1a1(skyes rabs): xxx
1b1(skyes rabs): rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi satwa a b+hUd+hA na kalpa
1b2(skyes rabs): latA/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs
2a1(skyes rabs): brjod pa'i dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing / thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gang thugs dri bral shel
2a2(skyes rabs): la chags tshon 'dzin pa min pa nyid// yid ni snying rjes brlan la gang gis skyon rnams ma lus skams// gang gis khro ba med la
2a3(skyes rabs): rang gis 'khor ba'i ngag mngon bcom// kun mkhyen de yis khyed la dge legs g.yo ba med gyur cig/ dam pa'i grib bsil
2b1(skyes rabs): dang ldan brtan pa'i chos kyi rtsa bas bskor zhing bsod nams ra bar gnas// blo dang rig pa snying rje la sogs chu yis rnam mdzes rnam par rgyas pa'i yal ga can// cho ga
2b2(skyes rabs): shes de mod yal 'dab grags snyan dkar ba'i me tog rtag tu dam pa'i 'bras bu ni// bsam kun yongasu rdzogs par mdzad pa dpal ldan sangs rgyas ljon pa rnam par rgyal
2b3(skyes rabs): gyur cig/ 'khor ba chu srin 'byung gnas las// 'gro ba gdon pa'i blo gros ni// mthu chen rnams la 'byung 'gyur te// de yang 'di skad rjes su thos// gser
2b4(skyes rabs): ba gam gzhal yas khang // khang pas bskor ba'i grong khyer ni// 'od ldan zhes bya bsod nams las// 'od ldan mtho ris lta bu yod// legs pa rnams kyis legs pa bI/
3a1(skyes rabs): rig 'dzin dang ldan grub pa dang // dri za'i tshogs kyis rab tu bsten// brgya byin grong khyer sar gshegs 'dra// chos kyi rgyal po'i pho brang bzhin// bsod nams khang pa bsngags 'os shing // pad ma dang brtul zhugs sbyin pa dang // brtse ba'i
3a2(skyes rabs): rang bzhin gyis rtag bsten// gzi brjid la brten lha rnams kyis// gang gi grags pa mngon mchod pa// rab gsal zhes pa'i sa bdag de// der nis yi TIg ler gyur// gang gi grags pa'i me tog gi/ dog pa yon tan dri bzang tshogs// phyogs kun ri dgas mig
3a3(skyes rabs): can gyi// rna ba yi ni rgyan du gyur// thabs shes ldan pa gang gi bka'// sa skyong mgo yi tshogs rnams la// gser gyi me tog dri med kyi// phreng ba bzhin du rab tu bgyid// nam zhig sa yi dbang phyug de// 'dun sar bzhugs la glang po yi// nags kyi bdag po
3a4(skyes rabs): mngon phyogs te// pus mos la btsugs nas smras// lhan cig khyod grags thos gyur nas// sa srungs sa la 'ongs pa lta'i// glang chen mchog tu mdzes pa ni// rmad du byung ba bdag gis bzung // skabs gsum par 'os so gnyis 'di// sgo na gnas so rab tu
3a5(skyes rabs): gzigs// gang phyir jo bos gzigs gyur na// g.yo ba 'khor yongs ngal 'bras dang bcas// de dag thos nas mi bdag ni// blon la yang dag bgros nas song // sgor ni so gnyis kaM la sha/ g.yo ba lta bur mthong gyur te// rab lhag dri bzang gis bos pa/
3a6(skyes rabs): bung ba 'gram pa'i rnga rnams kyis// sgeg pa'i rgyan ni yid 'ong ba// dpyid ka bzhin du rab tu bsten// 'bigs byed kyi ni chu shing dang // shal+la ki yi nags kyi dpal// dran las mig ni zum gyur cing // sa yi bar du lag pa brkyang // 'dab ma bdun pa'i dris rgyas
3b1(skyes rabs): shing // a gasta yis bstan pa las// 'bigs byed mi g.yos la ni// glang po'i rgyal por gyur ltar mtho// so yi ka bas rab brgyan cing // dpal 'byor rnam par rtse ba'i gnas// da ni rnam gzigs sa yi bdag/ ya mtshan gyur nas 'di ltar
3b2(skyes rabs): bsams// e ma gsar pa gsar par ni// rab gyur ngo mtshar sprul byed pa// bsngags 'os las rnams 'khor bar ni// spros pa'i rgyun thag chad pa med// bdud rtsi'i chu gter ma bsrubs shing // nor rgyas thang yang ma bcad la// ri bo bsgril ba med
3b3(skyes rabs): par ni// glang po 'di ni su yis bskrun// de nas glang chen kha lo pa// kun tu bgrod ces bka' nyan la// glang chen 'di ni thul cig ces// sa yi bdag pos kun tu bstan// de gdams sa skyong nang gi ni// grong gi khang par gshegs par gyur// bslab
3b4(skyes rabs): pa kun gyi khur bzod pa'i// glang chen kun tu bgrod kyi bzung // de yis slob ma dam pa bzhin// skye ba sngar goms dbang gyur pa// shes rab ldan de 'bad meng du// bslab pa kun gyi rnam dul thob// sbyin mang gdung ba med pa dang // stobs dang spro
3b5(skyes rabs): ldan bzod par ldan// ngag 'joms legs par 'gro ba de// rgyal po nyid dang mtshungs par 'gyur// des na glang po'i dbang po de// gdul ba'i bya ba mthar phyin nas// bya ba byas pa'i kun 'grod kyis// mo dbang la ni sbran par gyur// rnam 'gyur med pa'i
3b6(skyes rabs): stobs rgyas pa// lcags kyu'i dbang gyur de mthong nas// spro ba yi ni rtser bzhugs pa// rgyal po'i dpal du rgyal pos bsams// de nas rab dga' yang dag skyes// mkhas par bslabs pa blta phyir de// 'od stong shar gyi ri la bzhin// de la spro ba chen
4a1(skyes rabs): pos zhon// de nas glang po'i dbang po de// dkyil 'khor kun tu yang dag rgyu// mkhas pa blon bzhin dbang bsgyur ba// kun tu bgrod kyis yang dag bstan// rgyal po rang gi spro ba bzhin// glang po blta ba'i zhar la ni// rngon la rtse zhing
4a2(skyes rabs): dga' ldan pas// che ba'i nags su 'khyams par 'gyur// rin chen dpung rgyan 'od zer ni// ring du 'phro ste shal+la ka'i// lo 'dab mchog gis phyogs kyi ni// glang rnams 'bod pa lta bur song // nags su de ni 'gro ba dag/ rab dga' ya mtshan kun rgyas shing //
4a3(skyes rabs): mig ni rna bar rdzogs byas pa// nags kyi lha yis mthong bar 'gyur// nor 'dzin gyi bdag dbang po de// sha ba ri yi sna tshogs kyi// me tog dri bzang rdzogs pa'i rgyus// 'bigs byed rlung gis bsten par gyur// de nas 'bigs byed nye ba ni// rab dbang bde ba'i
4a4(skyes rabs): 'dab ldan par// rtse dga'i bsams pa dran gyur te// glang po shin tu rgod par gyur// dga' bas bcings pa'i glang mo yis// dri ma snom zhing gnyis 'thung de// mi bdag g.yer bas lugs bzhin du// lcags kyu'i dbang du gyur pa btang // so ldan 'dod chags
4a5(skyes rabs): kyis bkug pa// rjes su chags bcas rgyug pa de// rmongs pa 'khor ba dag la bzhin// gang du'ang dga' dang bral ma gyur// rlung bzhin mgyogs par bgrod pa yi// glang po mthong nas the tshom ni// skyes pa'i rgyal po glang po yi// kun tu bgrod la 'di smras so//
4a6(skyes rabs): kye ma ma la glang po 'di// khyod kyis 'dul ba 'dzin du bcug/ lcags kyu lci ba dag las kyang // gang zhig phyir phyogs song ba mthong // 'di yi rkang bkod khur gyis ni// phyogs kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba bzhin// rkang pas 'thung rnams rjes snyogs bzhin// sa rnams
4b1(skyes rabs): kun 'khrul myos pa bzhin// 'dir ni kha rje dus min par// rab tu mi mthun gyur pa bzhin// skyes bu'i bya ba thams cad la// 'bad pas zhugs pa 'bras bu med gyur// de skad rje yi gsung thos nas// 'jigs par gyur pa'i kun tu bgrod// bslab pa smad
4b2(skyes rabs): pas skyengs gyur cing // thal mo sbyar ba byas nas smras// lhan cig bdag gi glang po 'di// bye ba kun gyi dbang du bgyis// 'on kyang di ring glang mo yi// dri ma mnams shing rnam 'gyur gyur// 'dod pa'i dbang du gyur pa yi// skye bo rnams ni man ngag
4b3(skyes rabs): min// sdom pa ma yin yon min zhing // legs pa nyid min 'dod pa dran// yul las mngon par phyogs pa'i blo// dga' ba'i ro la chags gyur pa// shang shong mang po ri yi chu// rnam par ltung bzhin su yaM bzlog/ lus ni ngal ba'i bslab pa lnga//
4b4(skyes rabs): 'dul bar byed pa kho bo mkhas// yid ni sdom pa'i bslab pa la// thub pa rnams kyang mkhas pa min// chags las ngal ba mi rtsi zhing // bsdams pa ma lus dral gyur te// ngan rmongs bzhin du lam min nas// gnyis 'thung 'di ni rab tu rgyug/ skye
4b5(skyes rabs): bo ngan pa yangar ltung // nges par ltung ba bgyid pa nyid// sa bdag ljon pa'i lo ma rnams// yang dag zung la 'di ni mthong // mi bdag gis ni kun tu 'gro'o// de dus su 'od tshig thos nas// de dang lhan cig shing chen gyi// lo ma dag las 'phyangs par
4b6(skyes rabs): gyur// mi bdag shing las khabs gyur te// rta la zhon nas gshegs par gyur// glang pos nags su 'khyams gyur pas// glang mo la ni 'khyud pa thob// de 'og glang chen 'dod bzhi// nyin zhag bdun gyis 'dogs pa'i sar// rang nyid mngon du 'ongs shing
5a1(skyes rabs): chags// bza' ba mngon par 'dod cing gnas// brlab pas gdams pa'i dbang gyur cing // rang nyid 'ongs pa de mthong nas// mkhas pas shin tu dga' ba yi// kun tu bgrod kyis rgyal la smras// chags pa'i zhags pas drangs
5a2(skyes rabs): gyur cing // 'dod pas gzir nas rab song gang // bslab pa dag dang mi 'gal bar// glang po 'di de rang nyid 'ongs// brda' dang ldan pa'i dbang gyur gzigs// sa la kI sa ri ro shes pa// shin tu che ba'i lcags kyi zas// 'dzin cing dul ba dag tu gnas// 'di ni
5a3(skyes rabs): 'dod pa'i ro yi drangs// kun tu sdug bsngal ro yis drangs// 'dod pa'i rims ni rab zhi nas// phyi nas rnal du gnas pa thob// lha cig seng ge stag dang ni// glang po la sogs gdul bar nus// chags pa'i chang gis myos pa'i yid// yul la mngon par phyoT/
5a4(skyes rabs): pa yin// de dag thos nas sa skyong gis// de de bzhin zhes bsams nas smras// kun tu bgrong khyod bden pa dang // rig pa dag tu brjod pa yin// rab zhi ba yi tshul khrims gang dag gis// sems kyi gnyis 'thung myos pa ni// sdom pa'i thag pas btags gyur pa// /
5a5(skyes rabs): 'jig rten 'di ni 'ga' yod dmo// de skad smras tshe kun tu bgrod// lha ni zhugs pas de la smras// lha cig 'gro ba'i nyon mongs rnams// ma lus 'joms pa la brtson zhing // rnam par rig ldan 'jig rten na// 'bad pas chags brel skyed pa yod// zhi dang tshig
5a6(skyes rabs): sa dri ma med// rab rtogs sangs rgyas kho na'o// da ltar sangs rgyas mtshan thos pas// skye ba sngar skyes goms pa las// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems// rgyal po yi ni smon lam skyes// 'khor ba chu srin 'byung gnas su// rnam par bying pa'i 'gro
5b1(skyes rabs): ba 'di// dge ba'i lam nas rdzogs pa yis// byang chub grol bar yang dag bsgral// de nas de la nam mkha' las// gtsang ma ris kyi lha yi smras// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu// sa bdag mngon par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// de skad de yi tshig thos pas// rgyal
5b2(skyes rabs): po rdul bral rnams kyi mchog/ skye ba dran zhing lha mig ldan// byang chub sems dpa' nyid du gyur// de nas de ni snying stobs yang ldan mig ni de nyid dag la gtad // srid pa'i chu gtor bying ba'i 'byung po kun la rjes su brtse ldan zhing // yang dag rig pa spro ba dang ldan mngon
5b3(skyes rabs): par gsar bskyed pa las// sems can rnams ni yang dag bsgral phyir dge ba'i lam dag bgyis par gyur// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi khri shing las rab gsal gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab
5b4(skyes rabs): ste dang po / gang zhig bcang brda ro bstegs pas kyang // gzhan gyi don la gdung med pa// 'gro 'dir bsod namaso can rten gyi// rkang 'thung de dag rgyal gyur cig/ a riSh+Tha zhes bya ba'i grong // yon tan tshogs kyis bgrang bya ba/
5b5(skyes rabs): 'gran D+ha/ byin grong khyer ni// gang las brling ba med pa yod// der ni sa sbyong byung gyur pa// dpal gyi ste zhes rnam par grags// yon tan rin chen tshogs rnams kyi// 'byung gnas rin chen 'byung gnas bzhin// gzhan la phan pa'i nus pa can// gang gi mthu
5b6(skyes rabs): yis phyogs rnams kun// rjes su chags shing mdzes gyur pa// nyi ma yi ni 'od kyis bzhin// stug por sbyin pa'i dri bzang can// 'byor pa dkar ba'i grags pa dang // glang po gang gis 'gro ba dag/ mdzes pa dpag bsam ljon pa bzhin// skye dgu'i bsod
6a1(skyes rabs): nams kyis bkrun gang // sgyu rtsal gnas kyang drang bar gyur// drang por gyur kyang blo gros che// blo ldan gyur kyang slu byed min// ji srid tsha zer gyi gdung zhing // ji srid rlung ni skyo byed pa// de srid gang gi bka' dang ni// grags pa
6a2(skyes rabs): rab tu gzhom med gyur// mtshungs par ngal zhing mkhas pa dang // yon tan drug shes mig dang ldan// blon po stong phrag bcu gnyis kyiso// gang zhig yongs su nye bar bsten// chos gtsor 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dar// skye bo legs byas ldan par gyur//
6a3(skyes rabs): skye dgu rje dang yon tan gyis// mtshungs pa kho na bud med bzhin// de yi bsod nams dbang gis ni// skye bo mtho ris 'gro ba yis// gzhal med khang gis brgya byin grong // lam dang bral bar rab tu byed// lha yi 'jig rten dag tu mi'i// 'jig rten
6a4(skyes rabs): yong dag zhugs mthong nas// sa bdag la ni khro ba dag/ skyes pa mchod sbyin brgya pas bsams// kye ma so spyod dpal gyi sdes// shin tu sbyin par byed pa dang // dge ba'i khrims kyis skye dgu rnams// bdag dang mtshungs par rab tu bkong // bdag gis
6a5(skyes rabs): sgyu ma bsgrubs nas ni// sbyin pa'i snying stobs mthu ldan zhing // sems ni nyams pa med pa de'i// brtan po rab tu brtag par bya// de ltar yun ring rnam bsams nas// gzugs ni gzhan du bsgyur byas te// rjes 'i'abrang lha ni nyung ngu dang // mi yi 'jig
6a6(skyes rabs): rten dag tu zhugs// skabs der blo bzang blon po ni// rgyal srid srung ba'i bla ma yis// skye dgu'i bya ba gtso bor ni// yongs rtogs mi yi bdag la smras// rgyal po rgyal srid mdzes ldan zhing // rdu lo bral zol med sbyin byed pa// khyod kyis skabs gsuM
6b1(skyes rabs): dbang phyug ni// pham par byas pas ngo mtshar gyur// gzhan gyi yon tan rdzogs pa dang // bdag nyid de las dman pa ni// mthong nas phrag dog rnam 'phrul dag/ nges pa kho nar cis mi 'byung // chen po rnams kyi legs byas la'ang // khyad 'phags
6b2(skyes rabs): gzhan la 'gran pa'i me// bstan pa'i skye bo phrag dog can// phal cher gdung bas nyen par 'gyur// sbyin la gcags pa khyod kyi ni// nor kun sbyin pa lugasu 'gyur// bu dang chung ma bdag nyid kyang // sbyin bsam thubo chod shin tu chos// gang
6b3(skyes rabs): gi 'gro ba'i gtsug gis ni// nor bu nyams byed rab brjod pa// shin tu drag cing 'jigs pa'i rgyu// mi bzang rmi lam de de mthong // rnam shes de nyid smra ba rnams// sa skyong sku lus sbyin pa ni// bgyid par 'gyur zhes brnag ka'i gtam// rab tu smra
6b4(skyes rabs): ba dag kyang thos// lus kyi sbyin pa slong ba'i tshogs// kun gyi 'bras bu med pa'i rgyu// dpag bsam sar skyes gnas pa ni// kun la rab tu byin 'gyur nyid// de phyir sa sbyong khyod kyi lus// 'gro ba bsrung ba'i rin chen phyir// skye dgu'i dbang gyur gtong ba
6b5(skyes rabs): yi// thub chod 'di la dgyes bral mdzad// blon po'i mchog gis smras pa 'di// thos nas nor 'dzin bdag po ni// snying stobs dkar 'dzum gyis bkrus pa'i// mchu mdzes ldan pas de la smras// blon po chen po khyod kyis ni// blon pos 'ongs shing phan
6b6(skyes rabs): pa brjod// 'on kyang slong skyes phyir phyogs pa'i// gdung ba dag gis yongs mi bzod// slang zhig ces ni brjod pa la// dgag pa'i yi ge rtsub mo'i tshig/ gang gi kha nas rnam par rgya// de dag gson po srog song yin// 'di las 'di ni thob 'gyur zhes/
7a1(skyes rabs): snying la bzung nas slong ba po// 'ongs pa gang las phyir phyogs shing // 'gro ba'i gson pa de yis ci// sdug bsngal skye bo gang dag sa// gdung ba thob pas yid bsil zhing // snying rje med pa'i bdag nyid can// bsod nams zhan
7a2(skyes rabs): de'i skye ba smad// 'ba' zhig du ni 'ga' zhig tshe// 'ga' zhig 'ga' la phan por 'gyur// don de legs pa rnams kyi lus// 'di ni gnod par bcos kyang dga'// mi bdag snying stobs ldan pa'i tshig/ de skad thos nas blon po ni// g.yo ba med par 'gyur ro/
7a3(skyes rabs): zhes// bsams nas ci yang mi smra'o// de rjes nam zhig sa yi rje// rol cing rnam par gnas pa de'i// btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od ces pa// dga' ma'i bdag po'i dga' ma bzhin// mdzes ma sems kyi ri dgas zhags// 'chad la mkhas pa'i thub pa ni// ring nas rang
7a4(skyes rabs): dgar 'os gyur pa// mig ni 'dzum bral 'dzin pas mthong // skye ba snga ma gzhan dag tu// 'brel cing mdza' bas 'dris pa bzhin// de mthong de yis 'dzin pa dang // brtan pa'i phung po gtser ma gyur// de yi yid ni chags bral yang // bag chags kun nas lang
7a5(skyes rabs): gyur cing // dngos las phyir phyogs btang gyur te// mngon par 'dod pa'i sa la song // gang phyir srogs chags thams cad kyi// skye ba sngar goms bag chags ni// rgyun tu dga' ba'i skud pa yis// rtag tu btsems 'di med mi 'gyur// da ni gnasu 'ongs pa la//
7a6(skyes rabs): yon ni blang bar mdzod cig ces// klag pa'i brtul zhugs yongs rdzogs pa'i// slob ma bram ze'i khye'us smras// de la de smras mnyes go/ shin dag/ nagasu bdag la nor mi dgos// 'on kyang snying nas gus pa na// gang zhig mngon par 'dod pa nyon// sa bdag dpal snga'i
7b1(skyes rabs): lha mo ni// rgyal ba'i 'od de gal te na// khyod kyis sbyin du 'thob pa na// 'di ni bdag gi yon du 'gyur// de skad bla mas brjod thos nas// slob ma'i yid ni rab tu 'dar// mi phod blangs na rnyed pa la// the tshom kun tu 'khrugs par gyur// da ni slong rnams rang 'dod
7b2(skyes rabs): bzhin// rtag tu gdangs pa'i sgor song nas// sa skyong rnams kyi gtso bo yi// khang par yid ches zhan par zhugs// mi 'thob dogs slong zhum pa yi// bsams pas yid ni mi g.yo zhing // shin tu sbyangs las gdong btud de// sa la rtog cing lta ba
7b3(skyes rabs): bzhin// slong ba 'ongs pa de mthong nas// sa bdag rab tu dgyes par gyur// bdud rtsi rab sbyin chas pa yi// chu gter yang dag rgyas 'gyur bzhin// khyod kyi 'dod pa ci zhig ces// brjod nas sa la spyod pas mchod// 'os pa min brjod ngo tsha zhing // yi ge 'khrul
7b4(skyes rabs): par de yis smras// khyod ni slong ba'i dpag kasam shing // sngon chad gzhan gyis ma bslongs shing // shin tu rnyed dka'i gnas de yang // bla ma'i don du bdag slong gyur// bdag gi rig pa'i brtul zhugs rdzogs// skyob dpon mngon par 'dod pa'i yon// rgyal
7b5(skyes rabs): po lha mo rgyal ba'i 'od// gal te phod na slong bar mdzod// thub pa'i slob mas de brjod pa'i// 'phral nyid sa yi bdag blo'i yid // mdza' dang sbyin pa'i ror gcags pas// rnam pa gnyis zhig byung bar gyur// mo yi 'od zer mdun dkrigs pas// snying du
7b6(skyes rabs): sdug pa'i btsun mo dag/ dkar ba'i gos kyis g.yogs pa bzhin// de yis skye gnyis dag la smras// 'bral bas 'jigs pa'i sems la yang // nga yis bden par mi brtsi zhing // rnam par mi dpyad khyod kyi ni// bla ma gang bzhed bdag gis sbyin// de skad brjod
8a1(skyes rabs): nas rgyal po yis// btsun mo pad+ma'i spyan ldan ma// rtag tu snying la yang drug gcags// 'tsho srog gzhan pa lta bu bos// 'bral bas gdung ba'i me dag ni// bla mur gyur pa'i bzlog gyur cing // mdza' ba shin tu
8a2(skyes rabs): 'phel ba yi// 'dod pa'i gnyen gyis bkag gyur kyang // thub pa'i slob la rab tu byin// 'phral la ri dgas mo bzhin du// 'di ni mi nas ngal ba dang // skrag bcas mig ni rig rig gyur// sa spyod gtong ba'i ngang can gyis// dga' ma btang ba
8a3(skyes rabs): gyur pa la// gtong bas 'jigs pa bzhin du sa// chu gter ska rags g.yo ldan 'dar// gang phyir lus la gnas skabs ngan// dbang po zla sogs lha rnams kyis// bzod dka' yang ni bzod byed pa// dga' ma de la su mi dga'// la la'i tshul khrims
8a4(skyes rabs): la la'i nor// lA la'i dka' thub la la'i chos// la le'i ngo tsha la la'i lus// bud mdu chang du btang bar gyur// skyes bu rnams kyis 'tsho ba'i srog/ chags pa'i nor kun gang dag nyid// de nyid sems dpa' cha rnams kyi// sbyin pa rtsa yi gzugs ma bzhin// de ni
8a5(skyes rabs): blangs nas song ba dar// dal bas yid 'khrugs mi yi bdag/ dga' ma dang bral 'ad la sdang // yid 'byung bzhin du rab tu gyur// slob mas sa bdag chung ma ni// 'tsho ba dang bral 'jig rten dag/ pha rol sar 'grod bzhin blangs te// 'ong ba thub pas
8a6(skyes rabs): mthong gyur nas// 'gyod pa drag pos yang dag gdungs// mchog tu ngo tshas shin tu zhum// las ni rnam par bslad pa las// bdag nyid rigs pa min par bsams// kye ma ma rabs byis pa bzhin// bdag gis g.yo ba 'ba' zhig las// grags pa min
8b1(skyes rabs): pa'i 'dam du ni// dogs med rang gis bdag nyid bsgyur// bdag ni chos min byed pa yis// rigs gnas bla ma'i btsun mo ni// chos kyis skye dgu'i mar gyur 'di// sdug bsngal me la rab tu gtad // bdag gi tshul khrims ma bsams shing // yang
8b2(skyes rabs): dag sdom pa ma dran la// chags dang bral nyid ma brtsis shing // dben pa rnam par ma bltas ci// kye ma rtog dpyod med rnams yang // yang dag sdom min chang gis myos// legs pa'i lam las phyir phyogs te// 'dir ni g.yang sa kho nar rgyug/ de ltar
8b3(skyes rabs): bsams nas thub pa de// skyengs pas gzi byin nyams gyur te// bzhin ni dman pa mngon phyogs te// rgyal po'i btsun mo la smras pa// dbugs dbyung mdzod cig ma gcig kye// mya ngan bgyi bar mi 'os so// nges par bdag ni tshul ngan pas// khyod kyi
8b4(skyes rabs): sdug bsngal 'di nyid do// 'jug ngogs shing 'di'i 'og tu ni// ngal ba'i gdung ba btang byas nas// nga dang lhan cig ring khyim du// da lta nyid du khyod 'gror 'gyur// thub pas 'di brjod lha mo ni// bdud rtsi'i char gyis bran pa bzhin// 'jigs pa'i kun
8b5(skyes rabs): rmongs btang gyur cing // srog ni 'dzin pa rnyed par gyur// gtong ba'i spyod pa rmad byung gi/ mtho ris khyab pa de thos nas// rgyal po'i rtse ba'i snying stobs dag/ shes 'dod nor lha'i bu nyer 'ongs// mi mad nags su stag gis ni// smad kyi lus phyed zos
8b6(skyes rabs): gyur cing // bu bzhi yis ni ngu bzhin du// bzung bar gyur pa bram ze'i gzugs// khrag ni mang po rab zag cing // rgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor 'phyang dang ldan// sdig pa brtan par byas pa bzhin// sdug kyang srog dang ma bral te// rab tu gsar pa sha yi dris/
9a1(skyes rabs): sha za'i tshogs rnams rjes 'byung ba// bskam chags rgyal dang rkun pos bskyed// nor med rnams kyis nor ldan zhing // grong khyer dbus su zhugs pa las// de ni grong khyer na gnas rnams kyi// snying rje zhum dang sdug bsnga
9a2(skyes rabs): gzir// 'jigs dang ya mtshan rgyu ru gyur// de yis zos dka' mya ngan dang // skrag pa rnam pa dang bcos bzhin// 'phral du grong gi bud med rnams// 'jigs pas sgyid lugs par byas// de nas sa bdag slong ba rnams// blta phyir 'dun sar
9a3(skyes rabs): 'khod pa de'i// mdun du bu gzugs bzhi po des// de ni khri la bzhag ste bkod// mi bzod nyon mongs rnams 'khrugs shing // mi sdug cha lus de mthong nas// skye ba bzhin gyi tshogs rnams ni// sgra med mig ni zum par gyur// 'dar bas 'khru/
9a4(skyes rabs): shing brkyang pa yi// dpung pa g.yas pa bslang byas nas// gdung bas yi ge bral ba'i tshig/ de yis sa skyong dag la smras// sa bdag khyod na dge bar gyur// dram za dag gi gnas skabs 'di// bzod dka' sdig pa bzhin du thob// bdag la gzigs shig
9a5(skyes rabs): snying rje'i gter// 'khor ba lta bur 'jigs pa'i nags// zab mo dag tu stug gis zos// sdug bsngal rab tu lci ba 'di// longs spyod phyir na bdag 'tshe'o// phongs pa'i gdung ba 'di la yang // drag po'i nyon mongs bzod nus pa'i// srog 'dis bdag ni
9a6(skyes rabs): mi gtong ste// mdza' bshas dam pa'i skye bos bzhin// su zhig bdag nyid lus phyed bcang // gal te khyod la ster ba na// des khyod 'tshe bar 'gyur ro zhes// nam mkha'i lha yis bdag la smras// 'gro ba 'di na skye bo rnams// gzhan gyi don las phyir
9b1(skyes rabs): phyogs te// phal cher rang gi bde ba tshol// su zhig srog star snying rje'i gter// thams cad tshen thams cad gtong // dman zhing phongs pa rnams kyi gnyen// lus sbyin las kyang phyir ma phyogs// khyod la skyabasu bdag song ngo // zol med gus shing rgya che ba'i//
9b2(skyes rabs): sbyin par gang gi 'bras bu 'khrungs// khyod nyid gcig pu 'jig rten 'dir// legs byas rkang 'thung dag tu skyes// gtong pong ldan pa gang khyod kyi// lags byas rdo ni 'jig rten no// sbyin pa nyid kyis rdung por bgyid// yon tan bsgrags pa gzhan gyi ci// ltung
9b3(skyes rabs): zhong nyen rnams yongs su skyob// gtsang mar spyod pa'i brtul zhugs ldan// phongs pa'i dus su khyod lta bu// bsod nams tshang zong dag gis 'thob// mi dman kun tu dga' ba'i gaunyen// ha ri tsAn bzhin du bsil// lho yi phyogs kyi rlung gis bzhin//
9b4(skyes rabs): dam pa rnams kyi gdung ba 'phrog/ rdzogs pa'i zla ba khyod kyi zhal// mdzes pa 'di yi las 'khrungs pa yi// tshig gi bdud rtsi'i char rgyun ni// zla 'od lta bus gso ba nyid// de yis de skad brjod pa'i 'phral// de yi sdug bsngal snying la 'phos// myur zhing rtabs
9b5(skyes rabs): par rgyal po yis// rmongs shing brgyal ba de la smras// srog 'bral las skyes 'jigs pa dag/ khyod kyis thong la dbugs dbyung mdzod// lus phyed rtog dpyod med nyid du// gnyis skyes khyod la bdag gis sbyin// gang phyir skad cig 'dzad pa'i lus// 'di ni
9b6(skyes rabs): bsrungs kyang mi mdzad min// dam pa rnams kyis lus 'di ni// gzhan la phan phyir 'dzad par 'gyur// sa skyong de dag brjod ldan la// snying ni yang dag 'dar gyur pa// rdo rjes bcom bzhin blon po ni// chen po blo gros chen pos smras// kye ma bab col goms pa
10a1(skyes rabs): las// jo bo gdung bas gzir min nam// skye dgu bsod nams yongs zad las// phan pa nyid la mi rtsi'o// skyo dgu 'byor par 'gyid pa'i mthu// khyod mtshungs yon tan ldan pa su// gang zhig g.yog 'khor
10a2(skyes rabs): gud pas brjod// nyan dang byed po sa yi bdag/ rje bo glang chen rol pa ltar// mig zum phan pa mi mdzad na// 'khor bzang rnams kyi dbang thang dang // phun tshogs 'di snyed kho nar brtse// 'dul ba smra ba rnams kyi tshig/ dge ba'i me tog gis gtam+ba pa/
10a3(skyes rabs): sbrang rtsi'i dog pa gang dag giso// rna bar bgyis te yun ring mdzes// 'gro rnams bsrung ba'i rin chen gyis// sku lus su zhig slong gyur pa// 'di ni srin po 'am sha za ste// slu byed bram ze'i rnam par byas// gal te 'di ni che ba'i sgra// 'di yis nges par ma bgyid
10a4(skyes rabs): na// lus 'di bcad pa skad cig kyang // 'tsho ba de lta ga la mchi// gdon ngan dag gis legs byas ni// rtag dpyod med par gdu byed pa// de dag bdag nyid gdung zhing rtsub// 'jig rten gzhan du'ang bde ba med// rtag tu nus pa kho na sbyin// mi nus pa ni ji ltar
10a5(skyes rabs): sbyin// bdog kun dang ni lus sbyin sogs// rab tu smra ba khyo na mdzes// gang 'di rgya mtsho nor bu stor // ring nas rno ba'i bdud rtsi ste// slong ba yang dag 'ongs rnams kyi// der ni btung ba'ang gzhan las so// rgyal po skye dgu rnams kyi srog/ slong ba rnams kyi yid
10a6(skyes rabs): bzhin nor// khyod ni 'bad pa thams cad kyis// gzhan srog gis kyang bsrung bar 'os// lha cig bab bcol ma mdzad par// bdag la dang zhing brtse bar mdzod// mching bu dum bu'i slad du ni// rin chen btsong bar mo midzod cig/ 'di smras rje yi zhabs dag la//
10b1(skyes rabs): blon po gang zag 'gyel gyur kyang // sa bdag lus 'di sbyin pa yi// rnam par brtag las g.yos ma gyur// dga' ba'i 'dzum gyis phye ba yi// so yi 'od kyis srog la ni// chags pa rmongs pa'i mun pa dag/ yongs su 'phrog bzhin de yis smras// blon po
10b2(skyes rabs): chen po khyod kyis 'di// gus dang bcas pa 'ba' zhig tu// gsal bar brjod de bram ze'i srog/ the tshom nga yis mi bzod do// do shal grang reg pad+mo dang // pad rtsa zla btsun gyis// nang gi gdung zlog slong ba ni// phyir phyogs sdug bsngal las skyes min//
10b3(skyes rabs): sdug bsngal dag gis gzir ba kun// kun nas 'phrog sems spro ldan pa// bdag gi byang chub bar chad ni// blo bzang bgyi bar mi 'os so// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi// sems kyi 'das gyur bdag gis dran// skyo ba gzhan du'ang lus po dog/ byin
10b4(skyes rabs): bis dag ni nad med gyur// stag mo ltogs shing nyan med sngon// bu ni bza' bar brtson mthong nas// de bsrung slad du lus po ni// rnam 'gyur med par bdag gis byin// shi bir skyes tshe long ba la// mig ni zung dag bdag gis byin// khra las skyes
10b5(skyes rabs): ba'i 'jigs pa las// phug ron rang gi lus kyis bsrungs// zla ba'i 'od du gyur tshe yang // drag po'i mig la mgo bo btang // skye ba gzhan du bdog kun dang // bu dang chung ma sogs kyang byin// sa spyod byang chub sems dpa' yis// de skad smras pa blon
10b6(skyes rabs): bo'i mchog/ gson min shi ba ma yin bzhin// dbang po gdung bas nyen por gyur// de nas sog le rnon po yis// sku lus bcad pa'i bya ba dag/ bgong bar mi nus rgyal po'i bkas// bzo bo dog la bskos par gyur// mya ngan drag pos 'bangs
11a1(skyes rabs): de dag/ brgya byin rgyu yis rnam rmongs te// ji zhig ltar stes sa bdag gis// lus ni gcod la yang dag zhugs// sogs la rno zhing rtsub pa yis// mi bdag rnam 'gyur mi mnga' ba'i// lus phyed rnam par bcad pa'i tshe//
11a2(skyes rabs): sa ni yang dag g.yos par gyur// skar mda' ltung ba'i gos dmar can// rgyu skar 'khrugs shing sgra chen sgrogs// mchi ma'i thogs pa'i tshogs ltung zhing // mkha' ni sgra bcas du ma bzhin// mi rung gzigs pas drag po yi// sdug bsngal shin
11a3(skyes rabs): tu bzod dkar gyur// nyi ma rdul gyis gos dag gis// myur du gdong pa bsgribs pa bzhin// skye dgu'i mgon gyi lus la der// sog las gshags pas skye dgu rnams// dus shing phyogs kyis bu mo yis// sgra snyan rnams kyis cho nges bkang // mi
11a4(skyes rabs): bdag snying stobs ma bri ba// brgya byin gnyis skyes mdog dbyibs can// ye mtshan 'gyod pas non pa yi// sems kyis mthong nas ring zhig bsams// 'di las blo chen 'di yi yid// gzhan gyi don du gdung ba la// snying rje bas kyang mnyen pa dang /
11a5(skyes rabs): rdo rje bas kyang sra ba thob// kye ma bdog nyid tshe spyod tshul// rgya mtsho bas kyang shin tu zab// ri rab pas kyang yang dag mtho// mtho ris pas kyang ngo mtshar bcas// kye ma srog 'di 'gro na yang // snying stobs rgya mtsho snying stobs ldan// dam pa ya ngar lhung
11a6(skyes rabs): na yang // chen po nyid ni mi nyams bzhin// mig stong ldan pas de bsams che// sa yi bdag po'i lte 'og nas// lus phyed nges par bcad nas ni// sa la myur du ltung bar 'gyur// lus ni rnam gnyis gyur kyang de// dga' dang spro ba'i rang bzhin gyur//
11b1(skyes rabs): 'byung po kun yongs bskyabs pa yi// snying stobs kyis ni sog nas bzung // de yi bka' yis lus phyed ni// sbyar nas nyams pa rnal du gnas// yongs rdzogs lus ni yang dag langs// bram ze yis ni de la smras// e ma rgyal po khyod kyi
11b2(skyes rabs): ni// zol med lus kyi sbyin pa yis// rdul bral mchod 'os khyad par du// dri med grags bsna rnam par mdzes// khyod yid nor bu dri med dang // mtshungs pa ci yang ma byas pa// kye ma byed po rmongs pa dag/ dpe yis kyang ni shin tu dbul//
11b3(skyes rabs): drung zhing rab zlum mngar bas khengs// mtho zhing bcas par gyur pa yi// bur shing sdong po lta bu yis// gzhan don bzod dka'i gdung ba bzod// 'di smras bram ze'i dbyibs can gyi// brgya byin dran pa las skyes pa// yang dag gso byed sman gyi
11b4(skyes rabs): tshigs// bdud rtsi zhu bas de rdzogs byas// de nas byad gzugs gsal bar byas// yongs su tshim nas brgya byin gyis// rang gis lus phyed legs sbyar ba'i// sa yi bdag po rab tu bsngags// de nas me tog dkar po'i tshogs/
11b5(skyes rabs): mkha' las rab tu ltung gyur pa// de tshe sa gzhi dga' zhing dgod// gyen du bskyod pa lta bus mdzes// de ltar gyur pas mtshar skyes pa// thub pas skabs der de la ni// btsun mo dga' ma rgyal ba'i 'od// khyer te mngon du phyogs nas
11b6(skyes rabs): phul// rnam dag rang gi grags pa bzhin// btsun mo de dang yang dag 'gro gos// gnod la rnam 'gyur mi mnga' ba// brgya byin gyis dris de yis smras// de nas rab mchog seng ge'i khri// bi sh+tsa karmas sprul pa dang // rin chen char gyi
12a1(skyes rabs): rab gang ba'i// 'dzam bu'i gling du sa bdag ni// lha yi dbang pos bsngags byas nas// btsun mor bcas pa mngon dbang bskur// sbyin pa'i bsod nams mthus bskrun pa'i// dge bas skye dgu tshim par byed//
12a2(skyes rabs): 'khor ba'i sems can mtha' dag ni// yang dag sgrol ba'i brtul zhugs byas// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu// mngon 'tshang rgya yid rab dgrar gyur// rgyal po'i thugs ni byams pa dang // snying rje dar bab snying stobs grub// rnam par dag cing phongs
12a3(skyes rabs): ba'i gdung ba rab zhi'i 'bras rgyas dag/ rab ster rab dga'i chu yas bkrus pa'i mig gis bltas nas skyengs gyur pa'i// brgya byin 'chi med grong khyer de yi grags pas khengs pa dag tu song // de ltar de ni lha yi tshogs dang grub pa gnod sbyin dang // lto
12a4(skyes rabs): 'phye'i dbang gis spu ldang mdzes pa'i byug pas mchod ldan mthu// sa rnams dag ni mtho ris brtag byar byas shing bsrung nus la// srid bral 'byor pa dag gis mdzes pa thob ldan byang chub sems// sngon byung yang dag brjod pa yis// sbyin pa khyad 'phaT
12a5(skyes rabs): gsol byed cing // dge slong rnams la gdams pa'i slad// bcom ldan rgyal ba de skad gsungs// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi khri shing las dpal gyi sde'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yul
12a6(skyes rabs): 'dab ste gnyis pa'o// / 'gro ba 'dir spros pa rmad byung rin chen tshogs// chu srin 'byung gnas dag las skye bar ldan// su zhig kyang ni rab tu gsal ba ru// bde bar 'gro ba skyes bu rin chen skyes// ba gam 'od tshogs
12b1(skyes rabs): ga pur gyis// yongs su dkar ba'i grong khyer ni// shA ke ta zhes bya ba ste// skal bzang sa yi thig le yod// 'jug ngogs bzhin du bsten 'os gang // bsod nams byed gtsang gzi byin dang // snying stobs rang bzhin gaM gA ltar// dri med yid ldan
12b2(skyes rabs): dag tu gnas// nam zhig grags pa'i me tog ldan// bsod nams dri bzang rab tu rgyus// legs byas skyed tshal dga' ster du// grong khyer pa rnams rab tu rtsen// der ni sa bdag chu gter che// rab mang yon tan rin chen dang // grags pa'i ri bong
12b3(skyes rabs): mtshan ma bskyed// gser gyi gtsug bud ces grags byung // rtag tu dam pas bsten 'os shing // rtsod dus rab tu 'phrog byed pa// rdzogs ldan lta bu gang gis ni// skye bo chos rnams 'dzin par byas// sa bdag bzod la kun chags shing // dpal gyis dkris
12b4(skyes rabs): gyur snying rje dgo'// rab grags la yang dbang thul gang // skye dgu rnams kyi dga' byed gyur// 'tshe med mchod sbyin bslab ldan pa// gang gis bsod nams mi 'jigs yon// mi gsod sgra dbyangs yongs rdzogs pa// 'byung po kun la byin par gyur// mthu dang
12b5(skyes rabs): ldan yang gang ma myos// rnam par 'byor yang snyan par smra// rje nyid yin yang bzod ldan tshul// lang tsho ldan yang dbang po thul// mthon por gyur pa'i zla mo dang // zla ba'i 'od zer dpa' bo dang // sa gzhi 'dzin pa dam pa'i phyogs// gang gis ya mtshan byas
12b6(skyes rabs): par gyur// rgyal po do zla med pa de'o// rgyan ni gnyis shig byung gyur te// gtong ba rdzogs pa'i snying rje dang // legs byas dpal ni dar bab pa'o// pad+ma'i 'byung gnas de yi ni// lha mo mdzes ldan dga' mar gyur// snga dro'i dpal bzhin rtag tu ni// skyon med
13a1(skyes rabs): dga' ba mngon par 'char// lus ni rje yi yon tan dang // dpal ni 'bar ba gtong ba dang // mdzes pa nyid ni khrims kyis bzhin// de ni rgyal po'i zla bas mdzes// rtag tu dga' byed snyam pa dag/ rab bkram rnam par grags pa de//
13a2(skyes rabs): sa 'dzin mchog gi mdzes gyur pa// mtho ris dpal gyis lhun po bzhin// rdza las dus su dge ba'i gnas// mngal ni de yis bzung gyur te// 'jig rten pad+ma 'byor pa'i slad// a di ti yis nyin byed bzhin// bdud rtsi'i zer gyis chu gtar rlabs// tshangs
13a3(skyes rabs): pa'i pad+mas khyab 'jug lce// dag byed dag gis srub shing bzhin// de ni mngal gyis mdzes par gyur// de yi mngal gyi mthus sres pa'o// mngon par 'dod bzhin mi bdag gis// mngon par 'dod pas mngon lhag nairI// slong ba'i don mthun kun la byin//
13a4(skyes rabs): slar yang sa bdag gis sred dris// dge ba'i mngal dang ldan ma ngas// dbyangs can ma bzhin rang nyid kyis// dam chos rnam par bshad pa byas// yongs rdzogs bsod nams rin chen ni// chos gtir bsgrub pa rab 'dzin pas// phongs pa'i sdug bsngal rgyas
13a5(skyes rabs): pa las// rtag tu bsrung shing rab tu bsrung // 'brog dgon bgrod dkar yongs lhung 'jig rten ni// pha rol lam du gdung bas nyen rnams la// yid 'ong rab rgyas 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i phyogs// grib shing chos dang mtshungs pa gzhan yod min// rab rib
13a6(skyes rabs): can la snang ba phongs pa'i dug la nor bu ltung ba lag pa'i 'che la sa ste// slong la dpag bsam ljon pa 'gro la rgyal ba'i shing rta lam gzhan dag la lam gyi rgyags// sdug bsngal nad la sman chen dang ni srid pa'i 'jigs pa kun 'khrugs bsam pa
13b1(skyes rabs): dbugs 'byin pa// gdung ba bdag la tsAn nags tshal brtan pa'i mdza' bshes chos ni dam pa rnams kyi gnyen// de sogs mi bdag btsun mo'i tshig/ dkar ba'i chos ni thos gyur nas// dpal ldan 'gro la 'jig rten du// dam chos gcig pu skyabasu
13b2(skyes rabs): gyur// de nas dus ni yongs rdzogs te// mkha' las bdud rtsi'i 'od zer bzhin// 'gro ba'i rab rib 'joms pa'i bu// lha mo las ni btsas par gyur// de yi gtsug rgyan nor bu ni// lhan skyes dag tu skyes gyur te// skye ba gzhan sngar 'grogs pa
13b3(skyes rabs): yi// dben pa bzhin du dri ma med// de yi gtsug na gang 'od mthus// mtshan mo nyin du bgyid pa yis// nor bu bsod nams las skyes pa// rab tu sdug de yis mdzes par gyur// gtsug tor dang btsas nor bu de'i// bdud rtsi'i khu ba'i thigs
13b4(skyes rabs): pa yis// lcags rnams myur du zhi ba dang // gser du bsgrub pa nyid du'ang bgyid// de nas skye dran byis pa de'o// tshig gis sa yi bdag po yis// nor bu'i bcud 'khrungs gsar rnams la kun// slong ba rnams la rtag tu byin// de skyes tshe na
13b5(skyes rabs): lha rnams kyis// mkha' la grong khyer me tog dang // rin chen rgyal mtshan gdugs dang ni// ba dan rlung g.yab gos kyis bkang // shin tu gsal bar bskyed pa yi// rig pa kun gyi rnam mdzes bdag/ de ming mi bdag gis mdzad po// gtsug
13b6(skyes rabs): na nor bu zhes su grags// yongs 'du dag gis chu gter bzhin// bu skyes mngon par skyes pa des// yab kyi bsam pa dga' ba yi// bdud rtsis rab tu rgyas par byas// rgyal bas pi lo ma bzhin d+ha// gzhon nus dri yi sras mo bzhin// mchod par 'os par
14a1(skyes rabs): skyes pa yi// gzhon nu de yi yum yang mdzes// de nas dus kyis yi bdag/ bsod nams them skas dag la ni// lha yi gnas su yang dag 'dzegs// gtsug na nor bu mi bdag gyur// slo ba rnams kyi ying
14a2(skyes rabs): bzhin nor// de yi sbyin pas yongs khebs pas// bsod nams bde snang 'jig rten na// phongs par gyur med slong ba'ang med// rgyal po de yi glang chen ni// bzang po'i ri zhes bya bar gyur// bdag po bzhin du rjes mdun par// sbyin pa'i
14a3(skyes rabs): brlan ldan lag pa'i rdzing // nam zhig 'jig rten 'dren byed de// chen po'i gnas na 'khod gyur pa// b+hi gu'i rigs 'khrungs thub pa ni// srid 'byor yang dag 'ongs gyur te// mi dmon mtshan mo'i bdag po yis// 'od kyi dpal 'byor gzugs
14a4(skyes rabs): can bzhin// 'jo sgeg rol pa'i bzhin ras can// mdzes ma mchog gcig bzung bar gyur// nu ma dag no mi dben zhing // rkang pa'i chu skyes dmar ba dang // mig dag g.yo bas 'gro la de// shin tu ngo mtshar gyur pa bzhin// dka' thub dpal
14a5(skyes rabs): dang 'grogs pa bzhin// mdzes ma rjes 'brang thub pa des// skye dgu'i mgon gyis mchod byas nas// stan ni yongasu gzung bar gyur// mdzes ma des kyang mi bdag ni// brtan ldan zab cing mdzes pa dag/ gzhan gyi gdung la snying rje nas// gzhu
14a6(skyes rabs): bzhag 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bzhin// gtsug gi rin chen 'od zer ni// mi rung 'jig par byed pa yis// phyogasu bsrung ba'i yig phreng dag/ gur gum gyis ni 'bri ba bzhin// rlung ni g.yabs shing 'phen byed pa'i// rnga yab dag gis rnam mdzes pa//
14b1(skyes rabs): 'gro ba yang dag sgrol min par// snying stobs gyen du 'phyur bcas bzhin// rin chen yid 'ongs do shal dag/ snying dkar gzung bar byas pa ni// sa 'og rgud pa zhi ba'i slad// lhag ma can gyis bstan pa bzhin// che ba'i dpung pas sa dang ni// sems
14b2(skyes rabs): kyis bzod pa thob pa dag/ mthong nas mngon par 'dod pa dang // ya mtshan dbang du rab tu gyur// ri dgas g.yo ba'i mig can ma// lus med kyi ni bsngos gyur te// thub pas pang du bzung nas ni// 'gro ba'i bdag la rab smras pa// 'jig rten 'di nas
14b3(skyes rabs): 'gro ba'i mig/ 'dab brgya rnam par rgyas byed pa// lha ni khyod dang nyi ma dag/ 'char bas rab tu mdzes par gyur// 'byor las snyed slar 'byung ba yi// kun rmongs grogs ldan rgyags pa dag/ dge rnams yon tan la sdang bzhin// e ma ho khyod la med pa
14b4(skyes rabs): nyid// rgyal po byams ldan 'jig rten mgon// 'jig rten snying rje kun rdzogs thugs// khyod kyis grags pa sgron ma bzhin// mchog tu pha rol phyin par gyur// khyod ni mi skyo drang po dang // gtong pod zol med legs byas ldan// 'di nyid phyir
14b5(skyes rabs): na khyad par du// blo ldan rnams kyis bsten byar gyur// mdzes ma me tog mig can 'di// pad+ma'i khong nas yang dag byung // sbyin bsreg lhag ma'i 'o ma yis// bdag gis gan suM legs par bsos// btsun mo chun mo sa gzhi yi// chun mar skyes
14b6(skyes rabs): mchog khyod kyis long / khab 'ja'i dpal mo bzhin// 'di ni khyod bdag nyid la 'os// dus kyis mchod sbyin bsod namos 'bras// rdzogs par bdag la sbyin par mdzod// 'di brjod cho gas rgyal po la// mdzes ma byin nas thub pa gshegs//
15a1(skyes rabs): yid srubs dga' ma thob pa bzhin// rgyal pos sdug ma pad+ma ldan// dge la bsod nams ldan pa bzhin// mdzes pas skyed mos tshal du brtses// de nas dus kyis de yi bu// 'khri shing smyig ma'i mu tig bzhin// bdud rtsi pad+mo'i
15a2(skyes rabs): gtsug ces pa// yab kyi yon tan me long gyur// brgya byin 'jig rten skyong sogs kyis// 'gom par mi 'os che bar dang // rang nyid pad+mar skyes sogs kyis// kun nas bstod 'os spyod par ldan// grags pa'i dri bzang rob rgyas pas// phyogs kyi khongs ni yang
15a3(skyes rabs): dag rdzogs// slong ba'i tshogs kun dge ba ru// bgyid pa'i dpag bsom rkang 'thung ni// sa bdag dag gis thub pa'i tshig/ dus su bya bo dran gyur nas// mi 'tshe nor ni yongs rdzogs shing // yon ni yangs pa'i mchod sbyin byas// b+hi gu'i bu sogs
15a4(skyes rabs): thub pa dang // mi dag rab tu bzod dka' sogs// 'dod pa kun gyis ma bsdams pa'i// mchod sprin der ni yang dag 'ongs// grangs med nor gyi char 'babs pa'i// sbyin bsreg mngon du gyur pa der// me yi dbus na lho yi dbang // srin po'i gzu
15a5(skyes rabs): su yang dag langs// rid cing rnam 'gyur lus can de// sa skyong la nI tre ba t+ye de// bdag ni bkres skom thAM/ ba za' dang btung ba slong bar 'gyur// de nas sra yi bdag po'i bkas// rim gro pa yi 'khor rnams kyis// bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang // btung ba dag
15a6(skyes rabs): kyang nye bar bstabs// de bas srin pos sa bdag la// cung zad rgod bzhin rab tu smras// rgyal po 'di la bdag mi dga'// gang phyir bdag ni sha yis 'tsho// 'phral la bsad pa'i sha dang ni// shin tu mang ba'i khrag dag gis// bdag cag tshim
15b1(skyes rabs): pa rab tu skye// gang zhig 'dod pa gnang bar mdzod// 'dod kun rab tu ster ro zhes// khyod can bdag ni yang dag 'ongs// sbyin no zhes ni rab bsgrags nas// dgag pa khyod kyi 'os pa min// de skad srin po'i tshig thos nas// snying rjes gzir ba'i mi bdag
15b2(skyes rabs): ni// 'chi ba med par nges pas na// slong ba phyir phyogs sdug bsngal gyur// bzod dka'i 'tshe ba mi bzod de// slong ba 'bras bu med pa'ang min// kye ma chos la the tshom 'di// byed pos byas shes de yis bsams// bsad pa med par lus las ni//
15b3(skyes rabs): dag rnyed pa yod ma min// bdag gis glog sbur dag gis yang // lus kyi nyon mongs phra mi bzod// bdag gis 'byung po thams cad la// 'jigs med bsod nams yon byin nas// srog chags bsad las byung ba'i sha/ 'di la bdag gis ji ltar sbyin//
15b4(skyes rabs): de ltar legs bsams mi bdag ni// snying rjes 'khrugs pas de la smras// rang lus yang dag bcad nas ni// sha khrag khyod la sbyin par bya// sa yi bdag pos de smras pas// 'gro ba rnams ni 'khrugs par gyur// lus ni zad par spro ba yang // grogs
15b5(skyes rabs): mchog rnams kyi bzod ma gyur// sa skyong de bzhin thub rnams kyis// brtse bas rab tu bzlog gyur kyang // rang gi lus la bcad nas ni// sha khrag zhag rnams dri la byin// mgrin pa'i bar du khrag 'thungs pa'i// srin pos sa yi bdag po yi// sha
15b6(skyes rabs): rnams rab tu za ba'i tshe// skad cig sa ni rab tu 'dar// de nas lha mo pad+ma ldan// bdag po de ltar gyur mthong nas// smre sngags 'don cing rab tu 'gyel// rmongs shing brgyal bas dkris par gyur// mi yi dbang po'i snying stobs ni// rab rgyas de mthong lha
16a1(skyes rabs): dbang gis// srin po'i gzugs ni yongs btang nas// tha la mo sbyar nas de la smras// oM ma ho rgyal po khyod kyis ni// bya ba dka' ba'i las 'di yis// ba spu langs pa'i gtams pa'i gos// lus la ci
16a2(skyes rabs): phyir 'byung mi 'gyur// rgyal po rdul bral khyod kyi ni// e ma bsod nams thun mong min// e ma snying stobs bla na med// e ma bstan pa mtha' dang bral// pha rol sdug las sdug bsngal zhing // rnyed dka' la yang chags dang bral// mi mthun phyogs
16a3(skyes rabs): lo bzod ldan pa// dam pa rnams ni legs byas lam// gang gis 'jig rten gsum po la// rjesu brtser gyur bdag nyid che// snying rjes brlan pa'i snying stobs kyi// spro bi 'di ni yang dag gsal// 'di brjod lha yi sman rnams kyis// de lus rnal du gnas
16a4(skyes rabs): par byas// rab tu dang zhing ngo ches dman// brgya byin rang gi gnas su song // de nas mchod sbyin cho ga bzhin// rdzogs te skabs gsum pas mchod pa'i// sa yi bdag pos rgyal po dang // thub mchog rnams kyang mchod pa byas// mchod sbyin 'jug tu mdzes
16a5(skyes rabs): ma dang // grong dang grong khyer rin chen char// skabs gsum par 'os rta dag ni// gser gyi phreng ldan bcas des byin// dpag tshad brgyar ni mgyogs pa ru// nyi ma gcig gis 'gro ba gang // rgyal po'i glang chen 'dun na 'din// tshangs pa'i shing rta zhes bya la//
16a6(skyes rabs): rgyal po glang chen bzang po'i ri// de la yang dag gtad mthong nas// rgyal po shin tu bzod dka' der// chags pas drangs pa'i yid du gyur// de nas sa bdag mchod sbyin gyi// dpal gyis ya mtshan gshegs gyur cing // sa la spyod pas mchod sbyin
16b1(skyes rabs): 'bras// b+h+ri gu'i bu la gtad pa'i tshe// ma ro rtsi slob thub pa ni// mchod dang stan thob bA hi ka/ yang dag 'ongs nas shis pa'i tshig/ sngon du btang nas de la smras// rgyal po slob gnyer dag gi mthar// bdag gi bla ma bla ma'i yon// g.yog 'khor don
16b2(skyes rabs): du skye bo ni// thun mong pa la rnyed dka' zhes// sgrub byed khyod nyid gcig po yis// rnyed dka' rab tu sbyin pa sprul// dpag bsam rkang 'thung 'jig rten na// nam yang mang po skye mi 'gyur// bdag gi bla ma dka' thub kyis// nyam chung rgas pa'i g.yog
16b3(skyes rabs): 'khor du// pad+ma ldan pa'i lha ma ni// bu dang bcas pa gnang bar mdzod// thub pas de brjod rgyal po ni// brtan pas 'dzin btsun mo dang // 'bral las skyes pa'i mya ngan las// yid ni brtan pas de la smras// dga' ma srog las mngon par lhag/
16b4(skyes rabs): rgyal tshab dag dang bcas pa ni// mngon par 'dod pa bla ma'i yon// thub pa khyod la rab tu sbyin// de skad brjod nas mi bdag gis// pad ldan sras bcas de la sbyin// sems dpa' tshul ldan bdag nyid rnams// rang srog la yang chags med gtong // byal
16b5(skyes rabs): ba'i nyon mongs kyis skrag pa'i// rgyal po'i btsun mo sras dang bcas// blangs te gnas su song nas ni// thub pas bla ma la rab phul// skabs der dregs bcas ku ru'i rgyal// shin tu bzod dkas sa dbang la// glang chen bzang po'i ri bo ni// 'byor phyir pho nyas
16b6(skyes rabs): nye bar bslangs// mdun na 'don la byin zin pa'i// so gnyis rgyal pos ma byin gang // de tshe rang nyid mang po'i sdes// g.yul ni rab nyid tu 'gyed du 'ongs// ku ru'i rgyal po'i dpung rnams kyis// grong khyer lam rnams bgags pa la// sa gzhi sbyong bI
17a1(skyes rabs): dmag gi tshogs// g.yul du 'jug pa rab spror gyur// dpa' bo glang chen seng ge de// dgra ni rnam 'joms nus gyur kyang // skye bo mdzad pas 'jigs shing 'khrugs// snying rje las ni yang dag bsams// rgyal po shin tu
17a2(skyes rabs): bzod dka' ni// bdag gi yang dag sbyor ba 'di// bdag gi rjes mthun grogs kyi mchog/ glang po dag la chags rmongs pas// kye ma 'brel la dgra nyid gyur// dam pa'i mdza' ba mdza' ba'i mtha'// bar ma rnams kyi mdza' med mtha'// ngan pa rnams kyi
17a3(skyes rabs): srog 'phrog pas// shin tu 'jigs rung dag mtha' yin// kye ma 'byor pa la chags pas// bdag gi yang dag sbyor ba 'di// srog ni skad cig 'jig ldan zhing // gzhan gyi srog ni gcod pa la'o// 'tshe bas ngal la rab chags shing // g.yul gyi khrag
17a4(skyes rabs): gis mngon bkrus pa'i// sems can yang dag sbyor ba 'di// zas don rtsod pa'i las la'o// g.yog 'khor gtum drag phra ma can// srog ni 'tshong zhing kha zas dag/ don gnyer rnams kyi rtsod pa ni// khyi rnams kyi bzhin bzod par dka'// kye ma rdzas la
17a5(skyes rabs): chags pa'i blo// pha rol gdung bas bsil gyur pa// rang nyid bde ba kho na'i phyir// ma rungs spyod la rab tu rgyug/ gang zhig g.yul grub go bgos shing // khrag gis sbags pa'i dpal za ba// de snying rab tu drag po la// snying rje'i cha ni ga la zhig/ rgyal
17a6(skyes rabs): po shin tu bzod dka' 'di// rnam par 'byor la chags shing rmongs// bdag gi snying rje'i sul gyur pas// gnod byang gyur kyang bsad mi 'os// de ltar bsams shing rje las// nags no tshol byed de yi slad// rang sangs rgyas ni rnam pa bzhi// rang nyid mkha'
17b1(skyes rabs): las yang dag 'ongs// kun mkhyen mchod dang stan thob cing // dang bas rab zhi dang tshul can// rgyal po'i yang dag bzhed pa de// thos nas de nyid rab tu gsungs// 'khor ba kun rmongs rab rab kyis// 'ong bar brtse ba dang ldan pas// sems dpa'
17b2(skyes rabs): snang ba'i rnam rig can// sa spyong khyod ni mdzes par gyur// rgyal po dgyes par mdzod cig dang // byang chub tu ni blo gros chags// da lta rab tu 'gog pa'i tshe// nags nyid du ni 'askye bar byos// chu rgyun rab gsal lhung lhung sgrogasayang dag sim byed
17b3(skyes rabs): thigs pa can// dben pa'i nags kyis phyogs de// zhi ba rnams kyi dga' skyes nyid// rjes su bzung blos 'di gsungs nas// de la mkha' gshegs bsgrubs byas te// 'od kyis phyogs rnams rab gsil zhing // de dang lhan cig de rnams gshegs// de
17b4(skyes rabs): rnams rang rang gnas gshegs te// sa skyong gangs can ngos kyi nags// yang dag thob pas rab tu dang zhing // rab tu zhi ba dag tu gyur// snying stobs ldan rnams nang na ni// de blo dben zhing dri ma med// dga' ba'i char ni rdzogs pa'i sa// nags kyis
17b5(skyes rabs): gzhi bzhin du gyur// swa bdag 'od ldan 'phral la ni// sa 'dzin bdag gis bsgribs pa der// gti mug rab rib thob pa yi// mya ngan 'gro tshogs skye dgu nyal// de nas thub pa ma ri rtse'i// gan su de yi blon po yang // rgyal srid bsrung bar
17b6(skyes rabs): nus gyur pa'i// rgyal po'i sras ni rab tu bslangs// thub pas rnam 'gyur med pa byin// blon po yis ni blangs byas te// rgyal sras rang gis grong khyer du// dmag tshogs yang dag ldan par byas// de nas dmag snga'i spro ba bzhin// shin tu dpa' ba
18a1(skyes rabs): sngon 'gro ba// rgyal po mchog gi sras po yis// 'khrugs dku ru'i rgyal po sleg/ de yi shing rta glang po che// bcom zhing rnam bshigs bcags pa de// 'brog pas yongs skyob byed cing // tas+t+rin+d+hu yi sbyong du
18a2(skyes rabs): song // stobs ldan rgyal po'i sras po des// shin tu bzod dka'i g.yul bcom la// blon pos de dpungs bkod pas// lhag ma can bzhin dga' bar 'gyur// de nas dus kyis sdig bdag nyid// rgyal po shin tu bzod dka' yi// grong du
18a3(skyes rabs): char med mu ge dang // yams kyi nye bar 'tshe ba byung // mi bzad grong rdal rgud pa dag/ bsams pas rjes su gdung bas gzir// dge ba'i bya ba 'bras med des// yongs su skyobs par rig ma gyur// rgud pa sel byed de yis dris// blon po rnams
18a4(skyes rabs): kyis de la smras// rgyal po chen po bzod dka' 'di// skye bo gdung ba yang dag bskyed// sa bdag gtsug na rin chen gyi// jo bo gal te gtsug gi nor// bdud rtsi'i rlan ldan rnyed na ni// de yis rgyud pa 'di las tha ro// gangs can ngos na rgyal ba
18a5(skyes rabs): de// dben zhing dri bral bsam pa yis// 'khor ba las ni phyir phyogs gnas// bdag gi bya ma rta las thos// kun gyi yid bzhin nor bu ni// bslangs na nor bu ster ba nyid// bu dang chung ma lus la sogs// de yis sbyin min ci yang med//
18a6(skyes rabs): de skad blon po'i tshig thos nas// sems la de bzhin bstan byas te// de yis slong phyir bram ze rnams// de yi drung du brdzangs par gyur// skabs 'dir rgyal po gtsug na ni// nor bu na gsu rgyu ba yis// thub pa ma ri rtsi gnas kyi// nye 'khor yangs
18b1(skyes rabs): bar phyin par gyur// der ni lha mo pad+ma ldan// rtsa ba 'bras za'i brtul zhugs bzung // mi med nagasu thub pa yi// bstan pa las ni 'jigs shing song // sngon la 'gro ba'i sha ba ris// sdug bsngal gnas skabs bsten pa mthong // 'dzin par 'dod
18b2(skyes rabs): bas 'dir gyur cing // snying rje rje skad tsha nges btab// kyi hud rgyal po gtsug na nor// zhes dang skyabs shes mi bzad par// bya ni ku ra raM sgrogs bzhin// snying rjer cho nges grag pa thos// mi bdag rgyugs pa'i phral la ni// rang gi mdzes ma mthong gyur
18b3(skyes rabs): te// zla ba sgra gcan gyis skrag pa// 'od ni rnam par nyams pa bzhin// chags bral lus kyi gos 'dzin cing // mig sman yongs su 'dzin dang bral// rdzogs pa'i longs spyod kun sbyor rnams// mi rtag nyid du smra ba bzhin// rgyal po dang pa bde bar
18b4(skyes rabs): gshegs// nu ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par gnas// 'dren byed 'chi ma'i ngur smig can// snying rje'i sa de rnam gzigs nas// 'khor ba'i spyod pa ngo mtshar can// rnam par spyod la sra gyur kyang // sa bdag yid ni brtse ba yi// chu dris nges par bcad
18b5(skyes rabs): pa bzhin// lha mo mgon med lta bu yis// nagasu mgon po gcig pu nyid// 'jig rten mgon po de ltar song // gdugs dang rnga yab bral mthong nas// de bral mthong nas dug gis non pa dang // de mthong nyams dga' rgyas pa dag/ mya ngan dga' ba
18b6(skyes rabs): yang dag rdzogs// myur du rnam par 'khrugs par gyur// rgyal pos zhi bgyis sha ba ri// dmod pas 'jigs nas rab tu bros// nyi ma mngon par 'char ba yi// mthu ldan mun pa dman gyur mthong // bar 'dir zhi la sdang ba'i bdud// 'byung
19a1(skyes rabs): po kun b+hi bsam par gnas// skyes bu'i gzugs kyis yang dag 'ongs// mi bdag la ni smras par gyur// rgyal po chu skyes spyan ldan dag/ mi med na gsu dga' ma ni// phreng ldan mig yangs mnyes gshin ma// 2
19a2(skyes rabs): ni btang bar mi 'os so// rgyal srid longs spyod kyis spangs naso// nges par bde med gyur pa 'di// khyod kyi yid kyi spyod tshul bzhin// rgyal po'i rgyal po mo mdzes so// de dag thos shing dben pa yis// bar du gcod byed yid 'byung du// rnam
19a3(skyes rabs): bar shes te mi bdag gis// 'dzum bcas de la lan smras pa// dul la zhi ba mi 'dod pa'i// 'dod pa khyod ni bdag gis shes/ rab tu sim par 'dod pa rnams// su zhig khyod kyis rnam mi rmongs// sa spyod de skad brjod pa yis// 'phrul
19a4(skyes rabs): 'dod pa mi snang gyur// 'bral ba'i me yis gdungs pa yi// lha mo shin tu rnam par 'khrugs// yid 'byung las rgyal rgyal po yi// btsun mo bdag po longs spyod bral// sdug bsngal mi 'os sdug bsngal ldan// de la dbugs ni 'byin cing smras//
19a5(skyes rabs): lha mo chos ni bya bar rigs// mya ngan bya bar mi 'os so// bde bas rnam par 'khrul pa yi// ro bral mjug ni sdug bsngal yin// lus can tshe ni rgyug chu 'dra// g.yo ba rnams kyi snying sdug grogs// pad+ma g.yo ba'i 'dab rtse na// 'greng ba'i chu thigs lta bu
19a6(skyes rabs): yin// dpal 'di yud tsam gar mkhan dang // dus kyi sprin glog 'khyud pa dang // 'khor ba'i sbrul gyis ri 'dzin ni// rnam par rtse zhing rab tu ga mo// longs spyod skad cig kho nas 'bral ba'i nang // 'byor pa rmi lam bag ma len dang mtshungs// ba'i
19b1(skyes rabs): ba'i dpal ni rlung bsnun mar me'i rtse// srid pa'i spyod tshul 'di dag smyon pa'i gar// snying rje kun gyis bsten bya dpal 'byor min// dam chos rtag tu gsal bya mar me min// grags snyan rnams kyis dga' ldan na chung min// bsod nams dgra ni brtan
19b2(skyes rabs): ldan 'tsho ba min// bden pa'i brtul zhugs kyis ni de la de skad gdams// drang srong chen po'i 'dul ba btsun mo rnams btang nas// 'khor ba las ni phyir phyogs rnams kyi dka' thub nags// yang dag sim byed bsod nams ldan par rgyu zhing song //
19b3(skyes rabs): rgyal po shin tu bzod dkas myur bar gnyis skyes lnga// rnam par btang zhing de bzhin song ba des// rnam dge snying stobs slong ba rnams kyi ni// dus med gnyen gcig po de nags mthar mthong // 'jigs nas brtan pa rnam par btang ba bzhin// de
19b4(skyes rabs): dag gis ni sgra bskyangs shis brjod bsgrubs// shugs rings ring zhing dro ba'i rlung dag gis// mi bzad gdung ba gsal byas de la smras// rgyal po shin tu bzod dka'i grong khyer du// rgyal po drag po nyer 'tshes dge tshogs bcom// skye bo'i
19b5(skyes rabs): da pa mtha' dag chad par byas// rab 'dod gzar ba'i sgra tsam lhag mar gyur// skyon rnams ma lus zhi ba'i rgyu gcig bu// 'jig rten gsum bsrung grags pa'i mthu ldan pa// gtsug gi nor bu lha khyod snang ba na// de yi nye bar 'tshe rnams
19b6(skyes rabs): zhi bar bgyid// brtse bas brten pa tsan yal 'dab brlan pa dang // dri med bsam pa zla ba'i nor bu rab gsal ba// khyod nyid lta bu yongasu gdung ba'i dus su ni// srid pa'i skye bo rnams kyi skyabasu 'gyur ba yin// de dag gis ni de skad bslangs la snying
20a1(skyes rabs): stobs drag/ rnam par ma rba snang rdzabar yos yang dag khangs// rnas par mam rnas smra ba'o nye bar gdung ba dag/ khang du yang dag zhugs bzhin logs par bsams nas kyang smras// kye ma mA la nye bar 'joms
20a2(skyes rabs): ba'i las kyis ni// nges par gzir ba'i sgra dgu bral ba'i sdug bsngal las// rab skyes tshe de'i sgra ni nang gi byed pa dag/ nges par 'joms pa rgyal po des ni ji ltar bzod// bdag gi mgo yi rtsa ba las skyes nor bu 'di// myur du nges par
20a3(skyes rabs): tshong la rab tu gzung bar gyis// gal te skye bo slong ba'i sdug bsngal mdzad pa yi// rgyu nyid du ni skad cig bdag 'gro bdag leg so// nor 'dzin bdag pos de skad smras tsam la// sa 'dzin chu gter dang bcos 'dzin ma ni// de yi spyi bo 'gem
20a4(skyes rabs): ba'i sdug bsngal dag/ drag pos 'jigs pa bzhin du ring zhig 'drar// de 'og mi bdag thugs spyod brtse ba yis// mnyen pa'i gsung gis rab rno mtshon pas kyang // rno ba'i sems ldan de rnams mtshon rnon gyis// rang nyid spyi bo 'gems
20a5(skyes rabs): la rab tu zhugs// rigs 'dzin bsgrub bya grub bcas lha rnams ni// pad+ma'i stan sogs mkha' yi gzhal yas nas// mi drab pheM de yi dka' spyad mdzad pa la// snying stobs ma zhum blta phyir yang dag 'ongs// 'phral l-i spyi bo rnam
20a6(skyes rabs): bar bkas pa yi// rin chen 'od du rnam par 'phrul 'dzin pa'i// khrag gi rgyun gyis mngon gtor lus can de// slong ba'i bde las zhugs gdung ba bzod// sdug bsngal drag po'i shugs kyis mig zum zhing // brtan pa snying spobs
20b1(skyes rabs): brjong+yas de mthod ste// smad d+h+r-ig smon pa da ni thob ba bzhin// gtan snong bram ze dga' dang bral swA d+hAr// d+hAl pos rang chus sdug bsngal rnam byung bas// 'khor bya ba rnams nyon mongs rang bzhon+d+ra lus// rnam pa 'di lta phyug
20b2(skyes rabs): bsngal spyong 'bum gyis// dril gyis mnan zhes rab tu gdung bar gyur// ngas rnams bsams lus bcings rin chen sbyin pa las// bsod nams 'bras bu dag gis gang thob des// bsod nams min smin dmyal bar mi rnams kyis//
20b3(skyes rabs): dag po'i sdug bsngal cha yang med par gyur// khrag dang zhag gis nges blan nor bu de// g.yo med tshogs ma'i rtsa ba las bton pa'i// brgyal bas 'khrugs kyang slong ba'i re ba dag/ yongasu rdzogs pas de ni rab dgar gyur// gnyis skyes
20b4(skyes rabs): rnams la rang gis lag sor gyis// yal 'dab 'dar bzhin nor su byin nas de// yang dag mun pas 'jig rten 'dzum byed cing // tsha zer can bzhin shin tu dmar bar ltung // lha rnams me tog char dang lhan cig tu// snying stobs
20b5(skyes rabs): bri ba med pa sa der ltung // gnyis skyes de rnams nor bu yang dgra blangs// rgyal po shin tu bzod dka'i grong khyer song // de yis 'phral la nye bar 'tshe rnams ni// mtho ris 'os pa'i longs spyod tshogs rnams thob// sems can mtha'
20b6(skyes rabs): ngag yang dag sgrol 'os pa// byang chub sems de'i snying stobs de yis bsngags// skabs 'dir mi dbang 'du shes cung zad thob// b+h+ri gu'i bu dang gau ta ma la sogs// ma ri rtse sogs thub po nags tshal las// rin chen sbyin pa thos
21a1(skyes rabs): nas yang dag 'odus// sku mo bang ldan myur rtsi nyid kyis// rjes bzhin song bas yongs brlags de mthong nas// kun rmongs shugs kyi mngon bcoms la ni// 'khri shing gzhon nu bcad bzhin skad cig 'gyel//
21a2(skyes rabs): nas mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams kyis// mi bdag legs brjod phyogs mthar rgyu ba'i tshe// rgyal po'i sras de blon dang lhan cig tu// skye dgu skye dgu'i mgon can nye bar song // khag gis lus bsgos snying stobs ma zad cing // sa yi dbang
21a3(skyes rabs): po sa la 'gyel mthong nas// nyon mongs gdung ba che ldan skye bo rnams// yang dag ming don rnam rtog brjod par 'gyur// rang don la chags mngon sbyor bdag nyid ngan// shing bcod 'ga' yis snying rjes brlan ldan zhing // slong kun gyis
21a4(skyes rabs): bsten drang zhing legs spyod pa'i// kye ma nyam s+thA pAr grib thosal shing 'di bcad// kye ma pha rol don du srog gtong 'di// mchog tu ngo mtshar gnas skabs dag tu songashin tu dri bzang rang gi lus gcod pa// yid 'ong zhing ni sa ha
21a5(skyes rabs): kar nyid// brkam cho gas srog chags rang gi yin yang rang // ma yin 'dod pa 'dod pa nor ngor mi ni// sems can kun la phan brtson bdag nyid can// brtse ldan ma yi lus kyang chags gnas min// gang don slong skye 'di ni slong
21a6(skyes rabs): ba'i dngos// kun don gnyer la zhugs par rab 'gro ba// zhum pa 'don pa'i brtul zhugs can gyi srog/ de nyid yongs su skyob zong rtswa lta yin// de skad rab brjed rnam mang mthu yis ni// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phel ba'i
21b1(skyes rabs): tshe// ma ri rtse thub mchi mar bcas pa'i spyan// chags pas sa skyong la ni mngon phyogs smras// kye ma ma la rgyal po skye dgu rnams// yongs skyobs gter gyi sa gzhes 'gro ba yi// rgyu med gnyen gyi dngos por bsten byas nas//
21b2(skyes rabs): khyod kyis brtse bas lus 'di rtswa bzhin byin// slong ba'i gnyen khyod rang nyid srog la yang // ltos pa'i spyod tshul zad par nges rab zhugs// gang zhig dpal 'byor gnas kyi lus 'di ni// khyed kyis gnod pa'i gnasu yang dag sbyar// rgyal po
21b3(skyes rabs): legs byas brtul zhugs bsod nams kyi// zong 'di las kyang 'bras 'ga' bzhed lags grangs// slong ba'i rgyus kyang khyod kyi 'tshogs ma phye// sgo las thugs kyi rnam 'gyur ma bstan nas// thub dbang dbus thub pas de skad du// rmad byung
21b4(skyes rabs): mtshar ba'i yid kyis dris pa des// 'bad pas ngal dub bzod byas khrag gis ni// mngon par spags pa'i bzhin rab phyis nas smras// thub pa bdag la 'bras 'dod gzhan ma mchis// 'on kyang mngon 'dod cig nyid rab tu mang // gang
21b5(skyes rabs): zhig srog chags 'jigs rung 'khor bar bying // sgrol byed nyid du srid par bdag gyur cig/ slong ba dga' bar lus ni rnam bcom 'dir// rnam 'gyur ma shas gang yang med pa nyid// gal te ngas brjod dam tshig 'di bden na// de yi lus
21b6(skyes rabs): 'di rnal du gnas gyur cig/ rgyal po bdon nor ldan 'di brjod tsam la// snying stobs la 'os lhan skyes mthu ldan pa// bden pa'i stobs kyis de lus rma sos shing // de tshe skyes pa'i rin chen ldan par gyur// de nas brgya byin tshangs sogs
22a1(skyes rabs): lha rnams dang // rab dga' skyes pa'i thub pa thams cad kyis// sa sbyong slad du mngon par gsol btab kyang // sa bdag longs spyod mngon par bzhed ma gyur// dran rnyed pad+ma dang ldan thub pa yis// rab bskul
22a2(skyes rabs): rgyal po'i sras dang 'grogs nas ni// skye dgu seng ge'i khrir bzhugs bde ba la// 'bral ba zhi slad bdag la gsol ba btab// de nas rang rgyal de rnams mngon phyogs te// 'gro la phan phyir brtse bas 'khrugs gyur cing // lus kyi 'od kyis
22a3(skyes rabs): phyogs cha khengs pa ni// dgyes pa gsol bar mdzad bzhin de la smras// bral ba'i mjug ni ring zhig lon nas thob// yang ni yongs gtong gnas skabs bzod dka' ba// gang phyir lan cig min ltung sdug bsngal bcings// bzod pa rgyal po'i
22a4(skyes rabs): blos min lha mos min// rgyud ldan sdug bsngal rab zhi'i rgyu gcig pu// rang lus slong la gang gis rab sbyin zhing // gang gis chos 'di'ang gzhan don nyid na des// rang gis mi la'ang btang snyoms ji ltar bya// de dag gis ni 'dri brjod mi yi dbang //
22a5(skyes rabs): blo yis de bzhin zhes nges ji ltar yang // mkha'i lam nas rang gi grong khyer phyin// sras bcas rang gi rgyal srid gnas rnams bsten// de ltar do ni snying stobs yangs shing bde ldan byang chub sems dpa' ste// shin tu yun ring rgyal srid bzung
22a6(skyes rabs): zhing bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas bsten nas// rgyal ba'i grong khyer rin chen mchod rten gdugs dang rin chen sgron ma ni// rab tu gsal ba rnam mang dpal gyis mtshan pa'i byang chub goms par gyur// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'i/
22b1(skyes rabs): phyir// dge slong rnams la sbyin pa'i gdams ngag tu// rang gi spyod tshul mtha' ni dper mdzad nas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni de skad gsungs// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa'i brjod pa dpag
22b2(skyes rabs): bsam gyi khri shing las gtsug na nor bu'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal mdab ste gsum pa'o// / gang zhig mtho ris mdzes ma'i lag pas mchog tu rab bskyod mdzes pa'i rnga yab dag dang ni// gdugs dkar
22b3(skyes rabs): 'dzum pa'i phun tshogs dag gis 'jig rten na ni legs ldan thugs ni rnam mdzes dang // glang yang grags spyan ga pur rgyun gyi dri med thos pasim byed rab tu 'phro ba dag/ sbyin pa'i cha shas de 'bras shin tu chung ngu'o e ma sbyin pa dpal gyi dang
22b4(skyes rabs): po'i rgyu// 'o ma'i tshogs las bdud rtsi bzhin// mkhas rnams mngon 'dod grags pa yis// gang zhig rnam ga sal sa 'dzin ni// gso sbyong 'phags shes bya ba byung // nor 'dzin bsrung ba nor dang ni// gzi brjid ldan pa gang
22b5(skyes rabs): mdun du// mi yi bdag po'i spyi bo dag/ nges par phyag la sus ma btud// chos kyis dag pa'i blo gros bzhin// sbyin pas brtse ba ldan nyid bzhi ni// dul bas nor khyor pa bzhin/ b+ha gas sa ni brgyan par gyur// yon tan kun ldan rigasu mtho// kun gyi
22b6(skyes rabs): gdung skyob zla ba'i 'od// gang gi gnas pa'i spyi bor gyur// sa yi bdag po kun gyi'o// gang gis grags pa 'jig rten rgyan// dkar zhing dbang phyug spyi bor gnas// dri med gang+gA'i chu bo ni// rab mang 'jig rten rnamasu rgyu// mchod
23a1(skyes rabs): sbyin stong gi byed pa po// mig stong pa las lhag pa'i dpal// gang gi btsun mo lha mdzes ni// stong phrag drug cu byung bar gyur// nam zhig drang srong bsrung ba'i phyir// srin du gzhon par dam
23a2(skyes rabs): bcas nas// dka' thub nags kyis sa la de// rta la zhon nas rnam par rgyus// rgyal po'i drang srong 'ga' yis der// bu yi mchod sbyin bum pa bzhag/ lam ring gyis ngal dub pa des// chu yis gang la ba 'thungs par
23a3(skyes rabs): gyur// skye bo med par rnyed pa'i chu// sngags kyi bum pa las 'thungs nas// rgyal po'i pho brang 'ongs pa na// sa yi bdag pos mngal thob gyur// rmi lam sgyu ma mi 'phrul sogs// gang gis ltad mo'i zer ma ni// rmad
23a4(skyes rabs): byung yang dag tshogs pa'i sku// brnag par bya de rgyal gyur cig/ mtshar ba'i las kyis rnam bskrun pa// sgrub byeng sna tshogs rnam par bkra// ngo mtshar ri mo bkod pa la// gcod par byed pa'i dbang phyugasu// dus kyis
23a5(skyes rabs): de yi spyi bo ni// rdol nas byis pa nyi ma bzhin// mdzes sdug 'od ldan skyes gyur te// 'phrul lI rma ni rab tu sos// bsod nams gzugs la brten pa bzhin// 'gro ba'i yang dag rgyal po'i mtshan// ldan pa de ni
23a6(skyes rabs): mnyes gshin las// nu zags rgyal po'i btsun mos blangs// byis pa bsngags 'os 'di yi ni// ma yi gnasu bdag gyur ces// de rnams phan tshun tshig gis ni// rgyal sras pa la nu zhes gyur// dbang po drug ni rab
23b1(skyes rabs): 'das dus// bsod nams kyis brtson mi zad tshe// de ni rab tu bskyed ldan zhing // byis pa'i rtse dwags rnam par rol// lang tsho gsar pa rab zhugs te// rig gnas kun gyi pha rol phyin// yab ni mtho ris gshegs la des// rim
23b2(skyes rabs): bas 'ongs pa'i rgyal srid bzung // legs byas kyi ni 'bangs gyur pa'i// gnod sbyin mkha' yi khyim zhes pas// de yi dbang bskur yo byad rnams// mchog ni nye bar bsgrubs par gyur// gser gyis bcings pa'i cod pan dang //
23b3(skyes rabs): gtsug tor zur phud byas pa des// ston ka'i sprin gyi rna cha n+dan// lhun po'i mdzes pa thob dang ldan// de nas de yi rin chen bdun// de tshe byung gyur 'khor lo rta// nor bu glang po bu da med dang // khyim bdag dmag dpon sngon 'gro ba'o//
23b4(skyes rabs): sa bdag 'di yi bu rnams ni// gzugs dang stobs dang gzi brjid mtshungs// dpung pa bzhin du dgra 'joms pa// stong phrag dag ni byung bar gyur// lhag ma ngal bas bder gnas pa// mtha' dag chu gter rlabs kyi ni// ske rags
23b5(skyes rabs): ldan pa'i nor 'dzin ma// ma lus dpung bas bzung bar gyur// sa ni bsrung bar chas gyur cing // rab tu gsal ba'i dpal la gnas// 'khor los sgyur de legs byas kyis// khyab 'jug lag pa bzhin du mdzes// grags pa 'gro gsum
23b6(skyes rabs): gang+gA dang // mthu yis rnam par brgyan pa'i dpal// 'di de bsod nams 'khri shing gi/ me tog rab 'thon dang po yin// de ni nam zhig nags kyi mthar// blon po dag dang lhan cig tu// me tog rnam par rgyas pa'i dpal// mdzes blta
24a1(skyes rabs): zhing rgyu bar 'gyur// der ni 'dab ma med pa'i bya// rkang pas 'gro rnams mthong gyur te// mkha'i lam bgrod dran pa yi// shin tu ring bar gyur pa bzhin// 'dab mas dman zhing bgrod byed min// 'tsho
24a2(skyes rabs): bzad cing lus g.yogs med// de rnams dbul po bzhin mthong nas// mi bdag brtse bas rab smras// kye ma sdug pa'i bya 'di rnams// ngan pa'i bya ba ci zhig byas// gang las 'di dag sgro dang bral// dga' las rkang pas rgyu bar gyur// snying rjes
24a3(skyes rabs): 'khrugs pa'i bdag nyid can// sa bdag gis de brjod pa la// blon po chen po bden pa'i sde// mdun du 'dug ste de la smras// lha cig 'dab chags rnams kyi 'dab// gang las byi bar gyur pa'i rgyu// nags na spyod rnams gleng gyur pa//
24a4(skyes rabs): dag bdag gis rab tu thos// dka' thub kha ton nus ldan pa// thub pa gzi brjid 'bar ba ni// lnga brgya bsod nams gnas gyur pa'i// dka' thub nags tshal 'dri na yod// de dag go klog bsam gtan dang // bzlas pa'i bgegs ni sbrub
24a5(skyes rabs): byed pa// shing gi nags la bya 'di rnams// rtag tu ce co sgrogs par gyur// rna bar mchog tu gnod pa dag/ shin tu yang dag rgyas byed pa// bya yi 'dus pa de dag la// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor khros par gyur// des bskrun chen po'i
24a6(skyes rabs): dmod pa ni// sreg byed gdung ba thams cad du// gnod pa byas pa'i bya rnams kyi// 'dab gshog skad cig gis zags gyur// bya ni 'di rnams 'di dag ste// sdug bsngal gyis 'tsho 'dab gshog bral// khyod kyi mi mthun phyogs bzhin
24b1(skyes rabs): du// dal zhing nags su rkang pas rgyu// blon po chen pos brjod de dag/ thos nas sa yi bdag po ni// bya rnams dmod pas gdungs pa la// snying rjes rab tu non pas smras// kye ma thub pa gsol ba rnams// zhi bar gyur kyang nagasu ni// yongs
24b2(skyes rabs): su gyur pa'i me dag gis// mi zlog sreg par byed pa nyid// rang nyid bde phyir gang gis yid// khro bas gdung la bzod pa yi// chu yi yongasu bran ma byas// log pa'i dka' thub can des ci// rab dang blo dang byams pa'i yid// brtse ba'i sbyin pa/
24b3(skyes rabs): dul zhing bzod// gang de dka' thub bsngags par 'os// lhag ma lus 'di skems pa 'di// 'jig tshogs 'dzin pa'i dka' thub cing // rnam par bslad la nags kyis ci// chags dang bcas la 'byor pas ci// spyod tshul ngan la thos pas ci/
24b4(skyes rabs): de ltar sdig pa'i sems ldan zhing // khro ba drag pos bskyod pa yi// bzod dka' thub pa de dag nyid// bdag gi yul nas 'gro gyur cig/ 'di brjod de la mi bdag gis// ji srid bdag ni dbang ba'i sa// de srid gtong bar byos shig ces//
24b5(skyes rabs): skyes bus phrin ni bsrings par gyur// bya yi 'dab gshog byi ba yis// khros pa sa yi bdag po de'i// phrin thos skyengs par gyur pa yi// thub pa rnams kyis yang dag bsams// rgya mtsho bzhi yi 'obs kyi ni// ska rags ldan pas yi bdag/
24b6(skyes rabs): yul gang mi bdag mi dbang ba// gang zhig bdag cag gang du 'gro/ de ltar bsams nas thub pa rnams// gser gyi so 'dzin dag gi ngos// lha dang grub pas yongs gang ba// 'dzam bu'i phyogs dang nye bar song // de nas sa yi bdag po de'i// mthu/
25a1(skyes rabs): ni shin tu che ba yis// sa ni ma rmos smin byed cing // mkha' yang rin chen gos skyes gyur// smin pa gsod byed sbyangs par ni// bgyid pa de yi brtan pa las// sprin tshogs 'bebs par bgyid rnams kyis// zhag bdun gser gyi
25a2(skyes rabs): char pa phag/ de yi mthu ni chen po yis// sde dang lhan cig mkha' la phyin// shar gyi lus 'phags zhes bya'i gling // mchog gi skye bo dbang du byas// de yi dmag dpon mchog dag no// rtul pong stobs dang gzi rgyas pa// dpa' bo bye ba phrag ba
25a3(skyes rabs): brgyad// mkha' la sngon du 'gro bar gyur// de 'og pa lang spyod gling dang // de nas byang gi sgra mi snyan// lhun po yi ni ngos rnams kyang // nyams med bstan nas bsrungs par gyur// brgya byin mang po 'das gyur dus// lhun po gsor gyi lcog la ni//
25a4(skyes rabs): gling bzhi'i sa yi bdag po dr-i// de bas rnam par rab tu rtse// nom zhig lha rnams lta bzhed pas// lha bzhin mkha' la gshegs shing de'i// sprin sngon gyis bzhin glang po yis// phyogs rnams rab tu khyab par gyur// de nas thub pa bskrad de rnam//
25a5(skyes rabs): lhun po'i ngos la dka' thub kyis// gnas pa'i spyi bor mkha' lus ni// de yi rta glang spangs rnams lhung // de las de rnams khro bas gdungs// mig gis mkha' la lta byed cing // ser skya'i 'od kyi 'khri shing gi/ tshogs kyis phyogs rnams ser sbyar
25a6(skyes rabs): byas// de rnams 'di ci zhes brjod khros// dmod pa'i me ni spro 'dod der// lha yi pho nya mngon phyogs de// rab dga' rnam par rgyas pas smras// 'di ni sa skyong ma lus kyi// mgo la bka' ni ngal bso zhing // brgya byin dag dang mtshungs pa'i dpal//
25b1(skyes rabs): sa yi bdag po nga las nu// mi yi lha ni nam mkha' la// sde dang bcas pa rab tu gshegs// gang gi drag po'i tshig 'di rnams// bsod nams mngon pa'i nga rgyal ldan// 'jig rten kun gyi bde ba'i dpal// sbyin byed gang la 'byor pa yi// rab
25b2(skyes rabs): bskyed rgyags pa ma mthong ste// yang dag rig la gti mug bzhin// nor 'dzin gsal bas ku be ra// stobs dang ldan pas gzhon nu ste// khyu mchog ldan pas dbang phyug dang // dpal dang 'grogs pas khyab 'jug dang // 'od rab spro bas
25b3(skyes rabs): nyi mo dang // skye bo dga' bas zla ba dang // mthong bas stobs gcod dbang po yis// gzugs mchog 'di yis rnam par 'dzin// stobs ldan sa 'og rab tu zhugs// da d+hI tsa yang rus lhag nyid// chu gter dang yang 'khrug mi 'dor// 'di
25b4(skyes rabs): yi gtong bas yin nem snyam// de skad lha yi pho nya'i tshig/ thos nas thub pa'i dbus son pa'i// bzhin ngan zhes bya thub pa yis// dmod pa'i chu ni mkha' la gtor// de nas sde dpon yongs 'dren gyis// rab tu bzhad cing de la smras// drang
25b5(skyes rabs): srong chen po khro ba mthong // dka' thung zad par yongs ma mdzad// sa bdag mdun du dmod pa 'di// 'bras med ngo mtshar 'gro bar 'gyur// khyod kyis gang gi 'dab ga shog zad// bzod pa'i bya de bdag cag min// de skad sde dpon gyis
25b6(skyes rabs): smes tshe// dmod pas bzung ba'i dpung tshogs la// mdun du sa bdag gis bltas nas// ya mtshan las 'di ci zhes gsungs// de nas sde dpon khro ldan pas// de la yang dag mngon phyogs smras// lha cig drang srong de dge go// dmod
26a1(skyes rabs): bas dpung 'di mi 'grong ngo // khyod kyi 'khor lo rin chen 'di'ang // mkha' la dmod pas rnam par 'khyams// sprin gyis yang dag bgags pa yi// tsha zer can dang mtshungs par bzung // de dag thos
26a2(skyes rabs): shing mi bdag gis// mdun du de ltar mthong nas kyang // mig nyid kyis bsgrubs dmod pa dag/ 'bras med rab gtum bslang par ro// snying rje'i tshogs kyis lus 'jig pas// yongs bsrungs de yi kyal ka'i bka'// dman pas
26a3(skyes rabs): drang srong che rnams kyi// ral pa sa la ltung bar gyur// khro dang rmongs pa mi thul na// bdag cag don med khur gyur ces// de dag ral pa ngo tsha nas// sa gzhi la ni 'byar ba bzhin// de nas mi bdag lhun po'i rtser// phyin nas lha rnams
26a4(skyes rabs): gnas sa ni// grong khyer blta na sdug ces pa// blta na mdzes pa mthong bar gyur// der ni rol mtsho las 'then pa'i// klu rnams dag la rab brtsams nas// gnod sbyin lag na gzhong thogs dang // phreng 'dzin zhes pa'i lha dang ni//
26a5(skyes rabs): de bzhin rtag myos zhes pa'i lha// khro bas sdom byed sde rnams dang // rgyal chen bzhi yi ris zhes pa// shin tu stobs ldan skabs gsum pa// rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams// go bgos mtshon thogs g.yul zhugs pa// rgyal po'i
26a6(skyes rabs): mthu yis pham gyur nas// rang sde rnams kyi sngon 'gro byas// de nas rgya che dpag bsam shing // yid 'phrog ko bi dA raM dang // yongs 'du zhes pa mthong bar gyur// lha rnams kyi ni yang dag bsten// de nas lhun pa'i rtser 'od zer// phreng
26b1(skyes rabs): ba bzhin du dri ma med// mkha' ni rang 'od kyi gsal ba// chos bzang zhes pa'i mdun sar phyin// gser dang b+hu ru bai DUr+ya'i// ka ba'i tshogs ni gsal zhing mdzes// khang bzang rnam par rgyal zhes pa// glags pas gang la rnam
26b2(skyes rabs): par mdzes// gang du chu skyes bzhin ras dang // bung ba lon bus mtshungs gyur pa// lha yi bu mos pad ljon dang // pad+ma'i shing gis lha mo'o// nor bu'i zhal zhal ka ba sa// gang du lha yi gzugs brnyan gyis// lha yi 'jig rten
26b3(skyes rabs): gcig nyid kyang // lho yi 'jig rten du ma 'dzin// rin chen rta babs pa gam gyi// 'od kyi tshogs kyis rnam bkra gang // phyogs rnams mdzes pas khyab gyur te// brgya phrag brgya byin mtshon gyis bzhin// gang du rlung gzhon
26b4(skyes rabs): gyis bskyod pa'i// dpag bsam rkang 'thung 'khri shing gis// dga' ba bskyed de dga' ba'i dpal// 'gyur zhing rab bsgyur bzhin du mdzes// gang na shing rta sna tshogs zhes// lha yi skyed tshal yid dga' ba// rtag tu spro
26b5(skyes rabs): bas dga' ma dag/ 'dod dang so ga'i bzhed pa bzhin// 'dod pa kun dang bde ba kun// dus tshigs kun tu me tog 'a bar// lha rnams gnas ni thams cad las// khyad 'phags rgyal pos mthong gyur nas// yud tsam
26b6(skyes rabs): ya mtshan g.yo med cing // 'dzum pa'i spyan dang kun dgar bcas// legs byas rnams kyi bsod nams kyis// 'bras bu de ni 'di zhes bsams// lha yi bdag po'i sa srungs ni// sred len bung ba'i tshogs rgyas pa// dga'
27a1(skyes rabs): tshal rnam pa dang bcas bzhin// der ni dri bzang ldan pa mthong // de nas sa yi dbang po ni// 'ongs par shes nas dbang po ni// lha yi tshogs dang bcas pa dag/ rab dga' ldan pas bsu ba byas// rin chen
27a2(skyes rabs): phreng bas rnam mdzes pa'i// mdun sa'i sa gzhi rgyal po yis// rgyal po lha yi rgyal po yis// mchod pa rdul bral mchog gis brten// rin chen bstan gyi phreng ba la// skabs gsum pa rnams nyer bzhugs shing // mchod sbyin
27a3(skyes rabs): brgya pa'i stan phyed la// mi yi bdag po dang ldan bzhugs// der ni lhan cig la 'dug pa'i// lha dbang mi yi dbang po bdag/ yon tan tshogs ni rgya che ba'i// gzugs ni khyad par med par mthong // de nas lha kun gyis spros pa'i// rab gsal mig
27a4(skyes rabs): ni rkang drug pas// bzhin pang 'thu ldan mi bdag la// 'phrog byed kyis ni yang dag smras// kye ma gzi brjid gter gyi gzi// gang zhig bsngags 'os mngon par 'char// khyod kyis sa ni brgyan gyur cing // 'od ldan lha yis na mkha' yang // mthu
27a5(skyes rabs): yis rab mtho grags snyan dag/ gsal ba'i gos can sa gsum du// yang dag rgyal po rnam rgyal ba// khyod kyi rgyal mtshan 'di mdzes so// khyod gtam bdud rtsi'i btung ba dang // khyod ni lta ba'i ro la yang // rna ba mig kyang rab bskul cing // bde
27a6(skyes rabs): ba'i sgra la dbyangs can no// las rnams 'bras bu rtsod pa yi// the tshom chad cing nges pa 'di// 'byor pa legs byas kyis thob pa// khyod nyid kho nas brtan par byas// bsod nams 'os pa'i kun spyod ldan// khyod lta bsod nams kyis mthong gang // /
27b1(skyes rabs): 'di nyid phyir nas dbang po yi// tshogs las mig nyid dga' ba'i gnas// lha yi dbang pos 'di brjod tshe// grags pa'i gter ni nga la nus// mthu 'di khyod kyis drin no zhes// smras nas gdong ni 'dud par gyur// de ltar de ni lha rnams kyis//
27b2(skyes rabs): rtag tu gus pas mchod ldan de'i// lha yul bzhugs shing gnas pa la// dbang po drug gis dus 'das gyur// lha min dkyil 'khor mtha' dag ni// de yi pha rol gnon pas nyams// lha yi rgyal po 'tshe med cing // dar ba dang ni rgyal bar
27b3(skyes rabs): gyur// gzi ldan g.yul du gzhu 'dzin lha'i// dpung pa'i grib mas nyer 'tsho rnams// dpa' bo ljon pa chen po de'i// ngal bso dag ni bsten par byed// de yi bsod nams tshong zong gis// nyos pa mi zad bde spyod pa'i// dus kyi rgyun ni che ba la//
27b4(skyes rabs): brgya byin drug ni 'das par gyur// dam pa'i las 'bras spyod pa yi// rtags ni dri ma med pa'i yid// de ni rnyog par gyur pa las// rab tu nye bar yongs zad gyur// de nas dus kyi sa bdag ni// nyes pa'i rnyog pas rab bsgos shing // mngon pa'i
27b5(skyes rabs): nga rgyal chags pa yis// zil gnan yid la 'dod par gyur// skabs gsum pa yi dpal 'byor ni// bdag gis dpung pa'i stobs kyis bsnyungs// de slad re zhig stan phyed kyi// bag khums 'di ni yongs mi bzod// 'gro ba kun gyis khur
27b6(skyes rabs): 'dzin pa// bdag gi dpung pa 'di yis bzod// bdag rang gcig pu lha dbang du// mthu yis 'gyur ba min pa ni// lha yi dbang po nyams byas nas// mtho ris rgyal srid phun sum tshogs// gdugs gcig nyid kyi thig le ni// rang nyid 'dzin
28a1(skyes rabs): par 'os pa bsten// de ltar bsam zhing brgya byin la// 'khu bar mngon par 'dod pa de'i// dkar ba'i 'od ldan mthu yi dpal// phreng ba bzhin du nyams par gyur// stug po rgyas par bsdams pa yis// skye bo
28a2(skyes rabs): legs pa'i ngogs gcod pa'i// g.yo ldan dpal ni sring bcas kyi// yid kyi rdzing bu dri mar byed// bag med rgud pa'i pho nya ni// che rnams kyis kyang bzlod dka' ba// rigs ni nyams pa nyid kyi gleng // sdig pa 'khrugs pa'i blo gros so// sdig pa
28a3(skyes rabs): rnam par brtags tsam gyis// sa bdag sa la skad cig gis// ltung ste 'bras bu rnams ltung zhing // rtsa ba bcad pa'i ljon pa bzhin// ma goms pa yis rig pa 'joms// rgyags pa rgyas pas dpal 'byor 'joms// rnam sdang gis ni legs
28a4(skyes rabs): nyid 'joms// chags pas yang dag mtho ba 'joms// kye me kA ye dar rgyas che// che zhing mtho ba'i rtser 'dzegs pa// 'byor pas rgyags pa skyes pa rnams// 'phral nyid du ni 'og tu ltung // de yis skye ba snga ma la// thams cad zil gnon zhes
28a5(skyes rabs): bya mchod// lha dbang rgyal srid bsten 'os ni// de yis 'bras bus thob gyur cing // gang yang lha dbang las lhag pa// mthu ni ya mtshan ldan po dag/ de yis snod la sbyin pa'i chas// bskyed pa mi nyung skal bar gyur// mnyen ldan zhes ni bya
28a6(skyes rabs): ba yis// grong khyer 'os shing gtsang ba ru// tshong dpon ud ka ri ka zhes// de yi sngon gyi skye bar gyur// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// nyid du gyur cing sems con kun// sgrol ba lo brtson rnam gzigs mtshan// bsod snyoms slad du
28b1(skyes rabs): de khyim zhugs// de yi snod du dang ba'i blos// sman ma chag gang de yis 'phangs// de la lhag ma bzhi dag ni// sa yi bzhi la ltung bar 'gyur// de yi sbyin pa'i mthu yis ni// sa yi bdag po nga las nu// gling rnams kun gyi bdag gyur nas// brgya
28b2(skyes rabs): byin stan phyed thob par gyur// de yi sems ni gzhan gang las// sran ma lhag ma sa la ltung // de tshe 'di ni 'bras bu'i mthar// skabs gsum pa las ltung bar gyur// gang zhig rmi lam sgyu ma'i gnas skabasu yang nam yang mi 'phro ba'i// rnam rtog
28b3(skyes rabs): phreng ba cung zad 'khrugs pas gang la nye bar rab sbyar ba// de ni sbyin pa'i dpag bsdam shing gis mtshungs med 'bras bu rab rgyas tshe// 'byor pa'i longs spyod spyod pa nyid du skal pa bsten pas rnam dag gyur// sangs rgyas bcom ldan dgyes pa yis//
