28b4(skyes rabs): rang gi skye ba gzhan brjod cing // dge slong rnams la rjes rna bstan du// sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'i dpal 'di gsungs// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las pa las nu'i rtogs
28b5(skyes rabs): pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi pa'o// / lha rnams kyis bslangs bsrubs pas shin tu 'khrugs shing 'o ma'i chu gter rang zhig 'dar// rang bzhin nyid kyis 'bras bu rab tu gtong tshe dpag bsam shing yang
28b6(skyes rabs): 'dar ro lo// gang zhig lus ni rab tu gtong yang spu long tshogs 'dzin 'dar ba mi mnga' ba// su zhig gcig pu de ni lus rgyas sbyin pa'i lus 'di goms par gyur pa yin// kai la shas mtshon byang phyogs nas// bla na med pa'i grong khyer ni//
29a1(skyes rabs): bzang po'i brag ces bya ba ste// sa yi rgyun du gyur pa yod// gang du grags snyun me tog dkar// phun tshonas kun gyi 'bras bu bzung // sbyin pa'i steng tsha lnga 'khri shing ni// grong khyer pa rnams dga' slang gyur//
29a2(skyes rabs): grong khyer sum rgyal mig gi mes// gang du skrag pas yid 'byung ni// stobs med g.yo zhing brtse ba yi// smin ma 'khyog po nyid kyis bsrungs// gang du gser gyi khang po'i phreng // mu tig tshogs rab 'bar bas mdzes// lhun po'i rtse yi phreng ba
29a3(skyes rabs): ni// rgyas pa'i rgyu skar 'phro ba bzhin// dar ni dpal ldan zla ba'i 'od// sa 'dzin rnams kyi mchog tu gyur// nyin mo'i zla 'od mdzes pa yis// gang zhig ke la sha bzhin byas// gang gi lus 'od zla nya yi// 'od ltar rdzogs pa'i 'phrog byed
29a4(skyes rabs): kyis// gsal byed can min snang ba'i mtshan// byams pa'i yon tan zad ma gyur// 'di mthong nyid ni rgyu skar rnams// 'dod pa'i rims ni bstan gyur zhes// mkha' la gdugs kyi zol dag gis// 'di ni zla bas bsgribs pa bzhin// dam
29a5(skyes rabs): pa'i mdzod na gnas pa'i dpal// rtag tu 'di yis rab gter zhes// gang zhig mthong la pad+mo can// zum par rab tu thob pa bzhin// sde yi nga rgyal rab btang nas// gtong ba dkar ba'i dpal gyi dpal// gdugs dang cod pan rab gsal
29a6(skyes rabs): rnams// grong khyer ba rnams dag la btang // de yi 'byor pa dul ba yis// dpal gyis brgyan cing mtho ba mdzes// gzhu ltar 'gug pa'i yon tan rgyud// gzhan dag rtse ru 'dzegs pa nyid// stong phrag bzhi bcu dag dang ni// brgya phrag
29b1(skyes rabs): dag gi lo rnams kyang // lus can rnams kyi tsher gyur pa// de dus rtsod la sdang ba byung // 'jig rten skyong las lhag pa'i dpal// 'jig rten skyong de'i grong khyer ni// phun sum tshogs pas gang ba dag/ stong phrag drug cu byung
29b2(skyes rabs): bar gyur// mchod sbyin byed po de yi dpal// grags pa'i thig le bsod nams brgyan// mchod sbyin du ba'i 'khri shing dag/ 'khyog pos g.yo ba'i lan bu mdzes// de yi blon po zla chen po// rab 'bar zla ba'i snang ba bzhin// phun tshogs ku
29b3(skyes rabs): mud ldan pa ni// rtag tu rnam par rgyas bgyid gyur// g.yo med mtshan ma shes rab kyi// ba dan rgyal srid chu gter gyi// rna ba 'dzin pa gang gis ni// gtso bo'i grags pa pha rol bsgral// de yi blon po glang po ni// sa 'dzin zhes bya sa yi khur/
29b4(skyes rabs): bzod pa gzhan yang byung gyur te// phyogs kyi glang po lnga pa bzhin// gang zhig phur pa'i lugs kyi ni// ma phye gros kyi gsang sngags kyis// mi mthun phyogs kyi dpa' bo dag/ sbrul gyi dug bzhin btang bar gyur// blon po de yis mi bdag dang //
29b5(skyes rabs): rgyal po yis kyang de brgyan pa// skyes bu dam pas yon tan dang // yon tan gyis kyang skyes bu bzhin// byas shes drang ba'i rje bo dang // dam pa'i g.yo ga ni rab gus pa// legs byas las skyes kho na yi/ skal pa ldan pas rnyed par 'gyur// rje yis
29b6(skyes rabs): skyes bu dam pa'i nang // gang gi yon tan shes pas rig/ 'di nyid kho na phun tshogs kun// ring du 'khyam pa'i ngal bso yin// sbyin la zhen pas sa bdag ni// 'jig 'gyur gang gis 'bras bu can// blon po gzhan dang de gnyis kyis// nam zhig rmi lam
30a1(skyes rabs): mthong bar gyur// mtshan ma ngan pa rab byung ba// mthong bas dogs par 'gyur de dag/ rtag tu zhi dang shis pa yis// las rnams dag la chags par gyur// sna tshogs pa shes gnyen la sogs pa// dka' thub
30a2(skyes rabs): nags gnas drang srong che// 'di rnams kyang ni mtshan ma dag/ mthong bas yid dman de skad brjod// bar der skye ba snga ma ni// tshangs pa'i srin po tshangs pa'i gnyen// ma rungs bzod dka' skye bo ngan// phrag dog drag po'i mig ces bla// rgyal
30a3(skyes rabs): po'i yon kun rab 'bar// sbyin pas rab bskyeng grags snyan thos// yon tan med de yon tan la// sdang ba'i gdung bas yang dag bsams// kye ma kyi hu gA 'di sa rkyen mtshan du/
30a4(skyes rabs): bud med tshogs kyis sgrogs par byu // de yi yon tan baspyod pa'i khag/ rtag tu bdag gi na bar zhugs/ ci bya yon tan gyis mtho gnan/ yon nyid gis yod mo par/ des 'i drang can de'i// sbyin pas pa'i
30a5(skyes rabs): drag/ byin nas mgo slong dgag po yis// nyams po 'di ni bdag gis byas// gal te mgo bo mi ste na// sbyin pas blang ba'i grags nyams 'gyur/ ster na 'dag ki ni// zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// de yun 'ongs pasams na
30a6(skyes rabs): ni// dri ldang ri zhabs mthar gnas pa// g.yo ldan ma rungs drag po de// bzang po'i brag tu song bar gyur// mig 'phrul sbyor ba shes pa de// rab tu zhi zhing rigs pa'i chas// byas shing sdig pa'i kun rtog ldan// sa bdag grong khyer sleng
30b1(skyes rabs): par gyur// srid pa'i nags 'dir rtag tu ni// yon tan skyon gyis yang dag gang // dpag bsam shing rnams rab skyes te// dug gi shing rnams skyes par gyur// ma lus nyams pa mtshon byed cing // 'jigs rung nyam skrag par byed pa dag/
30b2(skyes rabs): ltas ngan lta bu'i mi srun pas// su la nyon mongs skyed mi byed// yon tan ldan pa'i rang bzhin gyis// dgrar gyur rab gsal mi mthun phyogs// skyon la brten par mi srun dang // rab rib dag la dbye ba ci// legs pa rnams kyi yid btsugs
30b3(skyes rabs): 'joms// rnam par sdang ba'i dug bzod dka'// logs ring skye bo mi srung sbrul// 'jigs su rung ba su yis sbrul// grong khyer der ni rab zhugs che// grong khyer lha ni gzugs can ma// skrag pa'i mig ni g.yo ba yis// sa skyong la ni mngon phyogs
30b4(skyes rabs): smras// tshangs pa'i gnyen ni mgo slong ba// 'di ni khyod can nye bor 'ongs// 'gro ba'i 'tsho ba khyod kyi nI// 'tsho ba gcod byed 'di gzhom 'os// bdag gis bsam pa dri ma can// de ni grong khyer sgro ru bgags// de mthong ba ni bdag gi yid // skrag
30b5(skyes rabs): cing dga' ba ma thob bo// 'di smra grong khyer lha mo la// slong ba bgags pas ngo tsha dag/ rab skyes bzhin ras dman gyur pa// sa skyong gis ni rab tu smras// lha mo slong ba mngon 'ongs pa// 'di ni ma zlog nang du thong // slong ba'i bsam pa 'bras
30b6(skyes rabs): med pa'i// shugs ring bdag gis yongs mi bzod// slong ba don gnyer rnams don du// lus nyams bsod nams rab tu thob// gang phyir lus ni dus bzhi'i grangs// gnas kyang rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// slong ba re ba nyams pa dag/
31a1(skyes rabs): 'di rnams mdun du mi bgrod gang // de nyid skye bo legs rnams kyi// 'tsho ba 'gro bar mchod par 'os// bdag gi rdza su mthun pa ni// dge bar 'os pa khyod kyi mdzod// de yi bsam pa rnam bcom pa'i// gdung ba
31a2(skyes rabs): myur du bzlog par mdzod// de skad sa bdag tshig thos nas// g.yo ba med par nges pa yi// bsam pas yid ni rab gdung ba// lha mo snang ba min par 'gyur// de nas gya gyu can de 'ongs// mi bsrun sog le'i spyod tshul can// mi bzang drag po'i
31a3(skyes rabs): shing dag ni// gcod la rang nyid sbyor bzhin// slong la sgo ni rab phye ba// mi bdag khang pa de 'ongs la// sa bdag 'jig pas 'jigs pa'i sa// sa 'dzin dang bcas 'dar bar gyur// sgra gcan bzhin du gdong ngan de// mi dbang zla ba'i drung du
31a4(skyes rabs): 'ongs// mi shis don bzhin shis pa ni// brjod pa sngon du 'gro bar byas// rgyal po dag gyur gnyis skyes bdag/ dben par grub pa sgrub pa po// slong ba kun gyi lha yi shing // khyod can 'dod pa thob phyir 'ongs// rtag tu gang gi gzigs pa/
31a5(skyes rabs): bdud rtsi'i char chen yid ni skye bo dam pa'i grogs// bzod pa khong khro'i rdul rnams rab sel chu bo blo gros sdug bsngal gyis gzir ma// dpal 'byor dri med sbyin pa'i chu ni mngon 'thor tshig ni bden zhing rigs par ldan// 'gro ba rnams kyi
31a6(skyes rabs): gnyen du skyes pa de ni khyod nyid gcig po kho na yin// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i mgo yis ni// bdag gis 'grub ces 'ga' yis smras// de ni byin mdzod khyod las gzhan// su yis mgo bo sbyin par nus// gsal ba'i don gter yang bzhin nor//
31b1(skyes rabs): dpag bsam ljon pa la sogs yod// rnyed dka'i don ni rab ster mchog/ khyod lta bu ni shin tu nyung // de yis der brjod mi bdag ni// mi g.yo yangs pa'i bsam pa can// slong ba gzigs pas kun dga' dag/ rdzogs pa yis ni de la
31b2(skyes rabs): smras// gang zhig bdag gi legs 'tsho dag/ slong ba rnams kyi don grub slang // rnam par mi rtog yo byad du// zang 'gyur bram ze bdag legaso// bdag srog pha rol don du ni// nam zhig 'gyur zhes re ba yod// gal te khyod kyis de blangs pa//
31b3(skyes rabs): 'di ni bsod nams cis ma yin// 'jig rten 'dir ni slong ba rnams la// gang gang byin pa de de brtan// grub pa'i yo byad bdag gi mgo/ bsngags par 'os pa gzung bar mdzod// sa spyod snying stobs legs ldan pa// rab dga' ldan pas 'di
31b4(skyes rabs): brjod tshe// blon po chen po zla chen dang // sa 'dzin dag gis de la smras// d+he bo khyod kyi chos dang po// rang gi srog ni bsrung ba nyid// 'gro ba khyod ni 'tsho ba na// srog chags thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur// gang phyir khyod lus kun gyi gzhi// mgo
31b5(skyes rabs): bo byin par mi 'os so// rin chen gser gyi rang bzhin mgo/ bram ze 'di la sbyin par mdzod// slong ba'i don mthun re ba dag/ gang gis don kun gyis rdzogs pa// de dag yang dag bsrungs pa yis// thams cad bsrungs pa nyid du 'gyur// sdig
31b6(skyes rabs): ba'i sems ldan gnyis skyes 'di'i// rnam rtog 'di ni 'jigs su rung // gang phyir slong ba'i dpag bsam shing // rtsad bcad nye bar 'tsho bya min// rin chen gser gyi mgo thob nas// 'di ni 'gro 'gyur mgo yis ci// bkres pa rnams
32a1(skyes rabs): kyis yid bzhin nor// rnam par brtags nas bgam bya min// blon po'i gtso bos 'di smras tshe// rin chen gser gyi rang bzhin mgo/ de ni bdag gis grub pa la// nyer mkho med cis bram zes smras//
32a2(skyes rabs): de nas cod pan mi bdag gis// rab bkrol mu tig 'di rnams ni// mgo dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis// kun nas mchi ma'i rgyun bcas bzhin// skad cig de la grong khyer ba'i// cod pan rnams ni sa gzhi la// phyogs ni sreg
32a3(skyes rabs): mtshungs mgal me dang // skar mda' dag dang lhan cig lhung // rgyal pos mgo ni rab ster ba// rnam pa kun tu yongs rtags te// mthong bar mi bzod blon po ni// de dag lus ni gtang ba byas// de nas skyed tshal rin chen mang /
32a4(skyes rabs): zhugs te sa yi bdag po yi// rab rgyas tsam pa ka 'og tu// mgo bo gcod du yang drag gshegs// skyed mos tshal gyi lhas mthong nas// mgo bo gcod par brtson de la// rgyal po thub tshod ma mdzad ces// mya ngan dag gis
32a5(skyes rabs): 'khrugs pas smras// 'dar ldan 'khri shing rab smra ba// bung ba myos tshogs sgra dang ni// yal 'dab rab tu g.yo ba yi// lag pa dag gis zlog pa bzhin// rnam par brtag pa g.yo med de// skyed tshal lha yang dang byas nas// dri
32a6(skyes rabs): med bsod nams byang chub la dmigs pa'i// smon lam dag dang ldan par gyur// grong dang rin chen rang bzhin tshal// 'di ni bsod nams phung pos mtho// sems can yang dag sgrol 'os pa// ston pa'i mchod rten 'byung gyur cig/
32b1(skyes rabs): bdag gis brtag pa 'di yis ni// bsod nams cung zad gang bsgrubs pa// de yis 'khor bar lus can rnams// 'khor ba med par 'gyur bar shog/ de ltar dmigs nas mi bdag gis// tsam pa ka shing lo ma la// skra tshor
32b2(skyes rabs): kyis btags bcad nas mgo/ gnyis skyes la ni rab tu byin// de nas mi yis badrag po'i snying stobs spro zhing gsal ba'i smon lam dang // gang yang dri med bsod nams snang ba phyogs mthar rnam par 'phro ba yis// rmongs pa'i mun
32b3(skyes rabs): chen rnam par sel zhing yongasu mya ngan 'das la brten pa dang // srid par goms pa'i ngal ba rab sel 'gro ba la skad cig dag gis gyur// de ltar sngon skyes spyod pa'i mtha'// bshad nas bcom ldan rgyal ba yis// sbyin pa dag
32b4(skyes rabs): dam chos dag/ dge slong rnams la bstan pa bsgrubs// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtortogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las zla ba'i 'od kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga pa'o//
32b5(skyes rabs): sbyin pa la brtson brtson 'grus rgya che'i gnas// dag pa'i bdag nyid snying stobs rgya mtsho dang // spro ba che ldan rnams ni gzhan don la// kye ma bsam gyis mi khyab bzhed pa yin// gang zhig mkhar rnyog ri bo su la bcas dag la rtse dgas
32b6(skyes rabs): ba gam la 'dzeg dang // gang dag chu tshogs 'khrugs cing gyen 'thor rgya mtsho dag la rol pas ba lang rjes// gang yang nags tshal stug po'i khrod la dga'i bder khang pa'i thang bzhin 'god byed pa// de ni bdag nyid che rnams snying stobs
33a1(skyes rabs): kyis bsgrubs rgyas pa'i brtson 'grus rnam rtsen yin// sngon ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// man ngag rab tu gsal ba yis// mnyan yod grong khyer ba rnams kyis// mi shes las skyes mun pagasal//
33a2(skyes rabs): de ni nam zhig ma gA d+har// dge slong tshogs kyis yongs bskor zhing // tshong pa'i skye bo'i rjes 'brang bcas// rang nyid rgyu zhing gshegs par gyur// nor chen don mthun rjes 'byung zhing // nags kyi lam nas gshegs pa de/
33a3(skyes rabs): chom rkun tshogs kyis mthong gyur nas// sA la'i nags su rnam bsams pa// sems can phan dges bcom ldan 'das// 'di ni sngon la gshegasu gzhug/ nor gyi phung pos gang ba yi// don mthun phyi nas gzung bar bya/
33a4(skyes rabs): de nas bcom ldan kun mkhyen gyis// de rnams 'dod pa mkhyen gyur nas// rnam 'gyur mi mnga' bzhin 'dzum pas// 'di dag ci zhes de la gsungs// de yis rab dang 'dzum pa yis// snang bas rab rib bcom pa bzhin// de dag
33a5(skyes rabs): gdug pa yongs btang zhing // snyan pa'i tshig gis de la smras// bcom ldan kun mkhyen bdag cag 'tshe ba 'di// smad par 'os pa las kyis sprul// glu rngan ma yin zhing las min// bdag cag gdug pa lhan cig skyes// rang bzhin gyis
33a6(skyes rabs): ni sdig bdag nyid// ngo bo nyid kyis las kyi ni// sbrul gyi mtsho rnon ji ltar sel// des na bdag cag 'tsho ba ni// nyams byar mi 'os gshegs par mdzod// khyod ni gshegs na don mthun gyi// nor rnams thams cad bdag cag
33b1(skyes rabs): 'phrog/ de skad de dag tshig thos nas// snying rje yongasu rdzogs pa'i thugs// bcom ldan 'das kyi blo gros ni// skad cig khyogs la 'phyang bar gyur// de nas don mthun nor rnams kun// yongs bgrangs de dang mnyam pa ni// de tshe thob
33b2(skyes rabs): ba'i gter dag las// chom rkun tshogs la de yis byin// yang gshags byon pas lam du ni// rim pa de lta bu nyid kyis// don mthun sgrol phyir de yis nor// lan drug de rnams la rab byin// yang ni lam de nas 'ongs te// rjes su
33b3(skyes rabs): 'brang dang bcas de la// de yi zas ni mgron gnyer ba'i// blo gros chom rkun rnams la byung // dam pa mthong bas dri bral te// yang dag bshad pas dge pa yang // 'grogs pa goms pas legs pa'i lam// zam stegs dag nas
33b4(skyes rabs): 'gro bar 'gyur// mi dag thams cad yongs zad las// de rnams 'dod pa dag pa kun// der ni bcom ldan rgyal ba dag/ drang por gzigs pas mkhyen par gyur// don spyod pa dang don mthun dang // bdog pa gtong dang ston par smra//
33b5(skyes rabs): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po la// nges pa'i bdag nyid gang dag dang // gang zhig snying stobs ldan rnams kyi// tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi po// snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms dang // byams pa zhes bya yongs 'dzin dang // ma chags yongasu sdang
33b6(skyes rabs): ba med// ma rmongs pa de dge ba'i rtsa// gsum ni thugs la zhen pa yi// bdag nyid chen po gang dag dang // sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan shes rab rtag bsten zhing // thabs dang smon lam ye shes dang // stobs kyis
34a1(skyes rabs): baN+Da sbyin pa thugs// mongs spyod da ma za gcig pu dag/ rtag r+b+ha nyis yod na du nyid da/ ga pa gsum gyogs la bdag/ dramad can dang sa/ par wAs/ zung ba rdzulas rnam ga h+na/
34a2(skyes rabs): skye mched drug ni 'byed pa dang // byang chub yan lag bdun ldan// 'phags lam yan lag brgyud nyer ston// kun sbyor dgus dman rgyal ba ni// stobs bcu'i bdag nyid ldan dag gis// 'jig rten skye bo'i spyod tshul la// mi mkhyen pa ni ci
34a3(skyes rabs): zhig yod// de nas shin tu snying rje yis// zhabs la mgos gtugs de dag la// de bzhin no zhes bcom ldan gyis// de yi zas la zhal gyis bzhis// de mthong sdig pa zad gyur pa/ degis ni mnya mo du rdul// dge slong tshogs
34a4(skyes rabs): kyis bskor ba yis// zas kun cho ga bzhin du blangs// de 'og de yi smon lam ni// ye shes snang ba'i thur ma yis// de dag mig ni yang dag phye// rab tu gsal ba'i gnas mthong gyur// de dag 'phral la drag por ni// chags bral yongs
34a5(skyes rabs): smin rab tu drang // rab tu byung dang ldan thob nas// 'gro ba'i mchod bya nyid du gyur// de dag 'phral la dge ba de// sngon du nye bar gnas mthong nas// dge slong rnams kyis 'di ci zhes// dris shing bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// 'di dag
34a6(skyes rabs): bdag dang 'brel pa 'di// don mthun bsrung zhing bslu ba yis// gling du 'gro ba'i skye ba ni// gzhan dag la yang grub par gyur// rnam rgyas spro ba sgrub byed kyi// rab mchog mkhas pa dga' ba'i sa// ba ra NA si zhes pa'i grong // mtho ris sde yi/
34b1(skyes rabs): mtshams gyur yod// gang na dri med chu rlabs ni// 'dzin pa lha yi rgyud 'dzin dag/ rtag tu lus can rnams kyi snying // brtse ba bzhin du dang bar bgyid// bzod pa bzhin du 'byung po kun// bag phab bde bar gnas pa gang // 'tshe ba med
34b2(skyes rabs): bzhin dam pas bstan// rig pa bzhin du mkhas pas 'dod// de na mi bdag tshangs par ni// brtag bya rnam rgyas pad+mar brten// tshangs sbyin zhes byas 'jig rten ni// 'jig rten gsum pa bzhin du bsrungs// der ni ded dpon dga' ba'i
34b3(skyes rabs): sde// zhes pa'i rnam tho spu lta bu// chu rnams dag gis chu gter bzhin// nor gyi don mthun gnas su gyur// de sras shin tu dga' zhes po// skye bo legs pa'i gnasu gyur// gang la brten pa'i yon tan tshogs// don rgyas nyid du rab tu gyur//
34b4(skyes rabs): sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab ldan// byed po rnam par chags slad gang // legs byas dpal du byas pa bzhin// de ni dri med rig kun dang // sgyu rtsal shin tu yangs par yang // ro ldan yid 'ong chu
34b5(skyes rabs): gter cher// chu bo bzhin du zhugs par gyur// spyod pa yon tan gyis brgyan cing // lus ni mtshan gyis brgyan pa gang // skyes bu mchog la chags pa bzhin// bsngags par 'os pa'i dpal gyis bsten// bsod nams kyis nyos mtho ris
34b6(skyes rabs): su// yab ni dus kyis gshegs pa'i tshe// de yis tha snyad khur dag ni// phrag pa'i 'os la gnas par byas// des bsams bdog gi dpal 'byor 'di// rim pas 'ongs shing yangs pa ste// de lta na yang slong kun gyi// re ba yongasu mi rdzogs snyam//
35a1(skyes rabs): sngar 'ongs slong bas zos nyid tshe// gang zhig phyis slong 'bras bu med// skyes bu dam pa la gnas dpal// shin tu che ba des kyang ci// rta gtong slong ba gcig de yang // gang gis da dung yod ma rdzogs//
35a2(skyes rabs): rin chen 'byung gnas byed po yis// yangs par byas pa'ang 'bras bu med// yang na brnag pa rgya che ba'i// slong ba su yis yongs rdzogs te// a gas+t+ya yi khyor chu yi// hub tu rgya mtsho chen po song // dpal ni gcig la slong ba mang //
35a3(skyes rabs): slong ba kun khengs bzod pa gang // nor de bdag gis yong mi 'thob// ci bya 'di ni shin tu gdung // dpal dang nor bu la sogs kyis// lnga drug nyid khengs gzhan ma ni zhes// chu gter da dung rta gdong me// gdung ba nang du 'bar ba bzhin//
35a4(skyes rabs): slong ba phyir phyogs kha yi ni// sdug bsngal shugs rings yongs mi bzod// de slad bdag gis 'bad pa yi// grangs med nor ni bsgrub par bya// de ltar yun ring bsams nas de// don mthun chen pos bskor nas ni// rin chen gling gi
35a5(skyes rabs): grong khyer du// phyin nas rin chen bsdu ba byas// de 'og don byas slar log ste// 'ong ba de ni chom rkun pa// don mthun nor 'phrog sbyor ba la// nags na rgyu bas lam du mthong // de dag don mthun nor blang phyir// bab col du sbyor des
35a6(skyes rabs): mthong nas// rang gi nor kun byin nas ni// rje su 'brang ba'i nor rnams bsrungs// phyi nas rim pa de bzhin nyid// rin chen gling gi 'gro 'ong gis// don mthun bskyab phyir chom rkun la// nor ni lan drug rab tu byin// phyis kyang
35b1(skyes rabs): lam ni de nyid nas// 'ongs pas de bzhin chom rkun pa// don mthun nor ni 'phrog pa la// lhag par brkam pa de dag mthong // des bsams kye ma bdag gi nor// chen po yis ni yongs su sim// 'di dag pha rol nor 'phrog la//
35b2(skyes rabs): brtson pa las ni phyir ma log/ nor gyis 'gro ba khengs byas shing // bdag gis yang yang brjod gyur kyang // kye ma ma la chom rkun ni// sdug pa 'di dag yongs ma khengs// rigs pa'i spro ba zhan gyur cing // lan smra kun tu bcom
35b3(skyes rabs): pa dang // smad par 'os pa'i dam bca' bzhin// ngan par skyes pa bdag skye smad// me yis rab tu gdungs pa de'i// skye ba med par mtshan mo ni// lo brgya lta bur rab tu gyur// mya ngan 'dam du bying ba yi// glang po'i dbang po bzhin
35b4(skyes rabs): ma g.yo// dbugs ring de la rmi lam du// lha ni mthu chen ldan pas smras// blo bzang mya ngan ma byed cig/ don med lus ni rab skem yin// rnam brtag dam par mngon 'dzegs po// khyod kyi 'dod pa 'byung bar 'gyur// blo ldan
35b5(skyes rabs): brtson 'grus can rnams kyi// 'bad pas 'grub par mi 'gyur ba// rmi lam rnam rtog rnyed dka' dang // 'jig rten 'di na de yod min// gang yang nus pa de dpe med// gang zhig gnyis skyes gcig gi yang // gsung gi kyal ka kho na/
35b6(skyes rabs): yis// 'bigs byed sa dang mtshungs par 'gyur// bdag nyid chen po'i bya ba'i dus// mi mnyam pa yang mnyam par gyur// ring ba rnams kyang nye bar 'ong // chu yang skam sa nyid du 'gyur// gzhan don khyod kyi brtson pa 'di// 'bras
36a1(skyes rabs): bu nyid du the tshom med// shA stonas spyod pa bsgrub la// the tshom lta yang mi 'byung // lha rnams kyis bstan pa darab// gling na rin po che dag med// gang zhig gcig gi mthu yis kyang // 'jig rten gsum
36a2(skyes rabs): go sna pa d+mo// gang byi mi mas 'das nas// doni ts+tshi hU~M Sh+T+rIH/ rnam nga bzhin gyi ste// b+h+r-i gdas skyegs rgyas sbyin pas sbyin// sa d+hag med ni gdung bapyod // brtan pa'i thazlas nas par bsgru//
36a3(skyes rabs): 'i phreng 'akros// ro su ba sangs su byungakhyod ni maung stongs mthuHsa shing // 'kho rab tu rlon par yad// da hU~M stsog nga/ rje rim badz+ra dr-i snron+da// nu g+h+ri b+h+yog rgyun+ya yod/
36a4(skyes rabs): che ba'i gling dag ni// bdun brgya rab tu 'das gyur cing // de bzhin du ni rin chen bdun// chu klud+ha ni bdun dang rjes 'gro dang // bzlog 'gro zhes pa'i chu yi gat+te // rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gis drer// pha rol 'thob po bsod nams ts+tshan+ta/
36a5(skyes rabs): de nas de mtshungs ming can dri// rlung gi rab rib rmongs par byed// smin chen don yod ces pa yis// mig gnyis gang du rnal gnas ster// de nas kun 'khor zhes chu gter// gang du rlung ni be rA ma b+has// 'bying zhing 'byung bas srog
36a6(skyes rabs): chags rnams// kun 'khor bdun las sgrol bar byed// de nas kun 'khor zhes pa'i ri// gang na mtshan rgyu dung gi lte// 'jigs su rung zhing srog 'phrog pa// skabs gsum pa yang skrag byed gnas// de na sman tshon dung gi lte// sbrul ni
36b1(skyes rabs): nag pos dkris gyur pa// mig dang mgo la bzhag pa na// bsod nams ldan pa yongs su skyob// de nas chu sngon zhes pa'i mtsho// gang na srin po mig dmar yod// ma kir zhes bya'i sman 'dzin dang // sangs rgyas rig byed rig pa'i
36b2(skyes rabs): dbang // de nas chu sngon zhes pa'i ri// gang na mgrin pa sngon po ni// mtshan rgyu mig ni rab 'bar ba// srin po lnga brgya dag dang gnas// de na don yod ces pa'i spyan// mthong dang dbugs dang reg pa dang // mche bas rab spros drug gi mi// rtag
36b3(skyes rabs): tu sbrul gyi dug rnams bsrung // gso sbyong brtul zhugs ldan pa dang // byams dang snying rje'i bdag nyid kyis// sbrul ni nag po rab bskrad nas// sman chen de ni thob par 'gyur// de yi mig snyun zur bud ni// byas na srin po'i shing d+ha ri// 'bru
36b4(skyes rabs): med theg pa phra mo can// bsod nams ljon pas sgrol bar 'gyur// de nas be raM b+hA zhes ro// de rjes gang gis pha rol gzhan// 'jigs rung zangs kyi nags zhes pa// sA lo chen po'i nags kyi nang // de na sbrul ni sbram chen dag/ zangs mig ces
36b5(skyes rabs): pa bzod dka' ba// drag po'i dri ldan gang gi rlung // nyid kyis 'tshe bar mi byed gnas// zla ba drug tu nyal gyur pa'i// kha chu yis ni dpag tshad khyab// ltogs pas gdungs nas zla drug ni// gnyid dang bral bas chung bar gyur// 'od ma'i rtsa ba rdos
36b6(skyes rabs): bsdams phug/ rab tu phye bas dri dang ldan// nyon dang mtshan du rab 'bar bya// mig sman du 'os spyan thob 'gyur// sdang med ces pa sangs rgyas kyi// rig pa bzlas pas sbrum chen ni// 'jigs rung de dang gzi brjid che// gzhan gyis kyang ni
37a1(skyes rabs): 'jigs mi 'gyur// de nas ri ni che ba bdun// 'od ma'i tshe ra mas gtams gyur pa// zangs glegs gis mtshan rkang pa yis// brtson 'grus ldan pas thar bar 'gyur// de rjes shal ma li nags dang // 'gyur
37a2(skyes rabs): byed chu klung rnam bdun dag/ brgal nas rtse gsum zhes pa'i ri// rab tu mtho ba dag tu sleb// de na rtse gsum zhes pa yis// tsher ma rdo rje 'bigs byed yod// zangs kyi grogs bu nges sbyar ba'i// rkang pa dag la mi 'jug go/ chu klung rtse gsum
37a3(skyes rabs): zhes pa dang // de na lcags kyi rtse yi ri// chu klung nges dang ljags phur gyi// ri bo de nas ngas lha'i klung // de nas bco brgyad 'khyogs ces pa'o// ri bo 'grod par dka' ba dang // de nas de dang mi mtshungs klung // de rjes phra mo zhes po'i raM// de
37a4(skyes rabs): nas du 'i'i mig ces re// phyogs drospu du bsgo tshog gyur pa// ma rungs sbrul gdug dkyil 'khor gyi// mthong ba reg pa'i dug gis khyab// de yi rtse na rdzing bu'i mtha'// rdo bas bcings pa'i phug chen po// phug gung nor bu 'od khung dang // sman
37a5(skyes rabs): chen 'tshe byed ces pa yod// de phye de yi mgo dang ni// rkang lag lho la ma ngon par thugs// gsang sngags stobs dang bcas bgrod na// ma rungs sbrul gyis gnod mi 'gyur// de nas sbrul gdug ri bo bdun// sems can drag pos kun tu
37a6(skyes rabs): khengs// de lta'i chu klung dag kyang ste// chu'i phun tshogs pa mtha' med// de dag ma lus rab brgal te// gzhan phan brtson pa bsod nams kyis// rtse mo mkha' la reg gyur pa// dkar ba'i ri la 'dzegs par 'gyur// de nas de yi ngos
37b1(skyes rabs): zhan la// ro hi ta ki zhes grong khyer// dpag bsam shing gis nye bar mdzes// mtho ris dang mtshungs mthong bar 'gyur// de na ded dpon snying stobs ni// chen po ma g+ha zhes pa yod// sems can kun la phan par dgyes// brgya byin
37b2(skyes rabs): bzhin du rnam par grags// shes bzang blo gros skyon med des// ba ra da yi gling dag tu// 'gro bar brtson pa khyod kyi ni// lam gyi gdams ngag kun byed 'gyur// 'di brjod bdud rtsi'i rlon gyis bzhin// 'os pa'i tshig gis shin tu dga'//
37b3(skyes rabs): mang du spro ba bskyed byas nas// lha mo 'phral la mi snang gyur// shin tu dga' ni rab sad nas// thams cad de de bzhin zhes bsams// rang gi spro ba sngon btang nas// snying stobs la ni zhon te chas// de yis bstan pa'i lam nas ni//
37b4(skyes rabs): ngal ba rnam bcom des bgrod pas// lo ni bcu gnyis rdzogs pa na// ro hi ta ka'i grong khyer sleb// skabs 'dir der ni don mthun bdag/ ma g+ha las kyi sbyor ba las// gso ba dka' ba'i nad kyis ni// lus ni rnal du ma gnas gyur// de nas
37b5(skyes rabs): rgyal po'i khab lha'i khyim// nang du 'jug pa ma thob nas// de yi sgo na shin tu dga'// bya ba bsgrubs slad 'dug par 'gyur// de nas sman pa'i zol gyis ni// de ni nang du 'jug pa thob// nye bar rigs pa'i gtam shes pa// su yi gus
37b6(skyes rabs): pa'i sa ma yin// tshe yi rig byed sgrub shes shing // 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid shes pa des// zla drug 'jug nyid de yi tshor// shes nas bsams pa 'khrugs par gyur// dga' zhing phan pa'i sman mang dang // de yis rim 'gro laT
38a1(skyes rabs): byas pas// dus ni shin tu thung ba yis// shin tu dga' dang mdza' bor gyur// de la mdza' bas sman sbyar rnams// de yis 'dod pa bya bar gyur// mdza' bos cung zad byin pa gang // de dag kun la yid
38a2(skyes rabs): dga'o// de nas bde ba'i rim 'gros de'i// nad ni chung ba nyid du gyur// dam pa'i grogs las sdug bsngal zhi// de las nad dang bral bar gyur// de nas ma g+ha mdza' ba las// yang phebs skyes la shin tu dga'// slad nas rang gi
38a3(skyes rabs): gtam gyi tshe// spyod tshul mtha' ni rig par byas// ba da ra yi gling bgrod la// bdag nyid che de'i spro ba dag/ gzhan don g.yo med shes gyur nas// ma g+has ya mtshan de la smras// kye ma snying po med pa yi// 'khor ba 'di na snying
38a4(skyes rabs): bo'i gzugs// gzhan gyi bsam pa'i dpung gnyen ni// nor bu 'ga' zhig yod pa yin// na tshod gzhon zhing mdzes pa'i gzugs// gzhan gyi don la gtsags pa'i yid// yon tan phun tshogs bsod nams ldan// gnas 'di khyod nyid
38a5(skyes rabs): kho na'i yin// 'di snyed sa 'di rab bzlas nas// khyod ni gzhan gyi don du 'ongs// khyod kyi stong grogs bgyid pa la// 'on kyang bdag ni mchog tu gzir// mtshams ni nges pa lus can gyi// srog ni nges par 'gro ba nyid// khyod kyi 'dod pa'i
38a6(skyes rabs): rgyu nyid du// bdag gi de mthar gyur kyang bla'i// da ltar nyid du zad pa gang // de ni zad par yongasu bgrang // gzhan gyi don du srog dag kyang // zad pa rnyed pa brgya dang mnyam// bdag gis ba ra da yi gling // ma mthong 'on kyang bdag gis thos// chu
38b1(skyes rabs): ter chen po phyogs lung ston// de nas de yi mtshan ma shes// de skad brjod nas sa bdag gis// grogs bzang mnyen pa'i tshig kyang dor// de yis bkra shis gru gzings ni// shin tu dga' dang lhan cig bzung // de nas bsam pa yangs pa
38b2(skyes rabs): ni// de dag gozings la zhon gyur te// rje su mthun pa'i rlung dag gis// dpag tshad brgyar yang 'gro bar byed// gnas dang gnas su chu gter che'i// chu ni kha dog sna tshogs mthong // 'di dag ci zhes ltad mo'i slad// shin tu dgas bris ma 'ga'
38b3(skyes rabs): la'o// rgya mtsho 'di yi chu la ni// lcags kyi ri bo lnga dag yod// gzhan yang zangs dang dngul rang bzhin// de rnams grib ma'i bye brag gis// kha dog sna tshogs gnas dang gnas// khongs gnas rab 'bar sman dag gis// chu gter 'di ni 'bar
38b4(skyes rabs): mthong // 'di brjod ma g+ha dus kyi mtshams// thob cing nad kyis thebs par gyur// srog btang dam pa'i grags pa dag/ brtan pa'i 'tsho ba rnam par btsugs// ji ltar bdag nyid che snying stobs// rdo rje byugs pa bas kyang brtan// de ltar gal te tshe
38b5(skyes rabs): gyur na// srid pa bsgrub byar cis mi 'gyur// gzings ni ngogs phyin shin tu dgas// de dang bral ba las skyes pa'i// mya ngan bsal nas grogs po yi// lus ni legs par bya ba bsgrubs// rten ni rnam par chad pa'i tshe// gang zhig bya la brtan
38b6(skyes rabs): pa'i yid// 'di nyid bdag nyid che rnams kyi// snying stobs spro bas mtho ba'i rtags// yang ni gzings la zhon byas te// chu bo'i gter ni yang dag bsgral// rin chen ri bo'i ngos nas ni// nags tshal stug po'i nang du zhugs// bdag nyid chen
39a1(skyes rabs): po'i blo gros ni// dman pa 'bral bas ma yin zhing // gdung dang dgra rnams mngon sbyor dang // nad dang nyon mongs spyod pas min// der ni na mkhar son pa'i ri// phyogs ngos ma lus bkag gyur pa// mdun
39a2(skyes rabs): du bgegs ni gzugs can bzhin// bgrod par dka' ba de yis mthong // rmongs pa bzhin du sbyor ba'i ri// de mthong thabs ni dman gyur cing // zhab su yal 'dab mal bstan la// nyal nas de yi skad cig bsams// kye ma bdag
39a3(skyes rabs): ni zhugs gyur nas// ji snyed dus ni rab tu 'das// gang du'ang ba da ra yi gling // ming yang nges por ma thos so// bsod nams zong gis bdag gi ni// brtson pa'i grogs mchog gyur pa gang // de yang las kyi dba' rlabs kyis// dus
39a4(skyes rabs): min gdos pa chag pa bzhin// thabs nyams thabs ni 'di la yang // shin tu che ba'i 'bad rtsol gyis// bdag ni nges par rnam mi bzlog/ grub pa 'am yang na shi bar gyur// 'gro ba gsum po 'dir skyes pa// gzhan la phan
39a5(skyes rabs): phyir srog dag ni// zad par gyur pa de gcig pu// skye 'gro rnamasu mchod par 'os// der ni de ltar bsams 'khrugs de// snying stobs rgya mtshor shes gyur nas// ri la gnas pa'i mchod sbyin ni// sngon po zhes pa 'ongs nas smras//
39a6(skyes rabs): shar du dpag tshad phyin gyur nas// sa 'dzin rtse mo gsum pa ni// sa las byas pa'i them skas la// 'dzegs la de nas 'gro bar gyis// de skad gnod sbyin gdams ngag gis// rin chen de yis rnam brgal bas// rtse mo shin tu
39b1(skyes rabs): mtho ba yi// shel gyis 'dzin mdun du mthong // bya rnams kyis kyang bgrod dka' ba// 'jam pa'i brag ni gcig pu de'i// de yi yid la re ba ni// yud tsam bya ba med par gyur// shin tu mtho zhing rten dang bral// rang gi rtogs
39b2(skyes rabs): bzhin g.yo med par// de la rnam dpyad yun ring de// ri mo bkod pa bzhin du gyur// de nas zla 'od ces pa yi// gnod sbyin brag gi phug gnas pa// snying stobs phun tshogs de la ni// mngon phyogs ya mtshan ldan pas smras// 'di
39b3(skyes rabs): nas shar du rgyang grags tsam// song bas can nags tshal ni// rlung zhon gyis bskyod 'khri shing ldan// sngon med rnam 'phrul mthong bar 'gyur// der ni rab gsal byed ces pa// phug na gtams pa'i sman chen po// lus can bsrung phyir
39b4(skyes rabs): rin chen la// rab tu btus pas 'thob par 'gyur// de yi 'od kyis snang byas pa'i// skas kyis shel gyi ri la ni// 'phral nyid du ni yang dag 'dzegs// 'dod pa thob phyir 'gro bar byos// sman chen de ni don byas bzhin// skad cig gis
39b5(skyes rabs): ni 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dod pa thob pa glog ltar g.yo// de phyir mya ngan bya ba min// de ltar sgrub byed gnod sbyin gyis// bstan pas de yis sa 'dzin dag/ yang dag 'dzegs pas mdun du ni// gser gyi khang ldan grong khyer mthong // lhun
39b6(skyes rabs): po brtsegs pas rgyas pa bzhin// rab gsal rnams kyi sprul pa bzhin// skad cag gis na 'gro bor 'gyur// 'ad pa thob pa glag ltar ga ye// de phyir mya ngan bye ba man// de ltar sgrub byed gnod sbyin gyis// bsten pas de yas sa 'dzin
40a1(skyes rabs): ngo mtshar kun gyis byas pa bzhin// de mthong ya mtshan ldan par gyur// grong khyer lam ni mi med cing // gser gyi sgo glegs chen po yis// de yi sgo ni bcad mthong nas// de ni nags kyi mtha' na gnas//
40a2(skyes rabs): skabs 'dir nyin mo'i mthar gyur te// mtha' med mkha' lam lam bgrod pas// tsha zer can ni yongs ngal bzhin// nub kyi ri dang nye bar sleb// 'od stong nub par gyur pa'i tshe// mngon par 'gro ba mun can ma// rgyu skar bdag po 'dod gyur nas/
40a3(skyes rabs): dal bus rab tu 'gro ba bzhin// de nas rab gsal 'byor pa yis// phyogs kun yongs rdzogs gyen du phyogs// dri med byang chub sems dpa' bzhin// bdud rtsi'i 'od de shar bar gyur// mun pa'i tshogs ni ma lus pa// rab tu zhi bar nus
40a4(skyes rabs): shing rgyas// yid ni dngas byed zla ba'i 'od// snying stobs spyod tshul bzhin du mdzes// nyin bral las skyes phyogs rnams kyi// mun pu'i rmongs pa zla bas phrogs// ga' phyir ring na bzhugs pa yi// bdag nyid che rnams gzhan phan mchog/ zla
40a5(skyes rabs): ba'i zer gyis shin tu dga'o// skad cig lus ni khengs gyur nas// bya ba'i rgya mtsho rba rlabs dag/ 'khrug po'i rgyu ni gnyid thob gyur// mtshan mo zad par gyur pa'i tshe// yon tan yon gyis gus bcas pa// mthu chen lha yis rmi lam du// de la
40a6(skyes rabs): mngon par phyogs nas smras// e ma kA ye snying stobs can// de nyid dam pa'i mngon zhen pa// legs byas khyod kyis ngal dub ni// gzhan gyi don du rgya che byas// nyon mongs lhag ma chung ngu 'dir// yid ni 'byung bar mi 'os so// snying stobs dman
40b1(skyes rabs): pa med rnams kyi// rang dbang nyid du thams cad 'grub// gser gyi grong khyer gang 'di dang // gsum ni pha rol gzhan dang gzhan// gong nas gong du rnam par bkra/ 'di na rin chen grong khyer yod// khyod kyis sgo ni brdungs pa na// de dag las
40b2(skyes rabs): ni mi 'am ci// bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu drug dang // so gnyis rim pas phyir 'byung 'gyur// khyod kyis dbang po thul ba yis// de yi bag med rig par bya// ring po min par 'dod pa dag/ 'thob par 'gyur te gzhan pa ci// lha mos gus
40b3(skyes rabs): bcas 'di brjod la// de nas rab sad shin tu dgas// grong khyer sgo la mngon phyogs te// lag pa yis ni lan gsum brdungs// de nas mi 'am ci mo bzhi// g.yo ba'i rlung gis bskyod pa yis// ngo mtshar ljon pa'i snye ma bzhin// yid
40b4(skyes rabs): ni rangs par byed gyur cing // 'dren byed dag gi bdud rtsi'i char// bzhin ras zla ba'i 'od zer gyis// nyin mo 'ang zla 'od ldan par byas// dga' bas mthong nges shin tu dga'// 'dod pa rgya cher yang dag mchod// de ni mngon par 'dod pa
40b5(skyes rabs): yis// mdzo' bos mgron gces bzhin du byas// zla ba chu shel snyan 'khod pa// de la dran pa 'tsho ba'i sman// lus dang bcas par skyes pa bzhin// stan ni bzung byas de dag gis// rtse dga' dgod pa'i 'od zer dag/ yang dag rgyas
40b6(skyes rabs): par gyur pa ni// mdza' ba'i phrang skyes ga pur dag/ sngon du ster ba bzhin du smras// yon tan dam pas brgyan pa'i dbyibs// khyed can 'ong bar 'os pa yang // gang gi khyim du rang nyid 'ongs// kye ma bdag cag bsod nams can/ bdud
41a1(skyes rabs): rtsi la ni su zhig sdang // tsan dan la ni su mi sred// zla ba la ni su gus dman// dam pa rnams la su mi 'dod// gang yang bud med rang nyid ni// gleng ba skal bzang nyams pa'i rgyu// de lta na
41a2(skyes rabs): yang khyod mthong ba// nyid kyis mu cor byas phyir smra// mi 'am ci yi grong khyer 'di// bdag cag dang bcas mdza' bas ster// legs par brjod ldan rin chen yang // dge ba khyod kyi rang dbang nyid// de skad de dag rnams kyi
41a3(skyes rabs): tshig/ mdza' bar 'os shing thos shin tu dgas// so yi zla 'od snying stobs ltar// rab tu dkar ba spo zhing smras// phebs par smra ba'i bdud rtsi 'di// su yi gus mang gnas ma yin// khyed rnams dag gis gus byas pa// bdag
41a4(skyes rabs): gis yang ni gus pa'i gnas// 'di mthong nyid ni bsngags par 'os// de la'ang rje su 'dzin pa 'di// mu tig 'khri shing gdung sel la// tsan gyis kyang byugs sam ci// rnam pa 'di lta'i dri med dag/ zla ba'i 'od bzhin gyur pa dang //
41a5(skyes rabs): rnam pa 'jig rten spyod tshul ni// yang dag rigs shing mdzes pa yin// rigs shing mdzes pa'i spyod pa dang // rab tu dang shing dri med yid// mnyes gshin pa dang 'jam pa'i tshig/ su yi gus pa'i sa ma yin// mchod pa'i
41a6(skyes rabs): yo byad 'os gyur pa'o// kun spyod 'di ni bdag gis blang // bud med gzhan dbang yin pa'i slad// khyed kyang bdag nyid sbyin mi 'os// gzhon nu ma dngos las 'das pa// khyod ni gzhan gyis yongasu bzung // byams shing gus pas
41b1(skyes rabs): ma dang ni// phebs pas bdag gi sring mo yin// gang zhig gzhan gyi 'byor pa dug/ gzhan gyi bud med ma dang ni// gzhan 'tshe bdag nyid 'tshe ba nyid// de dag phyogs ni gnod pa med// phra ma rdzun dang tshig rtsub dang // bkyil pa smra ba spangs
41b2(skyes rabs): pa'i tshig/ gang gi kha na rtag pa nyid// de dag phyogs rnams kun tu shes// gang zhig brnab sems bral ba'i sems// gnod sems dag ni yong su spangs// log par lta bas dman gyur pa// de dag legs pa'i lam la brten// mi dge
41b3(skyes rabs): bcu yi lam dag las// nges par log pa'i rang bzhin can// de dag dge ba'i sde rnams kyis// bkag pa med pa'i mtho ris lam// nor gyis mtho ba rnams kyi nor ni blo gros nyid// dbang pos rnam rgyal rnams kyi mig ni rig pa nyid// skyes
41b4(skyes rabs): bu mchog gyur rnams kyi bsod nams brtse ba nyid// yid ni gtsang ba rnams kyi ngos 'jug dog bdag nyid// skyes bu rnams kyi rnam pa de lta'i yon tan dag/ legs gnas 'di ni khrims kyi dri ma med par 'gyur// rin chen mu tig dam pa'i
41b5(skyes rabs): tshogs ltas shin tu lhag/ tshul khrims dag ni rnam pa rnams kyi rgyan du brjod// sems can don gnyer dbang po thul ba de yis ni// yon tan rjes mthun de skad brjod pa thos gyur nas// tshim par gyur cing ltad mo'i don bzhin mkha' las
41b6(skyes rabs): ni// zla ba'i 'jig rten sa la spro zhing de yis smras// nor bu bzhin du yon tan rib 'bar rin thang med// dge ba khyod kyi mdzes pa'i 'od ni mthong gyur pa// gang zhig mgo dang rna ba snying ka nyid la yang // rtag par dam pa rnams kyis rgyan du khyod
42a1(skyes rabs): nyid bgyis// bdag nyid dang mnyam grags pa'i mthu ldan rin thang che// nor bu 'di ni khyod kyis rab tu bzung bar mdzod// gang zhig rgyal mtshan la bzhag dpag tshad stong phrag tu// slong ba rnams kyi 'dod/
42a2(skyes rabs): pa char du 'bab par 'gyur// de skad brjod nas rin chen rab mchog gzhon nu mas// rab tu dang ba gzugs can bzhin du de la byin// des kyang de ni mdza' bo'i nye bar spyod pas blangs// dngul las byas pa'i grong khyer dag ni gnyis par
42a3(skyes rabs): phyin// de ni gus pas de yi nyis 'gyur dag gi ni// mi 'am ci mo rnams kyis de la mchod pa byas// rim pa de dag nyid kyi rnam dag blo gros kyis// de yi nyis 'gyur mthu ldan nor bu thob par 'gyur// de nas gsum pa'i grong khyer bai DUr+ya rang
42a4(skyes rabs): bzhin// mdzes pa'i mig can bcu drug de dag de yis mthong // de dag rnams la de bzhin nyid du nor bu ni// de yi nyis 'gyur mthu ldan rim gro dam pas thob// de nas mdun du rin chen bzhi yi rang bzhin gyi// grong khyer grong khyer kun las
42a5(skyes rabs): lhag pa'i dpal ldan pa// bzhi par phyin de mi 'am ci ni mdzes ma de'i// nyis 'gyur dag gis yon tan lhag pas de don gnyer// legs bsdums de yis de bzhin nyid du dam chos kyi// gtam dag zhar la byung bas tshim gyur de dag ni//
42a6(skyes rabs): rab rgyas ut+pal sngon po'i phreng ba lhor ring ba'i// zur mig gis 'phangs 'od dang ldan pas de la smras// rin chen 'byung gnas zla ba da ra zhes pa// nged kyi ming po mi 'am ci yi rgyal rigs yod// rdzu 'phrul yongs kyis rang gi ming gis
42b1(skyes rabs): mtshan gyur pa// rin thang che ba'i gling 'di de yi bzhugs gnas yin// 'od zer tshogs ni gsal ldan rin chen 'di yang bsod nams rten rnams kyis// gso sbyong zhes bya'i brtul zhugs nges pa'i cho ga rgyal mtshan la bkod na// 'dzam
42b2(skyes rabs): bu'i gling du mtha' dag 'gro tshogs mngon 'dod don rnams char nyid 'bebs// gzhan don brtan par gyur pas khyab par bgyid slad de ni gzung bar mdzod// de ltar mdzes ma rnams kyis 'chi med shing 'bras legs btus gus bcas
42b3(skyes rabs): shing // lhag par mdza' sdug ldan pas skal bzang nor bu byin pa blangs byas nas// mgyogs 'gro rab dga' sprin shugs zhes bya rlung las rgyal ba la zhen te// de yi lam gyi gdams ngag thob pas de yang rang gi grong khyer song //
42b4(skyes rabs): dus tshod der ni dri med grags ldan sa yi bdag po tshangs pas byin// yangs pa'i dge bas mtho ris lam du rab gshegs pa ra NA si ru// dpal ldan 'jig rten bskyab blo rnams bskrun slong ba kun gyi 'bras bu ster// shin tu dga' ni
42b5(skyes rabs): grong khyer gtso bos chos kyi rgyal srid la dbang bskur// de nas mgo bkru cho ga'i rim pa yis// gso sbyong dag la nyer gnas bco lnga la// rin po che de rgyal mtshan rtser btags nas// sna tshogs 'dod pas yongasu gang bar byas// gzhan
42b6(skyes rabs): la phan pas 'bras bu ldan par gshegs bgrod byas shing lo brgyar ni// rgyal srid chen po la gnas 'jig rten mtha' dag khengs byas mi bdag gi/ gnas la sras bzhag nye bar zhi ba thams cad thob cing de nyid shes// gang yang 'di
43a1(skyes rabs): ni tshangs pa'i dngos po dam pa dag tu gshegs par gyur// rin chen gling du mngon bgrod pa// shin tu dga' mi skye ba der// gang mngon bdag gis khengs byas pa// chom rkun de kun 'di dag go/ de skad
43a2(skyes rabs): ston pa gtso bo yis// rang gi spyod tshul mtha' yi gtam// sbyin dang brtson 'grus man ngag gis// dge slong rnams la rjes bstan bsgrubs// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi
43a3(skyes rabs): 'khri shing las ba dA ra'i gling du 'gro ba'i yal 'dab ste drug po'o// / dge ba'i smon lam dag pa'i gzi biN+Did dang // dben pa dri med snang ba'i rtogs byed ldan// gang zhig yongs su bsgrags pa tsam nyid na// srid
43a4(skyes rabs): pa'i rmongs 'phrog de nyid bsngags par 'os// grong khyer ser skya zhes par ni// n+ya gro d+ha yi nags tshal gnas// sngon tshe 'khor ni stong pag la// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan mdzad// mi dman kun dga'i tshogs kyi bcud// tsan ltar
43a5(skyes rabs): bsil de yi ni// gsung gi bdud rtsi gsan pa yi// snyims pos bsod nams ldan pas 'thungs// chos ni nyan pa'i tshigs pa dar// rgyal po zas ni gtsang ma yis// bsod nams nye bar bstun pa'i chus// dri ma dang bral dga' ba thob/
43a6(skyes rabs): de nas rgyal rigs las skyes pa// shAkya ming chen dag gis der// chos kyi gdam ngag thos gyur nas// rang gi khyim du phyin te smras// kye ma sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'di// bdag cag gis ni don chen la// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas chos
43b1(skyes rabs): dang ni// dge 'dun grub dang myang 'da'i spyad// de ma tshig de thos gyur nas// khyim thabras zla 'od gdams ngag gi/ byung bar thob pas dga' ba dang // don du gnyer las de la smras// skyes bu bsod nams sbrul ldan rnams// bcom ldan 'das
43b2(skyes rabs): kyis rjes bzung 'os// bdag cag bud med smad 'os rnams// de yi man ngag 'os ma yin// de skad khyim thabs tshig thos nas// des smras bzang mo bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ba'i bla mo'i snying rje yi// gzigs pa dag la dbye ba med// kun la
43b3(skyes rabs): nyi ma'i 'od zer snyoms// chu 'dzin dag gis char pa snyoms// sems can kun la thugs brtse ba// bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs pa snyoms// skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo yi// tshig gi phyi dro khyod kyi skabs// bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du ni//
43b4(skyes rabs): rgyal po zas gtsang byed pa nyid// de skad bdag po'i tshig snyan gyis// shAkya'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod nams nags// gtsang ma der ni de song gyur// der ni snying stobs dpag bsam shing // snying stobs me tog
43b5(skyes rabs): 'bras bu che// rab tu zhi ba'i bdud rtsi yis// yang dag bran bya de yis mthong // rlung gis dud ba'i 'khri shing bzhin// de yis ring nas der phyag 'tshal// rna rgyan g.yo ba'i zol gyis ni// rmongs pa yongasu gtong ba bzhin// gser 'od rin chen
43b6(skyes rabs): rgyan rnams kyis// brgyan pa dag ni mthong gyur nas// dge slong kun dga' bo zhes pas// shin tu phani brtson de la smras// ma ma khyod kyi cha lugs 'di// dregs pas rgyags zhing rab zhis stong // thub pa'i dka' thub na gsu ni// mi rigs 'di ni
44a1(skyes rabs): chags bral gnas// yon tan gyis bsdams chags pa yi// mu cor rgyan rnams kye ma 'dir// bdag cag gzung bar mi 'os shes// khyod la nye bar 'doms pa bzhin// de yis 'di brjod gzugs bzang de//
44a2(skyes rabs): skyengs pa'i gdong ni dman pa yis// rgyan rnams thams cad bkrol nas ni// rang gi khyim du bskur bar gyur// de nas thams cad 'khod pa la// dge ba ston mdzad bcom ldan 'das// dngos po mi rtag pa nyid du// nye bar ston pa'i rtsom pa mdzad//
44a3(skyes rabs): nga gis rtag tu mi rtag nyid// rtag pa nyid bzhin 'gro bar ni// srog chags rmongs pas 'dzin byed pa// 'di ni rmongs pa'i mthu chen no// bde bar yid ches rmongs pa yis// 'jig rten mi bden pa la dga'// dngos po kun gyi dngos med ni// nyams
44a4(skyes rabs): myong gnas pa rig pa med// skye ba'i thos pa'i lam du yang dag chags ldan kha cig sgra yi bstan bcos dag dang ni// gzhan ni rig byed lam dang rtog ge rtsod pas gzhan te kha cig rgyud ni yongs 'dzin dang // gzhan dag rnam mang sgyu rtsal mkhas dang
44a5(skyes rabs): lhan cig nyid du 'jig par 'gyur ba'i skad cig gnas// de la yang ni mi 'jigs pa bzhin rol rtsed dag gi rmongs rnams dga' ba rab tu 'dzin// mi bzang yul gyi gnod pa'i lus ni nyon mongs phung po dag gi gnas// rab rmongs las byung
44a6(skyes rabs): srid pa rab rtsub mya ngam thang gi rnam par gsal// mtha' dang bral ba'i srid pa'i nad 'di ji ltar rnam par ldog 'gyur ba// de ltar bya dang bya min phan pa'i sa la rnam dpyod ldan pas dpyad// bcom ldan rang nyid 'di la sogs// 'du byed mi rtag yang
44b1(skyes rabs): ngag ldan// chos kyi gdams ngag dge ba ni// rigs par gsung bar brtson pa'i tshe// de ni shAkya'i bu mo gcig/ bu mo gzhon nu ma yi mtshams// bzod dka'i lang tsho la gnas pa// gzugs dang bskal bzang nyid kyis dregs// nu ma'i ngos
44b2(skyes rabs): su mu tig gi/ do shal dga' ba'i bdag po yi// grags pa'i snying po gsal 'dra la// zur mig g.yo bas yang dag bltas// ming chen chung ma zla 'od kyis// rtse gcig min pa'i sems ldan de// do shalha rnam par blta ba dag/ mthong nas
44b3(skyes rabs): chags bral bzhin du bsams// chos ni nye bar ston tshe yang // g.yo ba'i do shal 'di la lta// dngos po rnams kyi skad cig ma// 'di dag rmongs pas mi nyan nyid// rang gi do shal bstan nas 'di// do nal spro ba bdag gis dbrog/ lhag pa
44b4(skyes rabs): mthong ba kho na yis// lus can dregs pa zhi bar gyur// 'di bsams de yis 'bangs mo ni// ro hi ta song zhes bya la smras// ro hi ta song bdag gi ni// do shal khyim nas mgyogasu long // de yis de skad brjod pas de// der ni chos mnyan la
44b5(skyes rabs): zhugs pa// dus min 'gro bas yid byung nas// shugs dang bcas pas skad cig bsams// kye ma bdag gi dge ba 'dir// bar chod 'di ni yang dag skyes// gang phyir gzhan dbang 'tsho gyur pa// bdag gis chos nyan mi 'thob po// bsod
44b6(skyes rabs): nams dri bzang rgyas gyur pa cing // snying rje'i ge sar 'khrigs gyur pa// bcom ldan zhal gyi pad+mo las// gsung gi sbrang rtsi mchog gis thob// kye ma rang dbang rnam par gcod// lus 'jig bde ba nyams byed pa// sdug bsngal 'gro bar
45a1(skyes rabs): srog chags rnams// g.yog ni sdug bsngal brgyud ma yin// g.yog gis ngal dub kyis thob pa// gla rngan bya dga'i chu yi thigs// shugs ring shin tu tsha bas bskol// kye ma dka' slad dag gis
45a2(skyes rabs): 'thung // dpon po mthong na khengs nyams shing // yon tan nyams dang gzi brjid mchod // zhi zhing ngal ba 'di dag ni// g.yog byed bdag gi dang po'i 'bras// g.yog ni rkang pa 'ching ba'i lhuT kyi ljag sgrog zhum zhing nga rgyal 'chags pa'i sa/
45a3(skyes rabs): rtag tu nges par rang gi bya ba 'gog cing gnyid dang bde ba 'joms par byed// re ba'i chags zhe na tshogs kyi lam dang legs 'grogs longs spyod kyi ni rdo rje dang // rmongs pa rnams kyi ri dgas skom skyed mya ngan sa gzhi lus ni zad byed yin//
45a4(skyes rabs): de ltar yun ring bsams nas ni// de yi bka' yis de song ste// lus ni g.yog tu btsongs rnams la// rang dgar gnas pa ga la yod// gzhan gyis bskul bas dman gyur cing // 'gro ba de ni bcom ldan 'das// snying rje rgyas pa'i lha
45a5(skyes rabs): yi ni// spyan gyis gzigs nas skad cig bsams// skye ba 'di la 'di yi ni// 'tsho ba'i mtshams lhag yongasu rdzogs// sdug ma 'di ni 'khor ba las// bdag rang nyid kyis gdon par bya// de nas las kyi sbyor ba yis// lam du
45a6(skyes rabs): 'phral la bgrod de la// be'u la chags rmongs bcas pa'i// ba yi ru yis brdung bar gyur// skye ba gzhan gyi lhag gnas kyis// yid ni sangs rgyas la dmigs shing // bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin las// de yi rang bzhin dran des
45b1(skyes rabs): bsams// 'khor ba chu srin 'byung gnas kyi// skye ba'i 'khor mor srog chags rnams// las kyi rba rlabs kyis dkrugs pas// kye ma 'bying zhing 'byung ba'i rim// skyes bu rnams kyi dpral ba yangs pa'i rdo yi glegs bu la// bde med las kyi
45b2(skyes rabs): sprul pa gsal ba'i rtags can gzong dag gis// skye dang 'chi ba rab spros yi ge dag tu bkod gyur pa// 'di dag rnams ni lag pas yongs su phyis pas bskyod pa min// gang gis mngal nas brtsams te rim gyis lhung dang rga dang 'jig
45b3(skyes rabs): ba'i dus rnams dag/ gang du yang ni lus kyi rtsis ris gzhan pa nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin pa// las kyi dbang gis mi rnams dag gis mi rab mang sred pas rnam par bkra ba dag/ bkod pa 'di ni rma bya'i sgo yi tshogs dang mtshungs par yongasu
45b4(skyes rabs): smin par 'gyur// de ltar bsams te sngon du nye bar gnas skabs bzang po dang po'i rnam gzhag rab gnas pa// mi bzang 'bangs mo'i dngos po brnag pas skyengs par gyur pa bzhin du g.yo ba med nyid gyur// smon lam khyang pa dkar po dam
45b5(skyes rabs): pa'i chos kyis dag pa'i blo ni yongasu gzung byas nas// 'khor ba dag tu slongs par byed pas dri ma can bzhin de yi srog ni btang bar gyur// de nas mtho ris phun tshogs nye// sing ge la yi gling du de// 'o ma'i rgya mtshor zla ba yi//
45b6(skyes rabs): mo bzhin du rab gsal skyes// de ni mngal zhugs skyes pa'i dus// mkha' las mu tig char pa g.yos// sing ga la bdag bu mo de// mu tig 'khri shing zhes par gyur// de ni che bar skyes pa yis// bsod nams bzhin du 'jo sgeg
46a1(skyes rabs): 'dzin// yan lag rnams kyi rnam 'byed kyi// chog shes bzhin du lang tsho thob// de nas nam zhig mnyan yod kyi// grong khyer ba yi tshong pa rnams// chu srin 'byung gnas rab bsgral nas// sing ga la yi gling du
46a2(skyes rabs): song // de ni de dag mtshan mo'i mthar// rab sad ngal bsos dga' ba yis// chos don tshig bcad kyis bcings pa// sangs rgyas kyis gsungs glu ru blangs// pho brang ba gam la gnas pa// mi bdag bu mos rna ba yis// bdud rtsi de thos de
46a3(skyes rabs): dag rnams// bkug ste 'di dag ci zhes dris// rab dga' ldan ma de la des// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// sems can kun la thugs brtse bas// rang bzhin du 'os gsungs zhes smras// sangs rgyas mngon brjod thos nyid kyis//
46a4(skyes rabs): de ni spu long gis rgyan lus// yang dag rig pa legs ldan mthu// rab tu bskyed pa'i sku gzhir gyur// sgra ni sprin gyi lta bu yis// rma bya bzhin du de rangs nas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan zhes pa 'di// su zhes yang ni de la smras// de nas de
46a5(skyes rabs): la dad pa dag/ bskyed par gus pa de dag gis// bsod nams rang bzhin bcom ldan gyi// spyod pa'i lugs ni ma lus smras// de nas de yi gtam gyis de// sngar skyes dge ba rgyas pa thob// bcom ldan slad du gsol ba yi// spring yig de
46a6(skyes rabs): ngag rnams la bskur// dus kyis chu gter yang dag bsgral// rang gi grong khyer thob nas des// bdag nyid che la phyag 'tshal te// de yi gtam bshang spring yig phul// thams cad mkhyen pa bcom ldan gyis// de ni sngon nyid mkhyen gyur kyang //
46b1(skyes rabs): mu tig 'khri shing la brtse bas// rang nyid kyis ni spring yig bklags// kye ma bsod nams tshong zong dag gis rnyed par gyur pa khyod ni dran pa nyid// chud dang gdung ba dang ni sred pa 'joms pa'i srid pa'i sman bzang ci yang yin// bcom ldan las
46b2(skyes rabs): byung gtam gyi rim pas nyer bskrun yang dag rig pa myong ba'i sa// bcom ldan 'di de bdag gi bdud rtsi yang dag bgo skal chen por gyur pa yin// de ltar mdor bsdus spring yig don// bcom ldan rang gis rtogs gyur nas// cung zad 'dzum
46b3(skyes rabs): pa'i 'di zer gyis// phyogs kyi sems can rab gsal mdzad// de nas 'od tshogs rjes rgyas shing // ri mo mkhan gyis mi nus pa'i// rang gi sku gzugs ras la bkod// bcom ldan gyis ni de la springs// de yi bka' yis phyi nas yang // tshong
46b4(skyes rabs): de dag gzings la zhon// sing ga la yi gling phyin nas// de la thang sku rab tu bstan// gser gyi seng ge'i khri bkod pa'i// ras la de bzhin gshegs mthong nas// de las byung ba'i bsam gtan gyis// skye bo dgongs pa gcig
46b5(skyes rabs): na gyur// de yi 'og na bris pa ni// bsod nams kyis thob mthong gyur pa// skyabasu 'gro ba gsum dag dang // bslab pa'i gnas ni lnga yang ngo // lugs las 'byung dang bzlog bcas pa'i// rten cing 'brel par 'byung dang bcwa//
46b6(skyes rabs): de ba'aphags lam yan lag brgyad// mchog gi bdud rtsis rdzogs gyur pa'o// de yi steng du legs bshad ni// gser gyi yi ge rab mdzes par// dgongs pa mnyam gzhag bcom ldan 'das// rang gi bkod pas mdzes gyur pa//
47a1(skyes rabs): skye dang 'chi ba'i nyon mongs kyis btab gdung ba drag po rab rgyas dag/ mi bzang yul ni g.yo ba'i sbrul gyi phreng bas dkris shing dkrugs gyur pa// rab rib rab rgyas rab rmongs phug gi khang pa 'di la phyir thon la//
47a2(skyes rabs): sangs rgyas chos la skyabasu song zhig der ni srid la 'jigs pa med// dag byed rgyal ba'i sku gzugs la// sa yi bdag po'i bu mos pa ltas// thog med dus nas bsags pa yi// mi shes bag chags btang bar gyur// rab mtho gser zhun lta
47a3(skyes rabs): dur mdzes pa'i sku// phrag mdzes dpung pa pus mo'i bar mngon dga'// bsam gtan la chags phyed ni zum pa'i spyan// mdzes sdug rgyun bzhin rab tu mtho ba'i shangs// ngo bo nyid kyis mdzes par rtogs bya ba// rgyan med snyan gyi zhags pa ring du
47a4(skyes rabs): 'byung // thun mtshams sprin chags lha yi ri bo bzhin// lo 'dab gsar ba ltar dmar na bzas mtshan// 'od kyis phyogs la tshul khrims ston pa bzhin// zhal gyi zla bas kun dga' sbyin par brtson// bzod pa'i yon tan sa la slob pa bzhin//
47a5(skyes rabs): bsod nams las skyes skal bzang lan gsum du// bskor nas btud pas rna ba'i ut+pal dag/ 'phyang ba mkhur chos la reg des mthong nas// snying po med pa'i lus la lta ba spangs// bden pa'i mthu ni dam pa skyes par gyur// rgyun tu yang dag
47a6(skyes rabs): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dag/ rab tu gsal byas de tshe byang chub thob// de yis bde gshegs mthur ni rnam bsam shing // ya mtshan dga' ba'i sa yis mngon par smras// kye ma rmongs pa'i mun chen 'phrog byed po'i// de bzhin ga shegs pa 'od
47b1(skyes rabs): dang ldan pa'i sku// ring du gnas kyang rnam par rgyas pa yis// dpal 'di dge ba'i chu skyes dag la ster// skad cig gis ni srid bsgral dam pa dzis// smon lam thob cing nang gi byed rab dang // kye ma sred pa'i yongs gdung zhi ba'i slad// zhi ba'i
47b2(skyes rabs): bdud rtsi'i chu bo rab 'gyur bzhin// 'di brjod de yis bcom ldan la// mu tig rin chen rnams kyi skyes// dge 'dun mchod slad tshong pa yi// skye bo la bskur btang bar gyur// de dag chu gter che sgrol nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin// de
47b3(skyes rabs): yi mu tig rin chen tshogs// phyag 'tshal nas ni de la phul// der ni tshong pas de yi gtam// bshod pa thos nas dge slong ni// kun dga' bo zhes bya bas dris// de nas bcom ldan rgyal bas gsungs// gang 'di shAkya'i khyim du sngon// ro hi ta
47b4(skyes rabs): zhes 'bangs mor gyur// de nyid mu tig 'khri shing du// smon lam dam pa'i las kyis skyes// nor chen zhes pa'i tshong pa ni// ba ra tA sir sngon byung gyur// de yis khyim thabs bsod nams can// rin chen ldan zhes bya bar gyur// dbang po lnga pa
47b5(skyes rabs): nyid gyur tshe// bud med de yis mchod rten rtser// do shal chen po gus ldan pas// mchod pa byas nas phul bar gyur// bsod nams rnam smin des de nyid// sing ga la yi bdag po yi// bu mo mu tig 'khri shing gyur// yongasu mya ngan 'das
47b6(skyes rabs): pa'ang thob// de nyid skye ba gzhan la ni// phyug pas rgyags shing rmongs gyur nas// mchod la smod cing sprin gyur pa// de yis yun rings 'bangs mor gyur// dge dang mi dge'i las gang gang // skye ba'i zhing la skye bos btab// de dang de yi
48a1(skyes rabs): rang bzhin de// yongs su smin pa'i 'bras bu spyod// dge ba mtha' dag rtsa ba grags pa'i me tog dpal rab 'bar// legs spyad 'bras bu'i tshogs bskyed chos kyi 'khri shing mi rnams kyi// sdig dang nyon mongs
48a2(skyes rabs): rtse ba 'khrul zhing ltung dang rmongs pa dang // mtha' yas yongasu gdung gyur dug gi 'khri shing dag kyang yin// rab rtsub mya ngan du gsal 'khor ba'i lam ni shin tu gdung ba 'dir// drag por rje su gdung ldan sdig pa sdig pa po cig skye bo dag / bsod
48a3(skyes rabs): nams bsod nams mdzod cig bsod nams bsten pa rnams dag gi/ bsod nams bdud rtsis bran pa'i bsod nams grib bsil shing gi sa gzhi bsil// de ltar smon lam dam pa'i 'bras// bshad pa yis ni gdams ngag 'di// dge
48a4(skyes rabs): slong rnams ni gus pa'i slad// bcom ldan rang gi mdzad pa yin// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las mu tig 'khri shing gi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun
48a5(skyes rabs): 'o// / bsam pa rigs pa rnams kyi thugs dag ni// gnod pa byed pa la'ang snying rje rgyas// drag por gyur pa la yang 'dab ltar mnyen// zhe sdang tsha gdung la yang shin tu bsil// grong khyer rgyal po'i kham
48a6(skyes rabs): ces pa// lha yi grong ltar rgya cher sngon// khyim bdag dpal sbas zhes bya ba// nor byin lta bur byung bar gyur// skye bo legs la sdang zhing dregs// yon tan rnams la gus pa btang // rtag tu nor gyis rgyags myos te// dam pa rnams kyi blo la
48b1(skyes rabs): rgod// sra zhing shin tu 'khyogs pa dang // stong zhing mu cor sgrog pa yi// dung nyid la bzhin mi bsrun la// dpal 'byor yon du sten par byed// de la nam zhig zad byed pa// bla ma mi srun mnyen gyi bus// dben par dman pa'i gtam la
48b2(skyes rabs): chags// bsod nams dag la sdad las smras// gang 'di bya rgod spangs zhes pa'i// ri la dge slong lnga brgyas bskor// bde gshegs kun mkhyen zhes grags shing // 'gro gsum mchod pa nyid gyur pa// 'di yi rdzu 'phrul mchog/
48b3(skyes rabs): dag ni// ci yang bdag gis ma dmigs te// 'on kyang blun pos bcom ldan 'das// bcom ldan 'das zhes mtho ba thob// rtag tu rnam par ma dpyad nyid// pha rol brjod pa'i rjesu brjod// skye bo phal cher grag pa yi// lam du song ba'i
48b4(skyes rabs): rjes su 'gro// de yi brtul zhugs la sogs kyis// nges pa tshul 'chos nyid du rtogs// chu skyar mi smra rkang gcig gi/ brtul zhugs bzung nas nya rnams za// des na nye bar bgam po'i slad// de la bslu ba 'ga' zhig bgyi//
48b5(skyes rabs): g.yo sgyu can rnams sgyu ma yis// rmongs nas gzhan yang yongs sim 'gyur// de yis de skad brjod thos nas// las kyi rmongs pa'i dpal sbas ni// sdig pa'i g.yang la mchod ba'i slad// de yis bstan pa'i rigs pa yis// khyim
48b6(skyes rabs): du gas dang dod seng lde nga gi/ sol ba rab 'bar gyis khengs dang // dug ldan zas kyang byas nas ni// bcom ldan 'das kyis drung du song // rdzun gyis bskrun pa'i gus pa yis// de yis zas la mgron du song // thams cad rnam rig
49a1(skyes rabs): kun mkhyen gyis// de bzhin no zhes 'dzum bcas gsungs// dug dang me sbyor la 'khros pa'i// khyim thab chos ni smra ba mo// gos ni zagasu dogs pa yis// dpal sbas kyis ni khyim du bcings// de nas spyod tshul
49a2(skyes rabs): mkhyen gyur kyang // 'gro bas phyag 'os gdong bzhi sogs// lha rnams kyis ni phyag 'tshal zhing // bcom ldan rang nyid gshegs par gyur// dpal sbas kyis ni brtsams pa ste// grong khyer dag tu skye bos rig/ sdig can rnams kyi sdig po ni// shin
49a3(skyes rabs): sa kyang phyogs rnams rgyag/ de nas dge bsnyen dag gcig ni// bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs te// me dang dug la sems byed cing // zhabs la rab tu gtugs nas smras// rdzun gyis phyag 'tshal snyan par smra// gsang nas me dang dug za ster//
49a4(skyes rabs): bcom ldan rab tu 'bad pa yis// skye bo ngan 'di yongs btang 'os// dogs pas snyan smra la brten nas// 'phags pa min rnams dbugs 'byin byed// gang phyir sbrang rtsis kha byugs pa'i// spu gri ming na rgyu ma gcod// yon tan la sdang mi srun pas//
49a5(skyes rabs): yon tan can gzhan bstod mi bzod// gang gis dam pa dgyes 'gyur nyid// de yis skye bo ngan pa khro// 'jig rten gsum gyi mi bdag gis// 'dab brgya rnam par rgyas byed khyod// sgra gcan 'di yi gnas thob nas// 'gro ba long ba min pa ci// de
49a6(skyes rabs): nas bcom ldan cung zad ni// 'dzum pa'i zer dkar dag gis de'i// gnod pa mi bzang rab rib dag/ ring nas yongs su sel bzhin gsungs// bdag gi lus la mes reg dang // dug gis kyang ni tshugs pa min// gzhan la sdang bas dbul rnams
49b1(skyes rabs): skyon gyis kyang ni nyer 'tshe med// gang gis sems ni mi khro bsil// zhi ba'i bdud rtsis bran gyur pa// de la me yis ci bya ste// yul gyi dgra la dug gis kyang // zhe sdang skyon gyis gzir ba la// bdud rtsi dug nyid bzhin du spyod// tsan
49b2(skyes rabs): me tog rdo rje bzhin du spyod// tsAn sreg byed bzhin du spyod// byang chub sems dpa'i go 'phang gnas// snying rje byams pa dag dang ldan// dud 'gro'i skye gnas song gyur kyang // lus ni me yis mi tshig go/ ka ling ka yi mi bdag sngon// ri
49b3(skyes rabs): dwags tshogs rnams 'joms pa la// yang dag brtson pas dum bu'i gling // zhes pa'i nags tshal sregs par gyur// nags tshal rab tu 'bar ba der// bye'u ti ti ri gcig bu// byams pas byang chub la dmigs pas// sreg byed rab
49b4(skyes rabs): tu zhi bar bsgrubs// de slad 'khu med yid ldan rnams// gang du yang ni 'jigs pa med// snying stobs phun sum tshogs pa yis// dge mtshan 'di dang gzhan yang nyon// char med mi bzang dus su ni// thub pa 'ga' yi bsti gnas na//
49b5(skyes rabs): mi dang 'dra bar brjod pa yi// ri bong zhig ni yun ring gnas// 'bras bu rtsa ba yongs zad pas// ltogs ring thub pa mthong gyur nas// bsam pa de yi gdung bas gzir// g.yo med kun tu brtags pas smras// bcom ldan bdag gi sha
49b6(skyes rabs): dag gis// da ni srog gi rten po dag/ mdzod cig chos ni bsgrub bgyid pa// khyod kyi lus ni bsrung bar 'os// 'di brjod nags sreg mjug gi mer// thub pa byams pas yang yang du// 'bad pa yis ni bzlog gyur kyang // ri bong gi ni lus
50a1(skyes rabs): po 'phangs// de yi snying stobs mthu yis ni// 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis dkrigs pa'i me// 'jam pa'i sgra sgrogs bung ba can// pad+mo'i rdzing bur rab tu gyur// de yang lha yi lus kyis der// pad+ma chen po dag
50a2(skyes rabs): la gnas// thub pa phyag 'tshal ldan pa la// chos rnams rab tu bstan pa byas// de ltar byang chub zhugs pa rnams// 'jigs pa med mon dug gis min// de skad gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das// dpal sbas kyi ni khang par gshegs/
50a3(skyes rabs): des ni de ru zhugs nyid na// zhabs ni g.yas pa bzhag pa yi// me yi dong ni mtshe skyes can// bung ba 'jam sgrogs ldan par gyur// mtsho skyes khri la bzhugs pa de// dpal sbas kyis ni mthong gyur nas// de mthong sdig pa nyams pa yis/
50a4(skyes rabs): zhabs la btud de rab tu smras// bcom ldan bdag ni sdig can gyis// rim las 'das 'di bzod par bgyi// gti mug gis long ltung chags la// dam pa rnams ni thugs rje lhag/ bdag ni mi dge'i bshes gnyen dag/ rab tu rmongs pa sdig
50a5(skyes rabs): ba yis// lam la nye bar gdams pa byas// de la khyod nyid dran pa skyabs// khyod kyi zas dang btung ba kun// bdag gi dug gis bsgos pa byas// phyi nas gdung ba'i rang bzhin dug/ kye ma bdag nyid rang la 'pho// 'di brjod dpal sbas mchi ma
50a6(skyes rabs): dang // bcas pa'i mig la snying rje'i gter// bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas gsungs// dge slong dge 'dun nyan par byed// legs pa yi mug ma byed cig/ bdag cag khyod la phyir ma phyogs// 'jigs rung khon gyis dug spangs pas//
50b1(skyes rabs): nged la dug gis gnod pa med// khyod ni ba ra NA sir sngon// dpal ldan mi bdag tshangs byin gyur// de yi srog dang mnyam pa yi// dga' ma dpe med ma zhes pa'o// de nas de yi grong khyer mtha'i// nags gnas rma bya'i rgyal mo ni// gser du snang ba
50b2(skyes rabs): zhes pa'i sgra// de yis nam zhig thos par gyur// gling bu pi wang gdangs lta bu// de yi sgra ni thos gyur nas// dge mtshan ldan pas 'di ci zhes// mi yi mgon la de yis dris// rgyal pos smras pa nags mtha' 'dir// rin chen sgro ldan rma bya/
50b3(skyes rabs): yod// gang gi mgrin nas bsgrags pa 'dis// 'jig rten rnams ni snyan pas khyab// de skad smras pa'i mi bdag gis// shin tu mdza' sdug rab 'bad pas// de mthong don du gnyer ba la// rab tu rgod cing yang smras pa// de lta'i ngo mtshar gzugs
50b4(skyes rabs): can rnams// mdzes ma mthong ba rnyed pa dka'// de lta na yang 'bad pa na// de la yongs su ngal ba bya// de skad brjod nas mi bdag gis// rgya yis 'tsho ba de gzung phyir// ma thob na ni gsod pa dag/ yang dag rig par byas nas btang // yongs su
50b5(skyes rabs): dpyod pa'i mig rmongs pas// dbang du byas pa mi shes nyid// bud med rjes chags kyis bcom pas// bya ba min pa rnams kyang byed// mdza' las ma rungs khyim thab kyi// rkang pa'i stegasu gyur rnams kyi// blo dang dga' dran grags pa rnams// phrag
50b6(skyes rabs): dog gis bzhin rnam par nyams// de 'og bya bas gnas gnas su// zhags pa'i bcing ba bkod pa rnams// rma bya'i rgyal po'i mthu yis ni// kun tu rnam par chad par gyur// bad 'bras med las sdug bsngal zhing // mi bdag bka' yis 'jigs gyur
51a1(skyes rabs): te// mthong nas rma bya'i rgyal mo ni// snying rje 'khrugs pa nyid du gyur// de yi bsam pa kho mo dag/ 'chings par ma gyur sa bdag gi/ bka' ni drag pos 'jigs gyur pa// kye ma sdug brgya yi 'tsho// de ltar
51a2(skyes rabs): bsams nas snying rje yis// gsal bar smras te de btang nas// mi bdag bkug ste de khyim du// de nyid dang ni lhan cig song // pho brang nang der rtag tu de// sa bdag btsun mo bcas pa yis// mchod cing yongasu dris pa las// gus pas rnam
51a3(skyes rabs): par spro zhing gnas// mthon mthing nor bu'i khang pa ni// 'jam ldan chu 'dzin 'od la des// 'dab ma mdzes bkra dbang po'i gzhu// chags pa lta bur 'khrul pa byas// de nas de yi rim gro la// gus dang bcas pas lha mo bskos// phyong
51a4(skyes rabs): las rgyal ba'i bgrod pa la// nam zhig sa yi bdag po song // de nas lha mo dpe med ma// bdag po song bas bag med cing // gzugs dang lang tsho'i dregs pas long // rigs kyi lugs ni mthong ma gyur// gzhon nu 'bangs la chags ldan
51a5(skyes rabs): ma// 'dod pas rnam par bslad ma de'i// ngo tsha shin tu ring song ste// yang yang dmigs pas 'jig pa bzhin// dri ma ldan zhing gya gyu rno// rna ba dag la reg par bzod// g.yo ba g.yo ba'i mig can dang // mig ni legs pa rim pa mtshungs//
51a6(skyes rabs): 'khor ba chu srin 'byung gnas su// rnam pa mang pos myos byed cing // srog 'phrog nag po brtsegs pa yi// ri mo bud med rnam par rgyu// me tog pas kyang shin tu 'jam// sog le bas kyang rab tu rtsub// bud med sems ni bkrab dag/ su
51b1(skyes rabs): yi yongs su gcod pa shes// ma chags dga' mas mgul byas nas// gang zhig dga' bar bgrod byed de// bsil zhing dri med 'jam pa yi// ral gri'i rno rgyun 'thung bar byed// des bsams bdag gi pho brang na// rma bya'i rgyal mo tshul
51b2(skyes rabs): khrims shes// skyes bu'i lugs bzhin kun brjod pa// zug rngu 'di ni gnas par gyur// bdag gi spyod 'di sa bdag la// gdon mi za bar 'chad par 'gyur// las ni smad 'os re zhig byas// da ni bdag gis ci zhig bya// 'di ni gnang
51b3(skyes rabs): shes mchog gi blo// pha rol zur gyi 'dzin lta zhog/ bdag gis byas pa'i sdig pa yi// dogs pa semos med rnams la'ang skye// de ltar bsams nas de yis ni// de la dug ldan bza' ba byin// chags smos mi srun dbang gyur pa'i// bud
51b4(skyes rabs): med ci dang ci mi byed// de yis nye bar sbyar ba yis// bza' dang btung ba dug ldan gyis// rma bya'i rgyal mo rnam rgyas shing // rma byi'i rgyal mo rnam rgyas shing // mdangs bzang yid 'ong mdzes par gyur// lha mos rnal gnas de mthong nas// gsung
51b5(skyes rabs): ba rab mched dogs pa yis// dal bu dol bus mya ngan gyi// nad kyis bzung nas srog gtang gyur// de ltar de yi dug gis kyang // nad dang ldan pa nyid ma gyur// chen po rnams kyis sems yangs pa// dug ni dug med nyid du bgyid// 'dod
51b6(skyes rabs): chags dug yin gti mug dug/ zhe sdang dag kyang mi bzad dug/ sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin du// dge 'dun bden pa bdud rtsi'i mchog/ gti mug chu tshogs chen po 'jig su rung ba'i dug rnams spro// chags pa'i ltos 'gro chen po
52a1(skyes rabs): 'jig su rung ba'i dug rnams spro// sdang ba'i nags kyi phreng ba 'jigs su rung ba'i dug rnams spro// mi bzad dug rnams skye ba'i rimA pa gzhan ni yod pa min// 'di bzhin skye ba
52a2(skyes rabs): gzhan la yang // dpal sbas kyis ni me yi dong // chos ni 'dod ma de la byas// de yang 'phral la pad ldan gyur// de skad brjod nas bcom ldan 'das// yang dag snying rjes gzigs pa'i chus// bstan pa dag la
52a3(skyes rabs): mngon phyogs pa'i// dpal sbas rdul dang bral ba byas// de nas dpal sbas dge ba shes pas rab tu gsal ba'i gnas thob phyir// dri med dran pas skyabs su 'gro ba gsum nyid dran gyi gzhan ma yin// rgyal dang yongs
52a4(skyes rabs): su 'dris pas bsod nams thob ste gang phyir dam pa rnams// mthong bas gyur pa dge ba che dang rab tu dga' dang bde ba'i slad// mi shes rmongs pa sel ba'i bcom ldan 'das ni snying rjes bsod nams la brtson pas//
52a5(skyes rabs): gnod byed sdig pa bsten pa'i dpal sbas kyang ni 'bad pas rjes su gzung byas nas// 'ching ba'i khang par yang srid mdud pa 'di dag rnamasu gang gis mi 'gyur ba// srid pa yang dag gzhi la slad dge slong rnams la kho na
52a6(skyes rabs): dang bral ba'i bstan pa bsgrubs// zhes pa'i dge ba'i dbang pos byis pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las dpal sbas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dib ste brgyad pa'o//
52b1(skyes rabs): skal ldan rnams la mi shes pa ni legs pa'i rang bzhin las byung dge nyid gyur// rmongs pa rnams la dge ba mi phan nyid 'gyur 'di ni rim pa 'di yis mtshon// mtshan phyed smag ru ma mun pa sman gyi nags la
52b2(skyes rabs): mchog tu mdzes pa rab tu ster// gang yang nyi ma'i gzi byin 'ug pa'i rigs kyi mig ni kun tu nyams par byed// sa bdag gzugs can snying po yi// grong khyer rgyal po'i khab ces par// rab bzang zhes pa'i grong
52b3(skyes rabs): khyer ba// yongs rdzogs khyim na gnas pa byung // lto ba kun+da la rnam spang zhing // gti mug rab tu rgyas pa des// rmongs las zad byed pa nyid la// mngon par gus pa lhag par gyur// de yi chu ma tsho rigs
52b4(skyes rabs): can// bde ldan ma zhes bya ba yis// mngal bzung zla ba nya ba yi// dkyil 'khor shar gyi phyogs kyis bzhin// ka lan ka da ka'i gnas shes pa// 'od ma'i tshal du yang dag gnas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
52b5(skyes rabs): bsod snyoms la// nam zhig de yi khang par gshegs// de ni chung mar bcas pa yi// de la mchod byas gus bcas pas// bu ni mngal na gnas gang de// ci yi gzugs 'gyur de la dris// de yis bka'
52b6(skyes rabs): stsal khyod kyi bu// lha mi'i phun sum tshogs spyad nas// nga yi bstan la rab byung nas// yang dag ldan pas grol bar 'gyur// de skad gsal bar bka' stsal nas// bcom ldan rang gi gnas su ga shaM Da/ khyim
53a1(skyes rabs): bdag khang par zad byed pa// b+hu ri ka ni mngon par 'ongs// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de// rab bzang gis ni smras par gyur// zang byed pas thos myur bar ni// khong khrom
53a2(skyes rabs): drug gis 'khrugs par gyur// shin tu yun ring ngos thos nas// ngal bas bza' ni shes byas te// dris yin bcom ldan gyis gsungs gang // de lta'i rnam pa kho nar mthong // des pas mos me ma phye tshomad
53a3(skyes rabs): med par de yis bden par brjod// 'on kyang de yis smras pa'i dngos// gzhi la skad bdag ni mi bden brjod// bdag gi tshig gi sa rab bzang gis// gal te kun mkhyen de rig na// de las dge sbyong la gum+b+ha rnaMH//
53a4(skyes rabs): zad byed la dang gtong bar 'gyur// de ltar bsams nas khro ldan pa// de yis rab bzang dag la smras// kun mkhyen nga rgyal can de waM// 'di dag mi bden pa nyid brjod// lce yi phun tshogs thos// mi
53a5(skyes rabs): ji lton 'thob par 'gyur// 'on te rab byung bden nyid na// de yis 'di ni bsam par b+ha// dngul dang sgrogs pas gdu pa 'a/ gang mi'i tshethangs gizhan med ce// glang la 'tshob bas gzhan med pa/
53a6(skyes rabs): rgyal 'os pa de de yis// skyabs ni dge sbyong brtul zhugs yin// khyim bdag bdag gis mthong ba ni// gal te bdag gi tshig chad na// bzlog pa byis pa 'di skyes pas// rigs ni song su gdung bar 'gyur/
53b1(skyes rabs): brjod zad byed pa song tshe// khyim bdag gi ni yun ring du// rnam par dpyad nas mngal ltung slad// sbyor ba de dang de dag bsgrubs// gang tshe rdzas kyi sbyor ba yis// mngal ni yongs su ma g.yos nyid// de tshe
53b2(skyes rabs): 'di yis dben par ni// chung ma drag pos mnyed de bsad// de nas sdig can de yis de// bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du// rab tu bskyal tshe zas byed po// de yis gtam thos dga' nas smras// a ho kye ma kun
53b3(skyes rabs): mkhyen 'dis// byis pa la brjod de bden ldan// bu ni ma skyes ma dag ni// lnga pa nyid 'gyur 'di de yin// de yis brjod pa'i byis pa yi// lha mo'i dpal mchog de ni 'di// 'di yi rab byung de yang 'di// gang
53b4(skyes rabs): zhig dkur ni shi gyur pa'o// de skad de dag rab smra zhing // nye bar dgod pas thams cad nas// dur khrod lta ba kho na'i phyir// skye bo yang dag 'dus par gyur// skabs der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das//
53b5(skyes rabs): 'byung po dgongs pas lha yi ni// spyan gyis de dag kun mkhyen nas// 'dzum pa dang ldan skad cig bsams// kye ma gti mug gis bcings pas// rmongs pa ring du gnas pas kyang // lus can rnams la snang
53b6(skyes rabs): bsgrib// sprin gyi rnam par 'gyur ba bzhin// kye ma dge ba zad byed pa'i// zad byed pa des sdig pa'i las// khyim bdag dman pa'i blo can de// bya ba min par 'ang byed du bcug/ 'di bsams snying rje rab rgyas pa'o//
54a1(skyes rabs): bcom ldan rang nyid dge slong gi/ tshogs kyis bskor nas myur bar ni// bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod gshegs// bcom ldan rang nyid dur khrod na// rgyu ba shes nas rgyal po ni// gzugs
54a2(skyes rabs): can snying po blon dang bcas// sa de nyid du 'ongs par gyur// de 'og rab bzang chung ma ni// sreg pa'i me la bcug pa dang // chu skyes la gnas byis pa dag/ dku brtol nyi ma bzhin du 'thon// me 'bar dbus na gnas
54a3(skyes rabs): pa de// gang tshe sus kyang ma blangs pa// de tshe skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis// hA hA zhes pa chen por gyur// de nas bde bar gshegs pa'i bkas// 'tsho byed ces pa'i gzhon nus gsos// rmongs pa lta bur rang 'gro yis//
54a4(skyes rabs): gzhon nu 'od ldan de blangs gyur// rgyal bas gzigs pa nyid kyis ni// byis pa rab tu len pa'i tshe// ro sreg me dag de la ni// ha ri tsAn ltar bsil gyur// byis pa 'tsho zhing me las grol// rab tu mdzes pa mthong gyur
54a5(skyes rabs): nas// skyengs pas zad byed pa rnams ni// skad cig shi ba bzhin du gnas// de nas rab bzang ya mtshan gyis// rnam par 'khrul pa bcom ldan 'das// 'byung po kun la phan dgyes pas// bu 'di blang bar gyis zhes
54a6(skyes rabs): gsungs// de yang the tshom dag las blo// ci bya snyam pa'i khyogs las 'phyang // zad byed rnams kyi bzhin nyid la// bslab pa'i slad du skad cig bltas// de la des smras dur khrod kyi// me skyes byis pa 'di mi blang // gsal bar
54b1(skyes rabs): gung du 'di gnas pa// de khyim brlag pa nyid du 'gyur// de skad de dag tshig gis de// rmongs pas gang tshe de ma blangs// de tshe rgyal ba'i bka' yis ni// sa yi bdag pos byis pa blangs// me dang mtshungs pa'i 'od ldan pa//
54b2(skyes rabs): de yi ming ni me skyes zhes// bcom ldan nyid kyis mdzad par gyur// sa skyong khang par byis pa ni// rab tu bskyed par gyur pa de'i// zhang po yul gzhan song ba dag/ dus kyi yang dag 'ongs par gyur// de yi sring mo shi ba
54b3(skyes rabs): dang // bu skyes spyod tshul rig gyur nas// khro bas 'dar zhing mngon phyogs te// rab bzang la ni yang dag smros// rmongs pa zad byed la gus shing // de yi tshig gis chung ma bsad// khyod kyi rang gi bu dor nas// legs
54b4(skyes rabs): byas ming ni ci zhigo byas// rang bzhin gyis ni sems med cing // gzhan gyi sngags kyis kun tu bslad// skye ba ngan pa rgod na yang // rnam par 'jom byed ro langs bzhin// gal te rgyal po'i khab nas bu// da lta nyid du mi len na//
54b5(skyes rabs): bud med bsad pa bsgrags nas de// khyod nor chad pas gcod du 'jug/ de yi de skad brjod pas des// 'jigs nas sa bdag khab nas bu// len du bcug pas su bdag ni// 'dod dang ldan par ring na gtad// de nas rab
54b6(skyes rabs): bzang dus kyis ni// dus kyi dbang du song bar gyur// me skyes rnam par 'byor pa'i gter// 'od kyi nyi ma bzhin du gyur// slong ba rnams ni dpag bsam shing // lha mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thob// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun
55a1(skyes rabs): gyi// skyabs la de yis blo gros byas// de la gus pas nyer bskrun pa// rmad byung lha yi rin chen tshogs// bsod nams rin chen sgrub brtson des// dge slong dge 'dun rnams la
55a2(skyes rabs): phul// chu gter cher ni chu bo bzhin// de lha'i khyim du lha'i ris las// rnam mang phun tshogs ngo mtshar can// rang nyid kho na 'ongs par gyur// de yi khyim du bcom ldan 'das// rtsa dang rin chen mtshungs
55a3(skyes rabs): blos kyang // de yi dor ni rin po che'i// smod ni yongs su gzung ba mdzad// des na lha yi gos zung dag/ rang gi khrims bzhin dri ma med// grags pa rnams kyi dper bzod pa// bsod nams zong gis nyos nas
55a4(skyes rabs): thob// de nas nam zhig de yi gos// bkrus nas brlan pa nyid 'od bkod// yang dag g.yo bas rab bskyod nas// sa yi bdag po'i spyi bor lhung // me skyes de yis gos dag ni// sngon med rab mdzes mthong gyur nas//
55a5(skyes rabs): lha yi dpal la ya mtshan pa'i// rgyal po rang dpal rtsa bzhin sems// zas la mgron gnyer mi yi bdag/ me skyes khyim na gnas pas de'i// rin chen rang bzhin khang pa dag/ mthong nas mtho ris yin par
55a6(skyes rabs): sems// de nas dus kyis sa skyong ni// chos kyi ngang tshul ma skyes dang // bu ni rgyal srid la chags pa'i// g.yo yis nges par bkrongs par gyur// rgyal po yon tan dam pa can// rdzogs ldan lta bu de 'dra
55b1(skyes rabs): tshe// rgyal po mchog gi bu de yis// chos min+da bzhin du rgyal srid thob// me skyes dag gi khyim gyi dpal// sa bdag la dkon des mthong nas// yang dag mngon par song ste smras// khyod ni pha mas rnam par gsos//
55b2(skyes rabs): khyod dang nga spyan chos dag gis// 'byor pa phyed ni bdag la stsol// gal te mi nA na nor skal lnga// 'khu las rtsod pa nyid rab skye// gya gyus sdang bar byed pa de// de skad brjod pas mi skyes ni/ khang pa rin chen gyis gang
55b3(skyes rabs): bau// de la byin nas khyim gzhan song // lho yi rin chen yid 'phrog rgyas// 'jig rten phan byed dpal 'byor de// me skyes kho na'i rjes su 'breng // nyin mor byed la 'od zer bzhin// yang yang me skyes kyis spangs
55b4(skyes rabs): kyang // phun+da tshegs de ni lan bdun du// me skyes can song mi bdag gis// ma reg chung mo khyo cen bzhin// chom rkun la sogs rigs pa yis// rnam pa kun tu 'phrog brtson zhing // khros par shes nas me
55b5(skyes rabs): skyes ni// yid byung gyur pas yang dag bsamaso// skye dgu'i bsod nams ma yin pa// yongs su smin pas pha lta bu// rgyal po mnyes gshin yangs pa ni// dran pa'i lhag ma nyid du gyur// 'di na zol med drang po
55b6(skyes rabs): lo// skye dgu dbugs phyung pha ma bzhin// mtshan mo bde bar nyal byed pa// de dang mtshungs pa gzhan pa su// nor ldan rtswa bzhin bsgrub par bya// blo gros rin chen du bzhin du thob// skye bo dam pa drang po ni// bdud rtsi bas
56a1(skyes rabs): rnyed pa dka'// zol min mkhas pa bsnyen bya dang // rmongs min drang po'i bdag nyid dang // ma brtsigs mthon pa nyid dag kyang // de ltar skyes pa shin tu nyung // dun
56a2(skyes rabs): mi bdag zhe sdang gis// tshul ngan gnod byed la rab zhugs// 'jig rten rnams kyi sdig smin nas// dus min dag tu rtsod ldan 'ongs// 'gro ba sa bdag 'od ldan pa// bshes gnyen de ni nub pa'i tshe// de
56a3(skyes rabs): sras skyon skyes mtshan mo 'di// mun po'i slad du rab tu rgyas// mi srun dam pa 'das rnams kyi// rgyu med snying sdug yin nam snyam// gang zhig spyod tshul gzhan cha las// grags pa de dag rab gsal byed//
56a4(skyes rabs): de slad mi bdag ngan pa yis// byin brlabs sa 'odi yongs btang 'os// rtsod ldan dus kyi sa dbang la// skye bo rnams ni ga la 'tsho// mchog tu yongs 'dris yid 'ong chung ma dam pa rnams kyi rab sbyangs yon tan
