56a5(skyes rabs): dang // 'chol pa min pa'i rigs dang legs ldan sa bdag ri bong can mtshungs grags pa dang // lugs la yang dag 'os pa'i spyod tshul dag dang phongs med nor rnams te// mi bdag yon tan ldan na skyes
56a6(skyes rabs): bu rnams kyi thams cad rnam slad min par 'gyur// chos kyi rtsa ba nor gyi ljon pas yang dag bskyed gyur pa// skyon med 'dod pa rnams kyis me tog rgyas shing rab 'bar ba// bsod nams 'bras bu bde ba nges
56b1(skyes rabs): par 'jig rten longs spyod de// rnam par ltung byed rgyal dran rlung gis gal te ma bcom na'o// rtsod ldan dus dang bdag po byis// de yi rab gdung sreg pa'i me// dus min rnam slad rab tu drag/ mi srun ro
56b2(skyes rabs): langs tshogs kyis gang // dga' ba yid byung blo gros bskyod// bde ba'i dpal gyi lang cho song // de ni 'byor pa longs spyod rnams// spyod dang ldan le bdag mi sred// nor dang khyim dang chung ma dang // bu
56b3(skyes rabs): dang g.yog po yo byad rnams// mtha' med nad dang gdung ba ste// kye ma skyes bu'i yongs 'dzin to// so ga'i tshwa ba mi bzad dpal// ji lta ji ltar rnam 'phel ba// de lta de ltar lus can rnams// skyed
56b4(skyes rabs): pa'i yongs su gdung ba 'phel// skye ba kun tu nyer bsgrubs pas// nor gyi tshogs pa rab rgyas kyang // lan tshwa'i mtsho yi chu yis bzhin// mi rnams sred bral nyid ma yin// gang zhig nor ldan cho ga
56b5(skyes rabs): mi shes// med do med do zhes zlos pa// gal te de yis rab zhi na// yang srid dag tu su zhig 'gyur// rgyud dang 'thab mo rmongs dang chags pa chen po rjes su 'brang ba'i ltas ngan nor gyi ci// chung
56b6(skyes rabs): pa brgyar ltung yang dag chags pas nad bskyed 'bral bar 'gyur ba'i longs spyod dag gis ci// yang nyams g.yog la mi bdag gang zhig khang pa thob pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal dag gis ci// 'dir ni chags
57a1(skyes rabs): bral kho na 'jig dus 'jigs par nad med longs spyod dag tu 'os pa yin// rang gris skye bo snying sdug dri med snang ba'i dus ni 'dos gyur cing // lhag par mi srun sdig pas
57a2(skyes rabs): rgyas pa'i rmongs pa yang dag 'ongs pa na// ngal dub yongs btang skye bo med pa'i nags kyi gnas la yongs 'dris pa// yang ni rib zhi'i chus dkrus skyes bu rnams kyi bde ba'i dbugs 'byin yin// de
57a3(skyes rabs): ltar yun ring des bsams nas// mchog tu 'dod chags bral bar gyur// sdug bsngal rmongs pa'i gti mug dang // blo ldan rnams kyi rnam 'byed slad// slong rnams la des kun byin nas// bde ga
57a4(skyes rabs): gnas su rab tu song // gang phyir bden pa'i bder mngon phyogs// dpal gyi lcags sgrog gis mi khugs// gang tshe dang ba'i rgyal po ni// rdzing bu gtsang ma dran pa na// de tshe nor gyi blo gros ma// ro ldan
57a5(skyes rabs): la yang de mi sred// longs spyod dag la rjes chags me ni bzod dka' rmongs pa'i du ba 'khyims gyur pa// chog shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis yid la bsil ba nyid ni dal bus thob gyur nas// btung ba myos
57a6(skyes rabs): shing rab rgyug rnam par g.yo rgyun na chung g.yo ba'i smin 'khyogs can// skad cig 'grogs pa'i dpal mo 'di dag zhi ldan rnams kyi bgegs ni byed ma yin// srid pa'i lam gyi sdug bsngal rnams nyams
57b1(skyes rabs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i dka'// dri med nyid kyi gnas su rab tu byung bas rab tu zhugs// zhi ba nyid ni thams cad thob nas mnyam med rab bsil zhing // mtshon bral tha ra par 'gro ba'i slad du thub
57b2(skyes rabs): par de 'gyur to// me skyes byang chub grub pa de// mthong nas ye mtshan ldan pa yi// dge slong gis dri bcom ldan gyis// sngon gyi spyod pa'i mtha' rnams gsungs// skye ba'i zhing brgya la btab pa'o//
57b3(skyes rabs): bon lta bu'i las rnams kyi// 'bras bu phun tshogs skye bo rnams// 'chol po med par spyod par 'gyur// rgyal po gnyen dang ldan pa yi// grong khyer gnyen ldan dag tu ston// khyim bdag bsam pa chen po
57b4(skyes rabs): ni// dpal ldan ma bsdams zhes bya byung // de nas ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas rnam gzigs zhes pa grong khyer der// de dag rnams kyi legs byas kyis// nam zhig ljongs ni rgyu zhing gshegs// de ni dge slong
57b5(skyes rabs): stong phrag dag/ drug cu nyid kyi yongs bskor bar// ma bsdams pa yis dad nas phyin// phyag 'tshal nas ni mgron du gnyer// de yi yo byad thams cad kyis// zla gsum rim gro bgyid pa nyid// ji lta de
57b6(skyes rabs): ltar rgyal pos kyang // phyag 'tshal nas ni mgron du gnyer// grong pa la 'os ma bsdoms pas// sa sbyong la 'os sa bdag gis// de dag 'gron pas rjes bsgrubs pa'i// longs spyod kyis de lhag gnas byas/
58a1(skyes rabs): glang po rgyal mtshan nor bu gdugs// rnga yab rgya che'i dpal 'byor gyis// rgyal pos mchod pa de mthong nas// ma bsdams bsam pa 'khrugs par gyur// snying stobs dkar bar
58a2(skyes rabs): gyur pa de'i// rgyal ba mchod pa stong grogs ni// phyogs dag mchod sbyin brgya pa yis// lha yi dpal 'byor rnams kyis byas// de yis lha yi 'byor pa des// bcom ldan 'das ni mchong gyur pas// gang mdun
58a3(skyes rabs): 'khor los sgyur ba'i dpal// ngo tsha yi ni snod nyid gyur// nyi zla'i 'od zer nyams byed rin chen rnams dang sa srungs 'od ldan glang po dang // dri med gos dang spos phreng khrus dang dpag bsam shing gi 'bras bu rnam
58a4(skyes rabs): ngag gi/ zo de sogs gus btung rol pas g.yo zhing dul bus rnga yab dag ni rab bskyod par// de yis bde gshegs mngon mchod mthong nas mI yi bdag po ngo mchis dmun par gyur// de lhur ston pa la gus
58a5(skyes rabs): dge ba yongs smin 'bras bu rab mang dag/ gang zhig bsod nams rgya che ma bsdams pas mngon yang dag thob gyur cing // dri med yid ldan de yi skad cig smon lam nyid las de nyid ni// mchog gi nyi ma bzhin du dpal
58a6(skyes rabs): 'byor gyi gnas me skyes 'dir gyur to// 'gro gsum dri med ye shes kyis// rab tu gsal mdzad bcom ldan 'das// rgyal bas dge slong rnams la ni// smon lam gdams ngag de skad gsungs// zhes pa dge
58b1(skyes rabs): pa'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las me skyes kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu pa'o// / 'jag rten mtha' dag
58b2(skyes rabs): nye bar bzung slad rab zhugs ston pa dag ni sngon// grong khyer tsam pa dang nye dri med pad+ma'i rdzing ngogs 'gram na bzhugs// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba reg na bde ba'i 'od ldan dge slong gis// dris nas mngal tsam la
58b3(skyes rabs): sogs skye bo'i tshogs kyi skye bo'i spyod tshul gsungs// 'jig rten du ni dkar nag 'dron ma'i 'od can las skud kyis bkra ba'i// lus can rnams kyi skye bo'i gos ni rab mang gnas skabs mthong gyur te// shin tu
58b4(skyes rabs): 'bad pas gang zhig yun ring yongs sgyur hrul por gyur mod kyang // gdung ba'i dri ma snam chags tshon ni med pa nyid du 'gyur ma yin// skyes pa bud mod dag kyang 'dzin pa rnams nyams reg par zhugs byas shing /
58b5(skyes rabs): sbyor ba bsten pa'i khu ba zla mtshan yang dag 'grogs la ltung gyur pa// gcig tu gyur cing nges pa 'gal la sa bon dag gi dngos por 'gyur// su zhig khong der 'bral la 'jug ste dper na bsrubs pa'i me
58b6(skyes rabs): bzhin no// shel dum dag la tshon gyi rab dbye sprin la chu yi gter gyi chu// til la me tog dri bzang gser la me yis gdung bzhin dal bu yis// dri rnams kyi bzhin rnam pa mang po'i las kyis bsgos par
59a1(skyes rabs): gyur pa'i rlung // spyod tshul byed po yis kyang de dag mi mtshan 'di de nang du 'jug/ der ni phra ba'i rim pas yongs su 'gyur zhing rang bzhin gyi btsor 'di// ji srid dus su rnam
59a2(skyes rabs): bar 'gyur ba med pa byAshrIn+d+ra du rnam 'gyur 'dzin// rnam pa sna tshogs rab mang ba/ ba bak+Sha ba'i gzugs nI ma mtshan te// rma bya'i sgo nga tshugs rang bzhin ma bya'i rnam pa mi g+hasal bzhin// der mo mi
59a3(skyes rabs): mer nu ra nur nar nar gor gor lnga sogs gnas skabs bzung // dwe dang de dag lto yis bskyed pa'i drod kyis smin zhing 'phel byas nos// zla ba rdzogs pa'am yang na dgu yis 'khyil pa'i las kyi rim pa 'di//
59a4(skyes rabs): sdug bsngal 'du shes rab ldan ci yang rung ba'i mi bzang nyon mongs spyod// dus suM yu ba dag las 'bras bu ring nyid ltung zhing mngal sbyin pas// de dus langs pa'i me yi rlung ni mi dman mgyogs pas ra
59a5(skyes rabs): bskul nas// mtshon bya goms pa'i gnas kyi grogs po las kyi 'chi ngo bsna rdzogs gyur pa// gzhu yi 'khrul 'khor bkang nas btang ba'i mnga' bzhin nang nas phyir 'thon 'gyur// gan rkyal kha gdangs ro
59a6(skyes rabs): 'dzin drang pos nu rtog rtse la 'dzin byed cing // ma yi nu zho 'thung gang 'di yi rna bas min zhing mig gis mi ni// skye bar goms pa'i gdung bas bskyed pa'i nyon mongs gnas pa'i rol pa des// de yi mdun du spros
59b1(skyes rabs): ba mtha' dag ston byed bag chags kho na'o// rnam mang yul gyi nyams myong bskyed pa'i dbye bas grub pa'i nang khyab pa// gsal bar skud pa rab tu rgyas par legs sbyar bang rtsa'i cha shas bzhin// de nas rang bzhin
59b2(skyes rabs): dbang po'i grogs kyi 'du shes byin pa'i rmongs pa de// nu ma'i don du brjod tsong yongs su mnye bo'i reg pas ma ma rig/ mal stan gos rnams lag pas skyod pa'o 'dar byed dag gis mnan pa dang // gnas
59b3(skyes rabs): dang gnas su ya yor 'gyur lus srog chags rnams kyi zos gyur pasdu// rtag tu ngu zhing tshig dang bral bas lus kyi nyon mongs rgyud ma ni// su la smra ste mi bzang rgud pa nyid kyi gnas su rab tu gyur// gdung bas
59b4(skyes rabs): skyugs shing rab 'thob 'og ma'i tshogs kyi sa bzhin ni sngags gyur cing // gan rgyal brang gi dbus su ltung bsdu bran pas mtshon pAr gyur pa 'di// sgyu ma'i bud med la 'grogs mchog tu rtsi dgA'i ro lnga pa
59b5(skyes rabs): rlon pa las// dgod pa'i 'od zer shin tu gsal bas lus la rab tu khyab pa bzhin// de nas de ni rtse bas yige phreng yongs 'dris dag la lag go/ tang thob// 'khor ba 'di ni g.yo med 'ching ba'i
59b6(skyes rabs): rtsis kyis ri mo'i las ngag la// rang gi skye ba'i khor mo ring du 'bri bzhin oM yig la sogs pa// sde dang sde la blo gros rab gsal longs spyod spros pa nges par 'jug/ ji zhig ltar yang byis pa'i
60a1(skyes rabs): dngos po'i rab rmongs bral nas shes rab thob// smad nas kyang ni lang tsho drar la 'dod bas rab bslang 'du shes nyams// sdug bsngal mdzes pa'i sprin bzlog bud med rnams kyi rtse
60a2(skyes rabs): dga' rol pa dag/ snying po med la rab tu brtan pa'i blo yis mngon par 'dod pa bcings// bud med rnams kyi tshig la rna ba lus ni g.yo med 'khyud pA la// kha yi chang gI dr-i la sne dang dri yi ro la myong byed
60a3(skyes rabs): dang // bzhin la mig kyang snod du bgyis nas bya ba thams cad bsnyal ba 'di// lus ni yongs su 'gyur ba'i dbang po thams cad tshod dag 'dzin po bzhin// sdang la mdza' zhing yongasu 'dris la yongs sdong
60a4(skyes rabs): ngang tshul 'a dod ldan de// gri sar pa gsar pa la chags 'brang bcas gzhan gyi 'dod ma gzhan dag 'dod// de ltar phan tshutshu ga ni spyod pa phye par mthong gyur pa// 'di yI 'dod pa rang bzhin ro bral bkra ba'i
60a5(skyes rabs): rgyud 'di gzhan slad nyid// nyin zhug dag ni nyung zhig gnas pa'i lang chos long ba byas gyur zhing // 'damA lnga glang po bzhin du yul gyi chu gter dag ni mtha' memid la// bying zhing mtha' la rab lhung 'gro ba dag ni
60a6(skyes rabs): rab tu nyams pa 'di// ci zhig bya zhes nges pa'i shes pa dang bral rmongs pas rgyal bar 'gyur// ji srid 'di ni rtse zhing 'khyam dang gi yo dang dga' dang glal ba dang // 'dod pas 'khyud pa'i lus ni 'khyog
60b1(skyes rabs): pas 'dzum zhing 'dzum zhing smra byed pa// de srid de yi steng du dus kyis rab 'phangs bsod rtags me tog phreng // kha ba'i phreng ba ltar dkar zol gyis yongs su 'bab pa nyid// gti mug gnyid la chags pas
60b2(skyes rabs): dus dang dus la skad cig ltar shes shing // lus 'dir logs byas ma thob byin pa nyid ni min spyad pa min pa yi// rgyu 'dis de ni rkun pos brkus bzhin sdug bsngal dag las sems pa nyid// kun tu rmongs
60b3(skyes rabs): pa nyid kyi nyam nyes bag med 'gyod pa'i 'bras bu can// las ngan gyi thob nor dang mtshungs pas lang tsho rmi lam du brtag pa// bud med 'jo sgeg so ga'i me tog 'khri shing song ba de yi tshe// yan lag ma lus skyong
60b4(skyes rabs): zhing chags dang bral bas rang bzhin mtha' dag nyams// rgyal srid las nyams mi bdag bzhin de de nas bde ba 'das pas gdung // bdag gi tshe btang slong ba rnams la yang dag 'os pa'i sbyin ma btang // phyogs
60b5(skyes rabs): phyogs dag tu grags pa'ang ma snyun legs pa'i lam ni ma rtogs shing // slong ba'i dug 'thungs tsha dang grang ba yongs su rgyas pa lhag par thob// sdig las ci yang 'jigs par ma gyur gang zhig de nyid kho na gyis/
60b6(skyes rabs): gser gyis ljon pa'i 'od 'phrog yid 'phrog lang tsho'i dpal 'di gang na ste// smin zhing mdzes bral srin bus bcos pa'i shing mtshungs lus 'di ga la zhig/ na chung 'di dag mig gis ring nas yongs spong zur na
61a1(skyes rabs): zhen gyur pa// bdag la gnas kyi spre'u skams shing 'khyags pas 'khrugs pa bzhin zhes smra// lus 'di rnam par 'jig pa bsten te sgyu ma'i tshogs ni ma yin nyid// so yi nor bu
61a2(skyes rabs): kun dang skra da lhung ste skyon ni ma yin nyid// lus kyi brtson 'grus rlung ni rab tu stor to gAti mug myu gu min// mal stan la brkyang zad par gyur kyang bdag gi skyed pa za nga ma yin// de ltar bsams nas mi zad
61a3(skyes rabs): dbugs brtsegs hi go sogs rab tu rgyas gyur pas// 'di ni yun ring 'dris pa'i 'jig rten spyod tshul 'phral la gtong rtsom ste// lkugs gyur rang gi skye bo dang bral sems shing nus pa chad pa las// bstan
61a4(skyes rabs): pa nyams gyur dus la bab pa dbul la bu lon+da chen po bzhin// re zhig sa dang khang pa nor dang g.yog 'khor bu dang chung ma dang // srog ni mthar thug dus su blo yis de snyed gzhan yang bsams byas pa// ji srid
61a5(skyes rabs): skye ba la yang 'di ni slad nas chags rmongs 'ching ba dag/ de des nang du yongasu 'dris byas de yi rang bzhin ngo bor 'gro// zangs chen stong phrag nang du sdig las kyis bskyed bzod par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal dag/ spyad /
61a6(skyes rabs): nos ngu 'bod thig nag dmyal ba rnams kyi skye gnas dag tu 'khor gyur cing // gang yang bsod nams chas bsgrubs bde ba'i gnas de yang dag zad nas sdug bsngal de'o// de slad phyir mi 'ong ba ces 'bras thob slad du
61b1(skyes rabs): dri med blo yis ting 'dzin mdzod// sems can rnams kyi dge thob slad// de skad srid pa'i chu gter ni// 'jigs rung las sgrol brtul zhugs mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag gsungs// zhes pa
61b2(skyes rabs): dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtog pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las mngal nas 'byung ba bstan pa'i yal 'dab ste bcu pa'o// // gang zhig mnyes gshin
61b3(skyes rabs): byams pa'i blo yis dge ba'i slad du ni// srid pa'i 'jig rten skyes bu rnams kyi mchog tu rjes 'dzin dag/ 'bad pas mdzad pa de dag sems can rnams la snying rje dang // rjes su brtse ba nye bar gnas pa'i legs
61b4(skyes rabs): ldan su zhig lags// ser skya'i gzhi la n+ya gro d+ha'i// kun dga' rar bzhugs bcom ldan 'das// blta phyir shAkya'i rgyal po'i bu// dga' bo song bar gyur to sngon// nges 'byung gtam dang gros dag gi/
61b5(skyes rabs): gtam mthar mdun na gnas pa na// rab tu byung ba mdzod cig ces// bcom ldan dgyes pas bka' stsal to// de yi drin la mngon dga' nas// dga' bos de la lan gsol pa// bcom ldan bsod nams
61b6(skyes rabs): 'thob mos kyang // rab byung bdag ni mngon mi 'dod// khyod kyi nyes gnas su gyur nas// yo byad ji ltar bzhed kun gyis// re zhig dge slong dge 'dun la// gus pas bdag gi rim gro bgyi'o// 'di brjod rin
62a1(skyes rabs): chen cod pan gyis// de yi zhabs pad la reg nas// rgyal po'i bu ni btsun mo la// chags pas rang gi khyim du song // de ni mdzes ma yid 'od ma// dga' zhing mdzes dang yang dag
62a2(skyes rabs): phrad// yud tsam 'bral bar mi bzod pas// skyed tshal ma mchog tu rnam par rol// de nas nam zhig rang bzhin gyis// yon ton ldan dge bcom ldan 'das// dge slong tshogs dang bcas pa dag/ dga'
62a3(skyes rabs): bo'i khyim du rang nyid gshegs// kun dga'i bzhin ldan dga' bo yis// de yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal zhing // cher 'os stan la bzhugs de la// mchod pa byas nas rim gro bskyed// gang zhig bcom ldan
62a4(skyes rabs): rang nyid kyi// gzigs pas rjes su bzung byasmra nas// 'di 'dra bsod nams myu gu rnams// gang zhig yongs su smin pa'i 'bras// bdag nyid chen po rnams dran nA ma// thos po dang ni mthong gyur ba// 'di /
62a5(skyes rabs): de dge ba'i 'khri shing gi/ 'bras bu chen po dag gi rgyun// khyod kyi snang ba byams pa ni// chen por gyur pa 'di mthong bas// snying gi chu skyes rgyas pa'i dpal// su zhig gi ni mi skyes 'gyur// bdag nyid che rnam
62a6(skyes rabs): mthong ba ni// sbyin pa bas kyang shin tu dga'// bso nga nams pas kyang 'bras bu che// spyod bzang bas kyang bsngags par 'os// de skad brjod de'i gus pa dang // mdza' zhing byams pa nyid dag dang // sngon du
62b1(skyes rabs): mchod la mngon dgyes nas// bcom ldan 'das ni gshegs par brtson// dga' bo de yi rjes 'brang ba// rang gi gser gyi snod du ni// mchog gi nyer spyad mngar po dag/ rang gi bsdams pa bzhin du
62b2(skyes rabs): blangs// bcom ldan 'das kyi rjesna bzhin du// gus pas bdag po bgrong mthong nas// 'bral ba mi bzod mdzes ma yis// zur mig gis ni nges par bltas// bla ma rnams mdun mig gi bgros ni drang zhing
62b3(skyes rabs): rab tu g.yo ba dag/ yangs pa nyid kyi zur mig rlab mdzes cung zad bye bas mdzes pa'i mchog/ blta bya bltas nas gang zhig skad cig dud gyur de phyir lhag par ni// 'gro bar mi bya mgron po zhes ni thub pa
62b4(skyes rabs): tshig med gsungs pa bzhin// mdza' mo shugs ring ldan pa la// dga' bo bzhin ni phyir phyogs nas// bdag ni ring po mi thogs par// 'ong ba 'di nyid ces rab smras// de nas bcom ldan rang nyid kyi// gnas su
62b5(skyes rabs): byon la thal sbyar nas// re zhig rang khyim mchi'o zhes// 'bral ba bzod pa med pas smros// de nas khrir zhugs bcom ldan gyis// mdun du rab tu btud de la// 'dzum dang bcas gsungs da lta nyid// myur bar
62b6(skyes rabs): 'gro ba 'di ci zhig/ yul gyi rol bcags pa yi// kun rmongs kyis gzir sems can rnams// kye ma khyim gyi de nyid la// ying 'byung las ni phyir phyogs blo// tshe yi rgyan ni yon tan te// yon tan rgya ni dben
63a1(skyes rabs): pa'o// 'di yi rgyun ni rab zhi ste// zhi ba'i rgyan ni chags bral lo// snying stobs sems la bkod pa'i blun po de dang bzod dka'i zug rngu'i dum bu de// blo ldan rnams kyis de ni rnam par
63a2(skyes rabs): dpyad tshe tshe ni 'bras bral nyid du brtsis// gang yid phyugs bzhin chags bral dben pa yis steng mtshan nyid med pa rnam dag gi/ skad cig 'di dag 'ongad dang 'gro ba yang ni 'khor lo'i mu khyud g.yo ba bzhin// snying
63a3(skyes rabs): stobs ldan pa'i bsod nams blo ldan gyis thos rig byed ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang // skal ldan dag gi thams cad zhi ldan rnams kyi bde ba gar yang rnyed dka' min// mtha' dag dngos po'i rten gyur tshe ni shin tu
63a4(skyes rabs): chung ba'i cha ni yang dag rnyed dka' ste// 'bras med nyid kyis gang gis zad 'gyur mya ngan 'os pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// yul gyi chu gter g.yon ma'i glong 'khyil 'jo sgeg chu yis gang gyur pa// dregs pa mi zad
63a5(skyes rabs): chu srin rab langs mtshan mas 'khrugs par rab bskyed cing // lhag par 'bral ba'i rta gdong me ni rab 'bar rtag tu gnas pa la// skyes bu rnams ni sgrol lam chags bral drag po kho na bsdams pa'i stegs/
63a6(skyes rabs): de slad rab byung gzung bar mdzod// rgyal po'i sras ni dbang po thul// bud med bde dang dpal 'byor 'di// myur du yang dag 'grogs po bzhin// dge ba nyid slad tshangs pa yi// spyod pa yongs su gzung bar
63b1(skyes rabs): mdzod// 'khor ba snying po med pa'i khyim// gdon ngan 'di ni gtang bar mdzod// bcom ldan gsung ni snying rje ldi// brgyan pa de dag thos gyur nas// don gnyer mchod 'os gyis bsdams pa'i// dga' bos
63b2(skyes rabs): de la lan gsol ba// rtag tu khyod nyid bsnyen pa nyid// bcom ldan bdag gi rab byung yin// dge slong dge 'dun rim gror ni// 'os pa'i khyim la mchog tu gus// de skad smras nas bcom ldan gsung //
63b3(skyes rabs): bsgom bya'i dbang phyugla min pa dang // dga' ma la dgas drangs pas 'di'i// bsam pa khyogs la phyang mo yug/ yang drang yang du bcom ldan gyis// 'di la brtul zhugs nyer bstan mdzad// phan par brtson pa'i
63b4(skyes rabs): gdam bau rnams// mi 'os pa nyid mi bsam mo// dbang po ma thul dga' ba ni// gang tshe rab byung mi 'dod pa// de tshe de yi lus la de// bcom ldan gsung gis rang nyid lhung // de che de yi ngur smrig go/ ma ma
63b5(skyes rabs): zlum lag na lhung bzed can// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams kyis// gser gyi 'od zer lta bur mdzes// dgon pa pa dang bsod snyoms par// rgyal ba'i bka' yis der gyur to// khyim las khyim ni med
63b6(skyes rabs): nyid dang // phyag dar khrod pa nyid du gyur// de ni rab tu byung gyur kyang // snying la yang dag gcags pa yis// sngo bsangs dga' ma rtag tu 'dzin// zla ba'i mtshan ma mdzes pa bzhin// gang yang sems kyi
64a1(skyes rabs): tshugs pa dag/ bkrus kyang 'dag pa min pa gang // lam ni gang nas nang du zhugs// shel gyi bzhin du mi shes s+ho// bral bas skya bor gyur pa'i 'ong // chos gos
64a2(skyes rabs): dmar po yang dag chags// de ni thun mtshams sprin dum gyis// mtshan pa'i zla ba'i dpal 'phrog gyur// nags na rgyu zhing rol byed la// rid cing 'dzin pa brjed pa do// lus med skye ba'i rig byed kyi
64a3(skyes rabs): mdzes ma dag ni brjong ma gyur// rdo ba'i gzhi la bsdang nas ni// yongs rdzogs zla ba'i bzhin ras kyis// bzhin la bas ma gtan gro yo med kyi// yun ring dag tu de de bsams// kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis
64a4(skyes rabs): ni// 'byud pas rjes bzung 'di dag kyang // chags pas byin brlabs bdag gi sems// dri ma dang bral nyid mi 'gyur// 'khor ba'i spyod tshul thos gyur cing // grogs med brtul zhugs bsten mod kyang // ri
64a5(skyes rabs): dgas gzhon nu'i mig can ma// bdag gi yid la brjed pa med// mdzes ma'i gur gum gyis reg chags pa'i skal bzang lus la snam sbyar legs par bgos// de yi nu rgyas dkyil 'khor rab tu nyung ba'i
64a6(skyes rabs): lag pas lhung gzeng legs par bzung // gang zhig byang chub bgeg su 'gyur ba de la dmigs pa'i nyin mtshan bsam gtan can// bdog gi chags pa dag ni gal te 'phel na mchog tu rigs pa nyi du 'phel
64b1(skyes rabs): mdzes skad cig gis ni bdag 'ong zhes// sngon ni de la de ltar 'ong bar brjod// kye ma phrang ba'i bgegs gyur brtul zhugs 'di// byas pa mi bzo bdag gis phyin nas blangs// rab tu 'dar zhing g.yo
64b2(skyes rabs): ba'i tshig gis 'gro bar mi bya zhes smras shing // bla ma'i skye bo gnas tshe gang zhig rlung yab dor nas thub pa yang ma bzung // gang zhig rkang pas sa la 'bri zhing mthong min na yang bdag la zur mig mtshon/
64b3(skyes rabs): dgag pa mchog tu mdzes pa'i rim pa de yi bdag gis yod ni de yis bsdams// bdag bral ri dwags mig can de// 'jug ngogs ngur pa mo bzhin du// ba gam can na mya ngan dag/ sgrog cing mi nyal
64b4(skyes rabs): yod dam snyam// kye hud dga' ma g.yon can ni// 'ba' zhig pa bzhin bden pa btang // khyod kyi sems kyis chom rkun ngas// rdzun gyis brtul zhugs 'di la brten// ro zhig brtul zhugs 'dri btang nas//
64b5(skyes rabs): mdzes ma'i gam du 'gro bar bya// gang phyir chags pa'i mes gdungs pas// dka' thub gdung ba bzod par dka'// sdig can yun ring nas 'ongs pa// bdag mthong rgyal po'i bu mo de// gsar du skyes pa'i
64b6(skyes rabs): khro ba yis// ci byed par 'gyur yong mi shes// mdza' la chags pa'i rdul gyi cha// gnod cing dga' med bzod dka' ba// nges par bzlog pa dka' ba nyid// kun tu rnam 'gyur nyid kyi slad// gang gi dus na
65a1(skyes rabs): bcom ldan gyis// nags 'di btang bar mthong gyur pa// de tshe kho na bdag khyim du// 'gro bar bya zhes 'di nges so// nga ni dga' ba'i dmigs rten du// rdo yi glegs bu 'di
65a2(skyes rabs): nyid la// ro yi khams ni yid 'ong gis// zla bzhin ma de bdag gis bI// yang na gang gis mdzes sdug thigs// bdud rtsi ut+pal zla ba 'dra// mdzes ma de ni ri mo yi// yul du ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur// yid
65a3(skyes rabs): 'phrog ri dgas mig ni bung ba g.yo bas khyab pa'i ut+pal 'khyil pa bzhin// 'jo sgeg chu gter 'gram du byu ru'i nags ltar chu ni bim pa'i 'od rab gsal// gang yang kha li 'od de skyon med bdud rtsi'i zer gyi
65a4(skyes rabs): don mthun dag gis lam// mdzes ma'i lus ni ngo mtshar snying po ri mo'i lam du ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di bsams de yi rdo gzhi la// mchi mas bkrus shing 'dar ba yi// 'khrugs pa'i sor mes
65a5(skyes rabs): ji ltar yang // mdzes ma dag ni ngal bus bris// de yi rtogs pas gsal byas pa'i// gzugs brnyan lta bu la brten pas// sngon du byas nas mdzes ma la// mchi mas 'dzer 'dzer skad du smras// mig
65a6(skyes rabs): gnyis ma lus bde ba'i char rgyun ston kha'i zla ba'i bzhin ras can// mdzes ma bdag gis bris te mig chus rgyas pas skad cig kyang ma mthong // gzugs can ma dang bral la bltos med brtul zhugs ldan pa
65b1(skyes rabs): bdag la ni// sdig las ci yang gdung ba rab bskyed dmod pa zug pa ma yin nam// rgyas pa'i chu skyes nags kyi 'od 'dra dga' ba'i mig gis rjes su chags pa'i lus// de yi dus na nye bar gyur ba'i bar chad
65b2(skyes rabs): gyis bskrun khro ba yang dag thong // kA ye mdzes mi bdag la tshig lan byin cig mi smra bar ni ci la 'dug/ bden par bdag kyang khyod la chags pa'i chos gos 'di bsam brtul zhugaso// de skad smra zhing
65b3(skyes rabs): bud med dag/ bris pa ring nas mthong gyur nas// khro ldan dge slong rnams kyis ni// bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs smras// bcom ldan khyed kyis ma dul la// mnyes gshin 'ba' zhig pa nyid las
65b4(skyes rabs): rab tu byung ba 'di byin te// khyi la me tog phreng ba bzhin// mdzes ma bris nas dga' bo 'di// rdo ba'i gzhi la dal bu yis// de brjod bzlas pa la chags shing // bsam gtan la ni dmigs par 'gyur// de
65b5(skyes rabs): dag thos nas bcom ldan gyis// dga' ma bral bas rmongs gyur pa'i// dga' bo nags nas bos nas ni// 'di dag ci zhe sda rab tu dris// des smras bcom ldan bden par ni// mchog du mdzes ma la chags
65b6(skyes rabs): bdag/ dge slong rnams ni 'dod gyur kyang // nags tshal 'di la blo mi dga'// de skad dga' bo'i tshig thos nas// zhal gyi zla ba'i 'od zer gyis// 'dod chags chu skyes 'dzum pa bzhin// bcom ldan rgyal
66a1(skyes rabs): bas de la gsungs// kun tu chags las mi rigs blo// dam pa khyod kyi rigs ma yin// dge la mngon par gnas rnams kyis// sems ni bgegs rnams kyi mi khugs//
66a2(skyes rabs): longs spyod rtswa yis zegs ma dang mtshungs btang la mngon sbyor rigs pa 'di ni gang // skad cig bde ba'i ro myang tshogs dang 'gogs pa smad 'os 'di ni gang // chags pas 'ongs pa rnams ni gang du 'phral
66a3(skyes rabs): la ltung byed bzod dkar gyur pa yi// bsgral dka' bdud kyi lamo 'di rigs nyid kyis ni dge ba 'phrog par byed pa yin// de skad de la chags bral dag/ yun ring bstan mdzad des na 'dir// 'dug bya zhes brjod
66a4(skyes rabs): bcom ldan dang // rang gi bya ba'i spyang du gshegs// mdzes ma lha la chags gyur pa'i// dga' ldan dga' bos gnas skabs der// 'gro bar 'os pas bsams nas ni// rang gi khyim du chas par gyur/
66a5(skyes rabs): btsug lag khang ni mang po yis// sgo rnams bcad pas yun ring na// grong khyer mngon phyogs lam dag ni// dri zhig lhar stes thob nas bgrod// de nas chags las 'gro brtson de// thams cad mkhyen pa bcom
66a6(skyes rabs): ldan gyis// mkhyen nas mngon phyogs bka' sprul pa// dga' bo mgyogs por gang du 'gro// des smras bcom ldan re zhig ni// nags na bdag la dga' ba med// sems ni ngal bsos min rnams kyis// bya
66b1(skyes rabs): bu gang yang dag pa min// dpal ni rnga yab bzhad ldan de dang nor bu'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i ba gam phreng ldan de// a mra'i 'khri shing rlung bzhon gyis bskyod skyed tshal gsar pa'i sa gzhi mdzes pa de dang ni//
66b2(skyes rabs): me tog mnga' can gzhu yi 'khri shing gzugs bzang lto ba phra ba'i mdzes ma dre dag la// skye ba gzhan gyi bag chags bzhin du bdag gi yid ni chags los rnam par mi grol lo// yang ni chags bcas
66b3(skyes rabs): kho na yis// tshangs par spyod pa bdag gis spyad// brtul zhugs 'ching ba'i gzeb dag gos// mkha' la 'gro ba bsdams pa bzhin// gos ni mtshon gyis dmar pa yis// 'dod chags bral ba
66b4(skyes rabs): nyid mi 'gyur// rab byung btang nas bdag 'gro'o// bdag gi dmyal ba zang gyur cig/ de skad lan cig min smra zhing // rang gnas 'gro bar brtson de la// zlog cing rjes bzung blo gros kyis// bcom
66b5(skyes rabs): ldan rgyal bas bka' stsal pa// shes ldan skye bo nyer bsten la// so so'i skye bor mi 'gyur bzhin// dga' bo thos pas rnam par grags// smad cing bslang pa ma byed cig/ rnam par rig pas skyon bshig
66b6(skyes rabs): cing // tshul khrims ldan pa mkhas rnams blo// snying po med pa'i bde ba lo// chags pas bya min la mi 'jug/ mchog tu smad pa'i khang par ni// ngan pa'i las la kun tu chags// rgya chen 'dod
67a1(skyes rabs): chags 'dzin pa khyod// ngo tsha skye ba min pa ci// skye gnas la skyes skye gnas chags// nu ma 'thungs pa nu ma nyed// kye ma ngo tsha mi byed pa// skye ba nyid la brlag par gyur// rtag tu dam
67a2(skyes rabs): pa'i skye bo spangs// ma yi sgrom la chags gyur pa// sems ni kun rmongs kyis bcom pa'o// phyugs rnams nyid la mthong ba yin// bud med skyes pa'i ngo rgyal 'di// khyed kyis dga' dang bral nas thong //
67a3(skyes rabs): srid po'i khur bur lag 'gro rnams// longs spyod dang bcas 'jig pa thong // sgrom las skyes pa'i dga' ba dag/ su yi yid 'byung skyed mi byed// gang gi 'jug tu khyi rnams kyang // nges par kha ni phyir
67a4(skyes rabs): phyogs 'gyur// khyim gyi rgya las rnam grol khyod// de nyid du mngon rgyug pa ci// gang phyi ro ri dgas thar gyur pa// slar yang rgyur ni 'jug po min// de skad bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa'i// bka' yis
67a5(skyes rabs): nges par bsdams pa yi// dga' bo mdzes ma sems byed cing // slar yang gnas su rab tu zhugs// de nas nam zhig dga' bo la// gnas khang phyag dar bskos nas ni// phongs pa rjes 'dzin la brtson
67a6(skyes rabs): pa'i// bcom ldan slar yang rab tu gshegs// de yis bka' yas gnas gang dag/ spyib la rab zhugs dga' ba yi// bsam pa las ni 'dod chags bzhin// sa las rdul rnams yod ma song //
67b1(skyes rabs): yongs su spyod pa'i chu dag ni// len du song bar gyur pa de'i// yang yang bkang zhing rab blangs tshe// bum pa stong pa nyid du gyur// bgegs ni de yis yid dag ni// shin tu skyo ba nas 'gro ba'i slad// mdzes
67b2(skyes rabs): ma lta bar 'dod pa yi// dga' bo btang nas rab tu song // de nas re ba brtan pa yis// 'gro ba de ni kun mkhyen gyi// lha yi spyan gyis mkhyen gyur nas// 'phral la mngon phyogs bka' stsal pa// kye ma mdza'
67b3(skyes rabs): ba'i snum gyi dri// snod du sbyar bas tshwa byed cing // khyod kyis chags pa mtshan mo'i 'od// mar me bzhin du zhi mi 'gyur// g.yon mo mchog tu mngon 'dod pas// ci yang khyod snying la chags 'di// da rung yang
67b4(skyes rabs): 'di mi 'bral te// gang zhig rams kyi chen bzhin no// chags pa rab tu brtsams pa'i tshe// de dus 'jigs shing long bar byed// yan lag gtsor 'grong rab zhugs tshe// smad pa nyid kyis kun tu 'khyud// yul
67b5(skyes rabs): gyi nyams myong dang 'grogs pa// sdig pa'i grogs lha'i dbang po yis// sdug bsngal bzod dka' 'khyil pa yis// dmyal bar mi rnams 'phen par byed// grogs ngan reg pa'i cha yis kyang // lhag par rab
67b6(skyes rabs): tu skyo bar byed// nya dang ro ni rul ba yi// dri nga rab tu ldang ba bzhin// dge ba'i grogs kyis reg gyur po// rnam pa kun tu dge ba 'dzin// dge ba'i dri bzang gis khyab bzhin// gang zhig rin ni chen por byed//
68a1(skyes rabs): 'di brjod de la bcom ldan gyis// dam pa dam pa min bI phaH// mngon du reg pas dri bstan nas// sgrogs ni de dag bstan pa mdzad// de nas dga' bo bcom ldan gyis// khyer
68a2(skyes rabs): nas ri yi dbang po ni// spos dang ldan pa ri dwags kyis// rnga ma'i rlung yab g.yob par gshegs// der ni nags mes tshig gyur cing // mi sdug shin tu ring ba'i yus// spra mo zhar ma de lA ni// bstan nas
68a3(skyes rabs): rgyal bas bka' stsal pa// dga' bo 'di ni mthong dam ci// sman pas shin tu smad pa'i dbyibs// 'di la'ang su zhig 'os pa yis// dga' mar mthong nas sbed pa yin// legs dang mi legs yod nyid
68a4(skyes rabs): min// dga' ba nyid du chags pas lta// 'jig rten na ni skye bo gang // gang gi dredaga'i dro de yis dga'// 'di dang mdzes ma de yi ni// mdzes pa'i bar ni ci zhig yod// dga' bo khyod kyi phyogs ltung
68a5(skyes rabs): dag/ rab tu thong la bden par smros// bdag gis don du ma gnyer slad// mdzes ma'i khyad nyid rig pa med// don du gnyer na dga' bar 'gyur// dga' ba nyid na mdzes pa nyid// 'di dang de la khyod par de ga/
68a6(skyes rabs): ngas ni cung zad ma mthong ste// sha lpags rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor la// dga' ba dam tshig byas tsam nyid// de skad bcom ldan gyis dri ba// shin tu rigs min dris gyur cing // gang yang bla mas bsdams
68b1(skyes rabs): gyur pa'i// dga' bos de la lan gsol pa// bcom ldan de skad ci la gsungs// gang 'di mya ngan la co 'dri// kun gyi bla ma gtso bor ni// gyur pa su yis rnam par dul// mdzes ma yi ni dga' ba de// mchog
68b2(skyes rabs): ga cha las mdzes pa ste// 'gro les rgyal ba'i dran pa yang // gang mthong dga' ma mi dran no// de yi mdzes pas ku mung tshal// dga' bzhin zla ba'i 'od kyi min// grags pa'i lam 'gro blun po yis// yon tan khyad
68b3(skyes rabs): par yong mi shes// de yi me tog tshogs rnams bzhin gyi dri bzang nor la ni// bskus par mthong nas rab tu rgyas pa'i skra tshogs dag la bcings// 'jo sgeg 'gros dang mig gis mdzes pa dag la bskus gyur pa'i//
68b4(skyes rabs): ngang pa ri dwags 'jigs bzhin nags nyid du ni bros sam snyam// ri dgas mig can dpe med mde yongs 'dris brtag pa mi nyung zhing // rnam mang rnam par rtogs pas kyang ni byi bar nus pa nyid ma yin// gang gi
68b5(skyes rabs): bzhin mdzes ngag dang srang la gzhal tshe yang ba nyid kyis na// rgyu skar bdag po de ni mkha' la lhag par mdzes pa ma yin nam// bsod nams kyis 'thob yid 'ong smin ma'i 'khri shing g.yo ldan sgeg cing rol// de yi
68b6(skyes rabs): bzhin ni yid 'phrog dga' dang ldan te mi 'thob na// rab byung 'dis bdag legs byas lhag par ci zhig bgyid 'gyur 'di yi slang // brtul zhugs yo byad khur du zhu gyur pa 'di dag ci slad bdag khur lags// de
69a1(skyes rabs): skang dga' bo'i tshig thos nas// chags pa rab tu rgyus pa de// bcom ldan rang gi mthus blangs nas// lha yi gnas su phyin par gyur// brgyu byin dga' tshal de ru nI/
69a2(skyes rabs): bdud rtsi bsrubs las rab 'khrungs pa'i// lha yi bu mo mdzes pa drag/ de la rab tu bstan par gyur// rkang pa pad tshal las las 'khrungs pa// mdzes pa'i rgyud ni dmar po yis// chu gter ngogs kyi
69a3(skyes rabs): byu ru yis// nags kyi rjes su 'khrid pa bzhin// yongs 'du lhan cig skyes pa yi// yal 'dab chags pa ltar gyur pa// rol cing sgeg pa'i grogs po yi// lag pas chu skyes dag las rgyal// mdzes shing
69a4(skyes rabs): yang 'ong rol pa dang // 'dod pa kun tu dga' ba'i grogs// chu skyes bde blog nyid du ni// 'dzum byed zla ba'i 'gran zla dang // kriSh+Na s+phA ra'i mig dag dang // kun rmongs gso bas nag mo ni// brtsegs pa'i ri mos
69a5(skyes rabs): reg pa yi// bdud rtsi tshogs kyi bskor ba bzhin// mdzes sdug long tshe rdzogs gyur pa// de dag mthong nas 'phrul nyid du// kun dga'i bzhin ldan dga' ba ni// rdul gyis bkrus pa bzhin du gyur// pad+mo'i bzhin ras
69a6(skyes rabs): dang ni ut+pal rgyas pa'i mig/ kun da'i 'dzum dang me tog tshom bu'i nu rgyas can// de dag rnams la dga' bo'i snying ni cig car du// phyogs lhung bung pha rol cing g.yo ba dang mtshungs thob// de la yid song dga'
69b1(skyes rabs): bo la// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// dga' bo 'di dgra mthong ba dang // chags pas khyod blo dga' 'am ci// 'di rnams dag dang mdzes ma de'i// mdzes sdug khyad par ji snyed cig/ gzhan
69b2(skyes rabs): yang cha las rab gyur pa// gsal ba kho nar rtogs par bya// gal te lha mo rnams kyi gzugs// mdzes ma'i gzugs pas lhag pa na// de phyir de dag kho na nyid// dus kyis khyod la brten par byas// re
69b3(skyes rabs): zhig rab tu dang ba'i blo// yid ni chags bral kho na yis// tshangs spyod spyod cig de nas ngas// lha mo'i tshogs ni khyod la sbyin// de ltar bcom ldan gsung gis ni// nges pa skyes pa'i dga' bo yis/
69b4(skyes rabs): bzhin zhes brjod brtul zhugs sems// mtho ris bu mo'i bsam pas byos// de dag 'grogs 'dod gyur pas de// rang gi chung ma la gus dman// yon tan zong mtshungs dgo' ba yis// mdza' ba bden
69b5(skyes rabs): pa nyid ma yin// skyes bu'i goms skyes mdza' ba ni// gzhan du yongasu driman pa yis// kye ma gnas ni brjed gyur nas// 'phral la gzhan du rgyug pa nyid// skad cig lang tsho dga' ba yi// mdza' ba gcugs
69b6(skyes rabs): pa nyams pa yis// bden pa ma yon rtag min te// lus can rnams kyi bde ba bzhin// de nas dga' bo bcom ldan gyis// skad cig gi ni rang gnas khyer// nges pa de yis tshangs spyod ni// dul ba nyid
70a1(skyes rabs): kyi brtul zhugs spyad// mdzes ma'i mdzes sdug phun tshogs pa// gzhan gyi blo des brdzes par gyur// skad cig rab nyams dga' ba ni// yon tan la'ang dman par 'gyur//
70a2(skyes rabs): de nas nam zhig dga' bo ni// rgyu bas rab 'jigs dmyal ba'i tshogs// 'jigs rung zangs tshan 'dzin pa yang // 'ga' zhig dag tu mthong bar gyur// de mthong nyid na sdug bsngal zhing // 'dar bar gyur pas
70a3(skyes rabs): 'di ci zhes// de yis de ni chog sa pa yi// 'jigs rung dmyal srung rnams la dris// de la des smras tsha ba yis// zangs chen brgya ni rdzogs pa 'di// shin tu chags ldan rgyal po'i bu// dga' bo la ni byas pa
70a4(skyes rabs): yin// chags bral nyid ni da dung yang // brtul zhugs log pa dri mi bstan// mtho ris bud med 'grogs bsams pra// tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa nyid// bskam chags log pa'i brtul zhugs can// chags
70a5(skyes rabs): sdang snyigs ma can rnams kyi// rtag tu tsha ba'i zangs chen ni// 'di dag 'jig pa med pa'i gnas// de ltar dga' bos yang dag thos// spu lod+d+ho gos ltar rgyus gyur cing // der ni rjes su gdung ba yis// lus po
70a6(skyes rabs): dum bur gyur bzhin sems// gan su mngon song 'dod chags kyi// bag chags zhen pa btang byas nas// bla med tshangs par spyod pa ni// yongasu rdzogs shing dul bar gyur// nang du the tshom rnam grol
70b1(skyes rabs): zhing // stug po'i rmongs pa zad las de'i// yid ni rang dang thob gyur te// ston ka'i klung gi chu bzhin no// 'dod pa med cing rab zhi thob// mchog tu nges par der zhugs pa// dam pa'i blo yis bcom ldan
70b2(skyes rabs): la// yang dag mngon du phyogs te smras// bcom ldan bdag la bya ba ni// lha mos yod min mdzes mas min// gnod pa dang bcas yul gyi dpal// 'di dag mjug ni mdzes dang bral// ji lta ji ltar
70b3(skyes rabs): dngos rnams kyi// ngo bo nyid med 'di bsgoms pa// de lta de ltar sgrib pa dang // bral ba'i spyod tshul rab gsal 'gyur// de skad smra ba'i dga' bo dag/ rim gyis dgra bcom gnas thob pa// yongs su
70b4(skyes rabs): myang 'das dag pa dag/ 'grub par bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs// dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dog gis// 'bras bu dga' bos thob gyur ces// dge slong rnams kyis mngon phyogs dris// rgyal bas de la
70b5(skyes rabs): bka' stsal pa// skye ba gzhan bsgrubs bsod nams kyis// legs byas goms par byas gyur pas// dga' bos dge ba'i rtsa ba yas// 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa thob// dri med yongs pa'i rigasu
70b6(skyes rabs): skyes shing dran pa'i gzugs brnyan lta bu'i lus// dpal 'byor skye bo bde ba'i grogs mo spyod tshul dam pa rtag tu dga'// sems ni rab tu zhi ba'i chus bkrus rang bzhin lugs kyi 'gros ldan 'di// skyes
71a1(skyes rabs): rgyu rnams kyi dge ba'i me tog dag gis 'bras bu rgyar 'khrungs yin// u ru dzA ldan grong khyer du// sngon ches bdag a ruNA sa// dgra bcom yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas//
71a2(skyes rabs): rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten ni// nor bu'i rang bzhin byed pa la// byams ldan zhes pa bram ze'i bu// bsod nams chen po'i bgo skal gyi// skal ldan byed po nyid du gyur// de nyid kyis ni dge slong
71a3(skyes rabs): gi/ dge 'dun bsro khung sbyin khrus byas// de yi bsod nams smon lam gyis// khyim bdag gi ni rigs su skyes// bsod nams ngang tshul de ni sngon// rang sangs rgyas kyi nye gnas gyur// mdzes ldan phreng
71a4(skyes rabs): bas mngon brgyan pa'i// rab 'bor mchod rten dag kyang byas// de yi bsod nams smon lam gyis// de ni logs skyes zhes bya ba// ka sha'i bdag po kri ki'i bu// gsal ba'i mtshan gyis mtshan par gyur/
71a5(skyes rabs): dgra bcom yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od srungs mya ngon 'das pa'i mthar// mchod rten rin chen bdun rang bzhin// ka shi'i sa yi bdag pos byas// de yi bu ni legs skyes kyis// 'od gsal gser
71a6(skyes rabs): gyi gdugs dag btsugs// dga' bo de yi smon lam gyis// da lta shAkya'i rigs su skyes// de ltar sngon skye'i rim pas thob pa legs byas kyis bslang ba'i// gang yang yangs pa'i bsod nams kho nas dri med
71b1(skyes rabs): rigs dang ni// yid 'ong gzugs dang longs spyod mchog dang zhi ba yongs 'dris mthar// dam pa'i gnas su legs par 'gro ba dag kyang dga' bos thob// dga' bo dge bar mdzad pa la// de skad gsungs
71b2(skyes rabs): nasu bcom ldan gyis// dge slong gi ni dge 'dun la// legs byas de de bstan pa mdzad// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las
71b3(skyes rabs): mdzes dga' bo'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bcu gcig po'o// // gong na med pa'i gnas su dr-i med blo// dri ma dang bral dge ba'i skas la 'dzeg/ blo gros dri ma can ni
71b4(skyes rabs): dmyal ba'i khung // 'jigs rung mun pa 'thibs pa dag tu ltung // shAkya rnams kyi grong khyer sngon// ser skya'i gzhi ni rab rgyas par// shAkya'i gtso bo chen po yi// 'bangs kyi bu mo bzhin bzang ma// bstan
71b5(skyes rabs): bac+doMs dag la ngal ba byas// sgyu rtul kun la mkhas dang ldan// yon tan rigs ldan phreng can ma// zhes pa 'dod pa'i phreng ba bzhin// skyed tshal mchog nA rje bo yi// tshig gis me tog 'bru brtson pa/
71b6(skyes rabs): de yi mdun du bde gshegs ni// 'chag cing yang dag 'ong ba mthong // de mthong nyid na de yi yid// rab tu dang ba dag tu gyur// ston ko'i dus ni dri med kyis// yid ni rab tu dang pa bzhin// de mthong
72a1(skyes rabs): bas bsgrubs dga' ba dag/ gnas par byas pa nges bsams pa// bdag gi bsod snyoms legs byas kyis// bcom ldan len par gyur na zhes// snying rje rgyas pa'i kun mkhyen gyis/
72a2(skyes rabs): de yi brnag pu kun mkhyen nas// lhu nga bzed bstun bcos bcom ldan gyis// bzang po byin zhes de la gsungs// re ba yongasu rdzogs pa des// de la phyag byas phul nas ni// 'bangs mo'i sdug bsngal bzlog
72a3(skyes rabs): pa'i slad// smon lam dag ni byas par gyur// de nas de yi pha yi gron// gnyis skyes na ma zhig 'ongs pa yis// mtshan ma ldan pa'i phyogs mthong nas// yo mtshon gyur pas de la smras// kye ma dpal ldan khyim bdag
72a4(skyes rabs): de'i// bu mo gnyer dang bral gyur cing // nor dang longs spyod spangs nasA ni// bu mo khyod ni 'bangs mor gyur// kye ma gti mug sprin dag gis// brtsams pas skad cig gsal ba'i glog/ 'khor ba sbrul gyi lce
72a5(skyes rabs): dag gi/ rol pa bzhin du dpal 'byor g.yo// dge ma dogs pa ma byed cig/ ngas shos lag pa'i mtshan nyid kyis// ring po min pa nyid na khyod// sa yi bdag po'i dga' mar gyur// khyod kyi lag pa de pal mo
72a6(skyes rabs): y-i// bad ltar mnyen la phreng ba dang // 'khor lo lcags kyu'i dbyibs 'di mthong // de skang brjod nas gnyis skyes song // de nas yid srubs longs spyod grogs// sbrang rtsi 'thung ba rnams kyo gnyen// skal bzang 'a
72b1(skyes rabs): shing 'khyud byed pa// legs ldan dpyid ni mthong bar 'gyur// mdzes mA'i nga rgyal gnyis 'thung dgra/ dpyid ni ral pa ldan pa dag/ glal bar byed pa'i lce bzhin du// mya ngan med pa'i dog pa mdzes// gzhon nu'i
72b2(skyes rabs): 'gram pa mdzes pa yi// rkun po tsam ka yi tshogs// mig bzangs ma yi skra zhags la// bcing bar 'os pa nyid du gyur// dpyid kyis a mra'i me tog gis// khyod dang bral rnams pha rol bsgral// mthu ldan rnam
72b3(skyes rabs): par ma thul ba// gzhan dge 'joms la bltos pa med// sbrang rtsi 'thungs pas a mra yis// 'khri shing mchog tu dpyad byar gyur// yid 'ong longs spyod mkhas rnams kyis// 'phral nyid dpyad par bya ba bzhin//
72b4(skyes rabs): a mra'i 'khri shing gzhu la mnga'// bkod pa a mra'i mtshon dang ldan// rgyal gyur cig ces bdag dregs la// slongs mau pa bzhin khu byug sgrogs// skabs 'dir ko sa la yi dbang // dpal dang ldan pa gsal ni rgyal
72b5(skyes rabs): ni// ri dwags 'dod du song ba dag/ rta yis khyer nas yul der 'ongs// gzhu ldan yid 'ong rnam pa can// rta lngas babs par gyur pa des// mdzes mya dga' ma gzhan pa bzhin// gnan ma kha pa men 'ag las ya mtshan la/
72b6(skyes rabs): yid byung rab tu zhugs gyur te// bdag nyid chen po de yi yid// de la lta 'dod rnam par rgyas// 'phral la 'jigs par rab gyur cing // ngo tshas gdong btud de mthong nas// mdzes pa'i rlabs kyis phrogs pa yis//
73a1(skyes rabs): mI yi bdag pos bsam par gyur// gang gi mdzes pas nyin mtshan du// mig gi 'dab brgya rnam rgyas byed// gzhon nu zla bzhin sngo bsangs ma// mig 'bras g.yo ldan
73a2(skyes rabs): mA 'di su// bA Da la chu b+hA ku lA'i// dri bzang la ni bud ba bzhin// 'di yi bzhin la me tog mtshon// dpyid dang mdzes pa mthong bar gyur// kye ma mdzes sdug mi dman zhing // lang tsho rnam par rgyas
73a3(skyes rabs): pa'i lus// brten ldan bdag gi'ang brtan pa ni// gang gis brkus pa bzhin du dogs// kye ma sbrang rtsi'i dogs pa dag/ rmad byung yon tan rtsom pas kyang // rkang drug pas kyang rkang las rkang // gang gis
73a4(skyes rabs): 'gro bar ma nus so// de ltar bsams naswa sa sbyong gis// de mthong nags kyi lha ru shes// de yis rim gyis bshad pa yis// de yi spyod tshul rnam par rig/ de rjes der ni gus byas te// de yis yal
73a5(skyes rabs): 'dab rlung yab dang // gtsang zhing bsil ba'i chu yis kyang // mi bdag bde ba thob par gyur// de yi zhabs kyi pad+ma dag/ de yis mnyes shing log pa yi// chu skyes reg pas ngal ba de// 'phral la gnyid dag
73a6(skyes rabs): thob par gyur// de nas skad cig gis rab sang // ri dwags bdas pa'i ngal ba bsos// da ni lha yis reg pa yis// dga' ma gzugs can gyur pa shes// de nas shAkya chen pos kyang // ko sa la dbang 'ongs pa
73b1(skyes rabs): dag/ thos nas de la mngon phyogs te// mchod par 'os pa de la mchod// gus bcas blangs pa'i phreng can ma// 'dod pa'i bkra shis me tog phyeng // de yis rang gi bu mo bzhin// rin chen mdzes pa de la
73b2(skyes rabs): byin+da// 'dzum dkar yid las skyes pa yi// ba dan dre ni blangs byas na// sa yi bdag po glang po la// zhon nus rang gi glong khyer song // lan bu glang po ri bo'i steng de na// lan bu g.yo ba'i bung ba can// rgyal po
73b3(skyes rabs): dpying dang 'grogs pa yis// go sar pa phreng can ma de mdzes// mdzes ma de dang lhan cig tu// rgyal po'i pho brang phyin nas de// rin chen ba gam 'od zer can// yid 'ong khyang par rnam par rol// rgyal
73b4(skyes rabs): po'i btsun mo sngon ma ni// lha mo dbyar gyi rnam par mi// spyod tshul tha dad nyid min sems// rgyal po'i dpal mo sa gzhi bzhin// de ni de yi reg pas dang // de yang de yi gzugs bzang gis// phan
73b5(skyes rabs): tshun yon tan phul byung bas// mchog tu ya mtshan ldan par gyur// sngon ma lha yi gzugs ldan dang // phyin ma lha yi reg ldan nges// ngo mtshar ldan pa de dag gtam// 'jig rten dag tu rab tu grags/
73b6(skyes rabs): par der de dag lha yi ni// gzugs dang yang dag reg pa'i rgyu// gnasu dge slong rnams kyis dris// bcom ldan rgyal bas rab tu gsungs// sngon tshe thos mchog ces bya ba// gnyis skyes khyim par gyur pa
74a1(skyes rabs): yi// chung ma mdza' mo mdzes ma dang // shi ri sha ka zhes par gyur// de nas nam zhig mdzes ma yi// ming po rlab byung khud kyis ni// nyi tshe'i sadus rgyas nyid gyur pa// srid
74a2(skyes rabs): mo'i khang par 'ongs par gyur// badrag po'i bka' yis de yis dri// zla ba gsum gyi rim gro yis// gus pas mgron du gnyer te gnas// de yi chun ma yis kyang mchod// mdzes 'jam lo ngas spyod dag
74a3(skyes rabs): gis de// de dag gis mchod skye ba ni// da lta lha yi gzugs mdzes dang // reg pa yang dag ldan par skyes// drang por 'dul ba dag dang rab ldan phun sum tshogs pa'i go bzung rmos byas shing // da ka'
74a4(skyes rabs): thub dag gis rab gdungs lus kyi zhing bzang shin tu gshin par gyur pA la// gang gis dus su dge ba'i sa bon rigs btA de nI sbyin cing rab 'bar ba'o// 'bras bu phun tshogs mchog tu dam pa'i las
74a5(skyes rabs): la chags pa'i blo bzang rnams kyis spyod// de skad thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung // bden pa dge slong rnams kyis thos// de de bzhin zhes nges byas nas// zhi ba la ni bston par gyur// de nas dus kyis sa
74a6(skyes rabs): bdag gis// sras ni phreng can ma'i gyur// 'phags skyes pa zhes bya ba ni// rig dang sgyu rgyal rab sbyangs pa'o// de yi mdun na 'don gyi bu// ma yi sdug bsngal gyis bcas thos// ma la gnod ces
74b1(skyes rabs): rnam grags pa// na tshod mtshungs pa'i mdzu' bor sgyur// nam+b+ha zhig de dang lhan cig tu// 'phags skyes pa ni rtu la zhon// rtswa zhang sngon la song ba dag/ shUn+d+ha glang gi spyod chal phyin// 'di ni des b+hA
74b2(skyes rabs): 'bangs mo yI// bu zhes dregs pa rab smra ba'i// shAkya rnams kyis mtshon bzung nas// der ni de la mtho 'tsham byas// rang gi grong khyer song nas des// de yi kho na lan bsam par gyur// rigs kyi dregs
74b3(skyes rabs): pas smad pa ni// lus can zug rngu lcags kyu yin// de la lan bya'i bsam pa yis// yid ni nges par bsregs po de// yab ni mtsho yang rgyal srid la// mchog tu 'dod pa skyes par gyur// de yi ring spyod
74b4(skyes rabs): la sogs pa'i// blon po brgya phrag lnga dag ni// pha las bcad nas dbye ba yis// rigs pa rnams kyis rang dbang byas// de nas nam zhig sa yi bdag/ gsal rgyal rnam rig yang drudrag skyes// chos kyi gad mos
74b5(skyes rabs): ngag mnyan pa la// gus pa mchog 'phel legs bsdams pa// ring spyod kyis ni rta bzung ba'i// shing rta dgra l-i zhon nas ni// thams cad mkhyen pa bcom ldan 'das// blta ba'i slad du song bar gyur// btso
74b6(skyes rabs): ldan 'das kyi gnas phyin ste// zhabs la mngon par phyag 'tshal nas/ de yi drin gyis dang ba'i blos// chos kyi rjes 'gro de yis thos// mgyogs pa nyid du ring spyod kyang // shing rtas grong khyer myur song nas/
75a1(skyes rabs): skabs der rgyal po'i bu dag ni// mngon par dbang ni bskur bar byas// de nas bcom ldan la zhus nas// mi yi bdag po 'gro brtson nas// mdun du rjes 'byung mthong ma yin//
75a2(skyes rabs): shing rta mA yi blon po 'ang min// rkang pa nyid kyis sa bdag de// dal bus rab tu 'gro ba yi sa// dbyar gyi rnam pa phreng can mar// bcas pa ring nas 'ong ba mthong // 'phags skyes po ni dbang bskur ba/
75a3(skyes rabs): de dris de yi tshig gis shes// bu yi dpal 'byor yongs spyad slad// phreng can ma ni de yis btang // de yis dbyar gyi rnam pa bzung // grogs po sa yi bdag po dag/ ma skyes dag yis nga khyer ni//
75a4(skyes rabs): rgyal po'i khab ces brjod par phyin// gdugs dang bral bas de gdung zhing // bkres skom ngal ba dang ldan pa// rnga yab rlung dag ring po yis// shugs ni stong pa bzhin du gyur// 'jigs med bde ba su yis
75a5(skyes rabs): thob// tshe yi ni su yi dbang du gyur// su ya phun sum tshogs pa ni// myur ba rjes su nyams ma mthong // de yis las kyi rtsa ba bzhin// ring ba'i la phug rnying pa zos// chu yang 'gyur byed 'thungs pa yis//
75a6(skyes rabs): gnod pa kun gyi tshogs gyur pa// lus kyi thabs la sred pa yis// mi rtag pa nyid mi shes par// rmongs pa'i slad du skye bo 'bad// ma zhu'i nad kyis thebs nas 'gyel// ma skyes dgra yis ko sa la'i// dbang
75b1(skyes rabs): po 'ongs pa thos gyur nas// song bas rdul gyis kha gang bzhin// srog dang bral ba de mthong gyur// btsun mo rjes su zhugs pa de'i// lus ni legs par bya ba byas// sdug bsngal zhi ba'i slad du de// bcom
75b2(skyes rabs): ldan bde gshegs lta ru song // de yis de la btud nas smras// bcom ldan ko sa la yi dbang // grogs po bdag gi grong khyer du// 'ongs nas nor med gum par gyur// gang gis grogs la phan pa dag/ byas
75b3(skyes rabs): pa min pa'i dpal 'byor 'di// bdag dang phun tshogs smad cing sdig/ rmongs las grags pa min pa'i gnas// rgud tshe snying la re ba dag/ rnam par bkod nas grogs thob pa'i// grogs po 'bras med nyid gyur te//
75b4(skyes rabs): gang zhig 'tsho ba de yis ci// grogs la phan pa'i dpal dang ni// phongs la phan pa'i nor dag dang // 'jigs la phan pa'i srog gang yin// de dag 'tsho ba legs pa yin// bcom ldan skye ba snga ma la// de yis
75b5(skyes rabs): las ngan ci zhig bgyis// gang zhig smin nas mjug tu ni// des kyang gnas skabs ngan pa thob// sa bdag mig ni mchi ma dang // bcas pas 'di dris bcom ldan gyis// gdung bzhi byed tshems kyi ni// zla
75b6(skyes rabs): 'od spro zhing der bka' stsal// sa skyong mya ngan ma byed 'di// srid par gnas pa'i rang bzhin no// rnam pa 'di ltar dngos po ni// bden pa min rnams mi rtag nyid// 'khor ba'i nags nang rnam par yangs pa 'dir// /
76a1(skyes rabs): rang bzhin gyis g.yo dus kyi bung ba dag/ rang dgrar 'bab pas 'gro srog gi me tog gi/ ge sar tshogs la khyam zas byed pa nyid// longs spyod dba' rlabs dag dang mtshungs
76a2(skyes rabs): shing ri dwags 'jigs pa'i mig ltar g.yo// dpal 'byor skad cig mtshon bya skye bo'i chu gter rnam par gsal ba'i glog/ lus kyi pad+ma lang tsho gsar po'i nyi 'od gzhon nu dmar ba g.yo// srog gi thigs
76a3(skyes rabs): pa srid pa'i mya ngan thang la myur du 'jig par 'gyur// yid ni byams pa'i snod gyur gzhan la phan pas dgyes shing chos kyi nor// rgyags pa'i tshogs rnams rab gcod bzod zhi rnam par spyod la yongasu 'dris//
76a4(skyes rabs): 'di ni yul gyi bde las phyir phyogs bde ldan de nyid tshol rnams kyi// snying po med pa'i 'khor bar rnam 'gyur dag dang bral ba'i yo byad yin// rdo yis myur du bcom pa bzhin// skye bo sdug la mya ngan byed// phongs
76a5(skyes rabs): bya drag po de zlog pa'i// bya ba slar yang mi byed do// srid pa'i phas dub mthong gyur kyang // rnam kun dben pa med pa yi// skye bo 'di dag rmongs pa las// mi dge 'dod par byed pa ci// bram ze rab bde zhes pas
76a6(skyes rabs): sngon// 'ga' zhig las rnyed la phug dag/ me yi lag tu bzhag nas ni// khrus la rlung gi ngog su song // skabs der yang dag 'ongs pa yi// phyag na lhung bzed rang sangs rgyas// de nyid mngon par bzhed gyur
76b1(skyes rabs): pa// des kyang rab tu btung nas byin// de nas de yi bu bkres nas// rings par khrus byas yang dag 'ongs// zas ni rtsom par byed pa'i tshe// ma la rang gis la phug blangs// bdag gis mgron la de byin bu//
76b2(skyes rabs): dge la rje su yi rang byos// de skad ma yi tshig thos nas// de ni mda' yis phug bzhin gyur// mgron khyod 'phral la ma zhu bas// gzir cing skra ni phug gyur pas// mi chung bdag gi la phug dag/ srog dang ldan cig/
76b3(skyes rabs): phyir 'byung shog/ de skad sdig pa thob pa de'i// shin tu rtsub pa'i tshig de yis// mjug tu ma zhu'i nad nyid ni// skye ba gzhan pa rnams su gyur// de nyid da lta gsal rgyal te// snga ma'i bsod nams gzhan smin pas//
76b4(skyes rabs): rgyal srid yangs pa thob gyur nas// mjug tu de nyid kyis zhig gyur// 'khor ba'i lam gyi mgron po lnga// dge dang mi dge'i las kho na// longs spyod slad du nyer bsgrubs pa'i// lam rgyags bzhin du lag na gnas/
76b5(skyes rabs): de skad bcom ldan de yi gsungs// thams cad bde ba thos nas ni// de de bzhin zhes sems byed cing // der phyag 'tshal nas mi bdag song // skabs 'dir rgyal srid thob pa yi// 'phags skyes po ni shAkya'i
76b6(skyes rabs): 'khon// mdun na 'don gyi bu song nas// smras pas de dag brlag brtson pa// glang po shing rta rta rdul gyis// rmongs pas blo bzhin phyogs rnams ni// rnam dbye med pa nyid byed cing // shAkya'i grong du rab tu
77a1(skyes rabs): song // de yi spyod tshul ma rungs te// bcom ldan kun mkhyen gyis mkhyen nas// shAkya'i grong dang nye bar ni// gshegs nas shing skam 'og tu bzhugs// ring nas
77a2(skyes rabs): de nas bzhugs pa de// 'phags skyes po ni 'ongs pas mthong // shing rta la babs mdun du ni// mngon phyogs rab tu btung nas smras// 'dab ma snum pa'i yal ga can// grib ma stug rnams yod pa la/
77a3(skyes rabs): de rA ni bcom ldan mi bzhugs paro// shing rkam 'og tu ci zhig mdzad// sa skyong gis ni 'di brjod che// bcom ldan rgyal bas der bka' stsal// mi bdag gnyen gyi grib ma ni// can pas kyang shin tu
77a4(skyes rabs): bsil// gnyen dang mtshungs pa'i nor rdzas med// gnyen dang mtshungs pa'i dgo' ba med// gnyen dang mtshungs pa'i mdzes pa med// gnyen dang mtshungs pa'i mdza' bo med// sa bdag shAkya 'di dag
77a5(skyes rabs): gnyen// de la dga' bas de dag gis// grong 'gram 'dab ma bsgom pa yi// rkang 'thung 'di la dga' ba skyes// de dag thos nas bcom ldan 'das// shAkya'i phyogs su lhung bar ni// rig nas khro dang/
77a6(skyes rabs): bral ba yis// 'phags skyes po ni log par gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang // shAkyar 'jigs pa 'byung mkhyen nas// sems dpa' dag pa rnams dag la// dge legs slad du chos bstan
77b1(skyes rabs): mdzad// kha cig gis ni rgyun zhugs 'bras// gzhan gyi lan cig phyir 'ong dang // phyir mi 'ong 'bras gzhan gyis ni// de yi bka' yis yang dag thob// lhag ma blo gros blun po yis// shAkyas gnas de ma thob ste//
77b2(skyes rabs): gang zhig nyin par rab rig dag/ 'byung ba'i bya ni 'ga' zhig yod// de nas mi bdag log pa yis// khon gyi sbrul dag nyal ba dag/ mdun na 'don gyi bu yis ni// rab tu sad pa rnam par bsgrubs// de yis bskul
77b3(skyes rabs): bas shAkya'i rigs// gzhom pa'i blo gros de yis byas// khon gyi me ni rab 'bar bar// phra ma yi ni rlung gis byed// 'jigs rung skye bo ngan pa yis// sngags kyis 'phral bslang mi bsrun pa'i// ro langs dang ni sa sbyong
77b4(skyes rabs): su yi dmag dpung srog ni 'phrog byed min// de nas de yi dmag dpung ni// glang po shing rta'i mchog rab bkrigs// lam bkag shAkya rnams kyis ni// grong khyer yang dag 'khrugs par gyur// der ni bcom ldan
77b5(skyes rabs): 'das kyis kyang / shA bsrung slad phyogs lhung zhing // yang dag brtson pa mo d+gal// chen po dag la bka' stsal pa// shAkya rnams kyi las kyi skyon// rnam kun nas 'di nye bar gnas// de la bsrung ba sgrub byed pa/
77b6(skyes rabs): nam mkha' la ni 'grong ste brtsegs// skyes bu rnams kyi bsam yas 'byor pa dag dang mi dge dag/ 'od dang rab tu 'gro yang yud tsam rang dbang med pa ni// las kyi yi ge rang gi skye ba'i gnas la ring lag gos// bkod
78a1(skyes rabs): pa dag ni nges par don med can du gyur pa min// de skad bcom ldan gsung gis ni// de la phyag 'tshal der phyin te// 'phags skyes po ni nyer lhags pas// shAkya rnams kyi bgro ba byas//
78a2(skyes rabs): srog dang ldan tsam su la yang // 'u cag 'tshe ba mi bya'o// dgra yis rab tu 'phangs pa'i mda'// 'u cag lus la 'dzugasuM bas// de dag de ltar gros bzung ste// khro bas lag na mdung dang ni// gzhu ni rab tu brdungs
78a3(skyes rabs): byas nas// pha rol 'jug la brtan pas gnas// skabs der don gyi sbyor ba las// rang gi yul na mi gnas pa/ shAshaM bA ka yis gros// mi shes par ni yang dag 'ongs// de yi sa bdag go bgos pas// grong
78a4(skyes rabs): khyer bsdams pa mthong nas ni// khros te gcig pus g.yul du phyin// de yi dpa' rnams brlag par byas// g.yul du skyes bu seng ge yis// dpa' bo glang po de dag bsad// mu tig gis bzhin grags pa yis/
78a5(skyes rabs): dga' bar bya ba nyid du gyur// gzhan la khros par gyur pa de'o// ral gri de ni ci yang 'bar// rang gi rab tu gdungs pas de// dgra yi chu bo yangs par song // 'phags skyes po ni spro ba nyams// pham nas rang gi/
78a6(skyes rabs): grong khyer song // dgra ni bsad pas shaM bA ka/ shAkyas nang du 'jug ma ster// sdig las kyis de de dag gis// nang mi yin yang yongasu btang // dam pa chos kyi gnyen ldan rnams// rang gi'ang ma rungs la phyir
78b1(skyes rabs): phyogs// dam pa chos nyid rtag pa rnams// nor rdzas pas kyang gtong phod dang // nang mi bas kyang legs byas dang // tshe srog pas kyang grags pa dga'// de dag gis ni bskrad pa de// mthar gyis bcom ldan drung du
78b2(skyes rabs): phyin// de la dge legs slad nyid du// rang gi mtshan ma cung zad blangs// bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis// rang gi dbu skra sen cha byin// de yis blangs nas da hU De// zhes pa'i dkyil 'khor dag tu song //
78b3(skyes rabs): dor ni shes rab mthu dag dang // rtul phod spro ba yon tan gyis// de yi rgyal srid thob ste dpal// blo ldan rnams la kun tu mod// dpal 'byor drung po'i mtshan nyid do// grags pa mkhas pa'i lhan skyes
78b4(skyes rabs): yin// grub pa thams cad chung ma ni// rtag 'grus ldan pa rnams kyi yin// de nas der ni der gnas te// bcom ldan dbu skra sen cha la// rin chen mchog gis rab mdzes pa'i// mchod rten rab tu gnas
78b5(skyes rabs): bar byas// 'phags skyes po'i nga khon gyis ni// pha rol bsgral 'dod slad nas yang // sgo dbye'i rigs pas 'phral nyid la// shUkya'i rnams kyi grong du zhugs// der ni shAkya stong phrag dag/ bdun cu rtsa bdun rab
78b6(skyes rabs): tu bsod// de nas bu mo gzhon nu rnams// stong phrag de yis bcings nas khyer// shAkya brgya phrag lnga rnams ni// lcags dang glang po'i 'joms byed kyis// rab tu bcom nas grong khyer ni// mthar byed grong khyer bzhin
79a1(skyes rabs): du byas// bcom ldan gyis kyang shAkya rnams// dgra rnams kyis ni brlag byas pa// l+la kyi rjes su bcings mkhyen nas// skad cig thugs ni byung bar mdzad// snying rje rgyas pa'i dge slong
79a2(skyes rabs): rnams// de la mngon du phyogs te dris// shAkya'i rnams kyis las ci bsgrubs// 'jigs rung gang gis 'bras 'di 'dra// de skad des dris bcom ldan rnams// thams cad mkhyen pas der bka' stsal// rang gi/
79a3(skyes rabs): las kyi rnam smin gyis// shAkya rnams ni brlag pa nyid// nya ba rnams kyi chu nang na// sngon tshe nya chen gnyis shig drangs// nya na rtag tu rab bcad pa'i// gdung ba chen po dag gis bsad// dus kyi skye ba gzhan la
79a4(skyes rabs): ni// de rnamasna chom rkun nyid gyur pa// nor ni 'phrog pas de dag nyid// chom rkun du gyur bsregs nas bsad// nya de dag dang khyim bdag de// 'phags skyes pa dang mdun na mngon// nya pa dang ni chom rkun pa'i/
79a5(skyes rabs): shAkya rnams kyis bsad par gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di thos nas// dge slong rnams kyis las rnams kyi// 'bras bu'i rgyu ni bslu ba dag/ med pa nyid du nges par gyur// de nas rgyal bas ngan rgyags pa'i//
79a6(skyes rabs): 'phags skyes po ni rang grong song // bu ni rgyal byed ces bya ba// byis pa rtse bas mdza' la smras// lhan cig shAkya ci la gsod// des ni yul la gnod ma bgyis// de skad brjod pa'i rang gi bu// 'phags skyes po
79b1(skyes rabs): yis bsad par gyur// myos thob gnod pa goms pa las// glang po bzhin du skye bo ngan// nges par sdang dang nyes pa dang // 'joms pa nyid du cis mi byed// rang gi dpung pa lta byed cing // 'dun sar 'dug
79b2(skyes rabs): nas des smras pa// kye ma bdag gi gzi brjid mer// dgra rnams phye ma leb ltar spyod// bdag gi dpung sgyum 'di gnyis ni// mthar byed rta babs ka ba ste/ shAkya rnams ni ma lus pa// gsod pa gdams
79b3(skyes rabs): byed bla mar gyur// de yi rtsal la bsngags pa de// shAkya'i bu mo gzung ba des// thos nas yid byung drag po yis// gdong pa btud nas rab smras pa// las kyi zhags pas bcings pa yis// lus can rnams
79b4(skyes rabs): la bya bzhin du// 'chi ba bsgom pa'i nus pa dag/ gshog pa ldan yang yod ma yin// gang gis ma ni zhi bar byed pa'i rgyu de dag ni rta gdong gis zla lo// 'bad rtsol chung ngus za ba'i mun pas dus su tsha zer ldan pa
79b5(skyes rabs): 'dzin par byed// yongs su blta ba'i lam gyi yul min ngo mtshar dang bcas spyod pa drag gi gnas// las dang ljon pa'i rgyud kyis bsdams pa 'di kun su yis su yi bya bar bzod// de dag thos nas mi yi bdag
79b6(skyes rabs): rkang pas bcom pa'i ltos 'gro bzhin// 'jigs rung khro ba'i dug rgyas nas// 'di yi lag pa chod ces bskos// gang gi 'gram du de yi ni// lag pa gcod pa'i sdig las byas// rdzing bu lag pa'i snying po zhes/
80a1(skyes rabs): da lta yang ni s+ya la grags// 'khri shing la yang khyi snying me// bad ldan la'ang sog le'i so// phreng ba la yang rdo rje'i char// brtse med 'bebs su 'jug pa nyid// lag pa'i pad+ma
80a2(skyes rabs): bcad de rnams// der ni gdung ba drag pos gzir// bcom ldan skyabs 'os blo yis ni// bsgoms nas skyabasu song bar 'gyur// de dag gnad bsnun gdung ba ni// drag po kun mkhyen gyis mkhyen nas//
80a3(skyes rabs): de dag yang dag dbug 'byin par// 'os pa bde sogs lha mor bas mos// de yis reg pas lag par skyes// de yi lha yi gos kyis g.yogs// de dag sems ni rab dang bas// lus btang mtho ris song
80a4(skyes rabs): bar gyur// lha bad ut+pal gyis mtshan lus// lha yi bu mo nyid thob nas// ston pas chos ni bstan pa yis// de dag yangs pa'i gnas su song // dge slong gis dris bcom ldan gyis// de dag las
80a5(skyes rabs): 'bras mngon par gsungs// 'di dag lag pa g.yo bzhin du// dge slong dag la mtho 'tsham byas// de yi las kyi rnam smin gyis// mi 'dod par ni rab tu ltung // nga la sems ni dad pa yis// 'di dag
80a6(skyes rabs): dge ba'i 'gro ba thob// las 'bras smin pa rnam bkra nyid// de skad brjod nas bcom ldan gyiso// de yi zhar la dge slong dag/ rnams la chos ni bstan pa mdzod// skabs 'dir rgyal pos btang ba yis/
80b1(skyes rabs): gsang nas spyod pa'i nyan rna yis// bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod shes nas// 'phags skyes po dang nye bar song // des smras lha cig dge slong rnams// mdun du de yis 'di skad gsungs// sa bdag de yi
80b2(skyes rabs): rang las kyi// 'bras bu ny+dza bar bdag gis mthong // blon po 'dun na 'don bcas te// zhog bdun na ni mes tshig nas// dmyal ba mnar med ces bya ba// bzod dka' dag tu ltung bar 'gyur// de skad
80b3(skyes rabs): de yis tshig thos nas// mi bdag mdun na 'don dang bcas// chu yis khrul 'khor khang nang du// zhag bdun 'bad pas gnas par byas// zhag bdun mjug na skad cig la// pho brang 'khor du song ba
80b4(skyes rabs): des// me shel nyi ma'i 'od dag gi/ sbyor bas me ni rab tu 'bar// 'jig pa'i rlung gis gtsubs pa lta bur rab tu 'bar ba rtse mo can// rdegs ces sgrogs pas de ni myur bar nges bsregs dmyal ba'i me
80b5(skyes rabs): tog thob// 'jig can rnams la 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan du'ang phyogs kun 'bar bas khengs// bsod nams rten la thams cad kho nar bsten zhing gdung ba'i sa gzhi bsil// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang
80b6(skyes rabs): pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// 'phags skyes po'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // dam pa
81a1(skyes rabs): bdud rtsi rlan pa'i zhal dang ri bong can zhes zer dag/ sdug bsngal zhi byed bde ba phun sum tshogs pa sbyin par byed// skye bo rnams ni yang dag 'tsho byed rab rib 'phrog par byed// dam
81a2(skyes rabs): pa'i yid kyi mtsho ni rnam par rgyas shing dgod par byed// grong khyer rgyal po'i khab ces pa// sa yi snying po gzugs can snying // mtha' dag sa bdag snying po ni// sa yi brgya byin byung bar gyur// gang gi dpung pa
81a3(skyes rabs): yi rten// sems ni bzod pa'i rten dag la// khur ni bkod pa'i skye bo rnams// bsam pa mtha' dag phyi rol gyur// gang gi gtong dang rtul phod kyis// re phyogs yong su rdzogs byed cing // lag pa rin chen tshogs
81a4(skyes rabs): la yengs// ral gri 'dzin la dam par gyur// nam zhag de yis grong khyer du// nye bar 'tshe ba lci ba byung // mi bsrun gsar du mngon dar bas// kun tu dregs skyes bzhin du 'khrugs// skye bo'i bsam pa'i skabs phye
81a5(skyes rabs): ste// 'dun sar yang dag zhugs pa ni// skye dgu'i pha ltar gyur de la// grong khyer ba yi skye bo'i zhus// lha cig lha yi mthu ldan pa// khyod kyi bka' yis dul ba yi// skya bo rtag tu rgya ljon 'di// lugs las
81a6(skyes rabs): rab tu mi 'da'o// dam pa'i lam nas rang bzhin gyis// rab zhugs skye bo 'di dag la// nye bor 'tshe bar rab rgyas 'di// glo bur dag tu gang nas 'ongs// rang gi chos la zhugs dga' ba'i// las dang rgyal po bzang
81b1(skyes rabs): pos kyang // sbas par gyur pa'i mi rnams ni// rgud pa dag tu ltung ba min// bdag cag rnams kyi khyim khyim du// s+t+waM ma btsas pa'i bu tsha rnams// bya ba legs pa'i 'bras bu dag/ ma bsdams pa las bzhin du
81b2(skyes rabs): 'phrog/ de ci mi shes 'byung po 'am// yang na shin tu che ba'i rgyu// gang gi mthu yis rigs dag ni// bu rgyud bral ba nyid du byed// de dag tshig nges sa bdag la// de yi gdung ba 'phongs par gyur// dam pa'i
81b3(skyes rabs): nang du pha rol gyi// sdug bsngal zhing la chu bzhin 'jug/ yan lag kun la khyab byed pa// skye bo sdug bsngal chen po des// dug gis bzhin du bsgrubs pas de// skad cig snying ni rab 'khyam gyur// des smras
81b4(skyes rabs): dpung pa'i dbang dang ni// skyes bu min par 'dir ci bya// mi mtshon pa de phyir btsos po// ji ltar kho na brtsam par bya// khyod rnams di ring nyi ma gcig/ rang rang gnas su 'gro bar byos// khyod kyi bu tsha 'jigs
81b5(skyes rabs): bsrung ba// brtul zhugs bcas pas nges par bsam// de skad rgyal po'i gsung thos nas// grong pa chen po mgu rnams kyis// mchod pa gsal byed thal mo dag/ yang dag sbyar nas de la smras// lha cig
81b6(skyes rabs): khyod kyis nges 'dzin dang // byams pa rjes su thob pas kyang // khyod la bsam pa rnam bkod pas// bdag cag da ni ngal ba med// khyod kyi bka' drin mi rtsub cing // yid du 'ong bas rab gzigs pa// 'di
82a1(skyes rabs): nyid skye bo 'di dag gi/ 'tsho ba nyid kyi char 'bab bzhin// ci yang khyod kyi gsung 'di dag/ bdud rtsi dag dang mtshungs shing dga'// gdung ba 'phrog byed 'jam zhing mnyen// nges
82a2(skyes rabs): kyi ci dang ci mi bsgrub// mkhas shing byas zhes snying rje'i gter// mthong ba rnyed sla drang por gyur// skye bo legs pa'i jo bo ni// skal pa spyod pa dag gis thob// dam pa'i sems la gnas pa'i dam pa
82a3(skyes rabs): rnams ni yongs 'dris bdud rtsi dag pas kyang // shin tu mnyes gshin tshig ni lnga pa bas kyang mnyan pos ston zla'i 'od tshogs pas// spyod pa'i kun dga'i tshogs gter gzhan pa ci zhig yid ni me tog
82a4(skyes rabs): bas kyang 'jam// skye bo legs pa ha ri tsan pas kyang yongs gdung mchog tu bzlog par byed// ces brjod drin dang ldan de la// phyag 'tshal de yi yon tan ni// yang 'ongs me tog phreng ba dag/ phyogs su
82a5(skyes rabs): 'grems shing grong pa song // rgyal po yis kyang grong khyer du// 'byung po mched pa'i tshi ga'i rim// byas nas zhi dang shis po yis// tshogs kyi nges pa'i brtul zhugs byas// 'phrog ma zhes pa'i gnad
82a6(skyes rabs): sbyin mo// grong khyer gnas pa'i byis pa rnams// 'phrog ces grong khyer lha dag gis// brjod pa de yis thos par gyur// de nas sa bdag blon dang bcas// grong khyer skye bos lhan cig tu// ka lan ta ka'i
82b1(skyes rabs): gnas zhes pa// 'od ma'i tshal gyi gnas bzhugs pa// sdug bsngal rim gyis gdung ba dag/ bsten pa kun gyi mi tsha'i sman// bde bar gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// skyon rnams zhi slang lta ru song // mthong
82b2(skyes rabs): ba dga' de mi bdag gis// ring nas mthong nas phyag 'tshal te// mdun du 'khod nas de la ni// grong khyer ba yi sdug bsngal smras// grong khyer ba yi brgyud dag ni// nyams po mkhyen nas snying rje'i gter// bcom
82b3(skyes rabs): ldan 'das kyang myur bar ni// thugs ni g.yo ba med nyid 'dzin// 'gro ba'i dkyil 'khor mi bdag dang // bcas pas bskul nas 'gro ba'i gnyen// de ni lhung bzed chos gos bzung // gnod sbyin mo yi khang
82b4(skyes rabs): bAr gshegs// de yis dben pa de ya ni// khyim du bcom ldan rgyal bas byon// dga' byed ces pa de yi bu// gcig ni snang ba min par mdzad// bcom ldan gshegs nas gnod sbyin mo// myur bar rang
82b5(skyes rabs): khyim 'ongs pa yis// rab mang bu las dga' ba'i bu// dga' byed dag ni mthong ma gyur// de ni tshol zhing rmongs bcas pas// drus ma be'u stor bya bzhin// 'jig rten dang ni nag sa rnams kyang // rings
82b6(skyes rabs): por rab 'khrul de yis bskor// kyi hud dga' byed kyi hung bu// khyod kyi bzhin ni gar mthong na// zhes pa che bar rab sgrogs shing // de ni ma lus phyogs su song // de yi phyogs kun mgyogs btsal
83a1(skyes rabs): nas// bu ni mthong re med pa yis// mya ngan byed cing ri dadu gling // rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor dag tu song // mi yi sa las 'das nas ni// 'jigs su rung ba'i grong khyer dang // mtho ri swa
83a2(skyes rabs): phyogs ni ma lus pa// gzhal yas khang dang bskyed tshal dang // 'jig rten skyong ba'i grong khyer du// ngal zhing gang du 'ang ngal mi so// phyag ni 'tshal zhing rab song ste// btsal yang bu ni rnyed ma gyur// de nas lus ngan tshig/
83a3(skyes rabs): gis ni// bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas song ste// bcom ldan skyabs su 'os pa la// 'brel bas gzir ba skyabasu song // der ni de yis rab spyod mtha'// nges par bshad pas de gsan nas// cung zad 'dzum gyis dkar
83a4(skyes rabs): ba'i mchus// mya ngan can ma der bka' stsal// 'phrog ma khyod la bu rnams ni// kye ma brgya phrag lnga rnams yod// gcig nyid kho na stor ba la// 'di snyed 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal ci// zhes des bka' stsal sdug bsngal gyis/
83a5(skyes rabs): nyams pa gnod sbyin mos thos smras// bu 'bum yod kyang bcom ldan 'das// bu gcig pu rlag par yod mi bzod// bu las mchog dga' gzhan nu med// bu tshigs dug gis gdung ba ni// de byurlag las gzhan sdug
83a6(skyes rabs): bsngal ci// bu dang ldan pa kho nas shes// rgyu med nges par bsdams pa yis// bu yi dge ba lhan skyes nyid// ma tshang ring dang dri ma can// su yi bu ni zla mi mtshungs// de skad gnod sbyin chung ma'i tshig/ mnyes gshin gyis
83b1(skyes rabs): 'khrugs nas gyur nas// bcom ldan 'byung po la brtse bas// 'dzum bcas de la bka' stsal pa// khyod kyi bu ni mang po las// gal te gcig bral mya ngan 'di// bu gcig rnams kyi bu khyod kyis// phrogs pa'i
83b2(skyes rabs): gdung ba ci zhig 'dra// rtag tu khyim du ma mthong bar// khyod zhugs bud med rnams kyi bu// bu yi mas kyang stag mo yis// rI dwags rnams kyi bu bzhin zos// rang gi lus la glang gang gos// sdug bsngal nyer
83b3(skyes rabs): spyod nyid 'gyur ba// mya ngan nyams myong mtshungs bsdu ni// de ni gzhan la bya ba min// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gyis// bslab pa'i gzhi gsum gal te khyod// 'dzin cing 'tshe las phyir ldog na/
83b4(skyes rabs): dga' ba'i bu de khyod kyis 'thob// de skad bcom ldan gyis bka' stsal// de yis bslab gzhi bzung de nas// 'tshe ba spangs las dga' byed bu// de yis byin nas thob par gyur// de yi skye ba snga ma yi// spyod
83b5(skyes rabs): mtha' las kyi rjes 'gro de// dge slong gis dris bcom ldan gyis// spyod pa'i mtha' de bka' stsal pa// sngon tshe grong khyer 'di nyid du// grong po kha cig longs spyod can// ri dang skyed mos tshal 'gro zhing // gar da
83b6(skyes rabs): rol mos rnam par rtse// de nas lam der ba rdzi yi// mdzes ma su zhig nr-i rgyas shing // ri dwags mig ldan dar ba dag/ khyer nas 'tshong du yang dag 'ongs// rang bzhin gyis ni glang po'i 'gros// mngal khur le lor
84a1(skyes rabs): bgrod ldan pa// de yi dal bus nyer 'grod cing // chags bcas de dag rnams la bltas// nags k+Shi ri dwags ltar mdzes ma// yid 'od ma de'i tshul ni// mngon 'dod ma bsgribs
84a2(skyes rabs): brla nu pa des// de dag rnams kyang sred ldan gyur// 'dod pas myos pa nyid gyur cing // ngang tshul 'phrul la nyams pa dag/ ma rig bag med ma de ni// de dag rnams kyis der dran gnyer// de nas de dag rab
84a3(skyes rabs): song tshe// chags pas dral nas de yi mngal// khros pas dmar por gyur pa bzhin// brtan pa dang ni lhan cig lhung // skabs der de yi bsod nams kyis// lam de nas ni rang sangs rgyas// lus dang
84a4(skyes rabs): sems ni rab dang ba// legs par 'ong ba de yi mthong // dar ba'i rin gyis thob pa yi// a mra lnga brgya de yis ni// ring nas phyag 'tshal rnams btud nas// yid nyid kyis ni de la phul// bsod nams de
84a5(skyes rabs): las gnod sbyin rigs// rdzu 'phrul ldan 'dir da lta skyes// a mra phul bas 'di la bu// lnga brgya dag ni skyes par gyur// ngang tshul brjed nas bdag po dag/ btang bas 'tshe ba ldan gyur sngon// rang sangs rgyas
84a6(skyes rabs): la phyag 'tshalo bas// de yi sa bslab gzhi de ring thob// de skad der ni gnod sbyin mo las rgyud ci yang // rnam mang rnam smin bkra ba dag ni bka' stsal nas// 'jig rten kun gyi legs byas bsam byas ston pa blo yis
84b1(skyes rabs): skye bo rnams kyi srid pa'i mtsho la dge ba'i zam stegs mdzad// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las 'phrog ma'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i
84b2(skyes rabs): yal 'do ba ste bcu gsum pa'o// // gang zhig rtag pa'i lam du 'ong rgyu ba nyid min smad byung rab tu 'phel dang ldan// rmi lam gyis kyang gang dang 'grogs min gang la yongs 'dris
84b3(skyes rabs): sngon chad med pa'i rim// gang la mi rnams tshig ni mi smra nyid dang gang zhig rna ba mig gi mgron// rgyu me de skye bo'i mthu ni 'byor pa tshad kyis gzhal bya min pa de la bstod// grong khyer rgyal po'i khab ces par//
84b4(skyes rabs): sa bdag gzugs can snying po yis// 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs pa yis// rgyal ba mchod pa mthong gyur nas// rmongs pa kun mkhyen nga rgyal can// phrag dog dug gis rab brdungs pas// de yi khyad 'phags
84b5(skyes rabs): ma bzod de// kau shI kas snang ba bzhin// nub mor gyur pa'i rab rib tshogs// dri ma can ni shwar cha nas// 'char bas rtag tu nyin par la// rang nyams bya skad 'gran par byed// grwanag lhas bu dang yang dag
84b6(skyes rabs): rgyal// me pham nog can de bzhin du// rdzogs byed gnyen gyi bu la sogs// rmongs pa zad byed gzhan dag kyang // bdud kyi sgyu mas rmongs byas shing // 'gran 'dod zhe sdang skyon gyis ni// du bas bzhin du
85a1(skyes rabs): mun gtibs pas// mi bdag la mngon phyogs nas smras// nags na 'dug pa'i dge sbyong gang // 'di ni kun mkhyen nga rgyal can// khyod kyis de dang de rnams kyi// rdzu 'phrul
85a2(skyes rabs): mthu ni blta bar byos// rdzu 'phrul mthu las gang cung zad // skye bo mgu bo rab spel ba// ngo mtshar che ba mthong gyur pa// de dag cho 'phrul zhe su brjod// rgyal po bdag cag gam ni de// mdun sar tshe'i phrul
85a3(skyes rabs): ston pa yi// nus pa gang lnga yod gyur de// 'gro ba gsum du mchod 'os 'gyur// zhes pa de dag tshig thos nas// mi bdag de dregs las phyir phyogs// smras pa khyed bsam 'di ci zhig/ 'phye be ri le
85a4(skyes rabs): 'jigs par 'dod// 'di ni rigs min phye ma leb// rnams kyis me la 'gran nam ci// 'di ni smra bar mi bya yang // smra na bdag gi grong las 'byin// rgyal po yon tan shes pa yas// de skad spro zhing
85a5(skyes rabs): bshad pas na// mi srun de dag mkha' lo bzhin// rten med par yang song bar gyur// mi bdag gzugs can snying po 'di// rmongs las phyogasu lhung gyur pas// sa sbyong gzhan can 'gro bya zhes// de dag
85a6(skyes rabs): rnams kyis bsams par gyur// skabs der bcom ldan mnyan yod kyi// grong khyer dang nye rgyal byed tshal// kun dga' ra bar byon par gyur// phyogs de nyid du de dag song // de dag der byin ko sa la'i// sa
85b1(skyes rabs): yi bdag po gsal rgyal la// cho 'phrul rgyang byung 'gran pa ni// de nyid kho na la de la brjod// yon tan khyab shes mi bdag ni// de dag dregs pa gzhom 'dod pas// rdzu 'phrul lta bar spro ba'i skud//
85b2(skyes rabs): bcom ldan 'das kyis drung du song // mngon du phyin te dul ba yis// phyag 'tshal nas ni rab gsol pa// bcom ldan mu stegs rnams ky-i ni// dregs pa zhi bar mdzad par 'os// rdzu 'phrul 'gran
85b3(skyes rabs): ba'i nyer sbyor gyis// khyod kyi mthu ni lta bar 'dod// de dag rang gi yon tan bsngags// bdag can rna ba 'on par byed// ga tso bi dam pa mgu ba yi// rang gi gzi brjid rab gsal mdzod// mu stegs zhes
85b4(skyes rabs): pa ma lus pa'i// mun pa brlag par rab tu mthong // de skad rgyal po'i tshig thos nas// bsam pa chen po rnam 'gyur med// 'gran zheng khro ba dang bral ba// bcom ldan 'das kyis der bka' stsal//
85b5(skyes rabs): rgyal po gzhan dag nyir gzhom dang // rtsod dang rgyags pa'i phyir yang min// rnam dben rgyan du 'os pa yis// yon tan 'di ni gzung bar bya// 'gran pa'i rgyu yis rab bsgrubs gang // pha rol
85b6(skyes rabs): bo sngags 'phrog yon tan ni// phrag dog dag gi dri ma can// rnam dpyad yon tan bral des ci// gang zhig rang gi yon tan gyis// gzhan gyi yon tan sgrib byed pa// bsngags par 'os pa min
86a1(skyes rabs): ba des// rang nyid kho nas chos chung gson// yon tan dam pa yongs brtag nyid// mchog tu skyengs par byed pa yin// gang phyir dag pa srang la ni// gzhal ba'i mtho
86a2(skyes rabs): 'tsham rigs pa min// gang zhig yon tan ldan na yang // gzhan la rab dang nyid mi 'gyur// lag na mar me thogs de de'i// snod kyi grib mas mun par byed// de nyid 'jig rten+da kun mkhyen// bdag
86a3(skyes rabs): gi lhag ma ci zhig rig/ pha rol mngon khengs zil gnon par// rtul ba brtan pas rang zil gnon// de skad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// rab zhi mngon par bzhed thos nas// rgyal pos ngo
86a4(skyes rabs): mtshar bstan pa la// mchog tu mngon par zhu ba byas// de nas tshes kyi bcom ldan gyis// zhal bzhes mdzad pas mi yi bdag/ mgu baMs zhag bdun dus btab ste// rgyal po'i pho brang song bar gyur/
86a5(skyes rabs): skabs der sa yi bdag po yi// ma gcig min pa'i spyan zla zhig/ pho brang 'khor dang nye bA yI// khang bzang gzhi yi lam nas rgyus// las kyi rlung gis bskyod ba bzhin// rgyal po'i btsun mo'i lag nas
86a6(skyes rabs): 'phos// rtse dga' dang bcas 'gro ba de'i// phrag par me tog phreng ba lhung // skyon ni rig par gyur pa de'i// skyon rnams nga bang pos gsal byas nas// phra ma mkhan gyis gtam de dang // rgyal po
86b1(skyes rabs): yis ni rtogs par byas// rje bo'i bsam pa stong par ni// chung yang bu ga rnyed gyur nas// gnod pa kun byed lce gnyis pa// phra ma rab tu 'jug pa nyid// rgyal po phra mas bskul ba yis// phrag drog dug rgyas brgyal
86b2(skyes rabs): gyur pas// spun zla'i lag pa rkang pa dag/ myur du chod ces yang dag bsgos// lag pa rkang pa rnams bcad pa'i// gzhon nu las kyis rnam bslang bas// bsod pa'i nor 'dzin la nyal te// mi bzung rgud par
86b3(skyes rabs): zhugs par gyur// ma dang gnyen ni mya ngan can// gdung ba drag pos yongs bskor de// skad cig mig ni mi g.yo ba'i// zang byed rnams kyis mthong bar gyur// de ni yongs skyobs la chags shing // kun la
86b4(skyes rabs): phyag 'tshal mya dran gyis// gzir ba'i rgyal bu gnyen de rnams// de dag la mngon nas phyogs nas smras// ka la zhes pa mi bdag bu// skyon med 'di ni chad pas bcad// khyod rnams kun mkhyen smra ba po//
86b5(skyes rabs): 'odi la bka' drin bsgrub par mdzad// de skad mche ma rub zugs shing // rab sgra de yis gastsol patA'i bas// mthu med de dag mi smra zhing // skyengs nas gzhan du song bar gyuraro// de nas dge slong kun dga' bo//
86b6(skyes rabs): bde gshegs bka 'a yis lam de nas// 'ongs te bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis// de yi lus ni rnam par bsgrubs// rkang lag yang dag smyos pa yi// rgyal po'i bu yang dang ba'i blos// rgyal la skyabs su
87a1(skyes rabs): mngon song ste// de yi nye gnas rag tu gyur// de nas zhag bdun 'das pa'i tshe// bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi// cho 'phrul blta 'dod sa bdug gis// khang pa chen po byung
87a2(skyes rabs): du bcug/ der ni zad byed pa sogs dang // lhan cig mi bdug bzhugs pa la// bde gshegs bzhed bsdu sa gzhi dag/ dpag bsam shing gis bi rgyan par gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mthu//
