87a3(skyes rabs): lta ru lha rnams 'ongs pa'i tshe// bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge'i khri// rin chen rab 'bar che ba bsten// me yi khams lnga rab bzhugs pa// dwe yi 'gram pa las 'khrungs bu'i// mye yi tshegs kyi srid pa
87a4(skyes rabs): yi// dkyil 'khor dag ni khyab par gyur// srid par gnas pa mtha' dag 'jigs pa'i 'jigs pa dral bu yis// pad+ma'i tshal dang mtshungs pa'i me ni zhi bar gyur pa la// de rjes bcom ldan sku ni snying rje'i
87a5(skyes rabs): chu yi phung po las// bdud rtsi gang ba'i dba' rlabs dri med 'od zer rab tu 'phros// stong phrag zla ba'i mdzes pa las rgyal mdzes pas khengs gyur cing // gzi brjid rab tu rgyas pas nyi ma'i 'khor li 'bras med
87a6(skyes rabs): mdzad// 'dren pa de ni skye bo tshogs kyi rnam par lta byed kyis// legs byas kyis 'thob sngon med mgu zhing dga' bas 'thungs par gyur// chu ba bai DUr+ya ldan rin chen dmar po'i 'dab ma yangs// mdzes shing rab
87b1(skyes rabs): tu 'bar ba'i gser gyi ge srar ze 'bru can// chung drug pa rnams dri bzang tshogs kyis 'bod pa'i pad+ma ni// de nas de yi drung du sa gzhi dag las mngon 'khrungs gyur// de dag rnams la nye bar bzhugs pa'i
87b2(skyes rabs): bde gshegs 'khor lo ni// gser 'ong mdzes shing 'jam pa'i spyan ldan de nas nye bar mthong // bdud rtsi mnyes de shAn ri bong can 'od bsil byar gyur pa dag/ gang zhig shar bas 'jig rten dag
87b3(skyes rabs): gis 'phral la bde thob gyur// de dag dbus na bcom ldan 'das ni mthu yi 'byor pa dag/ ri rnams dag las gser gyi ri bo bzhin du lhag par 'dzin// phyag pa legs mtho stug cing mdzes par yang
87b4(skyes rabs): ngag gnas pa ni// lha yi sar skyes rnams las yongs 'du bzhin du rab tu mtho// mtho risi bu mo'i lag pas me tog rnams ni gtor gyur pa'i// mi dman phreng ba'i tshogs kyis yan lag mchog rnams
87b5(skyes rabs): rgyas gyur cing // de zhal chu skyes rnam par lta la mig ni 'dzum bral bas// mi rnams ngag kyang skad cig mi yi dngos min thob par 'gyur// de nas lha yi rnga chen dung dra rnga sgras khyab gyur cing // me tog/
87b6(skyes rabs): char pa gang rgyangs cher bzhad no mkha'i do rar ni// dri za mi 'am ci dang thub pa'i dbang phyug spyod rnams kyis// bcom ldan bstod pa'i tshig gi sgra ni bsgrags par gyur// der ni bcom ldan zhal gyi pad+ma
88a1(skyes rabs): mchu yi 'dab dmar zhing // 'od zer dkar bas kun dkrigs so yi ge sar rdzogs pa las// bsod nams kyis gtsang shin tu mdur ba'i gsung gi sbrang rtsi ni// rang nyams dang
88a2(skyes rabs): mthun dam pa'i dri bzang skal dang ldan pas 'thungs/ sdig pa'i tha ba thong la bsod nams dag gis bon theb// khon ni yongasu dor la zhi ba'i bde ba bsten par byos// 'chi ba'i dug ni nyams byed ye shes bdud
88a3(skyes rabs): rtsi 'thungs shig dang // dge ba'i grogs por gyur pa'i lus 'di ring por mi glan so// dpal 'byor g.yo zhing la tsho nyid kyang rku bar rjes su 'gro// lus kyang gnod pa'i tshogs rnams dag gi gnas nyid gyur pa yin/
88a4(skyes rabs): srog ni ngan pa'i lus kyi khyim gyi yud tsam mgron yin pas// chos kyi rang bzhin rtag tu skyed la rab tu 'bad par mdzod// de la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyer bstan ye shes kyi// snang ba dri ma med pa dben
88a5(skyes rabs): zhing dge ba'i mthu stobs kyis// skye bo'i ngar 'dzin 'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri bo'i rtse mo ni// nyi shu rdo rjes bzhin du myur bcom zhi bar gyur// rdzu 'phrul 'od ldan bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu stobs rtogs mu stegs rnams/
88a6(skyes rabs): sngags kyis bcom pa'i dug 'dzin bzhin du dregs pa nyams gyur cing // nyi ma'i 'od kyi mthu yis mar me bzhin du zil gyis man ni// yun ring g.yo ba med pa ri mo bkod pa bzhin du gyur// skabs der gnod sbyin
88b1(skyes rabs): lag na rdo rje zad byed pa rnams ni// bdag nyid kun gyis rtag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mthun phyogs// yin par shes pas drag po'i rlung gis dkris pa'i chur dag spros// rnam par rmongs nas sa lci khung
88b2(skyes rabs): bur skyabs pa dag tu byas// de nas de dag la mtshan bcom ldan sbubs 'os snying rje yis// brlon par gyur pas nye bar bstan pa kun gyi yul bka' stsal// ri dang nags dang sa dang klung dang khung la sogs//
88b3(skyes rabs): 'di kun nges par sngar ma rnams kyi 'jigs la skyabs mi 'gyur// rab tu sang ba'i ring bzhin gnas la blo gros bskyed byas nas// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun bcas la gang zhig skyibs song ba// de dag
88b4(skyes rabs): 'gro ba 'jigs pa 'jigs pa la yang 'jigs po med// dman pa yongs 'dzin skyabs ni gzhan na yod pa nyid mi yon+ya// 'jig rten pha rol mi bzad mun pa bzlog dkar chos ni rab rgyas tshwa zer can// bzod
88b5(skyes rabs): dka' sdig pa'i gdung ba phongs pas mngon par bskyed pa sbyin pa chu gat+ne ra yin/ mi bzung gti mug pa yang sa chen po'i spyod la shes rab lag pas ma tshil ba ste/ kun tu mi rnams kyi ni bsod nams
88b6(skyes rabs): kho na dman dang cho de bral ba'i skyabs// de ltar ra bo rib kyis bsgribs mig can rnams kyi mig ni dbyer 'os shing // tshems kyi nor bu'i 'od zer dag ni rab gsal ldan pas gsal byas nas// mdun sar
89a1(skyes rabs): bde gshegs zla bas dag pa'i chos ni nye bar bstan pa dag/ brtan par gyur pa'i glanas bzhin mdzad nas rlung gi gan su gshegs par gyur// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos
89a2(skyes rabs): byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las cho 'phrul gyi rtogs pa brjod ba'i yal 'dab ste bcu bzhi pa'o// rjes dang mdun
89a3(skyes rabs): dang mngon du gyur par yang // skye bo'i dge ba'i las kyi lam dag ni// gsal byar byed pa bdag nyid chen po'i mthu// rin chen sgron ma lta bu rgyal gyur cig/ sngon tshe lha yi grong khyer du// yongs 'du klo
89a4(skyes rabs): bi da ra'i drung // la ba dkar po zhes bya ba// 'od bzung rdo leb stang du nI// bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs gsum pa'i// tshogs la chos ni bstan mdzad nas// mi rnams rje su gzung ba'i slang // dzam+be'i
89a5(skyes rabs): gling du babs par gyur// sa la babs par gyur pa de'i// rjes su 'tsho med rnam 'brengs byas// gzhal yas khang gi tshogs kyis ni// sa gzhi mnyam pa khengs par gyur// zla ba'i 'od ldan rnga yab
89a6(skyes rabs): ni// de yi tshems kyi 'od rgyun gyis// rgyas pa'i nye bar bstan pa bzhin// gdong bzhi pa yis blangs par gyur// thur ma brgya yis mtshan pa'i gdugs// mtshan ming ri dwags mtshan ltar dkar// nga
89b1(skyes rabs): bka' drin rnams bcas bzhin// brgya byin gyis ni blangs par gyur// grong khyer shang ka sh+ya yi 'gram// u duM wa ra'i nags drung du// babs pa de la legs byas ldan// kun dgar bcas pas phyag 'tshal gyur//
89b2(skyes rabs): skye bo'i tshogs dang dge slong ma// ut+pal mdog ma zhes pa yis// blta ba'i gnas skabs ma thob nas// mi bdag gzugs ni nye bar blangs// rin chen cod pan rab gsal zhing // rna rgyan 'gram par rab mdzes
89b3(skyes rabs): bo// de yi gzugs gsar mthong gyur nas// gtsug tor yal 'dab dgod pa bzhin// de yis bsam pa shin tu yang // skye bo'i mdun 'dir bar mtshams med// bdag gis rgyal po'i gzugs mthong nas/
89b4(skyes rabs): gus bcas skabs 'di ster bar 'gyuraro// 'di las gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das// phyag 'tshal bdag gis rnyed par dka'// dbang phyug la dga' skye bo yis// yon tan zhes pa'i gnas ma yin// kye ma rtsa
89b5(skyes rabs): mtshungs g.yo ba'i nor// ro bral snying po med pa yis// bag chags goms par gyur pa lngas// ma dpyad nyid kyis skye ba 'phrog/ 'phel la skye bos mi bdag la// zhes sar byas nas skabs sbyin des//
89b6(skyes rabs): shale g.yo bas bcom ldan la// mdun du phyag kyang byas par gyur// gnas skabs der ni mdun sa ru// 'char ko zhes pa'i dge slong gis// de lta'i gzugs de mthong gyur nas// bzhin ni 'dzum pa dang
90a1(skyes rabs): bcas smras// mi bdag gzugs can dge slong ma// ut+pal mdog ma skye bo yis// phyag byas ma 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis// bcom ldan zhabs la phyag 'tshal byed// ut+pal
90a2(skyes rabs): d+hI dang mdog dag gis// ba dag gis 'di ni mdun du shis// de skad brjod nas 'dug pa'i tshe// bcom ldan gyis kyang bka'u stsal pa// dregs las rdzu 'phrul reb ston pa// dge slong ma yi rigs mon+d+ra
90a3(skyes rabs): nyid// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rims gsar gyis// rlub tu zhi ba nang bar byed// de skad bad+d+hod nas bcom ldan gyis// dge ba de de bstan mdzad nas// g+hi rnams bzlog ste dge slong dang // lhan cig rang gi
90a4(skyes rabs): na sa su bya shugs// dar ni nyer bzhugs de dag gis// rAs dris shing kun mi khyen gyis// sbyar b+he'i las kyis yang dag bsnams// dge ma yi gtam gras rjes te// be ra d+h+wa ser sngon byung ba/
90a5(skyes rabs): dzin rdzo// tshud na ni ldan ma / de smin dngas sa d+hAr/ n+na nga lag pa'i yan dre na/ la ma da // byu zlus b+h+yo/ smras/
90a6(skyes rabs): rje mes de las mangs bzung gyuraro// skabs der chu gter gling la ni// rje su 'bri bar brtson pa yi// khyod la rab tu nye bdag/ 'bral bas gzir ba de yis smras// ji snyed no ri ni phun chogs shing // nga
90b1(skyes rabs): lha yang ni 'phel ba thob// gang gi ched du 'jigs rung ba'i// chu sbyin 'byung gnas zab mo b+harga la// nar ni 'dzin pa gnod pa mang // s+phon+na tAn bsgrub pa gnod pa med// nor ni don gan+d+her+ya rang yul nas/
90b2(skyes rabs): 'jig rten pha rol dgra tu 'gro// kha cig ring du song nas kyang // sdug bsngal las ni 'brus med ldog/ gzhan ni g.yo med nor dang ldan// 'di yi nges pa las rnams so// de skad dga' ma'i tshig thos nas//
90b3(skyes rabs): don mthun bdag po de la smras// mdzes ma nor bdag bsgrubs pa ni// bsngags pa'i snod nyid kho na yin// bder gnas nor bsgrubs kyis dman rnams// rtsa ba zos pa'i 'phye bo bzhin// de ring sang la longs
90b4(skyes rabs): spyod dang // lhan cig yongasu zad par 'gyur// rang khyim du yang dbul rnams la// skye bo sogs le bzhin du rtsub// 'jig rten gzhan du'ang nor ldan ni// skye bo rnams kyi mdza' sdugs// 'phel bar rtsom smad
90b5(skyes rabs): zlo tshes ni// phra mo la yang spyi bo 'dud// mthar ni yongs mdzad rang nye bas// yongasu rdzogs pa la yang min// spyi bo mngon par drar la nye// rmongs pa'ang mkhas pas phyag byar 'os// rgan yang mo yi yid du 'ong //
90b6(skyes rabs): ma ning yin yang dpa' bsten 'os// mkhas kyang bkres dang skom pa la// dgra yi bstan bcos zos pa 'am// snyan ngag bdud rtsi 'thungs pas ni// skad cig su yi sa rnam par rgyal// gang la nor yod de ni
91a1(skyes rabs): yon tan gyis thos bstod byas yon tan dag kyang cis mi 'dzin// dbul las nyams pa'i skyon gyis gzi byin sun phyung yon tan me tog snying mtshungs nor gyi ni// yon tan nyid
91a2(skyes rabs): de yon tan la ni nor ldan bsngags 'os yon tan ldan pa min// slong ba'i ngan byas tshogs rnams zhi ba dag las nor ni yon tan rnams kyi tshe sreg yini// de skad srog lngas nor lhag pa// de yis bdag po'i
91a3(skyes rabs): tshig thos nas// 'khri shAng rkang drug pas rgyas bzhin// mig sman dang bcas mchi thigasu rgyas// de nas de dang lhan cig tu// don mthun mgon gyis gru gzings bsten// sred pa drag po 'dzin rnams kyi//
91a4(skyes rabs): chu gter chen po lag pa'i snod// las kyi rlung gis rjes zhugs pa// chung ma'i grogs ldan de yi gzings// yid la rU ba srog dang bcas// chu gter du ni zhig par gyur// de nas las kyi longs spyod kyi// lhag mas
91a5(skyes rabs): shing du ma bzung gyur pas// ka se ru yi gling phyin nas// de yis chung me shi ma gyur// der ni bsam pa nyams gyur cing // mgon med mya ngan byed de dang // 'dab bzang rigs las skyes pa'i bya// skyes bu'i dbyib
91a6(skyes rabs): can phrad par gyur// mdzes pas phrogs pa bzhin bzang ming // de yis mdzes ma de la smras// mig ni g.yo ma yid brtan mdzod// gnas 'di khyod la 'jigs pa med// 'di ni skal bzang mchog gis// bdag
91b1(skyes rabs): ni khyod kyi 'dod pa tshol// chu srin 'byung gnas 'di 'jigs rung // dge ma khyod ni yang skyeso// de yis 'di brjod ngal bu yis// rin chen rang bzhin khang par phyin// mngal ni yongasu rdzogs de la// gzu
91b2(skyes rabs): mdzes bu dag btsas par gyur// byis pa de ni cher skyes tshe// rim gyis snyan par smra byed pa// mkhas pa de yis mdzes ma de// longs spyod dag la mngon phyogs byas// drang nyid phyir dang 'jam nyid phyir//
91b3(skyes rabs): mdza' gcugs nye ba'i skye bo la// bud med rang nyid 'khyud 'gyur te// rkang 'thung dag la 'khri shing bzhin// de yis mchog gis skyed tshal du// nu rgyas de la rol pA las// gzhon nu mdzes pa'i rnam
91b4(skyes rabs): pa can// phA dang mtshungs pa btsas par gyur// pad+ma'i bzhin zhes bya ba de// lang tsho'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa yis// dus su 'dab chags rgyal po ni// bzhin bzang 'jig rten gzhan du song // de rjes
91b5(skyes rabs): dang ldan pad+ma'i bzhin// pra yi gnas ni tho ba 'gyur te/ yon tan can la rtsod med du// rigs kyi phun sum rang dbang gyur// kun tu de yi mthu dag ni// gtso bo'i nus ldan nyid shes nas// dbang
91b6(skyes rabs): phyug thob pa'i bu de la// skye bo med sar ma yis smras// bu gcig rang rigs la 'os pa'o// dpal 'byor 'di ni khyod kyis thob// ded dpon las skyes bdag gi bu// 'di la skal ba yod ma yin// ba ra Na ser
92a1(skyes rabs): rang stobs kyis// khyod kyis 'di ni rgyal por gyis// rang yul nyid du phun tshogs pa// dga' ba nyams myong ro dang bcas// de skad ma yi tshig gis bya// gshog rlabs
92a2(skyes rabs): shin tu che ba yis// spun zla phrag pa laM khyer nas// mkha' las pa ra NA ser song // de nas sa bdag tshangs pas byin// seng ge'i khri l-i bzhugs pa dang // drag rno rdo rje'i sder mo rnams// de yis lan
92a3(skyes rabs): cig bsnun nas bsad// rgyal po'i stan ni de nyid la// phu bo rdzogs par dbang bskur nas// blon po 'jigs pa'i tshogs rnams la// rtsal mchog ldan pa des smras pa// bdag gis rgyal por dbang bskur
92a4(skyes rabs): 'dri// gang gis rab tu spyod byed na// de ni rje la gus pa yis// ma rtogs de rjes 'gro bar 'gyur// rab mchog blon la dal bu yis// 'di smras bya yi gang zag ni// spyan la phyis kyang phrad pa yis//
92a5(skyes rabs): 'gro ba zhugs nas stong bar gyur// tshangs byin de nyid 'di'o zhes// blon po rnams kyis bgros pa las// rang gi skye bo gzhan la yang // mi bdug de ni grogs pa thob// skabs der nogs nas blangs pa yi//
92a6(skyes rabs): mngal dang bcas pa'i glang mo zhig/ mngal ni nang nas bkag pa bzhin// phyed ni phyir byung grol ma gyur// bud med dag pa'i lag rtse yis// reg pas mngal 'di grol bar gyur// ces pas rtsis pas bstan
92b1(skyes rabs): ni// blon po rnams kyis rgyal la smras// de nas sa yi bdag po'i bkrus// pho byung 'khor gyi bud med kyi// lag pas glang po la reg nas// der ni bden pa'i byin brlabs byas// gang tshe de dag bden
92b2(skyes rabs): tshig gis// glang mo'i mngal ni ma grol ba// de tshe rgyal po'i pho brang gis// skye bo thams cad skyengs par gyur// de nas ba lang rdzi mo zhig/ mngon phyogs ngang tshul bden pa'i tshig/ smras nas glang mo
92b3(skyes rabs): la reg pa// gang gis mngal 'di grol bar gyur// rgyal po 'ang rang gi btsun mo rnams// tshul khrims kyis dbul nyid shes nas// ba lang rdzi mo de nyid ni// 'gro ba gsum na dag par sems// dag pa'i
92b4(skyes rabs): rigs la chags pa des// de yi bu mo so sum bA// zhes pa mdun du yongs blangs pa// lha mo'i sgra yi snod nyid gyur// bud med g.yo ba nyid dag dang // de yis mdzes pa bsam pa las// dogs pa'i kun
92b5(skyes rabs): tu 'gro ba yis// gnyid kyang de yis btang bar gyur// bar skabs de ni spun zla la// mdza' las shin tu gcags pa yis// bya yi bdag po pad+mo'i bzhin// de la lta ru 'ongs par gyur// sa bdag gis
92b6(skyes rabs): kyang de la 'khyud // dga' ba yis ni bkur sti bsgrubs// skye bo med sar de la ni// rang gtam bshad nas yang smras pa// ngang tshul bden pa'i sring gzhal bas// bud med rnams kyi skyon mthong nas//
93a1(skyes rabs): bdag ni btsun mo'i tshogs las phyir// phyogs te bag ma gzhan sar blangs// gzugs dpalang tsho 'gro ldan ma// de la'ang bdag ni mi ston te// gcig la skyon ni mthong ba rnam//
93a2(skyes rabs): kun la yid ni dogs pa skye// de slang spun zla khyod kyis ni// grong khyer mi maud dag tu bzung // ngang tshul la ni dogs btang nas// bdag ni rims dang bral bar 'gyur// de las de ni mtshan re zhing // khyod kyi bkri
93a3(skyes rabs): las 'dab chags kyis// dal bus khyer nas bdag khyim du// 'ong bar 'gyur ba 'di dag 'dod// de skad phu bo'i tshig thos nas// mkha' la 'gro bas de la smras// dogs pa'i dri mas phrag dog ni// rgyal
93a4(skyes rabs): bo brdzun pa nyid ma byed// phrag dog dug gis rtag gzir ba// dga' bar bya ba des mi dga'// bza' ba rnams kyi ri mo rigs// lta ba ma yin gnyid ma yin// ma ning 'dod ldan bde ldan mkhas// nor
93a5(skyes rabs): ldan dud pa rje bzod ldan// slong ba khengs pa mi srun des// bud med dag ces gtam nyid ci// drang po la yang gya gyu can// gnas pa na yang shin tu g.yo// rigs ldan yin yang logs gnas pa'i//
93a6(skyes rabs): bud med 'khri shing 'khyud par byed// mig g.yo mchu ni chags dang bcas// sman ma 'khog cing nu ma sa// bud med rnams kyi cha shas la'ang // skon mod mthong ba nyid yod min// mkhas pas g.yo
93b1(skyes rabs): ldan bung ba yi// rnam par rol pas bud med spyad// mtsho skyes rtsa ba btsal ba na// 'dam gyis nye brar gas pa nyid// 'dzum byacas yA mtshan dag gis ni// gtsang sbra dang tshul dag dang bral// bud med
93b2(skyes rabs): rnams ni des bsdams pa'i// dga' ba cig lo blo ma yin// de lta na yang gal te 'bad // gang zhig mngon par zhen par mdzod// nyin re bdag grong skyed mos tshul// skye bo med par de bzhag byas// spun
93b3(skyes rabs): zla 'dab chags kyis de smras// ka se ru ka'i gling du ni// de dang mdzes ma mi bdag gis// gus bcas bsnyen bkur byas te btang // de yang gling du skyes pa yi// dri mchog rang bzhin phreng ba rnams// bya la
93b4(skyes rabs): zhen nas mtshan re zhing / nam mkha' las ni 'ong bar gyur// yongs 'du'i rjes 'gro ljon pa yi// me tog de dag de yis thob// bung ba g.yo bI munA gtibs pas// grags pa yi ni rab rib bzhin/
93b5(skyes rabs): de nas nam zhigra mA nu ba// zhes pa gnyis skyes gzhon nu ni// ba ra NA sir gnas pa zhig/ nags nas yam shing len du song // der ni mi 'am ci mo yis// yid bsrubs gsal ba de mthong gyur// gang
93b6(skyes rabs): zhig mthong ba nyid kyis de// dran pa rnam pa brjed par gyur// gser du mngon par 'dod pa yis// phas bzhin de la de gtad nas// mdzes ldan zhes pa'i mdzes ma dang // phug gi khang par rnam par
94a1(skyes rabs): rol// rin chen rgyan gyi 'od zer gyis// rab rib tshogs ni des bsal te// de dang yun ring rtses pa las// dusu bu ni de yis thob// bu de byis pa nyid la yang // gang che
94a2(skyes rabs): stobs ldan rlung ltar mgyogs// de tshe ma yis de yi ming // myur 'gro zhes par bsgrubs par gyur// bgegs med longs spyod bde ba yis// ngoms med de yang phug gzhan du// mdza' bo zhags
94a3(skyes rabs): nas rdo ba yis// phug ni bsgribs shing rtag tu 'gro// de nas nam zhig pa yis ni// rang gi spyod pa'i mtha' rnams de shud// myur 'gro yis thos bsam pa ni// ya mtshan dag gis rgyas par smras
94a4(skyes rabs): khyim gzhan sgo ni rdo ba yis// long ba bzhin du bsdams pa 'dir// kye ma yab khyod mdzes pas kyang // bcings pa 'di nyid dag tu gyur// tshur zhog khyod kyi rang gi gnas// ba ra tA si nyid du 'dod/
94a5(skyes rabs): tshe yang 'bad pa med par ni// rdo ba bdag gis bsil bar bya// rang yul bral ba'i nyon mongs ni// bzod par dka' ba ji ltar bzod // rang gi lus bzhin yul dag ni// sus kyang btang bar mi nus
94a6(skyes rabs): so// rang yul bral ba'i skye bo rnams// nor gyi tshogs ni khur po dang // longs spyod nye bar longs spyod min// yon tan thag pa'i mdud par rig/ ces smras phug gi khang pa nas// rdo ba chen po de
94b1(skyes rabs): bsal nas// khas blangs pa yi pha dang ni// lhan cig mgyogs par song bar gyur// de dag myur du song de nas// mi 'am ci mo mngon par 'ongs// phug khyim stong pa mthong gyur nas// snying mi dga' ste 'di
94b2(skyes rabs): ltar bsams// kye ma bdag la gcugs pa brjed// skye bo ngan pa de gar song // lce gnyis pa dang lag 'gro yi// gya gyu nyid la'ang rmad byung ci// bde lo chags ldan mjug tu ni// dga' bar mi byed 'bros
94b3(skyes rabs): bar byed// ring du gnas kyang mdza' gcugs med// skye gnyis ldan pa ne tse bzhin// de ltar bsams nas de yis ni// gnod las khyo la dga' ba btang // me tog lta bu'i mdzo' bo yis// gnod pa bzod pa
94b4(skyes rabs): ma yin no// bdag gi bu 'di rig byed dang // yon tan gong gis sA la 'tsho// zhes bsam grogs mo'i lag tu ni// de la de yis rgyud mang spyings// longs spyod bde ba'i zong dag gis// bud med rnams ni khyo la dgal//
94b5(skyes rabs): ba mnyes gshIn yong su ma nyams pa// bu la dga' ba g.yo ba min// de dag tshul ngan ngo tsha nas// mgyogs pas myur du 'gro ba ni la// de yi grogs mo mgyogs 'gro mas// myur 'gro la ni rgyud mang byin// 'di yi
94b6(skyes rabs): rgyud ni dang po 'dir// reg par mi bya bgegs byed yin// de skad smras nas des byin pas// rgyud mang blangs nas de song gyur// de nas rang yul rang khyim du// de yi pha ni bzhag byas na// rgyud maung sbreng ba
95a1(skyes rabs): mkhas pa yis// kun tu rnyed dang mchod pa thob// de nas nam zhig cheng ba dag/ chu ga ter gling du 'gro ba rnams// lha yi rgyud mang la chags pas// de ni gzings la bskyon par
95a2(skyes rabs): gyur// de yi rgyud mang yid 'phrog pa// rna ba'i bdud rtsi rgyun dag gis// skad cig skad cig rgya mtsho yang // rlabs na med pa bzhin du gyur// de nas dang po 'i rgyud dag la// reg pas nyer 'tsho rab bskyed de/
95a3(skyes rabs): gzings ni rab tu 'phar zhing chags// tshong pa thams cad rlag par gyur// de nas las kyi lhag ma yis// myur 'gro yis ni shing dum thob// rlung gis bskyod nas skad cig gis// ka se ru yi gling du phyin// dar
95a4(skyes rabs): ni chu gter drogs 'gram g+hi// skyed tshal mchog tu rab zhugs des// nu ma mA me tog chun po dag/ rab rgyas bud med so sum bA// me tog dri sar zhes bya ba'o// phreng ba rab 'bar rgyud byed cing // sems med rnams
95a5(skyes rabs): kyang lus kyi ni// yon tan gyis ngos 'ching byed mthong // des kyang mdzes pa'i rnam pa can// brtan pa byis pa lang tsho yi// mtshams kyi dbus nas nyid gyur pa// de mthong ya mtshan dog tu gyur// 'dod pa'i rlung
95a6(skyes rabs): gis rab bskyod pas// lag pa'i yal 'dabo g.yo ldan zhing // ngang tshul me tog lhung ba des// 'khri shing bzhin du der rab btud// 'phral la yun ring 'grogs pa bzhin// de dag mchog tu mdza' bar gyur//
95b1(skyes rabs): skye ba snga ma'i mdza' gcugs pa// yid kyis yid ni mi mthong ngo // nyin pa ra da dang dga' byed cing // mtshan mo yang ni sa bdag dang // sbal ba'i 'dod ldan mdza' bor ni// g.yon ma'i spyod pa nyid las
95b2(skyes rabs): bosamA sa// spyod tshul shes pas des de la// ba ra NA sir 'gro don gnyer// de yi tshig gis mig btsums nas// bya la zhon nas de yis phyin// de yis bzlog par gyur mod kyang // mkho' la mig ni
95b3(skyes rabs): phye ba yis// chu ga ter g.yo ba'i bsgribs pa'i mig/ de ni 'phral nyid long bar gyur// pho brang 'khor gyi skyed tshal du// de yis de bzhag 'jigs pa yis// skrag cing mya ngan gyis gdungs pas//
95b4(skyes rabs): so bdag gzims pa'i khang par zhugs// yang ni shin tu gdung ba yis// mtshan mo de ni bzlas byas nas// tho rangs bsams pas zil gnon des// 'gro dang sdong bar nus ma gyur// skabs der
95b5(skyes rabs): tsu ta dri bzang gi/ tshogs ni yang dag rgyas gyur cing // me tog gzhu can rtse dga' yis// lang tsho dpyid kyi zla ba ni// khu byug 'ud bas gnag gyur cing // dus kyis bral ba rnams kyis dus// bzod ka'
95b6(skyes rabs): mya ngan 'grems byed pa'i// mya ngan med gsar rab tu mthong // 'dod pas rmongs pa'i rgyal pos kyang // sred dang ma bral skyed mos tshal// lta bar brtson pas nyi ma gcig/ so sum bA ti gtang ma gyur// de
96a1(skyes rabs): ni de dang lhan cig tu// chags dang rgyags dang 'dod pa yi// 'khor ba bzhin du ngal bso'i gnas// me tog gi ni nagra su song // der ni rlung bzhon gyis bskor ba'i//
96a2(skyes rabs): 'khri shing skyengs par byed pa yi// btsun mo mthong nas sa yi bdag/ rab tu dga' ba nyid du gyur// gzhan chags dug gis zil gnan pas// de yang dran pa zum bir gyur// bsam pa'i zug
96a3(skyes rabs): rngus dkrug pa'i yid// bde la'ang bde ba min+da par rig/ lag 'gro nang du song ba yi// bud med kyi ni phreng bas bzhin// mgrin par byas pas rmongs byas pa'i// shin tu chags ldan blo gar byed//
96a4(skyes rabs): der ni dben par 'khri shing gi/ tshogs kyi sgribs par gnas byas pa// long bas so sum bA yi ni// dr-i sar phreng ba'i dri bzang tshor// 'phral la nyid du tshogs pa yI// rnam 'gyur leswa nr-i sbas po
96a5(skyes rabs): brjed// glu blangs 'dod pas myos pa rnams// 'jigs pa dag nI ga la rtsi// dman pa'i rlung gi ro las bskyod par gyur pa dgra' ma yI// bzhin ni myos ldan pad+ma'i d+hi bzang tshogs pa'i snying po can//
96a6(skyes rabs): dri ser me tog dri de ring nas 'ong bar gyur pa 'di// bung ba'i lam ni rgyud mang su 'khrul sgra yis dga' bar 'ongs// sa bdag gis ni de yi glu// snying la 'beb po de thos nas// skyed mos tshal dag
96b1(skyes rabs): btsal byas pas// 'khri shing nang du de mthong gyur// chags pa drag pos myos de la// dogs par gyur pa de yis dris// so sum bA 'am de yi ni// las kyi mtshan nyid khyod shes sam//
96b2(skyes rabs): des smra so so gsum bA dag ni// ci phyir mi shes gang gis mchu// bim pa dkar dam+bAr chags pa yis// rgyal srid la ni yid 'byung bzhugs// 'dod pas bkod bzhin de yi baR+Sha// ri mo rang
96b3(skyes rabs): bzhin bkra shis mdzes pa yod// 'khyil pa sdug gu mdzes pa'i 'khor mo 'dra// de yi nu ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la 'ang yod// de dag thos nas mi bdag ni// yongs su gdung ba drag pos nyen// yid
96b4(skyes rabs): kyi chags pa me tog ni// rnying pa bzhin du dor bar gyur// de yis smras pa mi mo rnams// bsrung ba rgyas kyang tshul khrims mis// na mkha'i me tog phreng ba bzhin// dag pa rnam kun nyid du med/
96b5(skyes rabs): rgyal pos 'di brjod long ba dang // lhan cig dur khrod nags la de// myur du bong bu la bskyon nas// grong khyer las ni phyir bton gyur// ngo tsha med pa de dang de// lhan cig 'gro ba nyid 'das tshe//
96b6(skyes rabs): nags su chom rkun bdag po yis// phun tshogs dag dang bcas nyid thob// 'phral la chom rkun dkyil 'khor dag/ mngon bros de tshe skye bo yis// long ba nyes pa med pa nyid// chom rkun dag tu
97a1(skyes rabs): 'khrul nas bsang // so sum+b+ha b+hA de rkun pos kyang // skad cig 'grogs pas mtshan spyad nas// de yi rgyan rnams blangs nus ni// chu bo rab tu brgal nas song // chu
97a2(skyes rabs): klung ka ran du ba de'i// 'gram du gos dang bral ba des// mig sman dang bcas mchi ma'i chus// nu ma non+da cing myo ngan byas// de yau du sA na wa skyes zhig/ khA yi sha nI rab btang nas// chu la 'phrer
97a3(skyes rabs): ba'i nya la song // de na mkha' la 'gro bas khyer// nya ni 'phral li gting du song // sha ni bya yis phrog pa'i tshe// gnyi go nyams pas de yi ni// bsam pa mig ni g.yo med gyur// de mthong de yi
97a4(skyes rabs): bzhin+da la ni// sdug kyang 'dzum pa mthong bar gyur// gzhan dag gis ni 'khrul pa la// 'chir nye rnams kyang dgod pa yin// skyengs pas khros pa de yi ni// mi 'os 'dzum pa de la smras// kye
97a5(skyes rabs): ma 'jig rten gad mo yis// gnas gyur khyo da ni bdag la dgod// mi ba ga btang nas long bar phyin// ldong ba btang nas chom rkunA bsten+da// gsum+b+ha tshar nyams pA khyod kyi ni// 'dzum pa'i
97a6(skyes rabs): gnas ni gnyis nyam nga // yongs su brgod pa 'di ni mchog/ bdag ni rigs pas khyod phan bsgrubs// mi bzad gnas la gang zhig ni// co 'dri'i mkhas pa de mi sbyin// 'di brjod grong
97b1(skyes rabs): khyer song nAs ni// klud+tha gi ngogs na so sum bA// dka' thub rigs pa gnaso zhes// blo glos bzang mos rgyu lnga la smras// de nas gos dang rgyan bskur nas// de ni rgyal po sna blang sdu par gyur// lus
97b2(skyes rabs): can rnams kyi chags pa yi// lhag mas skyon ni sgrib pa nyid// da lta'i ut+pal mdog 'di de// sngon skyes gzhan gyi bsod nams kyis// dge slong brtul zhugs nye bar thob// 'di yi yid ni gang zhig
97b3(skyes rabs): chags pas sbyor la nyams kyis rab rlan dang // rgyags pa dang ni 'dod pa'i dbang gyur chags dang ldan pa nyid du gyur// des na de tshe yud tsam zhi ba rnam par dpyod pa dang bral nas// mi yi bdag po'i
97b4(skyes rabs): gas byas kun dga' ldan pas bdag la phyag 'tshal gyur// ce sra dge ba'i dpeng pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpe'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las lha las babs pa'i rtogs
97b5(skyes rabs): bA baN+Dod po'i yil 'dab ste bco lnga pa'o// // mthu ldan rnams kyi mtshungs med brtan pa dang // brtson 'grus stobs ni ngo mtshar bcas pa yin// chen po nyid la rten
97b6(skyes rabs): pa'i sbyor ba las// gang phyir thams cad chen po nyid du gyur// sngon ni stobs ldan gyid kyi gnas// ku sha'i grong khyer dga' ba ru// rang dgar rol pa'i bcom ldan 'das// bde gshaMgs rang
98a1(skyes rabs): nyid gshegs par gyur// legs par byon pa de thos nas// rim gro dag la rab brtson pa// dge ba tshol ba de dag gis// lam ni legs par sbyang ba byas// rtswa dang
98a2(skyes rabs): tsher ma rdo ba dang // sreg ma rdul dang bsal byas nas// tsAn chu yis legs bran te// yul ni mdzes pa de dag gi/ dbus su 'bigs byed rgyur gyur pa'i// chung ma gting du zhum po bzhin// gting
98a3(skyes rabs): du bying ba'i rdo chen ni// sa las yang dag byung bar gyur// 'byor dang dpung ba thug pa yas// de ni sol la de dag rnams// zla ba song yuM nga de yi ni// stong phrag tsha yang zad mu gyur// de nas 'kho
98a4(skyes rabs): ba'i yongs gdung dag/ rab tu zhi byed bdud rtsi'i zer// kun gyi yid ni dga' ba'i gnyen// bcom ldan 'das ni byon par gyur// stug po'i mun pa dag dang bral// gsal zhing mthong ba 'bras
98a5(skyes rabs): dang bcas// rab dang phyogs ni rnam par phyed// rab tu gsal ba ston nyi bzhin// 'bras med nyon mongs kyis gdungs pa// yongs dral de dag des gzigs shing // de dag gdungs gyur thos
98a6(skyes rabs): nas kyang // phyag 'tshal bzhin ldan der bka' stsal// ngal dub 'bad rtsol ldan pa khyed// 'khor ba yi ni las la bzhin// bya ba 'di la rab brtson pa// kye ma nyon mongs 'bras rtsom// brtsams
98b1(skyes rabs): nas mi bzang nyon mongs dang // byed pa na yang the tshom bcas// grub kyang nyer mkho med pa'i las// shes rab ldan rnams yongs mi byed// de skad gsungs nas che ba'i rdo// zhabs mdzub kyis phyung g.yon
98b2(skyes rabs): ba yi// phyag gis g.yas pa'i phyag tu ni// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkod mdzad nas// mtha' med pha rol gnon pa yis// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mthar btang ste// 'gro ba gsum du ngo mtshar gyi// spyod pa
98b3(skyes rabs): pho nya bzhin du mdzad// shin tu rmad byung mdzad pa des// de ni 'phangs pa'i 'phrul nyid la// rlung ni rab tu langs pa bzhin// skye bo khyab pa'i sgra rab byung // 'du byed thams cad mi rtag nyid// 'di ni 'khrul
98b4(skyes rabs): ba med par byed// chos rnams thams cad bdag med dang // zhi ba myang 'das kho na yod// de skad gsal ba'i sgra brjod de// bcom ldan phyag na rdo ba ni// ri dbang rtse mo'i rnam pa can// slad nas kyang ni gnas
98b5(skyes rabs): bar mthong // skad cig gis de bcom ldan gyi// zhal gyi rlung gis gzhig byas te// mchog gi ngo mtshar brgyud ma ni// phyogs rnam dog tu bkram pa byas// slad nas phra rab rdul rnams kyis// bcom ldan
98b6(skyes rabs): 'das kyis gcig nyid byas// gzhan du rdo dang 'gro gsum du// ya mtshan dag kyang bzhag par mdzad// de nas bcom ldan brtson 'grus dang // stobs ni rdzogs pa gyid rnams dag/ ngo mtshar mig
99a1(skyes rabs): ni mi grwa s+yo bas// mthong nas phyag 'tshal der gsol ba// kye ma khyod kyi mthu chen po// stobs dang brtson 'grus rgyus pa 'di// gang zhig nges par rtog pa s+ho/
99a2(skyes rabs): nus pa lha rnams la yang med// khyod kyi stobs dag bla ma ni// rjes su 'dzin la rab zhugs pas// rdo ba bying zhing gting dag tu// song 'di skye ba bzhin du bton// ngo mtshar mchog mdzad khyod
99a3(skyes rabs): ni// brtson 'grus shes rab stobs sogs kyi// tshad kyi mtshams ni nges pa dag/ su zhig gis kyang cang shes sam// de skad smra zhing ngo mtshar ni// g.yo med de rnams la gzigs nas+ho//
99a4(skyes rabs): rdo ba med la rab zhugs te// bcom ldan rgyal bas bka' stsal pa// srid gsum 'byung po rnams kyi stobs// gcig nyid du ni gyur ba gang // bde gshegs gcig gi stobs de dang // 'jig
99a5(skyes rabs): rten na nI many+dzam pa min// chu ga twe ra chu ni bum pa dang // 'gro rnams phra rab rdul drag gis// 'grung ba ru ni shin tu nus// bad gshegs mthu ni ma yin no// gang gis srang gi tshad kyi ni/
99a6(skyes rabs): lhun po'i de nyid grangs rig pa// des kyang bde gshegs yon tan ni// dam pa'i lci ba nyid mi rtogs// de skad gsungs nas bcom ldan gyis// brgya byin pad+ma'i gnas dang bcas// lha
99b1(skyes rabs): yi dkyil 'khor 'ongs pa lnga// dge ba dag ni bstan pa mdzad// de yis de de nyer bstan pas// gyad rnams byang chub la brten nas// nyan thos zhes bya nyi tsher bcas// yang dag rdzogs sangs
99b2(skyes rabs): rgyas nyid gyur// 'ga' yis rgyun zhugs 'bras bu thob// gzhan gyis lan cig phyir 'ong yang // phyir mi 'ong 'bras gzhan gyis te// gzhan gyis dgra bcom gnas thob gyur// de lhur
99b3(skyes rabs): bosam pa phra rgyas khams dang 'a gro ba gzigs gyur cing // mkhyen nas rang bzhin de ltar mtshungs pa med pa'i gdams ngag ni// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po yang dag rab bsal dri med
99b4(skyes rabs): pa// de dag rnams kyi dge ba spel slad bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las brag
99b5(skyes rabs): nges par 'phangs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'ad ba ste bcu drug pa'o// // chags pa med rnams nges par rnam par dag pa'i gnas// dge ba mngon 'dod
99b6(skyes rabs): 'khor ba'i g.yon dang legs byas la// mngon par dga' zhing yid kyi dri ma rnam dag gi/ khon gyi rdul dang bral ba dge legs bskyed pa yin// sngon tshe klu rnams gdengs ka yi// zam pas
100a1(skyes rabs): gaM gA legs par bsgral// bcom ldan bde gshegs pha rol tu// byon nas dge slong rnams la gsungs// 'dir sngon rin chen rang bzhin gyis// mchod sdong rmad
100a2(skyes rabs): byung mdzes pa byung // gal te dge mtshan khyed lta na// 'di nyid du de dag bdag gis bstan// zhes gsungs sa la bcom ldan gyi// mtshan mchog ldan pa'i phyag dag gis// reg pas klu yi tshogs
100a3(skyes rabs): rnams kyis// rin chen mchod gdong slad nas bstan// dge slong thams cad de mthong nas// yun rings mig ni mi 'dzum zhing // lus ni g.yo ba med pa dag/ ri mo bris pa bzhin du gyur// de dag
100a4(skyes rabs): gis dris bcom ldan gyis// de gtam slar yang rab gsungs te// 'das dang ma 'ongs mkhyen pa ni// tshems kyi snang bas 'grems pa bzhin// sngon tshe lha ya bu 'ga' zhig/ dus kyi mtho ris las
100a5(skyes rabs): yongs 'phos// brgya byin bka' las mi yi bdag/ mang pos bkur ba zhes par gyur// sa yi gzhi la chos kyi ni// spyod pa rjes 'jug dran pa'i slad// de yis mchod sbyin brgya pa la// rigs pa'i
100a6(skyes rabs): mtshan nyid cung zad blangs// de nas lha yi bdag po'i bkas// bi shwa karma sa de gnas su// 'od ldan rin chen mchod sdong ni// bsod nams bzhin du ma thob bsgrubs// de nas de ni lha la chags//
100b1(skyes rabs): skye bo dge mtshan g.yo ba med// rmos sogs lngas rnams rgyun chad pra// rgyal po'i bang mdzod zad par gyur// de nas su bdag de yis de// gang gA yi ni chu la 'phangs// da lta yang ni sa 'og na//
100b2(skyes rabs): rin chen gyis rgyan nyi mas bzhin// dus kyis de ni yo na zhwa yingad kyi 'an lnga 'gyur ma yin// yongasu gyur pas mi 'jigs geng // 'gro na nges par de yod min// ma 'ongs dus na skye dgu'i lo// stong phrag brgyad cu
100b3(skyes rabs): pa yi tshe// rgyal blo grags pa dung lta dkar// dung zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur// mi bdag dpag bsam shing rta des// mchod sdong bsod nams kyis 'thob 'di// mdun na 'don gyi bur gyur pa//
100b4(skyes rabs): byams pa la ni rab sbyin 'gyur// slong ba yid bzhini nor gyur pa// byams pa yis kyang 'di blangs nas// 'phrul la dum bur byas nas ni// 'jig rten dbul po med byed 'gyur// byams pas mchod
100b5(skyes rabs): sdong byin de nas// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas nyid 'thob// bla na med pa'i ye shes gter// lha rnams kyis ni mchod par 'gyur/ btsun mo blon po'i tshogs dang bcas// stong phrag brgyad cu dag
100b6(skyes rabs): gis ni// yongs su bskor nas dung zhes pa'i// rgyal po'ang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur// skye ba snga ma'i smon lam gyis// dung gi dge ba rgyas pa dag/ byas pa nges par longs spyod slad// 'bras bu
101a1(skyes rabs): yongs su smin par 'gyur// yul dbus su sngon rgyal po ni// nor lha'i bu lha nor lha'i bu// byang phyogasu yang mi bdag ni// nor gyis bkur pa zhes pa byung // 'byor
101a2(skyes rabs): pa'i dran pa las 'khrungs pa// khon gyis sems gdungs de dag gis// yid no g.yul dag rtsom pa// lhag par rab tu dga' bar gyur// de nas nor gyis bkur ba 'ongs// grong khyer du yang rab tu zhuH
101a3(skyes rabs): glang po shing rta'i tshogs rnams kyi// gang+gA'i 'gram ni bar med byas// der ni rin chen gtsug ces pa// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas nyid thob// brgya byin tshangs sogs lha rnams kyis// zhabs la/
101a4(skyes rabs): mchod ldan de yis mthong // de bsams rgyal po nor lha'i bu// kye ma bsod nams chen por ldan// gang la skabs gsum pas phyag byas// 'di ni yul gyi khongs nas gnas// de nas de yi mthu yis ni//
101a5(skyes rabs): der ni sa skyong de dag gis// khon gyi rdul ni zhi ba yis// log par rmongs pa yongs zung gyur// de nas sa bdag nor lha'i bus// pha rol dang ni sdu mas byas nas// bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs te/
101a6(skyes rabs): longs spyod kun gyis mchod pa byas// mchod pa'i mjug tu bdag phyag 'tshal// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis// bdag ni chen por gyur cig ces// smon lom dag kyang byas par gyur// skabs 'dir shin tu
101b1(skyes rabs): che ba'i sgra// dung las yang ngag 'khrungs pa'i tshe// phyag 'tshal mdun na gnas de la// rin chen gtsug gis bka' stsal pa/ dung zhes bya ba'i sa sbyong ni// 'khor los sgyur bar khyod 'gyur te// 'jug
101b2(skyes rabs): tu byang chub ldan pas kyang // dge ba yang dag thob par 'gyur// de ltar dam pa'i smon lam bsod nams rgyas pa las ni sa bdag nor lha'i bu// mi yi bdag po dung zhes bya bas blo gros 'thob 'gyur rin chen
101b3(skyes rabs): gtsug gis bstan// de bzhin byang chub tu ni rnam dag blo gros byams pas byams las mdzad par gyur// gang phyir dam pa'i grogs ni dge la mngon mjug bsod nams las kyi dang po yin// zhes pa dge ba'i
101b4(skyes rabs): dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod po dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las byams pa lung bstan pa'i yal 'dab ste bcu bdun pa'o// / sems ni rab tu
101b5(skyes rabs): dang ba'i dri ming mnyes gshin rab 'bar ba// shin tu chung ba'i sbyin pa'i me tog 'bras bu'i tsho shas ni// ru dbang gser ri ro ha na dang bdud rtsi'i gter byin pa'i// 'bras bu phun tshogs dag dang mtshung
101b6(skyes rabs): pa nyid du nyer mi 'gro// sngon ni kun mkhyen dgongs pa che// yang 'ong mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal// mgon med zas sbyin dag gi ni// kun dga' ra bar bzhugs par gyur// de yi slob ma snying rje'i gter// /
102a1(skyes rabs): 'phags pa 'od srungs che zhes bya// grong khyer nye ba'i nags kyi mthur// ljongs na rgyu zhing gshegs par gyur// der ni grong khyer mthar brten pa// shin tu ngan 'gro'i
102a2(skyes rabs): bud med dag/ ma dza yi nad kyis gzir ba yis// 'od srungs do ni ci 'dod mthong // de yis de mthong rab dang zhing // dang pa dag gis yang dag bsams// 'di 'dod bsod snyom su 'os pa// bsod
102a3(skyes rabs): nams las ni ci ma skyes// de yi 'dod pa ngo mtshar can// dad pa dang ldan rnam mkhyen nas// snying rje rgyas par lhung bzed dag/ rab tu bskyang nas bsod snyoms blangs// sems ni ngang pa drag po yis// 'bras
102a4(skyes rabs): chan rab mang phul ba'o tshe// mdze mo de yi lag pa yi// sor mo brul nas snong du lhung // de 'og de yis sdig pa bzhin// mi rtag lus dag dor nas ni// dga' ldan zhes bya lha rnams kyi// nang du yang dag
102a5(skyes rabs): skyes par gyur// rmad byung de shes brgya byin ni// sbyin pa'i dge la gus rgyas pas// 'bad pas 'od srungs dam pa'i snod// bdud rtsi dag gis yongasu bkang // dge slong rab zhi'i bdud rtsi yis// khengs
102a6(skyes rabs): ngos bdud rtsi byin la yang // dga' med rtswa yi rtse mo yos// lhung bzed thur du kha bstan gyur// dam pa snying rje rgyas pa rnams// dmin la mdza' gcugs dga' ba bsten// phun sum tshogs pa 'bar ba yi//
102b1(skyes rabs): bzhin la gus pa dman par gyur// de ni dga' ldan lha tshogs na// gnas pa thos nas mi yi bdag/ gsal rgyal gyi ni bcom ldan gyi// mchod ston lhag par gnas par byas// rgyal ba de yI khang pa na// dpal
102b2(skyes rabs): 'byor ngo mtshar byed mthong nas// 'phags pa dga' bos bsod nams de// dris shing bcom ldan gyis bka' sprul// sngon ni khyim bdag zhig gi bu// dbul ba las ni 'bangs nyid gyur// zhing las dag lnga
102b3(skyes rabs): yang dag chags// ltogs shing ring pa ngal bar gyur// yun ring zhig na ma yis ni// snum dang tsha med zan chad gcig/ khyer nas 'ongs pa des thob nas// gus dang bcas pas za ru song // lag pa bkrus pa de
102b4(skyes rabs): yi tshe// ci dgar yang dag 'ongs pa yis// rang sangs rgyas la de nyid ni// rab tu drang ba'i sems kyis byin// de nyid dus kyi sa sa kya la/ 'byor pa 'di ni sbyin pa yi// thigs pa de yi dang po'i 'bras// de
102b5(skyes rabs): skad bcom ldan gsung thos nas// dge slong dag ni ya mtshan gyur// rgyal po yid kyang yungs pa yi// mchod pa bcom ldan mdun du byas// rgyal pos longs spyod ma lus pas// gus pas zhal zas
102b6(skyes rabs): phul byas nas// 'bru mar bum pa bye ba yis// mar me yi ni phreng ba byas// der ni dbul mos mar me ni// shin tu chung ba dag cig phul// thams cad sna ni rab zad nas// rab tu 'das tshe gang ma song //
103a1(skyes rabs): de yi sems ni dri med kyi// smon lam de yis rnam pasams pa// shAkya thub pa nyid du ni// 'gyur bar kun mkhyen gyis bka' stsal// bcom ldan mdun du rgyun
103a2(skyes rabs): yis// rin chen sgron me'i phreng phul nAs// phyag 'tshul nAs ni mdun bstud te// gus pa yis ni du ga sol ba// sod de nams de de'i mthu drug las// bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin la ma gyis//
103a3(skyes rabs): med yang drag rdzogs byang chub// khyod kyi su l-i ster mi bgyid// khyod kyi bka' drin brtse bra las// de ni thob par bdug 'tshal lo// rnam par mi rtag 'bras thob slad// dpag bas mi rkang 'thung bsten pa
103a4(skyes rabs): lags// de skad rgyal po'i tshig thos nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi sgo bka' stsal pa// blo med yang dag rdzogs pA yi// byang chub sa bdag rnyed par dka'// pad+ma'i skud pa byas kyang phra// ri bau bas kyi shin
103a5(skyes rabs): tu brling // rgya mtsho bas kyang zab pa de// bde blag tu nIni 'thob ma yin// bdag gis skye ba gzhan rnams su// sbyin pa mang pos thob ma gyur// sems ni rab dang dri med kyi// ye shes de yi rgyu ru gsungs
103a6(skyes rabs): nga las nu yi skyo ba la// bdag gi gling bzhi'i bdag po yis// yun ring sbyin pa'i 'bras bu spyad// byang chub de ni thob ma gyur// blta sdug skye bar sbyin pa yis// 'khor los sgyur ba'i dpal di ni/
103b1(skyes rabs): tu che ba bdag gis spyad// byang chub de ni thob ma gyur// gnyis skyes skye ba bI lA mar// glang po brgyad ni sngon byin pas// bsod nams chen po bdag gis thob// byang chub de ni thob ma gyur// gang zhig
103b2(skyes rabs): rang gi chung ma 'di// sha za zhes brjod rnam par spangs// dge bo'i bdag nyid rgyal po'i bu// gzugs ngan du ni sngon pa dag gyur// dpal la dpal dang dpung par sa// stong la dga' ba rtag gnas
103b3(skyes rabs): gang // de ni gzugs dman sdug bsngal ldan// su zhig yon tan thams cad rgyas// gzugs bral lus ni gtong ba la// zhugs de bde sogs bdag po yis// lha yi gtsug gi nor byin nas//
103b4(skyes rabs): mnga' lnga pa dang mtshungs par byas// mchod sbyin byed de'i mchod sbyin la// grong khyer stong phrag drug cu ni// gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon gzugs// ri bo lhun po'i dpal thob gyur// dge ba'i
103b5(skyes rabs): skye ba de la ni// bdag gi mchog tu spyan sogs byas// bsod nams de dag rnams kyang thob// byang chub de ni thob ma gyur// rtse gsum rgyal po'i skye ba la// bdag gis bden pa'i mthu yis ni//
103b6(skyes rabs): tshor med mu ga dang btsas bcom// byang chub de ni thob ma gyur// mi thi lar ni mchod sbyin byed// lha chen rgyal po'i skye ba la// bsod nams phun tshogs bdag gis thob// byang chub de ni thob
104a1(skyes rabs): ma gyur// sa sbyong ni mi'i skye bya la// mi thi lcar sngon dka' thub sbyin// mchod sbyin gyis ni bsod nA masna thob// byang chub de ni thob ma gyur// sngon ni mi dadag
104a2(skyes rabs): dga' blo la// phra ba ldan pa'i bu bzhi dang // lnga pA dag kyang me ldong bzhin// yon tan lhag pa byA bar gyur// dus kyi mthar ni nye ba'i tshe// sau yi bdag po de yis bsam// bdag gi
104a3(skyes rabs): mthar ni rgyal srid lA// rtsub mo 'di bzhi 'os pa min// bdag gi bu ni me long bzhin// legs spyod shes rab dri med dang // ldan pas rgyal srid dag gi dpal// gzugs brnyan mdzes pa
104a4(skyes rabs): 'thob pa yi ni// 'di bsams de yis blon la smras// skye gnas kyis bslang btsun mo yi// tshogs kyis mchod par gyur pa dang // gang gi dbu rgyan mi g.yo la// nor bu'i rkang rjes dag la
104a5(skyes rabs): 'ang mnyam// sgo yi ljon pA'i pad+ma so la// gtor drug mthong bar gyur ba nI// khyed kyis mi yi dbang por bya// zhes brjod mI bdag mtho risu// gshegs tshe blon blos me long bzhin+d+ra/
104a6(skyes rabs): de yi brjod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi// rim pa rnams kyi dbang por byas// chos ni nges par bya ba la// rgol dang phyir rgol rnams kyis gang // mthong ba nyid kyis rang nyid ni// rgyal pham rigs
104b1(skyes rabs): pa dag la gnas// sngon gyi rgyu mtshan med par ni// mi 'dod sdig pa thong gyur pa// bram ze dbyug can+da zhes pa la// brtse ba ldan pa'i mdun du ni// ba lang zung don khyim bdag gi/ rgod ma
104b2(skyes rabs): bslad las shing rta bas// sto'u ltung las 'jog por ni// gnas pa'i chung mas rnam par rtsod// bu ni bsang las chang 'tshong mes// rtsod lnga mtshungs pa'i chud pa ni// de yi mi mthun phyogs
104b3(skyes rabs): 'jig slad// brjod nas de gtang rnam par bkrol// lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khyad par las// sems can mi ma yin rnams kyi// sems kyi rjes sbyangs the tshom ni// de dang de dag nges par
104b4(skyes rabs): byas// gang gis char med kyis dge ba'i// mu ge lo ni bcu gnyis la// zos kyis sems can kun gyi srong// rab tu 'tsho ba nyid du bsgrubs// de ltar me long bzhin skyes tshe// bdag gis
104b5(skyes rabs): bsod nams thob par gyur// che rgyus yang dag rdzogs byang chub// de ni nam yang ma rtog so// 'bad rtsol shin tu che bar ni// spro ba med pa brgyar goms pa'i// dri medo shes pas kun
104b6(skyes rabs): rdzob ni// bcom pas da lta bdag gis thob// gang yong shin tu mchog gyur bla med bden pa rigs pa'i yang dag rdzogs pa'i bya nga chub 'di// mi bdag ye shes shes rab dag gis rtogs
105a1(skyes rabs): b+h+yas nges par sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyis mi 'thog/ rmongs pa'i mtshan mo dang bral sprin sad nA mkha' rab gsalnga dri ma med pa dag gis bsten// zol med kun+da dga'i
105a2(skyes rabs): bzhi de ni srid pa'i mun pa gcod byed nyin mo'i dpal 'byor yin// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las me long gi bzhin gyi rtogs
105a3(skyes rabs): pa brjod pa'i yal 'deb ste bco brgyad pa'o// // gang yang ye shes slob dpon dge ba'i rgyu// 'khor ba'i chu gter zam pas gang bsgrubs pa// 'di ni gnyen dang mdza'
105a4(skyes rabs): bshes spun zla dang // ma dang pha dag gis kyang byed pa min// rgyal po'i khyab kyi grong khyer gyis// ka lan ta ka'i gnas zhi snga ba// 'ong ma'i tshal gnas dga' bar ston// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
105a5(skyes rabs): bzhugs par gyur// bang nas skyes dang nye rgyal te// kun tu rgyu ni gnyis po sngon// dge slong dngos por rab rdzogs pas// zhi ba dag tu zhugs par byas// de nas yang dag bstan mdzad pas// dag
105a6(skyes rabs): slong shA ri'i bu dag ni// gang gis dgra bcom mngon byas te// de ni thar par 'gro bzod gyur// de yi rmad byung ba sngags 'os te// dge slong kun gyis mthong gyur nas// de la sngon gyi spyod mtha' dris//
105b1(skyes rabs): des kyang de dgra rnams la gsungs// bram ze mo yi grogs po yi// chung ma yon tan mchog gyur pa// pha yis rtse mor ming dag kyang // su ra pi ka zhes btags par gyur// de yi ming pos
105b2(skyes rabs): su ra pA pa// zhes pa rang sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur// dang po'i tshul khrims zhes bya ba// nam zhig khyim du 'ongs par gyur// de yis khyod bstan pa las// khyim pa'i gus pas de mgron gnyer// rab
105b3(skyes rabs): btud gus pa'i spyod pa dang // rim gro dag gis tshim par byas// nam zhig chos gos 'grub pa yis// bya ba dag gi ni byed pa de'i// khab kyi las dbang mthong gyur nas// smon lom dag ni gus bcwa pra//
105b4(skyes rabs): ji ltar chan pa rno 'di dang // ji ltar zab mor 'gro ba'i khrag/ de ltar bdag gis shes rapra ni// mchog tu gyur ces yang dag btab// rang sngangs rgyas la gus pa dang // smon la ma dag ni de yis kyang // shes rab
105b5(skyes rabs): ldan pa shA ri'i bur// skye ba 'di la der gyur to// dge slong shA rI'i bu 'di de// da lde rab rno blo mchog ldan// dge ba'i snod gyur gang gi phyir// dam pa'i blo ni dpag bsam shing // bcom ldan
105b6(skyes rabs): 'das kyis gsung thos nas// dge slong rnams kyis yang zhus pa// mi las smad pa zlos gar mkhan/ rigs su shA ri'i bu cis 'khrungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis der// bka' stsal skye ba
106a1(skyes rabs): sngon nyid la// blo gros chen po zhes bya ba'i// rgyal bu dam pas 'dod par gyur// dpal dang ldan yang de yi blo// rab tu byung la phyogs par gyur// rab tu dang ba yongs
106a2(skyes rabs): smin la// phun sum tshogs pas sgrib mi byed// rgyal sras gzhon nu rnamya ngag ni// rab byung rigs la 'os min nyid// ces brjod pa yis byams pa yis// 'bod pas de ni bzlog par gyur// nAm
106a3(skyes rabs): zhig glang chen la zhon nas// skye bo lam du 'gro ba ngas// rgan po dbul po mthong gyur nas// snying rje bas ni 'di dag smras// skal meng nor ldan 'jig rten na// gnyen gyi 'ching bas bsdams rnams kyi//
106a4(skyes rabs): rab byung 'thob bya min pa nyid// khyod kyang su yis rnam par bzlog/ des smras dbul po bdag la ni// lhung bzed med cing chos gos med// zhi ba'i yo byad drag la yang // nor ni nye bar mkho ba nyid//
106a5(skyes rabs): rgyal po'i sras kyis de thos nas// thub pa'i dka' thub nags song ste// de ni rab tu 'byung bcug nas// lhung bzed chos gos rab tu byin// yun ring min pa'i dus kyis de// rang sangs rgyas ni nyid gyur
106a6(skyes rabs): nas// rgyal po'i sras la mngon phyogs te// rdzu 'phrul mchog rnams bstan par gyur// de yi mthu rnams mthong gyur nas// mi yis bdag po'i sras des bsams// kye ma ngar ba che nyid phyir// bdag
106b1(skyes rabs): la rab byung dkon par gyur// dbul zhing rnam 'byed med las ni// dman rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka'// des na dman rigs rnams 'byor dang // ldan par bdag ni skye bar shog/ de yi smon lam dag
106b2(skyes rabs): las ni// de nyid shA ri'i bu 'drir skyes// skye ba gzhan du bcom ldan 'das// 'od srungs kyis ni rab tu byung // bden pa'i gter de nges por dgyes pas 'dul ldan 'di ni dge ba dag gi slang // yang dag
106b3(skyes rabs): rab tu dang ba rgyas pas dus su shes rab ldan pa rnams kyi mchog/ shAkya thub pa'i slob mar 'os pa dag las mchog tu bzhed par 'gyur bar bstan// maung+gal 'di yang 'di ru
106b4(skyes rabs): gsungs zhes yang dag rig pa'i rang bzhin ldan rnams smra// skye ba gzhan du dbul po las byed las// drang srong chen po 'ga' zhig brtse ba yis// lhung bzed chos gos dag ni byin gyur nas// mtshungs
106b5(skyes rabs): med rdzu 'phrul mthu yang rab tu bstan// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las shA ri'i bu rab tu byung ba'i rtogs pa brjod
106b6(skyes rabs): ba'i yol 'dab ste bcu dgu pa'o// // gang yang mchog tu mi bzang mthu ldan gang // de ni bsod nams phul phyung ngar ba'i mchog/ mngon sum gyis mtshon dge ba'i phyogs
107a1(skyes rabs): kyi dbang // skye gzhan mtshan nyid nyid du nye bar gyur// sngon tshe mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal// dga' ba mgon med zas sbyin gyi// kun+da dga' ra bar bcom ldan 'das/
107a2(skyes rabs): de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par gyur// khyim bdag stobs kyi sde zhes pa// gro nga ni nor las byung bar gyur// 'bras bu'i tshogs kyis slong ba yi// phyogs tshogs grib bsil ljon pa bzhin// de yi
107a3(skyes rabs): btsun mo rgyalnga sde la// dus su pad+ma'i mig can gyi// bu zhig bsod nams ngag gis btsas// dga' ba drag ni gzugs can bzhin// lhan skyes rin chen sgron ma'i 'od// de yi rna ba'i rna rgyan gyur// gser
107a4(skyes rabs): nI byaM bA brgya yis kyang // pad+me gau rin la mtshungs ma gyur// 'di ni rgyu skar gro bzhin skyes// sna brgyan rin chen byi ba ri// gro bzhin bye ba rna zhes te// gzhon nu yon tan ldan par gyur// de ni dri med gsal
107a5(skyes rabs): zhing mdzes// cha rnams kyis ni yongasu rdzogs// mi dman kun dag 'i rgyas gyur pa// su yi zla ba bzhin ma gyur// mig ni mchim ldan pa'i ma// mchog tu rtsub pa'i tshig dag gis// snyan smra yin yang
107a6(skyes rabs): snang byas te// zla bas dug gi char phab bzhin// nor sbyin lta bur phun so tshogs pa'i// pa yis bzlog kyang gzhon nu de// rin chen don gnyer don mthun no// chen pos gling gzhan ring bar song // chu
107b1(skyes rabs): srin 'byung gnas rab bsgral nas// skye bo med pa'i lam bgrod de// las kyi rlabs kyis rnams bslad pas// rang gi don mthun 'bral bar gyur// don mthun gyis kyang de ma rnyed// mya ngan gyis log
107b2(skyes rabs): dalta bu yis// nyon mongs bsgrubs nas rang yul du// 'ching drang bral bar rab tu zhugs// de yang ngal zhing ngal bso dang // rab tu bral bas chu tshegs brgal// gdung ba'i mya ngan phreng
107b3(skyes rabs): ba yis// mtshan pa'i lho yi phyogasu song // nges bsams nor ni chen po dag/ yod la nor bsgrubs la brtson pa// nyon mongs 'bras bu dor ba ni// bdag gi tshul min nyid kyi bskyed// mi rnams
107b4(skyes rabs): cho ga shes bral ba las// kye ma nor sgrub lnga 'jug pa// gnod pa thams cad 'byung ba yis// smad 'os rgud pa dag gis gnas// 'khor ba nor gyi bsgrub pa la// bag chags goms las lus
107b5(skyes rabs): can rnams// rmongs pa 'di ni gser gyi ri// thob kyang yongasu tshim pa med// ngal dub rab rgyas ro dang bral// 'og gi mya ngan su gzhi 'di// 'brar ba'i dpal bzhin ring bar ni// bdag gi
107b6(skyes rabs): sred pa rab rgyas bye// kye ma gnas dang gnas rnamasu// ri dwags skom pas long ba bzhin// mya ngan gyi ni smig rgyu yis// bdag la rmongs pa bskyed pa nyid// skom pa 'di dang ngal ba yis// chu ni
108a1(skyes rabs): med pa'i sa gzhi 'di// phyogs ni 'bar bar bdag gis mthong // ci zhig bya zhing gang du 'gro// de ltar bsam shing ngal bus de// chu yi bsam pas song ba na// ngal
108a2(skyes rabs): dub rnam pa dang bcas bzhin// lcags kyi grong khyer mthong bar gyur// shin tu skrag pa'i spun zla bzhin// 'jig su rung ba'i skyes bu ni// dug ltar drag cing mig dmar po// sgo der gnas pa mthong bar
108a3(skyes rabs): gyur// de yis de la btung bA dIs// gang tshe tso yang myi smra ba// de tshe rang nyid nang zhugs pas// yi dwags 'jig rten rnam par mthong // rus pa chu rgyus lcug lus skams// gos med rdul gyi phreng bas
108a4(skyes rabs): gros// shing bsregs lta bu'i yi dwags rnams// mthong bas de ni gdung bar gyur// chu dang bral bas gzir de la// de dag gi ni chu bslangs pas// rang gi gdung ba yongs btang ste// de yi sdug bsngal
108a5(skyes rabs): gyis gzir gyur// gdung ba rab smra skom pa ni// drag pos gzir de la des smras// brtse med bdag la mya ngan gyi// dgon pa 'dir ni chu gang lngas// khyed su las ni ci zhig gis// sdug bsngal bzod
108a6(skyes rabs): dka' 'di la bkod// khyod rnams phyir bcos 'bras med pa// 'di las bdag ni mya ngan byed// gzir ba ma mthong mthong yang gang // de dag nyon mongs 'joms bzod pa// zug rngu med par brtag
108b1(skyes rabs): ba de'i// gnyid ni bde bas blun pa bzhin// de la des smras bdag cag ni// thar med mi yin 'gal ba'i las// rmongs pa las ni rab bsags pas// gdung ba mi bzad gnasu 'phangs// lhag
108b2(skyes rabs): bar smod cing smod pas gzhan gyi bstan pa nyams byas rgyags pas rgyags pa las// 'phags pa min zhing phra dog dag gis gdung ba rnam par brtson pa ma bzlog pa// bdag cag rnams ni brtse ba med pas
108b3(skyes rabs): skye bo legs pa'i snying la rtag tu ni// tshig gi lcags mnga' dug gis yongasu bsgos pas zug rngu rab tu zug par byas// sbyin pa ma byin nor ni phrogs pa nyid// 'tshe ba'i slad du sems ni byas pa nyid/
108b4(skyes rabs): bdag cag lus kyis gzhan gyi chung ma dag/ 'phrog pa'i rnam 'gyur rab tu byed pa bsgrubs// de dag dman pa la chags shing // ngan pa'i las la mkhas gyur pas// yI dwags grong khyer 'jigs
108b5(skyes rabs): rung 'dir// bdag cag nyon mongs snod nyid gyur// de dag tshig de des thos shing // gzhan du'ang rnam pa de lta yin// yi dwags mngon par mi 'dod pa// mthong nas snying rje rgyas por gyur// ngan
108b6(skyes rabs): 'gro'i grong khyer de las ni// bsod nams stobs kyis thon nas de// dri med grib ma bsil ba yi// nags kyi nang du phyin par gyur// de nA lam ring gyis dub cing // yongs ngal dal bu dal bu yis//
109a1(skyes rabs): skom pas yongs gdungs long ba bzhin// 'od byed ri las lhung bar gyur// ma lus phyogs rnams gsal byed pa'i// bsod nams bzhin du nyin zad tshe// rkun rmongs nug
109a2(skyes rabs): bo'i mun pa dag/ 'jig rten du ni sdig bzhin byung // byA dang bung ba chags gyur pa// pad+mo can gyi phun tshogs brgya// rnam rgyas rab tu 'grogs pa yi// gnyid bzhin yang dag byung bar gyur// snying
109a3(skyes rabs): rje las bzhin bsil zer gyi// zla 'od bdud rtsi'i thur ma yis// rab gsal skar ma 'gro ba'i mig/ de nas rab rib bral bar byas// 'khor ba nyin mo nub mo yI// 'char nub gzhan du gyur pa dag
109a4(skyes rabs): rnam 'phrul du ma mthong ba la// bdud rtsi'i 'od ni dgod pa bzhin// mig ni kun dgra'i bdud rtsi'i char// reg bde mtshan byed phyogs kyi ni// bu mo'i bzhin gyi me long dag/ dga' bre gzugs can
109a5(skyes rabs): bzhin shar tshe// ltad mo la ni gzhan gzugs kyis// mtho ris sa la 'ongs pa yi// mdzes pa'i gdong bzhin gzhal yas khang // gro zhin bye bas mdun du mthong // der ni lha yi bu mi dag/
109a6(skyes rabs): rgyags pa dang bcas bzhi mthong ste// zla ba shar ba'i kun dga' dang // rnam par rtse phyir 'grogs pa bzhin// de dbus mchog gi rnam pa can// dga' ba dang ldan mthong gyur te// gzhon nu'i dga'
109b1(skyes rabs): ba'i tshogs rnams dag/ rnam bcas nyid du gyur pa bzhin// rin chen rna rgya na dpung rgyan da // zur phung 'od zer ring po yi// mtshams las 'das pa'i ngo mtshar dag/ phyogs kyi gdong la 'dra
109b2(skyes rabs): bzhin// der ni legs byas las byung ba'i// ljon shing rgyas pa'i 'bras bu'i dbul// rkoHsa spyod bde ba phun sum tshogs// rmad byung de dag mthong bar gyur// de nas gro bzhin bye bA na// de dag
109b3(skyes rabs): dga' bas mgron gnyer do// zhing pa'i bza' btung dag la ni// mtshan mi bde bar bos par gyur// de nas rgyu skar me tog gi/ rlung chen the rangs 'od dag gis// mi rtag pas bzhin zla ba yi// dpal 'byor
109b4(skyes rabs): yongasu nyams par byas// mtshan po dag ni zad gyur cing // srid pa'i mig ni nyi ma dag/ 'byung po kun gyi bde sdug gi/ dbang po gcig pu shar ba'i tshe// gzhal yas khang dang lha mo rnams// skad cig
109b5(skyes rabs): gis ni mi snang gyur// skyes bu yang ni mdzes pa bzhin// rnam par nyams nas sa la lhung // de nas de yi rgyab tu ni// shin tu 'jigs rung khyi tshogs byung // 'gro gsum smod sdig gis bslad pa'i//
109b6(skyes rabs): nyon mongs phung po ma lus bzhin// kha dang mgrin pa nas brtsams sha/ za zhing drag gtsang khrag gis myos// de dag rnams kyi cho nge ldan// de ni zos shing zad par gyur// nyin mo'i mthar ni slad nas yang /
110a1(skyes rabs): gzhal yas khyang de byung ba mthong // lha mo bzhi po de dag dang // mdzes ldan skyes bu de yang ngo // de nas gro bzhin bye ba rna// shin tu ya mtshan nas de la// grogs
110a2(skyes rabs): po ngo mtshar 'di dag ni// mthong ba ci yin smos zhes dris// de dris de yis rab smras pa// grogs po 'di ni mnyan par gyis// khyod ni glo bzhin bye ba ni// des shes legs byas ldan pa yin// nor
110a3(skyes rabs): las byung ba'i grong du bdag/ sdug can phyugs ngag skyong bar gyur// rtag tu bdag gi phyugs rnams kyi// sha la rab tu bcad nas btsong // kA t+yA ya na zhes 'phags pa// snying rje'i gter ni bsod
110a4(skyes rabs): snyoms la// byin pas bdag la rab gsungs pa// las ngan 'di las rnam blar log/ bab col tshol ba'i nyon mongs ni// 'tshe ba'i rang bzhin bzong dka' 'di// rtsa ba bcad pa'i ljon pa bzhin//
110a5(skyes rabs): rang gi lus la ltung ba nyid// de ltar bdag nyid bzlog gyur kyang // gang tshe sdig las ma log pa// de tshe 'phags min la brtse ba// de yis bdag la slar gsungs pa// gal te rnam kun brtse
110a6(skyes rabs): med khyod// nyin bar dag ni 'tshe ba byos// mtshan mo bdag gi dam tshig las// tshul khrims sdom pa yang dag long // sems can kun la phan bzhed pa// de yis 'bad pas 'di brjod nas//
110b1(skyes rabs): tshul khrims blangs pa'i rang bzhin gyi// bsod nams blo gros bdag la gnang // dus kyis dus kyi dbang song ste// bdag gis gnas skabs 'di drag thob// sol tshan bdud rtsi char dag gis// nyin dang
110b2(skyes rabs): mtshan ni gtams pa bzhin// mtshan mo tshul khrims blangs 'bras dang // nyin par ngag ni 'tshe ba'i 'bras// bdag spyod bsod nams sdig pa yis// bde dang sdug bsngal dag tu 'dor// bdag ni
110b3(skyes rabs): sdig pa byed de la// grogs po yis ni snying rje mdzod// rang yul song nas bdag tshig gis// bden par bdag gi bu la smos// bdag gi khang pa'i zur mtha' na// gser gyi snod ni sbas nas yod//
110b4(skyes rabs): de ni phyung la sdig pa dag/ yongs su gtong ba'i bya ba bsgrubs// 'phags pa kA t+yA yA na nI// rtug tu bsod snyoms dag gi sa mchod// de yis dul bas de brjod che// de yis de bzhin zhes smras song //
110b5(skyes rabs): de ni song bas bdun dag tu// lha yi gzhal yasa? khang pa gzhan// rin chen+da pad+ma 'khri shing mdzes// dga' tshul gnyis pa lta bu mthong // dwer ni nyin mo rtsom pa na// lus med dang 'grogs lu swa bcus
110b6(skyes rabs): bzhin// lha mo dag dang skyes bu ni// rin po che yi brgyan pa mthong // de yi bde ba'i yo byad kyis// de bzhin nyid du der gus byas// lam ring nyon mongs dbus su ni// bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin nyin mo
111a1(skyes rabs): bzlas// de nas nam mkha'i gzhal yas khang // rtse nas pad+ma ldan bdag ltung che// sdug bsngal gyis bzhin 'jigs rung gi/ mun pa'i khur gyis 'gro ba byas// de nas mtshan bdag zla
111a2(skyes rabs): ba'i 'od// skyug cing nyams ldan nyid kyis bsil// 'od zer dkar ldan rim gyis ni// skye bo'i nad pa bzhin du mthong // nyin mo'i snang ba bzhin du gzhon+da// mtshan mo'i srin po bud med kyis// zos pa'i thod pa'i dum
111a3(skyes rabs): bu bzhin// ri bong bzhin du snang bar gyur// 'jig rten dus kyi n+dan gyis// byug pa zla 'od dog gis khyab// gzhal yas khang dang mtho ris kyi// ri dwags mig ni gshed song // gzhal yas khang nas skyes bu de// lhung
111a4(skyes rabs): par gyur cing sbrul gzugs kyis// brtse brgya pas ni rim pa yis// lan bdun dkris shing rnam par btsongs// de yi spyi bor bug pa dag/ de yis byas nas klad pa khrag/ za bar byed cing rim pas yis// mgo bo dag ni tsha
111a5(skyes rabs): mar byes// de nas skya red zer gyis bka'o// nyin mo yis ni bzhin gsos shing // 'jigs rung mthong ba'i nyon mongs las// skar ma rnams ni mig zum tshe// yang ni lha yi gau zhal yas khang // lha mo de dang gzhon nu
111a6(skyes rabs): de'ang // ma zad lus can lha yi ni// rgyan gyis brgyan par rab tu byung // shin tu mtshar la de dris shing // rang gi spyod mtha' de yis bshad// gnyis skyes bdag ni yid ces bya// khyim tshes dag gi chung ma ni// gzhon nu
111b1(skyes rabs): tsAn dog pa ma// g.yem ma lag 'gro bdag gi ni// shin tu yid du 'ong bar gyur// grong du gzhan gyi chung mar dga'// lug blo 'khrugs pa bdag gi blo// mtha' dag yul gyi grong du ni// des par bying zhing
111b2(skyes rabs): brlag par gyur// 'phags bA kA t+yA ya nas bdag/ 'dod pa'i chom rkun sdig shes nas// brtse ba'i dbang gis snying rje las// skye bos dben par dal bus gsungs// blun po gzugs dga' gzhan gyi ni//
111b3(skyes rabs): bud med lus 'grogs dga' ba yis// lus med me la phye ma leb// 'bab bzhin brlag par ma 'gro zhig/ kye ma 'dod chags la chags dang // bag med rab tu ltung ba dag/ 'dod ldan 'tshe ba po dag l+la//
111b4(skyes rabs): gzhan 'joms chung mar gus pa mchog/ sdang dang ngal du bo che bar 'dar bas rnam par 'khrugs gyur cing / bya rgod bud med kyi ni sos smags sen mos nyams par byed / gzhan gyi chung mer dga' sgrub rnams
111b5(skyes rabs): kyi spu zing byed pa yi// kun tu rmongs pa dang ni dmyal ba'ang 'dod pa mchog/ de slad mnyes gshan+ya ngan pa yis// las 'di las ni khyod phyir log/ mi gtsang sdig pa'i reg pa la// khyi rnams kha na dga'
111b6(skyes rabs): bar 'o gyur// de skad de yis brtse bas bdag/ bkag kyang rnam par ma dag blo// ma 'gags pa yi chags pa yis// bsdams pasau de nyid gtam ma byas// de nas bdag gis ma btang ba// mkhyen nas kA
112a1(skyes rabs): t+yA ya na nI// nyin mo'i spyod la phan brtson pas// bdag la tshul khrims blang ba gnang // tshul khrims yang dag blangs nas nyin// gzhan gyi bud med bgrong las mtshan
112a2(skyes rabs): bsod nams sdig bsdu bskyed la sa 'di// bde sdug rang bzhin dag tu gnas// nor lngas byung ba'i grong du khyod// song nas bdag gris bu la smos// me yi gnas na bdag bris ni// gser dag
112a3(skyes rabs): sbas te bzhag nas yod// de phyung 'tsho ba'i bya ba dang // k+Sha t+yA ya na de yang mchod// de yis gus pas de skang brjod// de nas gro bzhin byaM ba song // de yis mdun du nor bu yi// gzhal yas
112a4(skyes rabs): khang gnas lha mo mthong // mdzes sdug 'o ma'i rgya mtsho lngas// dulA dub med bskrun dpal mo bzhin// de yis gzhal yas khang pa yi// rkang pa bzhin la ya dwags bzhi// btags nas
112a5(skyes rabs): blta na mi sdug cing // chu rgyus ldan pa de yis mthong // des kyang de ni ra b+he shes ni sa// mdza' ba'i tshig gis yang dag bshad// lha lnga 'os pa'i btung ba dang // ro ldan bza' ba de la byin//
112a6(skyes rabs): za che yi dwag sa rnams kyi brda sa// snying rje rje bzhin ring nas bslangs// de yis brtse bas de rnams las// bya rog la bzhin zan chags byin// gcig gi zan chag gra phug gyur// gzhan gyi
112b1(skyes rabs): lcags kyi thu lum dang // gsum pa yis ni rang shra nyid// bzhi pa'i khrag dang rnag nyid gyur// de mthong de dag sdug bsngal gyi// spyod pas snying rje ldan gyur des// bzhin gyis pad+ma mdzes pa dag
112b2(skyes rabs): mdzes bral byas pa de la dris// de yis rmad byung de dris pa// ri dwags mig can de yi smras// gro bzhin bye rna 'di dag la// byin pa tshim pa'i don mi 'gyur// nor las byung ba'i grong gnas
112b3(skyes rabs): ba// bram ze dga' ba zhes pa ni// dang po'i rkang pa la bsten 'di'o// chung ma rab dga' zhes pa dag/ gnyis pa'i rkang pa la btags dang // bu ni gos med ces pa yin// rkang pa gzhan la brta
112b4(skyes rabs): 'di dag/ bdag gi 'bangs mo mna' ma yin// rgyu skar sbyor ba'i mchod pa la// zas kyi nyer sbyor bdag gis mngon// legs par byas tshe bdag khyim du// 'phags pa k+Sha t+yA ya na byon//
112b5(skyes rabs): bdag sems rab tu dang ldan nas// bsod snyoms kyis ni do la mchod// mdzes pas phyogs rnams dri med kyi// ce su bzung ba mdzad bzhin gshegs// de nas bdag gi badrag po 'di// khrus
112b6(skyes rabs): byas mgyogs par yang dag 'ongs// rab tu dga' slad bdag gis smras// bsod snyoms phul ba de thos nas// khro las bdag smras mchod 'os rnams// mchod pa med par dge sbyong ni// sgra med
113a1(skyes rabs): g.yo ldan gra phug 'os// khyod kyis ci yi phyir du mchod// rmongs las 'di yi rjes brjod tshe// de bzhin bus kyang bdag la smras// chos pa thog mar za 'os te//
113a2(skyes rabs): lcags kyi thu lum cis mi za// bdag gi mna' ma 'di rtag tu// sngon la zos la longs spyod cing // bdag gis brjod la mna' byed pa// rang sha za zhes smra ba mo// 'brangs mo 'di yang zas drag la/
113a3(skyes rabs): rku zhing nyams pa dag tu byed// smad tshe bden par byed pa ni// rnag khrag za zhes smra byed yi ni// de dag yi dwags 'di dge gyur// rang gi ngag dang mtshungs par za// bdag ni 'phags pa'i bka' drin gyis//
113a4(skyes rabs): lho yi longs spyod nye bar spyod// khyod kyis rang yul byin nas ni// bdag gi bu mo dag la smos// khyod kyi pa yis khang pa na// gser gyi gter ni rnam bzhi yod// de dag thon la ci rigs byur// rangat+na gi
113a5(skyes rabs): skye ba gnas pa byos// dang ming po'i ming dag gis// kA t+yA yA nA rtag tu mchog/ gro bzhin bye ba'i rna la khyod// rang yul du song dral bzong // khyod ni rang khyim nas 'thon nas// lo ni bcu gnyis
113a6(skyes rabs): yongs su rdzogs// de skad brjod nas de yis ni// yi dwags bzhi po la bsgos te// nyal ba nyid nin yud tsam gyis// de ni rang yul phyin par byas// de yang 'phral la rang yul gyi// skyeng mos tshal
113b1(skyes rabs): gyi nags nas langs// pha ma bral ba'i mya ngan gyis// long ba nye bar gyur par thos// dge slong gnyis skyes mgron po'i tshogs// lha yi gnas rnams mchod byed pa// rang gi pha yi khyim mthong nas//
113b2(skyes rabs): mchog tu ya mtshan dag tu gyur// skad cig nyid phyir dngos po kun// mi rtag nyid du nges byas nas// mdza' dang chags pa kun btang ste// der ni gnas pas yang dag bsams// kye ma nyin mtshan
113b3(skyes rabs): mtha' med par// kun tu rmongs pa'i gnyid 'di ni// rmyi lam sgyu ma'i rol rtsed kyi// rmad du byung ba'i rnam 'phrul byed// skye ba'i lam rab ster ba'i ma// sa bon 'debs nus 'di yi pa// mgron po'i
113b4(skyes rabs): mchod dang stan lha'i lus// 'di la nges pa'i tshogs 'di gang// dpal 'byor 'khor ba'i spyan rum 'khyam por yongs 'dris gser gyi sred pa'i 'od // re ba phyogs rnams rdzogs par 'ching ba'i glog
113b5(skyes rabs): bzhin reg pa med cing rab tu g.yo// lus ni gnod pa kun dang 'jigs dang 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang rga da na ba dang // sdug bsngal dag gis yongasu 'gro ste de lta na yang lus 'dzin yid mi 'byung //
113b6(skyes rabs): dpal 'byor mtha' dag shis gyur cig/ thal mo 'di sbyar nang mi la// bud med rnams la yon bzod mdzod// bdag ni rab byung kho na dga'// 'di bsams de yis pa ma dag/ yang dag dbugs
114a1(skyes rabs): byung nig dag thob// chos lam dag cing zhi ba yi// gnas la blo ni bkod par gyur// don mthun nyams kyur yun ring na// 'ongs shing rid kyang snying stobs 'byor// ma zhus pas
114a2(skyes rabs): na rang mi yang // brtse ba'i gnas nyid du ma gyur// 'khor ba'i nyon mongs kyis rnams 'khrugs// de dag gal te brtse ba na// dam pa su la rjes mi brtse// de dag phun tshogs thob mi 'dod// phyugs skyed bram
114a3(skyes rabs): zla bud med la// gser thob mngon sum mtshan nyid can// phrin sogs ji ltar brjod pa bzhin// de dag rnams la bzlas byas te// kA d+hA ya na dang phrad nas// zhi ba de yis rab byung blangs// blu na po rnams kyi
114a4(skyes rabs): sgyid lug rgyu// de nas de yis rgyun zhugs kyi// 'bras bu dri ma med thob cing // lan cig phyir 'ong phyir mi 'ong // 'bras dang de bzhin dge bcom 'bras// khams gsum dag las 'dad chags bral// gser
114a5(skyes rabs): dang bong ba rdo bar mtshungs// na mkha' lag mthil mtshungs pa dang // ral gri tsan mtshungs par gyur// de nas mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal// smyig ma'i nags na bzhugs pa yi// bcom ldan rgyal ba
114a6(skyes rabs): lta ru de// kA t+yA ya na'i bka' yis song // phyag ni byas shing bcom ldan 'das// rang nyid dgyes pas dri ba byas// de nas gro bzhin byi ba rna// dga' ba rgyas pas de la smras// bcom ldan chos kyi sku yis ni//
114b1(skyes rabs): thos pa'i lam nas mthong bar gyur// da lta gzugs kyi sku yis ni// bsod nams kyis ni bdag gis mthong // mi chung bsod nams kyis 'thob bya// khyod ni mthong ba'i bdud rtsi 'di// 'thungs nas ngoms par
114b2(skyes rabs): ma gyur pa// de dag mchog tu bslus pa nyid// chags pa med kyang khyod kyi gzugs// su zhig chags par mi bgyid lags// byugs pa med kyang khyod kyi spyan// kye ma dga' bas byugs pa lags// khyod kyi
114b3(skyes rabs): gtam dang khyod rjes dran// khyed dang phrad dang khyod bstan pa// 'di dag dge ba'i rtsa ba yis// 'bras bu phun tshogs rgyas pa yin// zhes pa thos nas bcom ldan gyis// rab tu dang bus dga' bar byas// des bstan
114b4(skyes rabs): kun+d+ha dag 'ar ba dang // mnyam pa'i gnas ni do yos thob// de yA gan su bcom ldan yang // byams pa yis ni yang dog gshegs// de yi chos kyi kha don dag/ snyan pa thos nas des rab bsngags// gro bzhin gyi
114b5(skyes rabs): ba'i rna ba yis// rab zhi phun tshogs de mthong nas// sngon gyi spyod tshul dge slong gis// dris shing bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// ba ra NA sir rdzogs pa yi// sangs rgyas 'od srungs zhes pa sngon// mdzad pa
114b6(skyes rabs): rdzogs nas myang 'das kyi// dbyingasu yongs su mya ngan 'das// mi bdag kr-i ki zhes pas de'i// mchod rten rin chen rnams kyis byas// de yi bsod nams tshogs rnams ni// rang nyid mtho ris brjod bzhin
115a1(skyes rabs): 'phags// der ni nor dag brda byas nas// zhig ral gso ba la bzhag pa// de nas de sras rgyal srid thob// chags dang rmongs pas byin ma gyur// de nas byang phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i//
115a2(skyes rabs): ded dpon nor sbyin zhes pa yis// de yi cheng du rna ba'i rgyan// sa yau rin du rab tu phul// dus gzhan nye bar 'ongs nas kyang // nor chen gzhan yang phul byas nas// yong dag bsod nams ldan pa bdag // gyur ces
115a3(skyes rabs): de yis smon lom btab// de ni gro bzhin bye rno 'di// bsod nams dag gis gnas chen thob// de lta kho nA'i rna ba'i rgyan// mtshan nyid dag dang ldan par gyur// gang phyir 'gro ba'i dus su 'dris// ma yis tshig
115a4(skyes rabs): ni rtsub mo dag/ thos par byas nas de yi 'di// ngal dub chen po dag tu gyur// dag pa'i yon tan dam pa yI// las kyi ras chen dbus su ni// nag po'i lus kyi chu chud yang // gsal ba nyid du nges par zin//
115a5(skyes rabs): legs byas grogs ldan snying stobs spro ba dag dang khyim spangs grogs kyis dga' ba dang // mi bzang sgrol ba'i brtson 'grus zam stegs dag dang phongs pa skyob pa'i brtse ba dang // mjug tu yang ni zhi ba yongs
115a6(skyes rabs): su 'driso par gyur cing rab dang rab bzhin blo// bsod nams 'thob pa'i yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni 'bras bu rgyas par gnas pa yin// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod
115b1(skyes rabs): ba dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las gro bzhin bye ba rna'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste nya shu pa'o// / lce gnyis 'grogs la 'tsho ba ji ltar yod// gtso bo mAng la bde ba
115b2(skyes rabs): ltar yod// las kyis bcings la rang stobs ji ltar yod// shes rab mchog la gnong pa ji ltar yod// lus 'phags kyi nI mI thi l-i ro// mi bdag chu yi sems dpa'i ming // gang gi dpung po lag
115b3(skyes rabs): 'gro yi// sa yi khur gyi ngal sor gyur// nyes med phun sum tshogs pa de'i// blon chen dum bu zhes pa ni// yon tan drug po ma lus pa// yongs shes phur bu lta bu byung // lugs shesaM gus las
115b4(skyes rabs): de yi bor// mi yi bdag pos bltas gyur cing // byA ba'i dbang las skye bo kun// rtag tu bzhin la rab lhur gyur// chu dang skye bo bzlog mod kyang // spong ba'i rjes su 'gro ba yis// srol du rab tu
115b5(skyes rabs): 'bab pa yi// srid pa dag ni rnam par 'phel// de yi rang bzhin skye bo kun// mthong nas phrag dog gis brgyal ba'i// blon po'i tshogs kyi de yi ni// rnam par ltung ba rab tu bsams// 'byed
115b6(skyes rabs): mkhas de dag rgyal po yi// gnas su rab zhugs de yis ni// rje bo stobs de yang yang du// dgas pa'i gnas su byas nas bshad// de dag tshig gi dogs pa yi// rgyal po de las phyir phyogs
116a1(skyes rabs): gyur// bud med byis pas sbyong ni// mchog tu bsngags pa la yid ches// dogs par mi 'os la yang ngogs// dogs 'os skyon la'ang dogs pa med// bye brag
116a2(skyes rabs): mi shes g.yo ba yis// sna skyong bya rog dogs pa tsan+da// je bo chags bral rtags rnams ni// rnam gzigs blon po'i gang zag gis// rang sras sa 'tsho seng ge zhos// bya la dogs bcas dal bus
116a3(skyes rabs): smras// g.yo can phra mas mi yi bdag/ bdag la yid brtan bral bar byas// snying ni rnam par phye bstan yang // gcugs pa nyid du 'gro ma yin// chags dang bral ba'i jo bo ni// kun brjod mthong
116a4(skyes rabs): thos bor de// bdug la lhong pa nyid 'gyur te// rgan po yi ni lus po bzhin// prA ma sA tha dad rob bskyed pa'i// mdza' ba 'dum par mi 'gyur te// rdo yi dum bur byas pa yi// nor bu slar yang
116a5(skyes rabs): 'byar ba min// lce gnyis gya gyur non pa yi// jo bo tsAn rkang 'thung ni// don bya byed cing yon tan dang // ldan yang bsten bya nyid mi 'gyur// mi bdag gat+te ra nr-i don gnyer ba// 'jigs rung
116a6(skyes rabs): sdang ba'i dug 'bebs pa'i// lce gnyis pas bcom rnam 'khrugs pa'i// mi ni ji ltar dge ba bsten// de slad yang dag btang nas 'gro/ bdag sdang ba'i skyon gyis ni// gang na dogs pa zug rngu yi/
116b1(skyes rabs): rang bzhin gyis 'tsho yul des ci// mkhas shing rtul phod bsrung bar bzod// nor mang legs par yang dag 'grogs// dam pa gnas pa'i yangs pa can// gnas de bdag ni 'dod par gyur//
116b2(skyes rabs): de skad smrasna che bu dag kyang // de bzhin zhes smra rjes 'bras bcas// skyed mos tshal du 'gro zol gyis// 'khor bcas de ni rab tu song // 'gro bar shes nas mi yi bdag/ bzlog lnga yang dge rab
116b3(skyes rabs): brtson pa'i// 'bad pa yid kyang ma thob ste// rab tu spangs pas slar 'thob min// rmongs pa dam pa'i legs byas smod// skad cig de rnams blun par byas// de yi ni kun tu su zhig gis/
116b4(skyes rabs): don gnyer don byas min par 'gyur// yon tan gyis bkug blo ldan blon// 'ongs pa yangs pa can pa yis// gus pa'i spyod pas mchod de nas// tshogs kyi gtso bo'i gnas su bzhag/
116b5(skyes rabs): nas de yi 'byor pas dpal// des thob de yi gtso bos kyang // tshogs pa nam yang tshul min las// gzhan gyi gnod pa'i ga nod ma gyur// de nas dus kyi blon po'i bu// gzhon par gyur pa seng
116b6(skyes rabs): ge yi// bu mo yon tan ldan pa ni// mdzes ma tsi la zhes pa btsas// de yi bu mo gnyis pa yang // nye ba'i tse la zhes pa skyes// mdzes ma'o de dag skyes nyid la// mtshan mkhan mkhas pas rab
117a1(skyes rabs): smras pa// tsi la'i bu ni pa bsad nus// sa yi bdag po dag tu 'gyur// nye ba'i tse la'i yon tan can// rdzogs pa'i mtshan ldan 'gyur zhes so// blon sras thu
117a2(skyes rabs): blos sa 'tshe ni// dpa' bas che rgyags ma bsdams pas// sgyid tshal dkrugs pa'i gnod pa yis// tshogs rnams sdang 'os nyid du gyur// de dag de yi phe dag la// gus pas khro bral de dang
117a3(skyes rabs): ni// nu bor bcas la skyed tshal gnyis// sA la ta ma che rgyas byin// logs byas rigs pa gcig gis der// bde bar gshigs pa'i sku gzugs byas// 'byor pa rgya che'i gtsug lag khang /
117a4(skyes rabs): sa yi rgyan ni gzhan gyiso// de nas bas mtha'i dkyil 'khor du// pha yis stobs rgyas sa srungs bu// tshogs pa'i khro bas 'jigs pa las// las mtha' nye bar bsgrubs slad bzhig// blon po'i
117a5(skyes rabs): mchog de dus kyis ni// mtho ris bzhud tshe tshogs rnams kyis// legs pa nyid phyir gzhon pa'i bu// seng ge de yi sde gnas su bzhag/ tshogs pa gud bral sa 'tsho yis// pha yi gnas ni ma
117a6(skyes rabs): thob nas// yul dang gnas ni de dag la// chags bral yongasu gtang bar sems// tsher mas gtams shing stag gis snom// nags tshal mchog tu gnas par bya// rje bo mang pos rab phyi
117b1(skyes rabs): ma bsdams skye bo'i nang du min// tha dad dam pa'i bya ba smra// gang zhig gcig gis 'dod gyur pa// de la gzhan dag yong mi sred// tshogs pa ji ltar bsten par bya// zhes bsams nga rgyal
117b2(skyes rabs): can de yis// glong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu phyin// mi bdag ga zugs tsan snying po yi// yon tan gyi ni dpal 'byor bsten// do yis dgyes pas de mchod nas// do yi yid bstan gnas su gyur//
117b3(skyes rabs): de dus yon tan gyis 'grogs pa// yun ring 'dris pa bzhin du mdzes// de nas rgyal po gzugs snying gi/ btsun mo lnga pa nyid gyur de'i// 'bral ba'i me yis gdungs de dang // nye ba'i rtsi la nu
117b4(skyes rabs): bo yaM// bu mo btsunu mo blang 'os pa// blo ldan de yis rnams bsams nas// gsang nas rgyu zhing de yi bkras// yangs pa can gyi grong khyer song // tshogs kyi nye bar spyad bya nyid// mdzes ma su
117b5(skyes rabs): la'ang sbyin mi bya// zhes pa yangs pa can las sngon// rang gi yul du nges pa byas// de yi grong khyer sgo bsrung phyir// gnod sbyin gnas na 'phyang ba yis// dril bu shAn tu gsang ba ni// pha rol
117b6(skyes rabs): zhugs tshe sgra sgrogs byed// nu bo'i skyed tshal phreng bar ni// gros kyi gsang ste des rab zhugs// nye ba'i tsi l-i len pa la// byin pas tsaM la thob par gyur// de ni shing rta la bskyon song // dril
118a1(skyes rabs): sgra las ni mngon 'dod pa'i// skyes bu dpa' rnams des bcom nas// mi yi bdag po'i grong khyer phyir// de la des smras mdzes ma 'di// bdag gis bsams pa
118a2(skyes rabs): min puM thob// 'di yi bu yis pha gsod ces// gang phyir mtshan mkhan rnams kyis smras// de slang mi yi bdag po 'di// khyod kyi btsun mor 'os pa min// khyod ni 'tsho na skye dgu yi// phun
118a3(skyes rabs): sum tshogs pa thams cad 'tsho// de yis 'di brjod tsho nA des// de mthong gtang bar yong ma nus// de gdong la bris ri mo yis// las kyi slad nyid bcings pa bzhin// de yis smras pa bu
118a4(skyes rabs): yis pa// gsod pa gang du gang tshe mthong // gal te bu ni byung gyur na// rang nyid bdag gi dbang bskur bya// de skad brjod nas mi yi bdag/ mdzes ma len la dga' bar gyur// las kyis rlabs
118a5(skyes rabs): kyis sprul pa yis// phrogs pa'i blo la mthu yod min// dus kyis longs spyod ldan pa de'i// bu ni de la skyes gyur te// gang gi spyod tshul brtsis pa yis// pha ni gsod par brjod gyur pa'o// dka'
118a6(skyes rabs): thub nags kyi ri dwags rnams// bsad phyir na gsu sngon la zhe na// de la thub pa'i dmod pa ni// bu yi da byibs can 'di ltar gyur// skabs der chen po zhes bya ba// yangs pa can gyis tshogs
118b1(skyes rabs): kyi gtses// a mra'i nags las chu shing gis// sdong po las 'khrungs mdzes ma thob// de yi khyim du mdzes ma de// dal bu dal bus bskyengs bsrings te// dga' ba che dang sbyin pa yi// bsam pa yis
118b2(skyes rabs): kyang semasA la gzung // gnyen gyi mdze' las de yi ming // a mri skyong ma zhes su btags// bu mo dman pa bzhin btang nas// lang tsho dog ni bzung bar gyur// de nas de gting brtson pa'i pha// mdzes
118b3(skyes rabs): mu tshogs kyis nyer spyad bya// zhes pa'i dam tshig 'das gyur pa// tshogs pa drug gis bzod ma gyur// de nas sdug bsngal gyis gdung ba'i// pha la btud nas des smras pa// bdag ni tshogs kyi spyad bya
118b4(skyes rabs): nyid// gal te 'on kyang dom tshig 'di// gcig gis steng du gzhan dag ni// mi 'jug rang gi gnas su sdod// nyi ma re le bdag gis zong // kar shA pa na brgya phrag lnga// zhag bdun nyid na khyim ba gau
118b5(skyes rabs): ni// rnam par blta bya gzhan du min// zhes pa'i dam tshig 'di 'das na// kun gyi spyod bya nyid gyur pa'o// zhes pa de yi dam tshig dgra/ shes nas de yi phas smos pa// tshegs kyi rung zhes smras nas ni//
