118b6(skyes rabs): gus pas nges pa brtan po byas// des na rin chen khang pa de// mchog gi rgyan gyis ra bo brgyan cing // gser gyi ba gam khri stan la// 'dzegs nas nyin par zla 'ong byas// de nas 'dod ldan gang gang gis// zo
119a1(skyes rabs): byin de can+da nye bar song // de dang de yi grwa TI brjid ni// de yi mthu yis rab tu nyams// blta ba nyid du'ang mi nus na// reg pas 'khrug pa slar yang ci// dwe ni tsan na 'khri shing da /
119a2(skyes rabs): lag 'gros longs spyod bgags pa bzhin// de nas mdzes ma de yi nI// nu ma rgyas pa'i khung dag gis// rked 'khyog 'jigs pa rab ster ba// lang tsho yi yang lang tshe bsten// de yi gzugs ni rmad byung de//
119a3(skyes rabs): 'dod chags rdzogs roshing longs spyod bral// g.yang sa'i gser gyi 'khri shing gis// me tog bzhin du 'bras med gyur// ltad mo'i bsam pas rtsed mo'i slad // tha dad yul gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i// ri ma
119a4(skyes rabs): mkhan gyis skyong gi/ gzugs ni de yaM khang par bris// mi dbang rnams ni ri mo la// bris shing byaltas pas rim gyis des// gzugs can snying po'i gzugs dag ni// dga' ma'i bdag po bzhin+d+ha du
119a5(skyes rabs): mthong // de mthong nyid na 'phral la ni// 'dod chags yang dag langs par gyur// gang gis de ni bris de la// der ni dge mtshan dag la dris// gang gis mdzes sdug bdud rtsi yis// yongs rgyas mig
119a6(skyes rabs): gi dga' bskyed pa// dga' ma dag gi 'khri shing dpyid// grogs po sa bdag 'di ni su// gang gi dpal mo lha mo'i yang // skal bzang las skyes dregs 'joms pa// saM bdag 'di yi mdza' gcugs
119b1(skyes rabs): kyi// skal ldan bsod nams ldan pa su// de yis dris lan dral bur ni// ri mo mkhas pas de la smras// legs byas phun tshogs snying po 'di// sa bdag gzugs can snying po yin// rtul phong
119b2(skyes rabs): gzugs ni srang gzhal ba// mtho ris 'dren pa'i lha su yis// 'di la yid srubs dag kyang ni// re ba med pa nyid du dogs// de yis de skad brjod tshe de// mngon par 'dod pa gsar pa yis// 'phral
119b3(skyes rabs): nyid mngon du phyogs byas te// swa skyong la ni mig gtad do// skabs der gzugs can snying po yis// mi med khang par dal bus ni// gtam gyi mjug tu sa 'tshol// cung zad 'dzum dkar mchu yis smras/
119b4(skyes rabs): grogs po cung zad bdag gi ni// yid la gang zhig rgyu ba nyon// ma bsdams grogs po rang dbang du// smra ba ci yang bdud rtsi'i ro// yangs pa can pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// thun mong du byas bud med
119b5(skyes rabs): mchog/ mdzes ma byin pa chu shing 'dra// chu shi d+ya nang nas byung b.rI thos// gzi ldan snying sdug du 'os te// de mthus de nyams de dag gi/ da lta yang ni sun ma phyin// pad+ma ldan pa glang pos bzhin//
119b6(skyes rabs): bud med rin chen skyes gnas las// ma skyes pa de thos nyid las// yid ni kun dag re bcas pa yis// dge mtshan mi zhan su mi byed// bdag gi mig dang lhan cig tu// yid ni de la mngon pa
120a1(skyes rabs): chags// de yi yon tan+da thos pa yi// skal ldan rna bar bdag dga'o// sa yi bdag pos 'dir brjod tshe// sa 'tshos de la lan smras pa// rgyal po 'dod chags gter
120a2(skyes rabs): de ni// lag 'gro'i tshogs kyis yang dag bkag/ shin tu chung ba 'khrugs phyir na// bzod dka'i g.yang sa dran par 'gro// mi bzang lam 'di khyod la ni// mi bzang mda' can bdag gis bstan//
120a3(skyes rabs): ni blang du 'thob pa min// khyod kyang 'gro bar 'os pa min// gnyis ka the tshom thabs dang bral// 'di la bdag ni ci zhig sgras// de yis de brjod mi bdag gis// 'dod pa'i don ni ma btang ste// 'drod pas gzir
120a4(skyes rabs): na rigs pa'i lugs// mkhos pa rnams kyang mi dran no// de nas su 'chos lha cig de// grong khyer yangs pa can song nas// ri dwags mig can khang par ni// chas gzhan dag gis rab tu zhugs// ri mo mthong ba
120a5(skyes rabs): nyid kyis ni// migu ngag yongs 'dris mi yi mgon// de yis mthong nas skad cig ni// sbyangs pa dang bcas sa la bltas// ngo chas lan dang bral bu de// 'dar bas rab tu bskyod pa yi// dril chung sgra ldan
120a6(skyes rabs): mi bdag la// legs par 'ongs sam 'dri ba bzhin// der ni rang lus ri mo la// skal bzang sngon nas khengs ldan pa'i// rgyal pos de yos mdzes sdug gi/ chu yi rgyun byed snyim pas 'thungs// ngo tsha
120b1(skyes rabs): 'bebs pas mdzes ma dang // mngon par mtho bas sa yi bdag/ smra ba bcad la sa 'tsho yis// 'dzum bcas myur bar de la smras// lha 'di'i rnam pa ri mor bris// bsam gtan nges par brjod pa
120b2(skyes rabs): las// khyod kyi gus pa'i khyad par gyis// mngon sum nyid du gsal bar gyur// khyod kyis 'di ni ri ma la// byis shing 'dis kyang sems la khyod// khyed gnyis mdza' bo'i pho nyar ni// su zhig rab
120b3(skyes rabs): song ngas mi shes// zhes sogs gtam gyi sbyor ba yis// rab dga' yongs rdzogs de dag gis// gang gang 'dod chags kyis bsten pa// de de nyams su myong bar gyur// dril sgras 'jig rten dogs
120b4(skyes rabs): pa skyes// rgyal po 'od ldan rab bsgribs pa// blta bar mi 'os de yis khyim// dben par zhag bdun gnas par gyur// 'khri shing me tog ldan pa bzhin// dus su de las mngal thob des// ngo tshas
120b5(skyes rabs): dman zhing dal bu yis// de la spyod mtha' rig pa byas// khyim ni spyod la nye ba na// byung na bu ni yongs shes pa'i// yid ches slad du sor gdub dge/ de la byin nas mi bdag song // mi bdag 'od ldan
120b6(skyes rabs): lus can mi rnams dag gis bku ro ba gshegs gyur tshe// 'phral lo rab skyes 'bral ba'i rab rib kyis gtibs bzhin gyi pad+ma zum// srong la char dang 'jam pa'i rlung gis zil gyis mnan pa'i pade ldan
121a1(skyes rabs): bzhin// mchi ma dang bcas shugs ring rab ldan de ni dga' ba dman par gyur// lag pa'i stan gyis 'gram pa dang // brtag pa yid ni sna bdag dang // lus kyis
121a2(skyes rabs): gusar du nyams chung nyid// 'dzin cing de ni nges par dman// de nus dus kyis dag ldan ma// de la bu ni btsas gyur te// pha yi gzugs brnyan dag dang mtshungs// legs pa'i blo bzhin rnam dul ba'o//
121a3(skyes rabs): de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// rim gyi bskyed par gyur pa'i tshe// 'di ni gzugs can snying po yi// bu zhes 'jig rten rnams su grags// gang tshe rigs la mi 'os pa'i// ngan smras mnga' ni de nges
121a4(skyes rabs): de// rtses grogs byis pa khro ba dang // ldan pa rnams kyi smras pa'i tshe// de nas rig pa bsgrub 'os bu// sor gdung dang bcas pha yi ni// gnasu tshong pa'i tshogs chen la// de yi rab tu springs par gyur//
121a5(skyes rabs): gzugs can snying po bdag gis kyang // dbyibs mtshungs bu ni yang dag thob// yongs 'a khyud dga' ba'i mchi ma yis// de ni 'jigs med rnam par bsgrubs// a mra skyong ma'i spyod mtha' de// thos nas
121a6(skyes rabs): dge mtshan ldan pa yi// dge slong gis dris bcom ldan 'das// rgyal bas da yi gtam rgyud gsungs// grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu ni// rgyal po'i btsun mo'i skyed tshal gyi// nagasu skyed tshal srung
121b1(skyes rabs): bston// phreng ba can zhes bya bar gyur// dang bas brlan pa'i rang sangs rgyas// nam zhig 'dod dgar mdun du 'ong // rgyal po la 'os tsu tA yi// me tog rnams kyis de la mchod// der ni skye gnas
121b2(skyes rabs): las ma skyes// mi bdag potsun mor bdag gyur ces// sems ni rab tu dang ldan nges// de yi mdun du smon lam btab// bsod nams mi tog 'bras bu'i longs spyod ldan// de nyid mchog gos lus
121b3(skyes rabs): ldan a mr-i sbyong // de skad rgyu che'i spyod tshul thos gyur nas// dge slong de dge 'dun sar ya mtshan gyur// cem pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpe'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing
121b4(skyes rabs): las/ oM m+bu skyong ma'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dang ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// / mi rnams nor ni dngul tshwa'i thigs pa khu tshur dag gis nges par bsdams pa'i rnam par mthong /
121b5(skyes rabs): dbul dang mgon med rnams lnga ster zhing nye bar mkhro bar gyur pa rab tu rgyas pa'i dpal// bsod nams dga'atshal gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten bcom ldan sku gzugs rab gnas la sogs kyi// nor ldan
121b6(skyes rabs): 'di ni grags pas lhan cig mi bzang gnasu gang zhig gang gi rnam par mdzes// dpal ldan mnyan du yod par ni// khyim bdag sbyin pa zhes pa byung // de yi bu ni rab byin dag/ bsod nams phun tshogs
122a1(skyes rabs): 'byung gnas gyur// de ni byis pa nyid na rgyan// slong ba rnams la rtag tu ster// skye ba sngar goms bag chags ni// su yi gang gis zlog ba 'gyur// rtag tu rgyan rnams ster
122a2(skyes rabs): ba las// pha yis mchog tu bzlog pa na// klung las gter ni yang dag blangs// de la rab tu bstan par gyur// pha ni mtho ris song ba'i tshe// kun tu gter ni mthong ba des// de bul dang mgono med la byin
122a3(skyes rabs): bas// mgon med zas sbyin zhes par gyur// dus kyi sbyin pa byas pa des// bu ldan bu la mnyen gshin pas// bu yi khyim thab don gnyer zhing // mdzes pa 'bad pas tshol bar gyur// de nas bram ze sbrang
122a4(skyes rabs): rtsi yi// phung po zhes pa mkhas pa las// grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu ni// mdzes ma dga' zhig slong du btang // de yis ma ga d+har phyin nas// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong song ste// khyim bdag nor ni chen po la//
122a5(skyes rabs): mdzes ma mchog ni bram ze bslangs// mgon mod zas sbyin ces bya ba// mnyan yod na yod grags ldan de'i// bu ni legs par skyes pa la// mdzes ma byin zhes de yis smras// de smras yul drang 'brel pa/
122a6(skyes rabs): dag/ mchog tu nges kyi rigs la 'os// nged kyi rgyud kyi bu mo rnams// rin ni shin tu che bas ster// shing rta mchog ni brgya phrag dang // glang po rta dang 'bongs mo dang // gser sri nga rnams ni bzhi phrag
122b1(skyes rabs): brgya// gal te nus na sbyin par gyis// de yis de skad brjod de la// bramA ze 'dzum zhing lan smras pa// de dag mgon med zas sbyin gyi// khyim gyi 'bangs kyi yin yang chung // bram ze bu me'i rin rnams ni// ma
122b2(skyes rabs): lusau kha yis blangs pa'i tshe// khyim bdag gi ni gus pa yis// de ni zas kyi mgron du gnyer// der ni de yis ma bsdams par// bzo pa bcu'u ba rnam mang zlos// mtshan mi mA zhu'i nad kyis btab/ gdung ba chen
122b3(skyes rabs): blo'i tshe de bton// grang zhig sbed pas 'ju min zos// mtshan mo gnyid kyis bde mi 'dzin// 'jig rten gzhan du bde slad de// skye ba'i las ni ji ltar byed// mi gtsang bas 'jigs khang pa las// de ni phyi ru 'ab
122b4(skyes rabs): kyis dor// rang bzhin nyid kyis ma rabs rnams// g.yo ldan bltos pa med pa'i gnas// de yi dge ba'i las dag gis// snying rjes gnyen pa shA ri'i bu// maung+gal bu dang 'grogs nas ni// lam de nyid nas yang
122b5(skyes rabs): dag 'ongs// de dag gis ni ngal bus de// smyug ma'i rtse mo grel ba yis// phyis shing lan brgyar swa yis kyang // bkrus te de la chos bstan song // de dag mdun du de yang sems// rab tu dang bas lus btang nas//
122b6(skyes rabs): rgyal chen bzhi yi ris kyi ni// lha yi nang du skyes par gyur// der ni rnam thos sras kyi bkas// mi yi 'jig rten khang pa dang // lha khang sgor ni mchod pa la// de yis lhag par nyer gnas byas// de nas
123a1(skyes rabs): 'brel pa nges pa ni// spring yig gis shes brjod pa bzhin// mgon med zas sbyin rang nyid ni// rin rnams khyur nAs 'ongs bur gyur// 'brel pa'i khyim du phyin pa na//
123a2(skyes rabs): rgyal po la 'os zas kyi tshogs// phun tshegs ri yi rnam pa can// ngo mtshar bskyed pa de yis mthong // khyim bdag la ni ya mtshan las// dri mid yang ldan de yis dris// bza' ba rab mang po shams
123a3(skyes rabs): po 'di// rgyal po mgron du gnyer ram ci// de yis der smras sangs rgyas ni// baucom ldan dge 'dun dang bcas pa// bdag gis bdag gi dga' chen ni// rang gis bsod nams las mgron gnyer//
123a4(skyes rabs): zhes pas sangs rgyas mtshan brjod pas// spu long gis ni rirab rgyas te// 'phral nyid zla ba'i khu bo yis// de ni yongs su bkang bzhin gyur// don dam rnam par rig min su zhig gi ni ming tsem la// gang
123a5(skyes rabs): yang skye bas bcings pa'i lhun skyes dngos po rab tu rgyas// rab gsar sprin gyi sgra la dga' zhing mngon 'dod gasngal ba yis// rma bya rol sgeg gar dang 'phyar ba'i spyod la reg par byed// 'od zer rab
123a6(skyes rabs): gas ro bzhin ras kyi// pad+mo las skyes des smras pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan zhes pa su// dge 'dun zhes ni su la brjod// de yis 'di dris khyim podag gis// 'dzum dang bcas pas rab smras
123b1(skyes rabs): kye ma sa gsum dag gi ni// ston pa khyod kyis mi shes sam// 'khor ba'i zhags pas 'jigs nas skyabs// tshol ba'i skyabs gyur rgyal ba de// 'jig rten na ni su zhig gis// mi shes
123b2(skyes rabs): ba de mchog tu bslus// skyabs kyi thabs nI mi shes par// gang gis na chod zad par byas// gti mug gis rig skye ba ni// 'bras med byas pa de yi ci// gau ta ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das//
123b3(skyes rabs): shAkya'i rgyu lta b+hU'i rigs las 'khrungs// khyim spangs bla med byang chub tu// yang dag rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa// rdo yis mchog tu rjes bzung bas// phyin nas rab tu byung gyur pa// 'dod chags bram
123b4(skyes rabs): ba'i dge slong gi/ tshogs la dge 'dun zhes su brjod// sangs rgyu sku gtsor byas dge 'dun 'dri// bsod nam sna zong gis rnyed gyur nas// rang gi dge ba tshol byed pa// bdag gis gus pas mgron
123b5(skyes rabs): du gnyer// de skad de yi tshig thos nas// mgon med zas sbyin de dran zhing // sangs rgyas la dmyigs bsgom pa yis// mtshan mo gnyid du yang dag song // mtshan mo'i lhag ma'i thun la ni//
123b6(skyes rabs): 'dod pas yang dag drangs pa bzhin// tho rangs zhes shes grong khyer gyi// sgo nas de ni phyi rol song // sgo yi lha khang du phyin pas// de ni lha dang yang dag phrad// sbrang rtsi phung po bstan pa yis// mchog
124a1(skyes rabs): gi lam ni thob par gyur// de nas de yis bcom ldan thob// skom pas gdungs byas bdud rtsi bzhin// rab dga'i dri bzung bde ba yis// nyams myong ba dpe med gyur/
124a2(skyes rabs): lam gron skom pas gus bcas par// rnying nas gri ba bsil ljon pa bzhin// zhi zhing ngal bsos bsil ba de// thob cing yongs su gdung ba bral// de yi yid ni dri ma dang // bral po de mthong nyid kyis thob
124a3(skyes rabs): nam mkha' stan dang phrad pa yis// sprin gyi tshogs dang bral ba bzhin// gang yang bsod nams dang tshul dang // bka' drin ldan pa'i mthu de ni// rang gi drin gyis sems kyi ni// spyod tshul bgegs med 'gyur
124a4(skyes rabs): pa yin// des bsems kye ma bdag gi ni// gang yang rmongs pa 'di dang bral// rnam 'gyur 'di ni rjes su bcad // rab tu zhi ba phun tshogs skyes// bcom ldan 'das 'di bdag giso sngon// gang zhig mthong
124a5(skyes rabs): bar ma gyur bslas// sku ni skal ldan min pa yis// mig gi spyod yul mi 'gyur// gzigs pa'i bcud kyi bdud rtsi yid 'ong rgya che ri bong can ltar nyams su bde// spyod tshul snying rje dar la bab pa'i dbang gyur
124a6(skyes rabs): rab tu dang ba'i ring bzhin blo// 'khor ba dag ni med par dgyes kyang yongs su 'dzin cing rab tu nye bar gnas// phul du byung ba 'di ni rdul bral rnams kyi chags pa nyid dang bral bar bgyid// ces bsams kun
124b1(skyes rabs): dbyar ldan pas de// nye bar btud nas de yi ni// zhabs kyi pad+mar phyug 'tshul ba// rab tu dad pa'i sems kyis bsgrubs// de ni 'ongs la bcom ldan yang // rab dang dgyes pa'i mtshan nyid can// snying
124b2(skyes rabs): rje rdzogs pa'i pho nya yis// bzhin ras mdzes pas bka' srul po// de yi dbugs 'byin bskyed pa'i spyan// skyel dag smad bdud rtsi yi// chu bi rab 'bar ci yang ni// nges b+hur de la rnam par spros// de
124b3(skyes rabs): nas de la bcom ldan gyis// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams// rab tu rtogs pa sgrub byed pa// logs ldon chos 'di bstan po mdzad// ston pa'i bka' las nyon mongs kyi// rgyud ni mtha' dag zhig
124b4(skyes rabs): pa des// rang gi spyi b+ha brjod byas nas// de la phyag 'tshal der gsol pa// bcom ldan bdag ni shin tu 'das// bcom ldan+da 'das la sbubs song // goms pa'i bag chags rnam par zhig/ 'khor
124b5(skyes rabs): ba mchog tu bdag mi dga'// chen po rnams kyi gzigs pa ni// mi dge ba dag ring du byed// dge ba myur bar rab tu ster// rigs pa'i spyod pa gsal bar byed// khyed ni bzhugs slad gus pa las/
124b6(skyes rabs): gtsug lag khang mchog bde 'os pa// yid 'ong rin chen snying po'i gnas// rang gi grong du bdag bgyid// der ni skal ldan bdag cag gi/ mchod par rim gros bsten pa na// bcom ldan rtag tu bzhun

125b2(skyes rabs): pa// sa ha ka ra'i ljon pa bsta no// shA ri'i bu yi mthus bslas pa'i// rlung rta chen po che ba yi// mu stegs byed kyi spro ba bzhin// rtsa nas 'thon zhing dum bur gyur// dr-i nas mig dmar gyis

126a1(skyes rabs): 'dod pas// dge slong dag la gnod brtson zhing // de nA las byed zil gyi gnas// de nas de dag shA ri'i bus// de yi spyan zur tsam nyid kyis// yid ni byams dang ldan par
