126a5(skyes rabs): rgyal ba la// gsol te lha dang lhan cig nA// lam du de yis nyer bsgrubs pa'i// rgyal po la 'os 'byor pas byon// de ni byon pa la dga' nas// sred gsum rab tu dang ba'i tshe// de la mgon med zas sbyin
126a6(skyes rabs): gyis// chu yi rgyun ni rab tu sbrengs// gang gi tshe na phyogs de ru// chu yid rgyun ni ma bab pa// de tshe gzhan du bcom ldan gyi// gsung las rgyun dang ldan par bab// de mthong mtshar nas dge slong gis// zhus
126b1(skyes rabs): shing bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyur// bka' stsal chu 'di rengs pa yis// rgyu ni rab tu mnyan par gyis// sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la 'dis// gnas 'di yi ni 'di nyid du// rab tu byin par gyur to zhes// chu
126b2(skyes rabs): rgyun 'di ni gzhan du ltung // sngon gyi yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// rnam par gzigs la 'di nyid kyi// mchog gis kun dga' ra ba yi// sa phyogs 'di nyid rab tu byin// rgyal gyi skye ba dag la yang // sangs
126b3(skyes rabs): rgyas gtsug tor can la phul// de nas ra g+hu'i skye ba la// rgyal ba thams cad skyob la phul// srid pas byin zhes gyur pa na// 'khor ba 'jig lo rab tu phul// chen po'i bdag tu gyur pa'i tshe// skyob pa gser
126b4(skyes rabs): zhes bya la phul// A ShAr Da yi skye ba la// slar yaung 'od srungs la 'di phul// de lta nga la 'di nyid kyis// yul 'di dag ni rab tu byin// dus kyis nor bzang zhes pa 'di// byams pa la ni 'bul bar 'gyur// snyings
126b5(skyes rabs): stobasau bzod pa tshul khrims drang // ldan phyir 'di yis gter rnams mthong // sngon yang khyim gyi bdag po 'di// gser sbyin zhes par gyur pa na// rang sangs rgyas ni mya ngan las// 'das pa'i legs par bya/
126b6(skyes rabs): ba~M byas// rin chen bum par de yi gdung // bcug nas smon lam btab pa las// da lto rin chen mdzod 'os pa'i// gser gyi snod du 'di gyur to// dge slong de dag rnams kyis bdud rtsi'i snying po bzhi no//
127a1(skyes rabs): ston pa'i gsung ni mngon par brjod pa 'di thos nas// byed po rab gnas kyis bsgrubs bsod nams rgyas pa yi// me tog lhug par gnas byas mchog tu dga' bar
127a2(skyes rabs): gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang bris byas pa'i byang chub sems dpe'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri ni ring las rgyal byed kyi tshal yongasu bzung ba'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//
127a3(skyes rabs): kye ma legs ldan rin thung che ba'i chen po nyid// nor bu bzhin du yon tan bla ma nyid kyis 'thob// yon tan med par gang zhig lus kyis bla ma nyid// rdo las rags pa bzhin du de ni 'bras bu med // shA
127a4(skyes rabs): kya'i grong gi mi yi dbang po sngon// dpal ldan zas gtsang dag pa'i bdud rtsi'i gter// chags bral ldan las bde gshegs nyid thob pa'i// sras ni dran nas 'dod dang bcas par gyur// de bsams
127a5(skyes rabs): bsod nams yon tan lha gnas shing // dbyangs can gnas dang mtsho lus skyes pa'i dpal// yid ni rab tu da ba'i rtse dga'i gnas// bu yi bzhin ras gang tshe bdag gis mthong // de ni lta bar sred
127a6(skyes rabs): bas 'dir byon zhes// bdag gis gang gang rgyal byed tshal du btang // de de mig mi 'dzums pas de lta zhing // de nyid du ni bdud rtsi 'thung zhing 'dug/ gang yang mdza' las bdag mtshungs 'tshar ka ni//
127b1(skyes rabs): de dgug skud du bdag gis yang dag btang // spring yig lag de lta rnams mngon dga' ba// de nyid du ni lha nyid bzhin du gyur// de yi kha l+ya bdag gis phrin gyi tshig/ springs pa gang de brjod pa ma yin
127b2(skyes rabs): nam// gang phyir thams cad nges par rang phan 'dod// gzhan gyis don la bsil ba nyid 'dzin lo// chags med 'di ni yud tsam ngal bso mdzod// rtag tu bdud rtsis khengs pa'i rnam gzigs kyis//
127b3(skyes rabs): myur du bdag gis lus la chags gyur pa// brtse ba'i dbang gis gnyen gyi don 'di mdzod// ces pa 'di thos bdag dang phrad pa la// skad cig kyang de phyi ba shol ji ltar mdzad// de yi thugs ni/
127b4(skyes rabs): yal 'dab mnyen pa la// rang bzhin mdza' gcugs rna rgyan med dam ci// yid la re ba 'di yis sa ya bdag/ de blta'i slad bzhin mdun du song po'i tshe// de yi byin gyis rab tu byung gsal
127b5(skyes rabs): byas pa'i// dga' ba'i ro ldan 'char ka yang dag 'ongs// rab tu byung bas de dang mtshungs pa'i mthu// kun dwags rnam bA re 'khyam pa de mthong nas// bstan pa'i spyod tshul nyams shing 'dod
127b6(skyes rabs): ljon pas// mi bdag kun tu rmongs shing brgyal bar gyur// bsil ba'i chus bran 'du shes rnyed pa des// de la ci slad byin po min zhes dris// lha cig khyod can nyin zhig tshogs kyis de/
128a1(skyes rabs): gus bcas byon par 'gyur zhes des kyang smras// de nas nyin zhag rnams ni rab 'das tshe// gzhon nu don kun grub pa'i bcom ldan 'das// dge slong tshogs kyi rjes 'brang lha
128a2(skyes rabs): rnams kyi// cho ga sdu dang bAts+tsha swa bsdu mkha' la dral bus byon// mtho ris mdzes pa'i lhag pad kyis gtor ba// man+dA ra ba'i phreng rgyus mdzes pa de// mtho rIs gAM gA'i dbu bi rab gsal brtsegs/
128a3(skyes rabs): mdzes shing rgod pa'i lha yi ri bo bzhin// sprin gyi grogs rnams dkrigs pas 'byed cing 'khrul// dzam+b+ha na da'i dril chung sgra ldan po'i// gzhal yas khang gis phyogs kyis gdong mdzes pa// gus pra/
128a4(skyes rabs): ston pa'i bstod pa bsgrubs pa bzhin// bar med nyi ma'i 'od gzer sgrib byed pa// rigs 'dzin grub pa'i tshig ces dang bcas pa'i lha// yongs rdzogs gdugs dkar gang dag chags pa yis// khyab pas na ma
128a5(skyes rabs): mkha' yang dgra N+Do Di bar gyur// de nas 'jig rten kun la phan rdzogs pa// kun dbyibs kun gyi rang bzhin rnam par snang // legs par byon pa de ni skad cag gis// mkha' dang phyogs dang sau las kun
128a6(skyes rabs): gyis mthong // skye bo'i mig gi rab dga' spungs pa dang // dge la dga' ba'i bsod nams tshad gyur pa// snang ba'i gteri de mthong nas 'jig rten rnams// shin tu rangs pa'i dba' rlobs rmad byung byung // ngo
128b1(skyes rabs): mtshur mdzod gyur mdzes pa'i mthu ldan pa// 'char kas legs par bshad pas rab shes nas// gzhon nu 'gro ba'i bla ma de lnga ni// sa bdag ring nas thal mo sbyar bas btung // de nas babs te 'phags
128b2(skyes rabs): skye'i rjes 'brang bcas// rgyal pa gus pas yang dag mchog gyur bya// phyogs cha gzi byin rgyas par mdzes pa yi// n+ya gro d+hA yi rin chen sa gzhir byon// 'jig rten gsum po bka' la legs gnas te//
128b3(skyes rabs): dor ni rkang stegs ldan pa'i goser gyi khri// rin chen myu gu bkri ba'i 'da'i ldan la// lhun po la ni 'od ldan lus bzhin 'jigs// yid kyi zla ba mog gi bdud rtsi'i rgyun// yid la re ngas don gnyer longs
128b4(skyes rabs): ba de// dga' bas mig mi 'dzum par bltas pa las// skad cig sra yi dbang pos lho nyid thob// dga' ba'i ro las nang du zhugs pa bzhin// do shal rin chen mchog la gzugs brnyan chags// gzhon
128b5(skyes rabs): nu khyad 'phags dgyes pa rgyas de la// mgrin ni mchi mas 'gags pa de yis smras// yongs tshim g.yo med bsal ba'i rang bzhin las// thams cad dge ba'i thad la dga' bar byed// yongasu gdung
128b6(skyes rabs): byed 'bral ba'i nyer bstan 'di// bdag cig rnams la khyod kyis ci phyir mdzo da// mdza' dang rab dga' yon tan la gus pas// 'khyud pa dang ni brtan par 'grogs pa dang // zhabs la phyag bgyi'o
129a1(skyes rabs): slad du mnyam nyid du// bdag gi blo 'dri 'phral la khyod can rgyug/ cung zad gang de bdag gis brjod pa 'di// bdag la byams ngor khyod kyis gsan par bya// yon tan
129a2(skyes rabs): spangs pa'am chags bral rim pa ni// mdza' bas rmongs pas brjod bya min pa nyid// nyi ma'i gzugs can ldan pa'i rin chen gyis// khre gas pan dri thod par ma rgyal pa/ mas pa pa 'i dag nga / sa ma khyod ni san rgya gan sus mas tsu ga
129a3(skyes rabs): chu yis mchog tu mngon bkrus pa// mya ngan thang las yongasu tsha ba'i chu// rdul gyi rgyus pas gcig pu ji ltar 'khru// rin chen mdzes pa'i rna cha 'gram par 'phyang // rgyan rnams 'dor ba nges par ci zhig riH/
129a4(skyes rabs): ci slad bde med khyod ni glo bur du// tsAn zla ltar dkar bas dga' bas ma yin// mi bdag la 'os khri stan bla re che// lha ltar khyad par dkar lA cis mi gzims// dpal mos gsar 'khyud longs spyod
129a5(skyes rabs): 'os gyur pa// khyod kyi lus kyis stan ngan ji ltar bzod// mdzes 'dzum rlabs kyis gzugs brnyan gos 'os pa// lus 'di la ni chos gos ji ltar 'os// khyod kyi phyag ni pad+mo'i rol ga nI sa 'dir//
129a6(skyes rabs): ltar lhung bzed dga' ba ji ltar skye// khyod kyi mgrin pa rgyab kyi gnas 'di dag/ sred ldan mdzes ma'i lag pas bsdams 'os pa// longs spyod dpal mo'i rab dga' nyams gyur cing // glo bur nyid mdza'
129b1(skyes rabs): gcugs nyams par byed// me tog gzhu ldan nyams par byed pa'i gzugs// glang po chen myos bum ltar mtho'i nu rgyas 'byor// lang tsho dga' ba'i rtse sa nye ba'i nags// ci slad khyod kyis
129b2(skyes rabs): mi bzang chags bral byos// zhes gsan tshul khrims gter gyis bka' stsal te// zla ba'i chu bzhin rol pa'i 'dzum dag gis// mi bdag sna tshogs rin chen 'od 'phros pa'i// rgyal po'i dpal/
129b3(skyes rabs): ni mi snang mdzad pa bzhin// rgyal po chu rgyuni ltar g.yo 'tsho ba'i srog/ gal te rga dang na bas mi 'joms na// rab dga' bdud rtsi'i char lta'i yul rnams la// rtag tu su zhig mngon par 'ad
129b4(skyes rabs): bgyid // zhi ba'i bdud rtsi nyams myong bo rten rnams kyi// nag sde nang stong pa'i sa gzhi gnod med yin// 'byor pas rgyags shing rtse dga' 'khrugs rnams kyi// ba gam ldan pa mthar ni rnam
129b5(skyes rabs): par ltung // gang zhig gur gum dang bcas chus bkrus pa'i// mi bdag rtag tu chags dang bcas par 'gyur ro// yid ni rab tu dang pa'i chus bkrus pa'i// cho ga shes deng tshul dri ma bral
129b6(skyes rabs): bar gyur// snying rje rgyas pa rnams kyi lus mdzes pa// gzhan phan gyis yin sngon byug pas min// rna ba thos pas yin gyi rna chus min// lag po sbyin pas yin gyi gdu bus mo ni// sa bdag
130a1(skyes rabs): gis spyad lhag mar gyur pa'i rgyan// mu tig 'od chags dkar ba'i 'dzum dang bcas// rmongs pa dga' ba ma bcom 'dri dag ni// dam pa rnams kyi spyad par 'os pa myin//
130a2(skyes rabs): chags pas gzir dang dgra yis gdung gyur pa// nor gyi bsam gtan ldan pa'i rgyal po la// reg na bde ba'i mal na gnyid yod min// zhi ba rnams ni kun tu bde bar gzims// lag 'gro'i spyod
130a3(skyes rabs): tshul sbrul shun mdzes pa yi// gos bzang gis yin chos gos dag gis min// lhung bzed kyis ni zas dag gtsang ba dang // yongs rdzogs bdud rtsi'i grogs po nyid du bskyed// gdugs kyi bzhin
130a4(skyes rabs): ni mchog tu mi gsal zhing // rlung yab rlung gis yid ni rnam par g.yo// ha ri tsAn gyi sa rlanA do shal gyis// mi bdag snying lnga bsil ba reg par byed// 'byor pa 'bral ba'i nAd kyi rjes su 'gro//
130a5(skyes rabs): rtse dga' ro bral mdzes ma skad cig mtha'// gang gi lus la gnod pa rtag gnas de// su yi longs spyod skal bzang nye bar rigs// 'phral du zol gnon longs spyod nyer spyod ni// rgyun du glal
130a6(skyes rabs): bcas blun pa nyid bskyed cing // sred 'khrul rmongs dang brgyal ba rgyas pa dang // mi bzad chags dang bcas pa nyid du byed// gang che bde dpal zla ches ri mo dang // long cho yi nga ni snga dro bo'i me tog ste//
130b1(skyes rabs): lus ni las kyi rlabs kyi phreng ba 'dzin// de tshe bdag ni rjes su chags dang bral// na ho a bcas pa'i glang zhon rna ba'i stabs// rang bzhin gyis g.yo rgyal po'i dpal 'byor gyis// longs spyod thaMd
130b2(skyes rabs): skad cig 'jig pa'i grogs// rgyal po'i thugs ni rab drang mchog sgrub cing // dge ba'i slad du de de bka' stsal nas// zhi ba'i rlabs lhun bdud rtsi'i rgyun rgyas shing // de yi spyan gyis 'khor la rnam par
130b3(skyes rabs): gzigs// shAkya'i rigasu 'khrungs pa'i mkhas pa ni// khra phrag bdu rten gyis chos ni rtogs byas shing // de la stong phrag bdun yang yongs rdzogs kyi/ khyad par yang dag 'thob pa'i snod nyid mdzad/
130b4(skyes rabs): de nas de dag grangs mtshungs stong phrag tshogs// zas dkar la sogs rnams kyis dag pa thob// bre bo zas dang bdud rtsi zas sogs kyi// shin tu che ba'i sems ni drang ba thob// kha cig nyani thos byang chub
130b5(skyes rabs): ldan par gyur// nye tshe'i byang chub reg dang la lnga dag/ de bzhin yang dag bla med byang chub zhugs// gzhan ni mkha' bzhin rab tu dang bar gyur// de nas gzhan gyis rgyun zhugs 'bras bu thob// de bzhin
130b6(skyes rabs): gzhan gyis lan cig phyir 'ong dang // phyir mi 'ong 'bras de yang gzhan gyis to// nyon mongs rnam grol gzhan gyis dgra bcom thob// 'dun sa der ni lhas byin gcig pu zhing / mun pa'i tsho Da
131a1(skyes rabs): kyis gtibs shing rab rmongs pa// sdig du med mya thul skye bo rnams kyi lugs// bden pa la bkod 'di ni sgyu zhes smras// mi yi badrag kyang mnyes ga shin gyis chags shing /
131a2(skyes rabs): sras ni ngar lngas bzlog par dregs skyes pa// rgyal ba'i bka' las dge slong maung+gal bus// rdzu 'phrul chen pos rgyags dang bral ba byas so// bcom ldan mthu ni rgyal pos mthong gyur kyang // shin tu rmad
131a3(skyes rabs): byung skyes bu nyid mi sems// phul byung mdzad pa goms pas reg pa ni// dris par skye bo'i ya mtshan rgyu ma yin// de nas nyi ma gzhan la lha dbang gis// rab bsgrubs gser gyi gzhal yas khung chen du//
131a4(skyes rabs): lhun po'i lcogs ltar gsal zhing mdzes pa yis// rin chen seng ge'i khri la bcom ldan 'das// de nas der ni tshangs dang dbang po sogs// 'od zer che ba'i lha rnams nyer gnas tshe// de yi gtsug
131a5(skyes rabs): ter rtse las 'phros pas phyogs// zla 'od phreng ba'i ral pa bzhin du mdzes// lha rnams stug por babs shing zhugs pa yis// bar 'tshams med pa'i sa der rgyal pos ni// sgo bzhi rnams su lam nyid thob
131a6(skyes rabs): ma gyur// ku be ra sogs smin ma ga yi ldan pas// der ni mngon par 'jug 'dod bzlog gyur pa// bzhin ni mdzes bral brjod pa 'khrul gyur pa'i// sa bdog mchog tu gzi byin med par gyur// rgyal
131b1(skyes rabs): ba'i bka' yis de dag rnams kyi btang // ci zhig ltar ste de mdun sa gzhi thob// zas gtsang spyi bos de la phyag 'tshal nas// de yi mdun na rab dang sems kyis gnas// de nas ston pas de la chos kyi
131b2(skyes rabs): gtam// 'phags pa'i bden bzhi rab tu rtogs byed bstan// gang zhig shes pas de yi 'jigs tshogaso la// lta ba'i ri rtse nyi shu dag kyang bcom// de nas skye ba'i bya ba byas pa de// song nas zas
131b3(skyes rabs): dkar la smras rgyal srid bzung // des smras bdag ni bcom ldan gyis gnang ba// bstan pa la dga' rgyal srid la min no// bre bo zas kyang rgyal srid la phyir phyogs// bdud rtsi zas kyang chags bral ldan gyur
131b4(skyes rabs): tshe// de nas zas gtsang gis gnang rgyal po yi// dpal 'byor de ni bzang ldan zhes pas bzung // de nas rgyal pos longs spyod gtsang ma rnams// rab phul 'gro ba'i dbang gis rgyal ba mchod// n+ya
131b5(skyes rabs): gro d+ha yi gnas ni der rab phul// zas gtsang ying la re ba dag par gyur// de nas bre bo zas kyi bu gzhon+da gnyis// ma yis bskul bas de las gcig rab byung // rgyal po'i bka' yis bkag pas
131b6(skyes rabs): gzhan ma ni// chen po zhes pa khyim na gnas par gyur// de nas chag sa bral rgyal po bzang ldan gyi// yid ni nags tshal mngon par 'dod par gyur// rnam rig ldan pa rab zhir zhugs pa'i yid//
132a1(skyes rabs): gsar ba'i dpal 'byor gyis kyang khregs pa myin// de nas dri yis rgyu lnga srid dbang bskur ni// 'thob 'dod sems ldan byin yang dag 'os// smras pa bdag ni rab tu 'byung
132a2(skyes rabs): ba'i dus// rim byas 'ongs la khyod ni ci zhig brjod// dben pa'i tshul 'chos 'dzin pa'i lhas byin gyis// mdun sar legs bsdams de la smra sau pA// rgyal po bdag la rgyal srid 'dod pa med//
132a3(skyes rabs): rab tu byung bas khyod dang bdag mo tshungs gyur// zhes pas gya gyu dul rdzun ldan pa de'i// 'khyog tshig brjod pa rgyalnga pos thos gyur nas// shAkya'i tshogs 'dri khyod kyi brtog pa yi// dbang du
132a4(skyes rabs): gyur ces 'dzum zhing rab tu smras// de nas lhas byin 'gyod pas nye bar gi dungs// longs spyod rje su chags las 'di ltar byas mas// ci slad bdag gis phyin ci logs 'di brjod// yang na
132a5(skyes rabs): ri ba byung yang nA rgyalnga srid pa sten// bzang ldan sogs bcas shAkya gzhan nu rnams// rang gi rgyal srid btang nas bgrod pa yi sna// 'phags pa'i spyod tshul la dgyes zas gtsang gi/ mdun
132a6(skyes rabs): bdar glang po shing rta nges par byung // de nas thams cad 'gro tshe lhas byin gyi// tsad pan la chags pad+ma rA ga tshe// mkha' mchog 'od kyi 'dab sar ldan byed pa// khrag gis byugs bzhin 'dod ldan
132b1(skyes rabs): khwa yis khyer// de nas mtshan mkhan gyis dri'i khrag gi rtags// sems can skyon bcas mtshan ma ngan gyur pa// drag po'i dmyal bar 'gro ba de mthong nas// mtshan ma gzhan dag slar yang brjod pa
132b2(skyes rabs): nyid// ko ka bung ba nyam thag ma he dang // 'tshe sogs ming dang chang gis rab myos pa// der ni rnam pa de lha'i bgegs gyur pa// ngan pa'i mtshan nyid rnams ni yang drug bshad// de nas rang dgas
132b3(skyes rabs): sa bdag bzang ldan yang // lhas byin la sogs de rnams bcas pa nyid// rab byung chos gos lhung bzed ldan gyur pas// sa gzhi chags bral rang bzhin byas pa bzhin// rgyal po dang ni de bzhin
132b4(skyes rabs): rgyal sras dag/ do shal dpung rgyun rna rgyun rab spangs pa// de dag rnams kyi sku lhung nye bar 'kho ra// 'drig mi khan chags bral mig chu wAn+d+he pAr b+hurar+ya// de ni rmongs shing dman yang rgyal ba'i
132b5(skyes rabs): dkaso// rab tu byung nas mchod 'os mchog tu gyur// sems ni mchog tu gyur // sems ni mchog tu rab tu drang ba'i rgyu// mkhas pa nyid min rigs ldan min nam snyam// de nas phyog la mi
132b6(skyes rabs): bdag bzang ldan gyis// 'dreg mkhan de yang 'khor der 'khod shes nas// saM bdag gyur nas dman pa yi 'di yi ni// rkang la ji ltar 'dud ces g.yo med gyur// rnam par rtog ldan khongs dang ma
133a1(skyes rabs): bral ba// de lnga bcom ldan 'dzum zhing bka' stsal pa// rmongs pas cher bsdams rigs las byung ba yi// mngon par khengs pa rab tu byung nas thong // zhes thos rgyal po'i sras bcwa
133a2(skyes rabs): rgyal po yis// phyag 'tshal tshe na sa gzhi rab tu g.yos// bcom ldan gsung gis de yi rkang pa la// lhas byin tshig rtsub brjod cing phyag mi byed// de nas sa ge yis ya mtshan yid can gyi// dge slong che
133a3(skyes rabs): kyis dris shing stenr-i pa yis// bkra' stsal rgyal pos skye ba gzhan la yang // 'dreg mkhan 'di la nges par phyag 'tshal byas// ka shi'i grong du dbul po gzhon nu yis// smad 'tsheng bzang mo zhes pa mngon
133a4(skyes rabs): mthong gyur// mdzes pas de tshe de yi g.yog rnams byas// gang phyir chags pas rgud kun nye bar ston// ngo yis btang nos me tog btu ba'i slad// yang yang lhag par don gnyer bung ba bzhin// de dang
133a5(skyes rabs): 'grogs pa'i lus med re ba lus// nags nang rnams su de yis ngal zhing 'khyams// skabs der sngon la chagus pas rAbA ngal zhing // nags nang phyin par gyur pA sa yi dbang// lus ni 'khri shing gis
133a6(skyes rabs): bsgribs tshangs sbyin gyis// de ni rab mthong de yi gla dag thos// ma tog gas pa gsar pa 'dod pas sbrang rtsi bad// ci ste de ltar gdung bas// khyod 'joms myur du song // bzhin ras me tog rnam rgyas chu skyes
133b1(skyes rabs): wAn pA de// gang phyir nyin mo'i mjug tu zum par 'gyur ba yin// mi bdag gis nI de yi glu skad thos// 'dzum zer do shal mdzes pa la reg cing // des smras nyi 'od drug pos gdungs pa la// g+ho Da
133b2(skyes rabs): bri glu yi nyams dgor sbyor ba hU~M// des kyang smras pas bdag nges par nI// nyi mu'i mi gdung 'dod pa mchog hU~M gdung // 'jig rten nA ni rang lus sdug bsngal 'dzin// sA ka'i mya ngam thang ni sreg
133b3(skyes rabs): min// don ldan tshig 'di'i yon tAn+da pAlA yis// de ni sa yi bdag po'i mdza' bor gyur// legs bshad yang dag brjod pas reg pa nI/ su zhig dag gi bsnyen bkur gnas mi 'gyur// de nas rgyal bu mi
133b4(skyes rabs): med par gyur po// de yi bsil ba'i ri mi gros gdung ba b+h+rUM la// de nas byas shes de yis dga' bas de// blangs nas lpA ni ts+tshag+na r+m+ma la b+he'i pho blang song // dri la 'di yis srog rab byin ces nas// lhag pa
133b5(skyes rabs): tshim pas sems kyi spyod tshul rdzogs// rgyal srid phyed sbyin mngon phyogs de gnas te// sems rjes zhugs la sbyin min ci zhig yod// nga ni rgyal srid phyed sbyin min brtson po'i chu// mdzes pas mtshan
133b6(skyes rabs): mo bsams pa bdag mau ni// bzang po med na rgyal sring bode bas ci// der mdza'i bdud rtsis dbang bskur skal ldan yin// rgyal srid las kyang phyed le bodag me sred// dpal ni chung yang nyams pa med
134a1(skyes rabs): na mdzes// don cig ldan las rtag tu 'gal bar brjod// gnyi ga longs spyod rtsod pa gzugs can nyid// bde slad mi bdag gsang nas bkum pa na// rgyal srid mtha' dag gis
134a2(skyes rabs): ni bdag rdzogs 'gyur// zhes pa skad cig rnam bsams 'gyod pas gdungs// dge po'i gugs gtadade yis slar bsam pa// bdag gis ci bsams mchog tu smad 'os 'di// nges par rno ba'i rab
134a3(skyes rabs): byed 'di lta ci// las ngan brtag pa'i dri mas rab bsgos pa// kye ma ring sems la yang ngo re tsha// rgyal srid shes gyur bde la phyag 'tshal lo// kun rmongs ma tsog dpal 'byor bzod par mdzod// grang
134a4(skyes rabs): dog nyam su ma myong bsam nyid na// dang po blo yi rang bzhin 'di ltar gyur// kye mA dpal dang dug shing bsnams tsam gyis// skyes bu rnams ni rnam par nyams par byed// 'khrul pa skyed byed brgyal ba nyid
134a5(skyes rabs): du byung // rnam par ltung byed mun pa rgyas par byed// yun ring 'di bri sems rang nyid byang chub la// chags bral de yi sems spyos snga dro ni// ma yi bdag pos mngon par gsil btab kyang // sred pa
134a6(skyes rabs): dang grol rgyal srid brdzung mi gyur// dus kyis rang sangs rgyas nyid thob pa de// rdzu 'phrul tshe ldan mi bdag gis mthong nas// mgo phreng de yi zhabs pad la 'phos pas// sems ni dang bar 'os pa 'di
134b1(skyes rabs): dgu smras// glang spyad dam+b+ha pA'i las kyai rnam sbyin skyes// rab gis dbapung bskur dben de byug byur 'os// gang gi myum+bu las chags pa bral rnams kyis// rgyu gter sgra rags ldan pa gtang bar 'os// zhes pa de don gyis
134b2(skyes rabs): bskyed rgyal pos brjod// thos nas de don don du gnyer nas bzung // 'dreg mi kha na de ni zhi ba'i gnas thob nas// de nyid sman pa gang ga sbyang ba lo// mchog gi las kyi sbyor bas rab byung las// dam pa'i dngos po mchod
134b3(skyes rabs): 'os thob la'ang // rgyul byos rab btung phyug 'tshul de yi tshe// rnam 'gyur drug ldan sa yang g.yos par gyur// rgyal po rnam 'dud sgrib pa de ni bzang byin dag dang tshongs pas byin// gang yang nye ba 'khor de dge
134b4(skyes rabs): ldan 'dreg mkhan gau g+ha skyong ba la// zhes pa'i ngo mtshar bcom ldan gyis gsungs dge slong de dag rnams kyis thos// sems ni rab dang kho na legs pa'i lam la rgyu nyid yin par sems// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang
134b5(skyes rabs): bis byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bse gyi 'khri shing las// yabA dang sras mjal ba'i yul 'dra ba ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// / gang zhig sems can don rnams
134b6(skyes rabs): dag gi shu dang chung me la sogs mchog tu ni// phongs pa'ang btang nas dman pa'i pho nyas bzhin no log par gyur pa med pa nyid// yid bzhin rin chen las lhag mdzes shing 'jig rten kun gyis smad par ma
135a1(skyes rabs): 'os pa// skyes bu'i rin chen gzhan pa sngon med mthu ldan su zhig de rnams phyag bgyir 'os// shAk+Sha'i grong khyer dag tu sngon// lhas byin gtam gyi mjug thogs su// dge slong gis dris
135a2(skyes rabs): bcom ldan 'das// rgyal bas sngon gyi spyod mtha' gsungs// dpal 'byor yid gcugs gnas gyur pa// sna tshogs zhes pa'i grong khyer byung // kun la phan po'i nus pa can// legs byas skye ba'i sa gzhi bzhin/
135a3(skyes rabs): der ni mi bdag spyod tshul bkra// grogs min mun pa'i tshe zer can// mig gi kun dga' bdud rtsi'i gzugs// kun tu rgyal ba zhes pa byung // de yi bu ni gtong phred can// thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gyur// gang gi
135a4(skyes rabs): sngon med btong ba yis// dpag bsam shing gi grags pa phrogs// phrag dog spangs nas dus mnyam du// mkhas po yis ni rab brgyan pa// bden pa gang gis tshig dang ni// sbyin pas dpal dang thos pas blo// gang
135a5(skyes rabs): gi grags pa ke tA ka'i// nang gi 'dab ltar dri med pa// phyogs kyi na chung rna rgyan du// gyur pa da lta'ang rnam par mdzes// nam zhig de yis slong ba la// shing rta rgyal sring rnam par rgya'o// 'od kyis ying la re ba 'phrog
135a6(skyes rabs): rin chen mchog gis brgyan pa byin// shing rta mchog do byin pa la// skye bo mtha' dag ya mtshan gyis// snying ni kun tu non gyur cing // bsam pas kyang ngo mo yaM dbang // de nas so bdag dga' ba zhan// yid la re ba
135b1(skyes rabs): bsam byas non// mi dga' ba ni nyer bsags pas// blon po che rnams bos te smras// shing rta chen po'i sde dang ni// gang gi mthu yis rang bsgrubs pa// dgra 'joms rgyal bar byed pa yi// shing rta de
135b2(skyes rabs): ni gzhon nus byin// gnyis la bdag gi dpal 'byor ni// g.yo med gyur cing bde bar gnas// shing rta rtul phong lam de dang // glang po rgyal po'i gte la'o// de skad rgyal po'i tshig thos nas/
135b3(skyes rabs): blon po rnams kyis der smras pa// shing rta chen po'i sngo dang ni// gang gi mthu yis rab bsgrubs pa// dgra 'joms rgyal bar byed pa yi// mnyes gshin las ni bag med pa// 'di ni rgyal po khyod kyi skyon// chos
135b4(skyes rabs): ni su yi dga' ba min// sbyin pa su'i bkur bya min// 'on kyang rtsa ba nyams pa yi// shau nga? las 'bras bu dron gnyer ldog/ gnyis skyes de yi sna shing rta yang // gzhan gyi yul du btsongs par gyur/
135b5(skyes rabs): zhes smras blon po thams cad ni// zug rngus zug pa bzhin du gyur// de nas dge ba'i rnam smin bzhin// snying la kun dga' ster byed pa// dus kyi myos byed dga' ba yi// dpyid ni yid dag byung gyur cing //
135b6(skyes rabs): dpyid ni don gnyer bung ba rnams// rang nyid kyis bzung bsten 'os pa'i// me tog tshal gyis 'jig rten ni// grags pas bzhin du dkar ba dang // 'gro ba ljon pa mya ngan med// 'jig rten grib bsil phan
136a1(skyes rabs): bar brtson// me tog gzhon nus rang rgyus pa// dpyid kyis bsgrubasdu bar brtsams pa'i tshe// rgyal sras slong nga'i dpag bsam shing // rgyul srid 'phel byed glang po la//
136a2(skyes rabs): zhon nas me tog rgyas pa yis// ljon pa gzig su nags su gshegs// rgyalo phran gzha na gyis btang ba yi// bram zes la mi du bgrod de la// mngon phyogs shes pa brjod pa'i tsho// mngon du
136a3(skyes rabs): btang nas rab smras pa// legs pa khyod ni 'jig rten na// g.yo ba'i yid bzhin nor bus sgrogs// gang dang phrad pas slong ba rnams// dpal gyis mchog tu 'khyud bar gyur// phul bzhin khyad par
136a4(skyes rabs): grags pa ni// gnyis nyid bzang po'i skye ba la// sbyin pas lag brlan 'jig rten na// khyod dang mtho bstan glang 'di'o// legs byas rgya che'i glang po 'di// bdag cag la ni gnang bar mdzod/ khyod
136a5(skyes rabs): las gzhan gyi gtong phyod kyis// 'di ni sbyin par mi nus so// de yis de bslangs spro ldan des// srog ldan yang dag rgyal srid bzhin// dung dang rgyal srid rnga yab bcas// gnyis 'thung de dag rnams la
136a6(skyes rabs): byin// byang chub gtso bo'i smon lam byos// rin chen mang ldan glang po'i dbang // byin nas dag pa'o blo ldan de// kun tu dga' ba rgyas par gyur// rgyal ba'i glang po byin pa yi// grags pa mi bad
136b1(skyes rabs): gis thos nas// rgyal po'i dpal 'byor bsrung ba yi// thabs dang bral ba nyid du bsams// de nas sa bdag rgyal srid ni// nyam sra pas 'jigs shing khros pa yis// nges par bskrad nas gzhon
136b2(skyes rabs): nu de// phyag 'tshal nas ni chas gyur te// btsun mo ma dris lhan cig des// gzhon nu dri ldan zhes pa dang // do bzhin kriSh+Na zhes pa yi// bu mo khyer nas na gsu song // slong ba rnams la na gsu yang //
136b3(skyes rabs): be zhon pa l-i sogs lhag ma byin// gang phyir chen po'i snying stobs ni// phun sum tshogs sam rgud kyang snyoms// nam zhig ma dri me tog dang // rtsa ba 'bras bu bsgrub pa'i slar// song tshe bram ze su
136b4(skyes rabs): zhig gis// rgyal po'i sras la mngon phyogs smras// g.yog 'khor med pa bdag la ni// bu sring spyang po 'di dag blang // gang phyir snying stobs chen po khyod// thams cad sbyin par rab tu grags
136b5(skyes rabs): 'di thos 'phral la ma dbyed par// mchog tu sdug khri tsu gde mas das byin na// de bral mya ngan bzod par byas// nor dang bu dang chung ma sogs// 'jig rten pa yi mchog tu phangs// brtse ldan gtong phong can
136b6(skyes rabs): rnams la// sbyin pa los gzhan phangs pa med// de nas bu la mnyes ge shin pa'i// ma dri 'ongs pas bu srid dag/ me mthong shin tu brgyal nas ni// khyo yi mdun du 'gyel bar gyur// mya ngan
137a1(skyes rabs): me ni 'bar ba yis// khyab cing cho nge 'don pa de// 'du shes rnyed pas bu srid dag/ byin par gyur pa'i mtha' thos nas// khyod la mdza' byas rjes zhugs te// bu la
137a2(skyes rabs): byams pa'i sdug bsngal me// bzod dka' de yi sems la ni// khong du rab tu 'bar bar gyur// skabs der lha yi dbang po ni// bram ze'i gzugasu mngon par 'ongs// rgyal po'i sras laM btsun mo ni//
137a3(skyes rabs): sdug ma 'bang sa ma'i don du bslangs// de yis bslangs pa'i 'phral la de// btsun mo dang bral mya ngan dag/ blo yis bzod byas snying stobs kyi// chu gter de yis de la byin// 'phral le byin pra ra
137a4(skyes rabs): 'khrugs sla shing // ri dwagrasaM mo bzhin rnams skrag pa'i// btsun mo la nges byang chub kyi// bag tshogs nang du 'dzeg cing smras// dge ma yang dag yin ston cig/ mya ngan byi bar mi 'os so// mdza' ba
137a5(skyes rabs): 'di ni rmi lam 'dra// snying sdug 'grogs pa bden pa med// gnyis skyes 'di la gus pa yis// khyod blo chos la dga' bar gyis/ g.yo ba'i 'jig rten bgrod pa lo// dam pa'i chos ni brtan pa'i grogs/
137a6(skyes rabs): rang gi skye bos legs pa kun mthong gnyen rnams nyams su myong bar gyur// skad cig yongs su gyur pas dri ma can 'gyur grogs kyi phreng ba mgrin par bkod// lang tshe dang ni srog dag chung ma bu yis
137b1(skyes rabs): rtag tu zad pa nyid gyur cing // chos las gzhan pa'i thob pa gang yang yongasu brtan pa 'dris ma thob// ces smras btsun mo la chags pa// yongs btang de yi bzhin pad kyis// mdzes dang sems kyi brtan
137b2(skyes rabs): pa yi// spyod tshul dag ni de yis bzung // bral ba'i mya ngan gyis gdungs pa'i// ma dri mthong nas snying rjes 'khrugs// bde sogs bdag pos rang gi gzugs// yang dgra bzung nas de la smras// bu mo mi
137b3(skyes rabs): dga' ma byed cig/ nga ni skabs gsum dbang po'i lha// 'di yis slong ba rnams la khyod// ster 'gyur de slang bdag gis bslangs// da 'di khyod 'di nyid la khyod// bdag gis gtams par byas te btang //
137b4(skyes rabs): gzhan la 'di yis khyod mi ster// ji ltar gzhan gyi nor ster 'gyur// khyod ni bu sring gnyis po dang // ngos par phrad pa bdag gis bya// zhes smras mig stong ldan pa ni// 'phral la nyid du mi snang gyur/
137b5(skyes rabs): de nas bram zes bu tsha dag/ khyer nas nor ni 'dod pa yis// nga ba gyi phreng song / na po las ni ba na // rgya lo gro krig/ // mig ni mchi mas 'gags pa yis// nor ni chen po dag gis bslus// dus kyis sa bAdag thams
137b6(skyes rabs): cad bshes// mtho ris gshegs tshe grong khyer ba// blon pa'i tshogs kyis gsol btab nas// thams cad sgrol gyis rgyal srid bsten// mchog tu sbyin pa la zhen pa// rdul bral de yi rgyal srid ni//
138a1(skyes rabs): phun tshogs snying stobs kyis rgyas pas// su yang slong ba por ma gyur// nor des 'byor tshogs sdig pa can// bram ze dz+nyA dz+nyA ka de yang // bdag gi rang mthus phun tshogs zhes//
138a2(skyes rabs): skye bo dag la mngon par smra// thams cad sgrol de nga nyid de// gnyis skyes de yang lhas byin no// dge slong rnams la bcom ldan gyis// 'di gsungs sbyin pa bstan pa mdzad// sbyin pa 'jig rten pa
138a3(skyes rabs): rol mi rnams gnyen// g.yang sa rgyur ni kun tu ltung ba'i rten// 'jigs rung mun par yun+da ri rab tu gsal// bzod dka'i sdug bsngal dus su dbugasa'abyi no// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i
138a4(skyes rabs): byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las thams cad sgrol gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// / mtha' dag 'jig
138a5(skyes rabs): rten snang ba spro slad nyi ma 'od zer 'gyed// bdud rtsi'i char mchog dbab slad zla ba rdzogs pa nyid du 'gro// sems can bsgral ba'i slad du dge ba'i zam stegs chen po ni// kha cig 'di snyed 'gro bar bsdu
138a6(skyes rabs): bar 'os pa'i skye bo 'dzin// shAkya'i grong khyer dag tu sngon// rgyal po dpal ldan zas gtsang byung // grags pa ri bong can bskyed pa// bdud rtsi'i chu gter gzhan pa bzhin// ngo bos mi srun la char ge/
138b1(skyes rabs): ngo mtshar byed pa su zhig gis// yon tan ldan pa'i tshogs la gtad // dam pa'i phyogs la ltung bar byas// da lta'ang mya lus phyogs drang ngogs// gnasu chags shing dben ldan pa// gang gi grags pa
138b2(skyes rabs): rnam dgra bos// thub pa'i brtul zhugs nges pa bzhin// sangs rgyus ma ru bdag gyur cig/ ces pa'i smon lam sngon bta bo bA// dri med mdzes par mi yul 'ongs// bi shI karma'i bu mo lo// skyes bu
138b3(skyes rabs): dam pa'i grags pa bzhin// lha mo sgyu 'phrul che zhes pa// de yi yod bong mchog tu gyur// zla ba'i ku mud ldan pa bzhini// de yis rmi lam dku nang na// glang po dkar dang mkha' la 'gro// ri bo 'dzag dang
138b4(skyes rabs): skye bo ni// chen pos dpung 'dud du mthong // skabs der byang chub sems dpa' ni// rang nyid 'jig rten lde brtse bas// dga' ldan lha yi gnas dgra las// de yi lhum su yang dag byon// 'jig rten
138b5(skyes rabs): dga' byed byang chub semasra// de yas lhums su bzung ba nau// 'o mtsho'i rlabs kyis zla ba bzhin// dkar ba'i 'od dang ldan par gyur// bu ram shing skyes rgyal po'i rgyu de// de ni lhums na gnas pa de//
138b6(skyes rabs): gter dong ljon pa'i sa gzhi bzhin// de ge ba'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshon gyur// de yi sred pa byung gyur pa// sbyin pa'i bsod nams rang bzhin skyes// sa ha ka ra'i dri bzang ni// sel ba la yang bslu ba
139a1(skyes rabs): min// de nas dus kyi sku yang dag rdzogs// lum+b+ha bi ni yi nags gnas ba'i// lha mo de lta sras bltams te// di ti las ni nyin byed bzhin// ma yi mngal gyi dri ma yis// ma reg
139a2(skyes rabs): de yis dgu brtol byon// de nas de yang rang bzhin gyis// rdul bral lus ni rnal gnas gyur// phyir byung nyid na brgya byin gyis// stobs shes 'dod nas skad cig ni// rdo rje snying po'i sku de bzung // de ni nus
139a3(skyes rabs): med nyid du gyur// bltams pa tsam gyis khye'u de// rang gis gom pa bdun phyin nas// yi ge rab gsal tshig gis ni// phyogasu rnam par gzigs shing smras// 'di ni bdag gi myang 'das shar// 'jig
139a4(skyes rabs): rten blo gros rjes mthun lho// 'di yang skye ba'i mtha' dang nub// 'di ni 'khor po dag las byung // de skad de yis brjod pa na// sa ni kun tu 'dar gyur te// 'gro ba'i bla ma mi bzad stobs// de gzung bar ni mi nus
139a5(skyes rabs): bzhin// mkha' yi chu rgyun gyis bkrus ba// de yi grags pa dka' ba'i gdugs// snying stobs 'dzum pa'i rnga yab bcas// der ni lha rnams dag gis bzung // skabs der nag po zhes pa yi// thub pa kiSh+Ti
139a6(skyes rabs): de yi rir// gnas la che bo mi sbyin gyis// 'od zer mthong nas rab tu dris// phug dang khang par bcas pa'i ri// gang gis mun pas dbul byed pa// nyi ma brgya yi snang ba bzhin// snang ba mthong ba gang las
139b1(skyes rabs): lags// ya mtshan las des de skad brjod// lha yi spyan ldan des smras pa// byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba la// bsod namasna snang ba 'di dag skyes// mnyes gshin mi ring nyid nA de// dge ba'i
139b2(skyes rabs): slad du'u cag bAlta// zhes brjod thub pa kun dga' zhing // ngo la bsos bride ba nyid du 'gyur// srus belta mos don kun mchog tu ni// grub pa zas gtsang gis mthong nas// 'di ni don kun grub
139b3(skyes rabs): be zhes// de yi mtshan yang btags par gyur// gnod sbyin shAk+Shu 'phel zhes pa// shAkya'o grong khyer dag na gnas// gang la btud bas shAkya yi// byis pa nyer 'tshe med par 'gyur// lu
139b4(skyes rabs): des yab kyi phyag 'tshal ba'i// slad du btung tshe gsang ba po// de yis byang chub sems dpa' de// mthong nas de yi zhabs la btugs// de nas sa bdag dgyes pa yis// de ni 'phang du blangs
139b5(skyes rabs): byas nas// de yi lus la mtshan rnams ni// mtshan mkhan dag gis rab tu bltas// de nas mtshan shes ya mtshan ldan// kun gyis mi bdag la smras pa// lha cig gzhon nu mchog 'di
139b6(skyes rabs): ni// mtshan rnams dag gis nye bar mtshon// mtshan nyid 'di dag rnams kyis ni// 'khor los sgyur ba brgya byin bdag/ thams cad ngal bso'i skal ldan na mi// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs par
140a1(skyes rabs): gyur// 'di yi rab gnyis rab tu mdzes// dmyur zhing pad+ma lta bur mnyen// sor mo'i 'dab ring 'khor lo yis// mtshan cing legs par rab tu gnas// mthong zhing ngang
140a2(skyes rabs): ba'i rgyal po bzhin// sor mo'i yal 'dab dra bar ldan// dpal ldan e Ne'i byin pa zung // pus mo'i bar du phyag gis brgyan// gsang ba sbubs bcas glang po bzhin// n+ya g+ho d+ha ltar chu zheng ga ba/
140a3(skyes rabs): g.ya su 'khyil pa'i spu yis mtshan// rgyu khyon ngag dang mtshungs par methong // rdul dang dri ma'i chas ma reg/ 'dzam bu chu bo btso ma'i 'od// phyag zhabs phrag so mgrin pa'i mchog/ rab gsal
140a4(skyes rabs): 'dab ma bdun pa'i dbyi bas// sku mdog dag kyang seng ge 'dra// lus kyi yan lag che zhing gsal// tshems ni bzhi bcu mnyam zhing dkar// baR+Sha mtshams med cing shangs dag mdzes// ljags
140a5(skyes rabs): kyang ring zhing srab pa ste// 'brug dang rnga yi sgra lta bu// spyan mthing rdzi ma pa yi 'dra// gtsug tor lhan cig skyes pa'i dbu// dbu ni gdugs dbyibs byis pa 'dri// mdzod spu dkar mdzes smin char mtshan/
140a6(skyes rabs): thugs kar bkre shis rab tu 'bar// ri mo dung dang chu skyes phyag/ rgyal po khyod kyi sras po 'ad// 'khor los sgyur ba 'am kun mkhyen ni// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu// sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i bla
140b1(skyes rabs): mAr 'gyur// zhes brjod de dag song ba'i tshe// sa yi bdag pos dga' ba thob// nyin zhag bdun na ston pa yi// yum ni mtho ris dag tu song // gang tshe de ltas shAkya rnams// thub pa bzhin du
140b2(skyes rabs): zhi ba nyid// mthong ba de che gzhon nu de// shAkya thub pa zhes byar gyur// 'di ni lha rnams dag gi yang // lha zhes gzi brjid dag gis des// sa yi bdag pos de yi mtshan// lU yi lha zhes btags
140b3(skyes rabs): bar gyur// de nas mi sbyin dang 'grogs te// thub pa nag po de nyid mthong // gus pas dka' thub nags tshul nA// de ni lta ru yang dag 'ongs// byang chub sems dpa' skal ba ni// gsal byed
140b4(skyes rabs): nyi ma 'char ka bzhin// mthong nas bzhin gyi dpal rgyas pa// pad+mo nyid dang mtshungs pa thob// phyag dang mgron che byas pa yAM// rgyal la thub pas de smras pa// rgyal po yon tan tshegs kyis bzhin/
140b5(skyes rabs): sras kyis khyod ni dgyes par 'os// 'di yi mtshan rtags 'di dgra ni// thar pa'i dpal 'byor phun tshogs sam// 'khor los sgyur ba'i dpal du brjod// 'bras bu 'di dag bslu ba med// 'di yi byung
140b6(skyes rabs): chub snga dro yis// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i chu skyes zhal// pad+ma'i 'byung gnas dag gis bzhin// skal ldan mig gi snod du 'o gyur// byang chub 'o ma'i rgya mtsho che// snying stobs dag pa 'di yi ni//
141a1(skyes rabs): gsung gi bdud rtsi mkhas pa dag/ skal ldan rnams kyi nyer 'tshor 'gyur// gang gi dus ni yongs rdzogs pas// 'di ni mthong ba rnyed dka' ba// bdag nyid gcig pu 'gro ba ni//
141a2(skyes rabs): da nams ldan pa 'di na bslus// zhes smras mi bdag la sbran nas// mkha' las dka' thub nags song ste// yid na rib tu dang byas nas// lus ni gtang bar rab tu bsams// yongasu rdzogs pa'i
141a3(skyes rabs): man ngag ni// mi sbyin dag gis mngon par zhus// de yis de la smras pa bu// bdud rtsi gzhon nu ston par 'gyur// rgyal sras dau la bdud rtsi ni// rtogs nas nad dang bral ba khyod// 'khor bya'i chu ga trer
141a4(skyes rabs): las sgrol 'gyur// zhes pa smras nas lus btang gyur// mi sbyin gyis ni 'phral la de'i// lus kyi legs par bya ba byas// kA t+yA ya na zhes thob nas// grub slad ba ra Na sir song // de nas gzhon nu bskyed
141a5(skyes rabs): bsrings shing // rig kun legs par pha rol phyin// yi ge mkhas pas tshangs pa yi// yi ge mngon pAr rnam par sprul// gleng chen khri yI stobs mtshungs par// de ni 'gro byar grags pa'i tshe//
141a6(skyes rabs): yangs pa can pas dga' ba'i slad// de la glang chen myos pa bsrings// 'byung 'gyur 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyir// de la skyes su 'ongs pa yi// glang po che de lhas byin gyis// yongasu sdang ba dag gis
141b1(skyes rabs): bsad// so gnyis rab tu lhung ba de// dga' byos gom pa bdun du khyer// gzhon nu yis kyang de blangs nas// ra ba dag las phyi rol 'phangs// tA la bdun dang sa yi gzhi// mda' gcig gis ni nges
141b2(skyes rabs): par phug/ gcod 'bigs ma tshon dang bstan bcos la// de nyid phul du phyin par gyur// de nas btsun mo yon tan mtshungs// grags 'dzin ma ni rgyal skyes kyis// dag pa'i khrims bzhin 'jig
141b3(skyes rabs): rten na// grags pa mA thob blangs par gyur// skabs 'dir rlung ni chen po yis// shin tu che ba'i ljon pa ni// dpag tshad bdun pa rnam par bsgyel// chu bo'i srol ni 'gags par byas// thur bgrod
141b4(skyes rabs): ro hi ka zhes pa// de ni shing chen gyis bkag pas// ngang tshu la nyams pa'i bud med bzhin// rgyun las rab tu bzlog ste song // rgyal po'i sras kyis ljon+da pa de// blangs shi bcag ste 'phangs
141b5(skyes rabs): nas kyang // skyes dgu zhi slad chu yA ni// dba' klong 'khrugs pa rnam par bzlog/ de nas nam zhi ga skyed tshul du// ngang pa sgro ldan rnon po yis// lhas byin gyis ni bskyod par gyur// gzhon nu
141b6(skyes rabs): yis ni yang dgo gso so// de yo rtsod pas lhas byin ni// lhag bor shin tu gdung bar gyur// gang phyir rigs mtshungs yoyin ten gyis// mtho bo gya gyos mi bzod do// namo zhig gzhon nu
142a1(skyes rabs): 'dod pa yi// gzugs mtshungs rgyal po'i bu mo ni// sa 'tsho zhes pas mthong gyur nas// 'dod pa ci yang skyes par gyur// zas gtsang gis ni btsun mo ni// sras kyi
142a2(skyes rabs): thugs la 'os shes nas// khab tu blangs te yid srubs kyi// yid la re ba rdzogs par byas// de nas mtshan mkhan nges bcas rnams// mngon phyogs mi bdag la smras pa// khyod sras nyi ma
142a3(skyes rabs): bdun pa la// 'khor los sgyur ba 'am thub par 'gyur// de thos mi bdag sras kyis ni// 'khor los sgyur ba'i gnas thob nas// rab tu 'byung la 'jigs pa yis// nyin grangs rang bzhin bsems
142a4(skyes rabs): par gyur// dpal ni thums cad g.yo ba dang // zhi ba brtan pa'i bde ba'ang rigs// 'on kyang longs po spyod la chags rnams// phun sum tshogs la mchog tu gus// de nas nam zhig skyed tshal du//
142a5(skyes rabs): rnam par rtse slad rgyal po'i sras// mgyogs shing mtho ba'i rtswa ldan pa'i// shing rta la dag la zhon te gshegs// de yi lam du skyes buM ni// rga bas 'khogs shing mdog mi sdug/ mgo skyes zegs
142a6(skyes rabs): shing brul gyur po// skyem zhing rtsub pa'i rnam pa mthong // de yis de mthong rang lus la// gzigs nas yun ring rnam bsams po// kye ma lus 'di smin pa yi// mjug ni smad par 'os pa yin// /
142b1(skyes rabs): 'di ni na tshod mtha' thob kyang // mtha' ni rten par mi byed cing // rga ba 'dri ni rgan po las// skra dkar zol gyis rgod pa bzhin// kye ma nga ni rgan po dag/ rus gzeb lus po chu rgyud kyi// rgyun gyi zhags pas
142b2(skyes rabs): smras pa ru// / rmongs bya'i mkha'agro graso 'am snyam// 'di ni khyim du ci zhig byed// dka' thub nAg su cis mi 'gro/ rgan po'i lus dang lhan cig tu// blo yang rab tu 'khu mes pa'am// rgan po 'khrur
142b3(skyes rabs): ba la brten gyi// blo ni chos lA ma yin no// rga bas lus ni 'khogs pa la// rang bzhin gyis ni dben pa med// so phreng lhung bas kha chu dang // zugs pa'i cha yis 'khru ni yi cwa ra gyur pa/ rgan pa 'di ni smod
142b4(skyes rabs): bar byed// lta byed nyams shing lus po ring // stobs ni zhum shing thos pa nyams// 'on kyang rmongs las rgan po yi// gzhon nu mA yas mdzes par mthong // dkar po nyid 'di smad pa nyid// yin
142b5(skyes rabs): yang rgan po tsI sti 'dzin mchog tu g.yo zhing chags bral yang // gang 'di lus la shin tu phangs// de ltar bsams shing lus dag ni// rgud pa rnams kyi tshogs gyur cing // gnod pa dang bcas dgongs
142b6(skyes rabs): gyur pa// de yi thugs yid byung bar gyur// slar yang dus gzhan dag na des// rnam par gyur pa'i ro 'dra ba// rnag dang bcas pa skye bo bzhin// nad kyis thebs pa'i mi zhig mthong // de yis de mthong
143a1(skyes rabs): rang nyid kyi// lus la dmigs te rab bsams pa// kye mA lus 'dir nad kyi tshogs// lhan skyes kho nur rab tu 'byung // sha yi rang bzhin lus po 'di// dman pa yin yang skad
143a2(skyes rabs): cig gang // nur zhing 'khrugs par mi 'gyur ba// 'di nyid ya mtshan shin tu che// 'di bsams thugs ni byung ba ste// lus la the tshom zhugs pa yis// rgyal skyid longs spyod chags pa la// gus pa dag
143a3(skyes rabs): dang bral bar gyur// de nas dus der phreng ba dang // gos kyis g.yogs par gyur pa'i lus// lus kyi bya bas gnyen 'dun gyi// skye bo 'khrugs pa'i ro zhig mthong // de mthong 'phral la chags bral zhing //
143a4(skyes rabs): brtse ba sdug bsngal smod pas 'khrugs// 'khor ba snying po med pa ni// yongasu btang bar yun ring bsams// las kyi rang bzhin lta bu yi sa// phreng ba snying la reg par bzung // ring du 'gro bar chas gyur
143a5(skyes rabs): ba// 'di ni yi dwags gan su 'gro/ kye ma yul la goms par ni// rtse dga' dag lnga brtson pa yi// mi rnams dus mthar 'o rgyal bas// shing dang rdo ba mtshungs pa nyid// skyes bu rnams lus srid
143a6(skyes rabs): mtsho'i sdug bsngal chu yi chu bur dang // dus rlung gis bskyod las kyi 'khri shing rtse yi me tog dang // sgyu ma'i bud mede mig ni rnam par g.yo ba dag gi cha// 'di la brtan pa nyid du mngon par khengs pa 'di ni
143b1(skyes rabs): gzhan lA phan par ldan pa cung zad ma brjod rigs pa'i chos ma thos// dge ba'i me tog bsnams pa nyid min bden pa yi ni tshul ma mthong // zhi ba'i gnas la reg min zhes gsal bar bsam
143b2(skyes rabs): la chags shing // nga lde sos srog song 'di ni 'phral la g.yo ba med nyid 'dzin par 'gyur// de ltar rgyal po'i bu yis ni// lus ni mri brtan pa nyid bsams// ma lus yul la chags pa/
143b3(skyes rabs): yi// mdza' ba mchog tu med par gyur// de nas mdun du gtsang mu yi// ris kyi lha rnams kyis sprul pa// lhung bzed ngur smrig 'dzin pa yi// rab tu byung ba mthong bar gyur// de mthong
143b4(skyes rabs): nyid na de yi blo// rab tu byung la mngon mchog gyur// gang phyir 'dod pa mthong ba ni// dga' bas rang bzhin rgyas bar 'gyur// gnas dang gnas de ru rgyal po'i sras// 'dod chags bral
143b5(skyes rabs): 'gyur rgyu rnams ni// mthong ba thams cad kha la bas// sau yi bdag po dag la bshad// de nas yab kyi chog gis ni// gzhon nu grong gzigs dge mtshan la// 'gro bas lam du gter
143b6(skyes rabs): rnams ni// sna tshogs bzhag pa mthong bar gyur// skyes bu sngon bkod bud med kyi// lag pas bton nas nye bar gnas// gang tshe de yis ma blangs pa// de tshe chu yi gter du zhugs// mgo skyes
144a1(skyes rabs): rdul gyis gos shing sgra// lag pa rkang pa rnam par gas// bkres dang skom pa dral bas gzir// thod pa mi bzung 'jor dag gis// rko 'brung phyogs ni rmA yis nyen// nyon
144a2(skyes rabs): myongs dbang gyur mthong gyur nas// snying rje rab tu rgyas par gyur// brtse bas de dag nor rnams kyis// dbul po nyid ni min par bsgrubs// bsod nams dgyes des glang bu rnams// nyon mongs dag las
144a3(skyes rabs): grol bar byas// de nas rgyal sras rjes 'brang bcos// nyi ma'i 'od zer rab rgyas pa// nyin gung tshad pa chen po'i tshe// de las phyi ra ni log par gyur// shing rta'i sgra yis gtsug bud can// gyen phyogs
144a4(skyes rabs): phyogs na sngon por byas// rdul gyi chu yi thigs rgyas pas// nags tshal gzhi ni bsil bar sleb// der ni shing rta las babs nas// snyan par grags shing rna rgyan ni// rnam par 'phyang des ngal bso'i slad//
144a5(skyes rabs): dzom+b+ha'i grib ma bsten par gyur// de yis rdul gyi chu thigs rgyun// gsal ba snying gar 'dzin pa dag/ do shal dag gis 'brel pa ni// chags ldan sbyar bas mdzes pa bzhin// rim gyis shing rnams thang
144a6(skyes rabs): grib ma yongasu gyur pa'i tshe// de yis sku las dzam+b+ha yi// grib ma bsil ba des chung ngu g.yos ma gyur// de yi grib ma bsil ba des// gdung bas nyen pa rab tu bzlog/ chags bral drag po'i bag
144b1(skyes rabs): chags kyis// 'khor ba dga' bral dag gi bzhin// de nas sa bdag phyogs de ru// sras ni gzigs par bzhed ldan pas// glang po che la bung ba ni// rab 'dus rnga yab 'khrug cing 'ongs// gzhon
144b2(skyes rabs): nu'i mthu lasna grib mA ni// g.yo ba med pa de mthong nas// gus bla rmad byung yang drug tho bo// rab tu btudu nas der phyag 'tshal// de nas yab dang lhan cig de// grong khyer 'gro bar brtson pa yis// grong
144b3(skyes rabs): khyer mtha' yi dur khrod ni// ro yis yongasu grang ba mthong // zhi ba'i nAM gas ni mi shis pa// ro yis khengs mthong chags bral can// de yis skad cig shing rta ni// bzung nas kha lo sgyur la smras// kha
144b4(skyes rabs): lo pa ltos srog chags kyi// gnod pa'i rang bzhin lus kyi skabs// rmongs pas bag med rnams kyi yi// 'di ltar mthong yang chags pas brlan// gzhan gyi bud med bltas ma ngoms// mi ga ni gus dang
144b5(skyes rabs): bcas par myangs// 'di yi bde ldan min pa'i lce// bya rog gis na gcod la ltos// 'di yi nu ma'i stod du na// sems dmugs rgod cing bde bar gnas// 'dod pas rgyas pa'i bya rgod kyis// mchu gcod
144b6(skyes rabs): 'dod ldan dog gis bzhin// rkang 'thung 'di dag g.yo ba'i bya rog chags pa'i gci bas skyug cing brgyal ba dang // rnam par gyur cing rnags pa'i ro yi dri ngas nges par sgra ngan sgrogs pa bzhin// lan cig ma
145a1(skyes rabs): yin bya rgod kyis 'joms brlan ldan rgyu ma bzangs pa'i ro mthong nas// rlung gis rnam par bskyod pa'i yal 'dab lag pas bzhin ras sgrib par byed pa bzhin// lang tsho ldan
145a2(skyes rabs): bA g.yo med myos pa'i snying dag myur du phrogs shing mgrin pa dge la chags// ci yang khrag la 'dod pa mngon par gsol zhing sen mos kha yi ri mos kun tu mtshan// rma yi mtshan ma so yis gtong
145a3(skyes rabs): ba'i mchu yi 'od ba la skad cig mya ngas ngo shing myangs byas nas// ce spyang 'di ni gcer bu'i bya ba dag la shin tu chags pas dga' bar byed pa bzhin// zhes brjod srid pa 'jigs rung zhing // smad pas dga'
145a4(skyes rabs): dang bral ba skyes// nyon mongs bzlog pa'i thabs sems shing // grong khyer nang du zhugs por gyur// ri dwags skyes zhes ri dwags mig/ ri dwags las skyes dri bzengs can// gzhon nu ma yi ches rab
145a5(skyes rabs): 'bar// yang thog thon pas der de mthong // de mthong tshe na de yi mig/ mchog tu thos par yang dag rgyu// 'phrol nyid dben pa dag dang ldan// chagasaso dang bcas shing g.yo bar gyur// ngo tsha bzod par
145a6(skyes rabs): mi nus pa// 'dod pas bzhin du de mthong ba// nyid kyis gzhon nu ma de drangs// grogs mo'i mdun du 'dug nas smras// chags pas gdung ba gang gis lus// 'di yi reg pa zla 'od kyis// mya ngan
145b1(skyes rabs): 'da' 'gyur bud med ni// 'jig rten dag na skal ldan bu// rgyal po'i bu yis 'dod pa'i sgra// mya ngan 'da' ba thos nyid nas// spyan gyi pad tshal ston pa bzhin// gyen du phyogs te de la bltas// de yi
145b2(skyes rabs): tshig dang lus des kyang // rab tu dang bar gyur pa nges// legaso spyod yon tan 'bar ba yi// do shal sems kyang de la 'phangs// lta ba'i rjes su mthun pa yis// rgyal bu'i dgongs pa sa bdag gis//
145b3(skyes rabs): shes nas btsun mo'i tshe gas gnas su// de ni blangs nas bkod por gyur// de nas btsun mo stong phrag ni// drug gis gang ba'i pho brang du// rgyal po'i sras kyis zhi ba ni// dgyes par rnam par bsam
145b4(skyes rabs): shing zhugs// skabs der mi yi bdag po la// mtshan mkhan rnams kyis gsal bar smras// khyod kyi sras ni thub pa 'am// 'khor los sgyur bar nang mo 'gyur// de nas mi bdag rang 'byung la// mchog
145b5(skyes rabs): tu 'jigs pas bsams nas ni// grong khyer sgo bsrungs 'gro ba dang // 'ong ba rnams ni dgog par byas// bre bo zas sogs spun zla rnams// de yis sgo rnams dag tu bkod// rang nyid grong khyer dbus su
145b6(skyes rabs): ni// dmag dang blon por bcas te gnas// de nas lha mo grags 'dzin mas// rgyal po'i bu las mngal thob nas// zla ba rab tu nye ba yi// ston ka'i mkha' bzhin dkar zhing mdzes// de nas grong khyer sgo
146a1(skyes rabs): bsrung ba// zhag gcig lhag mar gyur pa'i tshe// nyi ma zhi bar rab zhugs shing // nyin par rab 'byung mngon phyogs 'gyur// nyi ma zhi bar song ba'i tshe// thun mtshams kyang
146a2(skyes rabs): ni 'khor ba la// yun ring dpyad nas ngur smig gi/ gos la brten te mi snang gyur// ma lus phyogs kyi mun pa yis// rmongs pa 'joms brtan zla ba ni// dal bus shar bas na mkha' dag/ snang bas khengs
146a3(skyes rabs): shing gzigs par byas// tshogs dang gdung ba ldan pa'i sems// nyi ma sing chen mkha' ni// zla ba dag pa'i snying ldan pa// ci yang ma bslang rab dang gyur// de nas skabs der btsun mo'i tshogs// gan+da
146a4(skyes rabs): pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi khongs// rin chen khang par zla ba'i 'od// rab zhugs the tshom dgong byed pa// ro bral snying po med gyur pa// kun la gzigs shing rgyal po'i bu// mkha' ltar dri med rab dbang
146a5(skyes rabs): dran pa rab tu rgyas pas smras// bud med rnams kyi tshogs pa 'di ni 'dod ba'i me yi skar meda'i g.yog 'khor dang // drag po'i sdug bsngal brgya phrag dag gis gdung ba'i grogs yin yongasu btang
146a6(skyes rabs): bar 'os// de ni khyim bdag yongasu btang nas ljon pa'i 'og gi 'khri shing bsil ba yi// gzhi la rab tu zhi ba bde ba'i snying por bdag ni yongasu 'gyur bar 'os// zla ba'i 'od kyis rgyags pa'i rang bzhin
146b1(skyes rabs): mtshan mo lang tshe rgyas pa 'di la ni// 'di dag mig rnams gnyis kyi rgya yi nges byas gos rnams mal stan dag la lhung // rmi lam gyis bskyed rigs pa min+da pa'i tshig sgra sgra yi phrag pa kun tu g.yogs// myos
146b2(skyes rabs): pa'i dbugs kyi rlung gis bskyod pa'i mar me dag ni po cher gyur pa bzhino// lus ni brkyang zhing rang dbang min// ngo tsha med cing gos dang bral// lus can gnyid kyis log pa dang // shi la nges par bye brag ci//
146b3(skyes rabs): zhes pa brjod cing gshegs pa la// de ni brtson par gyu ra ba'i tshe// grong khyer sgre ni bsrung ba rnams// phun tshun gtam dag byung gyur pa// kye kye su su 'di mal tshe// mel tshe ldan la nyes pa med// NAM yaM
146b4(skyes rabs): thugs ngor 'khrugs pa yis// mtha' dag nyid ni mel tshe byed// 'khor po'i khang par mkhas bu mel tshe byed// rmongs pa'i mun par bag med gnyid par byed// mel tshe rab ldan 'jig rten dag na 'tshe//
146b5(skyes rabs): shi drang gnyid kyis log la bye brag ci// mtshan mo rgyal sras/ du bzung na// gnas pas gtam de thos gyur nas// rang gi 'dod pa legs pa yi// lam nas song ba bzhin du sdems// de yi myang 'das mtshan
146b6(skyes rabs): nyid kyi// rmi lam skad cig gi nyid kyis mthong // bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi// gter la rab tu nye bar bsams// de nas lha mo grags 'dzin ma// 'phral la rab sad skrag pa yi// de dus mthong ba'i rmi lam
147a1(skyes rabs): ni// bdag po nyid lA ra tu ba shad// jo bo bdag gi khri rgyun lus// chug dang dpal ni 'gro ba dang // nyi zla dag kyang bsgribs gyur pa// rmi lam du ni bdag gis mthong // de thos de yis
147a2(skyes rabs): der smras pa// mdzes ma bden spangs 'khor ba 'di// rmi lam nyid na rmi lam gyi'ang // rmi lam de ni ci zhig 'dra// nga ring rmi lam lte bA nAs// 'khri shing skyes byas nam mkha' khyab// lhun po mgo yi snga su
147a3(skyes rabs): byas// shar dang nub kyi chu gter gnyis// lag pa gnyis dang rkang pas kyang // lho yi rgya mtshe nga yis bzung // bzang mo bdag rmi 'di ni dge/ bud med bdag po dge bas dge/ byang chub sems dpas de brjod
147a4(skyes rabs): tsho// ci yang mi sgra grags 'dzin ma// slar yang gnyid la mngon phyogs te// mig ni zum pa nyid du gyur// de nas brgya byin tshangs la sogs// bdud rtsi spyod rnams yang dag 'ongs// byang chub sems dpa'i
147a5(skyes rabs): spro ba nI// shin tu chung ba rab rdzogs byas// de dag rnams ni lha yi bu// sa ri chu gter 'dzin bzod pa// shin tu mgyogs par gyur pa bzhi// de yi 'gro ba'i grogs la bskos// brgya byin gyis bsgos
147a6(skyes rabs): gnod sbyin ni// lngas rtson zhes pas rnamo sprul pa// khang bzang la reg thams skas la// babs nas de ni phyi rol byung // 'dun pa zhes pa'i kha lo pa// gnyid ni sad par byas te bos// sngags ldan zhes pa'i
147b1(skyes rabs): rta yi mchog/ de yi spro ba bzhin du bzung // dpal mo'i zur mig lhur g.yo ba'i// rno mudzes 'phrog byed la ni// de yi phyag gis srab skyogs nas// bzung zhing spyi bo re reg par byas// gang gis mthu
147b2(skyes rabs): yis phyugs rnams kyang // g.yo bA dag ni rnam par gtong // zhi brtson legs pa'i yid kyis de// nang dang phyi rol gang du'ang mnyam// de nas stobs ni shes 'dod nas// de yis zhabs ni sa la
147b3(skyes rabs): bkod// ya mtshan ldan pa'i lha yi bu// de dag rnams kyis g.yo ma nus// 'drog pa med pa'i rta la de// 'dun pa dang ni ldan cig zhon// rang gi bsam pa bzhin du ni// dri med che ba'i mkha' la
147b4(skyes rabs): gshegs// dpal gyi mya ngan shugs rings bzhin// g.yo ba'i rlung ni rab langs pas// gtsug tor thod kyi yal 'dab ni// g.yo zhing bsgyur zhing rab tu nga/ shegs// de rgyan rin chen 'od zer
147b5(skyes rabs): gyi// ri mos na mkha' rnam par bkr-i/ skud ba pa tA'i phreng ba yis// rnam bkra snam sbyar blangs pa bzhin// bltar 'os po brang 'khor gyi lha// 'dren byed g.yo bya'i ut+pa la// mchi ma'i thig
147b6(skyes rabs): rdzogs gang gyur pa// rab tu gshegs pa de mthong gyur// 'khor ba bzhin du rnam rgyas pa'i// mi bdag gnyen bcas grong khyer la// ring nas g.yas bskor mdzad nas ni// bzod pa mdzod
148a1(skyes rabs): ces de yis smras// mtshan ma skad cig lhag ma la// skye bo gnyid kyis rgyas btab tshe// ming chen zhes pa'i rgyal po'i gnyen// rab tu sang+ga sad de mthong gyur// mkha' la 'gro ba de mthong ste//
148a2(skyes rabs): ri bong can du dogs pas phrogs// yun ring spyad nas mi bdag na// mchi ma rgyas pas skong cher smras// gzhon nu mdzes pa'i rnam pa can// ban d+hu dzI ba lta bu khyod// rigs pa byed pa'i chags bral nyid// ngo mtshar
148a3(skyes rabs): 'di ni rigs ma yin// rig mchog khyad par don gnyer ba// re ba khyod la gtad pa'i yub// rI ba kun skong khyod kyis ni// ci slang re thag chad par mjed// ces pa shAkya chen po'i tshig/ mi bdag sras kyis thos gyur
148a4(skyes rabs): naswa// der smras gnyen dang mdza' ba yi// 'brel pa 'ching ba'i lcags kyi sgrog/ log pa'i khyim gyi bde ba la// dga' ba'i lus 'di 'jig par 'gyur// yul gyi dug gis gzir rnams la// nags ni bdud
148a5(skyes rabs): rtsi'i khang pa yi ni// yul gyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo pa 'di na bag med rab tu dga' ldan zhing // gdongs can gdengs ka gsum pa lag pas drangs nas mgo la 'ching ba bkod// drag po'i dug gi 'khri shing yal 'dab
148a6(skyes rabs): g.yo ba'i phreng bas mgrin pa bstams// sol ba 'bar ba'i tshogs kyi gang ba'i ngan 'gro'i lam du 'jug par byed// mkha' la gshegs shing 'di smras nas// skad cig gis ni grong khyer rgol// phyi rol sa
148b1(skyes rabs): gzhir mngon gshegs te// de ni mgyogs pa'i rtu la zhon// de nas shAkya'i gtso chen gyis// sa yi bdag po de la s+thAn+da// pho brang 'khor du btsun mo rnams// snying rje'i cho nges byung bar gyur/
148b2(skyes rabs): de nas tshangs dbang nor sbyin lnga// sogs pa'i lha rnams dag gis bskor// dpag tshad bcu gnyis phyin nas ni// rgyal po'i bu yi nags tshal slab// de nas rta la babs nas des// rgyan rnams ngag ni
148b3(skyes rabs): rnam par bkrol// bzhin gyi 'od kyis kun dga' ni// gsal bas 'dun pa la smras pa// khyod ni rta drang rgyan rnamaso dang // zung la khang pa dag tu seng // sgyu ma'i 'ching ba 'di dag gis// dA ni bdag la
148b4(skyes rabs): dgos pa med// nags 'dir bdag rang gcig pu nyid// zhi ba cho ga shes gnyen dang ldan// skye ba gcig bur yang dag skye// gcig pu nyid du rnam par lci zhing // mi bzung yul dang sbyor ba'i longs
148b5(skyes rabs): dag gis nang btang zhing // ro ldan dga' ba'i khyad par nyon mongs skems par rab zhugs pa// yongasu zil non srid pa 'di lan 'di nyid bdag gi gnas// 'dod pa'i mdzes pa zhi ba bodag ni zhi ba kho
148b6(skyes rabs): na bsten// zhes smras de yis 'bar ba yis// rgyan rnams de yi lag tu btang // mu tig mchi ma'i thigs tshogs kyis// de dag mya ngan gtong ba bzhin// ral gris gtsug pud bcad nas ni//
149a1(skyes rabs): nam mkha'i gzhi la de yis 'phangs// brgya byin gyis kyang de blangs nas// gus pas lnga yi gan su khyer// gang du bdag nyid chen po des// nyon mongs bzhin du skra bcad pa// der
149a2(skyes rabs): ma pa rnams dag gis// dbu skra blangs pa'i mchod rten brtsigs// 'dun po yas kyang rta blangs nas// rab tu song te nyin bdun gyis// grong khyer nye bar ngal bus phyin// mya ngan dag gis gziri bar bsams//
149a3(skyes rabs): mi bdag sras ni yongs su dor// rta ni stong pa nyid du khrid// sras kyi tshe da ldan pa yi// mi bdag lta bar ji ltar nus// de ltar bsams nas rta gtang ste// de yis gnas de nyid du bsdad// stan stong rta ni grong
149a4(skyes rabs): khyer du// mya ngan gzugs can bzhin du zhugs// de mthong pho brang skye bo ni// sa bdag blon por bcas pa dang // ma lus phyogs kyi so sor ni// cho nge'i ku tse mu cor byas// mgrin pa gdung ba'i sgra rab
149a5(skyes rabs): boskyed// mya ngan ldan pa kun gyis 'jus// chags bral ldan pa'i rta de ni// mchi ma nyil zhing srog btang gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i reg pa yis// bsod nams thob cing gtsang ba des// 'khor
149a6(skyes rabs): ba las ni grol ba'i slad// bram ze'i rigs skye ba blangs// gong du gzhon nus ngur smrig ni// brgya byin dag gis byin po blangs pa yi// der ni ngur smrig blangs pa yi// mchod rten skye bo chen pos byas// de ltar
149b1(skyes rabs): 'byor pa sred med 'jug slang skye ba skye ba rab grol slad// skye bos dben pa'ang skye bo rnams kyi rmongs pa'i 'khor lo bzlog pa'i slad// yon tan gyis ni skye bo chags mdzad chags pa dag dang bral gyur pa// dge
149b2(skyes rabs): ba 'dod cing 'dod pa btang nas nges par 'os pa nyid bstan to// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpog bsam gyi 'khri shing lngas mngon par 'byung ba'i rtogs
149b3(skyes rabs): pa brjod pa'i yal 'dub ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// mdzes pa'i mig gi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i bdud// gang gis bka' yi yul du bsgyur byas pa// srid pa'i mthu yis zil munan
149b4(skyes rabs): mngon par grol// skye bas 'jigs las rab grol de dag rgyal// de nas dka' thub nags tshal der// byang chub sems dpa'i dka' thub bsten// rdo rje yo nye gnas lnga/ ba ra Ni sir rab tu song/
149b5(skyes rabs): de nas thub dbang 'dod 'os pa'i// shAkya thub pa dal bus yis// sde 'dod dag gis grong du ni// rang nyid ljongs ni rgyu zhing gshegs// der ni khyim bdag bde zhes par// mngon par brjod pa'i
149b6(skyes rabs): bu mo ni// gzhon nu ma dag dga' ma dang // dga' stobs zhes pa byung bar gyur// de yis sa bdag zas gtsang gis// sras kyi grags pa bos gyur nas// khyim thab dag tu bsgrubs slad du// brtul
150a1(skyes rabs): zhugs lo ni bcu gnyis byas// phreng ba lta bu'i gzhon nu ma// dri bzang dga' ldan snying la ni// mngon par 'dod pa rang bzhin skyes// skud pa bzhin du rtag tu gnas// yang
150a2(skyes rabs): yang 'o ma 'thungs pa yi// pa rnams 'o ma de gnyis kyis// blangs nas shul gyi snod du ni// dge ba'i 'o thug bertul zhugs mthar// 'o thug cho ga bzhin grub tshe// bram ze'i gzugasu lha dbang dang /
150a3(skyes rabs): pad+ma'i stan ldan lha dag kyang // yul der yang ngag mngon par 'ongs// mdzes ma de dag dga' ba yis// mgron gyi che ni rab blangs che// bad+ma byin gyis smras yon tan kun// rgyas pa la ni thog mar phul/
150a4(skyes rabs): bdag las re zhig tshangasA bu 'di// lhag pas dang po nyid du 'os// lha'i rgyal pos de brjod tshe// gdong bzhi pa yis rab smras pa// gtsang mo ris kyi lha de dag/ bdag las kyang ni lhag pa yin//
150a5(skyes rabs): tshangs pas de skad smras pa'i tshe// de dag gis kyang mkhar gnas smras// nai rany+dza na zhes pa yis// klung du zhugs shing chur gnas pa// byang chub sems dpa' dka' thub kyis// ring 'di kun las khyad par
150a6(skyes rabs): 'phags// de dag thos nas gzhon nu mas// bos te rin chen snod du ni// phog nas blugs te gus pa yis// sbrang rtsi'i 'o thug de la phul// byang chub sems dpas de blangs nas// rin tshan snod ni de
150b1(skyes rabs): la btang// byin pa 'di ni slar mi blang // zhes brjod de dag gis ma blangs// 'od ldan de ni chu klung du// de 'phangs klu rnams ngag gis thob// rdo rje can gyis de dag las// mkha' lding gzugs kyi bskyod thob blangs/
150b2(skyes rabs): rab dang byang chub sems dpa' yis// de nas mdzes ma zung la smras// sbyin pa'i smon lam dag gis ni// khyed gnyis ci zhig mngon par 'dod// de la des smras zas gtsang sras// mkhas pa kun tu dga' ba'i gter/
150b3(skyes rabs): gzhon nu don kun grub pa de// bdag cag bdag por mngon par lnga dong // de dag tshig ni chags ldan zhing // 'dod pa'i dba' rlabs lhag pa des// de yi thugs la ma gos te// chu yi pad+ma'i 'dab la bzhin// blo hrI
150b4(skyes rabs): smras pa gzhon+da nu de// rab tu byung ba ma thos sam// de la bud med dpal mo bzhin// mi g.yo dga' ma med dam ci// zhes pa 'dod pa myin thos nas// shugs rings phyung ste gzhon nu mas// smras pa'i sbyin
150b5(skyes rabs): po'i chos 'di ni// de yi grub slad nyid gyur cig/ ma mthong byams bya yang dag sbyar// nang zhugs phyi rol phyogs tshe'ang // yun ring sa goms pas nges byar ni// phyogasu lhung ba mi zlogs// de dag tshig de thos
150b6(skyes rabs): nas blo// rab dang byang chub sems dpa' ni// nags kyi nang du 'ong la bso'i slad// de dag la ni gleng nos gshegs// 'o thug bdud rtsi'i cha dag gis// stobs ni mchog tu rgyas pa thob// bsil grib mchog ldan
151a1(skyes rabs): shing dag gis// rang dzes sa 'dzin dag la 'jigs// der ni skyil krung bcing ba mdzad// de yis bde bar bzhugs pa'i tshe// nga rgyal bzhin du rtse mo ni// rab tu mtho ba'i ri nge zhib
151a2(skyes rabs): sa 'dzin rnam par zhig pa der// thugs ni byung bzhin de yis bsams// kye ma dri med ma yin pa'i// las ni bdag gis ci zhig byas// de ltar brgya bsams dbugs ring ba// de la nam mkha' lha yis smras// dam pa
151a3(skyes rabs): khyod kyis mi 'os pa'i// las ni ci yang bsgribs pa meng// rgyan chang med par dge bsgrubs pa// sa yis 'dzin par bzod ma gyuraro// sems can dge bas rab bsgrubs pa// rab mtho ri bo brgya pas lci// chu ngon rany+dza
151a4(skyes rabs): na ni// yang dag sgrol la g.yo med yul// byang chub semadris la grub ster ba// rdo rje gdan zhes brjod par song // lha yis bstan pa'i lam nas de// rab gshegs lam gyis sra gzhi la// zhabs ni bkod
151a5(skyes rabs): bus gsar dag gi/ pad+ma brgyad pa byung bar gyur// de ni gshegs pa'i sa gzhi la// chu rnams rab tu rdol bas dkrigs// 'khar ba'i snod bzhin sgra ldan zhing // rab tu par ces nam zhes kyang // gang gis bla
151a6(skyes rabs): med ye shes gter// 'grusab par 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu can// mtshan ma de dang de dag ni// byung bar gyur pa de yis mthong // ne rany+dza na'i sa gzhi la// nag po zhes bya long ba'i klu// sangs rgyas byung bas mig
151b1(skyes rabs): thob cing // sa yi sgra thos nges par 'thon// mtshan nyid thams cad rab rdzogs shing // dzam+b+ha chu bo'i 'od zer 'bar// byang chub sems dpa' des mthong nas// thal mo sbyar byas rab smras pa// pad+ma'i spyan ldan
151b2(skyes rabs): mdzes pa khyod ni ling cho dar la nags tshul 'dir// phun tshogs rnams la 'bral ba'i gtso dung ba rab tu byin nas rnam par gnas// mtshungs med zhi ba'i khyad par rab tu 'byed cing tshig shes skye ba'i rgyu/
151b3(skyes rabs): khyod ni srid po'i mtshol lus can rnams kyis badren pa'i zam stegs 'gyur// ji ltar 'di na ri dgas 'di dag 'jigs pa'i g.yo ba nyid ni ba teng byas shing // ji ltar mkhar bgrod tshogs rnams rtse dge'i 'khru
151b4(skyes rabs): los nye ba nyid du rnam par gnas// gang yang sems can rnams kyi snying gi yid brtan mtshungs pa nyid kyi gnas gyur ba// de ltar 'di ni ngal du bo med par bang bu sbyin pa'i sangs rgyas sku yin snyam// lag ldan
151b5(skyes rabs): phrug gu pad+mo dag la lag pa dag la lag pa 'jog par byed// gtsug bud ldan pa'i mjug rtse'i rlung gis snyan pa'i sgra yang bde bar byed// mig zur g.yo ba'i r-i dwags mo rnams mdun du gus pas gyen du
151b6(skyes rabs): gus bas phyogs par gyur// bsod nams rab dang rang bzhin 'di ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i dus kyi lugs// di ring kho na dag pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob nas// 'jig rten gsum po ma lus khyod kyis rtogs
152a1(skyes rabs): par bgyid// bdud rtsi zer gyis 'phral la ku mud ldan pa ni// rUb dang rab tu dga' ba'i dkar ba rdzogs pa bzhin// nyin mo'i mgron bzhin gzi brjid rab 'bar khyod kyis snang bas
152a2(skyes rabs): 'phral la phan tshun du// rab rgyas pad+ma lta bus mchog gi snang ba la reg 'jig rten rnam dag gis// sbrang rtsi 'thung ba'i phreng bzhin gdung zhing skrag par des bcing snying la phyir byung ba// gti mug mun pa'i phreng
152a3(skyes rabs): ba slar yang nang du gnas ni byed par mi 'gyur ro// dul bsi de skad smra ba yi// klu yis rgyal la rab dang blo// byang chub sems dpas phebs par smras// chu bo yang dag brgal nas gshe DA// rdo rje gdan gnas
152a4(skyes rabs): byang chub kyis// rtsa bar des phyir ma 'khrugs par// brgya byin gyis byin ku sha rnams// rtse mo g.yas bsten mal stan byas// der ni skyil krung bcas mdzad nas// g.yo ba med par nges pas bzhugs//
152a5(skyes rabs): bdud rtsi'i chu gter bsrubs po yis// 'jug tu ngal ba so bzhin du mdzes// brtan zhing drang po'i dbyibs ldan de// thun mong min par bzod pa'i rten// mi g.yo gser gyi 'od ldan pa// lhun po gzhan pa
152a6(skyes rabs): bzhin du mdzes// zag pa zad pa'i mthar thug pa// skyil krung 'di la bdag gnaso// zhes pa'i brtag pa byas nas des// dran pa'i sgro ni rab tu bcings// de nas skabs der bdud dag ni// zhi la brag dog
152b1(skyes rabs): spring sA yig thogs// myur ba nyid du mngon par 'ongs// byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa// 'jig rten gnyen la g.yon nyid dang // 'dod min 'dod pa 'di ni ci// dus min me tog sa na sa na#
152b2(skyes rabs): khyod kyi grong khyer rab tu blangs// btsun mo'i tshogs kyis phreng ba dkag/ mi yi bdag po zas gtsang bcing // zhes pa'i tshig 'di thos nyid na// mya ngakhro ba'i dug spangs pa// de yi rnam 'gyur ma bslab/
152b3(skyes rabs): bo'i// sems kyi rnam par bsam par gyur// kye ma budag la bdud drug ni// bAr chad bya bar rab tu brtson// ngo tsha med 'di gtsug pud ldan// tso bzhin 'gro la gar stabs bsgyur// mtha' ni 'chi bar
152b4(skyes rabs): mi nus bdud// khyod kyis gnod par nus mi yin// 'tshe ba'i mchog sbyin gcig gis ni// 'dod pa nyid 'di khyod kyis thob// mchod sbyin sbyin pa dka' thub bsngags// bdag / nyid la ni byed mi spro/
152b5(skyes rabs): rang gi yon tan bsgrogs pa yis// bsod nams me tog rnyings shing 'brul// de yis de skad sun phyung bas// lus can+da sems ni 'phrog po'i bdud// khro ba dang bcas rab song ste// rmad byung sbyor ba yang
152b6(skyes rabs): dag brtsams// de nas tsu ta'i 'khri shing bzhin// yid 'ong rab tu mdzes pa'i mig/ g.yo ba'i bung ba g.yo ldan ma// yang 'ong mdzes ma mthong bar 'gyur// spyod tshul mdzes pas ngoms gyur pa// 'dod
153a1(skyes rabs): pa'i bu mo gsum po de'i// rkang pa pad+mo can bkod nas// dka' thub nags ni chags ldan byas// dur ni mig gis ri dwags mo/ 'gying ba'i grogs kyis glang mo dang // de
153a2(skyes rabs): ngag bzhin gyi chu skyes kyis// pad+ma can ni dman par byas// de yi lus ni lang tsho yis// brgyan cing rje su chags pas byugs// mdzes sdug gos dang ldan pa yis// sems med rnams kyang chags par gyur//
153a3(skyes rabs): rdo rje'i gdan la bsam gtan la// mnyam bzhag gauyo mad spyan ldan pa// de mthong nas ni de dag rnams// ya mtshan bsam gtan 'dzin par gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rtag pa las// rgyu gas
153a4(skyes rabs): dang chags pa'i rang bzhin gyi// na tshod 'phrul nyid yongs btang des// dam pa'i ngo che'i dga' ba bstan// de nas de dag phyir log ste// stong bas yul l-i ru bA chags/ yid srubs grags pa rtsom pa
153a5(skyes rabs): yis// dmag gi tshogs pa bsdus par gyur// tha dad bzhin ldan srog chags dang // mtshon cha kun gyi 'jigs pas khyab// bye ba phrag ni sum cu drug/ de yis dpung chen yang dag rdzogs// rang nyid
153a6(skyes rabs): khro zhing drag po yis// rna ba'i bar du mda' sbyin drangs// bdud kyi rnam 'gyur drag po yis// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu gtseso// de yis rab 'phangs rdul dang ni// dug dang rje ldan mtshon gyi char/
153b1(skyes rabs): man+da ra dang pad+mo yo// tshogs su byang chub sems la gyur// slar yang bdud dpung gis 'phangs pa// mtshon gyi chur ni 'dzin bzod pa// de la rdo rje ra ba'i gnas// lha rnams dag gis rab tu byas// brtag
153b2(skyes rabs): be nyams pa'i dran pas kyang // ting nge 'dzin gyi rna ba'i tsher// shel gyi ljon pa 'dab ma ni// dril bu gsal ba'i sgra ldan sprul// mu cor sgrogs pa'i shing de dang // bdud dpung mtshon dang bcas pa dag
153b3(skyes rabs): nam mkha'i lha yis blangs nas ni// lcags ri'i phyi rol rab tu 'phangs// de nas bcom ldan ye shes ni// dri med rab dang yang dri ga thob// kun rigs kun rtogs skye ba ni// thams cad dran pa mchog tu gyur//

153b6(skyes rabs): la rab tu 'gyel bar gyur// mi bdag btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas// srog ni btang bar byas pa'i tshe// legs spyod phyogs su lhung ba yis// na mkha'i lha yis dor smras pa// bdud rtsi gsol nas
154a1(skyes rabs): khyod kyi sras// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas nyid gyur// de yis gzigs pa rnams yang // 'chi mas byas pa'i 'jigs pa med// mi bdag blon po btsun mo dang // bcas
154a2(skyes rabs): bas tshig de thos gyur nas// bdud rtsis bran zhing skad cig le// srog ni slar yang byung bar gyur// kun dga'i dga' ston chen po der// zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin tshwa// byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mo ni//
154a3(skyes rabs): grags 'dzin ma la sras mdzes btsas// sgra gcan zhes pa'i byis pa de'ang // mi bdag des bskyed dogs pa'i tshe// ma yis dag slad rdo dang bcas// 'phangs tshe tshul 'phyo bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das
154a4(skyes rabs): kyang nyin zhag bdun// sku ni g.yo ba med par gnas// rdo rje skyil krung bcings pa yis// lha rnams ya mtshan ldan par byas// tshangs pa'i rigs zhes bya ba yis// lho gnyis kyis ni bskul ba na// mchog
154a5(skyes rabs): tu kun dga' bdud rtsi yis// tshogs ltar mdzes pas bka' stsal pa// lha dang lha min dbang phyug bde// gang gis sdug bsngal du brtsi ba// bde bar gnas pa 'di ni sngon// kye ma bde ga gis shes ma

154b1(skyes rabs): yul gyi nyon mongs 'khor ba'i lam 'gro na kun tu gdungs gyur cing // nyon mongs can bdag zhi bas dga' bar nye gyur tsan grib ma sa bzhin// dbang po mtha' dag tshim pa'i bde ba 'di yis bdag ni dga' ba
154b2(skyes rabs): skyes// zhi ba gangs ldan nagasu ngal bsos rnams kyi bde ba'i dpe ni ci// gnas skabs der ni bsod nams dge/ yongs su smin pas nags tshal der// tshong pa ga gon bzang po dag/ don mthun
154b3(skyes rabs): tshon pos 'ongs par gyur// lho yis bskul ba de dag gis// gus pas bcom ldan la phyogs te// phyag 'tshal nas ni bsod snyoms 'di// blang bar mdzod ces rab tu smras// brtse ba'i dbang gyur

154b6(skyes rabs): dag rjesu bzung bar mdzad// legs byas rnam par rgyas pa'i dbang po bsod nams gter la mkhas// rgud pa ma lus byed don du gnyer ba'i dpag bsam shing // dge ba yongs gyur bslab pa'i

155b2(skyes rabs): snying stobs stobs lhag pa// ro la chags pas rab rmongs pas// mdzub mo ro ni myangs byas nas// kha zas skyon gyis lci ba dang // rtsub cing kha dog ngan par gyur// de dag rnams kyi sa las ni//

156a1(skyes rabs): yul la// chags dang bral bas thub pa che// ser skya zhes pa'i gnasu spong // byis pa sgra chen sgrogs pa yis// bsam gtan dus kyi dgegs byed pa// de dgra grong khyer gzhan du ni//
