156a5(skyes rabs): bdag po byung gyur te// gang zhig sdeng gi bzhin du ni// rgyal po glang pos g.yul mi bzod// de sras thu bo zas gtsang ste// gzhan ni zas dkar dwe yaM ni// rje su skyes pa bre bo zas// bdud rtsi zas ni
156a6(skyes rabs): gzhon nu'o// bu mo bzhi ste gtsang zhes dang // dkar bre bdud rtsi de bzhin no// zas gtsang sras ni bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gzhan ni dga' bo'o// de nas zos dkar sras gnyis ni// skar rgyal
156b1(skyes rabs): zhes dang bzang ldan no// bre bo zas kyi sras gnyis ni// ma 'gags de bzhin chen po'o// kun dga' bo dang lhas byin zhes// bya ba bdud rtsi zas las 'khrungs// legs par rab rtags gtsang ma'i bu//
156b2(skyes rabs): dkar mo'i bu ni phreng ba can// bzang mo bre bo ma yi bu// yangs pa can yang bdud rtsi'i bu// gang la rigs ni rab gnas po// sgra gcan 'dzin ni bcom ldan sras// zhes pa rab gsal ye shes
156b3(skyes rabs): rang bzhin zhes// rigs ni ji lta bzhin bshad thos gyur nas// mchog gyur khyad par dag pa shAkya rnams// bcom ldan mthu yis rab+hA 'khrungs par gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i
156b4(skyes rabs): byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las shAkya byung po'i rtogs pa dwa rjod pa'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// / gos dag glu rtsi'i dri ngas
156b5(skyes rabs): ldan pa bzhin// skyes bu snying stobs dben pa'i gnyen ldan pa// bsod nams nye bar rdzogs pa'i mthu chen gang // ci yang de ni lus brgyar med mi 'gyur// grong khyer rgyal po'i khab kyi ni// 'od ma'i
156b6(skyes rabs): tshal gyi nags nang na// sreg chags 'gro kun yongs gdung la// rgyal ba thugs rje'i mtsho bzhugs tshe// gang gi nor gyis nor sbyin no// nor gyi dregs pas long ba 'phrog/ dang ldan gru 'dzin zhes bya
157a1(skyes rabs): ba// sa bdag tsam bur byung bar gyur// de yi bu ni btsas par gyur// yid la re ba brgya ldan pa'o// nor rnams 'dod pas thob pa yis// rnam par 'byor pa bde ba'i grogs//
157a2(skyes rabs): gro bzhin dag la skyes gyur cing // bu de skyes pa'i tshe na des// dga' ba bye ba nyi shu ni// dbul po la byin gang gi tshe// gro bzhin bye ba nyi shu zhes// de tshe byis pa de grogs gyur// gang gis rigs ni
157a3(skyes rabs): rnam brgyan pa// logs byas kyis ni 'byor pa bzhin// nor rnams 'dred pa sgra kun dang lhan cig tu// rig pa thob cing 'phel bar gyur// pha yaM lugs rnams bzung ba yis// bde ba nyid du ngal bsngo byas
157a4(skyes rabs): nam zhig nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las// 'od zer tshegs bzhin mdun du ni// modz+wAl gyi buM babs nas// 'ongs pa la ni de yis smras// phyogs mtshams rab tu gsal byed pa// nyi ma 'dra ba khyod ni su/
157a5(skyes rabs): skabs gsum dbang du ma ri bong can// lha 'am nor gyi dbang po 'am// de las des smras bdag ni lha// ma yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'odas// yon tan dpal ldan lho dbang gis// phyag byas dag gi
157a6(skyes rabs): slob ma yin// thub chen de la khyod kyi ni// dri med bsod snyoms rab tu stsol// snying stobs dag cing rgyas pa las// thob pa'i longs spyod bcom ldan mnyes// zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan// gro
157b1(skyes rabs): bzhin rna bar song ba yis// nyi ma la gus rigs yin kyang // spu long rab tu rgyas par gyur// sngon skye'i bag chags kyis sbyar ba'i// rang bzhin gang la gang gnas pa// de la de ni brjod pas kyang //
157b2(skyes rabs): gsal ba nyid du rtogs par gyur// de yis de la chos pa'i snod// mtho ris skye bo la 'os pa// TI shu gus pas chags pa dang // dang ldan sems kyis rab tu bskur// de nas gus bAs phun tshogs
157b3(skyes rabs): des/ springs pa de dag mtha' dag ni// lhag par rjes su 'dzin brtson pa'i// bcom ldan rang gis bzhes par gyur// gnas skabs der ni gus pa yis// rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di// mi
157b4(skyes rabs): bdag la 'os tshos pa'i snod // rang gis gzung nas byung bar gyur// gro bzhin gyis springs longs spyod kyis// dri bzang de ni sa bdag gis// tshor nas brgya byin gyis spangs pa// thams cad mchog ldan yin
157b5(skyes rabs): par bsams// lhung bzeng lhag ma bcom ldan gyis// byin nas sa yi bdag pos myangs// zas de gro bzhin gyis springs par// thos nas ya mtshan 'dzin par gyur// de nas mi dbang bcom ldan la/
157b6(skyes rabs): phyag 'tshal rgyal po'i pho brang du// rab tu song ste gro bzhin gyis// phun tshogs mchog tu rgyas par bsame// rang nyid der ni lha ru 'gro// grags chen 'di ni blta bar 'os// blon bcas de ltar nges byas
158a1(skyes rabs): nus// de yis bskyod pa bcom bya skrun// sA byu ga nga 'o 'dzin// brtson pa khrugs shes glu 'ad+d+hAn b+his// shes nas dben pa dag tu du// gro bzhin la sku
158a2(skyes rabs): ba// mi bdag rigs kyis brten sra'i bla// ze khyod lta ru 'ong zhes pa// 'di ni mchog dang khyad par du// skyon dang bcas par bdag gis rtogs// sa dbang mtshon bya nyid gyur nas// gshog pa sbyor
158a3(skyes rabs): bar brtson pa yang // thogs pa med par 'joms 'gyur te// rgyud las 'phos pa'i mnga'o bzhin no// shin tu khengs pa g.yog rnams kyi'ang // dgra yi 'o su gyur yin na// mngon par khengs pa
158a4(skyes rabs): gcig pu yi// sa yi bdag po slar yang ci// gzugs dang na tshod skal bzang dang // mthu dang 'byor pa thob pa la// 'gran las rang gi bu dag kyang // khyad 'phags skye bos mi bzod do// sdang ba'i
158a5(skyes rabs): rang bzhin skye bo la// 'gran las rang gis bu dag kyang // khyud 'phags skye bos mi bzod do// yon tan bsgribs pas 'tsho bye ru/ yon tan bsgribs pa'i pad+ma ni// tsha zer can gyi yid du 'ong //
158a6(skyes rabs): 'phyar ba suM yi sdang bya min// rab tu su yi stong bya sdug mon// ljon pa rengs pa rlung gis bsgyel// rab tu dud pa srung bar byed// mngon par 'gro 'os so sbyong de// gal te khyod can ring ting
158b1(skyes rabs): 'ongs// de la khyod grags rmongs pa 'di// dge legs skad du mi 'gyuraro// de skad 'di nas rang song ste// rgyu skar phung po dang mtshungs pa'i// do shAl skyes bu byin nas ni// phyag 'os gco la phyugs
158b2(skyes rabs): tshal byos// nos bye ba yi tshig thos nas// gro bAzhin d+ha de na chen gyis// rnam par brgyan pa g+hu na hUM/ sa yi bdag po wA dro song // rgyal po ze pa tha~Mng sing+ge nos des// phyung tshong mthong nas rgya
158b3(skyes rabs): lnga// phyog 'tshal ngo shal de la phul// dpal ni dga' nas dgod pa bzhin// mi bdag mdze' ba'i spyan gyis ni// rkang pa gser gyi baspus mtshan// rang nyid 'ongs pa de mthong nas// ya mtshan las
158b4(skyes rabs): ni 'di skad smras// kye ma bsod nams mthu chen ldan// gang dang phrad pa tsam nyid na// sems kyi spyod tshul rab drang ba// sems can gnyen khyod ci zhig go/ yon tan las ni dbang phyug mchog/ nang
158b5(skyes rabs): med las ni legs pa'i grogs// dge ba khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das// 'od ma'i tshal nas cad mthong ngam// de yi zhabs dang zung dag la// blta bar 'os pa bdag 'dod do// skye bo legs las
158b6(skyes rabs): phyogs lhung ba// sa yi mgon pos 'di brjod tshe// gro bzhin bye ba nyi shus kyang // gus pa de la slar smras pa// lha cig khyod kyi bka' drin ni// mtshungs med dga' ba 'di nyid las// da lta bdag
159a1(skyes rabs): gis bcom ldan ni// blta bur rigs pa nyid du gyur// ces brjod de dang lhan cig tu// lugs la mkhas pa sa yi bdag/ gus pas de bzhin gshegs pa ni// wA ru rkang pa nyid
159a2(skyes rabs): kyis song // gro bzhin skyes pa'i nyin par nA sa// sa la mu reg rkang pa yis// 'gro tshe g.yog pos chen po lnga// 'os pa'i gos kyis sa gzhi gla yogs// bcom ldan la gus dul bu dang // sra bdag la yang rje
159a3(skyes rabs): sa las// ngo tsha bzhin du g.yog rnams kyis// sa la gos ni 'gebs pa bzlog/ de nas gos ni bzlog pa'i tshe// lha yi gos kyis su gzhi g.yogs// bsod nems ldan pa'i nyer mkho rnams// 'bad
159a4(skyes rabs): med par phun sum tshogs// lha yi gos rnams bzlog nas ni// de yis sa la rkang bzhag che// ri dregs rgya mtsho dang bcas pa// g.yo med sa gzhi rnam par g.yos// de nas sa bdag dang 'grogs te// rgyal
159a5(skyes rabs): ba'i gan su phyin+di nas des// bcom ldan 'das la rab bltas shing // de yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal byas// dga' dang zhi zhing dben ldan pa// mdun na gnas pa de la ni// bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs
159a6(skyes rabs): ba yi// bdud rtsis mngon par dbang bskur mdzad// khams dang bsams pa bag la nyal// rang bzhin dag kyang spyad nas nges// bden pa yang dag rtogs bya'i slad// de la chos ni bstan par mdzad// de yi
159b1(skyes rabs): 'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri// rtse mo nyi shu ldan pa ni// ye shes rdo rje de yis bcom// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i gnas la reg/ de nas de yi lus la ni// rang byung skyes tshe mi yi bdag/ yA mtshan gyur pas
159b2(skyes rabs): bcom ldan la// phyag 'tshal 'phral la rang nyid song // gro bzhin brtul zhugs drag ldan yang // bag chags lhag ma'i 'du byed las// nAm zhig gnyen dang longs spyod kyi// bde ba dran pa
159b3(skyes rabs): skyes par gyur// bau tsam ldan 'dzum dang bcas pa des// skyengs pa de bos bka' stsal pa// sems ni kun tu yongs rto zhugs pa// khyod kyi yongs su rtog 'di ni// dral ba 'am shin tu drangs pa
159b4(skyes rabs): yis// rgyud mangs dbyangs dang bral ba yin// mnyam pa las ni sgra snyan 'gyur// de slang mnyam pa bsten par bya// zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas// phyi nas gdung ba rnam par spangs// thams
159b5(skyes rabs): cang zhi ba nye bar gyur// de yi dri med ye shes thob// de yi rmad byung grub pa de// mthong nas ya mtshan che ba yi// dge slong kun gyis bcom ldan la// dris shing des kyang bka' stsal pa// gro bzhin
159b6(skyes rabs): gyis ni dge ba'i las// skye ba gzhan la bsgrubs pa nyon// gang phyi re bsod nams min pa yi// mthu ldan rmad byung phun tshogs min// sngon tshe yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// bcom ldan bde ga
160a1(skyes rabs): rnam par gzigs// gnyen ldan zhes pa'i grong khyer du// ljongs ni rgyu ni zhing gshegs par gyur// der ni legs byas gus pa yis// zan la nye byar mgron du gnyer//
160a2(skyes rabs): nyin re res kyis de dag gis// khyim du rjes 'brang bcas pa gshegs// de nas dbang po'i zla zhes pa// bram ze'i bu ni dbul po yi// res l-i bab tshe 'bad pa yis// de la 'os pa'i bza' pa sbyar//
160a3(skyes rabs): de yi 'bad pa chen po yis// gus pas gtsang mar sbyar ba'i zas// gos kyis nor 'dzin g.yogs byas nas// rab tu btud de de la phul// longs spyod de yi smon lam gyis// gro bzhin bye ba lha lta
160a4(skyes rabs): bu// gser gyi bu yi rkang pa can// nor 'dzin 'dir nau de gyur to// gos dang bral ba'i sa gzhi la// 'di yis nam yang reg pa med// 'di nyid phyir na de yi ni// rkang pas reg las g.yosau gyur//
160a5(skyes rabs): ces pa bde gshegs gsung ni bdud rtsi lhur dkar ba// tshems kyi 'od bzhin rab tu gsal ba'i rang bzhin dag/ dge slong tshogs kyi thugs ni rnam par mi g.yeng bas// mchog tu 'thungs nas dge
160a6(skyes rabs): ba bstan pa'i slad du gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las gro bzhin bye ba nyi shu pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab
160b1(skyes rabs): ste ny+dzi shu brgyud pa'o// // mi srun skye bo ngan pa'i gnod pa bzod dka' chen po yis// bsam pa che rnams byasam pa rnam par 'byung ba nyid ma yin// sbrul gyis rang bskor sna
160b2(skyes rabs): 'dzin dag gis dkrugs par gyur mod kyang // rgya mtsho snying las bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin rab tu gtong ba min/ sngon tshe glong khyer rgyal po'i khab// ka lan da ka'i gnas zhes pa/ 'od ma'i tshal ni yid
160b3(skyes rabs): 'phrog na// bcom ldan 'das ni rnam par bzhugs// der ni rgyal po dgra mang rnams// rnam par skrag byed ral gri'i gnyen// gzugs can snying po zhes bya'i bu// ma skyes dgra zhes bya bar gyur/
160b4(skyes rabs): lhas byin zhes pa/ shAkya'i rigs// de yi snying po grogs por gyur// gang gi ngan pa'i sngags kyis de// ro langs bzhin du drag por gyur// de yis na mau zhig sa yi bdog/ mdun sor bde bar
160b5(skyes rabs): 'khor lnga smra sa// rgyal po bdag gis khyed bsten pa'i// 'bras 'di da dung grub pa med// bde bar yid gcugs grogs ngag ni// phan tshun ying la re ba skong // rdzun gyi rim gre bral ba la//
160b6(skyes rabs): grogs kyi sgra ni rab tu 'jug/ gang 'di 'od ma'i nags tshal na// shAkya'i dge sbyong bder gnas pa// de bsang lha yis phyag byas pa// de yi gnas ni thob par 'dod// gang gis dgra bo mi cho
161a1(skyes rabs): dang // gang gis dgra po choms pa dang // gang gis glags pa mi 'tho ba dang // gang gis khengs pa mi 'phel ba// grogs kyi phun tshogs de yis kya ma sa kyis// ma
161a2(skyes rabs): du sas ga rgya/ la po'i lam du rab zhugs bya// de la glang chen nor skyong ni// khro bas long zhing gtum pa de// myangon du rab tu gtang bar byos// lhas byin gyis ni de smras tshe// mi bdag
161a3(skyes rabs): grogs la mnyes gshin pas// sangs rgyas mthu ni bsams byas nas// gdong smad ci yang mi smrar gyur// rgyal po'i grogs kyis ngan rgyugs pa'i// lhas byin dag kyang phyir byung nas// glang po'i
161a4(skyes rabs): blon po chen po la// dro shal rngan par byin nas smras// dge slong dge sbyong brgyas bskor nas// nang pa grong khyer 'ong bar 'gyur// de la khyo da kyis glang po che// btang bar byos shes sa bdag gsung //
161a5(skyes rabs): lhas byin tshig thos gnyis 'thung gi/ bdag pos de bzhin zhes po smras// gang phyir lug dang rmongs pa'i phreng // gcig song rje su ltung ba nyid// thams cad mkhyen pas sdig can gyi// sems
161a6(skyes rabs): kyi bsam pa mkhyen mod kyang // dge slong lnga brgya dag dang ni// thabs cig yang dag byon par gyur// de nas glang chen bdag po yis// gnad du bsnun bkye glang po che// drag po khang bzang rkang
161b1(skyes rabs): 'thung 'joms// khro bas long bas de mdun brgyugus// yongs su 'dril las lcags kyu ni// lci ba yi yang dbang mi 'gyur// mi srun rig byed ldan pa bzhin// sdang dang rgyags pas dri mar
161b2(skyes rabs): byas// ldan gcig min par rna bskyod pa// bI sten pa'i gdung ba la chags pa// bung ba rnams kyis srog 'joms byed// bdag po ngani bas g.yog gi bzhin// khang pa'i nyer ches shing rnams ni//
161b3(skyes rabs): 'joms pa de yis mngon par brgyugs// 'jig rten 'phral la bros pa'i tshe// hA hA zhes pa chen po byung // de yi rna ba rab bskyed stabs kyis blangs pa'i rlung gis rab zags li khri'i rgyun gyi tshogs/
161b4(skyes rabs): bud med 'jigs pa'i gos dmar lhung ba lta bur spyod pas rgyal po'i lam ni khengs gyur cing // rab gtum dbyug pa bslang 'dri'i sna ni g.yab mo'i tshogs 'gyed phyogs kyi bud med 'dzi gas pa yis/
161b5(skyes rabs): gdungs par gyur pa'i lan bu'i 'od ltar bung po'i tshogs ga tI bas rnam par 'phrul pas kun rmongs gyur// grong khyer bcom pos rab gdungs te// skye bo ku rus 'khrugs pa'i tshe// rab myos bla
161b6(skyes rabs): ldan lhas byin no// ba gam che ldan steng du 'dzegs// de ni bcom ldan 'dzin pa la// mchog tu lta ba 'dod par gyuraro// yon tan can rnams rab bcom pas// gtum po dag ni yongs su tshim//
162a1(skyes rabs): der ni glang pos rab skrag nas// dge slong thams cad bros pa'i tshe// dge slong kun dga' gcig pu nyid/ bac+doMs kyi nye 'khor gyur// bac+doMs kyi phyag las der// gdong lnga ldan pa lnga 'thon
162a2(skyes rabs): te// 'jig su rung ba'i ral pa can// de yi sen mo 'od tshogs bzhin// dreg pa'i rjeng byed bzlog byed pa// de yi dri tshogs gnyis 'thung ni// chu dang lci ba zag byed cing // 'phral la nyid du phyir
162a3(skyes rabs): phyogs gyur// so ldan dregs pas dbul ba nyid// mthong zhing mgyogs par bros pas der// phyogs bcu rnams ni sreg byed kyis// rab tu 'bar bar mthong bar gyur// de yis 'gro ba mau 'bar
162a4(skyes rabs): zhing // 'bar ba'i dri bsri dkrigs mthong nas// ston pa'i zhabs kyi pad+ma'i drung // bsil ba dag tu nye bar song // sred pa mngon zhum yid ni bsam ldan bzhin gyi ma dzes pa rab tu nyams gyur
162a5(skyes rabs): cing // nyon mongs do ba'i dbugs rgod de yi lag pa chags pas long ba drig gi ni// mang du mdzad pa rtsom bzhin bkren pa nyer gnas sbyin pas dman pa'i sbrang rtsi 'thung // ca co sgrogs par rtsom zhing
162a6(skyes rabs): yongs gdung dman par song ste/ khung ltar spyod par gyur// ston pa thugs rje'i rgya mtsho yis// zhabs kyi drung du 'ongs gyur cing // 'jigs pa de la 'khor lo dang // bkra shis kyis mitshan phyag gis
162b1(skyes rabs): reg bum pa phyag bkod d+he l+ya ni// bcom ldan rgyal bas bka' stsal pa// gnas skabs dman pa 'di ni bu// rang las nyid kyis thob pa yin// khyod lus sha yi ri bo 'di// dben pa'i snang ba dag
162b2(skyes rabs): gis sprin// rmongs pa'i tshogs kyis khur gyur pa// sdig pa mchog tu bskrun pa yin// bcom ldan snying rjes brlan pas 'di// brjod tshe 'jigs pa'i glang po de// ying brtan thob nis gdags
162b3(skyes rabs): thag gis// btags bzhin g.yo med nyid du gyur// lces byin gyi ni brtag pa dang // glang po drag po chen pa yang // nyams tshe bgegs med dga' ba yi// skye bo ya mtshan skyes par gyur//
162b4(skyes rabs): de nas khyim bdag khyim du ni// zas ni rab tu blang mdzad nas// dge slong dgra dang stabs gcig tu// bcom ldan nags su gshegs brtson gyur// glang po dpyong yang mngon btud de// rgyal
162b5(skyes rabs): ba'i zhabs kyi pad+ma l-i// lag pas reg par byas nas ni// glang po sA lus ni btang bar gyur// rgyul chen bzhi pa'i lha dag tu// nye bar 'khrungs shing mdzes pa ni// dri ma med de 'phral nyid la//
162b6(skyes rabs): bde bar gshegs pa lta ru 'ongs// rang gi bosti gnas phyin gyur pa'i// bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs te// nor bu'i rna cha rab 'bar ba/ nyi ma 'dra ba des phyag 'tshal// de yi dpung rgyan
163a1(skyes rabs): cod pan gyis// 'od kyi yal 'dab rgyas gyur pa// sprin gyi phreng ba brgya byin gyi// gzhu yis khyab pa bzhin du mdzes// sdig pa bral des ston pa yis// mdun du dul bas 'khod
163a2(skyes rabs): nas ni// lha yi me tog snying stobs bzhin// dkar bas btor nas de smras pa// yongs su sim po'i gnas gyur pa// bcom ldan khyed kyi zhabs ngag gis// pad+mo la ni reg pas bdag/ skabs ngan sdug bsngal
163a3(skyes rabs): gdung bzhi// kye ma bcom ldan gzigs pa gdung ba'i dug skyon tsha ba zhi bar byed// ci yang bdud rtsi'i char pa zhi zhing bsngags 'os 'jam zhing yid du 'ong // gang gis gsal bar reg pas mchog tu rtsub pa'i
163a4(skyes rabs): rnam 'gyur gnod pa dag/ rnam par btang nas rmongs pa'i phyugs kyang nang du rab tu zhi ba bsten// de skad brjod par byed pa de'i// srid pa zhi slad bcom ldan gyis// yang dag bden pa mthong byed pa// drag pa'i
163a5(skyes rabs): tshes ni bstan pa mdzad// dbu rgyan mu tig 'od dkar ba'i// mgo yis ston pa'i zhabs dag la// phyag 'tshal srid pa'i 'khrul pa la// dgod pa bzhin du rnye bas so// bzhin ras zla bas nam mkha'i bzhin//
163a6(skyes rabs): rab gsal byas nas de song tshe// dge slong gis dris bcom ldan gyis// de yis byung ba'i mtha' bka' stsal// sngon dus gzhan la ston pa ni// 'od srungs zhes pa'i bstan pa la// rab tu byung bar gyur kyang
163b1(skyes rabs): 'di// bslab pa'i gnas la gus ma gyur// ma gus pa las glang po yi// longs spyod nyid dang dge 'dun ni// bsten las bden pa'i lha stobs kyis// 'jug tu brtan pa 'dzin pa thob/
163b2(skyes rabs): skye ba snga mar bsgrubs pa'i las// su zhi ga gi yang mi bzlogs te// gus par spyad byas sems ldan la// las kyis nye bar bstan nas 'brel// 'jigs rung gnod pa de la ni// dge slong
163b3(skyes rabs): kun gyis bdag btang lnga// de yang kun dga' bos ma yin// sngon tshe 'grogs pa mAnyan par gyis// ri bong mtshan ma ltar bsil mtshor// gang ba gang ba'i bzhin zhes pa'i// ngang pa'i
163b4(skyes rabs): rgyal po spyan dgra ni// yid du 'ong bar sngon gyur to// nam zhig pa ra NA si na// sa yi bdag byo tshangs sbyin gyi// tshangs pa ldan pa'i rdzing bu ni// dga' bar gang ba'i bzhin gyis phyin// g.yo
163b5(skyes rabs): ba'i pad+ma sa bkrigs yi// sre 'brus yod su sa ra bA de// ngang pa dag ni lnga brgya dang // mtsho skyes can derA rnam par rol// sngon gyi bsod nams mthu yAs ni// khyad 'phags gzugs
163b6(skyes rabs): rab 'bar ba de// bya ba dor ba skye bo yi// g.yo med mig gis mthong bar gyur// de ni der gnas sa bdag gis// thos nas de dag blta 'dod pas// rgya yis 'tsho ba mkhas pa dag/ de bzung
164a1(skyes rabs): slad du btang bar gyur// pad+ma can gyi rol ba'i 'dzum// dkar ba'i 'od zer de bzung tshe// drang pa lnga brgya dgra gis ni// de btang mgyogs pUr rab tu song // gcig ni
164a2(skyes rabs): de la gzhungs bzang bas// bcings pa med kyang bcings pa bzhin// mdza' ba'i zhabs pas dbang byas nas// de yi don du gdung zhing gan+da// de nas rgyal blo ngang pa yi// rgyalo de yis bzung ba dang // gnyis
164a3(skyes rabs): ba mdza' bas bcings pa yang // mthong nas ya mtshan de dag btang // dang ba gang ba'i bzhin de dog/ de yi rjes 'brang kun dga' bo// des ni dpa' yang bdag gtang nas// song ba'i dge slong
164a4(skyes rabs): ngang pa nyid// gang gis grags pa pha rol gyis// yid kyi glegs bu lA bris pa// ba ra tA sir sngon dus na// sa bedag a Ta zhes pa byung // stong dang g.yul 'gyed lho phyogs pa// g.yul gyi
164a5(skyes rabs): dus su sngon 'gro zhing // lag pa'i mtshon zhes grags pa ni// de yI bslu med grogs por gyur// nam zhig 'jigs rung g.yul zhu gas tshe// blon po lnga brgya drug gaus ni// mi bdag dau btang
164a6(skyes rabs): 'jigs nas song // lag pa'i mtshon gyis btang bar ma gyur// sa skyong de ni nga nyid de// blon po de dag dge slong rnams// lag pa'i mtshon de kun dga' bo// 'di nyid nga ni btang ma gyur// sngon gyi
164b1(skyes rabs): skye ba gzhan la yang // bdag ni seng ge khron par lhung // wA skyes g.yog gis skad cig las// spangs pa gang deng dge slong rnams// wa skyes gcig gi sder mo yis// ring du bskos nas
164b2(skyes rabs): rdodag thar byas// de nyid kun dga' blo 'di ste// dri lta bdag gi rjes 'brang gyur// sngon tshe ri dwagras khyu yi bdag/ rgyu yi zhugs pas bcings par gyur// de yi rjes 'brang ri dwags rnams/
164b3(skyes rabs): sred ldan 'o bas sbrug nas bros// mig chu ldan pa'i ri dwags mo// rjes rgyu gas pas ma btang ste/ mdza' ba'i lcogs sgrog gis bcings pas// g.yo ba med par gyur pa bzhin// de nas
164b4(skyes rabs): sring ldan 'ongs gyur cing // ri dwags gsod ber brtson mthong nas// de yis smras pa thog mar ni// mda' yis bdag gis 'tsho ba phrogs// shes pa de yi gsal ba yi// tshig dang mdza'
164b5(skyes rabs): bas mtshar skyes pa// rngon pa de ni byams pa yis// ri dwags ri dwags mor bcas btang // ri dwags khyu yI bdag de ba/ ri dwags mo de kun dag bo// de ltar mdza' ba'i 'brel pa 'di// sngon gyi spyod pas rjes su
164b6(skyes rabs): zhugs// ro zhes pa bde gshegs gsung thos dge slong ni// de dag thams cad ngo tshas zhum pa bzhin// 'dod pas brlan pas kun dga' dang bcas par// ris kyis kun dga'i kun dgani
165a1(skyes rabs): bzhin bad bltas// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam+b+ha g+hi 'khri shing las norar+ya skyong gis rtogs pa brjod
165a2(skyes rabs): pa'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// // gang zhig snying stobs ldan pa'i snying stobs kyis// khyad par sems can dag ni bde ba'i rgyu// lus ni zhi ga kyang khro ba'i me rnams
165a3(skyes rabs): drag/ mchog tu zhi ba 'gyur de rgyal gyur cig/ chos bstan pa la sngon 'dug pa// dge slong kauN+Di n+ya yi// gtam gyi zhar la dge slong gis// dris shi bcom ldan gyis bka' stsal// bI ra NA
165a4(skyes rabs): spyi dag tu ni// sa bdag tshangs pas byin gyi bu// kA shi mdzes pa zhes pa dang // dus kyi sa zhes bya ba byung // rgyal tshab dpyad ni bskur 'os pa// gzhon nu kA shi mdzes pa yis// rgyal srid
165a5(skyes rabs): chos dang chos min gyi// rang bzhin yun ring dpyad nas bsams// lang tsho skad cig 'jig pa dang // sreg ni chu rlabs g.yo bya'i tshe// rgyal srid rmi lam bgre ma len// rmongs pa'i rtsa 'dir
165a6(skyes rabs): bdag blo med// chags pa'i cho de rab mang zhing // yang yang sgyu dang rmongs rang bzhin// 'khor ba snying po med pa la// 'phyon ma du bzhin bden pa med// de slang khyim nas khyim med par//
165b1(skyes rabs): bdag ni sdig med rab tu 'byung // ral gri'i spyod la reg 'gyur ba'i// rnam par 'byor la chags pas ci// de ltar rnam bsams rgyal po'i bu// dri med dben pa'i rnam pa can// nagasu 'gro
165b2(skyes rabs): bar 'dod pa yis// sa skyong la ni mngon phyogs smras// rgyal po bdag la mngon phyogs kyis// tshogs ni nye bar mkho ba med// rgyal tshab dbang ni bskur 'os pa'i// kun tu brtson par bzlog/
165b3(skyes rabs): bar mdzod// yabA lags gsod 'ching 'jigs dang gdung // skyed byed rgyal po'i phun sum tshogs// khro ba'i me yis rab gdung ba// 'di dag bdag ni yongs mi 'dod// dur khyod tsha yi
165b4(skyes rabs): rtse mo bzhin// shin tu drag po'i spyod pas khyab// rab tu 'bar bau sa bdag dpal// su yi chags bral skyed mi byed// gdugs kyi snang ba yang dag bsgribs// rnga yab dag gi rlung gis
165b5(skyes rabs): bskyod// rgyags pas myos pa sa yi dbang // sdig pa dag gi spyod la ltung // 'jam pa'i longs spyod gos gomos pa// shin tu gzhon pa sa bdag gis// lus la 'jug tu nyon mongs kyis//
165b6(skyes rabs): rdo rje mi bzad 'bab par 'gyur// rgyun tu bsam pa'i gdung ba dang // sred pa drag po'i cho de can// rgyal srid rim bstan 'di rnams kyi// rmongs shing rgyal ba mi zlogs so// gnas dang gnas
166a1(skyes rabs): su lce gnyis pa// 'khyogs cing rin chen sgron ma can// skyon khung la lta rgyal po yis// bya ba gzhan dag gsod ba yin// mi bdag brgya lhag dregs ldan ma// bdag
166a2(skyes rabs): las gzhan du mi 'gror sems// gces bzhon sra bdag dag gi dpal// do sha l-i rnga yab dag gis rgod// 'das pa'i sa bdag dran pa las// rgyal po'i dpal ni rmongs pas bsgribs//
166a3(skyes rabs): rlung yab kyis bsal shugs rings dang // muM tIg mchi ma'i rgyun ldan bzhin// de slad rab tu byung ba yis// skye ba'i lugs ni rnam spangs nas// tshig shes bsil ba'i grib mra can// yongs
166a4(skyes rabs): ga dung zhi ba'i nags su 'gro/ rtag tu gnod pa'i lus 'di yang // dril bsngo med par 'khor bi yi// lam gyi 'gron pasa? bkur dka' nas// sA yi khur lta slar yang ci// zhes pa mchog
166a5(skyes rabs): tu mi snyan pa// bu yi tshig thos sa yi bdag/ rab tu 'byung ba'i sgra yis 'jigs// mya ngan ldan pas de la smras// chen por gyur pa'i rigs 'di dang // yang dgra rgyal srid 'phel ba'i
166a6(skyes rabs): smad// rgan po bdag gis bu khyod la// re ba mchog tu rnam par btsongs// mnyes shin bdag gi brtag pa ni// dus min nyams par bya mi dgos// nag su khyod kyi long tsho 'di// gsar du
166b1(skyes rabs): mdzes bya'i 'os ma yin// dam pa'i sngags ni goms par ldan// legs pa'i lta ba la chags pa// dbang po thul ba'i mi bdag ni// kun tu nags med dka' thub yin// rang gnas yin
166b2(skyes rabs): ya mtsho skyes ni// gos pa med par chu la gnas// nags ning yin yang mya ngan med// bud med rkang pas bsnun pa mthong // rang khyim rnyed blo'i longs spyod kyis// ji srid mig ni rmus byung bya//
166b3(skyes rabs): de srid yul ni 'di dag rnams// skad cig yongs su btang bar nus// rang gis skye bo nang gi ni// bde ba yongs btang khyim las 'thon// nyams myong longs spyod bral pa yi// nyon mongs
166b4(skyes rabs): skye bos mi bzod do// khyim du chos ni bde ba yis// nyon dang dran dang sgrub par byed// nags su skam po rnams kyi ni// nyan dang dran dang bya ba skam// rtswa yis tshogs kyi khab rtse yis// rkang pa dmar
166b5(skyes rabs): skyes zag byed pa// de las 'jig rten pha rol tu// sdug bsngal gi zhun po ci zhig 'byung // skye bo za ba rnams la blta// byugs pa rus pa'i lhag mar gyur// rtag tu gzhan gyis byin pa za//
166b6(skyes rabs): dka' thub tson rnams yi dwags bzhin// bukri'i nags na gnas pa ni// rdul gyis gos dang mtshungs pa ste// tshangs par spyod pa skyong ba ni// chu srin 'byung gnas skems pa yin// nags bsre
167a1(skyes rabs): me yi du byA rab rgyus khro gnyer ldan pa'i bzhin// pha wang gnas dang 'ug pa'i phug ni stug por gyur pa'i khyim// seng ges bsad pa'i so gnyis khrag gis dmar por byas gyur
167a2(skyes rabs): ba'i// nags su khyim btang nas ni su zhig dgri' ba 'byung bar 'gyur// 'dod ldan dag ni dul ba 'dod cing du la pa dang ldan sngo bsangs rtse dga' dran// tshim pa shin tu drag po'i brtul zhugasau la
167a3(skyes rabs): dga' bkres par gyur pa zas dag 'dod// gcig pu da ga ni skye bo'i tshogs 'dod skye bo'i tshogs kyis yid byung nags tshal 'dod// de ni mchog tu tshol ba yongs btang slar yang skye bos smad par
167a4(skyes rabs): 'gyur ba thob// be dag ni yongs su bor nas su// nags su 'gro bar mi 'os so// khyod ni nags na gnas pa dag/ dgra rnams yid la re ba yin// mu tig gsal bar rgod byed pa// rgyalnga po'i
167a5(skyes rabs): phun tshogs nga rgyal can// btang na slar yang mi 'ong ste// ral gri dag gis 'khri shing bzhin// pha yi sa lan mang de brjod kyang // de ni nges pa las mi g.yos// bdag nyid chen po'i brtan po ni// rdo
167a6(skyes rabs): rje ri yis rtse mo mtshungs// ma dang blon po rnams dang ni// gnyen dang grong pa che rnams kyis// gsol ba btab kyang nyini gsum de// zas dang smra ba med par gyur// rgyal por spyod dam dka' thub cam
167b1(skyes rabs): 'di ni rang gi 'dun pas 'tsho// 'jig rten 'di ni 'dod rjes 'jug/ ces pa blon+da pos rgyal la smras// mchi ma dang bcas sa skyong gis// ji zhig ltar skyes gnang nas de// mi smra grong
167b2(skyes rabs): khye pa rnams du// thub pa'i dka' thub nagasu song // chags bral yongasu smin pa yi sI// der ni sems can thams cad lo// byams pa dag byis po rtse ba dag/ dbyen pa'i grogs su
167b3(skyes rabs): de yis bsten// de yi mthu yis de dag tu// nogs na gnas pa thams cad kyi// rang bzhin khon gyi me spangs nas// sems kyi spyod tshul bsil bar gyur// ri dwags tshogs la rab chags
167b4(skyes rabs): rngon pa rnams kyis srog chags gsod pa rab btang zhing // seng ges glang chen 'joms pa dang bral yan lag kun gyis 'grogs par gyur pa la// der ni mngon pa'i bud med mu tig tshogs rnams
167b5(skyes rabs): spangs pa'i sked skabs rma bya yi// gos kyis dbul zhing shugs rings dang ldan chags bral mchu ni rab tu skams par gyur// chu ga ter ska rags can sna btang // 'byung po kun la bzod pa ste//
167b6(skyes rabs): bzod pa smra ba zhes par ni// kA shi'i mdzes pa de grags gyur// skabs der sa gzhi mgu ba yi// tshangs pa byin ni mtho ris// 'byung po rnams kyi mya ngan bzhin// dus kyi sa ni sa skyong
168a1(skyes rabs): gyur// de nas rab bung ba'i tshogs// g.yo bya'i sprin+da 'khyog bzhin ras log/ thub pa'i dul ba la sdang ba'i// dpyid ni yang dgra byung bar gyur// ri dwags mig can
168a2(skyes rabs): khengs pa dag/ nyams pa'i pho nya tsu ta ni// rab tu rgyas pa chags pa yis// myos pa'i rgyu yis 'od kyis mdzes// mya ngan med pa dmar po la// logs gnas 'khri shing gi s+ya 'khyud rigs// phrag
168a3(skyes rabs): dog can bzhin me tog rnams// moM la ya yi rlung gis phrogs// khu byug gis rgyas skyed mos tshal// lang tsho rgyas pa de yi tshe// nags tshal blta ba'i ltad mo le// rgyal po btsu na mo'i tshogs bcas
168a4(skyes rabs): so// kha dog sna tshogs me tog rnams// lhung ba'i tshogs kyis rab smras pa// dgral
168a5(skyes rabs): bA'i nags tshal lta zhing de// dal bus dka' thub nags su phyin// nags su kyi sa gzhi mdzes pa dre ru// mdzes ma'i grogs dang yun ring du// rol cing brtse dga' ngal bso bas// skad cig
168a6(skyes rabs): nyid ni thob par 'gyur// sngon du me tog 'dzum pa yis// snye ma rab tu thu zhing der// btsun mo'i tshogs kyis bud med rnams// g.yo ba'i 'khri shing bzhin du song // skabs der bzod par
168b1(skyes rabs): smra ba ni// dben pa'i gnas na rab dgyes pas// zhi ba rjes su sems byed cing // gcig tu g.yo ba med par gnas// mI dmun kun dga' lnga spro zhing // mkhas pa rnams kyis phyag byur 'os// ring
168b2(skyes rabs): kyang mdzes sdug ma nyams pa// thog ma'i ri bong can shar bzhin// yid 'ong yongs su gyur pa yi// ri mo'i dbyibs ni mdzes pa dang // ri mo rnyings pa'i tshul gyis ni// gzugs kyi stong par ma gyur
168b3(skyes rabs): pa'o// sems kyi me long dag byed pa'o// de mthong rgyal po'i btsun mo'i tshogs// de dag ri mor bris pa bzhin// de dag nyid du ni g.yo med gnas// de nas mi bdag myur sad pas// mdun du btsun
168b4(skyes rabs): mo mthong ma gyur// nAgasu bas bras thub pa la// yongasu bskor nas gnas pa mthong // de mthong nyid kyis lag 'gro ni/ dbugs rgod phrag dog dug gis 'khrugs// ha la ha la bzhin du
168b5(skyes rabs): rab drag tshig gi tshul gyis spros// thub pa'i mtshan mar bcos pa yi// chas kyis ma tshar ba khrod 'dra su// blun po rnams kyi snying phrog khyod// nges par bud med rnams la dris//
168b6(skyes rabs): gzhan gyi bud med 'phrog bsam gtan// de yi bgegs bzlog bzlas pa dang // drang po'i yid rton dka' thub ni// g.yo rgyu can gyi thabs mchog yin// kha mngar sgyu ldan shing shun can/
169a1(skyes rabs): khyod kyi pags pa nags kyi ni// dug gi ljon pa bcad pa bzhin// kye ma rmongs pa bskyed pa yin// thub par rtag pa lta bu'i chas// smyos pa slar yang 'di 'dra ba// nang gi
169a2(skyes rabs): de nyid tshul 'phos kyi// bsgrubs pa'ang su zhig gi rigs// sa bdag khro bas 'di brjod tshe// khro med phan pa'i bsam pa can// bzod pa smra bas rnam 'gyur dang // bral ba'i yid kyis de la
169a3(skyes rabs): smras// bdag ni thub pa bzod par smras// bdag la dogs pa bya mi 'os// mdzes ma 'di dag rnams dang ni// 'khri shing dag la bye brag med// ces pa de yis brjod thos nas// da ni khyod kyi bzod
169a4(skyes rabs): bri blta'o// zhes pa brjod cing mi bdag gis// ral gris de yau lag gnyis bcad// bzod pa'i ngang tshul khyad par du'ang // rnam 'gyur med pa de mthong nas// ral gri la yang khro ljon pas//

169b1(skyes rabs): naswA// khro bas 'khrugs pa'i yid dag nI// brjod pas bskyung zhing de yis bsams// ji ltar 'di yis las gzhan rnams// btang nas bdag gis lus bcud pA// de bzhin bdug gis 'khor

169b3(skyes rabs): bzod pa'i lha// de sdug bsngal bas rgyal la zlos// grong khyer du ni mu ge dang // yams dang char med nyer tshe byas// rgyal pos thub la gnod byas los// lha rnams khros te bskyed pa'i skyon// mtshan

169b5(skyes rabs): du gyur// bzod pa smra bsdu der smras pa// bdag la khro ba chung ngu'ang med// las kyi ri mos yongs bcad pas// rgyal po 'di 'dra myong bya nyid// thams cad zad byed rang dbang du// nges par
169b6(skyes rabs): myong bya rtsi ba ni// brtan min yon tan min don min// dka' thub ma yin rjes min// skye bo'i gzhi la rtsa ba'i stobs che ldan pa rong gi las// sar skyes dag gi 'bras bu dus kyis yongasu smin

170a2(skyes rabs): ci yang yod ma yin// bden pa 'di yis bdag gi khrag/ 'o mo nyid ridu gyur lo ltos// yan lag bcad kyang bdag gi yid// gal te sdig med gyur pa na// bden pa de yi sI bdagi ni// yan ldeg
170a3(skyes rabs): de dag 'byor par shog/ ces pa dag pa'i blo ldan de'i// mchog tu bden pa brjod pa las// 'phral la yan lag de dag nyid// 'byar nas rnal du gnas pa thob// de nas mi bdag cod pan ni//

170b1(skyes rabs): dag rdzogs pa yi// byang chub gang tshe bdag gis thob// de tshe ye shes ral gri yis// khyod kyi rmongs pa bcad par bya// thub pas de brjod de la ni// khams bde byas nas rang gnas song // rgyal po'i

170b5(skyes rabs): sems can snying po drang zhing legaso spyod bsod nams gnas de su yang phyag byur 'os// chos lAm bgrod pa'i bgegs dang shin tu ngan par spyod de su yang smad par 'os// gang gi spyod pa bkra ba

171a1(skyes rabs): ldan gyis// sngon gyis byung b+ha'i mamany+dzu drug la// rkyen pa'i mtha' ni dka' stsal grwa/ b+hA ra Sh+TAsI mi g+ni dbyung // dbang ba'i skye chen zhes pa byung // gang gi dpal gyis sa si dbyung //

171b1(skyes rabs): 'byung // nam zhig chu ni tshol byed cing // khyu yi mgon de rjes 'brang bcas// lbu ba'i phreng ldan chu klung gi/ 'jug ngogs dag tu song bar gyur// der ni dgra rnams kyis bcings nas// chur
171b2(skyes rabs): 'phangs cho nges 'dre ba hrI 'i/ shin+da ran su rgyun gyi gakhye slo la tshanarna mtshab bla / Sh+Te shi 'okaM/ ri dwags tham+b+hi sa tsu dri mgrin pa ni// 'khyogs po'i rnam 'phrul ldan pasa? bros// gsIr gyi logs ni de yi tshe// brtse

171b5(skyes rabs): gis bzlog kyang // snying rjes rgyas shing drang ba de// chu ba la ni myur bA ru// zhugs nas de ni thar par byes// dogs med de yi ru dag gis// de yi byicingasA pa rnam bkrol nas// zhan cing
171b6(skyes rabs): rkang par gtugs byas te// 'gro bar brtson pa de la smras// gro Da po khyod kyis su la yang // bdag ni 'dir gnas smra mi bya// bigs pa la chags rngon pa ni// gser gyi 'od can bdag
172a1(skyes rabs): don gnyer// de yis dul bar de brjod tshe// gya gyu can zhes bya ba des// de la phyag 'tshal bstod pas bstod// de de bzhin zhes brjod nas song // skabs der mtshan
172a2(skyes rabs): mo rmi ldum du// mi bdag btsun mo zla 'od kyis// ri dwags dam chos smra byed cing // stan la 'khod pa de mthong gyur// de nas bden rmi lha mo de// rab sad mi yi bdag la smras// lha cig byudag
172a3(skyes rabs): gIs rmi lam du// rmad byung gser gyi ri dwags mthong // ri dwags de ni mngon sum du// gyur pa mthong bar bdag 'tshalo// ri dwags mtshan mo'i mtshan ma las// sgra gcan dogs pas 'thon pa/
172a4(skyes rabs): bzhin// lha mos gtsug sa pas de brjod tshe// mdza' slad sa ldi bdag po yis// ner rnams byin nas rngon pa dag/ ri dwags bzung ba'i slad du btang // de nas rngon pa de dag rnams// na gsu btsal
172a5(skyes rabs): nas phyir log ste// 'dir yang bcas pas mi bdag ni// 'bras med 'ongs pas khros la smras// lha cig ri yi rgyas pa yis// 'gro ba 'di snyed rnam par btsal// ngal bso med par bdag cag
172a6(skyes rabs): 'khyams// de lta'i ri dwags rnyed ma gyur// mig ni ngo mtshar bkod pa yis// 'gugs pa rab tu mdzes pa'i mig/ gser gyi ri dwags rmi lam du// yongs rdzogs gzugs 'di ga la yod// lha/
172b1(skyes rabs): cig gal te yid kyi ni// dge mtshan de la dgyes pa nA// bzo bo mkhas pa kha cig dag/ gser gyi ri dwags bgyid du stsol// ces pa thos nas myi bdag de// nor ni rab mang ster byed cing // ri
172b2(skyes rabs): dwags tshol ba'i brtags pa la// mngon par zhen pa nyid du gyur// de nas nor mang star thos nus// rngon pa bas kyang nir len la// brkam chags blo ldan gya gyu can// mi bdag la maungon phyogs
172b3(skyes rabs): nis smras// lha cig bka' drin mdzod cig dang // ri dwags bdag gis bstan par bya// gser gyi ri dwags ri dwags de// nags su bdag gis mthong bar gyur// ces pa thos nas sa yau bdag/
172b4(skyes rabs): rab tu dga' bya'i mig rgyus pas// bzang po ston cig ga na de// gang na de zhes ya yang smras// ri dwags la maM ni ston byed pa// de nyid sngon du 'gro bar byas// dpung bcas de ni dri med gdugs/
172b5(skyes rabs): zla sha ra rI po bzhin du song // de nas glang po rta 'gros kyis// bslangs pa'i rdul gyis na gas khengs pa// shing rtser gnas pa'i bya rog ni// ring du mthong bas mthong bar gyur// de yis
172b6(skyes rabs): dregs khyu yi bdag/ gser gyi logs la mngon phyogs smras// bdag gis phan pa mngon brjod de// khyod kyis mnyan min byas po min// bdag gis bzlog kyang khyod kyis ni// gang la srog
173a1(skyes rabs): ni byin pa de// skyes bu 'di ste go bgos shing // gzhu bzung rnams dang lhan cig 'ongs// da ni 'jigs pa byung tshe kA'i// gang du 'gro bya ci zhig bya// phan pa'i ci zhig spro
173a2(skyes rabs): bar bya// mnyam du 'chi bar bya 'om ci// byas pa mi bzo ma rungs spyod// sdig la chags pa'i dran pa 'di// khyod kyis bdag nyid nyams bya'i slad// dug gi rkang 'thung bsrungs par gyur// byas pa
173a3(skyes rabs): mi bzo'i rta gdong me// rang gi lus kyi gnasau dag kyang // yongs su spyad pas mi ngoms te// srog chags bcas pa'i rgya mtsho 'thung // byas mi bzo la phan pa dang // gyur gyu'i bdag la yid+mo gtsun
173a4(skyes rabs): dang // ngan pa rnams la gdams drug ni// byed po'i skyon nyid 'ba' zhig yin// zhes pa bya rog gis bshad tshe// sa yi bdag po nye bar 'ongs// khyu la phan pa'i dus la ni// byabs pas khyu yi bdag
173a5(skyes rabs): bos bsams// dpa' bo rnams kyi sde 'di yis// nags tshul chen po bskor nas ni// byedag gri zhar lA ri dwag sna rnams// yud tsam nyid kyis med par byed// de slad dpung go gtso bo dang // nye bar
173a6(skyes rabs): rang nyid 'gro bar bya// bdag nyid gcig pu gsod gyur la// ri dwags 'di kun 'tsho gyur cig/ de ltar nges byas ri dwags de// sa bdag dang ni nye bar song // gzhan srog yongasu skyobs pa la// bdag
173b1(skyes rabs): nyid tshe rnams srog ni rtsa// mdun du mgyogs par 'ong ba de// mthong nas g+hu gyu can dga' bla// rgyu la la mgyogs par de 'di zhes// lag pa dag gis ring nas bstan// de tshe bya rog du mod bya na//
173b2(skyes rabs): rdo rje lhung ba lta bu yis// de yi lag pa sdig pa yi// rkang 'thung yal 'dab yongs su ltung // ri dwags kyis bya shad de yi spyod// mi bdag ya mtshan ldan pas thos// zhal nas byis pa mi bzo ba'i//
173b3(skyes rabs): spyod tshul smad ces mu cor gyur// de nas se bdag dgyes pa yis// rjes shin tu che bo dang // 'byor pa mchog gis ri dgos de// rung gi grong khyer dag tu khyer// de nas rgyal po'i pho brang phyin//
173b4(skyes rabs): dri la rin chen khri stan phul// da yi mdun du mi yi bdag/ btsun mo blon po'i tshogs bcas 'khod// byang chub sems dpa' ri dwags de'i// mchog gi blo yau 'dun sa der// chos bstan gang gis
173b5(skyes rabs): skye bo rnams// bslab pa'i gnas dang ldan par gyur// nga nyid sngon gyi dus na ni// ri dwagras gser gyi logs der gyur// ma rungs gya gyu can gyur gang // de yang da lta lhas byin no// de nas bcom

174a1(skyes rabs): pa'i// dben pas mdzes pa'i dge slong tshogs de dge ba'i slad du ci yang gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bas ma

175a1(skyes rabs): rtsom g.yon can mi srun pa// rab dud nyid la yang dag brten// de naspu gzings la zhon byas te// bsod nams bzhin du rjes mthun brla// 'gro ba'i rlung gista rin chen+ta gling /

175b2(skyes rabs): tan legs spyod dang // mdza' ba 'bebs par dbang phyes gyur// de ni mya ngan nad zhi'i slad// rtag tu sems ni dga' byed pa'i// pi bang ston du goms gyur pa// dbyangs la mkhas pa de yis blangs//

179b1(skyes rabs): dag 'grogs pa nyung bar gyur// phal cher rgyal 'dod dpa' bo nI// seng ge bzhin du 'khrig pa nyung // dal gyis sman mchog ro dang ni// zas kyi lus ni yongs rdzogs pa// nyams gyur de dang de yi ni/
179b2(skyes rabs): chung mas 'khrig la chags par byas// mdza' ba'i snum gyis ma byugs shing // yon tan srad bus ma bcings la// rjes su bla mas ma smad pa// bud med rang 'dod reg po sa bde// mtshan mo
179b3(skyes rabs): smre med nu rgyu se ma// de ni de dang rol pa na// dogs ma da 'khrig pa sa ma tshi ma byar// bdag po bgegasu gyur par bsams// des na bdag po g.ye ma mA des// bsad pa'i gros ni byas par gyur//
179b4(skyes rabs): sdig pa dgo lu bsgrub mkhas pa// bud med sdig pa can rnams lo// rang gi mgo bo mtshungs med ni// nA bar brjod cing sgra ldan des// dpral bar sdig pa bris pa bzhin// ras kyi 'du mas bcing
179b5(skyes rabs): be byas// de yi mgo yi nad kyis ni// drag tu gdungs pa'i sa bdag sras// snying rjes de slar bcos pa yis// rigs pa de di sems par gyur// mya ngan bsam par bying de la// de yis 'khrun
179b6(skyes rabs): cing rab smras pa// 'khyags gdungs bung ba sgra sgrogs pa'i// kha bas nyen pa'i bad ldan bzhin// rnam pa de lta'i mgo nang sngon// bdag ni gzhon nu ma la gyur// sman pa rnams kyis rdo ba ni//
180a1(skyes rabs): zhu ba bskus nas rnam par bzlog/ ri bo 'di yi g.yang sa 'dri// rdo ba yi ni zhun gyis khyab// gal te nus na thag pA la// bogs la khyod kyis blang bar mdzod// bdag gis
180a2(skyes rabs): khyod kyi spyang thag ni// yag pa gnyis kyis bzung bar byas// chung mas dri smras rgyal sras kyi// mdza' las de bzhi no zhes smras// de nas de lag gis bzung ba'i// thog par dal bus 'chel byas te// ri yi
180a3(skyes rabs): tshwa klung drog la brdabs// sgra sgrogs ngogs su de yis babs// sman ni lon lo chags pa na// de yis spyad thag dris par btang // grwa yang sa chen po bud med kyis// sems ltar g.yo ba'i chu ri de lhung // dge
180a4(skyes rabs): ngo zhes kyi lcug ma las// de yi lus nyid zhig ma gyur// rgyun gyis rab tu khyer byed cing // brtan pa yis ni yun ring bsams// rang gi phyogs ni bud med kyi// sems mtshungs 'khor ma ston byed cing // bdag
180a5(skyes rabs): gis bud med nges pa la// 'di yis gdams ngag byas min nam// rab rgyas blo yis rtogs dka' zhing // rmi lam kun rtog dang mtshungs la// chags dang sdang ba'i gdung ba mi bzad nyon mongs rnam par 'dod la
180a6(skyes rabs): chags// nges par 'dod pa la ni skye bo mtha' dag rmongs par rab 'jug pa// sgyu ma bud med dag ni skad cig yongs su 'dres pa'ang ltung bar byed// de ltar nges par sems byed cing // shin tu che ba'i chu yi rgyun//
180b1(skyes rabs): legs byas lta bus grong khyer ni// bu skar can du de yis phyin// gnas skabs de yi tshe na der// mi bdag sras med nongs gyur pa'i// blon po chen po mtshan mkhan gyis// mtshan bzang ldan pa
180b2(skyes rabs): de bzung gyur// de dag gis de cho ga bzhin// bkra shis chu yis der dbang bskur// rmad byung bud med spyod mthong bas// bag ma len la sdang bar gyur byang chub sems dpa' spungs pa yis//
180b3(skyes rabs): ri la sman ni nus pa zhan// dus su skyon ldan ma dag kyang // 'tsho ba chad pas 'khrugs par gyur// grong dang grong khyer lam du des// phrag la yin lag nyams pa bkod// bdag po'i brtul zhugs
180b4(skyes rabs): ldan tshig gis// skye bo rnams la bsod snyims bslangs// bdag po'i brtul zhugs la gus pas// kun gyis de la mang du byin// log pa'i tshul khrims brjod pas kyang // rgud pa la ni 'byor
180b5(skyes rabs): bi bskyed// dag tsos kun gyis phyag 'tshal ma// de yis dral bus bskor zhing phyin// grong khyer pu skar can du ni// mi bdag sgo dang nye byar song // rgyal po bud med spyod la snang // bdag khrims
180b6(skyes rabs): ldan la phyag 'tshal 'gyur// zhes bsams de la gus pa yis// mdun na 'don gyis rgyal la smras// lha gcig yul gzhan ring po nas// bdag po'i khrims ldan su zhig 'ongs// gang zhig
181a1(skyes rabs): rkang pa 'akod pa yis// 'byung po'i yum 'di dag par byed// lha gcigs pA dag po phrag bkod pa'i// gtsang ma de la gzigs par mdzod// bdag khrims ldan la rab
181a2(skyes rabs): btud nas// skyes pa rnams kyi tshe 'phel 'gyur// de skad mdun na 'don gyis de// lta bar zhugs pa'i mi bdag gis// de la smras pa bram ze dag/ drang po khyod kyis yong mi shes// bud med mdza'
181a3(skyes rabs): zhes 'di rapa grags// grol med ces pa blo gros 'khrul// gtsang zhes mkha' yi ma tog thob// bud med sdig ces the tshom med// 'bras bu med cing bcad la skye// skye bo bgrogs la drang por 'gyur//
181a4(skyes rabs): 'brel pa rtsa med bud med ni// be ta sa yis 'khri shing bzhin// 'byed 'khu gcig pu'i tshul khrims can// rang bzhin nyid kyis tshul khrim snga 'tshal// bud med la 'dud bud med 'dud// bud med
181a5(skyes rabs): l+ya 'dud 'dud do 'dud// bud med spyod tshul skyong mthong ba// de bsami gdung ba'i bdag nyid can// bdag nA rin chen gyis gang ba'i// si gzhi 'di la'ang yang mi srid// ri yi ri dwags chung ma ltar
181a6(skyes rabs): rmongs pa pha rol slu la mchog tu sbyin// lus ni rnam par sbyin la chags shing skyes bu rnams kyi srog kyang 'phrog/ me tog lhung la 'jigs par byed cing me yi nang du'ang rnam par 'jug/ drang zhing gya gyu
181b1(skyes rabs): bud med rnams ni rnam par spyad pa rgyus mi nas// de lta na yang gal te khyod// 'bad na bud med de lta bya// zhes brjod mi yi dbang po yis// yang thog 'dzegs nas de la bltas// yan lag bcad
181b2(skyes rabs): pa'i grogs ldan ma// sdig con ma do yongs shes nas// blon po rnams las bdag des// de yi spyod mtha' nges par bshad// des kyang mi bdag yongs shes nas// skad cig gdong bud sdig can
181b3(skyes rabs): ma// skye bo rna ba bsgribs rnams kyis// myur du bskrad de rab tu song // khyad par lo ma zhes pa'i mi do bang sras// de bdag de yi chung ma de lhas byin// zhes pa'i byung tshul rgyal bas bshad thos nas//
181b4(skyes rabs): dge slong tshogs kyis de yi spyod pa smad// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// khyad par lo ma'i yal 'dab ste//
181b5(skyes rabs): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// // bsod nams rab zhi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin mthu// de ni dag pa'i bdag la ci yang yod// gang gi mothu yis ma rungs pa rnams kyang //
181b6(skyes rabs): 'phral la khro ba'i dug ni rab tu gtong // de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal byed tshal// kun dga' ra bar sngon zhugs shing // de yi bka' yis dge slong tshogs// ri dang nags la rgyu ba'i tshe// ri rab lhun
182a1(skyes rabs): po'i ngos la ni// 'dug gnas bsam gtan skyong byed pa// dge slong nyam chung bzhin ras ni// mdzes bral skye bo rnam drag 'ongs// de nas bcom ldan zhabs pad+ma la// mngon
182a2(skyes rabs): par phyag 'tshal de dag gis// lus ni nyams rtsal chung ba'i rgyu// dge slong rnams kyis dris nas smras// mkha' lding gis kyang gzhom dka' ba'i// klu ni dga' bo nye dga' dge/ lhun po kha ni lan
182a3(skyes rabs): gsum du// bskor zhing bcings nas rnam par gnas// de de ga rtag tu dug gi dbugs// me yis rgyas pa lan gsum spro// reg pa rdo ba rnam dag kyang // 'phralu la nyid du thal bur byed// de
182a4(skyes rabs): ya dug gi dbugs kyis ni// bsam gtan sbyor ba bdag cag bsregs// bzhin mdzes khwa dog bral ba dang // ring pa 'ba' zhig nyid du gyur// ces des bshad tshe dge slong gi/ tshogs kyi mdun
182a5(skyes rabs): zhus ston pa yis// klu dga' 'dul ba la 'os par// maung+gal gyi pu la bstan// sbyor bas mi snang dbyibs can des// lcog gis mkha' le 'khyud pa yis// ri rab lhun por yang dag phyin// klu dbang
182a6(skyes rabs): dag ni nyal bar mthong // de yis dal bus bslang ba las// gang tshe de dag mi sad pa// de tshe de ni klu tshon gyi// lus su gyur nas yang dag bcings// de yis bsdam sa pas rab sad do// 'jigs
182b1(skyes rabs): rung dbyibs de mthong gyur nus// 'jigs pas rnam par 'khrugs gyur te// mi yi gzugs kyis rab tu bros// de nas phan tshun 'bros byed pa// de la mot+pal gyi bus// klu yi ga zugs ni yongs btang nas/
182b2(skyes rabs): rang gi gzugs su byas te smras// klu dag mgyogs par gang du 'gro// 'jigs pa 'di ni yang dag thong // gang gis khyed cag 'jigs byed pa'i// kru d+he de na maM gnas so// de yi 'jigs pas gal
182b3(skyes rabs): khyed// rnam kun brtan pa med nyid na// skyabs su 'os pa sangs rgyas la// mngon par phyag 'tshal cas mi byed// ces des brjod thos dul ba yis// de dag gis ni de la smras// 'phags pa btso
182b4(skyes rabs): ldan bstan pa yis// bdag cag la ni bka' drin mdzod// ces smra klu yi dbang po dag/ bau com ldan 'das kyi drung khyer nas// de dag lo rgyus bshad nas de// de lnga phyag 'tsho la nye bar 'khod// de
182b5(skyes rabs): nus klu dbang skyabs song zhing // rin chen khyod kyis sa gzhi dag/ blo rgyun pas phyag 'tshal byas pa la// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka 'astsal pa// bslab pa'i gonas ni yang dag thob// 'byung
182b6(skyes rabs): bo kun la 'jigs med ster// skyabs kyi grogs ni thob pa las// da ni khyed cag 'jigs pa med// ces te yang dag gzigs tsam gyis// de dag skyon dang sdang ba dang // bral bar bcom ldan 'das
183a1(skyes rabs): kyis mdzad// de lnga phyag 'tshal song bar gyur// bsam pa che rnams yang dag mthong nyid na// sdang ba'i dug tshan gdung bas gtses pa yang // 'od kyi sgrol gyis lus la chags pa yis//
183a2(skyes rabs): zhi ba'i bdud rtsis bsil ba nyid du 'gyur// do yi sngon gyi byung bya'i mtha'// mthu yis ya mtshan dge slong gis// dris shing rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das// thams cad gzigs pas de la gsungs// ba
183a3(skyes rabs): ra NA ser mi yi dbang // dpal ldan kr-i kI zhes pa sngon// bcom ldan 'od srungs zhes pa las// chos kyi bstan pa thos par gyur// de yis blon po dga' bo dang // nye dga' dag la rgyal srid gtang // byung
183a4(skyes rabs): chub la ni yang dag chags// bden po mthong la dga' bar gyur// de yi blo des rgyal srid ni// chos dang chos min rang bzhin rje dang // 'od srungs la yang gtsug lag khang // yo byad kun dang ldan pa byaste//
183a5(skyes rabs): dus kyis 'di dag dga' bo dang // nye dga' klu yi dbang por skyes// gtsug lag khang phul bsod nams kyis// lhun po sa 'dzin de yi gnas// de ltar gdengs can mchog gi spyod po lus gzhan dag/ yod
183a6(skyes rabs): gyur legs spyad yongs 'dris rgyal bas gsungs pa dag/ zhi ba'i tshul ldan thub mchog tshegs kyis thos gyur te// dug 'dzin nges par zhi ba'i yon tan bstod par gyur// ces po dge ba'i dbang pos byas
183b1(skyes rabs): ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// dga' bo nye dga' rtogs pa brjod pa'i yalnga 'dab ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//
183b2(skyes rabs): glang zhig nor gyi cha shas chung ngu'i lhag/ gzhan la phan par bsgoms pas byin gyur par// yon tan brtag pa yongs su mi zad pas// bsod nams de ni khyad par gyur pa yin// de nas 'ga'
183b3(skyes rabs): zhig 'das dus na// bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du ni// chos ston pa la dga' bo de nga // nye dga' nyan du 'ongs pa'i tshe// rgyal po gsal rgyu la bcom ldan la// blta ba'i slad du nye bar 'ongs//
183b4(skyes rabs): de dag gis ni bsnyen bskur dang // phyag mi byas pas khros par gyur// rgyul la phyag 'tshal de song nas// de dag chad pas bcad par bsams// de dag gis kyang mkhar spong ste// de la mtshon
183b5(skyes rabs): gyi char pa pha ba// kun mkhyen gyis bskul mo phyogs par ni// maung+galA gyi bu stong nas// mi bdag gi ni mtshon char de// pad+mo ut+pal phreng bar byas// slar yang swa yi bdag po yis// bcom
183b6(skyes rabs): ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin// gdangs can dbang po 'ongs pa la// de yi bka' yis bzod gsol byas// de nas sa bdag gis gsol te// rgyal po'i khang par bcom ldan 'das// dge slong tsho
184a1(skyes rabs): bcas gus pa yis// gtsang ma'i ba shos ni gsol du gshegs// kha zas 'tshed par byed tshe drer// mtshan mo me ni nyer 'tshe skyes// 'phral la rgyal ba'i mthu
184a2(skyes rabs): yis ni// rab tu zhi ba nyid du gyur// bcom ldan gsol nas gshegs pa'i tshe// rang gi grong du sa bdag gis// mtshon mo me yi 'bar ba la// chad pa'i gro sa kyis dgag pa smras// skabs
184a3(skyes rabs): der khyim bdag legs sbyin gyi sa// bu ni rdzu 'phrul stobs shes pa// lang tsho ldan pa rdzun skyon gyis// rgyal po yis ni mngon par bsad// sngon du bcom ldan ston pa yi// bstan pa rjes su
184a4(skyes rabs): bzung bas de// ye shes brtan thob bu yi ni// nem zhig sdug bsngal gyis kyang sdug min gyur// bud med rang gi nor mang po// bkren pa rnams la des rab byin// shin tu chags pas dal bus
184a5(skyes rabs): dpal// pA na gcig gi lhag mar byas// de nas pa na'i rnyed pas chos// ma lus chung ngu byin nas byas// de ni khyim legs ster ces gyur// khyim ni shin tu chung ngur brjod// nam zhig lta ba
184a6(skyes rabs): la 'ongs shing // mdun 'khod chung ngur sbyin pa yi// ming gis ngo mtshar gyur de la// bcom ldan brtse bas bka' stsal pa// khyim bdag sbyin pa chung ngu la// ngo tsha bgyi bar mi 'os so// dad
184b1(skyes rabs): bas byin pa sbyin pa'i thigs// gser gyi ri po mtshungs par gyur// sngon tshe gnyis skyes bI la mes// shin tu mang ba rab tu byin// dad pa dang bral thun mong bas// de bzhin du ni 'phel bar
184b2(skyes rabs): gyur// su zhog 'dzam gling gtogs pa yi// 'gro kun gus pas gsol byed dang // su zhig byang chub ldan cig la// de yi la mod nams de bas lhug/ ces pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs//
184b3(skyes rabs): bden pa thos nas mngon dga' zhing // de la phyag 'tshal khyim bdag ni// rang gi khang par rab tu song // mtshan mo mar me btang nas der// bcom ldan rjes bstan klog pa na// me ni rab bsgraza
184b4(skyes rabs): chad pa'i slad// de ni rgyal po'i skyes bus bzung // chad pa'i dngos po med pas na// btson khang dag tu bzhag ste bcings// mtshan mo brgya byin tshang sA la sogs// lha rnams de la lta ru 'ong/
184b5(skyes rabs): de dag gis gsol nor long zhes// gung tshe de yis ma blangs pa// de tshe de yi khang par ni// chos bstan pa las blasags pa 'phel// de yi mthu yis rgyal pos kyang // grong khyer rib tu 'bar
184b6(skyes rabs): mthong nas// btson ra nas ni de btang tshe// gang du'ang me ni mthong ma gur// nam zhig bde gshegs lta ru ni// phyin nas de mdun 'khod pa des// mi bdog rgal la phyag 'tshal slang // phyin
185a1(skyes rabs): nas 'ongs pa mthong bar gyur// de yis sngon du bcom ldan la// phyag byas sa yi bdag la min// 'gro bas mchod 'os sngon du ni// gzhan la mchod par 'os
185a2(skyes rabs): yin// ma bdag rgyal la rab btud cing // rang gi grong khyer dag tu song // khyim bdag rang gi grong khye las// gzhan du spyugs gas bka' yis bsgos// de nas legs sbyin dag la lha// rab
185a3(skyes rabs): tu dang bas mi bdag la// srog chags phra mo rab spyod de// so yi dug gis 'khrugs par byas// de dag gos btab mi bdag de// blon po btsun mo'i rjes 'brangs bcas// phyin nas rgyal ba'i bstan pa
185a4(skyes rabs): las// legs sbyin la ni dad par byas// de ltar rtag tu nye bar gnas pas mchog gi bdud rtsi dag gi tshogs// khyim gyi bdag po legs sprin de yis bcom ldan gyis gsungs zhi ba bsten// dri med
185a5(skyes rabs): yang ldan rnams kyi mtha' ru gnas pas dben pa'i gter chen ni// rang gi bzhin du bgegs dang nyon mongs ngal dub rnam par spangs pas 'thob// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub
185a6(skyes rabs): sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// khyim bdag legs sbyin gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// // sbyin pa'i grogasu
185b1(skyes rabs): skad cig su gyur pa// de dang sbyin bdag 'bras bu mtshungs pa 'thob// gzhan la phan par brtson par zhugs rnams kyis// grogasu bsod nams lngas med mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan rgya lnga ba mnyan
185b2(skyes rabs): yod kyi// rgyal byed tshal ni dgo' bar sngon// mgon med zas sbyin gtsug lag khang // kun dga' ra bar sngon dgyes tshe// ko shAm+b+hir bad sa yi// mi bdag 'char byed ces pa byung // rig 'dzin bu
185b3(skyes rabs): mo'i skye bo yis// de lta'ang gang gi grags pa sgrogs// de'i yul du khyim pa ni// lus mtha'i 'byung gnas kyis 'tsho ba// nor bza nga zhes bya nor dag ni// sgrub la rnam par mkhas par gyur// nam
185b4(skyes rabs): zhig bye ba don gnyer zhing // 'dun ser 'ongs pa mi bdag gis// tshig nyid kyis ni yongs shes nas// gus pa bskyed de de la smras// khyim bdag gser na yongs bsags pa// khyod kyi dbyangs
185b5(skyes rabs): ni bdag gis shos// srog pa shes pa khyod la ni// gser gyi gter chen yangs pa yod// rgyal pos 'dzum bcas 'di brjod tshe// de la thal sbyar des smras pa// rgyal po bdag gi khyim ni/
185b6(skyes rabs): gser// bsags pa bden par yod pa nyid// mnyes gshin yangs pa dam pa yi// spyod tshul bsam pa la chags lha// yab khyod kyis ni bsrungs pa yi// skye bo 'od la ci zhig med// gal te
186a1(skyes rabs): mi bdag brtse ba med// zang zing la snom stag ltar gyur// nor ldan rnams ni nor med 'gyur// nor med rnams ni 'chi bar 'gyur// mi bdag chos kyi nor ldan nA//
186a2(skyes rabs): dogs pa med par skye bo rnams ni// nor sgrub bsgrubs pa'ang 'god byed cing // bgos pa gsal bar longs spyod byed// blo ldan de yis tshig dag ni// phun tshogs su bdag gis thos nas// saM yi
186a3(skyes rabs): 'od kyi bka' drin ni// gsal bar byed bzhi na de la smras// bdag gi bya ba'i blon por ni// blo gros ldan pa khyod 'gyur 'os// blo stobs ldan pa khyod lta bus// 'dzin byed khur 'di 'dzin par byed// /
186a4(skyes rabs): de skad rgyal po'i tshig thos nas// nor bzang gis ni de la smras// bdag ni rgyal po'i g.yog 'khor la// 'dun ser mdzes pa'i mkhas pa min// g.yog ni skyes bu rnams dag gis// rang dbang skyed
186a5(skyes rabs): tshal rnam par gcod// bde ba'i gnyid dang bde ba 'tshong // 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bkren 'jigs nyo// g.yog po dag ni rkang stegs bzhin// rtag tu 'og na gnas pa yi// mgo la dbang phyug
186a6(skyes rabs): zhabs bkod na// bya ba byas pa nyid du 'gyur// g.yog gi nyon mongs ngali dub kyis// phun tshegs thob pa'i longs spyod kyang // phra ma can dang 'grogs pa yi// rje bo smin ma 'khyog pas ge yo//
186b1(skyes rabs): bzung dka'i gdon bzhin mi dag gi/ phun tshogs dregs drag gzung dka' ba// 'di dag rab tu 'bad pa yis// bzung yang nges par mi gnas so// 'byor pa gsar ba gsar pa ni// 'du 'bral mdza'//
186b2(skyes rabs): gcugs rtsom pa dag/ mi zlog smad 'tshong mdzes ma bzhin// skad cig dga' bar bya ba yin// zhes smras rab tu bkag gyur kyang // rgyal pos de ni blon por byas// jo bo mchog tu bzhed pa la// nges
186b3(skyes rabs): parA su zhig 'da' bar byed// rgyal pos kun gyi gnyer gta cing // shin tu che bo'i gnas thob de// rnam par sdang bas sun 'byin pa'i// blon po rnams kyis bzod ma gyur// pra ma can gyis bskul
186b4(skyes rabs): ba yi// rgyal pos choso ni brtag 'dod nas// dam po'i bya ba min pa'i las// yang yang bskos kyang des ma byas// de nas mi bdag khro rdzun gyis// de ni bsod du bskul bar gyur// de lta na yang
186b5(skyes rabs): chos min dang // yang dag ldan pa'i bka' ma mnos// skye ba gcig nyid bde ba'i slad// skye ba brgya mang nyams 'gyur ba// smad pa'i la sa ni dge ba bdag/ mi bgyid do zhes de yis smras// chos
186b6(skyes rabs): kyis 'jigs shing cho 'brang gtsang // de ni sa bdag gis rob btang // slong ba rnams ni ma lus la// rgyun chad med pa'i sbyin khang byas// grags snyan ldan pa de yi ni// sbyin khang kuna'i tu grags bI
187a1(skyes rabs): tshe// dpag bsam shing la skyes bu rnams// gus pas mchog tu chung bar gyur// gnas skabs der ni thub pa'i tshogs// 'jug ngogs don gnyer lho phyogs nas// 'ongs pa 'brog
187a2(skyes rabs): dgon nyam nga ba// skye bo med pa'i gnas su zhugs// der ni thams cad skom pas gzir// brgyal zhing mal stan lu brten pas// sems med la yang rmongs pa las// skad cher tshwa ni rab tu blangs// lha dang dri
187a3(skyes rabs): za klu rnams lngas// brtse ba'i chu gter su zhig 'dir// gang gnas de yis bdag cag la// chu ra ba rtsol zhes de yis smras// de nas rin chen dpung brgyan can// gser gyi dril chung sgra sgrogs shing //
187a4(skyes rabs): lage bas gser gyi chu snod gzung // shing gi dbus nas byung bar gyur// lag pa'i bad+mas btud do lA// bdud rtsi myong bzhin de dag gis// mgrin pa'i bar du chu 'thungs nas// 'tsho ba thob cing dga' bar
187a5(skyes rabs): gyur// ya mtshan ldan pa de dgu rnams// chas te slar yang mngon phyogs nas// mi mthong shing gi gnas dag las// nges 'thon khyod ni su zhes dris// de yis smras pa mnyan yod na// snyan par grags
187a6(skyes rabs): pa dpal gyis gnas// mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba// kun ster khyim gyi bdag po yod// tshom bu pa bdag de yi ni// khyim dang nye bar gnas pas sngon// dbu nga ba bslang nas slong rnams la// de yi
187b1(skyes rabs): khyim ni rtag tu bstan// bsod nams de yis lha nyid ni// thob cing da lta bu dag 'dir gnas// slong ba'i rjes mthun dpung pa des// bdag gi g.yas pa 'dri mdzes so// thub pa de dag de la ni// khams
187b2(skyes rabs): bde byas nas slar song ba// nags su bkres pas rkang 'thung mchog/ mdzes shing grib bsal ldan pa mthong // de bzhin du ni de dag gis// de la yang ni bza' ba bslangs// ya mtshan byed pa zab mo
187b3(skyes rabs): yisau// skad kyang rab tu byung gyur te// rdzing bu 'di yi 'jug ngogs kyi// 'gram du bza' ba lha yi zas// yongs rdzogs yod kyis der song la// gang zhig 'dod pa gsol b.ru mdzod// de skad des

187b5(skyes rabs): yi dge 'dun mchod la bdag/ bram ze'i rim gro la mkhas pas// zho yi bum pa 'grim byed cing // de dag gsol ba mthur phyin tshe// zos lhag chung ngu zo bAr 'gyur// dge slong rna mas la rgyal
187b6(skyes rabs): po'i zas// zhes rgya che ldan pa dang // bdag nyid la ni zas ngan dag/ mthong nas bdag nyid skyo bar gyur// mgon med zas sbyin chog gis ni// zas la gus pa'i bsam pa yis// yan lag brgyad
188a1(skyes rabs): ldan gso sbyong gi/ brtul zhugs de nas bdag gis blangs// de nas brtul zhugs ma rdzogs pAswa// sred pas bdag gis mtshan mo zos// de yis bdag ni 'jig rten
188a2(skyes rabs): du// gso sbyong nyams par rnam par grags// brtul zhugs nyams pa de yis kyang // bdag ni lha yi bu nyid gyur// de yi tshig do thos gyur nas// thub pa de dag ya mtshan gyur// de dag 'gro
188a3(skyes rabs): zhing rab bas mas pa// dka'i thub drag pos bdag cag rnams// yun ring nyon mongs 'ba' zhig gyur// da dung dag la reg pa med// da ni gso sbyong brtul zhugs nyid// rab tu bsgre ba la 'bad par bya/
188a4(skyes rabs): gnod pa med cing bde ba'i thabs// rang la phan la su mi gus// de ltar bsams shing de dag ni// shAm+b+hi gtad song nas// khyim na gnos pa nor bzang gis// khyim ni grags dung ldan par

188b1(skyes rabs): lhun 'das kyi drung du khrod// des tshig gis de dag rnams// bcom ldan gyis kyang rjes smra b+hazung // gang gis de dag bden pa mthong // yang dag rtags shing bder bgrod gyur// de dag
188b2(skyes rabs): song tshe bcom ldan gyis// phyogs lhung brlan pa'i spyan gyis+ya ni// nor bzang nyid la rnam gzigs nas// yang dag ye shes ldan par mdzad// bden pa yang dag mthong bya theb// khyad par dge
188b3(skyes rabs): brgyus pa de nas rgyalo ba'i gtsug lag khang // shA nIr byed du bcug/ gang phyir bcom ldan gyisna bskos pas// der ni grogs la 'dis gyur pa// dge slong sbrul byed de byin /

188b5(skyes rabs): yI 'bongs mo re bdag gyur ces// dad pa'i smon lam gyis phul de// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos la// kha dog pa nyid du gyur// nor bzang kyis ni bsod nams tshogs// rmad byung
188b6(skyes rabs): ba 'bar mthong gyur nas// de yi sngon byung dge slong gis// zhus shing bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// ba ra t+na sir khyam dag sngon// gzugs byed ces ni bya bar gyur// rgya che glang po ga
189a1(skyes rabs): zhig gis// sbyin pa yongs su zad ma gyur// lo ni bcu gnyis char med kyis// nyams pa'i dus su de yi ni// sbyin khang mi zlog pa rnams la// zas ni rgyun chud med par gyur//
189a2(skyes rabs): de yi khyim du mdzod khang bdag/ pad+ma'i 'byung gnas zhes bya bas// sbyin pa yi ni grogs dag byas// gang phyir grogs dang ldan pas grub// de yi rang rgyal tshogs dag gi/ zas kyi du bos ni rigs byed pa/
189a3(skyes rabs): lhag pa'i blo ldan nye bar gnas// chos kyi pho nya zhes par gyur// na mo zhig de ni las kyis 'brel// dus ni yol bar 'gyur ba'i tshe// de dag rnams kyi mdun du ni// khyi yis dus kyi brda' dag byas// gzun
189a4(skyes rabs): byed gang de nga nyid do// mdzod pa mgon med zas sbyino// tshogs kyi chos kyis po nye gang // de nyid mi bdag 'char byed yin// gang zhig brde'u ni rigs byed pa'o// khyu de yang ni nor bzang ngo // rgyu la
189a5(skyes rabs): gdangs las shes pas+t+ra nA// gdungs can zhes po ming gzhan gyur// de ltar yid ni legs pa rnams kyi spyod pa dag/ rigs par srid pa 'bigs byed bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa// legs byas dri bzang
189a6(skyes rabs): snying por ldan pa bdud rtsi'i ro// dge slong rnams kyis gsan pa'i snyim pas 'thungs par grags// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub semos dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i dpag bsam gyo'i/

189b2(skyes rabs): la reg mi byed// lhan skyes yongs su 'dris shing rtag tu nang nas gnas gyur pa// dkar po'i yon tan rnams kyi byed po rigs ni min// mnyan yod rmyi la byed tshal na ston+da// sems can kun lo shis pa mi//

189b4(skyes rabs): gyur// de yi chung mo ke to ki/ zhes pa la ni bu gsum byung // 'byor len dang ni 'byor bzong dang // 'byor pa dga' zhes grags pa'i// nam zhig de ni nad kyis btab// 'chi ba 'dod cing nye bar gyur// mchog tu rtsub
189b5(skyes rabs): cing chags bral bas// chung ma bu rnams dag gis spungs// de ni 'bangs me phreng ldan ma// zhes pa gcig gos gus pa yis// ji srid rnal du gnas gyur pa// de srid rim gro mchog tu byas// mdza' zhi
189b6(skyes rabs): phan pas rab 'dud pa// byas shes de ni de dang ldan// zla mtshan dus su 'grogs gyur pas// de la bu ni bcas par gyur// gang tshe de skyes pa yi ni// de ni kun gang po nyid du gyur// byis pa zla nya ltar mdzes de//

190a2(skyes rabs): ni sgrub pa bya// de nas de dag nor thob ste// rgya mtsho las kyang grong khyer du// slar log gser ni 'bum phrag rnams// 'greng bar byas te dga' bar gyur// de dag rgya mtshor bskyod pa la// nor ni ji snyed byung gyur
190a3(skyes rabs): rang gi khyim du gang po la// de las ldog pa zong gos byung // de mthong de dag rnams kyi pha// rgan pos 'jug gi nyi ma la// de la phan smras srid pas+t+ra ni// rgud che du ma nyams pa bskyed// ngal de'i che

190a6(skyes rabs): phun sum tshogs// blo bzang skal ldan rang khyim du// chos kyi bgo skal ldan par 'gyur// gzhan ni rin chen 'byung gnas su// song nas srog la the tshom 'thob// nor gyi nye bar gnas pa mchog/

191a1(skyes rabs): dang zas la rtsod pa dang // rnam par bud med sngags byin pas// de dag rnams ni bye bar gyur// de nas nor ni 'god pa nA// sdang bAs dbang byas de dag gis// 'di ni

194b1(skyes rabs): slad nags su 'gro// der yang tshul 'chos brtul zhugs dag la yo byad rtsom pa gal te sogs byed na// mdzod kyi yo byad nyer mkhe de dag rnams kyis khyim du gnod pa ci zhig byas// rgyal ba rgyal byed
