194b3(skyes rabs): rab tu mang ba gzigs gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag bsams// kye ma 'di dag da dung yang // lus la sdug pa yo byad 'dzin// mngon par khengs pa'i rang bzhin gyis// 'ching ba'i rgyu ni yod ma
194b4(skyes rabs): zlog/ lus la lus kyi chas rnams te// de la nye bar mgo ba'i phreng // de yi yo byad 'dzin pa ni// kye ma 'ching ba'i lha rigs sgrogau yin// de ltar bsams nas bcom ldan 'das// dben par gnanges pa bsgrubs
194b5(skyes rabs): pa yis// nyer 'dzin rnams la snying rje las// dge ba'i slad du yang dag brtson// dge slong rnams kyis mi slong slad// zla ba gsum du bdag la ni// sus kyang nye bar gnas mi bya// zhes pa'i bgro ba mdzad pa ra
194b6(skyes rabs): gyur// nges pa de la rab zhugs tshe// dge slong dgon pa'i brtul zhugs can// chos gos dman ldan nye ba'i sde// zhes pa dgos pa'i slad du 'ongs// rab bzlog skal ba ljon pa des// bde gshegs mthong
195a1(skyes rabs): bya yang dag thob// bya ba byas te skad cig 'dug/ de la phyag 'tshal rab tu stong // dge sbyong rnams kyis bgrod de la// yongs bskor mngon du phyin te dris// 'phags pa khyod la
195a2(skyes rabs): bcom ldan gyis// kye ma mthong ba ji ltar gnang // 'di yi bka' la zla gsum du// dge 'dun dag gis mthong med pa'i// nges pa gang de lam min nas// bgrod pa khyid kyis ji ltar bshig/ de dag
195a3(skyes rabs): tshig de thos gyur nas// lhags par 'dzum zhing nye sde yis// de dag la smras bdag gi sa ni// nges pa yang dag nyams ma byas// bdag gis lta ba'i gnas skabs ni// bcom ldan rang gis bka' stsal pa//
195a4(skyes rabs): dge slong dgon pa pa rnams ni// lta ba dag gis bkag pa med// yo byang nyer mkho yongs btang zhing // 'ching pa dag las nges grol ba// shing drung phyag dar khrod pa dag/ lte ba dag ni zlog pa med//
195a5(skyes rabs): lhung bzed chos gros tshegs rnams la// 'di deng nang par gzhan no zhes// gang zhig bsags pa la dga' ba// de dag 'dir ni mthong ba med// ga nga zhig rab zhi'i brtul zhugs yo byad dag la 'bad/
195a6(skyes rabs): bos mngon par khengs 'di 'ching // de dag tsan rkang 'thung dag las yang dag gdung byed me ni nye bar skan// kha bas rab rgyas bsil ba'i chu rnams dag gis de dag mchog tu skomo pas gdung //
195b1(skyes rabs): myang 'das dgegs med gter gyi gnas la de dag bkren zhing phongs pa nyid du gyur// nye sdes de skad brjod thos nas// shAkya'i dge slong de dag rnams// skyengs pas spro ba zung gyur pas// 'phral
195b2(skyes rabs): lo nyid du rnam par bsams// 'di dgra bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa// bdag cag ched yin gzhan la min// gang phyir chos gis bkra ba'i tshigs// bdag ca ga kho na sa rab tu byon//
195b3(skyes rabs): da bral rnams la ston pa dgyes// 'dod chen bdag chags la dgyes min// de slad 'dod pa yongs btang na// bdag cag de yis bzhed par 'gyur// zhes bsams de dag thams cad kyis// rab
195b4(skyes rabs): tu gyon pa las lhag pa'i// mdzes pa'i gos kyi tshogs btang nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song // 'dod pa bral che bcom ldan gyis// 'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri bo ni// ye shes rdo rjes rnam
195b5(skyes rabs): bcom gang // de dag rjes su bzung ba mdzad// rgyun zhugs 'bras bu la reg pa// shAkya'i rgyal sras rnam dag gi/ sngon byung dge slong rnams kyis dris// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa//
195b6(skyes rabs): ba ra NA si ra sngon byung ba// sa yi bdag po tshangs pa so byin// gang dpung sa 'dzin sbyin pa yis// lag brnyan phyogs kyi gnyis 'thung bzhin// de yi btsun mo mu tig gi/ 'khri shing bzhin du yon
196a1(skyes rabs): tan can// skyes bu dam pa'i snyan pa bzhin// grags pa tshangs ldan ma zhes gyur// dri med bsdams pa dang ldan de// chu la rtse ru song ba'i tshe// bdag po'i gzugs brnyan
196a2(skyes rabs): lta bu'i bu// mtshan mchog ldan pa btsas par gyur// chu nang du skyes byis pa de// chu skyes shes ni bya bar gyur// yab kyi rgyal tshab bzhed pa dang // mtshungs pa nyid du che bar skyes// de ni skyes pa'i
196a3(skyes rabs): nyin par la// blon po lnga brgyas mtshungs par ni// gzugs ni mtshungs pa'i bu rnams dag/ lnga brgya rab tu thob par gyur// rang gi skye ba 'di la yang // rim gyis sngon byung dran gyur nas// bdade ga nyid
196a4(skyes rabs): la phan legs byas kyis// dus la bab par yang dag bsams// lo ni drug cu them par sngon// bdag gi rgyal tshab byas pa nA// mI bo zad dmyal ba yun ring du// nyam nga'i sdug ba sbrul gdung ba thob/
196a5(skyes rabs): smad nas skye ba 'di la yang // rgyal tshab dag ni nye bar gnas// rnam pa kun tu gsol btab kyang // bdag ni sdig po mi byed do// zhes pa de yis yun rings bsams// rgyal srid longs spyod las phyir/
196a6(skyes rabs): phyogs// pha ni yid 'byung skyes byed pa'i// lkugs pa 'phye bo bzung bar gyur// mtshan nyid thams cad ldan mod kyang // rgyal po'i lugs kyi snod ma gyur// gnyen rnams sdug bsngal bskyod byed do//
196b1(skyes rabs): lkugs pa phye bo zhes par gyur// mtshon dang bstan bcos stobs rgyus pa// blon po'i bu rnams kyis thob tshe// rgyal sras rab tu rgyur gyur kyang // ldang ba ma yin smra ba min// de nas de ya lus skyon
196b2(skyes rabs): gyi sna// smano ni sa yi dbang pos dras// sman pas smras pa rgyal po yi// sras la ma tshung mthong ba med// gal te bde ba bsten pa 'di'i// skyon ni go mes las skyes 'gyur pa// de lta'ang 'di ni 'jigs
196b3(skyes rabs): pa yi// shugs las ldang 'gyur smra bar 'gyur// zhes pa sman pas smos sa dbang gris// rdzun gyis gsod pa'i sa ru ni// 'jigs pa bgyi slad bu btang gyur// smod byed skyes bu de dag la// shing
196b4(skyes rabs): rta la gnas des smras pa// ba ra NAM si 'di na ni// skye bo 'ga' zhig yod dem med// ces pa de yos tshig thos nas// des de mi bdag drung du khyer// der ni yab kyis gsal btab kyang // slar yang
196b5(skyes rabs): lkug pa nyid du gyu ra// slar yang gsod slar khring+ga pa na// ro zhig mthong nas des smras pa// ro 'di 'tsho ba yin nam ni// bdag nyid kun gyis shi ba yin// de thos yab kyi ngos su des// bkod tshe slar
196b6(skyes rabs): yang smra bcad byis// slar yang gsod 'jigs nyid slad khyer// de dag la ni lam du smras// gang zhig 'bru yi phung po 'di// gang phyir de zos rjes su za// zhes pa'i tshig 'di brjod kyang slar//
197a1(skyes rabs): yi mdun du cang mi smra// de nas de la sa bdag gis// bshad pas rab skad bstan pa'i tshe// de yis smras pa mchog gter na// bdag ni smra zhing rkang pas 'gro/ de nas rgyal po dgyes
197a2(skyes rabs): pa yis// de la mchog ster rjes thos tshe// rang gri rkang pas mngon phyogs te// gsal bar de yaM pha la smras// bdag ni 'phye mon bdag lkugs min// bsam pa blon po 'ang bdag min te// 'on kyang skye
197a3(skyes rabs): gzhan nyon mongs// dran zhing rnam par 'khrug ma bsten// lo ni drug cu bdag gis sngon// rgyal tshab bde ba lo rings spyad nas// lo ni stong phrag drug cu dag/ dmyal ba'i nang du gnas par gyur// de slad bdag ni/
197a4(skyes rabs): rgyal po yis// 'jigs nas lkugs 'phyo 'di nyid byas// rab byung tshangs par spyad pa dag/ spyod pa 'di ni bdag gi mo tshig/ ces pa de yis brjod thos nas// ma lkugs shes pas dga' thob cing // chags
197a5(skyes rabs): bral zhes pas sdug bsngal ba'i// sa yi bdag pos de la smras// chos kyi rtsa ba rgyal srid 'do// bkye btang bar mi 'os so// mchod sbyin sbyin pa skye dgu skyobs// mi bdag dpal ni bsod nams rdzogs// bu gcig
197a6(skyes rabs): pa bdag bu khyod kyis// chags pa yongs su btang ba las// gnyid kyi dbul ba thob gyur cing // mya ngan mal stan dag la brten// yongs rdzogs zla ba ltar mdzes shing // ma tig gsal bar rked pa can// phun
197b1(skyes rabs): sum tshogs pa spangs nas khyod// rab 'byung ji ltar mngon par 'dod// rgyal po lnga 'os bde ba yis// mal stan mchog ni ljongs btang nas// nags ma'i gnas la zhen pa yis// rdul khrod sna gzhi
197b2(skyes rabs): ji ltar bsten// rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes me rol pa'i me long nor bu dang ldan khang pa ni// 'di dag btang nas nags kyi sa gzhi 'jigs rung stag ni yang dag rgyu bar byed// brtan pa'i sbrul ni rgan po'i dbu
197b3(skyes rabs): kyi bsreg pa dang grib dman gyur pa// 'khri shing nyung ba de dag rnams kyis mnyes gshin khyod ni dgyes par ji ltar 'gyur// zhes pa yab kyi tshig thos nas// rgyal po'i bu yis der smra sma// mchu mdzes
197b4(skyes rabs): so yi 'od kyis ni// chags bre la len du 'jug pa bzhin// chu ni bsil zhing dri ma med// cho gshes ri bong ldan pa bsil// chags bral skal ba bzang po'i sa// nags tshul la ni su mi dga'//
197b5(skyes rabs): gzhan gyi chung ma dag la bzhin// bdi myur dran pas ma btang ba// gang zhig dmyal rkyen gnod bcas kyi// dge' ba rnams la bdag mi dga'// bsam gtan sngags dang yongs shes dang // dbang po
197b6(skyes rabs): rnams ni thul ba dang // 'tshe bas rgyal po'i sbyor ba 'di// 'bad pa med par dmyal ba ster// nags kyi sa gzhi me tog rab rgyas 'khor ba dag la rgod pa 'dra// ngo bo nyid kyis mkhas pa rnams la zhi ba'i rang
198a1(skyes rabs): bzhin dga' ba bskyed// bsams pa yis ni mchog tu dral zhing rlung yab rlung gi shugs rangs mang // sa bdag rnams kyi 'byor pa 'di ni nges par bde ba'i grogs ma yin//
198a2(skyes rabs): yab cig bdag la rjes gnang gsol// bdag ni dka' thub nags su 'gro/ mi rtag pa nyid dngos kun gyi// rtse mor chags pa mkhyen lags sam// zhes po bu yi tshig thos nas// de de bzhin zhes rnam
198a3(skyes rabs): bar bsams// sa bdag mkhus pa ngo mtshur ni// rgyas par gyur pas de la smras// dri myed dben pa'i nigs tshul du// bu khyod gral te 'gro 'dod na// re zhig bdag gi the tshom gsol// phyi nas rigs
198a4(skyes rabs): bar khyod 'gyur ro// khyod ni gsod sngar 'gro ba yis// 'khyog po dag tu che rtsig mang po// smras pa de dag dgongs pa ni// de bzhin nyid du brjod par 'os// sa yi bdag pos dris pa dang // des smras
198a5(skyes rabs): bdag gis brjod pa de// 'di ni su zhig bdag gsod las// khyod kyis zlog pa mi gnas sam// legs byas dag gi ro yang gson// sdig ldan shi ba min yang shi/ bsod nams snga ma'i rtsa ba spyod//
198a6(skyes rabs): nor ldan rnams kyi 'bru phung bzhin// zhes pa'i bsams pa bdag gis ni// tshig ni gsum po de dag brjod// ces pa thos nas sa yi bdeg/ de la yongs 'khyud gus bcas pas// bu gcig dge ba'i
198b1(skyes rabs): slad du ni// rigs pa mdzod ces rab tu smras// de nasna ya ba ni mig chung dang // bcas pas rjes gnang nags tshul du// blon po'i bu ni lha brgya dang // lhan cig rab tu spong bar gyur// der ni drang srong che drung
198b2(skyes rabs): du// rjes 'brang bcas pas rab byung tho ba// dus kyis de dag ril ba dang / shing shun bsags pa de yis mthong // de nas bsregs pa la sdang deste// de dag mi ltar nges byas nas// blo gro sa
198b3(skyes rabs): chen pos ji tsam dus// skye bos dben sar gcig pu bsdad// mthong dang smra ba nges pa yis// bsdams kyang 'dod dgrar 'ongs pa yis// ri dwags la ni dge ba dag/ legs par 'ongs shes smos nus
198b4(skyes rabs): dris// slar yang thub pa ri dwags kyi// brtul zhugs de yis mchod mtho dA nas// blon po'i bu rnams thams cad ni// sbrengs par 'gyur bas yang dag bsams// nags su yongs 'dzin med pa yis/
198b5(skyes rabs): ri dwags ri dwags bairtulnga shugs 'di// gos dang dbyug pa'i tshogs dag gis// phun tshegs songs pa 'di dag mchod// de yi don du 'di yis ni// bdag cag lta la nges pa byas// brtul shugs yo
198b6(skyes rabs): byang bsags pa na// 'di dag gi yang bzlog gam snyam// zhes pa bsams nas de dag gis// brtul shugs yo byad bsags pa kun// chu yis rlung du rab spangs nas// dag pas de dang nye bar phyir//
199a1(skyes rabs): 'dzin pa sa spangs de dag gi/ khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas de// bsam pa ngag la nyal dag dang // 'os pa'i chos ni bstan pa mdzad// rgyal po'i bu de nga nyid de// blon po'i bu rnams/
199a2(skyes rabs): shAkya rnams// da lta'ang bdag gis de dag la// gtong ba nyer bstan 'di slar byas// zhes pa shAkya gzhon nu rnams kyi ston byung ni// rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs pa de dag nges bzung ste// sten byed rnams la gnye
199a3(skyes rabs): gshin ldan par gyur pa de'i// thugs rje de ni dge slong tshogs kyis rab tu mchod// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs bya brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ lkugs
199a4(skyes rabs): ba 'phye bo'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste sum cu brgyud pa'o// / bar+d+han pa'i khrur gyis mi g+ho dung lcu gro ma bzhin// legs byas bzod pa gang gis bzod pa 'dzin// rnam 'gyur me de hU~M
199a5(skyes rabs): mdzesau pa rmad byung bskyed// brtan ldan de dag mchog tu rgyal gyur cig/ sngon gyi bsod nams phyin ci log pas sngon// gnod sbyin 'di rI skyes skye dgu rnams kyi dgra/ u dum pa zhes bya ba drag por nI// gdung
199a6(skyes rabs): bas 'jigs la dus byas bzhin du gyur// 'jig rten la brtse mgon med rnams kyi mnyen// bcom ldan zhi ba brjod pas 'phel la ni// dus mini dus der bslab pa nyir bstan cing // skyabs 'gro rab ldan
199b1(skyes rabs): 'dul ba dag la bkod// srid pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi ba de// bde gshegs de dus 'dzum skyes rgyu ba la// rab tu dga' nas lta ru 'ongs gyur pa// mtho ris bdag pos phyag 'tshal 'di skad smras// ci slad
199b2(skyes rabs): glo bur 'dzum pa'i zla ris kyis// khyod zhal chu skyes rmad byung sbrang du mdzes// snying stobs bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho rgyu med du// 'jig rten thun mong bzhin du bzhad ma lags// skabs gsum dbang phyug tshig
199b3(skyes rabs): de thos gyur nas// bcom ldan thams cad gi zigs pas der gsungs pa// phyogs 'dir rang gi sngon dran byung gyur nas// dbang po bdag la 'dzum pa 'di skyes so// sngon tshe nags tshal 'dir ni gnas
199b4(skyes rabs): gyur pa// khro ba'i skyon spangs thub pa bzod la dga'// chags rdul rang bzhi ni srid la sdang ba gang // pad+ma dag la zla ba bzhin du gyur// de nas dpyid ka byang phyogs bdag po ni// chags ldan btsun
199b5(skyes rabs): mu'i tshogs bcas rtsi dga'i slad// nags kyi nang rnams blta zhing dge mtshan gyis// de yi bsti gnas nye ba'i sa gzhir 'ongs// chags ldan sa skyong rtsod ldan zhes pa des// rtse dga' la ni bud
199b6(skyes rabs): med rnam dag gis// rkang pas bsnun dang kha yi chang gis kyang // mya ngan med mdzes pa ku la dpal thob// der ni phyogs rnams dka' thub pa rnams kyi// dka' thub nyams byed khro chen smin
200a1(skyes rabs): 'khyog gi/ tshogs kyis bzhin dang 'dod me'i du bas bzhin// bung ba 'khor bas mun pa dang bcas 'gyur// rlung gis bskyod pa rtse dgas g.yo ba dang // me tog phun bus dud pa nu
200a2(skyes rabs): mras chu// yul 'dab dmar po dang ldan mchu sgros dmar// 'khri shing rol rtsed bud myed rnams kyis thob// rgyal po'i btsun mo dge mtshan rnam 'phrul la// nags su rgyu bas chags las rnam grol
200a3(skyes rabs): zhing // g.yo med bsam gtan ting 'dzin la tshogs pa// drang srong de la yongs su bskor nas gnas// de nas mi dbang phyogs der mngon phyogs pas// bud med rnams kyi sa yongs bskor de mthong nas//
200a4(skyes rabs): phrag dog khro ba'i me ni blta dka' des// de yi lag pa rkang pa myur du bcad// brtan pa rnam 'gyur med nges yan lag tshogs// bcad kyang sau yi bdag la nges mu khros// dri za gnod sbyin lto 'phye lha tshogs
200a5(skyes rabs): kyis// de la khro ba drag po dag las bzlog/ de nas mi dag ra nga gi grong song tsha// nags nas 'ongs pa'i thub pa thams cad kyis// der ni yan lag bcad pa de mthong nas// bzod ldan dag kyang khro bas/
200a6(skyes rabs): 'dar bar 'gyur// dmod pa 'dabs la mngon phyogs de dag las// bzlog nas bzod par bya zhes de yis smras// bzod pas yang dag 'khyud pa'i yid ldan rnams// khro ba'i las kyis tshigs par mi byed do//
200b1(skyes rabs): khro bral bdag gi rkang lag bcad gyur kyang // gal te rnam 'gyur shugs ldan ma gyur na// bden pa de yis nyams med lus ldan par// bdag gyur cig ces rab dang nges slar smras// de nas bden tshig
200b2(skyes rabs): brjod pas skad cig la// lag pa rkang pa 'byar zhing rma dag sos// lha yis bzod pa'i yon tan des bstod cig/ snying stobs dkar ba'i me tog rnams kyis mchod// rgyal po 'ang de sdig nag po brtsen
200b3(skyes rabs): lhu bus// chu bur gyis gtams spyod tshul rnam par nyams// rab drag rnag gi 'khor mor rnam 'khor zhing // 'jig byed smin pa'i dmyal bar song bar gyur// bzod dga' drang srong chen por gang sngon gyur//
200b4(skyes rabs): de nyid rtsod ldan gang de ltas byino// bir+d+ha byin 'das pa'i spyod tshul dran pa la// bdag gi 'dzum pa 'di skyes rgyu med min// zhes pa bcom ldan gsungs thos ya mtshan dag dang ldan pa'i yid// rab dag
200b5(skyes rabs): rnam rgyas spro bas gsal ba'i spyan gyi phreng 'dzin cing // nyi ma'i 'od zer rag pas pad+mo'i 'byung gnas rgyas pa bzhin// lha rnams bdag po dga' bas skabs gsum gnas su song bar gyur// ces pa dge
200b6(skyes rabs): ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chubo sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ bzod pa la dga' ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste sum cu rtsa dag pa'o//
201a1(skyes rabs): chen po khyad 'phags mtho ba rnams ni nyams par 'gyur ba yis// skyon gyi rgyu ni skye bo ngan dang 'grogs pa kho na yin// 'jug ngogs shing ni nges par 'bras bu skye bas lhan cig nyid//
201a2(skyes rabs): nga 'grogs pa kho rtsa ba phyung nas 'phral la 'gyel bar 'gyur// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegase pa sngon// chu bo yid 'ongs ldan pa'i ngogs// khang bzangs mdzes pa dang ldan pa// yangs pa can na rnam
201a3(skyes rabs): pa rA rgyu// nya pa'i tshogs kyisde de yi chu// bsgral bar dka' zhing zab pa la// nam zhig rgyu ni 'phangs pa na// 'jigs rung chu srin yang dag 'thon// mgo bo bco brgyad seng ge dang // gnyis 'thung sdug dang bor
201a4(skyes rabs): bu'i bzhin// lus nI ri yi rnam pa can// mi ni stong phrag dag gis drangs// der ni do mthong rnam par skrag/ 'dren pa'i theg pa chung gyur cing // ngo mtshar g.yo med nywa pa rnams// skad cig snod minA 'gro ba
201a5(skyes rabs): min// 'khor ba las kyis rnam bkra bar// rnam 'gyur ngo mtshar zab mo ni// brgya dang ldan pa'i khyad par rnams// su zhig gis ni rtsi bar byed// skabs der de yi ched du ni// 'byung bar dgongs pa bcom ldan
201a6(skyes rabs): 'das// skye bo thams cad skyobs pa la// dus mdzad rgyal ba yang dag byon// rgan po byis pa bud med bcas// ltad mo la 'tshogs skye bo dag/ bcom ldan gyis gzigs 'jug ngogs der// bstan ni
201b1(skyes rabs): yongs su bzung ba mdzad// dge slong tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa der mthong nas// chu gter phyir la log pa bzhin// skye bo thams cad der phyogs gyur// de mthong nyid kyis
201b2(skyes rabs): 'phral la ni// nya pa rnam par dud pa yis// srog chags 'ching ba yangs pa'i rgya// 2khon+dza ba lta ru btang bar gyur// di yau gsung gis chu la nya// tshwa srin na kra la sogaso tshogs// btang nus de dag
201b3(skyes rabs): khro bral bas// sdig pa yi nI dgra bor gyur// de dag gis bkod chu srin che// mdun du bcom ldan gyis gzigs nas// tshems kyi mdzes pas snying rje yo// chu bo spro bzhin de sa smras// bu kye ser smra khyod
201b4(skyes rabs): kyis ni// nyes par byas pa mi dran nam// 'di yang dag gi nyes spyad dge/ smin pa nyams su myong ba yin// khyod kyi mi dge'i grogs gyur pa// mi de da lta gA nA gnas// thams cad mkhyen pas de brjod
201b5(skyes rabs): tshe// dwe yas skye ba drin nas smras// khyab bdag bdag ni ni siR+Sha sgra yin// rang gi nyes par byas pa dran// ngag gi skyes spyad yongs smin pa// 'di ni nyam sna su myong bar gyur// dmyal bya sten byed bdag gi
201b6(skyes rabs): ma/ sngon du dmyal pa dag tu skyes// shes pa smras nas chu srin der// nga ro drag pos rab tu ngus// mya ngan rgya mtshor bying de la// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dud 'gro'i skye go nas son khyod
202a1(skyes rabs): la// dus min di ring ci zhig bgyi// bAg med rnams kyi bsod nams min pa'i rab tu rtsom pa gzu lums dag/ rgod cing rangs pas bsgrubs pa dmyal bar yongs smin la
202a2(skyes rabs): chags gyur tshe// nyon mongs 'bebs pa dag dang mtshungs pa'i rjes su 'gyod pa ma zhi bas// ngu la skyabs pa rnams la mtshan mo so sor mchog tu gdung bar byed/ sdug bsngal skad cig gis 'jig
202a3(skyes rabs): slad// bdag la sems ni dang bar byos// dang ba'i yid kyis dus byas na// lha yi gnas su khyod bgrong 'gyur// mnyes ga shin phan pa 'di yang nyon// rnam par dpyod la yad la gyis// 'du byed
202a4(skyes rabs): thams cad mi rtag cing // zhi ba myang 'das 'jig pa med// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 'di yis// de ni rab dang gyur pa'i tshe// skye bo'i tshogs dang yun ring du// ngo mtshar g.yo ba med par gyur//
202a5(skyes rabs): de nas skye bos gus par ni// gsol btab 'phags pa kun dga' bos// bcom ldan 'das la thal sbyar nas// de yi sngon byung rab tu dris// de yis dris pa ye shes spyan// dri mdu de yis rab tu
202a6(skyes rabs): gsungaso// sdig pa ngang tshul 'di yi ni// 'byung ba'i mtha' 'di mnyan par gyis// bskal pa bzang po dag la sngon// skye ze che lo khri phrag zung // thub tshe bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// 'od srungs
202b1(skyes rabs): zhes pa byung bar gyur// ba rA tA sarA de dus su// sa skyong kr-i ki zhes bya ba// slong ba'i dpag bas ma shing lta bu// mang po rab tu ster ba byung // nam zhig mkhas pa'i gnas su ni// mig stong gzhan
202b2(skyes rabs): pa bzhin de du gne sa// der ni gnyis skyes rig byed ldan// smra ba'i seng gi zhes pa 'ongs// thogs pa min par phrad pa dang // stan du nga bsnyen bkur yang dgra thob// slob ma'i phreng bas bskor ba
202b3(skyes rabs): des// de che rgyal la shis brjod pa// khyab bdag mkhas pa'i bdag po 'dun sar 'dug 'os shis ldan khyod ni shis gyur cig/ khyod kyi legs spyod bdud rtsi dag la mchog tu srod ldan yang dag
202b4(skyes rabs): lta la chags// sa bdag gzhan gyi mid+ya la snang ldan yon tan brjod la mu tsur che bar sgrogs// yon tan kun gyi rten gnas khyod kyi blo bur nyid du bdagu lo skyon rnams sbyar// gang zhig slong ba rnams kyang
202b5(skyes rabs): bar med rin chen char phab pas// sna tshogs slong ba'i don mthun yongs su tshim par byed gyur pa// de dag thams cad gtong phod dang ldan mtshungs med ba sod nams gter// khyod kyi sbyin pa bkren med
202b6(skyes rabs): 'byor pa'i rnam par 'phel ba yin// rgyal po yon tan cung zad yongs su 'dris po bdag gis bla ma dam pa dag/ brten las mkhas pa rgyal byed rigs pa'i cha shes ci yang thob// yid 'ongs mkhra
203a1(skyes rabs): ba'i pad+ma'i tshogs dang ldan pa'i 'dun sa 'dir// de yi tshig ni phul du byung ba'i yid ches 'ga' zhig bdag gis bstan// skye bo dam pa'i blo ni rang gi yon tan baN+Dir ngo tsha// de lta na
203a2(skyes rabs): yang sgra 'drod drag pos mu cor sgrog tu btsug/ rgyal po 'gro 'di dag na bdag gi tshig lan la srid pa'i// gal te mkhas pa yod na myur ba nyid du brtag par gyis// shes pa de'i gzhung gi tshig/ drag por
203a3(skyes rabs): snyems shing zag pa dag/ thos nas sa i bdag po ni// skyengs pas myur bar yang dag bsam// gal te lan nas ma thob par// rgyags shing 'phyar 'ang song gyur na// de lta na 'di bdag yul gyis//
203a4(skyes rabs): grags pa min pa sgrog pa'i rnga// gang nas sa bdag blun por 'gyur// yon tan can rnams dman par byed// de na skye bo rig byed la// yongs su rol ba byed ma yin// sa bdag chos kyis ku ni dga'
203a5(skyes rabs): ra// dri med dben pa'i snang ba can// 'jig rten rig byed la 'jug ste// dam pa'i bya ba'i spyod la bzhin// de slad 'di yi rgyags pa ni// rab tu 'bad pas tshor gcad bya// yul ni rig byed kyis dbul
203a6(skyes rabs): ba// rigs byed kyi bdag po nyid kyi skyon// de ltar bsams nas mi bdag gis// bram ze dkor pa Tar gnas pa// mkhas pa'i bla ma rnam dpyad nas// blon po chen pos 'gugs su bcug/ mkhan po rtag ge/
203b1(skyes rabs): rno ldan pa// sa bdag 'dun sa der 'ongs nas// smra bya'i seng ge'i dregs pa yi// ral ba dag ni chad par byas// myur bar smra ba ma lus lus// rnam rgyal de yis pham pa de'i// dbyangs can ngo/
203b2(skyes rabs): mtshar gyur pa bzhin// smra bcang rgyu ni yang drag thob// skar ma rnams ni 'char ba bzhin// mkhas pa gzi byin che rnam sa kyis// yon tan khyed 'phags la gnas pa// gong nas gong du mthong
203b3(skyes rabs): ba yin// de nas nor mang mi bdag gis// byin nas smra ba'i seng ge btang // grong khyer lta bu kar pa Ta// gnyis skyes rgyal las ba dag la byin// de nas rgyal las glang po rta// dpung rgyan gdu bu mdzes
203b4(skyes rabs): pa thob// mkhan po dpal dang lhan cig tu// rang gi khyim du rab tu zhugs// rgyal po'i dpung pas bsgrubs pa dang // tshong pa'i rgya mtsho nas bsgrubs dang // mkhas pa'i yon tan khyad 'phags kyis//
203b5(skyes rabs): bsgrubs pa'i dpal ni rnam par mdze swa// dus kyis dpal dang ldan pa de// bu skyes kun tu dga' bar 'gyur// bde ba la'ang bde ba phun tshogs pa// bsod nams las kyi mtshan nyid yin// skra ni ser
203b6(skyes rabs): skya gzi phyin can// ser skya zhes bya byis pa de// cher skyes shin tu mkhas po ni// pa las mngon par lhag par gyur// rigs rgyud chen po dag la mkhas// mkhas pa la ni 'byor pa rgyas// 'byor
204a1(skyes rabs): pa khyad 'phags dam pa'i bu// legs byas yal ga ldan pa'i 'bras// num zhig nad kyi sbyor ba yis// lus ni 'jig la nye ba na// skye bo med slar bu bos nas// bu la gnyis gshi//
204a2(skyes rabs): dus smras pa// bdag gi gzhon lnga yon tan bsgrubs// der la bab tshe nor rdzas bsgrubs// bu gcig 'jig rten pha rol gyis// bde sgrub slar yang byas pa med// mtshams ni legs par bgrangs pa'i dus// bu
204a3(skyes rabs): lon pa bzhin 'ongs pa'i tshe// da ni 'khrugs te bdag gang na// rig de gang nu no re gang na// yon tan me tog bde 'bras ldan// norI gyis rtsa btsongs skye bo yi// nags su dus min rdo rje bzhin// bzod ngaka'i
204a4(skyes rabs): dus ni ltung bar 'gyur// mtha' dag rig dang sgyu rtsal rnams kyis skye ba 'phen byed cing // skad cig bde ba'i rgyu ni nor rnams rab tu 'dzin par byed// rmongs pa'i slob ma mi rnams phyugs dang bu la dga' bar byed//
204a5(skyes rabs): lus 'brel yud tsam dag la thams cad gzhin te de yang gzhano// mdza' ba rmongs pas dbang byas bdag/ khyod la phan pa 'di brjod do// mnyes ga shin mang du thos pa las// 'khor ba'i snying po'i lam
204a6(skyes rabs): rig bya// dam par phyag bya rtsub mor pa mi bya// rab tu 'bad pas gzhan la phan pa bya// skyes bu sdig pa'i g.yong sar lhung rnams kyis// bsod nams 'di dag rnams ni rten sa yon// 'byer pa dag la ma
204b1(skyes rabs): mdzes pas rgyan// sdang med stobs dang rang bde la ma rmongs// rtsa ba gsum po 'di la dge ba'i shing // 'bras bu dam pa'i dpal ldan ma lus gnas// ji srid sa yi dkyil 'khor dag/ tsha zer gyis
204b2(skyes rabs): gdung de srid pa// 'di ni bu khyod mtshungs pa yi// mkhas pa smra ba po yod min// khyod kyis nam gyi dus na yang // dge slong rnams dang rtsod mi bya// sangs rgyas pa yi blo rab rgyus// ye shas zab cing
204b3(skyes rabs): rtog pA dka'// dge slong la sngon tshig gi don// bdag gis dri sA tshe bdag la ba shad// mkhas pa khyod kyi dI ba dag/ bye ba mi shes zhes pa'ang smras// de skad dge slong la rtsod na// khyod mkhas mchog tu
204b4(skyes rabs): zhum par 'gyur// gang phyir stobs mthu 'dod pa yis// ri la spyi bos brdung mi bya// bu la de smras bram ze ni// 'jig rten pha rol sa la song // lus kyi khang par lus can gyi// 'gron rnams ring por
204b5(skyes rabs): mi gnas so// dus kyi smra mkhas ser skya ni// mkhas pa ma lus nyams byed pa// yon tan mdza pos rgyal po lnga// nor dang mchod chen rgyas pa thob// de nas nam zhig ser skya ni// rgol ba'i rgyal srid
204b6(skyes rabs): thob pa la// dben par ngal bus rang gi ma// ka tsa ra zhes bya bas smras// rgol ba'i dreg pa gcod pa'i bu// phyogs dang gling las rgyal ba khyod// dge sbyong ngan pa dregs po yis// long rnams ci slad
205a1(skyes rabs): smos su d+mo// ku na sas ga sa sbyin dang // na smragasal tu da / ga/ 'dus / da rjes su cig gas// klu smra bar thugs rnams pa/
205a2(skyes rabs): nom pa mA yi rlig thos nas// mkhasatshig des racoM skyes pa// dge slong rnams dang rtsod mi b+h+yo// zhes te bdag ni pi mos bzlog/ gang gis yon tAn na rnams kyi// ba la mchod pa sman par byed//
205a3(skyes rabs): yi ge 'debs byed sgru ba zo// bdag cag mtshe thabs 'di yang nganachen po rnams kyi bde gzho mo skyed// rtag tu gang zhig rab brtson pa// bla ma la stong bzed dga' ba'i// mkhas pa gsum pa 'od dag spyod//
205a4(skyes rabs): na na d+d+haH sa pa shAn m+b+hi smr-i shi gas pa srid da/ zhig rdzun tI sa/ nyid du gzhin ma dang / da ya~M d+han/
205a5(skyes rabs): cho nas na dz+nyAn dang smos ci na ste/ tsha mas yongs des de dgye las// rgyus bar yang ni me nus k+Shi// glang zhig bdag med bsnyen pa rnams// mI mamAn+t+ra phyogs stos yo mi spyod/
205a6(skyes rabs): ces pa bu'i tshigs thos // blos te de yis de la smrasagyi'i ni sdug pa can// dge sbyong 'bangs gyur ma yin na mo// rlom po'i rigs ni che bar skyes// mang du thos dri 'i ni so rob ldan// nga da ts+li
205b1(skyes rabs): phyogs su lhung gyur pa// khyod kyang de dang mtshungs sam ci// tshad ma'i ral gri chen po yis// dge sbyong rnams ni tshar gcod mdzod // sprin gyi tshogs rnams ma bcom nu// tsha zer byed pa mi mdzes so//
205b2(skyes rabs): zhes pa ma yi tshig gis bskul// de la gus pas bsdams pa des// dge slong rnams kyi bsti gnas su// dal bus 'gro bar yang dge brtsams// de ni bgrod pas shes 'dod nos// lam du dge
205b3(skyes rabs): slong 'ongs pa la// gzhung gi snying po tshad ma yang // dus su 'os pa yang dag dris// des dris de yis rab smras pa// sgra don nges par sbas gyur pa// nges kyi tshad ma 'bum phrag gsum// bstan bcos
205b4(skyes rabs): mi stegs dag la dkon// mtshe li ni gang las ldog 'gyur zhing // lam ni gang las ldog 'gyur// gang du 'jig rten sdug bsngal dang // bde ba yang ni 'gag par 'gyur// zhes pa bcom ldan
205b5(skyes rabs): ston pa yis// gsung ni sgra don zab mo dag/ thams cad mkhyen pa ma bsten pas// ji ltar de ltar shes ma yin// de dag thos nas sder sna ni// tshigs bcad zab mos ya mtshan te// bcom
205b6(skyes rabs): ldan 'od bsrungs dge gi no// dka' thub nags tshal gtsang mor song // der ni dge slong tshogs mthong nas// de la ma dad rab spangs te// snying dang bzhin ras rab dang zhing // phrag dog bral bas rab
206a1(skyes rabs): tu bsdams// gang zhig yang dag mthong nyid na// yid ni dri ma med 'thob pa// snang ba'i rnyog pas de dag la// gdug pa bya bar su yis 'os// de ltar de yis yun rings bsams//
206a2(skyes rabs): da drang rtsod las phyir phyogs te// lam rang gyis dub rang khyim du// phyin nas ma la rab smras pa// ma ma rtsod pa'i las la // khyod kyis bskol ba rdzun nyid do// don sbas gzhung smra dge slong las//
206a3(skyes rabs): 'jig rten du ni rgyal mo nus// lam du dge slong gcig gonichos bcad tsam zhig bdag gis thos// don ma shes pas spyos gyur te/ shin tu yun rnyings su la bltas// de y-i gA zhung la
206a4(skyes rabs): groms mA byas// su yis de la smra bar spobs// de dag rab byung min pa la// rang gis bstan bcos 'chad mi byed// ces pa do yis brjod thos nas// ma yis de la rab smras pa// khyod kyi mngal
206a5(skyes rabs): gyi khur gyis bdag/ ngal dub ba skyed pa nyid du zad// 'gran pa la ni khro bas stong // dman pas kun la rab tu 'dud// gnod pa byas la mi sems pa'i// skyes pa de yis ci zhig byed// rin chen
206a6(skyes rabs): mtha' dag 'jig rten na// rin ni gzi brjid nyid kyis tshe// gzi brjid 'tsho ba spangs pa yis// skyes bu'o srog gis ci zhig don// de gzhung thob slad rdzun gyis ni// rab tu byung ba cis mi bzung // sku
206b1(skyes rabs): bcad mgo la ku sha dag/ slar yang skye bar 'gyur ram ci// zhes pa ma yi tshig gis de'i// yid ni rnyog pa nyid du 'gyur// 'phral la dus min rlung chub kyi// rdul gyis nam mkha' 'gog pa bzhin//
206b2(skyes rabs): de nas rab zhi la chags pa'i// zlog ldan de yis dge slong gi/ nags su phyin nas rab byung blangs// bde bar gshegs pa'i bsten bac+doMs thob// dus kyi yon tan la gus pas// seng ge'i khri la yang
206b3(skyes rabs): dag 'dzegs// mkhas pa chos ni smra ba po// de yis chos ni bstan pa byas// ma yis bskul bar gyur ba des// bstan pa de la rim pa yis// dge slong chos dang 'gal ba'i don// smra ba ru ni yang dag
206b4(skyes rabs): brtsams// chos la bsnun pas gdungs gyur pa'i// dge slong rnams kyi tshig dang tshig/ bzlog kyang de yis de dag la// bzhin gyi rnam 'gyur byas nas smras// gnas skabs min par mang du smra// dregs ldan
206b5(skyes rabs): mu tsAr so mchu dag/ khyi da kyis shes pa min pa las// bdag gi bshad pa rnam par 'gog/ khyed rnams bong bu spre'u rnga mo'i bzhin ldan stog gi khaM dang ba lang gdong // byi la e Ne pha ga dang khyi yi
206b6(skyes rabs): bzhini ldan mchog tu bolta bar dka' ba'i gdong // sgra bcad bsten yang bzod pa min na drag po'i sgra chen sgrogs pa smos ci dgos// shes pa smin ma mkhyog cing lan gcig ma yin dge slong tshogs la
207a1(skyes rabs): de yis smras// de yi tshig mda' rnon po yis// rnam par bcad bzhin dge slong rnams// lan gyi tshig ni mi brjod par// de btang nas ni gzhan du song // de nas ngag gis sdig pa des//
207a2(skyes rabs): phyi nas 'gyed pas gdungs gyur te// gnyis skyes de yis ma nyid btang // rab tu byung ba btang ma gyur// bdag gi bu ni drage sbyong gis// phrogs zhes rmo nge smra de yang // smon mar gyur cing lus btang
207a3(skyes rabs): nos// dmyal ba dag tu gnas pa thob// de nas dus kyi sdig pa dag/ rang gis byas pa'i ser skya ni// lus kyi mjug tu tshab rtsub kyis// chu srin 'di nyid dag tu gyur// dge slong nga smad la gang smras
207a4(skyes rabs): pa// da drag 'di yi gdong 'di dag/ gang phyir las kyi sa bon las// 'bras bu mtshungs pa'i rang bzhin skya// zhes pa gsungs dar ni bcom ldan gyis// rtag pa'i chos ni bstan mdzad nas// tha dang byi
207a5(skyes rabs): chub sgrub byed pa'i// skye bo dag la rjes gzung mdzad// de nas rgyal ba rang gnas su// gshegs tshe de yaM radwa bzhin ying // chu srin kha zas rab spangs nas// lus btang lha yi gnas su song // dau ni
207a6(skyes rabs): skad ci go bde gshegs la// sems ni rab tu dang ba las// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams su// dpal ldan dri med mdzes par skyes// de nas zla ba nye ba'i bzhin// phreng ba dang ldan rna rgyan mdzes// kun
207b1(skyes rabs): dga' rnam pa dang bcas bzhin// da ni badre gshegs lta ru 'ongs// lha yi me tog rab tu gtor// cod pan gyis ni sa la reg/ 'od kyi phyogs kyi 'khor lo bkang // de yis de lnga gus phyag 'tshal//
207b2(skyes rabs): nye 'khor de la bcom ldan gyis// chos ni rab tu bstan pa mdzad// gang gis bden mthong rgyun zhugs kyi// 'bras bu thob nas de song gyur// de ltar bya ba dka' yang de ni rtsa bzhin sdig pa'i 'dam dag
207b3(skyes rabs): las// gton zhing skye ba'i tshogs pa de dag kyang ste sdug bsngal bsgrubs pa yis// gdung ba ra nges par lhung ba rnams kyi nyon mongs rtso ba mtshungs maud dag/ ma lus bsod nams ngang tshul rnams
207b4(skyes rabs): kyis bde blag nyid du 'joms par byed// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtags pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ ser skya'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal
207b5(skyes rabs): 'dab ste bzhi bcu pa'o// // lus kyi snod son dge dang mi dgau bya// mnyam pa nyid du skyes bu longs spyod des// lus can rnams kyi rnam mang las skyes 'bras// gang phyir ma spyad
207b6(skyes rabs): kun tu zad mi 'gyur// bcom ldan bde bar gshegs pa sngon// grong khyer rgyal po'i khab kyi ni// ka lin daM ka'i gnas sho sa pa'i// nags kyi nang na rnam par gnas// gzugs can snying po sa yi
208a1(skyes rabs): bdug/ dar ni dpal gyis rnam byar grags// rin chen 'byung gnas gzhan pa bzhin// dus der grong khyer sgra sgrogs zhes// bya bar mi bdag dpal dang ldan// brags pa zla ba'i
208a2(skyes rabs): chu gter che// u drA ya na zhes pa byung // de yi btsun mo zla ba'i 'od// ces pa zla ba'i bzhin ras can// sraswa ni drag po'i rtsal du ldanA~M// rgyal chab gtsug pud can zhes gyur// he ru ka dAng b+hi ru ka/ zhes
208a3(skyes rabs): pA de yis blon po gnyis// 'du lA laM dkar po phur bu bdag/ bgrang bar bya ba min par gyur// sa bdag lha yi 'ong zer can// de gnyis spring yig gis mdza' gyur// ring du gnas dang nyi ma dang // pad+ma
208a4(skyes rabs): yi ni 'byung gnas bzhin// de gnyis ma du pho nya yis// sngon med rin chen tshogs bdag dang // grogs nyid mchog tu yongs rdzogs pas// mdza' ba'i gter ni tho ba par 'gyur// dam pa'i mdza' ba ring gnas
208a5(skyes rabs): kyang // mchog tu mi bzang grags pa bzhin// mi srun mdza' ba gnyer gnas kyang // brtan pa me yin rtsa 'bar bzhin// nam+ba zhig gzugs can snying po la// mchog gi go cha gse ra 'od 'bar// lha yi
208a6(skyes rabs): rin chen gyis mtshan pa// mi bdag u drA ya nas springs// dug mtshon mi rnams bsrung 'os pa// rnam bkra rin chen go cha ni// grogs kyis springs pa legs blangs nas// rgyal pos blon po rnams la
208b1(skyes rabs): smras// sa bdag de yis lugs bzang bzhin// lhag par mdza' ba go byed cing // thams cad gzung bar bzod pa yi// go cha 'di ni bdag la spyings// 'di la lan du sbyin 'os pa// de las lhags pa ngas
208b2(skyes rabs): mi mthong // phan dang gnod pa dag la yang // lan ni chung ba zug rngu yin// 'di las lhag pa cung zad gcig/ bskur 'os khyed rnams thams cad kyis// bsam par mdzod ces brjod nas ni// mi bdag
208b3(skyes rabs): byasam pa 'khrugs par gyur// de nas blo ldan blon po ches// yun+da rings bsams nas de la smras// dbyar gyi rnam pa zhe sa bram ze// rig kun legs par pha rol phyin// 'di las yon tan meng ba'i ste sna// rgyal
208b4(skyes rabs): po gcig kyang yod ma yin// gal te nus ni 'bad pa yis// de ni rab tu spring bar mdzod// gang zhig bcom ldan 'dasangs rgyas 'di// khyod kyi yul na nye bar gnos// lha rnams ngag gi gus gan kyi// thang
208b5(skyes rabs): ka de yi gzugs kyis mtshan// ma lus 'jig rten dge ba yi// me tog sor pa'i dpag bsam shing // ri mo rmi lam kun+da rtog la'ang // de nas bsod nams che bas mthong // zhes pa blon po'i tshig thos nas//
208b6(skyes rabs): de bzhin zhes pa blon po'i tshig thos nas// de bzhin zhes brjod sa yi bdag/ song nas bcom ldan la btud de// don de nyid ni rab tu gsol// de nas de yi rjes gnang ste// ri mo mkhan po mchog rnams la/
209a1(skyes rabs): bcom ldan sku gzugs bri ba'i las// mi yi bdag pos myur bar+ya bskos// rgyal ba'i sku ni lta byed pa// de dag gzugs kyis dbang byas nas// spobs pa dang ldan tshad dag ni//
209a2(skyes rabs): rab tu bzung bar nus ma gyur// de nas bcom ldan sku gzugs ni// dri med ras la 'phos pa dag/ gzugs bzang bsgom pa mngon shes des// de la blos yang dag rdzogs par byas// 'gro ba'i mig gi/
209a3(skyes rabs): bsod nams rnams// gzugs can yang dag bsags pa bzhin// sangs rgyas sku gzugs thang ka de// de nas sa gzhi skyong bas springs// gzugs can snying po'i lag rtags can// spring yig thang ka'i sngon
209a4(skyes rabs): byung ba// mi bdag u drA ya na ni// rab tu dga' bas rang gis bklags// bde bar gshegs pA'i zhabs pad bkod pa'i bsod nams nye gyur pa// skabs gsum 'grong gi khyad par rgya che mA ga d+ha yul nus/
209a5(skyes rabs): dge ba byas pa'i gzugs can sa yi bdag po gzugs can snying // chos kyi gnyen gyis sa gzhi'i thig le khyo de la rang smras pa// ri bong mtshan ma'i 'od ldan btsun sku gzun chags sdang dug ni nyams par byed//
209a6(skyes rabs): skyed pa yang dag zhi byed srid pa'i rmongs chen nad kyi sman dang phan pa dang // rab dang mngar ba'i bsod nams btsud len khyod kyi mig gi snod du rab blugs pa// 'di ni khyod laM rab springs skal ldan mgrin po'i bar
209b1(skyes rabs): du rab tu 'dod pas 'thung // dam pa'i las la rab tu sbyor zhing yon tan tshogs rnams 'dzin pa rtag tu slob// bya ba ngan las rnam par zlog cing brtan pa'i bde ba 'thob la mchog tu bskul// rgyun chad
209b2(skyes rabs): med pa nyid du bdag nyid kun gyis zol med phan pa bskye da byed pa// dam pa'i dge ba'i grogs kyis yid 'ong phan po 'di las mchog ni ci zhig bya// zhes pa'i spring yig grogs mdza' ba'i// bdud rtsal
209b3(skyes rabs): 'os don myangs nas// glang po la gnas thang sku yi// sngon du rgyal po rab tu song // blon bcas mdun na 'dron bcas de// mngon par dga' nas kun dga' las// gser gyi seng ge'i khri stang su// de ni rab
209b4(skyes rabs): tu bkram nas bkod// mdzes sdug bsod nams dag gi gnas// bde gshegs sku de mthong gyur nas// skye bos sangs rgyas rab rgyas la// phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshalu zhes pa smras// sangs rgyas mngon brjod
209b5(skyes rabs): thos nyid na// spu long gis pa rgyan dbyibs gyur cing // lha yi me tog char phab che// sa yi bdag po ya mtshan gyur// der ni bcom ldan spyod pa yi// bdud rtsi'i bsod nams thob nas de// chu 'dzin
209b6(skyes rabs): sgra yis mgrin sngo na dang // rab 'dod ldan pa mtshungs par gyur// rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis ni// rjes mi thun bzlog pa dang bcas pa// thang ka'i 'og tu mthong gyur nas// de yi rmongs pa rnam
210a1(skyes rabs): par grol// de nas sa bdag rgyun zhugs kyi// 'bras thob bden pa mthong ba yis// grogs la dge slong rdzongs shes pa'i// 'phrin gyi lan ni rab tu springs// de nas gzugs can snying
210a2(skyes rabs): po yis// bcom ldan 'das lnga gsol byas nas// kA t+yA ya na dge slong ma// ri ma zhes pa'ang de la springs// de nas mchod pa sgrub byed pa// mi bdag u drA ya na la// 'phags pa kAt+yA ya na des// der ni chos
210a3(skyes rabs): rnams bstan pa mjed// de yi chos ni bstan pa yis// skye bo rab mang 'dus pa rnams// rgyun dang lan cig phyir mi 'ong // dgra bcom 'bras bu'i gnas thob gyur// grong khyer dere ni rgyal dang ni// skar
210a4(skyes rabs): rgyal zhes grags khyim bdag gnyis// zhi slad de mthun rab byung nas// yongs su mya ngan 'asongs pa thob// dus kyi de yis gnyen rnams kyis// lus kyi 'jug tu mchod rten bsgrubs// de ming gis mtshan de lta
210a5(skyes rabs): yong // mchod rten phyil phyi la byung // btsun mo'i 'khor du dge slong ma// rim zhes ni bya bas kyang // rim gyis lha mo zla 'od la// rtag tu chos ni bstan pa mdzad// de nas nam zhi gas skyong ni// rtse dga'i khang
210a6(skyes rabs): par song gyur pa// mtshan ma shes pa de yi ni// 'tsho ba zhag bdun mtshams su rigs// de nas 'khor ba'i spyod tshul shes// nor 'dzin bdag bos de la ni// sngon la rab tu 'byung ba yis// dge ba'i
210b1(skyes rabs): gnasna thob rjes su gnang // legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba// mi bdag tshig gis dge slong mas// lha mo rab tu phyung ba'i lus// nyi ma bdun pa nyid la btang // rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams su//
210b2(skyes rabs): lha yi bu mo nyid du ni// 'phral nyid rab tu gyur pa de// rgyal ba yi ni nags su seng // der ni zla nya'o bzhin ras tsin+da// lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan pa des// shAkya thub pa mthong gyur nas// dga' bas dri
210b3(skyes rabs): yi zhabs lnga gtugs// lha yi me tog rab mthor mo// de la de bzhin grwashegs pa yis// gang gis bden pa mthong byed pa'i// chos ni bstan mdzad de song gyur// de yis mkha' la zla ba yi//
210b4(skyes rabs): gzugs bzhin bdag po'i grong khyer phyin// mtshan mo nyal ba bskyang nas ni// byang chub rab tu gsal bar byas// de ni tho ras rang gnas su// seng ba'i tshe na nor 'dzin bdag/ rang byung myangon par
210b5(skyes rabs): phyogs pas bu// gtsug phud can ni dbang bskur te// de nas blon po dag la de// skye dgu bsgrub pa'i phyir gtang nas// de ni mi bdag gzugs can snying // grogs po'i grong khyer dag tu song // gdun
210b6(skyes rabs): dong rnga yab dang bral ba// de 'ongs gzugs can snying po yis// rab btud mi bdag nyer spyad no// mdzes shing gtsang ba rnams kyis mchod// ngal ba bsos khri la 'khod de la// de dang phrad pas rab
211a1(skyes rabs): dga' zhing // dpal dang bral bsdu sdug bsngal ba'i// ya mtshan ldan pa de yis smras// mtha' yas kun gyi mgo bo la// rgyal po dga' ni ngal bso ba// brgya byin dag dang mtshungs pa
211a2(skyes rabs): khyod// 'di bzhin nye bar ji ltar gyur// rang bzhin bzhini ras me bral zhing // blo ldan glos ni skyes pa can// dpa' bo khyod kyi rgyal srid ni// gzhan gyis phrogs pa srid ma yin// zhes la glegs kyis dris
211a3(skyes rabs): lo des// 'dzum bcas de la ra bA smras pa// rgyal po 'byor pa thams cad du// 'gro zhing bdag la gzhan mi dga'// yul nyams myed las phyir phyogasde pas// sred dang bral ba bdag rang gis// dbang phyug
211a4(skyes rabs): longs spyod snod dgra ni// lhag ma bzhin du yang dag btang // dge ba'i grogs po khyod kyis ni// bde gshegs sku gzugs thang ka gang // phun slong rab tu springs pa do// bdag gri chags bral bla mar gyur/
211a5(skyes rabs): de ni khyod kyi bka' drin gyis// bcom ldan 'das kyi drung phyin nas// khyim nas khyi mo ni med nyid du// rab byung thob par bdag 'tshal lo// zhes pa grogs kyi tshig thos nas// de de bzhin zhes rnam bsams
211a6(skyes rabs): te/ de yi dben po la gus ldan// gzugs can snying pos de la smras// sa yau bdag po khyod kyi blo// dam pa mang pos bskur ba yang // 'khor ba las ni phyir phyogs pa// skal ldan 'di 'dra ji ltar skyes//
211b1(skyes rabs): cho ga shes 'byor pa thob gyur pas// skal ba bzang po mchog tu mdzes// yid ni chags bral gyis brgyan pa// sems can dag pa'i mtshan nyid yin// dam pa rnams ni 'khor ba nye bar zhi slad
211b2(skyes rabs): rmongs chen myu gu nyams byid pa// skye ba gzhan la nyer bsgrubs chags bral gnas ni galAM te yid la byid pa na// rgyal srid chen po gzi chen rdul bcas kyis ci bsgrubs dka' sgrub byed rnams
211b3(skyes rabs): kyis ci// longs spyod skad cig spyod rnams kyis tsi sdig ster sdug bsngal bde ba rnams kyis ci// gong gis nor mochog srogs las phangs pa'i nor ldan mA ni bde bla ga nyid du ga taMngo // gang
211b4(skyes rabs): zhig 'jig rtenA gsum pa 'dod kyang 'dod pa'i bde la phyir phyogs 'doms pa'i bla// gang gis kun rmongs sdug bsngal gyis gzir 'gro ba 'di ni rjes su brtsi ba'i gnas// bsod nams dag gis zla
211b5(skyes rabs): blo ldan rnams kyi zhi ba tsaM yang 'khor ba'i g.yon der 'gyur// zhes brjod pa gzugs can snying pos de// 'od ma'i tshul gyi gnas khrid nas// rab tu btud byas bcom ldan la// dwe yi byung ba'i mtha'
211b6(skyes rabs): rnams gsol// bde gshegs rnam pa mthong gyur nas// dga' bas yun rings bsams byas te// bdag nyid bya ba byas par ni// u drA ya na yis kyang bsams// mgo bo phyag 'tshal gyis
212a1(skyes rabs): 'brel bya// de yi lus la bcom ldan gyi// gzigs pa 'khor ba gcod byed ni// rab byung nyid dang lhan cig pas// de nas dge slong dngos po thob// lag na lhung bzed chos gros
212a2(skyes rabs): ldan// grong khyer du ni bsod snyoms bsrungs// skye bo ya metshun ldan par byas// gtsug pud can gyis rab dang zlas// chos kyi skye dgu bstangs byas nas// dus kyis chos min ma na 'dod cing // rnyog
212a3(skyes rabs): be dag dang ldan par gyur// gser 'od gsal ba'i glog dag ni// rnam par rol pa'i sprin phreng bzhin// phun sum tshogs pas su yi yang// dri ma tson du byed ma yin// hi ru ka dang b+hi ru ka/ blon chen dag
212a4(skyes rabs): gi chos min gyi// las la dga' zhing dbang ma gyur// khro ldan jo bo de btang gyur// de nas gnas su rgyal po yis// dbyug po tho ba blon por bcug/ sems kyi rjes 'jug mkhas pa yis// dman par
212a5(skyes rabs): rmugs bya d+ma lA smras// skye dgu rnams la mdza' bas yang dge chags// rgyal po gzhung ngun dag tu spro bar byed// g.yon can blon po rnams ni rang nyid kyi// grags pa rab tu sgrogs par byed pa yin// ga
212a6(skyes rabs): zhig rje bo'i don du ni// chos lo mi rtsi bde la min// don min grags min 'tsho ba min// de dag mchog tu gus pa'i g.yog/ nges par til mtshungs skye dgu rnams// rgyal po'i don byed ma bcag pas/
212b1(skyes rabs): ma yin ma nyams pas kyang min// ma gdungs pas min ma gzir min// zhes smras de dag rgyal srid kyi// bsam pa la ni rgyal pos bskos// chags pas spyod tshul ngan pa yis// skyabs med skye dgu gzhom
212b2(skyes rabs): par zhugs// sa yi bdag po blo gros ngan// rnam par mi spyod spyod tshul dran// sna chen bden po nyams pa'i tshe// skye dgu rnams ni ga la 'tsho// de nas nam zhog yun rings na// la mau du u drA ya ne yis//
212b3(skyes rabs): rang yul nas 'ongs tshong ba la// mi bdag yul 'khor gtom dag dris// de yis smras pa lha khyod kyi// sras po sa yi bdag po dag/ 'on kyang dam bI blo dang bral// blon po ngan pa'i dbang du song // de nu jo/
212b4(skyes rabs): bo'i bkra' yi skye dgu rnams// nye bar gdung ba rab rgyas ci yang gyur// gang gis da lta de ni yul ngan skyes// grong pa'i 'jig rten nyin dang mtshan mor gdung // gang na nyi mas mun pa spro byed gang na zla ba me
212b5(skyes rabs): char 'bebs// gang ni bdud rtsi las ni rab drag nag po brtsegs pa rab gsal skye// gang na skyob byed mi yau bdag pos skye dgu rnams kyi srog 'tsho 'phrog/ nyer 'tsho che ba rab rgyas de na tshe de dag ni su zhig nyan//
212b6(skyes rabs): mi bdag gis gdung skyo la bcags// tshong pa'i tshig ni bzod dka' ba// gdung ba'i rang bzhon do thos nas// brtse ba'i gtor des de la smras// bdag gi tshig gis 'di nas khyod// song la skye dgu dbugs
213a1(skyes rabs): dbyung mdzod// nga nyid 'ongs nas gtsug pud can// chosu la rab tu dgod par bya// zhes pa des brjod kun dga' ldan// tshong pa rim gyis rang yul du// song nas sngon du skye dgu
213a2(skyes rabs): rnams// dal bus dbugs ni dbyung ba bsgrubs// gtam de rab tu grags pa'i tshe// blon po dbyug po tho ba dag/ 'das pa'i sa skyong 'ong ba yis// skrag ste mi yi bdag la smra sa// legs pa rnams kyis
213a3(skyes rabs): skud pa'i gtam// rgyal po rgan po rab byu snang ba// rgyal srid 'bang pos don gnyer ldan// zhes pa lta cig kun tu thos// brtul zhugs dragra pos yongs su dug// gus paspyi longs spyod la mngon phyogs//
213a4(skyes rabs): rib byung ngo tsha thabs gcig tu// btang nas de slar 'ong bar 'gyur// rgyal po chags bral ma smin pas// 'phrul la nyid du gang btang ba// de rnams slar yad de dgra la// sngon las lhag par dga' bar
213a5(skyes rabs): 'gyur// 'jig rten lugs dang 'gal ba yi// yul rnams la ni khyad par du// srog chags yang drag 'dod 'gyur te// gnod pa'i zas la nad can bzhin// bde ba rab rgyas las yongs btang // gzhan
213a6(skyes rabs): gyi lag tu nye bar song // blun po dag gi a mra bzhin// phal cheraro thams cad dga' bar 'gyur// de slad gzi byin chen po'i gter// khyod ni khri las rab bskyod nas// gnas brtan ri bong can rnam bzhin//
213b1(skyes rabs): de ni rgyal srid spyod par 'dod// lus ni chos gos kyis skyo zhing // gos mchog mngon par 'dod ldan 'di// mgo zlum la ni rin chen gyis// mtshan pa'i cod pan 'dod par 'gyur// rin chen khang ba
213b2(skyes rabs): gas ba yi// longs spyod 'byor par rnams bskrun pa'o// rtse dga' btang nas nags kyi gnas// ngal dub ldan pa su yis bzod// ri dwags rmig pasna rtsub cing tshar mAs gtoms pa'i thang ka lA//
213b3(skyes rabs): gang zhig 'jam pa'i ma lo stan bder 'ong de dag ji ltar nyal// gang gis zla zer ltar bsil chang 'thungs de dag nags skyes kyi// glang po'i chung gis dro zhing de kha ba'i chu ni ji ltar 'thung // khyod la mi bzod
213b4(skyes rabs): bgrod pa ni// da lta nyid du nye bar gnas// lugs shes rnams kyi dang po'i gros// rgyal sras nges par ltung byed pa'o// de slang rgyal po ma 'ongs pa'i// sngon du jo bo khyod kyis gsod// phyi ma le'u ni 'ab
213b5(skyes rabs): pA dag/ gal te ma bsregs mar me 'joms// shes pa de dag tshig gis ni// sa bodag myur du 'khrugs par gyur// mi srun sprin gyis su yi yid// dri ma ldan par byed mi 'gyur// drogs bcas sog le
213b6(skyes rabs): bzhin du ni// rtsub mor gyur des der smras pa// bdag dang khyod gnyis mdun du ni// gnod pa 'di ni thun mong nyid// khyed gnyis nyid kyis khyad par gyi// tshul dang thabs la gnas pa'i blos// bya ba'i de nyid
214a1(skyes rabs): rnam spyod pa// gang rigs de ni bsgrub par mdzod// ces te rgyal pos spro bar byas// de dag gis mgyogs gsong byed btang // bsad phyir u drA ya na yis// mdun gyi lam ni rab
214a2(skyes rabs): tu bsdams// des kyang skye dgu yongs bskyab slang // bu la bsko bar brtson pa yis// bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs te// bdag 'gro'o zhes zhu ba byas// rang gis byas pa spyod mdzod ces// thams cad
214a3(skyes rabs): mkhyen pas rjes gnang nus// las kyi zhags pas yang dag drangs// de ni sgra sgrogs grong khyer song // lam du zon maud 'ong ba de// blon po gdug pas bskos pa yi// gau shed mo de dag rnams kyis bsang // skye
214a4(skyes rabs): bo ngon pas kun spyod bzhin// bsad pa de yi chos gos dang // lhung bzed sogs bzung de dog gis// blon po dag la mgu ba'i slang // rgyal po'i bya ba byas pa smras// sdig pas rab dga' de dag gis// mi yi
214a5(skyes rabs): bdag la rab tu bstan// pha yi chos gos khrag gis ni// sbags mthong 'phral la rmongs par gyur// dal gyi 'dud shes thob pa des// ji lta ro bdag nyid de myal ba ni// 'jigs rung gting du ltung ba yis//
214a6(skyes rabs): mya ngan de bzhin bla ma'i min// des smras dbang phyug sbrang rtsir chags// sdig par ltung ba ma mthong ba// bdag gis skye bo mi srun las// kye ma 'bras bu yang dag thob// kye ma kyi hud rten sa med// jigs
214b1(skyes rabs): rung dmyal ba'i gting du ni// mthon por 'dzegs rnams mi snyan dang // 'grogs pas 'phral la ltung byed gyur// gdug pa blon po'i blo glos kyis// bdag gis sdig chen 'di dag byas// da ni ltung bar 'gyur ba
214b2(skyes rabs): bladag/ gtsang byed kyis kyang gtsang mi byed// mnyam du ba dang dgra bcom dag/ bsad pa bdag ni su skyes sbrel// gong du bdag gis snod gcig tu// dug ni srog byed ldan par mtshungaste// ngogs med yab
214b3(skyes rabs): ni rgyan po dgra/ rab byung zhi ba bsten po la// chags las bdag gis rang gi sems// mtshon ni rnon po'i bye ba byas// gang zhig bsams pa nyid na 'dar ba skyed byed de ni thos par yang mi bzod// gang zhig
214b4(skyes rabs): mthong nas sems med rnams kyang mya ngan dag la rab tu gcags par byed// gung la 'gyod pa drag po'i mau yisau ma rungs rnams kyang 'jam po nyid 'gyur pa// de la'ang brtse med blo ldan rnams ni ral gri
214b5(skyes rabs): rnon po'i bya b+ha rab tu spro// zhes brjod sdug bsngalnga dag gos gdungs// bzhin ni cho nges mu tser ldan// mu rungs blon po de dag ni// nang du 'jug pa khro byi sa bzlog/ yon tan khyad par yong sde shes des/
214b6(skyes rabs): hi ru ka dang b+hi ru ka/ yab kyi sngon gyi blo na po gnyis// rab tu dang bas mgyogs par bos// de nas rgyal pos bsams pas rig/ mya ngan gyis ni skye bor gyur// dal gyis blon po gdug pa yis// de yi ma
215a1(skyes rabs): la mngon phyogs smras// lha mo khyod smras dpal dang ldan// rang bzhin gyis ni bsam pa drang // nang mi rab gcod rtsub mo yis// rgyal srid bsrung ba yong mi shes// phra ni rab tu byung ba yang /
215a2(skyes rabs): 'di yi rgyu la srid 'phrog tu 'ongs// bdog cag gnyis kyis rab zhi byas// de la ci zhig brjod par bya// gal te lugs kyi rgyud ldan pa'i// ri mi 'di dge ba'i ri mo min na// dge slong de yang rgyu la srid ni// mngon par 'dod de ji
215a3(skyes rabs): ltar ri mo// se badrag pha bsad khros pa yis// bdag cag gnas nas rnam par bskrad// rang nyid lta'ang mya ngan gyis// log par ci la yongs ma skyems// bdag cag gis ni legs byas byas// jo bo'i nyes byas nyid du gyur//
215a4(skyes rabs): dngos po kun la g.yog po rnams// gnod pa nyid dang ldan par 'gyur// rgyal po 'das la ci zhig 'gyod // gang byas de dag byas pa nyid// lha mo bosam pas ring pa'i bu// khyod kyis ci bskrad btang snyoms byed// de dge slo
215a5(skyes rabs): 'dra brjod thos nas// de drag tshig la gus pas bsgrubs// ta ra li kaM zhes pA yi// rgyal po'i ma dres dal bus smras// khyed kyi gros la nyer bskrun pa'i// rgyal pos sngon gyi byis pr-i yAs// dmyal bar ltung byararo byed pa'i las/
215a6(skyes rabs): 'di ni mtshams med gnyis su gyur// 'di yi pha bsad las skyes pa'i// mya ngan bdag gis bzlog par bgyi// dgra bcom pas 'i skyes sdug bsngal ni// khyod gnyis kyis kyang bzlog par mdzod// ces pa dal
215b1(skyes rabs): gyis de la bstan// sa bdag drung du de song nas// mya ngan gyis non zla ba ni// yongs zad lta bu de la smras// chos dang chos min rang bzhin gyi// rgyal po'i rgyal srid nyes pa mang // de la sdig dogs mya ngan gyis//
215b2(skyes rabs): bu khyod ci la yongasu gdung // gal te nges par pho bsad las// bla ma la byams khyod gdung la ni// khyod kyi sdug bsngal mi bzang der// di ring khyod la ngo tsha gtong // khyod kyi chos nyid pha de min// khyod ni gsang
215b3(skyes rabs): ba gzhan las skyes// rang 'dod zas dang bde bas bu// bud med rnams lo khrel yod min// zhes pa de tshig snyan min yang // dben par rgyal pos thos gyur nas// pa bsad sdig pa drag po yi// sdug bsngal
215b4(skyes rabs): ngag gi gdungs po btang // shar gyi ri bos nub kyi ri la sbyor ba'i bya ba rab tu byed// skad cig gis ni sa dang sa 'dzin 'bral ba'i rol rtsed rnam par sgrub// 'di dag 'phral la me ni chu las rnam spro de yang srig byed
215b5(skyes rabs): las// srid gsum dgra na bud med rnams kyi bsgrub bya min pa ci yang med// de nas dgra bcom bsad pa nyid// zug rngu lta bus gzir ba yi// mi bdag de yis las de ni// phyir bcos chos shes rnams la
215b6(skyes rabs): dris// de nas blo na ngan de dag gis// rgyal da seng skor rgyal mchod rten gyi// nang du byi la chung ngu gnyis// sha yi bslab pas chags byas nas// bkag par gyur kyang spyi brtol gyis// mi bdag 'dun
216a1(skyes rabs): sar+ya ra gzhugs te// gdung ba drag pos yongs gdung ba// rab zhi don gnyer de la smras// lha cig khyod ni rdzun ny+tsid kyis// sems ni mchog tu gdung bar byed// 'jig rten 'drin de ny-id du/
216a2(skyes rabs): thams cad dge ba'i dgra bcom med// gal te de drug bden pa na// mkha' la dang pa'i rgyal po bzhin// de dag rdzu 'phrul gyis bgrod pas// gzhan gyi gsod pa ji ltar srid// de slad dgra bcom yod min na//
216a3(skyes rabs): de bsang sdig pa ga la yang // gang na grong khyer yod min pa// de na mtshams kyi rtsod pas ci// gang dag khyim bdag rgyal de nga ni// skar rgyal dgra bcom gnas thob pa// de dag de lta rang rang gi/ mchod rten nang du byi lar
216a4(skyes rabs): skyes// de dag gsal bar mngon sum gyis// mthong la the tshom su zhig byed// gal te yid ches yod min na// rang nyid nges par cis mi lta// zhes pa brjod nas sa bdag yid// khyogs la 'phyang ba bzhin byos nas//
216a5(skyes rabs): mau srun de dag de dang ni// lhan cig mchod rten lta ru song // sngon med ltang mo 'bebs pa yis// de ni skye bo yang dag 'khrigs// rgyal po blon bcas lta brtson tshe// gdug pa'i blon po g.yon can gyis// sha l-i gom
216a6(skyes rabs): pas 'brel byas pa// rgyal dang skar rgyal zhes brjod pas// byi la chung ngu gnyis po dag/ dal bu yis ni mthong bar byed// rgyal dadong skar rgyal de dag gigos// gal te dgra bcom sgyu nyid na// bden pa de yis khyed gnyis
216b1(skyes rabs): kyisku// mchod rten la ni bskor ba'ang mdzod// sha ster tshe na de dag gis// de skad skad cher brjod pa yis// byi la de dag mgyogs par ni// nges par 'thon nas bskor ba byas// mI bdag rjes 'brang bcas
216b2(skyes rabs): byA yis// mthong nas 'phral la yid ches thob// khu tshur du ni rlung rdol pad+ma na mkha'i phyogs la ro mo dang // lho rtswa la yang spro dang sdud pa'i rol pa rab mang bkod pa dang // gzhon yang ci min phyugs dang byis
216b3(skyes rabs): blo la rmongs sgyu mig 'phrule dag/ skad cig yongs 'dris yi chos gzugs can g.yon can rnams kyis ston par byed// de nas bde gshegs bstan pa la// rgyal po mchog tu yid ches bral// 'phags pa kI tu
216b4(skyes rabs): dA mA~M ya~M bdag/ 'o ba mthong nAn+da sne ba hU~M/ tshigs blos slod pas 'jig smran gaushegs// dran pa snro m+b+ha dag gis bsgram+b+ha// de ni ga shegs pa mthod g+huR+Sha nas// gdug pa'i blun+da gcin
216b5(skyes rabs): dag gis rgyal la smras// rgyal po ba kra shes min pa'i sder// dge sbyong mgo reg sgra mdo 'di// lam du de ring bdag cag gis// mthong bas ci 'byung yong mo shes// 'di ni rgyam po sdig can gyi/ na
217a1(skyes rabs): bdag mi lta zhes brjod// khyod la 'di nAs skad cig gcig/ ring du song ste de ltar gnas// gzhung ngan khros pas de thos nas// mi bdag gis ni 'khor rnams la// phyag dar rdul gyi sbyar
217a2(skyes rabs): mo yis// ring du gnas 'di g.yogs zhes smras// gdug pa'i 'bangs ni de dag gis// rdul gyi spar mos g.yogs pa can// nang du zhugs pas bzlog pa'i slang // de yis mchog gi khang pa sprul// khro bas
217a3(skyes rabs): 'khrugs pa'i sbru la rnams dang // khrag ni 'thungs bya'i sdig dag kyang // hUM las 'jam pa nyid 'gyur te// sa yi bdag po'i 'byangs ma smin// de nas mi bdag song ba'i tshe// rdul zung brgya sa ga yogs de
217a4(skyes rabs): hi ru kA dang b+hI ru kas// sdug bsngal las mngon phyogs te smras// rgyal po ma rungs dran byed kyis// 'phags pa khyod kyis 'o brgya la thob// gang gis mdun du 'di mthong ba// bdag cag gi ni mig rnams snang /
217a5(skyes rabs): rmongs pa'i mun pa sdig spyod du// skye bo ngan pas mi bdag bsgyur// lus 'di mthong bas bdag cag kyang // sdig pa'i skal ba dag dang ldan// sa gzhi sdig mang gis gdungs 'di// blo mnga' khyod kyis btang bas
217a6(skyes rabs): sa// bzod dka' mi sra na gnas po ni// btang bar 'os par dza su mi 'dong // zhi ba zhi bar mi 'gyur bzod pa nyid ni nye bar zad mi 'gyur// khro ba rtsub mo'i skyon rnams dag gis blo gros la yang re ga mi 'gyur// ngan
217b1(skyes rabs): sems zug rngu dang mtshungs yid la mi gnas dam pa rnams dag la// 'jig rten na ni skye bo ngan pa rnam par spangs las bde gzhan med// dbang phyug nyid ni yon tan ldan rnams 'og lhung ngal dub nyon
217b2(skyes rabs): mongs ldan pa ster// zab mo nyid ni rab rib 'byung glan su 'jug srog gi tshugs rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed// mchog gyur de yang ma rungs gdug pa gya gyu'i sbrul rnams dag gis nyams byas pa// kye ma
217b3(skyes rabs): gang zhig skyon dang bral ba de ni mi srun la med khron pa bzhin// de dag tshig ni thos gyur nas// kA t+yA ya na tshon pos smras// gnod pa byas kyang bdag me khres// 'di 'dra las kyis bgrod pa yin// gang zhig sa
217b4(skyes rabs): bdag blun pa la// mi srun dang 'gregs skyon dag gis// 'jigs pa chen po nye bar gnas// 'di dag kho na bdagra sdug bsngal// 'di yi grong du dang po yi// nyin la rlung chen 'bab par 'gyur// gnyis pa la ni me
217b5(skyes rabs): tog char// de nas gzhan la gos kyi char// dngul gyi char ni bzhi pa la// lnga pa la yang gser gyi char// de nas rin chen char pa ste// rdul gyi tshor pa bdun pa la// de yis sa bdag gnyen dang ni// yul 'khor
217b6(skyes rabs): bcas 'di med par 'gyur// de slang khyed gnyis rin chen ni// mang po blangs nas 'gro bar bya// zhes pa de yi tshig thos nas// de bzhin zhes te de dag song // sngo bsangs hi ru ka yi bu// de yi nye bar gnas pa
218a1(skyes rabs): byas// b+hai ru kas byung bu mo nau// sngo bsangs can ma lag pas khrid// dge slong ma ni ri mA la// mngon phyogs gus pas 'di dag smras// 'phags ma bdag gis bu ma ni// rgud pa zhi bar mdzad
218a2(skyes rabs): khyod kyis// khyim gyi bdag po gdangs can gyi// khyim du yang dag bzhag par bya// zhes smra bu tsha gtad nas ni// blon po dgo ni rang khyim song // ri ma yis kyang bu mo blangs// gdangs can gyi ni gnas su song //
218a3(skyes rabs): de nas ji ltar dge slong gis// brjod de rim pas spyong du byu // ye shes skyon ldan shes rab kyis// de nyid ji lta bzhin du mthong // de nas nyi ma bdun pa la// rlon chen char ni bab pa'i tshe// blon po de dag rin chen
218a4(skyes rabs): gyi// gang ba'i gru bzung ma tshor song // de dag lho yi phyogs song nas// grong khyer gnyis byas he ru kas// he ru ka zhes de bzhin du// gzhan gyis b+hi ru ka tshal lo// nyi ma gzhan la rdul gyi char// chen po bab pas
218a5(skyes rabs): dmyal ba'i mgron// mi bdag gnyen dang yul 'khor dang // bcas pa rab tu nub par gyur// rgyal po dbyug pa tho bar bcas// sdig pa'i lhag mar gyur pa'i tshe// kA t+yA ya nas na mkha' las// blon po'i bu de
218a6(skyes rabs): khyor nas gshegs// grong khyer lha mo na mkha' las// dga' bas de yis rjes 'brangs pa// de yi bka' yis kar pa Ta'i// sha ra'i nags su gnas par byas// dege slong bsod nams mthu dang ni// blon
218b1(skyes rabs): bre'i bu de'i skal ba dang // lha mo yi yang byin brlabs kyis// grong de dpal dang ldan par gyur// de nas lha mo de yis der// kA t+yA ya na'i mchod rten byas// gang zhig da lta'ang lha ldan la// mchod rten phyug
218b2(skyes rabs): byed phyag 'tshal byed// de nas chos gosau gra zur la// 'tshal pa blon po'i bu khyer nas// 'phyang zhing kA t+yA yA na de// yul gzhan dag tu mkha' la so song // skye bo rnams ni ya mtshan las// 'phyang zhing 'phyang
218b3(skyes rabs): br-i su zhes brjod// der ni skye bo de dag rnams// 'phyang ba po zhes grags par gyur// skabs dor bud med sa yi bdag/ mtho ris dag tu song ba'i tshe// de yA bka' yis sngo bsangs de// mtshan shes rnams/
218b4(skyes rabs): kyi rgyal por byas// de nAs kA t+yA ya na yI [ऽ]/ sa tsan ka ma la der// dag pa'i chos ni bstan pa mdzad// bden mthong gus dang bcas pa des// bu yi dbyug pa blangs nas ni// chen po rnams kyis da
218b5(skyes rabs): lta yang // phyag bya dbyig pa'i mchod rten byas// de nas dal gyis mnyan du yod du// bzhed ldan kA t+yA ya nas phyin// rgyal ba mthong nas dga' ldan pas// dre yo zhabs la phyag 'tshal byas// u drA ya
218b6(skyes rabs): na bu yi gtam// der ni de yis rnam bshad pa// thos nas dge slong rnams kyis dris// thams cad mkhyen pas de la gsungs// rngon pa drag po'i zhabs shes pas// kar pha Ta nye nags tshal du// gal
219a1(skyes rabs): dang bcas pa'i rgya dag sngon// ri dwags bcing ba'i slad du bkod// 'khrul 'khor zhags pa ldan bkod nas// de srong tshe na rang srungs rgyas// ji ltar 'dod pa 'ongs pa yis// phyogs der rnam par
219a2(skyes rabs): bsten te gnas// de yi bsod nams mthu dag gis// ri dwags 'ching bar chud ma gyur// dag pa'i bdag nyid rnams mdun du// skye bos mi dge thob ma yin// de nas rngon pa 'ongs pas kyang // zhogs pa ri dwags
219a3(skyes rabs): mthong nas// khro bas long bas rang sangs rgyas// dug gis byugs pa'i mda' yis bsad// gzi brjid 'bar byed ltar 'ab ro ba// mda' yis phug par gyur da yi// mthu ni rmad byung mthong gyur nas// zhabs
219a4(skyes rabs): gnyis dag la de yis gtugs// de nas rngon pa bya min gyi// rgyu las mya ngan gyis gdungs pas// mda' dang rgyu ni yang dag btang // bdag nyid smod cing mya ngan byas// yongs su mya ngan 'das thob gyur pa// de yi
219a5(skyes rabs): gdung rus blangs nas des// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan sogs tshogs kyis// rtag tu mchod pa'i mchod rten byas// bsod nams de yis rngon pa ni// mi bdag u drA ya nar gyur// rang sangs rgyas ni bsad pa wa//
219a6(skyes rabs): lan yang bsod pa thob par gyur// khyim bdag kar pa kar gnas pa// nor dang 'bru sogs rgyas gyur pa// dga' bo zhes pa bu mo ni// rgyags pa'i ri mo zhes pa byung // nem zhig rgyags pas bran po des// khang pa
219b1(skyes rabs): phyags pa'i rdul rnams kyis// rang sangs rgyas ni lam nyid nas// byon pa rmongs pas rnam par g.yogs// de nyid kho na'i nyi ma la// yun rings bsams pas don gnyer ba// nu ma'i khur gyis gzir ba yis//
219b2(skyes rabs): bag mar slong ba'i skyes pa 'ongs// rang sangs rgyas kyis spyi bor ni// phyag dar rdul spar gtor ba las// bdag ni bag mar gyur pa la// nye zhes ming po la des smras// de nas de yi gtam dag gis// bag mar
219b3(skyes rabs): 'gro 'dod gzhon nu mo// rgyags pas rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi// mgo bo la ni rdul rnams gtor// srin bus zos rjes yi ge la// rab zhugs yid ches kyis rmongs pa// rtog dpyod med rnams 'gal ba yi//
219b4(skyes rabs): sdig spyod la zhugs de yi tshe// las de khyim bdag mkhas pa dang // sad pa zhes pas bzlog pa byas// bu mo de nyid gtsug bud can// mi bdag sdig pa ldan par 'gyur// de yi mau po gau tam sgrogs kyang //
219b5(skyes rabs): dge slong kA t+yA ya na 'di// ngan spyod dar ba bzlog pa las// khyim bdag de dag skyes pa ni// hi ru ka dang b+hi ru ka/ grong khyer nye bar gdung las thar// zhes pa bcom ldan gsung thos dge slong rnams ni rnam
219b6(skyes rabs): par dpyad nas kyang // dge dang mi dge'i las rnams 'bras bur yongs gyur bkra ba rab shes nas// mi srun skye bo'i tshig mtshungs dgra dang rtog dpyod dang mnyam bla ma dang // legs bcas dang mtshung
220a1(skyes rabs): gnyen ni 'jig rten dag na ci yang med par sems// zhes pa dge bya'i dbyung pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsamA gyi 'khri shing laswa/ u d+hA ya na'i rtogs
220a2(skyes rabs): pA brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// / gang zhig sa skyong 'byor pas rob bskrun rgya cher sbyin pa'i bsod nams las lhag pa// dam pa'i 'bras bu'i khur ni dbul po rnams kyi
220a3(skyes rabs): sbyin pa shin tu chung bas thob// chos dkar rnam par 'phel la dad pa phun tshogs dang ldan 'khor ba med pa ni// rnam par 'phel byed de ni sems dang nor dag dag pa nyid la rigs pa yin// rgyal ba rgyal byed
220a4(skyes rabs): tshal gyi ni// kun dga' rwa bar bzhugs tshe sngon// mnyan yod du ni khyim bdag dag/ bstan pa zhes bya nor chen byung // mkhas pa zhes bya de yi bu// legs bya dag la mkhas pa byung // nyams pa maud pa'i grogs pa

220a6(skyes rabs): mu gi skye bo zad byed pa// bslang bya slong byed mtshungs pa nyid// slong ba'i 'tsho ba chad pa byung // dge slong rnams ni nyam nga ba// mchog tu mi bzad dus der ni// bde bar gshegs pas mkhas pa ni/ bos nas rgyal byed
220b1(skyes rabs): tshal du chas// gser gyi phreng bas spras pa yi// rta yis bgrod par byed de la// yon tan rab rgyus mi bzad pa'i// g.yo can mngon du phyogs nas smras// slong ba'i don mthun slong ba yis// dpag bsam
220b2(skyes rabs): shing khyed phyogs su grags// bdag cag lnga brgya khyod la ni// bas mau pa gtang nas yang dag 'ongs// rgyan dang gos ni zur re dag/ bdeg cag so so yang dag 'dod// gal te phid na da lta nyid// thogs pa
220b3(skyes rabs): med par gnang bar mdzod// de yis 'di brjod dam pa yi// spyod ldan de ni rta las babs// de rnams legs par mchod byas nas// blo dang ldan pas skad cig bsams// gal te bcom ldan ma mthong bar// rang
220b4(skyes rabs): gi khyim du phyin pa na// bdud rtsi 'thung la nye ba yi// bgegs de bdag gis ji ltar bzod// slong rnams 'dod pa ma byin par// gal te khrel med phyin pa na// sbyin pa'i brtul zhugs rang nyid kyis// nyams
220b5(skyes rabs): pa 'di yang ji ltar bya// de ni de ltar sems pa na// klu yi rgyal po lhag ma rang // sa gzhi brtol nas yang dag mthon// slong rnams 'dod pa rab tu byin// klu yi rgyal pos byin pa yi// gos rnams dang ni rgyun
220b6(skyes rabs): rnams kyang // de dag rnams la byin nas de// zug rngu med bzhin mgyogs par song // des kyang ngo mtshar de mthong nas/ bde gshegs sgom pa'i bsod nam sa ni// don kun phun sum tshogs pa dag/ 'grub
221a1(skyes rabs): pa'i ma nyid yin par sems// de nas sems ni rab dang skyes// zhe sdang sdig pa rnam par nyams// de dag de dang lhan cig ni// bcom ldan 'das la lha ru song // de nas bcom ldan mthong

221b5(skyes rabs): rnams dman rnams la// rin chen rin chen min nyid gyur// khyekhyod kyis sngon ni rmongs pa las// legs byas tshogs ni ma byas pa// des na rin chen phung po 'di// khyed la sol ba'i phung por gyur// rin che na rnams
221b6(skyes rabs): ni 'bang nas brdung yang bsod nams zang pa las// du 'gro zhing sbrul po ldan pa las kyang nye bar 'ongs// nor rnams sgrub pa dag ni rgya tshe mya ngan mtshan me nyido// nar ni legs byis dag la rab zhugs rigs pa
222a1(skyes rabs): sems nyid do// de slad khyed kyis dge slong gi/ dge 'dun zas la sta gon mdzod// longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa'i tshogs// bdag gis khyed la phun tshogs bgyi// zhes brjod da yis
222a2(skyes rabs): nor dang zas// phun sum tshogs pa byin pa des// sangs rgyas la sogs dge 'dun rnams// de dag gis ni nyin cig mchod// dge 'dun ji lta bzhin mchod nas// skad cig smon lam de dag gis// bdag cag

222a5(skyes rabs): de yang // de las sol pa nyid du gyur// gzhon nu nyid kyi bsod nams kyis// gter gyi tshogs 'di spyad bya yin// zhes pa'i tshig ni bar snang las// de nas so yi bdag pos thos// gzhon nu nyid kyi tshig gi sa ni//
222a6(skyes rabs): gter rnams dag ni gter nyid du// slar gyur ngo mtshor bcas pa yi// mi bdag gis ni de khyim springaso// de nas nor rnams ma lus pa// gzhon nu bsam pa yangs pa yis// byin nas phun sum tshogs pa rnams//
222b1(skyes rabs): dbul po'i khyim du gnas par byas// de nas 'khor ba snying po med// rnam par dpyad phyir chags bral ba// brtan pa de yis mi rtag nyid// yang dag bsams nas pha la smras// yab cig dka' thub nags su bdag/
222b2(skyes rabs): 'gro ba re zhig gnang bar mdzod// skye ba brgya yi lha gra ma yis// 'byor pa 'di yi sau bdag nyon mongs// 'jig rten gsum gyi phun tshogs thob// gang du spyad bya nyid 'gyur pa// 'byung po kun gyi tshe yi ni// snod 'di shin
222b3(skyes rabs): tu chung ba nyid// gang zhig grang la rgyun tu bdag gis reg bya 'jam pa'i gos kyis g.yog bya zhing // gang zhig gdung la bdag gis dpal gyi dum bu bsol ba'i byug pas byug bya ba// gang gis don du dug mtshon
222b4(skyes rabs): me dang lag 'gro'i tshogs las mchog tu 'jigs pa thob// bdag gi lus 'di gnod pa dag las yongs su bsrungs kyang 'jig pa nyid du 'gyur// longs spyod las ni chags bral bdag/ dga' bo'i rab

223a2(skyes rabs): yis// las ni yang dag sgrub mthong ste// lus can rnams la ma yin no// zhes bsams bgrod pas mdun du ni// mda' mkhan dag gis mda' bsros shing // drang por byed pa mthong gyur nas// blo ldan
223a3(skyes rabs): mchog der rab tu bsamagyis// mda' ni sems med 'di dag rnams// gdungs pas drang po nyid 'gyur te// lus can 'khyogs po rnam dag ni// 'khor ba'i gdung bas kyang ma yin// zhes sems mdun
223a4(skyes rabs): du shing mkhan gyis// shing rta'i 'khor lo nyid byas pa'i// brtan pa'i gzugs rnams mthong gyur nas// slar yang yang dag sems par gyur// kye ma sems med shing rnams ni// bzo yi sbyor bas skad cig

223b2(skyes rabs): yis rang gi chos la bsdams// de ni ting 'dzin+d+ra la zhugs tshe// nor 'dzin 'dzin byed byed dang bcas// ma lus chu gau ter chu rlabs kyis// du ku la yi gos can g.yos// nges pa'i bsam gtan da
223b3(skyes rabs): shes nas// bgags med grub slad brgya byin gyis// phyogasu bsrung slad phyogs skyong nas// zla ba nyi mar bcas pa bskos// de nas bcom ldan kun mkhyen gyis// de yi dge rtsa sbyin pa las// grub pa1
223b4(skyes rabs): byar gnas pa dag/ mkhyen nas skad cig yang dag bas myas// 'di yi dgra bcom nyo ba la// gal te shA rI'i bu 'ongs nas// sgo ni rab tu brdungs pa na// bar du bgegs 'di the tshom myed// de nas de na
223b5(skyes rabs): 'ongs pa yis// mngon du bdag rang nyid song ste// sna tshogs dri ba la bsten pa'i// gtam gyis dus ni dbrog par bya// de ltar dgongs nas bcom ldan 'daste// rang nyid phyogs der byon nas ni// dge slong

224a1(skyes rabs): yis rgyun zhugs 'bras bu las// steng du lan gcig phyir 'ong gi 'bras bu thob nas// de nas dgra bcom 'bras bu thob// de nas gtam gyi 'jug tu ni// bAd gshegasu ga kye
224a2(skyes rabs): te rang gnas su// shA ri'i bu yi zhugs pa na// slob ma nyi ma bzhin du mthong // srid pa'i 'tshong pa rnams btang zhing // 'phral la thar pa de mthong nas// de yi grub pa dus bzhi brgyas// thob bya de
224a3(skyes rabs): yis bsngags// de yi dgra bcom gnas thob par// 'gro la grags pa dri thos nas// dge slong rnams kyis de yi gtam// dris shing bcom ldan rgyal bas gsungs// de bzhin gshegos pa bcomo ldan
224a4(skyes rabs): 'dus 'od srungs ba ra NA ser sngon// dge slong stong phrag nyi shu dang // lhan cig grong khyer pa rnams kyis// dad pas phul zhing gtsang ma yis// longs spyod yid 'ong thams cad kyis// mchod cing dus ni/
224a5(skyes rabs): ji snyed cig/ sems can phan par brtson pas bzhugs// der ni dge slong mchod la chags// khyim dang khyim du zhugs pa na// dbul po zhes pa'i dbu la po yis// shugs rings phyung nas rab bsam
224a6(skyes rabs): pa// gang zhig skal ba dman pa yis// dge slong gcig kyang 'gron ma gnyer// shin tu dbul las dge bo yis// bya ba btang bdag 'dra dman// ngag tshad tshig ni mtshams sbyor rnams la rigs pa
224b1(skyes rabs): yod min zhing // bya ba nyams zhing byed pa dang bral de nyid dman gyur pa// tha snyad kun las phyi rol gyur cing don dang bral ba yis// sgyu rnams bzhin du skyes bu rnams ni skye bos dor bya yin// 'di bsams
224b2(skyes rabs): me yis zil gnon cing // nor gyis dman nyid smod byed pa// de la lcags byas skul byed pa'i// las pas mngon du phyogs te smras// nor gyi sgo dman pa khyod kyis kyang // skyo ba gzhan du dge thob
224b3(skyes rabs): slad// ji zhig ltar yang dge thob slong ni// gcig kyang ci slad mgron mi gnyer// zhes pa de yis brjod pa nA// zug rjes zug pa slar bsnan bzhin// dge slong zhal zas mo 'byor pas// de ni mchog
224b4(skyes rabs): tu gdung bar gyur// tshang dpon khang par rdo zhig ltar// bkres par yongs gnyen de song nas// 'bad pas shing ni gtsang pa yis// las kyi rin gyis rgya shas thob// de yis chung mas dgra pA'i
224b5(skyes rabs): 'bras// de nyid du ni grus byas nAs// de yi glu rngan cha shas thob// gus pas rje bo dag la phul// de nas dad pas dge slong gis// zas ni brtson par brtson gyur pa// snying stobs dag pa de yo ni// rjesu
224b6(skyes rabs): sgrub byed brgya byin gyur// mdza' bo brgya byin gzugs bsgribs pas// lha yi bza' ba kha dog dang // dri dang ro ldan bsgrubs pa'i tshe// dbul pos dge slong rnyed ma gyur// 'byor ldan longs spyod phyug
225a1(skyes rabs): pa yi// grong pa rnams kyis sngon du ni// dge slong mgron gnyer sdug bsngal las// dbul po 'chi ba rtsom par gyur// nga la brtse bas bcom ldan 'das// 'od srung rang nyid mngon phyogs
225a2(skyes rabs): te// dag cing grub pa yongs mkhyen nas// zhal zas rab tu blang ba mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal zas bdag/ dbul zhes rgyal pos nor rnams kyi// rab tu 'bad pas gsol btab kyang // dbul pos nges
225a3(skyes rabs): bar khas ma blangs// de nas bcom ldan mchod byas te// de yis smon lamra rlab tu btab// yon tan nor ni yang dag rdzogs// dbul la drin pAr bdag gyur cig/ 'od srungs rang gi gnas gshegs shing // lha
225a4(skyes rabs): dbang mtho ris seng ba'i tshe// lha yi rin chen thams cad kyis// dbul po'i khyim ni khengs par gyur// de nas brgya byin bka' las ni// de yi khang pa skyed tshal mdzes// bi shwa karma sa rin chen gyis// ka bas
225a5(skyes rabs): rnam par brgyan par byas// dri med dbang phyug yang dag thob// de yis zhag bdun 'od srungs ni// dge slong kun dang bcas pa dag/ 'byor pa longs spyod rnams kyis mchod// gang gi khyim ni bud med bkres
225a6(skyes rabs): pa rid cing bu tsha ngu la slong rnams kyis// sgo na yongs dor khri stan sre mog phreng ldan g.yo med zur na sbrang bu sgrogs// byi la'i phrug gu dag ni thab tu nyal zhing ngu 'bod gzhan pa bzhin gyur pa// de yi dpal ni mi
225b1(skyes rabs): bdag chags pa'i gnas nyid dag gis su zhig mtshan mi byed// sbyin pa'i mthu ni bdud rtsi ltar// dag pa de yis dbul po ni// skye ba gzhun du mkhas pa nyid// thab nas dgra bcom nyid du gyur// de ltar kun rigs
225b2(skyes rabs): yon tan la gus pas// mkhas pa'i skye bo snga mar byung ba gsungaso// rnam dag sbyin pa'i bsod nams de la 'os// nges par bzung nas dge slong tshogs des bsngags// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub
225b3(skyes rabs): sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsamaM gyi 'khri shing las// mkhas pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / snying stobs kyis ni nyi ma'i 'od zer mun
225b4(skyes rabs): la bzhin gsal// chos dag gis ni rin chen tshogs rnams mkha' las 'bab par 'gyur// brten pa yis ni rgud pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gro/ sbyin pa yis ni phyogs rnams longs spyod skal ba bzang por 'gyur
225b5(skyes rabs): mnyan yod rgyal byed tshul du ston// bcom ldan bde bar gshegs pa yis// dge ba rab tu rdzogs rnams la// tshes ni rab tu bstun pa mdzad// sngon gyi dus ni gzhan dag la// skye bo tshe lo brgyad khri'i tshe// dpal ldan
225b6(skyes rabs): gser ldog ces bya ba'i// sa yi bdag po byung bar gyur// de yi grong khyer gser zhes pa// brgya byin 'chi med ldan bzhin du// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang yin kyang // bzhugs gnas yid du 'ong bar gyur// 'dren par
226a1(skyes rabs): 'os shing grags pa dkar// mdzes par zhugs shing yon tan rigs// gang gis mu tig dro shul bzhin// skye dgu'i bya ba snying la zung // skye dgu'i las kyi rnam smin+da gyis// chur med mchog
226a2(skyes rabs): tu mi bzad cing // skye dgu rnams la 'jigs ster ba// de yi grong khyer dag tu byung // snying stobs bstan pa 'phrog byed cing // thams cad yongs su gdung byed pa// char med de ni sa 'dzin gyis// yid ni yongs
226a3(skyes rabs): gradung rgyu nyid gyur// btso sI thabs thams cad nyam sdu pa des// blon po'i gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor ni// bsam paso g.yo ba myed mdun du// shin tu yun rings bsams nas smras// bcos thabs med pa'i char
226a4(skyes rabs): med ni'o// nye byar lhung 'di skye dgu rnams// bdag gi 'bad pas yongs bskyang ba// byas pa 'bras bu myed par byed// swa sbyong sdig pIs skye dgu rnams// mchi ma'i char ni ra bya 'bebs shing // 'byor med
226a5(skyes rabs): gsal byed phyogs rnams kyis// char ni nges pasa? 'gyur// skye dgu 'jig sa pa tshol gang // rgyal pos skyob paur mi bye da pape// dwe yi zu ru phud cod pan 'dzin// gsal bar zlos garA lta bu yin// gaunga? tshe rgal
226a6(skyes rabs): bos 'gro la phan// de tshe rgalo pos 'gro la phan// de tshe 'jig rten rdzogs ltan dus// gang tshe rgyal pos 'gro mi phan// nges par 'jig rten rtsod ldan dus// mi bdag rnams kyi sdig pa'i las ni skyabs med skye
226b1(skyes rabs): dgu mu ges nyen gyur cing // mi mthun phyogs ltung mngon sum mtshon pas 'jig cing nad dang sdug bsngal nye bar gnas// rab rgyas nyon mongs dag gis shin tu nyam thag ma bsnams kyi hud ces pa sgrogs//
226b2(skyes rabs): shin tu mi spun mdza' bos bslangs rnams mye dran byed cing mdza' gcugs med par 'gyur// de slad bdag gis skye dgu rnam so// mtha' dag mdzod kyis bsrung bar bya// rgyal po spyi dgu yongs skyob pa// bsod
226b3(skyes rabs): nams rin chen rang bzhin gter// zhes brjod de yi sngo rang gi ni// mdzod dang bang ba la sogs kun// rtag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyis// longs spyod nye bar spyad byar byas// de nas de yi zas kyi cho gros// dus kyi mu
226b4(skyes rabs): ge drag po yis// 'god pa che bas skyes bu ni// gcig gi zas kyi lhag mar gyur// de nas gnas skabs de la ni// nyi ma'i 'od can rang sangs rgyas// na mkha' los ni mngon phyogs te// de la zas ni bsrung ba mdzad
226b5(skyes rabs): nges pa'i the tshom de la nI// bdag nyid kyis ni srog gi gzungs// me rtags ded blo ldan des// de dag thams cad do la phul// dad pa can nges rang srog gi/ 'tsho bas mgron du byas pas de'i// de yi snying stobs dang
226b6(skyes rabs): tshul nyid// bsngags shing mkha' la rab tu gshegs// de nas mkha' la sprin phreng chu sa can// gnyis 'thung tshi la bung ba'i phreng bzhin dang // nub phyogs bu mo'i 'gram par a ga ru// nag po'i dog pa
227a1(skyes rabs): lta bur rab tu brtsams// nam mkha' bar snang dag gis mtha' dang ni// ut+pal sngon po rab rgyus nags kyi mdungs// bung ba'i chu yis bzhin du sprin gyi tshogs// ro dang ldan pas g.yogs gyur rnam
227a2(skyes rabs): bar mdzes// de nas zhag bdUn+tu sa lu skye dgu rnams/ 'dod pa'i kha zis ma lus char du bab// de yis 'og tu 'bru la sogs pa'i char// de nas rim gyi rin chen tshogs rgyar yang // de ltar legs byas phun tshogs la dga'
