227a3(skyes rabs): swA yaM bdag po drug giser mau dag don sa bdag kun gyi tsid bAn nor bu bzhin// mchog tu mdzes shing s+thA bI dgu rnams kyi srog ni bsrung bas mdzes/ gang phyir skye bo dam pa'i mthu ni gzhan don ra sgrub byed// ga zhigs
227a4(skyes rabs): yi bdag po gser mdog de// de lta nga nyid sgyu yi bdag nyid 'di// de skad gsung+yas nas bcom ldan rgyu la baM yis// blo ldan drum pa rnams la chos bstan mdzod// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems
227a5(skyes rabs): dpa'i rtags pa brjod d+ma ga bsam gyi 'khri nang las// gser mdog gi rtogs pa badz+rodI pa'i yul 'dab ste/ ni badz+rad+hU gsum par/ gzhan la pan+d+ha pa 'je bsngo pa'i mthu dong ni// kun+da gyi
227a6(skyes rabs): nyer 'tshe 'byor pa chen po ste// 'bras bu cher 'os 'di dag dge rnams kyi// bsod nams myu gu'i dang po'i 'bras bu yin// rgyal byed tshal gyi kun rar ston// rgyal ba bzhugs shing mngon dgyes tshe// dpal ldan khyim
227b1(skyes rabs): bdag lha yi rje// zhes pa mnyan yod dag na gnas// bu khyod kyis ni khengs ldan de'i// bu ni gser gyi lag gyur de// gang gi lag gnyis rmad byung ba// gser gyi rang bzhin dag tu 'gyur// de yis lag gnyis dag la
227b2(skyes rabs): dngul// snga dro snga dro 'bum phrag gnyis// rab tu skye ba gong gis ni// slong ba'i dpag bsam shing du gyur// de yi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams// dus kyis yongs su smin gyur pa// rab gse la dben pa chen po yis// rgyal
227b3(skyes rabs): ba la ni gus pa skyes// de nas rgyal byed tshal du de// song nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// mthong ste kun dga' ldan pa yis// de yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal byas// bcom ldan gyis kyang 'khor ba yis//
227b4(skyes rabs): bdud rtsi'i glegs po dge ba yi// pheM nya gzigs pa de la gtad // ston bres gzigs pa nyid kyis de// kun rmongs rab ri bi rab spangs pa// nyi mu'i 'od kyis pad+mo ni// rab tu rgyas pa lte bur mdzes// de nas bcom
227b5(skyes rabs): ldan 'das kyis kyang // de la dam chos bstan pa mdzad// gang gis chos kyi rang bzhin spyan// mi dman snang ba rab tu snun// sngon gyi bsod nams yongs smon pas// chags bral bag chags sad gyur pa// shes
227b6(skyes rabs): rab dri ma med pa des// phyag 'tshal kun mkhyen la gsol pa// bcom ldan skyabs thob skyabs su 'os// nyon mo ngas ma lus nyams pa'i slad// srid pa 'phrog pa'i rab byung ni// bdag la rab tu grub par
228a1(skyes rabs): mdzod// sems can rnams kyis tshe srog g.yo// lang tsho gzhon pa de bas kyang // glog ni 'khyug pa bzhin du g.yo// de bas kyang ni 'byor pa 'di// zhes pa smra zhing chags bral la// de yi
228a2(skyes rabs): lus la pad+ma gshags kyis// rjes su bzung ba las skyes pa'i// rab byung rang nyid ltung bar gyur// chos go/ sa dmar pos rab gsal ba'i// chagaso bral nyid na dri yis bzung // lhung bzed bzung bas
228a3(skyes rabs): slar yang ni// 'khor ba'i snod nyid rab tu btang // dge slong rnams kyis de yis ni// rma da byung grub ste mngon sum mthong // de yi sngon byung bcom ldan la// dris shing des kyang rab gsungs pa// rgyal po kri ki
228a4(skyes rabs): zhes pa sngon// ba ra NA sir de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan 'od srungs zhes bya ba// yongs su mya ngan 'das gyur tshe// de yi gdung ni rab sbyangs nas// mchod rten rin chen rang bzhin dag/ mtho ris snyog nus
228a5(skyes rabs): bsod nams ni// gzugs can bzhin du mtho bu byas// de le mchod pa yongs 'dzin cing // bya ru 'dzugs par byed pa'i tshe// bzo bo kan ta lo zhes byas// gzugs rnyan gnyis ni rnam par bkod// dang byi'i sems
228a6(skyes rabs): ni dag pa yi// bsod nams chung ngu shin tu che ba des// da lta gser gyi lag pa ni// 'dod par bya ba chen po thob// 'jig rten du ni rab grags dkar po bdud rtsi'i spun drung du// gtong ba'i yon tan drag po dang ldan
228b1(skyes rabs): 'byor pa rab tu rgyus gyur pa chu shi nga pa gnas pa khyen gi bya 'aM kho na dri med yid kyi dad pa dag pa kun spyod yin// bsod nams mthu ldan gser gyi lag pa yis// mthu ni de ltar rgyal bas pa shrad pa dgo/ thos pa
228b2(skyes rabs): nyid na dge 'dun ste// de ga' dang gus dang yA mtshan dbang du gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// gser gyi lag pa'i rto/
228b3(skyes rabs): pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog rgyal pa dran pa ni// skye bo ngan pa'i bzod dka' dug 'dzin dang // shin tu 'jigs rung khron par
228b4(skyes rabs): lhung gyur pa'i// skye bo rnams kyi rtun ser gyur pa yin// grong khyer rgyal po'i khab ces par// sa 'dzin bya rgod phung po yi// ngos la sngon tsho bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par gyur// skabs
228b5(skyes rabs): der bu la byams pa yi// rgyal po gzugs can snying po nyid// de yi bu ni ma skyes dgra/ gdug pa byed par gyur pa yis// grogs po sdig pa dang ldan pa// lhas byin gyi ni gros bzhin du// 'jigs rung mun can brtson
228b6(skyes rabs): khang ni// rgyu ba med par rab tu bcug/ bkres pas nyen pa de la ni// btsun mos zos dag btson khang du// gsang nas rab tu 'jug par byas// de bsad 'dod des shes nas bzlog/ sa yaM bdag de shin tu rnying // sngo
229a1(skyes rabs): zhing dri ma med ldan par gyur// dus min sprin nag gis gzir ba'i// nag po'i phyogs kyi zla ba bzhin// phalnga cher mnyes ga shin sems ldan pas// mchog tu rgud pa'i mdza' mo ni// gdung
229a2(skyes rabs): bcas sred ldan ma bzhin du// shin tu dam par 'khyud par byed// bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i phyogs su ni// mya ngan gyis gzir nges phyogs te// thul mo sbyar te spyis btud nas// ske da gdangs zhan par rab smras
229a3(skyes rabs): pa// dmin par 'don pa la brtson pa// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems// rin chen dgra bcom chen po nyid// bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal po skye tshogs skye ba yis// nyon mongs rab tu zhi ba'i rgyu//
229a4(skyes rabs): 'jigs rung 'khor ba rgya mtsho yi// zam stegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gzi brjod rnam par dug/ snying rje bdud rtsi'-i rgya mtsho ste// sems can kun gyi gnyen gtsog po// rtag tu sang la phyag 'tshal lo//
229a5(skyes rabs): zhes pa bsod nams me tog las// 'khrungs shing gus pa'i bdud rtsis bran// bstod pa'i dog pa bde gshegs kyis// snyan du 'os pa de yis byas// de yis nyon mongs sdug bsngal gyi/ rang bzhin skabs mkhyen
229a6(skyes rabs): kun mkhyen gyis/ 'ching ba'i khang pa'i bu ga yi// snang ba dag gis tshim par byas// de ltar gyur pa ma skyes dgras// shes nas dogs pas 'khrugs gyur pa'i// pha yi btson khang dag gis ni// bug pa shin tu chung
229b1(skyes rabs): ba'ang bkrag/ de nas gdug pa'i btson srung gis// de yis bka' las spu gri yis// dam du bcings pa de yi ni// rkang pa rnam par bcad pa byas// drag po'i sdug bsngal nyon mongs kyis// mchog tu gzir ba'i
229b2(skyes rabs): sa bdag nges// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal zhes// gdung ba'i tshe ji ldan pas brjod// de nas bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen// mdun du mngon sum nyid gshegs te// brgya byin gyis bshams gdan
229b3(skyes rabs): la bzhugs// thugs rje nyid kyis der bka' stsal// rgyal po ci bya mi bzad pa'i// las kyi lugs ni 'di 'dra yin// dge dang mi dges rab bsgre na 'bras// spyod pa min par yod mi 'dzad// chags sdang dug gis
229b4(skyes rabs): dkrigs gyur cing // sna tshogs gdung ba bzod dka' bla// snying po med pa'i 'khor ba na// sdug bsngal 'di lte snying po nyid// rgud pa nyams pas nyam thag cing // kun nas nyon mongs rdzogs dus su// 'khrug pa med
229b5(skyes rabs): pa'i chags bral la mi// brten pa kho na yongs skyob yin// 'khor ba 'jigs rung nags kyi nang na rab tu rgyas gyur pa// sdug bsngal ma yi gdung ba 'phro ba rab rgyas du ba bzhin// slar yang rig par gyur pa
229b6(skyes rabs): min pa legs byas ldan rnams kyis// mig ni mchi ma'i chu yi thigs kyis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po longs spyod re ba thong // sdug bsngal 'di la bstan pa brten// 'khor ba'i spyod tshul thams cad
230a1(skyes rabs): ni// yongs su 'gyur pa 'gal ba can// lus kyi mjug tu da lta nyid// khyod la dge ba nye bar gnas// zhes brjod de ni dbugs phyung ste// bcom ldan rang gi gnas su gshegs// gzugs
230a2(skyes rabs): can snying po'ang lus kyi mthar// de dus nyid na mtho ris su// dpal ldan rnam thos sras kyi bu// rgyal ba'i khyu mchog ces par gyur// pha ni srog dang bral ba dag/ ma skyes dgra yis shes gyur nas// de yi lus ni/
230a3(skyes rabs): sbyangs te// rang gis nyes par byas pa smad// de sems drag po'i sdig pas gdungs// spyod tshul ngan pa sa sun phyung ste// phyi nas gdung ba'i me la der// dag pa'i bye ba byed pa bzhin// de sa bsams kye ma kun
230a4(skyes rabs): rmong sa las// dbang phyug gis rgya gos sred ldan blo// tshul dran bdag ni kha smab tu// sdig po'i g.yang la lhung bar gyur// thos pa shes rab kyis dbul zhing // rang nyid bde bar rmongs gyur pa// mi srun bsngags rjes
230a5(skyes rabs): zhugs pa rnams// ba sam pas lus ni gdung bar byed// rten sa med pa'i sti ga pa yi// 'dam du lhung zhing nyams gyur pa// bdag med bdag la rgyal ba ni// yang dag dran pa skabs 'gyur// de ltar yun rings
230a6(skyes rabs): bsams nas de// bde bar gshegs pa'i drung song ste// ngan pa byas la rmod byed cing // mchog tu yang dag zhum par gyur// der ni bdag nyid mi gtsang bar// khas len khrol dang bcas pa des// sdig pa reg
230b1(skyes rabs): bus 'jigs pa bzhin// ring nas rgyal ba la phyag 'tshul// ngan byas lus la yang dag chags// gsal bar byed cing 'dar ldan pas// mig ni mchi ma dang bcas des// kun mkhyen la ni yongs skyob zhus//
230b2(skyes rabs): yongs gdung sdig pa byas pa bapad+mag/ dmyal po'i me ni bde bar+ya gaunas// thugs rje'i rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das// khyod nyid la ni skyabs su spong // grwa gnyis dmar ba khyod kyi spyan// pad+mo'i 'od ldan ga~M gI bzhin//
230b3(skyes rabs): dri ma 'khru bzod dgu byed pa// 'di yis bAdag la reg par mdzod// mi srun gros kyis rab zhugs shing // bag med spyod tshul ngan pa can// sdig can 'byor bA la chags pa// bdag gis pa ni rnam par bsad
230b4(skyes rabs): ces pa che de ldan de yi// tshig thes de bzhin gshegs pa yis// de yi sdig rdul dag bya'i slad// bsod nams dbya nga sde can rab tu spros// rang las kyis bzhin mi srun pa/ rgyal po gnod pa ma bsams pa/
230b5(skyes rabs): khyod ni pha bsad la bskulnga t+ye// nyam nga'i sdig par lhung bar gyur// sdug bsngal de des spyod byi zhing // khyod kyis kyang ni sdig pa thob// sa sbyong de dang khyod kyi 'dri/ myong bar bya ba mtshungs pa nyid// rang gi lAs ni
230b6(skyes rabs): rib bkod pa// dpral ba'i ngos la gnas pa dag/ rdo yi du me bu'i ri mo bzhin// mi rnams kyi ni g.yo ma yin// khyod ni mi srun pas bskul nas// sdig pa'i las ni byas pa yis// dge legs bdud rtsi nye ba
231a1(skyes rabs): ni// rang gi lag pas 'phangs par gyur// glal te khyod la da lta yang // sdig gzhom phun tshogs thob 'dod pa// yod na bsod nams blo gros mdzod// de yang zhi las bdag nyid la'o// mar me'i
231a2(skyes rabs): spyod tshul bde ba bskyed// 'tshe byed grags pa rab tu 'bar// be dud rtsi'i rab tu byed pa 'di// legs pa dang 'grogs dam pa'i spyod// rjes su 'gyod pa'i myes gdung dang // dam pa rnams dang 'grogs pa dang // yang
231a3(skyes rabs): dag bsgrags dang sbyin bu yis// lus can rnams ni sdig nyams byed// snod ni gats+tshid byed yon tan sdong bu nges par zad mi byed// mdza' ba'i snum ni mi 'phrog dri ma yang ni skyed mi byed// skyon mtshan mjug tu rab mdzes
231a4(skyes rabs): g.yo ba nyid ni 'dzin mi byed// dam pa dang 'grogs legs byas khong par mar me ci yong yin// yon tan ldan pa'i tshogs la rgud pa 'dom sa mkhas mtshan mo'i skad tsog mtshungs// skye bo'i 'dren byed rnams kyi
231a5(skyes rabs): bya ba mtha' dag tu rab tu 'gog par byed// shin tu mnyamo dang mi mnyam gnas la gnas shing snang ba yongs zad las// rmongs pa chen po 'byung ba skyed byed mun pa dang ni mi srun 'grogs// rgyal po dal bu dal
231a6(skyes rabs): bu yis// dus kyis sdig pa zad gyur nas// dben pas snang bar byas pa yis// rang sangs rgyas su khyod 'gyur ro// zhes pa bcom ldan rgyal ba yis// brtse bas de ni dbugs dbyung mdzad// ltung la lhag par dam pa
231b1(skyes rabs): rnams// snying rje byams pa'i spyan dang ldan// de nas bde gshegs la btud de// mi bdag rang gis gnas su song // sdig pa'i khur po chen po ni// yang ba nyid bzhin rnam par rig/ dge slong rnams kyis de song
231b2(skyes rabs): tshe// de yi las kyis dge mtshan las// swa skyong gi ni sngon byung mtha'// dris shing kun mkhyen gyis bka' stsal// ba ra NAM sir tshong dpon gyi// bu bzhi dag ni byung gyur te// dpal ldan bsdams pa dag bral zhing //
231b3(skyes rabs): gdung med rtse dga' la brtson pa'o// nam zhig bde bas myos gyur cing // phan tshun kyal ka'i gtam gyis gnas// lang chos 'phyar ba de dag gis// rang sangs rgyas ni byon pa mthong // de mthong rnam par sbeng ba skyes
231b4(skyes rabs): zhi dul smod byed phu bo ni// sun da ra ka zhes pa yis// 'dzum bcas spun zla rnams la smras// btung bas myos pas dge slong ni// chos gos lhung bzed rtags can 'di// srog dang bral ba bsgrub po zhes// 'di ni bdag
231b5(skyes rabs): gi yid la snyom// g.yo ba las des 'di brjod che// gnyis pa kun da ra zhes pas// smras pA bdag ni dge slong 'di// chu la 'phangs te bas da bar 'dod// de nas gsum pa sdig pa can// sun da ra ta zhes pas
231b6(skyes rabs): smras// dge slong 'di nyid mgyogs par ni// kha khyer dag las 'phang bar bya// bzhi pa gdug pa'i blo gros can// kan d+ha ra zhes bya bas smras// dge slong rkang pa rang gis ni// spu gris lag pa med par bya// zhes pa skra
232a1(skyes rabs): zhing de dag rnams// sdig pa yid la 'dod par gyur// gang gis rang 'dod mtshungs pa'i 'bras// de dag skye ba gzhan la thob// chags pas long bas nor mthong ste/ khro bas long bas nor
232a2(skyes rabs): mthong ste// khro bas long bas dgra nyid do// 'dod pas long pas 'dod ldan ma// dregs pas long bas ci yang min// nor gyis ra bo bskyed rnam 'gyur can// bdag nyid mi sdom rtog spyod dman// rgyags pa rnams
232a3(skyes rabs): kyi kun dga' ni// nyon mongs rtsa ba nyid du 'gyur// rgyu med khro bar byed cing rgyu med rab tu 'phar bar byed// rgyu med mdza' bar byed cing rgyu med kun tu khas len byed// nges par rmongs pas bcom pa phan dang
232a4(skyes rabs): mi phan dpyod med cing // mchog tu tshim pas mi yi phyugs rnams rgyags dang bcas par gyur// sdig lI sa tshong dpon bu thub bo// de nyid skye ba gzhan la ni// shAkya shA ri rgyu zhes pa// chang 'thungs nas ni nyam
232a5(skyes rabs): lo gsal rgyal yang // bu yi bskrad nas bsad par gyur// bzhi pa gzugs can snying po 'di// bu yis brtson du btsongs nas bsang // skye dang ldan pa'i nor bzhin du// las ni rab ldan
232a6(skyes rabs): spyod par byed// de ltar rmongs pas bcom pa'i dam pa dam mon rnams kyis 'dir// bde ba med pa'i las ni 'phral nyid rnam par bsgrubs pa dag/ tshul min nye bar gnas pa de ni mchi ma'i chu dag gis// mig rdzo
232b1(skyes rabs): mya ngan mi chung dbang dang bral bas spyod par byed// gzugs can snying po'i skye ba snga mar rab zhugs byung ba'i tshul// mi bzang dug gi rnam smin 'di dag bde gshegs kyis gsungs pa// 'dun sar dge slong
232b2(skyes rabs): rnam mang dag gis gsal bar thos gyur nas// gdung pa brgya yis mtshan min sun phyung sems nyid yin par sems// zhes pa drag ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag
232b3(skyes rabs): bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ ma skyes dgras pha bsad pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// // mi spun mun pas 'phrol la long ba re byas gyur cing // dpal 'byor rnam par
232b4(skyes rabs): gnas dang bral bar rab bskrun kyang // nyi mu nga'i gnas dang skabs mtshan mo 'das nas pad+ma bzhin// slar yang yon tan ldan pas rang rig phun tshogs 'thob// bde gshegs mnyan yod rgyal byed kyi// skyed
232b5(skyes rabs): mos tshal na bzhugs pa'i tshe// lhas byin yongasu snang ba yi// rtsod pas khyab pas rnam bsams pa// shAkya'i rigs las skyes pa'i mi// bdag ni spun dang mtshungs shing mnyam// bsod na mos mothu yis
232b6(skyes rabs): 'gro gsum gyis// mchod bya nyid ni rgyal pos thob// de slad de yi tshe ba ni// rab tu gzhom la bdag 'bad bya// gang phyir nyi ma ma nub tshe// gzhan gyi gzi byin gsal ba med// yid ni nga rgyal gyis mtho ba//
233a1(skyes rabs): rnam shes dag dang mthu dang ni// rigs dang dka' thub dpal dag gis// pha rol khyad 'phags bzod ma yin// dug ni rang gi sen rtse la// gzung nas de la phyag 'tshal te// brtan bur
233a2(skyes rabs): rkang pa la mnan pas// nges par phug la gtang bar bya// de ltar sdig pa bsams byas nas// sdang ba'i dbang gyur mi sran pa// de yis skar rgyal la sogs pa'i// gnyen rnams la ni 'di skad smras// di ring bde/
233a3(skyes rabs): gshegs gzu bo yi// zhabs la rab tu dang ba'i slad// gdug pa gnod pa byed pa'o// sdig pa ci ldan bdag gtug go/ zhes smra gdug pa'i blo can de// rjes mthun stir byed de dag rnams// kun dang lhan
233a4(skyes rabs): cig rgyal ba ni// rgyal byed chal bzhugs lde ru song // der ni bcom ldan mthong gyur nas// ji snyed nye bar des phyin pa// de srid bde ga ni bsregaso zhes// rkang ba sprug cing sgra tshor smras// 'tshe ba'i rnam rtog sdig
233a5(skyes rabs): pa ni// rdo rje lta bus yang dag bcomAM// skad cig de la dmyal ba'i med// lus dang bcas pa lhung bar gyur// 'jigs rung dmyal bar lhung ba de// 'phral la kun mkhyen gyis gzigs nas// de spyod thos pas
233a6(skyes rabs): ya mtshan pa'i// phun tshogs dge slong la gsungs pa// sdig pa dag gi skyon gyis 'di// nyon mongs nyam par lhung bar gyur// gang phyir dri ma ldan pa'i yid// kun tu rab rib drag po bskyed// grong khyer
233b1(skyes rabs): dge ba'i dbyangs su ni// sa yi bdag po yid bzang la// byas shes dang ni byas mi shes// bu gnyis sngon tshe byung bar gyur// byas shes brtse bas slong rnams la// rtag tu dpag bsam shing bzhin du// rang gi
233b2(skyes rabs): rin chen rgyun gyis tshegs// rnam par bkrol nas rab tu sbyar// bgos pa min pa pha yi rdza swA// thams cad bu cig thun mong yin// zhes smras byas mi shes kyis kyang // de yis byin pa de dag phrogs// de nas mi
233b3(skyes rabs): bdag blo gros dbyangs// zhes byas byas shes bsngags 'as la// skye bo dga' ma zhes pa yi// bu mo'i tshig gis byin par gyur// rang nyid kyis bsgrubs byin pa yas// yid la rI ba de la skyes// de nas chu ga tA
233b4(skyes rabs): chen por nI/ b+h+ya shes gzings la zhon par gyur// sdang zhing 'gyon pas gus 'phel bya// dan pA byas mi shes pa yang // rin chen sgrub brtsoni de nyid kyi// rjesu chags las song bar gyur// de nas chu
233b5(skyes rabs): don mthun gyis// yongs gang gzings ni ngal bu yis// rjesu mthun pa'i rlung dag gis// 'dod pa'i gling du phyin par gyur las ga sa kun tu khings// da nes de ni slar log nas// rang gi phyogasu 'gro
233b6(skyes rabs): btsun tshe// sa gzhi ri ba'i rin po che// lnga brgya lnga ni byas shis kyis// blangs nas gos kyi yal 'dab la// ras ma yis ni mdud pa bcings// de nas gzengs chen rin chen gyi// khur gyis yongs su ngal ba de//
234a1(skyes rabs): chen dag gis zhig gyur te// tshul ngan rnams kyi dbang phyug bzhin// de nas shing du ma bzung ba yi// byas shes kyis ni 'tsho ba thob// rgyab kyis byas mi shes dag ni// bying bar gyur pa
234a2(skyes rabs): yang dag bsgral// 'jigs ru chu srin 'byung ga nas las// brtse bas bsgral ba'i spun zla des// dwe yi thu ba dag la ni// rin tshan yid 'ong bsags pa mthong // dwe yi rin chen la chags dang // snang ba'i dbang
234a3(skyes rabs): du gyur pa des// rgya mtsho'i 'gram du ngal ba yis// spun la 'khu ba bsams par gyur ro// de ni gnyid du song ba la// mig dag mtshon gyis rab phyung nas// rin po che yi tshogs bzung ste/ byas mi gzo de mgyogs
234a4(skyes rabs): par song // sgra gcan gyis ni nyin phyed bzhin// gdug pas long bar byas pa des// 'jig rten phan pa bral ba las// sdug bsngal ldan pa des kyang bsams// de ni slong la sbyin don du// yid la re ba don med gyur//
234a5(skyes rabs): long ba bdag gi 'tsho ba ni// 'bras med dag gis dgus pa ci// gal te dus lA ma bab pas// srog ni 'jig par mi 'gyur na// de le grogs med dka' thub kyi// sbyor ba nyon mongs zhi 'jig bzod// nor zad skye
234a6(skyes rabs): sdang gyur cing // khengs pa dang bral 'khrugs pa'i tshe// skyes bu rnams kyi ni tshong 'jug/ zhi bas zad pa mchod par 'os// de ltar bsams shing dal bus des// 'gro ba don mthun dag gis bsgral// sa bdag
234b1(skyes rabs): blo gros dbyangs kyi ni// grong khyer dag drang nye bar phyin// bu lang skyong ba'i khang pa der// cung zad dus ni de yis bsdad// rgyal po'i bu mos skyed mos tshal// rnam par lta zhing 'gro ba yis// long yang rgyal po'i mtshan
234b2(skyes rabs): rnams kyis// gsal bar mtshan ma des mthong nas// skye ba snga ba'i mdza' bas bcings// de la mngon par dga' bar gyur// de las yab kyi bka' las ni// rang nyid mchog 'dam de yis byes// rgyal po rnams kyis
234b3(skyes rabs): nang nas ni// mig dang bral ba bos te gdams// sa skyong rnams ni yongs btang nas// sdig ma khyod kyis long ba gdams// zhes brjod pa ni khros pa yis// dge ma de ni phyi rol bsgral// mdza' bcugs nyer bas
234b4(skyes rabs): gus pa can// de yis long ba skyed tshul du// bzhag nas 'bad pas kha zas dag/ blangs nas ster zhing rtag tu gnas// nam zhig zas kyi skabs 'das tshe// yun ring lon nas 'ong ste de la// bkres pas bzhin nI
234b5(skyes rabs): yongs nyams pa'i// rgyal po'i bu yis rab smras pa// khyod ni kun tu ma rtags par// byed mas g.yo ba 'ba' zhig las// mi bdag yangs pa spyan ldan rnams// yongs btang bdag ni long ba 'dums// khyod ni khyim
234b6(skyes rabs): nas 'gyod pa yis// bdag la gus pa dman gyur te// da ni mdza' bzhan pa nyid// ston par brtson pa ma yin nam// long ba lta bas yid byung ste// gzugs bzang lta la mngon par phyogs// de ring zas kyi dus
235a1(skyes rabs): 'das te// ring mo zhig nas khyod 'ongs so// de yis rtsub mo 'di smras te// 'dar ba dang ldan 'khri shing ni// sgra sgrogs bung ba'i phreng ldan zhing // snyan par smra byed des smras pa// mgon po khro bas bdag
235a2(skyes rabs): la ni// log pa'i dogs pa bgyir mi 'os// mdzu'i bas mnyes gshin sems kyis ni// tshig gi mnga' ltung mi bzod do// khyod ni lha nyid du shes la// gal te bdag gi yid dag na// bden pa de yis khyod kyi mig
235a3(skyes rabs): cig na snang ba ldan gyur cig/ ces pas snying stobs ldan ma des// brjod tshe myur bar de yis spyan// rab rgyas pad+ma'i rnam pa can// gcig ni dri med nyid du gyur// de yi bden pa'i mthu yis ni// ya mtshon chen po yang
235a4(skyes rabs): dgra skyes// badren pa'i yid ches spro ldan pas// byas shes kyis ni de la smras// spun zla byas mi shes de yis// mig gnyis dag ni phyung gyur pa'i// gnod pa de la bdag la ni// kho na namra rnam 'gyur ma skyes na// bden
235a5(skyes rabs): pa de yis gnyis pa yis// mig kyang rnal du gnos gyur cig/ ces brjod de yis skad cig la// de ni gsal ba'i mig gis mtshan// de nas byung ba'i mtha' bshad pa'i// byas shes bdag por 'os pa ni// skye
235a6(skyes rabs): bo dge ma rab mgu bas// song nas pha la nges par bshad// de nas de ni gyos po yis// rin chen glang po rta yis mchod// dpal dang bzhin du mdzes ma dang // lhan cig yab kyi grong khyer song // zhabs la cod pon
235b1(skyes rabs): gyis gtugs te// rab tu mgu ba'i pha yis der// skal bzang skye bo rjes chags pa// rgyal tshab dag gi gnas la bkod// ngo tsha med pa byas mi shes// de la rab tu dang ba'i g.yos// zhabs la gtugs te de la
235b2(skyes rabs): ni// 'khu ba'i bsam pas yang dag 'ongs// sgyu yis de ni bsad 'dod pa'i// gya gyu'i bsam pa ldan pa de// kyi hud bdag bsregs bdag bsregs zhes// brjod pa kho nas dmyal bar ltung // de nyid lhas byin
235b3(skyes rabs): 'di yin te// byas shes de yang nga nyid do// skye ba gzhan du rjes 'brel bas// 'di yi sdang ba yong mi zlog/ de ltar kun mkhyen gyis gsungs lhas byin gyi ni spyod pa de// yongasu gdung ba byed pa rab mang dang
235b4(skyes rabs): ldan zhing // skye bo gzhan du nye bar bsags pa'i sdig pa rjes 'brel ba// dge slong tshogs kyis thos nas yid ni byung ba bzhin du gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod
235b5(skyes rabs): pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// byas shes kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'drab ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // snying stobs che bsten yid ni sbyin la gcig tu nges rnams kyi// spro dang mchod dang yon tan
235b6(skyes rabs): longs spyod 'byor pa skyed byed pa// sngon gyi bsod nams bsags pa las byung dge ba mngon brjod pa'i// dpag bsam shing ni nges par dus su ma tshang med 'bras skyed// bcom ldan rgyal ba mnyan yod na// sa bdag
236a1(skyes rabs): ko sa la dbang gi/ skyed tshalnga mchog na dge slong gi/ tshogs dang thabs cig sngon bzhugs tshe// thog mya bar dang mthar dge ba// srid pa zil gnon mchog gi chos// 'jig rten gsum po dge
236a2(skyes rabs): ba la// sbyor ba de yis rab tu bstan// skabs der klu yi rgyal po'i bu// rgya mtsho dag tu gnas pa bAzhi// stobs dang shin tu stobs dang ni// dbugs dang dbugs chen zhes bya ba// sring mo mngon dga' zhes yis//
236a3(skyes rabs): bskul nos de dag mnyam du ni// bde gshegs kyis gsungs dam pa'i chos// mchog gi bdud rtsi nyan du 'ongs// sngon gyi dus na bcom ldan 'das// blo bzang 'khor ba 'jig dang ni// gser thub ces ni bya ba dang // de
236a4(skyes rabs): na dgra bcom 'od srung la// nyan du sring mos bskul gyur kyang // dpal gyi bder chags 'ongs ma gyur// de dag bsod nams yongs smin nas// shAkya thub pa'i mngon du 'ongs// de dag mi yi lus bsgrubs te//
236a5(skyes rabs): ston pa la nI phyag 'tshal nas// zhabs la mgo yis gtu gas byas te// 'khor der nye bar 'dug pa'i tshe// gsal rgyal ko sa la yi dbang // dpal 'byor rgyags tshul 'dzum mdzes pa yis// gdugs dacing rnga yang
236a6(skyes rabs): bzlog nas ni// dam chos nyan du yang dag 'ongs// ston pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal slad// tshogs su zhugs pa de la ni// mi yi bdag la gus pa las// kun gyi btud cing go skabs phye// rigs gnas bla ma mi rnams
236b1(skyes rabs): kyis// mngon par dga' bar byas de la// klu yi rgyal po'i bu rnams kyis// go skabs bkur stir byas ma gyur// de dag dregs pas khengs pa dang // rgyal ba la ni gus pas kyang // khengs ldan mi bdag khro ba ni// rlung du
236b2(skyes rabs): rab tu bsgribs par gyur// de yis rang gi 'khor la ni// 'gro tshe sngon du de dag rnams// tsher btsod brda yis bskos byas nas// rnam par med pa bzhin du gyur// bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas kyang // dre yi nges
236b3(skyes rabs): pra mkhyen gyur nas// 'jug tu 'dzum mdzad rab gsungs pa// yid k+Shi me long dri ma can// sdang ba'i rdul gyis gang ba lnga// chos ni nye bar bstan pa yis// gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa mdzes ma yin// mnyam pa nyid dang bral
236b4(skyes rabs): zhing khri dang rmongs pas btsom rnams la// nyer bstan gyis ni dge ba'i cha shas chung ngu'ang yang mi byad// glang phyir blo grosta blun po rnams kyi rab mang skyon ldan lus// dag pas dman pa dag la sman ni sman nyid
236b5(skyes rabs): mi 'gyur ro// zhes pa bcom ldan rigs pa yis// phan pa gsung ba thos gyur kyang // klu rnams lnga ni sding ba'i yaus// sa yi bdag pos btang ma gyur// de nas bcom ldan la btud nas// mi br-i dgu rang gi
236b6(skyes rabs): gnas song tshe// de yi dpung gis lam bkag pas// klu rnams mkha' yi lam nas song // khyim du de dag gis bsams te// sa dag gzhom pa'i dus byas nas// 'jigs rung dgra sgra sgrogs sprin gyis tshogs// sna
237a1(skyes rabs): ba 'joms pas yang dag 'ongs// de dag rtsol ba kun mkhyen gyis// mkhyen nas sa yi bdag po yis// phyogs su lhung zhing bsrung bzod pa// maud+gal gyi bu la bsgos// de nas klu yi tshogs
237a2(skyes rabs): rnams kyis// rdo rje'i char chen rab spros pa// de yi mthu yis sa bdag la// me tog char pa nyid du gyur// de nas de dag gis mtshon dang // rdo yi char drag bzod dka' phab// mong+gal gyi bu yis brtags pa las/
237a3(skyes rabs): rgyal po la 'as zas nyid gyur// de yi mthu las gdengs can rnams// spro ba nyams nas song ba'i tshe// 'tshe ba dang bral mi yi bdag/ song nas bde gshegs la phyag 'tshal// rgyal ba'i bka' las maung+gal
237a4(skyes rabs): buM// de yi longs spyod phun tshogs kyis// gus pas legs sbyar skal ba bzang // rigs pa nyid du mchod par byas// de nas mtho ris la 'os pa'i// sa bdag 'byor mthong dge slong gis// thal mo sbyar nas
237a5(skyes rabs): kun mkhyen la// dge mtshan 'bebs lasu rab tu zhus// bcom ldan bsod nams ci zhig gi/ mthu yis rgyal po gsal rgyalA ni// longs spyod kun gyis rnam mdzes pa'o// rab rgyas rgyal srong chen
237a6(skyes rabs): po thob// 'di la rtag tu sa li yi// sdong po bur shing sdong bur gyu re// lha yi bza' btung phun sum tshigs// de dag las ni gong gi 'bras// dge slong gus pas dris pa 'di// bcom ldan rgyal bas bka'
237b1(skyes rabs): stsal pa// rgyal po'i longs spyod phun tshogs kyis// rgyu ni rab tu mnyan par gyis// ko sa la yi ljongs 'di ru// bur shing zhing pa dum bu zhes// bya bas rang sangs rgyus la ston// bur chu dang ni zas dag
237b2(skyes rabs): byin// de yi bstod nams rnams dang ni// bur chu zan dag gsol ba des// rlung nad kyis nyen rang sangs rgyas// rab dang dri med nyid du gyuraro// bur shing zhing pa bsod nams can// de ni rgyal
237b3(skyes rabs): pro gsal rgyal 'di// bsod nams de yi mthu yis ni// longs spyod skalnga ldan rnam par mdzes// byas shes rnams la phan pa dang // gdug sems can la gnod pa dang // dam pa rnams la
237b4(skyes rabs): legs byas ni// chung yang chung ngu nyid min 'gyur// sa bdag sngon gyi bsod nams 'di// kun mkhyen gyis ni gsungs pa'i tshe// legs byas mchog tu gyur pa las// dge sbyong ngo mtshar
237b5(skyes rabs): g.yo me du gyur// de nas bcom ldan lnga gus pas// rgyal pos lhag par gnas byas nas// longs spyod phun tshogs lha la 'os// de de rang gis nye bar br-i kau de// mchog tu mdzes pa'i
237b6(skyes rabs): rim gro yis// mchod de gser gyi khri la ni// bder bzhugs de bzhin gshegs pa laM// mi yi mgon pos rab smras pa// bcom ldan khyod la gus pa yis// legs byas dpal ni rnam
238a1(skyes rabs): rgyas pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yis// bdag ni grol gyur srid lags sam// bsod nams rdzogs pa'i rgyal ba can// sa yi bdag po gus pas 'di//
238a2(skyes rabs): dris la bde bar gshegs po yis// 'dzum dkar snang ba spro zhing gsungs// rgyal po'i khor ba dag gi lam// thog mtha' med par 'jug pa 'di// nyon mongs kun zad ma thob par/
238a3(skyes rabs): skyes bus bde bar+ya ji ltar 'gong // yun rings yongs 'dri sa 'khor lo skor bzhin rgyun tu 'ong dang 'gro ba yis// rang bzhin gyis zab 'khor ba 'di la bde blag 'god par mi nus
238a4(skyes rabs): to/ sbyor pa goms pa med cing las rnams nges par zad pa min par ni// rgya che'i bras bu gsal ba'i chos kyang 'di ni 'ching ba nyid du gyur// sprin la goms pa chen po yis//
238a5(skyes rabs): kun lasa? rnam par log gyur pa// bdag kyang sa la skye ba bzung // chos kyis 'khor pa nyid du gyur// nor can zhes bya nor dang ldan// ba ra tA sir sngon byung gyur// gdung ba
238a6(skyes rabs): 'phrog cing 'bras bu rgyas// slong ba rnams kyi grib shing bzhin// mu ges 'jig rten brlag gyur cing // mi bzang nyon mongs kyis 'khrugs che// rang songs rgyas ni lnga brgya
238b1(skyes rabs): yis// de la 'tsho ba bslangs par gyur// mi chung dpal des bang ba yi// khang bdag la 'gros de dag la// mchog tu longs spyod 'os pa'i zlas// mu ge dag gi mthar thug sbyar// dwe yI khyim
238b2(skyes rabs): du grA swo lta ba la// b+hU rgyu phyug lnga ni tshogs gyur tAM// de nas rim gyis rang sangs rgyas// stong phrag gnyis ni byung bar gyur// skyes che 'bras bu'i dpal thob pa// bsod nams ni tab pa de yi so ni/
238b3(skyes rabs): mu gre'i sbyin pas de yi mdzad// zad kyi nyon mongs zad ma gyur// bde ba rgyud ba bsod nams kyis// spyad nas nai rwa can de nyid ni// dA yin zhi ba mchog gis 'dir// yang dag rdzogs
238b4(skyes rabs): ba'i byang chub bstan// 'khor ba'i lus dang 'bras bu 'jug pa 'di// 'o ching byed theg pa dkar dang dkar min ni// bsod nams sdig pa dag gis rnam par bcings// de zad pa la
238b5(skyes rabs): thar po'i gnas zhes brjod// de ltar rmongs pa zad pas thar bar ni// rgyul bsu gsungs pa sa dbang gis thos nas// nyon mongs mdza' bos zhi ba kho nar nges// bsod nams mngon pa'i
238b6(skyes rabs): rgyal lhod par byas// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub semos dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// sa li sdong bu'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi
239a1(skyes rabs): bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // rang don la 'jug chags pa dang bral zhing // gzhan la phan par rtag tu brtson
239a2(skyes rabs): rnams kyi// grub pa nyon mongs rnams la mi 'jigs shing // gdung dang bgags bral gzir byed min par gyur// mnyan yang rgyal byed tshal du sngon// bzhugs pa bcom ldan rgyal ba yis//
239a3(skyes rabs): chos 'chad pa yi zhar la ni// dge slong tshogs la bka' stsal pa// sa bdag sa rnams kun gyi bdog/ don grub ces pa legs byas ldan// sa skyong kun gyi mgo bo la// bka' ni rnam par rtse bar
239a4(skyes rabs): gyur// chu yi gterA la gnas gyur pa// rgya mtsho zhes pa klu yi bu// don kun grub pa sa bdag ni// de yi bu nyid dag tu gyur// snying stobs rab tu 'bor ba'i 'od // skal bzang byang chub sems dpa'
239a5(skyes rabs): do// skyes pa tsam gyi sa gzhi ni// rang gi 'od kyis rgyas par byas// de ni che bar skyes gyur pa'i// grags pa lha rnams kyis mchod pa// srid pa mtha' dag khyab pa ni// chos kyi bzhin du yang dag/
239a6(skyes rabs): byas// skyed tshal mchog tu dar ma de// mdun du lha rnams kyis sprul pa'i// skyes bu rgan po mthong bar gyur// rgabs 'khogs pa de mthong nas// tshogs bral gyi ni bag chags sad// 'khor
239b1(skyes rabs): ba bzhin du lus dag ni// snying po med par de yis bsams// bskyed tshal mchog tu dang ma lta ba'i chags bral te// dal gyis log nas 'ong ba de// lam du dbul ba nyid kyis nA// mdzes bral
239b2(skyes rabs): phongs par gyur pa mthong // snying rjes drangs pa'i yid can des// bdo med nyon mongs de mthong nas// bsams pa sa la dbul po rnams// kye ma sdug bsngal bzod par byed// rin chen gyis gang sa
239b3(skyes rabs): gzhi na// gzhan las blangs pas nyer 'tsho zhing // phongs gyur 'di dag sdug bsngal ni// sbyin pa min las skyes par smra// skyes bu bkren pa 'di dag rnams// skyes bu gzhan la slong ba gang // 'di
239b4(skyes rabs): nyid kho ni mi bslu bar// sdig pa'i las rnams dag gis rtags// gni sa dang gan sa rmed gyur cing // 'di doge slong bas yid byung la// bslangs par gyur kyang bkres pa na// kye ma 'di dag nyes byas nyid// de ltar yun rings bas
239b5(skyes rabs): byas nas// kun gyi nyon po ga zhom brtson pas// 'gro ba dbul min bya ba'i slad// rinA tshon de ni gnyer rgya mtshor song // pa yis ci zhig ltar bsten nyid// d+he s+ya gnang nges pa brtan pa de// gzings la yang dag zhon byas nas
239b6(skyes rabs): rin chen gling du phyin par gyur// der ni tshong dpon gzings dag la// zho nas lhan cig 'ongs rnams la// ngo yi smras pa khyed cag rnams// rin chen 'dod pa bsdu bar mdzod// thun mong rin 'ang dag gis// bdag la dgos pa yod mo yin//
240a1(skyes rabs): bdag cag mdzod na rIn chen mchog/ 'dod dang ldan pa mang po yod// 'on kyang yid bzhin nor thob slad// bdag gi rtsom pa chen po 'di// de yis ni dbul ba nyid// nyams pa
240a2(skyes rabs): dag tu bya bar 'dod// rgya mtsho zhes bya klu yi rgyal// chu gter che rab tu gnas// bsams pa'i don ste rno bu ni// de khyim na yod bdag gis thos// mi bzad lam ni 'grod pa ste// bdag ni de nyid len du 'gro// brtan
240a3(skyes rabs): pa'i grogs ldan 'bad rtsol dang // ldan pa rnams la 'grong dka' med// bdag gis legs byas rtsom pa 'di// gal te 'thob na bden nyid du// bdag dang bral bas khyed cag rnams// ci yang gdung bar mi 'gyur ro// /
240a4(skyes rabs): zhes brjod de dag la bzlas nas// snying stobs ldan pa rgyal po'i bu// chen po'i bstan pa la brten nas// nges pa brtan pas rab tu zhugs// de yis chu yi lam dag nas// long bu tsam la nyin bdun phyin// pus
240a5(skyes rabs): nub tsam la nyin bdun dang // skyes bu tsam la nyin bdun te// de nas zhag ni bdun pa bzhi// glang mo'i tshad kyi chu dag la// phyin nas mdun du so dug can// 'dzags rung mthong ba dug can mthong // de nas
240a6(skyes rabs): byams ldan yid kyis ni// de dag dug med byas nas des// khro bas 'khrugs pa'i gnod sbyin gyis// gang ba'i gnod sbyin gling du phyin// der ni byams ldan yi ngag gis// de dag khro dang dral bar bsgrubs//
240b1(skyes rabs): spro ba yangs pas ya mtshan pa// de dag gis bshad thos gyur te// gzhon nu'i snying stobs rgyas pa dang // brtson 'grus spro ba 'di yis ni// klu yi rgyal po'i khang pa ru// khyod nyid bzhed pa 'thob par 'gyur// dus
240b2(skyes rabs): kyis khyod ni thams cad mkhyen// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gyur// bdag cag rnams kyang khyod nyid kyi// rjes 'brang nyan thos dag tu gyur// de dag dang bas 'di brjod de// mngon par dga' ba'i mi bdag bu//
240b3(skyes rabs): srin po rnams kyis khengs gyur pa// nyam nga srin po'i gling du phyin// rnam 'gyur gdug bral de dag gis// de bzhin nyid du mchod nas de// dpung pas blangs te skad cig gis// klu yis dbang po'i khang par 'phangs//
240b4(skyes rabs): lha yis dga' bde la 'os pa'i// snang ba 'byor ldan der ni des// sdug bsngal chen pos gzir byas pa'i// cho nge'i sgra ni thos par gyur// de yis de thos chags bral can// rang bzhin brtse bas brlan pa'i blos// mdun du
240b5(skyes rabs): klu yis bu mo dag/ mthong nas 'di dag ci zhes dris// yang yang mya ngan la chags pa'i// dro ba gsal byed shugs rings kyis// bim pa'i mchu 'dam mdzes pa dag/ dri mar byed nges de la smras// yon tan ldan pas
240b6(skyes rabs): pad+mo'i spyan// klu yi rgyal po dag gi bu// thu bo don kun grub ces pa// gces pa lnga pa nyid du gyur// de yis sdug bsngal dag gis ni// kun dga' dang bral bde dga' spangs// khang pa 'dir ni cho de dag/ stug po
241a1(skyes rabs): nyid kyis gnas par byas// shes pa de yi tshig thos nas// rang yul mthong bas dga' ba des// nang du yongs 'dris 'dzin byed cing // klu yi rgyal po'i drung du phyin// rgyal po'i drung phyin
241a2(skyes rabs): dga' ma dang // bcas pas de 'os yongs shes nas// bu cig tshur shog tshur shog ces// brjod cing kun dga' 'khrugs par gyur// mi yIs skye bo'i gtam dang ni// rang nyid 'ong rgyu dag kyang // de yis bshad
241a3(skyes rabs): pa thos gyur nas// klu yis yongs 'khyud de la smras// bu gcig yid bzhin nor bu 'di// bdag gi mgo bo nyid kyis rgyan// long shig khyod kyi brtog pa ni// 'bras med byed par mi spro'o// 'gro ba'i bya ba byas
241a4(skyes rabs): nas 'di// khyod kyis bdag la slar sbyin bya// zhes brjod gtsug rin chen mchog/ de yis gsal nas de la byin// yidra bzhin nor bu nyi ma'i 'od// yang dag blangs nas gzhon nu ni// dga' bas klu dbyung
241a5(skyes rabs): la btud de// gzings dang nye ba dag tu song // de yi gtam thos rgya mtsho yis// lha yis der ni de mthong nas// dge ba khyod kyis thob pa yis// yid bzhin nor bu ci 'dra smos// dri yis gsal bar 'di brjod
241a6(skyes rabs): che// zol med bsam pa drang po de// lag pa'i pad+ma rab gdengs nas// yid bzhin gyi ni nor bu bstan// rin chen mchog de des mthong nas// phrag dog dri ma'i bsam pa yis// de yis lag la lag
241b1(skyes rabs): pa yis// thal mos bsnun nas chu gter dor// shin tu dga' bas bsgrub pa yis// rin chen rgya mtshor ltung mthong nas// rtsom pa brtan pa 'bras med pa'i// mya ngan g.yo med des smras pa// yon tan la 'os
241b2(skyes rabs): rnam pa can// mdza' bas 'jam par smra byed pa// kye ma sdang bas sdig pa'i las// byas pas khyod ni mdzes mi yin// gang zhig pha rol khyad 'phags la// 'gran dang mya ngan nyon mongs gyur// de la phyogs ni 'di dag
241b3(skyes rabs): rnams// bsil yang 'bar bas dkrigs par gyur// gang zhig gzhan gyi spro bas mgu// snying stobs chu gter chen po de// grags pa ga pur ltar dka ba// 'jig rten gsum gyi thig le 'dzin// lha dag bdag gi rin chen stsol/
241b4(skyes rabs): sdig pa 'di dang bral bar mdzod// dam pa rnams kyi las dag ni// smad pa dang ni mtshungs mi 'gyur// chags sdom bag med sdang bA la// gal te rin chen mi stsol nA// de lta na ni khyed kyi granas// chu gter 'di ni bdagi bskam// zhes
241b5(skyes rabs): pa lan mang des smras kyang // gang che rin chen des ma byin// de tshe rang gi mthu yis ngas// chu gter bskam phyir rab tu zhugs// mig stong ldan pa'i tshig gis ni// baM shwa karmas sprul pa'i snod// bsams pa tsam gyis da yi ni//
241b6(skyes rabs): lag tu 'phral la byung bar gyur// bskam par brtson des ri byi yi// chu gter dag las chu blangs nas// bar snang la ni rab tu gtor// shin tu rmad byung byed pa des// chu gter sum cha lhag byas te// lha rnams kyis ni smras pa
242a1(skyes rabs): yis// 'jigs nas lha yis nor bu byin// rin chen rnams bzhin bdag nyid che// sngags rnams dang ni dka' thub kyang // zol med gzi byin che rnams kyis// mthu yis de nyid su yis rig/ rin chen 'byung
242a2(skyes rabs): gnas rab rgyas pha rol med pa de srid chu yis dkrigs gyur cing // byed po'i bde blag stob la dba' rlabs phreng bas mkha' la 'god pa nyid du thos// dam pa rnams kyi mthu ni chen po'i bdag nyid gzhal med cing yang zab pa
242a3(skyes rabs): ste// ya mtshan gnas gang bsam pa'i cho ga dag la blo ni mtha' ru rgyal bar byed// de nas yid bzhin nor thob ste// rang gi don mthun dang 'grogs nas// raM ba rdzogs pa rgyal po'i bu// rlung gis grong khyer drag tu phyin//
242a4(skyes rabs): rab tu mgu ba'i pha yis der// mchod cing bya ba byas pa des// rgyal mtshan rtse la rin chen btags// skye bo'i mdun sar rab smras pa// gal te 'gar yang bdag 'bad 'di// gzhan don kho na bdag don min// bden po de yis 'jig
242a5(skyes rabs): rterten 'di// thams cad dbul med nyid gyur tsog/ dman la brtse ldan snying stobs kyis// gter des de skad brjod pa na// rin chen char pa med ni// sa gzhi dag la bab par gyur// phyogs rnams kun tu rin chen tshogs// 'od dang ldan pa
242a6(skyes rabs): de yis ni// skye bo dbul ba'i rang bzhin gyi// mun pa lhag med nyid du gyur// re ba'i zhabs ldan stobs kyis dpal ldan rnams kyi khang mdun phyi rol dag tu 'jug/ sgo bas bsngo bas ldan yang yang rnam par g.yo zhing sgo yi khongs
242b1(skyes rabs): su nyen gyur la// shugs rings dang ldan mya ngan dag gis 'gyel zhing lus ni 'jig par 'dod gyur pa// bkren pa rnams la nor bu'i 'od zer drangs pa'i dpal tshogs ci yang byung // 'jig rten phongs dang bral ba'i nyin dang bral zhing
242b2(skyes rabs): yid bzhin nor bu yang // de yi bka' las lto 'phye'i 'dren pa nyid du gyur pa'i che// kun tu sbyin pa la zhan skye bo dag gi sems rnams ni// slong ba'i don mthun kun dang bral bas 'khrugs pa nyid du gyur// don kun grub pas sa
242b3(skyes rabs): skyong sras por ni// gang gyur de nyid nga yin lus gzhan 'dir// zhes pa'i sngon byung rgyal pos gsung thos nas// dge slong de dag de nyid sems par gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs
242b4(skyes rabs): pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// don kun grub pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / nu ma mngon dga' glang chen myos bum mtho// ga pur dau shal rab tu rtse dga' dgod// dar
242b5(skyes rabs): la bab pa'i na chung 'byor pa yang // bsod nams byas pa rnams la dga' ster yin// de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// mnyan yod nags na rgyu ba'i tshe// dpal ldan khyim gyi bdag po sngon// legs par rab sad ces pa byung //
242b6(skyes rabs): shin tu sdug pa de yi bu// glang po can zhes bya bar gyur// sngon bsgrubs bsod nams dag gi tshogs// rnam pa dag dang bcas pa bzhin// da ni skyes pa'i nyin par la// rab mchog glang po chen po ni// gser gyi rang bzhin skyes
243a1(skyes rabs): gyur te// ngo mtshar tshogs ni gcig gyur bzhin// glang dbang de dang gzhon nu dang // de yi pha yi re ba dang // 'jig rten ltad mo mdzod rnams kyang // mtshungs pa nyid du gang bar gyur// ri bong can bzhin byis
243a2(skyes rabs): pa de// dus la sgyu rtul chags gnas gyur// 'jig rten kun gyi mig gi gnyen// 'od zer ldan zhing rab tu mdzes// dal gyis de ni kho lag rdzogs// dpung pa'i ka bas rnam par brgyan// yid las byung ba rtsom pa'i gnas//
243a3(skyes rabs): lang tsho gsar pa thob par gyur// de nas nam zhig de yis ni// sa yi bdag po gsal rgyal gyi// bu mo'i lus kyi chos gos kyi// rtags dang lhan ces rnam mdzes ma// chos gos bu mo zhes bya ba// mdzes shing yid 'ong bzhin
243a4(skyes rabs): rus can// mig yangs gzhon nu ma dag ni// skyed tshul lta ru 'ong ba mthong // nyam spa med pa'i gzugs ldan zhing // mdzes ma mi dman dA mthong nas// de ni 'phral la ya mtshan dang // 'dod pa'i dbang du ya mtshan gyur// de bsams
243a5(skyes rabs): kye ma lus 'di ni// shin tu rmad byung mdzes pa ste// skyon dri med ri bong can// gang du bzhin gyi zol gyis mdzes// gzugs can mchu ni ban+d+ha kA gnyen yid 'ong rang bzhin can// 'di ni dro zla med pa'i mdzes sdug rnam par 'dzin
243a6(skyes rabs): byed cing // rlan ldan byu ru'i yal 'dab dag la 'khu bar brtson pa dang // bim pa'i 'od kyi rnam 'phral dag ni 'phral la 'bras med byed// ri bong 'dzin pa'i rgyags pa bzhin gyis mi bzod mdzes pas bdud rtsi dman byad
243b1(skyes rabs): cing // ut+pal rab tu rgyas pa'i nags tshal 'od ni mig gis rab tu nyams par byed// yang srubs 'grogs 'os lus can 'di yi 'jo sgeg 'gran zla dag la 'jigs ster ba// dga' mo'i rol rtsad dba' rlabs dag ni 'phral
243b2(skyes rabs): la nyid du skems par byed dam snyam// kye ma gang gi 'o ma 'dzin pa bzung ni rab rgyas sra mkhregs dben pa nyams// skyon gyi rang bzhin yin yang yon tan ldan pa'i do shal dug gis gnas par byas// bzhin 'di la yang bung ba'i
243b3(skyes rabs): phreng rnams chu skyes blo yis nye bsten pa dang // g.yo ldan mig gi 'dren byed thub pa'i yid kyang ci lnga chag shing nyams par byed// de ltar sems dpa' de yi lus// me tog mda' can lta bu dag/ mthong nas sa bdag bu
243b4(skyes rabs): mo nI// ngo mchi g.yo ba med par gyur// dran pa 'dzum par byed pa yis// de yi ngo tsha'i gos phrogs te// gas ra spu long rgyas pa yis// lus ni gsal bar mthong ma gyur// mngon 'dod gsar pas bkag gyur kyang // skyengs
243b5(skyes rabs): pa yi ni phyir bzlog ste// yid ni de nyid la bzhag nas// de ni stong bzhin dal gyis song // rgyal po'i pho brang phyin gyur nas// ngo tsha ya mtshan yid srubs kyis// zlum pa bzhin dang zhum pa bzhin// bcom pa bzhin du de gyur to// gzhon nu
243b6(skyes rabs): yang ni rang khyim du// yid las byung ba yang dag rgyas// mdun du zla bzhin ma de nyid// kun tu rtogs pas yang yang bris// de yis yid kyi nor mchog de// 'dod pa'i rig pa bzhin dran zhing // 'khor los sgyur ba'i bu mi bzhin// rnyed par
244a1(skyes rabs): dka' bar shes nas bsams// skye ba gzhan la gang gi lus// yun ring dka' thub yongs 'dris pa// skal ldan de yi legs byas kyis// shing gi 'khri shing de 'thob 'gyur// dga' ba rab sbyin bsod nams
244a2(skyes rabs): kyis// de mthong ba ni thob gyur te// gang zhig de 'grogs 'bras ldan pa'i// bsod nams de dag yongs mi shes// de yi bzhin res bsil ba'i zer ldan dran pas dga' ba dang // de yang rnyed dka' nyid kyis 'bras pa'i
244a3(skyes rabs): gdung ba dag gri badrag/ brtan pa 'di ci rmongs 'di ci zhig 'tshol ba da ni ci// srog dang lhan cig rnam par 'bral lam ci yin yongs mi shes// de gdong chu skyes dag gis 'phral la bcom pas mtshan mo'i yid 'ongs nyams
244a4(skyes rabs): pa bsten// de yis smin ma'i rnam 'phrul dag la ngo tsha yid srubs gzhu ni gugs par gyur// yid 'ong yal ga mdangs 'phrogs de yi mchu sgros dmar ba dag gis gzir gyur te// chags bral nyid thob bim pa dag ni nags kyi
244a5(skyes rabs): sa laM yang dag bstan nam snyam// de ltar zla nya'i bzhin ras can// bzhin la bsam gtan g.yo med kyis// nyid kyis phrag dog can gyis bzhin// btang ba de yis mtshan mo 'das// mdzes pa mthong bar gyur pa'i mtha'// de ni de yis
244a6(skyes rabs): bshad pa dag/ pha yis thos nas de yis ni// bsam pa 'phos shing yongs 'dris gyur// de la de smras bdag cag bu// rgyal po'i grong khyer gnas pa'ang min// 'khor los sgyur de bu mo 'di// khyod la ji ltar ster bar 'gyur// mkhas
244b1(skyes rabs): pa bkur ba 'dod pa rnams// mi nus pa nyid byed ma smin// rnyed par dka' ba 'dod ma yin// mi badren pa ni sgyu ma yin// 'khri shi tsU ta tsam pa ka/ rang dbang rnams la mi gus par// yongs 'dra'i 'khri shing sems pa ma/
244b2(skyes rabs): rkang drug pa nyid skam par 'gyur// gal te khyod dang de gnyis kyang // skye ba snga mar 'brel bsgrubs na// de yi 'bras bu 'bad med du// nges pa kho nar rgyas par 'gyur// ra ba'i zhags pas ma bkug cing // rtog dpyod dag gis ma gzir la//
244b3(skyes rabs): 'bad pa'i khur gyis ma ngal bar// nges par myong bya 'grub par 'gyur// zhes pa pha yi tshig thos nas// de de bzhin zhes rnams bsams te// sems ni mdzes mas gzung ba dag/ slar yang bzlog par des ma nus// de song gser
244b4(skyes rabs): gyi glang po la// rgyal la gsar du phrad pa yis// dga' 'os phrad skyes su ni// gser gyi mche ba zung dag blangs// de nas lag ldan bsod nams kyis// mdza' bas byin pa'i mche ba zung // gser gyi rang bzhin khyer nas nges// sa yi bdag
244b5(skyes rabs): po lta ru song // de yis rin chen gyis mdzes pa'i yi bdag po'i khong par phyin// nang zhugs rab tu mdza' ba'i slad// gser gyis mche gnyis po byin// rgyal po rab tu dang ba yis// yon tan gyis grags dga' bar byas// mchog ni ldong zhes
244b6(skyes rabs): brjod gyur kyang // re yis ci yang blangs ma gyur// mdzes pa dman min de la ni// rgyal pos lhag par bkur ba byas// rigs shing mdzes pa'i dpyod pa tsan// chags pa med la su mi dga'// rtag tu rgyal la phrad che des// gsar du so ldan la skyes pa//
245a1(skyes rabs): kAser gyi rang bzhin mche ba rnams// dga' ba'i slad du rab tu phyin// yi radwa dang ba'i pho nya ni// bzhin ngas mdzes pa 'dzin byed cing // bsten pa'i mdza' btsugs kyis bsdams pa'i// sa skyongs gis ni de la
245a2(skyes rabs): smras// rab mang gser tshogs gling pa yis// bsten 'di bdag gis yong mi bzod// gang phyir grong khyer pa yi tshogs// sa byadag rnams kyis rgyas bya nyid// skye bos bgos skal phul bA yi// gauser gyi dga' nga
245a3(skyes rabs): bdag la ci// rin chen yon tan khyod kyi ni// gzugs 'di nyid la bdag dga'o// gser dang rin chen rdo ba'i tshogs// mdzod rnams na gnas rgyal po ni// rgyan du 'os pa'i skyes bu dag/ rin chen rnams la chags
245a4(skyes rabs): na mdzes// khyod la 'dod pa'i mchog dag ni// bdag gis ci sbyin smra bar mdzod// ma lus mdzod ni byin gyur kyang // nges par bdag ni 'gyod mi 'gyur// rgyal po'i spyan zur lhung tsam gyis// gal te dpal 'byor ma thob
245a5(skyes rabs): na// don gnyer don med nyid gyur pas// sa bdag bsten pa'i don nu tso// de skad sa skyong gis smras tshe// gzhon nus thal mo sbyar byas nas// de la smras pas skyong bdag/ ster bar 'os pa gzhan pa su// mkhas pa rnams la
245a6(skyes rabs): rinu chen ni// don du ma gnyer sgrol mdzad pa// khyod kyi rgya mtsho'i grags pa ni// rab rgyas de dag rgya yis btab// rab tu sbyin pa chen pos kyang // ra ba chen po khengs ma yin// chung ngu rnams kyis dbang phyug gang // de ni
245b1(skyes rabs): chen po'i dbul po nyid// 'on kyang gang gis nor slong ba// khyod kyi dpung pas bsrungs gyur cing // chos kyi lam gyi 'tsho ba yis// skye bo rnams dbul po med// bdag kyang nor don gnyer ba min// sten par byed pa po yang
245b2(skyes rabs): min// nor ldan rnams la nor nyid nor// khengs ldan rnams la bkur ba nyid// dam pa'i dbang phyug bsten pas yon tan ngag ni zum gyur pa// dam pa'i me tog rnams ni 'phral la rnying pa nyid gyur cing // slar yang bkren pa
245b3(skyes rabs): pa'i tshong gi lam du dman pas ltung gyur la// dam pa'i skye bo rnams ni reg pa tsam yang mi bzod do// dman zhing smad pa'i bdag nyid lus 'dzin rnams kyi slong ba nyid pas shi ba mchog/ slong ba mchog tu bkur sti 'os pa
245b4(skyes rabs): skye bo kun gyis smad pa dag gis gnas// ji srid don gnyer nyid thob rmongs pa'i mun par dbang med 'jug cing 'bab byed pa// de srid yon ldan bum pa khron par 'jug las mchog tu thur du 'gro// phun tshogs thun mong nor ni zhing
245b5(skyes rabs): las tshong la rtag tu blo ldan+da rnams kyis 'dro ba// gal te cho ga shes med na gzhan pa ci zhig sa la gter rnams rgyas pa dang // phul byung rab dang gser dang dngul gyi bya ba de dag yod pa nyid// dga' dang 'grogs pa'i slad du
245b6(skyes rabs): lus ni g.yog gi rang bzhin du 'tshong su zhig 'dod// ces pa blo gros ldan gzhan ngas// tshig thos nas ni sa yaM bdag/ gus dang bcas pas gzhan pa ni// cung zad blang bar mdzod ces smras// rigs shing brjod pa mkha
246a1(skyes rabs): pa yi// rtsub mo la yang mi rnams dga'// bkren pa rnams kyi ngo stong ni// 'jam yang rna ba na ba'i rgyu// rgya cher yongasu tshim pa yi// rgyal pos mchog tu gsol btab des// de la smras pa gal te khyod//
246a2(skyes rabs): sim na bu mo bdag stsol// des de brjod tshe mi bdag ni// bsam pa the tshom 'phyang mor gyur// nang par bdag smra zhes smras nas// skad cig sa gzhi dag la bltas// de nas gzhon nu btang nas des// blon po'i gtso bo la
246a3(skyes rabs): smras pa// rab dang gzu lums bdag gis ni// bya rog bzhin du g.yo ba byas// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rigs 'khrungs pa'i// bu mo bsod nams zong la 'os// grong pa thun mong pa la ni// yon tan tsam gyis ji ltar sbyin//
246a4(skyes rabs): sbyin no zhes ni rab bsgrags nas// rjesu 'gyod pas gzir gyur pa lI// 'dren nor ldan par gyu ra pa bdag/ slong ba 'bras med ji ltar gyur// nang par mdun du de 'ongs pa'o// bzhin ni bdag gis ji ltar blta// bdag la rnyed dka'
246a5(skyes rabs): des bslangs nas// mdza' yang mdza' min nyid du 'gyur// rang bzhin nyid kyis lus can rnams// nges par yon tan yongs rdzogs kyang // ji srid bslang zhes ma brjod pa// de srid snying du sdug pa yin// zhes pas sa bdag khyogs
246a6(skyes rabs): la ni/ nges par brten pa'i tshig thos nas// blon po chen pos gnas skabs su// 'os pa bsams nas de la smras// rje bo dag gi blo gros rnams// bgros pa min par mthar thug cing // gsar du chags ldan gus pa dang // rang bzhin
246b1(skyes rabs): gzu lums ldan pa yin// sred ldan mi nub don gnyer bas// yon tan 'byung gnas bzhin du ni// rgyal po'i g.yog la rab zhugs des// gser gyi glang chen rnam par bcom// bu mo slong bla slar 'ongs che// khyod kyi rdul bus
246b2(skyes rabs): 'di brjod bya// gser glang zhon te 'ongs pa ma/ bdag gi bu mo thob par 'gyur// de yis rang lag gis bsad nas// de la glang po ga la yod// dwe dang bral ba'i ngo che yis// slar 'ong par ni mi 'gyur ro// zhes pa blon po'i
246b3(skyes rabs): tshig gis ni// nyin+da gzhan gzhon nu 'ongs pa la// lugs la brten pa'i mi bdag gis// mngon du phyogs te de nyid smras// gzhon nu yang ni khyim song nas// bgra ma lan 'ongs bkra shis kyis// gser gyi so gnyis
246b4(skyes rabs): la zhon te// rang gi mi dang lhan cig 'ongs// gser gyi glang chen la zhon nas// 'ong ba de ni sa bdag gi// mthong nas ngo mtshur 'byor pa can// bsod nams ldan pa'i mchog tu shes// de nus rgyal pos dge mtshan las//
246b5(skyes rabs): glang po gser lus can de las// spro ba chen pos ldan po la// rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhin du zhon// sa skyong gis nr-i zhon pa'i tshe// glang po de ni mi g.yo zhing // sngon ni gzhon nus brgyan pa'i tshe// slor yang rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur
246b6(skyes rabs): mi bdag gis de lhur shes shing // de yi mthu yi sa ya mtshan pas// bdag gi sbrul bzang zhes brjod cing // bu mo 'dod dpal de la ni// rin chen bu mos skyes bu mchog/ ma nor mchod nas mi yi bdag/ spro dga'
247a1(skyes rabs): yang dag rgyus gyur pa// bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho bzhin du mdzes// de nas gzhon nus mdzes ma ni// blangs nas rang gi khyim song ste// lus maud gzha ni drangs pa yi// ngal ba 'bras bu yod par
247a2(skyes rabs): 'gyur// ljang cho gsar pa dang 'grogs te// 'byor pa rgyu chos rtag tu de// gsar pa gsur pa dga' bar 'gyur// de nas nam zhig sa skyong ni// bye ba byas pa gsal gyis// bsod nams mthu ldan mag pa dag/ yid la
247a3(skyes rabs): gtsigs shing rab bsams pa// kye ma lha yi mthu 'di ni// gzhon nu dag la rab tu mthong // gang phyir thun mong bsod nams rnams// de ltar smin par 'gyur ba yin// rigs ni dpal 'byor khang bzang gzugs kyi dba' rlabs
247a4(skyes rabs): zla ba'i dregs pa 'phrog/ lang tsho longs spyod 'os dang yongasu 'dris pa'i yon tan rgyan gyi tshogs// grags pa bsod nams skyed tshal rab 'khrungaswa me to gI rab tu bkram pa'i grogs// 'byor pa 'dri ni yongs smin ci yi 'bras
247a5(skyes rabs): bu yin par yongs mi shes// dge mtshan yang dag skyes pa des// de ltar yun rings bsams nas ni// sangs rgyas lta ba la btags pa'i// yid kyi shing rta dag la mdzegs// mag pa bu mo bos nas ni// blon po dge
247a6(skyes rabs): dang lhan cig tu// yid ni sngon du 'gro ba yis// bcom ldan 'das la lta ru song // rgyal byed tshal ni mig lam du// gyur tshe gzhon po yang dag btang // rkang pas nyer btud mi bdag gis// bcom ldan 'das la rnam par bltas//
247b1(skyes rabs): der btud de yi zhabs pad kyis// gtsug gi nor bus g.yo ba des// bu mo mag pa btud pa dag/ de la ming gis rnam par bshad// thams cad 'khod cing phyag 'tshal to// kun nas mgo bo dung pa'i tshe// bcom
247b2(skyes rabs): ldan thams cad mkhyen pA la// thal mo sbyar nas rgyal pos dris// bcom ldan las ni ci zhig gis// gzhon nu blo ldan rnams kyi mchog/ yon tan tshogs ni rgyas pa 'di// gser gyi glang pos 'gro ba lags// 'di ni
247b3(skyes rabs): bgra gsar ba dag gi ni// bu mo gos kyis mdzes ma 'di// bsod nams gang gis rnam smin gyis// srog las lhag par snying du sdug/ sa yi bdag pos 'di dris tshe// kun rig bcom ldan rgyal ba yis// der gsungs skyes
247b4(skyes rabs): bu'i 'byor pa rnams// sa bdag bsod nams dag las 'byung // 'jig rten na ni 'dod bya gang // mdzes pa gang dang rmad byung gang // de de bsod nams nyid las 'byung // bcom ldan bde gshegs rnam par gzigs// dge
247b5(skyes rabs): slong dag dang lhan cig ston// rgyal po gnyen ldan grong khyer du// 'jig rten lnga ni rtse bas rgyu// gnas skabs der ni khye'u zhig/ gzhon nu ma dang 'grogs nas ni// shing gi rang bzhin glang po byas// lam gyi mdun der rnam par
247b6(skyes rabs): rtse brtso ma dzom+bu na da'i 'od// pad 'dab rgyas pa'i rnam pa can// yid 'ong snying rje'i spyan ldan pa// bcom ldan byin pa de dag gis// mthong nas de la gus pa rgyas// rjes su chags pas mngon phyogs te// de la rtse
248a1(skyes rabs): cha glang po ni// phul nas mdun du btud de gnas// bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas kyang // de dgu bsam pa mkhyen gyur nas// blartse bas shing gi glang po la// zhabs pad+ma dag glis reg par mdzad//
248a2(skyes rabs): de nas de dag bcom ldan gyis// yang dag dang bro'i thugs kyis gzigs// phan tshun khye'u bu mo dug/ khyo shug tu ni smon lam byas// gausder gyi glang po'i bzhon pa dag/ rigs dang thun dang 'byor pa yis// bdag gis
248a3(skyes rabs): skye ba 'os gyur cig/ ces par gzhon nu'i blo gros gyur// bu mos bcom ldan chos gos nA// mdzes po dang ldan mthong gyur nas// bdag gi skye bar chos gos dang // ldan par gyur cig ces pa bsam// de ni smon lam de
248a4(skyes rabs): dag gis/ glang po can 'di nyid du skyes// chos gos bu myo 'di yang ni// lus ni chos gos kyis mtshan no// bde gshegs kyis gsungs byung tshul de// de ltar swa bdag gis thos nas// cod pan de yi zhabs pad la// reg
248a5(skyes rabs): nas rang gi khang par song // rgyal po ya mtshan tan song tshe// gzhon nu chung mar bcas pa yis// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yaM// chos ni dag pa'i blo yis thos// de nas de dgra chags bral skyes// 'khor ba'i phyag
248a6(skyes rabs): chags nyams gyur cing // rab tu byung bas nyon mongs btul// dag pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur// rgya che legs byas goms pa'i sbyor bas bsod nams bsten pa yi// skyes bu rnams ni chos 'dod don yang phun sum tshogs
248b1(skyes rabs): par 'gyur// de nas de 'bras mngon 'dod spyad nas gus bcas de dug rnams// sprin bral mkha' ltar mdzes pa'i zhi ba 'jug tu ston par byed// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod
248b2(skyes rabs): pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ glang po can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa'i yA la 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa dku pa'o// // grang zhog bde blag tu bskrun mthu dba' blabs rmad du byung ba'i phreng ba skye// snying stobs
248b3(skyes rabs): sgospro ba'i sa dang rang bzhin dri med ye shes grasal ba'i bsam pa can// de dag gis kyang sgrub byed rgyal po'i bka' yi spring yig las kyi phreng chags pa// bkra ba dag ni 'gong par mi 'gyur dogs 'gram gyi gyu chu bo'i gter
248b4(skyes rabs): gyis bzhin// de bzhin mnyan yod du nI 'phyar rnams kyi// rab tu bskul bar gyur pi'i bud med dag/ ston pa'i grags pa gzhon par brtson gyur pa// lus dang bcas pa dmyal bar ltung bar gyur// de nas dge byed rlung
248b5(skyes rabs): gi cho gas// yongasu 'phyan byed dri med chu// rdzing buM gdung med ces bya ba// rin cheni tshogs kyi thum skabs can// gser gyi padad+ma tshogs ge sar gyis// rkang drug ser por byed pa yis// pad+ma'i khrir gnas bcom ldan 'das//
248b6(skyes rabs): dge slong rnams kyis yong mo bskor ba// thams cad mkhyen pa las kyis rgyud// 'gom bya min par ston mdzad cing // rang las spyod pa rnam par bkra// gsung yang dag brtson par gyur// las ni chad pa'i gnas skabs der / bcom
249a1(skyes rabs): ldan gus la gnyen gshin pas// shwa ri'i bu ni 'bod pa dag/ maung+gal bu la rab tu bskos// bya rgod phung po'i ri gnas la// khab dang skud pas sbyor ba ni// bkra shis rdzogs par byed pa yi// shA ri'i bu yis de
249a2(skyes rabs): can phyin// sor mo rengs byas 'grub pa yi// las kyi mthu nyid ma yin pa// bya ba 'gor bas 'jigs pa yis// myur dang bcas par de la smras// tshur shog tshur shog 'gyogs par ro// bcom ldan kun mkhyen rdzing
249a3(skyes rabs): buM ni// gdung ba mang par dge slong la// las ni nye bar ston par brtson// las la chags nas myur min zhing // thogs par gal te khyod sgrub ni// rdzu 'phrul chen pos khyod blang bya// bdag gi stobs yangs blta bar byos//
249a4(skyes rabs): zhes pa dwe yi tshig thos nas// shwa ri'i bu yis de la smras// re zhig bdag gi thu ba longs// de nas khyod stobs bdag gi shes// zhes smras bya rgod phung po yi// ri yi rtse la de yi btags// maung+gal bu yI blangs pa yis//
249a5(skyes rabs): tshe na ri ni 'gul bar 'gyur// shA ri'i bu yis lhun po la// ri ni ltung bar 'jigs nas btags// de nas de yi blangs pa'i tshe// lha yi gnas kyang rnam par g.yos// de nas ston pa'i gdan gser gyi// pad rtsa nor bu'i
249a6(skyes rabs): rang bzhin la// shA ri'i bu yis de bzhin btags// pha rol nus ming nyid du gyur// rdzu 'phrul rim pas maud+gal bu// shA ri'i bu yis pam byas pa// shin tu snga bar nges phyin tshe// bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song // de dag rdzu
249b1(skyes rabs): 'phrul ches bskyod pas// klu ni dga' bo nyer dga' dag/ sa 'og nas ni rab 'thon te// 'jigs nas bcom ldan la phyag 'tshal// shA ri'i bu ni rgyal ba'i mthu// de nas dge slong rnams gyis dris// ye shes spyan
249b2(skyes rabs): ldan bcom ldan gyis// sngon byung dag ni rab gsungs pa// bA ra NA sir sngon byung ba// drang srong dung dang bris pa'o// de dag char dang char med ni// 'gal brjod phan tshun 'gran par gyur// de nas nAm zhig dung khros pa'i// rkang pas
249b3(skyes rabs): raral pa la reg pa// bres pas der smras nyi shar che// khyod kyi mgo bo 'byed gyur gcig/ dung gis smras pa bdag tshig gis// nyin phyed 'phyar bar ma gyur cig/ des 'di brjod tshe mdzes pa yi// 'gro ba mun pa dang bcas
249b4(skyes rabs): bcas gyur// bris pas de la brtse ba yis// sa yi rang bzhin mgo bo byos// nyi ma shar che 'phral la ni// nor 'dzin dum bu brgyar gyur to// skye ba gzhan la dung de ni// maud+gal gyi bu nyid gyur// bris pa shA ri'i bu 'di ste// de las/
249b5(skyes rabs): de tshe 'ang rgyal bar gyur// de dag gi ni sngon byung mtha'// 'di ni kun mkhyen gyis gsungs tshe// las kyi rgyud ni bkra ba de// slar yang thub pa rnams kyis dris// bcom ldan las ni gang dag gis// 'bras bu rmad byung 'byung ba 'di//
249b6(skyes rabs): ye shes rang bzhin khyod kyi yang // lus la gang gis reg par gyur// rdo ba'i zer mas khyod zhabs kyi// mtho snad pa ci yi snang// sang ldeng thur mes zhabs phug nas// rma dang bcas pa 'di ni ci// bsod snyoms mtho'i lhung bzed ni// stong
250a1(skyes rabs): par deng khyod byon pa ci// mdzes ma rab byung de yis ni// rdzun gyis khyod la smad pa ci// mi bden smad dang bcas gyur pas// khyod la slu bar byed pa ci// baM ran t+ya ru khyod kyis sngon// ko TA ra yi nas gsol
250a2(skyes rabs): ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis lo drug ni// dka' ba spyad par gyur pa ci// khyod kyi lus la rab gnon gyi// nad kyis ci yi slad du reg/ shAkya'i rigs ni 'jigs pa'i tshe// khyod kyi dbu ni bsnyung gyur ci// ci slad khyod kyi lus
250a3(skyes rabs): mchog la// rlung gis sku rgyab bsnyung bar gyur// de dag rnams kyis 'dri dris che// bcom ldan 'dzum bcas der gsungs pa// nyon cig rgyun chad med par ni// rnam par bkra ba las kyo rgyun// lus can los kyis 'ching
250a4(skyes rabs): ba ni// chas zhugs g.yog po dam pa bzhin// 'gro nas phyi nas 'gro bar byed// sdod na sngon du sdod par byed// nags rnams phyogasu 'jug cing phyogs su rnam par rgyal chu gter 'god par byed// ri yi dbang phyug la 'dzegs
250a5(skyes rabs): brgya byin gnas ni kun tu mnan nas mngon par 'jug/ sa 'og snang ba min pa'i yul du rab 'jug las rnams dus kyi dba' rlabs bzhin// 'di dag rtag tu skye bo'i rjesu 'jug pa'i lam ni gang na'ang 'gog pa med// las kyi
250a6(skyes rabs): 'khri shing ring po gsar pa nyid la rtag tu 'bras bu rnying pas khyab// ngo mtshar dang bcas lus can lhan cig spyod cing de la'ang nges par g.yo ba med// gang zhog dge ba rnams kyis bkug dang yongasu dkris dang rnam par gsal
250b1(skyes rabs): ba dang // rab bcad gcus dang nges par brdar dang phye mar byas kyang zad pa nyid mi 'gyur// glang thrig zla ba mdzes pa'i lus lha sgon ni thig le nag po dang // glang zhig mu 'dus rnam pa'i sbrul nag nor bu 'od zer ral can 'dzin//
250b2(skyes rabs): sna tshogs kyis bkra'i spyod pa lus can rnams la ston byed pa// 'di ni bkra ba'i rim pos yongs smin las kyis sprul pa'i ri mo yin// gzhal du med pa'i nor bskyed cing // bu mang chung ma dang ldan pa'i// khyim bdag kha ba Ta zhes
250b3(skyes rabs): pa/ kar pa Tar ni sngon byung gyur// de yis mdza' bsaM bskyangaswa yis// byis pa mug d+ha zhes bya ba// nor ma bgos pa'i spun zla ni// ma mig cig pa de khyim gnas// nam zhig khyim bdag de la ni// khyim bsam gtan gyi bAr skabasu/
250b4(skyes rabs): chung ma nag mo zhes bya ba// gya gyu can gyis dral bus smras// rje yi sras po rmongs pa las// bag med drang pos khyod kyis ni// khyim du ma mi gcig pa'i spun// dug gi ljon pa rnam par bskyed// 'gong bral gcig po 'di yis kyang //
250b5(skyes rabs): 'god ldan bu mang khyod kyis ni// bgos pa min pa'i nor dag las// phyed ni tshul gyis len par 'gyur// nad bzhin 'phel ba 'di lnga ni// gsad pa kha na smad kyi mchog/ gnyen nI gcod pa dag las kyang // mi rnams nor gcod zod par
250b6(skyes rabs): dka'// zab mo 'du 'god rtsom pa yi// 'khor bar skye ba 'os gyur pa// chen po rgud par ltung gyur na// gnyis 'thung dbang po 'gyel pa bzhin// zhes pa de yi gdug pa'i tshig/ thos nas bsam pa rab 'dar zhing // mdza' ba'i
251a1(skyes rabs): zhags pas dbang byas des// de lnga bcugs pas rab smras pa// re zhig khyod kyis phan pa brjod// 'on kyang 'di ni shin tu sdig/ phyi rol yan lag nor thob spyad// lhun skyes yan lag su zhig gan
251a2(skyes rabs): nor la chags rnams nor don du// sdig pa bsam pa rigs ma yin// nor rnams bsrung bar gyur mod kyang / skad cig ni brlag par 'gyur// yang yang las rlabs rtsom pa yis// rab bskyeng 'khrugs pa'i rnam 'phrul can//
251a3(skyes rabs): dpal rnams rnyi gzar chu bo bzhin// bgrod pa dag ni su yis zlog/ de smad sprin ldegs bdag gi yid// spyan zla gsod la yangs mi 'jug nor rnams bdag ni 'tsho ba sngo/ spyod tshul nyam so na 'gro ba gang // zhes smra bdag po de
251a4(skyes rabs): yi yid// sna tshogs rigs pa nyer bstan nas// dal gyi sdig pa dag la ni// de yis mngon par phyogs par byas// mdza' snum mA blo bskyed pa yi// lhan skyes spyi bor skyes po bzhin// bu med spu gri'i so rnon gyis// 'phral la bcad
251a5(skyes rabs): nas 'dor bar byed// rmongs pas bcom pa'i blo dang bud med ni// 'khyog cing gzhan la rab gdug bya min la// 'jug pa'i slad du brten pa mngon sbyor cing // sdig par nges par ltung bar byed pa nyid// gnyen dang grogs la chags
251a6(skyes rabs): zhing // sems ni rab bdes myos gyur pa// dpal ldan rnams la dud pa bzhin// bud med rgyal la blo gros gang // de nas de yi spun zla ni// me tog btu slang kha drangs nas// mi med nags su rdo ba yis// cho de thos pa med par
251b1(skyes rabs): bsad// de nyid nga yin sdig pa de// skye ba snga mar rnam sbyad nas// mthe bong snang pa'i mtshan nyid can// da lta 'ang lhag ma'i cha shas 'dzin// ded dpon don byin zhes bya ba// gzings ni gang bar gyur pa ston// rjesu mthun pa'i
251b2(skyes rabs): rlung dag gis// rin cheni gling nas yang dag 'ongs// de nas ded dpon gnyis pa ni// don nyams de la brten gyur pa// snang bas gzings la sbas pa yis// bug pa bya bar rab tu brtsams// ci ste don byin gyis mthong nas//
251b3(skyes rabs): yang dang yang du bzlog gyur kyang // sdang bas long de sdig pa yi// 'bad las skad log ma gyur// de nas don mthun bdag khris nas// khro ldan rnam par rmongs pa de// mi bauzang shag ti rab bsnun nas// srog dang bral ba nyid du
251b4(skyes rabs): byas/ de nyid nga yin de bsad las// sdig 'bras skye ba gzhan spyad nas// lhag ma'i cha shas da lta yang // rkang par seng ldeng rma 'dzin no// lag nas lhung bzed brtse ba yis// brlan pa'i blo ldan rang sangs rgyas// u pA riSh+Ta zhes pa
251b5(skyes rabs): sngon// ka shri'i grong du bslang slad zhugs// de yis lhung bzed yongs khengs pa// mthong nas sdang bas sun phyung ba// 'bras med g.yo ldan zhes pa yis// lag pa yi ni sa la pho// dwe ngas zas bcad las 'khrungs pa'i// sdig de skye ba
251b6(skyes rabs): mang por ni// spyad kyang 'bras bu lhag ma yis// lhung bzad stong pa nyid du gyur// ba shiSh+Tha zhes bya ba sngon// dgra bcom nyid thob sems rab dang // rab zhi'i dga' chel grong pa yis// byas pa'i gtsug lag khang na gnas// de yi
252a1(skyes rabs): spyan zla rab byung ni// b+hA ra d+h+wa dzA skye ba~M yi ste// bkur sti rtag rgyasna de mthong nas// sdang ba'i me yis gdungs par gyur// yon tan can rnams bkur mthong nas// de nyams slad du skye bo rnams// rab tu 'bad
252a2(skyes rabs): byed bdag nyid ni// yan tan gzung phyir brtson ma yin// chen po la 'os gos zung zhig/ skye bo gus pas phul ba ni// drang po'i sems can ba shiSh+Tha// mdza' bas spun zla de la byin// des blangs yon tan la sdang de// khon dang bral
252a3(skyes rabs): ba nyid ma gyur// phan pa rnams dang mdza' bas kyang // dran pa rang girwa mi 'gyur ro// de yaus gtsug lag khang skyong ma// dben par yang dag bos nas ni// gos ni zung dag de byin// bkur sti byas nas rab smras pa// gos zung
252a4(skyes rabs): 'di ni rked bzang ngam// khyed kyis gyon la skye bo dag/ 'di na ba shiSh+Na yis ni// byin zhes dral gyis smra bar bya// de skad de brjod de yis kyang // khrus blang sA de yis bstan pa byas// gang gi shrISh+Na la ni// skye bo slong bar dogs
252a5(skyes rabs): par gyur// tshul khrims ma tshangs brjod pus des// de nas grong pas ma mchod de// ring du song gyur chen po rnams// bkur sti nyams pas 'jigs pa nyid// b+ha ra d+hA dzi de bdag ste// 'phags la smad pos skye gzhan la/
252a6(skyes rabs): bsod nams min spyad de lhag las// mdzes mas dang yang rdzun gyis smad// bdag sngon bram ze'i phrag dog gis// ba ra NA ser thub pa ni// blo ldan mngon shre lnga pa yi// grags pa phrag dog dag gis bcom// me tog gzhu
252b1(skyes rabs): can grags pa yi// ba dAn ltar mdzes smad 'tshong ma// bzang mo zhes bya bud med mchog/ ba ra NA sir sngon byung gyur// g.yo ldan gya gyu'i bsnam pa can// pad rtsa zhes pas nam zhig de// mthong nas mtshan mo spyad pa'i slang //
252b2(skyes rabs): gos dang rgyan dag de la byin+da// de nas g.yo ba'i chags pa can// mtshams la 'grogs par mngon phyogs pa'i// nyin mor byed pa na mkha' yi// khyams kyi mthar ni babs pa'i tshe// bzang mo rang gi khyim song nas// me
252b3(skyes rabs): tog gos dang rgyan rnams kyis// mdzes pa nyid kyi rgyan la ni// slar yang zlos pa'i rgyan dag byas// smug rtsi rkang pa'i mthil la rab chags shing // do shal mchog gis mgrin par sbyangs nas kyang // bya ba don gnyer me long la
252b4(skyes rabs): phyogs te// smad 'tshong spyod pa'i don bzhin de yis byas// mgrin pa la gzhan bzhin gzhan mchu la gzhan// de bzhin gzugs can ma nges snying la gzhan// rnam bkra rang gi bya ba gzugs con bzhin// skyes bu chags byed nyid kyi rgyan
252b5(skyes rabs): rnams gzung // yid skyong rgyal ba'i grags pa zla ba'i gzugs ni dang po bzhin// lan bu thig le'i ri mo 'jo sgeg ldan par rab spras shing // rab 'phro gdug pa'i du bas rab rib thun mtshams bzhin bkra ba// chags pa dar byas yan
252b6(skyes rabs): lag dang bcas chags pa dor ba mdzes// de nas g.yog mi chu srin ma// zhes pa myur bar rab zhugs te// der smras skad cig 'grogs 'dod pa'i// gzhon nu gsar pa phyi na sdong // kaR+Sha pa Ni brgya phrag lnga// rtsa bzhin du ni ster bar byed//
253a1(skyes rabs): 'di ni khyod kyi ster bzhin 'ongs// nAng zhugs nyid ni phyi rol mthong // rab mang nor ldan gtong phod can// brel bas yun ring mi sdod pa// 'dod sgrib 'dod chags bzod pa can// skal pa bzang mo ga la thob// ces
253a2(skyes rabs): pa de yi tshig thos nas// yon dang chags pa'i rab tu ni// skad cig phyang mo yug pa bzhin// bzang mos 'dzum bcas rang smras pa// gzhan las gla ni blangs pa dag/ lam srang dag gi bud med bzhin// de dus don gnyer gzhan la
253a3(skyes rabs): ni/ lag bzed nyid du ji ltar 'gyur// skye dgu rnams bzhin thams cad kyi// dbang du gyur kyang skad cig ni// gang gis sngon nyid 'thams pa de// smad 'tshong bud med rnams kyi bdag/ mtshan mo gcig po 'di nyid ni// pad rtsas
253a4(skyes rabs): nyos la ci zhig brjod// gzhan gyi snga do 'ong du chug/ bdag cag rtag tu gsar pa rtsom// bzang mos 'di chung ngu des// mchog tu sbrang rtsi la chags bzhin// gsar pa gsar pa'i ror chags shing // khros pas de la rab smras pa//
253a5(skyes rabs): gal te 'ongs pa btang gyur na// song ba nang bar 'ong mi 'gyur// smad 'tshong rnams dang tshong ba la// skal pas nyo ba mang bar 'gyur// 'di nas cung zad 'dri nas dang // cung zad nyin mtshan du sogs pa// smad 'tshong rnams
253a6(skyes rabs): kyi skyes bu yis// rnyed pa me tog thu ba bzhin// smad 'tshong ma la rtag tu mdza'// slong ba rnams kyi rig pa bzhin// chos kyi slad min 'dod slad min// nor nyid slad du rgyas par byed// mang dang 'grogs pas smad 'tshong ma// mi
253b1(skyes rabs): gtsang ba nyid du mi 'gyur zhing // 'di yi brtul zhugs mo nyams to// slar la don du gtor byar 'gyur// gzhan dag phyir 'thon gzhan nang 'jug/ gzhan dag phyo nas rab lta ba'o// smad 'tshong gang do mdzes pa s+ho// sa yi bdag pol
253b2(skyes rabs): mdun sa bzhin// tshong pa dbul po'i srang bzhin du// stong par khyim na gang 'dug pa// smad 'tshong rnams la 'di las ni// lhag pa skal ngan gzhan pa ci// skal ngan gyis ni 'dzin byed med// 'phyon ma stong par nyal ba ni// snga dro
253b3(skyes rabs): 'dod ldan rnams kyi smra// rdzun gyis 'khrugs par sgrub par byed// 'phrul la nyo ba yongs btang nas// ring na gnas la skyugs pa na/ zong 'grems sa ru smad 'tshong ma// phreng ba bzhin du myur du skam// 'di ni dag mtshan tsam don gnyer
253b4(skyes rabs): bya bas brel zhing mang du ster// nang zhugs nyid na phyi rol 'gro// tso nyams nor ni blangs par mdzod// phan pa 'di thos bzang mo des// de bzhin zhes te kha yis blangs// smad 'tshong rang bzhini chags pa ste// rigs pa skye bo chags byeng
253b5(skyes rabs): nyid// skad cig nyid ni der bzod mdzod// bdag gi tshwa dang rgyan ma tshar// zhes pa'i phrin ni skye ba la// pad rtsa la ni g.yog mo btang // 'dod ldan mdzes pa zhes bya ba// mang po sbyin pas skad cig ni// glang pos pad+mo can bzhin de//
253b6(skyes rabs): spyad pas 'khrugs pa nyid gyur to// de nas de ni srong ba'i tshe// mchu ni sos bcad lhag mo dang / de yis brtse med 'byung ba yis// skad cig gis ni rnying nyid thob// slar yang rgyun ni rab bzung nas// pad+mo'i rtse la myur bar ni// byon zhes
254a1(skyes rabs): sdong ba sbas pa yo// grogs mo des na rnam par spongs// rnga mos smras pa'i phra ma las// rdo la sbyang tshul byad chub shos// 'ad nyid du na bzang mo dan/ shog ces khro ba smras par smras// de nas phrin zlos dri bzang
254a2(skyes rabs): gis// rkang drug pa ni 'gugs ma de// pad rtsas bsten pa'i skyed mos tshal// rkang 'thung me tog rgyas par song // di ni 'ong ba mthong gyur nas// chags sdang dug ni mi bzad pa// 'khor ba rnam pa dang bzhin// de ni rnam
254a3(skyes rabs): 'gyur ldan par gyur// de yis bsams pa g.yo ba yis// khaM don gnyer bar btags pa yi// rgyun rnams tshugs las gzhan dang ni// tsA bar spyad pas nyams par byas// sgyu ma rang spyod gya rgyu'i tshogs pa bzhin du nu ma'i ngos
254a4(skyes rabs): dag la// sen mo 'khyog por rab btab rnams kyis ri mo gAsar pa 'dzin byed cing // mchu 'dang mdzes pa g.yon can lhag mas nyams shing bzhin ni zad gyur pa// log 'gro ma 'dis bdag gi yan lag kun la mi bzang
254a5(skyes rabs): dug rnams spro// skad cig de byasams che bar rab khros pa'i// ma yis rab bskyed du ba'i rnam 'phrul ni// smin ma'i rnam 'gyur dus kyi bzhin ldan das// skrag pa rgyas pa de la rab smras pa// mang dang skad cig la 'grogs
254a6(skyes rabs): spyod 'i tshong grong // de ni drang po gzhan nor ci la 'dzin// badrag dron nyid du byas pa'i chos 'dri dag/ khyod kyi rdul gyi thigs pas lcug mar byas// zhes smras gzugs bzang ma yi 'og pag ma ni// g.yo zhing bskyod pa
254b1(skyes rabs): gsal ba'i sgra dag gis// drin mdzod bu mo gzhon nu bskrad pa'i 'os// srungs zhes dmun pas slong bar byed pa bzhin// bung ba'i phreng ba sgra sgrogs btibs pa yI// 'khri shing rnams kyang bzhin ni rab btud pas/
254b2(skyes rabs): lag pa'i yal 'dab kun tu g.yob byed cing // brtse bas ring nas zlog par byed pa bzhin// 'jigs rung bsnun pa'i stag bzhin brtse med desa?// yan lag 'khri shing skrag nyams ri dgas ni// g.yo yangs mig can
254b3(skyes rabs): bsad nas mgyogs pa yis// gtum mo mtshon cha khrag sbagasA rab tu song // gang zhig khro bA'i long bas mig bkag pa// de dag rnams la bya min ci zhig yod// rtag tu yid ni brtse bas dbul ba yi// spyod tshul brtse mid
254b4(skyes rabs): 'jigs rung rnams la yang // dben par bzang mo sdig can gyis bsad ces// de nas derwa ni 'bangs mos sgra bsgrags shing // skye bo 'dus tshe nyi tshe sangs rgyas kyi// nags mthar de ni rang dga' dag tu zhugs// de mdun
254b5(skyes rabs): khrag gis spags pa'i mtshon bzhag nas// skye bo'i tshogs kyi nang du de bros che// rtags 'dzin grong pas sdig pa med mod kyang // rang sangs rgya sti 'phral la bzung bar 'gyur// ma rungs gnod byed la 'os gsod pa'i
254b6(skyes rabs): sar/ de nas rgyal po'i bka' yis de khyer tshe// pad+ma'i rtsa lag 'phral la 'gyod pa skyes// sdig pa 'di ni bdag gis byas zhes smras// de nas de yi tshig gis rang sangs rgyas// dpyod nas rgyal pos phyag
255a1(skyes rabs): 'tshal btang ba'i tshe// ngan byed la 'os bzod pa dka' ba'i bka'// nyams myong nyid ni pad+mo'i rtsa bas thob// de drag po'i sdig des skye ba mang // 'bum gyis dmyal ba'i nang du longs spyad nas// de yi las
255a2(skyes rabs): 'bras lhag ma da lta yang // mu stegs bu mo'i rdzun gyis mngon par sbyar// grong khyer gnyen ldan dag na ston// bcom ldan rgyal ba rnam par gzigs// grong po'i longs spyod kyis mchod cing // dge slong tshogs kyis bskor te gnas//
255a3(skyes rabs): bram ze ma thar zhes pas// mchod dang ldan pa de mthong nas// glong pa la slas dge slong ni// mgo reg longs spyod 'os pa min// ko Ta ra yi nas rdul gyis// 'di dag gi ni kha zas sgrubs// mgo reg 'gyur bag ldan pa'i kha// mchog gi
255a4(skyes rabs): kha zas 'os pa min// bram ze de dag tshig de las// skye ba mang por de yi sdig/ spyad cing da lta las lhag gis// ko Ta ra yi nas kyis zas// gang tshe bdag sngon bram ze yi// khye'u u Ta ra zhes gyur// de che bdag gi rigs mchog la// smad
255a5(skyes rabs): pa yis ni mi dge thob// lasa? des da lta lo drug tu// dka' ba spyad pas bdagra gi sna bsgrubs// de las lhag pa byang chub kyis// bsrungs pa yis ni thob ma gyur// khyim bdag nor ldan zhes bya ba// kAr pa TAR+Shi sngon byung ste/ dpal ldan
255a6(skyes rabs): zhes bya de yi bu// lus ni rnal gnas min par gyur// de ni sman pa kha ba'i bzhin// zhes pa nor mang re ba yis// rnal gnas byas kyang de yis phas// de la ci yang byin ma gyur// dus kyis gzing ba nyid gyur te// yang yang de yis
255b1(skyes rabs): bos par byas// de yi pha la cung zad kyang // khas blangs smras pa thob ma gyur// sman pa khro ba'i rims kyis gdungs// sred pas g.yo ba'i shugs ring can// nad pa yis kyang 'gengs pa des// sdug bsngal las ni rab bsam/
255b2(skyes rabs): pa// kye ma bsam pa drang po bdag/ g.yo dang ldan pa dag gi bslus// bdag gi lag nas nang pa yi// gter 'das da ni ci zhig bya// tsha ba'i sman bzhin sman pa ni// nad pa rnams kyis sngon du bkur// gdung ba bsos par gyur
255b3(skyes rabs): pa'i phyir// dran yang kha ni rmugs 'byin byed// don grub la ni nor ldan dang // sgrol zin dag la grub pa bzhin// ma lus nad las grol gyur pa// sa la sman pa nye bar mkho// mchod dang zhabs la gtugs byas pas// nad pas
255b4(skyes rabs): sman pa rab bsten te/ phyi nas min+da ni bsgrags pa na// sos pa rnams kyis thud kyis 'debs// sngon pa rgyal po sman pa yi// 'ching las ri dwags tshim rkun dang // nad sos song ba bsod nams kyis// phyi nas spyod yul dag
255b5(skyes rabs): tu ltung // de ltar rab tu sems byed cing // da ni rtag tu yongasu gdungs// sman pa bzhin du khro ldan nad// slar yang de yis thob par gyur// de nas khro bas bsgribs pa yis// sman pas 'gal ba'i sbyor ba las// rgyu me 'chad par byed
255b6(skyes rabs): pa'i sman// 'phral la nyams byed de la byin// des byin gnod pa 'thungs pa las// de yi rgyu ma dum bur gyur// sdig pa'i g.yang la lhung ba yis// chags pas long rnams ci mi byed// sman pa nga nyid de yi sdig/ skye ba khri phrag brgyar spyang
256a1(skyes rabs): nas/ las kyi lhag ma da lta yang // rab gnon nad kyi cha shas bsten// nywa yis 'tsho ba rnams kyis sngon// nya ni lus chen gnyis dag bzung // lus ni gcod pa mthong gyur nas// nya pa'i bu yis dga' bar byas//
256a2(skyes rabs): de bdag de la yongs tshim thob// sdig pa skye ba gzhan spyad nas// shAkya nyams pa de yi tshe/ skad cig mgo la nad kyi rag/ sngon che ljongs kyi gyad gyur te// mdza' ba stobs zhes bya ba'i gyang // g.yul gyi zol gyis gshegs byas
256a3(skyes rabs): tete/ de yi rgyab ni rnam gnyis byas// de nga de yi sdig chen ni// skye ba mang por spang byas nas// rlung gi nad kyis du ltar yang // rgyab tu skad cig gnad par byas// de ltar byang chub rdzogs sangs rgyas// des bstan bdag gi lus la
