256a4(skyes rabs): yang // nyon mongs thigs pa las 'dam gyi// lhag ma'i cha shes nges par ltung // skye bar spro dang 'chi ba'i tshe yang skyes bu rnams lus la// bkra ba'i las kyi lam ni phreng ba bzhin du rnam btags pa// rab tu chags pa 'di ni/
256a5(skyes rabs): bde ba dang sdug bsngal mtshams dag la// spyad cing btang bar gyur kyang lhag ma'i lkog ma rnam par 'dzin// de skad bcom ldan gyis bshad pa// dge slong kun gyi thos gyur nas// las kyi 'ching ba rnam dag ni// 'da' bar bya min
256a6(skyes rabs): nyid du nges// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// las bcu spyad pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu pa'o// // gdung skyob
256b1(skyes rabs): zlo yis brtse bas mnyes gshin rnams kyis sgrog ni 'gro bar spro ba'i tshe// sku long rgyun phyi rol pa bstan cing shin tu rna ba'i mtshon gyis bcad pa ni// gang gi lus la g.yo ba'i mig can rna ba'i ut+pal gyis bsnun mtshungs pa thos/
256b2(skyes rabs): de dag spyod pa rgya che brjod byar 'os pa'i tshig ni gang gi brjod pA bya// sngon ni gsang ba'i kaM ba ra ta// da rA da btul bcom ldan 'das// yul de nas ni mi snang bar// dka' thub nags tshal gzhan du gshegs// de yi g.yog
256b3(skyes rabs): la 'ongs pa'i lha// bad+me sogs bdag po dag gis der// bzhin la 'dzum pa'i zla ba dag/ shar ba mthong nas rgyu mtshan dris// de la bka' stsal nags kyi mthi'// 'dir ni bdag gis sngon byung dran// dran pa nyam su myong ba las// bdag
256b4(skyes rabs): 'dzum 'di ste rgyu med min// zhes pa brjod nas bcom ldan gyis// sngon byung gsung bar rtsol ba mdzad// grong khyer ut+pal ldan par ni// grong khyer gtso bo'i bud med dag/ sbyin dang tshul khrims brtse ba can// gser ldan ma zhes grags pa byung // nam zhig
256b5(skyes rabs): de yis dbul po yi// bud med btsas shing ltogs pas gzir// sbyin mo bzhin du bu che dag/ za bar 'dod pa mthong bar 'gyur// de mthong snying rje rgyus gyur pa// de yis de skad cig yang dag bsam// kye ma rang lus la chags pas// blo ni sdig lha
256b6(skyes rabs): rab tu 'jug/ 'di yi zas ni len du bdag/ gal te rang gi khyim song na// bkres pas yongasu nyen pa 'dis// bu ni nges par za bar 'gyur// yang na bdag gis bu khyer nas// gal te khyim du phyin pa ni// 'di ni bkres pa nyid gyur te// 'phral le 'tshog
257a1(skyes rabs): gtong bar 'gyur// de ltar gnyis ka the tshom dang // ldan pa de la brtse bas bsams// 'gro ba bsgral ba'i slad nyid du// de yIs smon lam btab byas te// de yis gtang pa'i mtshon rnon gyis// g.yo ba
257a2(skyes rabs): med par bcad nas ni// de la rlung gi nu ma zung // 'tsho ba yi ni zungs la byin// de nas dri grags ngo mtshar can// 'jig rten gsum rag grags pa'i tshe// brgya byin bram ze'i gzugs kyis ni// mngon du phyogs te de la dris//
257a3(skyes rabs): khyod kyi nu ma byin pa yis// yid la rnam 'gyur ma byung ngam// zhes dris de la dag pa dang // bden smra ldan pa des smras pa/ nu ma byin la rnam 'gyur cha// gal te bdag la 'ga' ma gyur// bden pa de yis re zhig 'phral//
257a4(skyes rabs): bud med nyid nr-i ldog gyur cig/ de brjod tsam la bden ldan ma// de yis bud med gzugs btang nas// metshan nyid thams cad phun tshogs pa'i// skyes pa nyid du yang dag gyur// grong khyer ut+pal zhes bya ba// gnas skabs der
257a5(skyes rabs): ni tshwa rdzogs shing // nad kyi sbyor bas lhung bar gyur// de nas rab mchog rgan dang blon// mtshan nyid shes rnams mngon phyogs te// 'phral la skyes pa nyid thob pa// gser ldan de ni mngon dbang bsgyur// chos ldan mdzes pa'i dpal
257a6(skyes rabs): de yis// rgyal srid dag ni yun ring byas// dus kyis lus ni btang gyur te// lus can dag ni brtan pa med// de nyid du na de tshong dpon bu// snying stobs mchog ces bya bar gyur// zol med bsgrubs pa'i sbyin pa ni// skye bar goms
257b1(skyes rabs): la gus bcas pa'o// 'byung po kun gzir bsam pa la// rtag tu de yas yid bkod de// bzod dka' 'dab chags rnams nyid kyi// bkres pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag bsams// de nas dur khrod nag su de// song nas spu gris
257b2(skyes rabs): lus bkas te// gal rgyal nyal nas sha za bzhi 'dab chags rnams la rab tu byin// rim gyis de yaM mig g.yas ni// mthon por 'gro ba'i mkhar bgrod kyis// mchu yis phyung zhing rab phyung nas// yang dang yang du rab tu btang // brtan
257b3(skyes rabs): zhing yanA lAg kun mi g.yo// de yis ya mtshan bya mthong nas// smras pa dogs med nyid du zo// nga yis khyod ni yong mi 'dzin// ro bral snying po med pa'i lus// gnod bcas skad cig 'jig pa 'di// gzhan la phan pa'i cha shas kyis/
257b4(skyes rabs): 'khor ba'i snying po nyid du gyur// mi rnams lus ni mi gcing zag cing so so'i gnasu smad gyur dri ma can// gnod pa'i gnas su gyur cing dbugs dus g.yo la log par chags pa 'di ni ci// gang zhig bsod nams rnams kyis 'ga' zhig dag
257b5(skyes rabs): tu 'ga' la 'ga' tshe 'ga' mthong nas// gdung pa zhi byed skyo ba la zhugs gyur 'di nyid gcig pu 'di yi dga' bya nyid// ces pa smra ba de yi lus// bkres pas nyen pa'i bya rnams gyis// za zhing 'phangs pas skad cig la// rus pa'i lhag ma
257b6(skyes rabs): nyid du gyur// dus kyis de ni bram ze dag/ sa la chen po'i bur skyes te// bden po'i brtul zhugs zhes bya ba// skye bo dog gis bkur bar gyur// rig pa ma lus thob gyur cing // snying rje dag la chags pa'i sems// zhi bar dga' ba de yi yid// khyim
258a1(skyes rabs): thab las ni phyir phyogs gyur// rigs su skyes shing yon tan thob// blo glos dben pas rab brgyan cing // 'byung po kun la brtsu zhing byams// bsod nams las kyi mtshan nyid yin// gzhon nu de nyid chags bral gyis//
258a2(skyes rabs): dga' zhing dka' thub nags song ste// drang srong gnyis kyis brtul zhugs byin// bsti gnas su ni rdal bso bsten// de nas dus kyi ye shes spyan// dri med shin tu rno ba yis// stag mo btsA la nye ba dag/ mthong nas de yis yang dag bsnam//
258a3(skyes rabs): bkres pa yis ni gzir ba 'di// zhag bdun dag na btsa' bar gyur// rang gi bu ni za ba la// sgom pa drag po 'ang 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes bsams de yi sdug bsngal ni// thub pa dag la bshad nas des// snying rjes de ni phyir bcos pa'i// yid
258a4(skyes rabs): la reg pa byas par gyur// de nas zhag bdun 'das pa'i tshe// stag mo mngal gyi khur gyis dubya// zas chag mang pos gdungs gyur pa// dka' las chen+da pos bu tsha bcas// rang gi khrag gi dri yis ni// sred pa drag po rab bskyod pa// de mthong bden
258a5(skyes rabs): pa'i brtul zhugs ni// snying rjes brlan pas yang dag bsams// sdug ma 'di ni bkres pa yis// sdug bsngal dag las bu bzar brtson// kye ma 'di ni rang don gyis// bu la chags pa'ang brjed par gyur// rang sdug bsngal bas thams cad
258a6(skyes rabs): gdung // gzhan gyi yongasu gdung bas bsil// skye bo 'ga' zhig gzhan gdung la// khyad par ni gdung ba skye// bu dang bcas pa'i stag mo 'di// lus byin nas ni bdag gis bsrung // srog la the tshom yongs rdzogs pa// 'di bdag sdug
258b1(skyes rabs): bsngal yongs mi bzod// gzhan srog bsgrub la lus ni rtswa bzhin brtags pas gtong ba rnam dag gi// rgya che bsod nams rgyas pa'i rang bzhin grags pa'i lus ni brtan par 'gyur// gnod pa rab chags srog go theg pa 'di ni
258b2(skyes rabs): rab g.yo rlung dag gis// g.yo ba'i padad+ma ldan 'dab ma'i khongs gnas g.yo ba'i chu thig dag gis grogs// 'di bsams snying rje'i gter de yis// 'byed pa'i thur mas mgrin pa la// khrag zag rma ni btong byas nas// stag mo'i mdun
258b3(skyes rabs): 'gyel bar 'gyur// nges par bdag nyid che rnams kyis// yid ni snying rje mnyen pa dag/ nye bar bsgrub la chags bya ba pas// gzhan gyis yongs gdung bzod ma yin// de nas g.ye med de yi snying kha rab tu rgyas pa la// stag mo khrag
258b4(skyes rabs): mngon par 'dod pa rnon pos rab tu mchongs// dga' dang 'dzum skyes sen mo'i 'od zer dag gis 'gro ba la// 'phags pa'i spyod pa'i ngo mtshar rab tu 'bri bar byed pa bzhin// byams pas 'khrul bzhin bzod pas nyes byas bzhin
258b5(skyes rabs): drang shes rab kyis ni bsdam tshogs bzhin// sdug bsngal bzod dka'i bslad pa bstan pas bzhin dang nyon mongs dka' thub dpal gyis bzhin// brtsu ba de yos lus ni snying stobs sa gzhi g.yo ba med pa de nyid kyis// stag
258b6(skyes rabs): gi chung mas btab cing mi bzad drag por mngon 'joms gsal ba'i khur dge bzod// stag gi sder mo phreng ba'i rol pas rnam par bcom gyur pa// de yi snying kha'i gzhi ni rnam par nyams pa skad cig mtshon// lus ni spu long gi byugs
259a1(skyes rabs): bsil zer can ltar dkar ba yi// snying stobs rab gsal 'od zer myu gus khengs par gyur pa bzhin/ sha dag za zhing khrag 'thung myos par gyur pa'i stag mo ni// dga' dang bcas pa mthong nas 'gro ba de yi
259a2(skyes rabs): gi srog/ 'tsho ba dag ni ring du 'gro ba'i dus su 'brel gyur pas// yud tsam zhig ni mgrin pa nyid la brten te brtan par byas// sred pa'i rjes mthun rtse dga'i 'od dang 'gro ba dag gis na// ngo tsha'i dbang las bzhin ni mchog tu
259a3(skyes rabs): rnam par sdud pa bzhin// khyi thab las ni phyir phyogs gyur kyang de yi lag pa dag/ de yis bzung nas mdza' zhing bcugs ltar snying ni dga' bar byas// byams pas dag cing rnam 'gyur med pa rgya cher snying stobs dang //
259a4(skyes rabs): lugs bzang bsod nams chu bo 'jig rten rnams su grags pa dang // 'byung por phan pa'i rang bzhin dman la snying rjes brgyan pa'i sems// rang dbang nyid du gyur pa legs ldan bdag nyid rnams kyis yin// stag mo'i sder
259a5(skyes rabs): mo'i rtse mos bshig pa de yi snying stobs dag/ mtshungs pa med pa de mthong 'phrul la nor 'dzin bu mo ni// dba' rlabs rol pa dang ldan chu gtIru bzhi yi ska rags can// srog ni zhig pa'i dus na 'jigs pa bzhin du ring zhig 'dir//
259a6(skyes rabs): bden pa'i brtul zhugs snying rjer rab dga' de ni nga nyid de// da lta 'dar ni rang gi spyod tshul dran nas bzhad gde skyes// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa 'di ni thos gyur nas// ya mtshan yid ldan brgya byin de ni bzhin ras
259b1(skyes rabs): g.yo med gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ gan gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yul 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // gang
259b2(skyes rabs): zhig nags song shing shun ldan gyur kyang // slong rnams rgyun du don byas nyid du byed// spyod tshul mdzes ldan dre dang tsan dan gyi// ngo mtshar dag ni su yis bsam mi bya// de bzhin dka' thub nags gzhan la// bcom
259b3(skyes rabs): ldan bzhugs shing 'dzum ldan la// brgya byin ya mtshan ldan pa yis// 'dzum pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan dris// de yis gus pas dris pa'i tshe// de la kun mkhyen gyis gsungs pa// mig stong ldan pas gnas 'dir ni//
259b4(skyes rabs): sngon byung ba dag bdag gis dran// ma d+hu dra ka zhes pa yi// grong khyer lha grong lta bur ston// bsod nams mi dmun zhes bya ba'i// sa bdag sa yi rgyan du gyur// snying rje'i dga' dang btang snyoms dang // byams pa sems la
259b5(skyes rabs): yang dag chags// phrag dog can bzhin gang gi dpal// slong ba'i skye bo'i khang par gnas// nam zhig de yi spyod po ni// 'gro la grags pa thob gyur nis// sa yi bdag po tshangs pas byin// rgyal bar 'dod pa de can 'od //
259b6(skyes rabs): de nas glang po'i tshogs gtams pas// phyogs mtshams dag ni mun par byas// de ni rje su bcing ba'i slad// de yis grong khyer bcing bar byas// snying stobs brtse ldan mi yi bdag/ drin ni rlag par mi bzhed do// zhes
260a1(skyes rabs): bsams de yi blon po ni// ma brjod g.yul la phyi rol 'thon// glang po rta dang shing rta rnams// rlag byed g.yul ni rgyas par der// bsod nams mi dman snying rje yis// sdug bsngal gyur pas yang dag bsams//
260a2(skyes rabs): mi bzad rgyal rigs chos 'di ni// chos min brgya phrag dag dang ldan// ma rungs srog chags bsod pa ni// gang du chos shes mngon par brjod// khrag gis bsgos shing dri ma can// rgyal rigs rnams kyi chos 'di smad// gang gi
260a3(skyes rabs): ched du rab 'bad pa'i// 'tsho ba de yang rtag pa min// bde nyung blo yis bzod bya 'di ni skyes bu rnams kyi nyon mongs smin// gnod pa dang bcas gdung ba'i lam du rtag tu nyams pa nyid gyur cing / phyi nas dran pas sdug bsngal shugs
260a4(skyes rabs): rings dag gis brtan pa 'joms byed pa// longs spyod don du kyi hud kyi hud gzhan srog 'tshe la rab tu 'brad// de slong che dang sdig pa'i gnas// chos min mang ba'i rgyal srid 'di// yongasu bting la bdag nyid ni// dka' thub nags
260a5(skyes rabs): su 'gro bar bya// rgyal po mi shes rmongs rnams kyi// bsod dang 'ching ba brgyas bsgrubs pa'i// sdig pa mi bzad dpal 'byor ni// dus kyi kham du byed pa nyid// 'khor bar dus min dag tu bsam yas dus ni stobs dang ldan pa
260a6(skyes rabs): 'dis// skyes bu so so dag la skal pa'i mtha' ni so sor ster byed cing // shin tu che ba'i rmongs pas blo bcom re ba'i 'ching ba brtan po yis// yul gyi bde ba'i tshogs la sems byed skyes bu rnams kyi rtse dga' 'joms// zhes pas
260b1(skyes rabs): bsams nas mi bdag ni// 'tshe ba'i nyon mongs las phyir phyogs// dbyug pa shing shun bzung nas ni// mtshan mo dka' thub nags su song // de nas blon po g.yul zhugs pas// de ni song ba thos gyur nas// 'jig
260b2(skyes rabs): rten la bsgribs dgra bo ni// sgra sgrogs rgyags pas 'phyar la smras// nagasu glang chen myos pa dag/ drag po'i sgra ni ma sgrogs shig/ 'dir ni seng ge'i sprin gyi sgra// bzod pa min pa rnam par gnas// zhes smra brtan pa
260b3(skyes rabs): de dag gis// rje yi bya dga' stug po dang // go chas lus ni rab g.yogs te// g.yul du g.yul ni rab tu sprad// skabs dir ko sa la dag tu// bram ze ser sku zhes bya ba// rgyal po dbyib gi go cha yi// nor gyi chad pas gzir bar gyur//
260b4(skyes rabs): ma lus nor byin dbul ba la// mang po byin par mi bzod pa// bu dang gnyen rnams mtha' dag ni// brtson khang nang du rnam par bkod// gnyen tshan bcings pas sdug bsngal bas// bcos pa'i thabs ni rab bsams de// grogs po rgyal zin
260b5(skyes rabs): pa yi/ ri dwags bzhin du g.yo ba med// bdag gi pha ma sring mo dang // spyan zla bu mo bu dag kyang // btson+da ra dgra tu bcings gyur pa// nor med dA na ni grol mi 'gyur// sa bdag chos lnga sdang ba yis// gang na chags pa rab tu 'jug/ nyon
260b6(skyes rabs): mongs dag gis brlan pa yi// yul de rab tu btang bas 'tsho// yang na gnyen gyi 'ching thag gis// skye bo rtag tu bcings rnams kyis// sdug par gyur kyang yul dag ni// rab tu btang bar ji ltar nus// de slad nyon mongs
261a1(skyes rabs): nang 'di la// nar ni nye bar bsgrubs pa phan// nor ni thar min gdung ba grang // de ni 'jig rten dag na med// nar ni phun tshogs kyu rgyu ni// smad 'tshong ma bzhin rnam 'gyur can// don du gnyer nas 'bros
261a2(skyes rabs): par byed// don du ma gnyer rang nyid 'ong // ro bral 'khri shing rnying pa bzhin// ring skabs rje su 'ching ldan pa'i// 'gar ni 'ga' che tshegs chen gyis// g.yog la 'bras bu med pa nyid// slong ba dam pa'i skye bos spangs// ngo tsha'i
261a3(skyes rabs): rdul gyis yongs su rgyas// dman pa brgya yi lhag ma ni// 'bras bur bcas kyang 'bras med nyid// dang po'i dus su nye bar 'ongs pa'i ro la sngon du bsnyen bkur cha// de nas nor gyis cha bslangs yongasu 'dris las bkur pa
261a4(skyes rabs): rnam par nyams// srid pas blo gros g.yo ldan slong ba'i tshogs rnams nang du rnam bsams shing // skad cig las ni re ba'i 'ching ba yangs par byed cing dogs par byed// chags pa'i rang bzhin 'jig rten 'dir// nor
261a5(skyes rabs): gyis yon tan su zhig 'dzin// de slad thabs kun dman gyur pa// bdag ni 'gro ba med pa nyid// grib ma don gnyer lam bzang bzhin// rten med yid la ri ba yis// ngal bso thob par ma gyur to// skye bo'i nags tshal mchog
261a6(skyes rabs): tu shin tu stug por gyur pa 'dir// gang zhig rgyun tu skya bo slong la 'bras bu kun star yang // nam yang 'dar bar ma 'gyur dud pa nyid kyang mi gtang ba// rgyad la dam pa'i ljon shing de ni gang yang rnyed ma gyur// bsod nams mi
261b1(skyes rabs): dman sa yi dbang // slong ba kun gyi dpag bsam shing // phongs pa'i gdung ba mchog tu 'phro// snying stobs 'o ma'i rgya mtsho thos// de ltar yang dag bsams nas ngas// ra ba bcas pas brtan pa yi// lam nas dga' bas sna drangs te//
261b2(skyes rabs): mi bdag lta bar 'dod pas chags// de nas de yi dal bu yis// grong mtha'i dka' thub na gsu phyin// mi bdag shing los yongs bkris pa// lam gyi yongasu dub pas mthong // bkres sko ngal bla gzir ba de// mi bdag gis
261b3(skyes rabs): kyang mthong gyur nas// snying rje'i rgya mtshos ring po nas// 'od ba yi ni rgyu mtshan dris// de la de yis rang gi spyod// shugs rings che bas gsal byas pa// bshad nas gnyen rnams bcings pa yi// sdug bsngal gyis gzir slar
261b4(skyes rabs): yang bshad// gnyen ni bcings pa dgrol ba'i slad// mi bdag slong ba'i lha yi shing // bsod nams mau dman lta ba la// gser don gnyer ba bdag 'ongaso// thugs ni snying rjes rdzogs gyur pa// dpal ldan 'jig rten
261b5(skyes rabs): mgon po de// mthong ba nyid kyi 'phral la ni// bdag gi brnag pa rdzogs par gyur// nyon mongs gdung ba nyams mi byed// smad pa yis ni sun mi 'byin// dus ni rnyings pa ma yin par// skye bo chen po 'bras bu skye// skye dgu rnams kyi
261b6(skyes rabs): dbul ba'i rab rib mi bzad 'phrog byed cing // grags pas rab tu gsal ba'i 'byor pas phyogs rnams yongasu 'ogongs// dri med yid ni mngon par rengs byed dga' ba dag gi gnyen// lho yi bdud rtsi'i zer des bdag gi gdung ba
262a1(skyes rabs): 'phrog par 'gyur// zhes pa de yis bshad thos nas// sa yi bdag po gzir bar gyur// bcos thabs med pa'i gdung ba dag/ 'phos pa yi ni yang dag bsams// kye ma bdag gi rgyal srid btang // dus
262a2(skyes rabs): min 'dir ni gnyis skyes kyis// bsams te bkres pas nyen pa yis// lam gyi shing ni skam po bzhin// skyong ba rnams la lAm ring gi/ ngal ba 'bral med gdung ba ste// ri dgas sred skyes chu lta bu// rmongs pa skyed byed bdag smad do//
262a3(skyes rabs): kha la rdo bsnun mtshungs pa yis// brgyal bar gyur bzhin don gnyer rnams// re ba nyams pas lam du ni// yongs ngal lci ba nyid du 'gyur// rgyal po de ni bdag yin te// rgyal srid btang nas nags tshal bstan// ces pa thos nas bram
262a4(skyes rabs): ze 'di// 'phrul la srog ni gtong bar 'gyur// 'di nas rgyal po'i gnas phyin te// bsams pa dgu ni ma thob nas// yid la re ba nyams pa 'di// gdung bas ci zhig byed par 'gyur// slong rnams phyir bzlog bzhin log tsha ba'i shugs
262a5(skyes rabs): rings dag gis gdung byed cing // kun tu rtogs pa lus dman chung ngur byos shing gang las mi 'gro ba// nyon mongs dus su mi rnams sems la 'phral la rab tu gsal ba gang // dag ldan yongasu skyob gnyen bsngags 'os gcig
262a6(skyes rabs): pu de nyid 'tsho ba yin// rang nyid rab bsrungs gdung ba'i nyams myong shos shing ri byi'i lto ba'i phug du blugs byas te// smin byed me yi rab tu gdung ba'i byed pas khyab cing 'tshed pa'i bya ba yongasu 'dris gyur kyang // slong ba'i tshogs
262b1(skyes rabs): kyi sred pa drag pos bskrad pa'o ma bzung gdung ba 'phrog pa min pa gang // skye bo 'gron po'i gdung ba shugs rangs chobs bskol zhong 'phel bar 'gyur byad rgya mtsho'i skyo ba spyad// de ltar skad cig bsams byas nas/
262b2(skyes rabs): rgyu dang 'bras bus mgron byas te// mi snyan+da smra bas 'jigs 'jigs bzhin// mi yi bdag pos de la smras// bsod nams mi dman rgyalnga po nga // bram ze dgye bsod sbyor ba'i tshe// tshe las chags bral rgyal srid ni/
262b3(skyes rabs): yongasu btang nas dben pa bsten// sa skyong longs spyod 'tshe ba'i 'bras// smin 'khyog lta bur mi brtan par// gsar pa'i khrag gis sbags pa ni// srin po bzhin du longs spyod byed// gnas min 'dug sa ci zhig gyur// khyod ni
262b4(skyes rabs): dus minA nye bar 'ongs// cung zad bdag gos nus pa glang // de ni bsdams pa med par brjod// ces pa rgyal po'i tshig thos nas// rdo rjes yang dag bcom pa bzhin// gnyen thar re ba bral ba las// de ni sa la 'gyel bar gyur//
262b5(skyes rabs): brgyal zhing sA la 'gyel pa de// mthong nas mig ni mchi mar bcas// snyan pa'i tshig gis dbugs phyung nas// rgyal pos slar yang rab bsams pa// kye ma bdag ni bsod nams dman// mya ngan lam dang mtshungs pa 'dir//
262b6(skyes rabs): slong ba'i re ba'i 'khri shing gis// myu gu 'phral la skams par gyur// nor don gnyer ba blun po'i 'dod pas dang por gnas min slong ba 'bras bcas bsams// re ba'i myu gus 'dod pa'i bde ba ma lus yal ga stong gi mngon par
263a1(skyes rabs): bris// de nas a mra thob par ma gyur seng ldeng skam pos bzhin du skad cig la// shin tu che ba'i rtsom pa nyams shing re thag chad pas 'phrul la brgyal bar 'gyur// bslangs nas rnyed pa chung ngu zhig/
263a2(skyes rabs): gal te 'di la bdag gis byin// bsod nams bslangs kyang ltogs gyur pa// 'di la des kyang ci zhig byed// gal te rtswa chag rnying pa dag gis thog phub khyim ni de nyid du gnas shing // gang yang bud med byi la'i phru gu thab tu
263a3(skyes rabs): nyal la rtse ldan de dag gis// gal te rkang pa nyid kyis 'gro zhing slar yang de ni bstan bya de lta na// da ni nges par sa bdag skad cig mthong dang mgu ba la yang yon tan ci// blo gros rtse bas nor 'dzin gyis// de ltar bsams nas
263a4(skyes rabs): 'dzin pa dbang // de 'dod bsgrub par chas gyur pas// rab sad byas te de la smras// longs shig bram ze khyod kyi ni// 'dod pa grub slad mi thogs par// 'bras bu 'thob pa'i thabs kyi mchog/ bdag gis yang dag rnyed
263a5(skyes rabs): par gyur// re zhig bdag gis mgo bcad nas// song ste sa bdag tshangs byin la// byin na de ni dga' ba yis// khyod la nor dag ster bar 'gyur// skyong ba'i tsan ljon pa de'o// tshig de thos nas gnyis skyes ni// rna bar rab zhugs gdung bya
263a6(skyes rabs): yis// khab kyis phug bzhin rab smras pa// srid gsum snying po skye ba ni// 'gro ba'i bsod nams kyis thob pa// khyod ni mgrin pa 'di la mtshan// brlang po sdig can su zhig bsnun// chags pas blo gros nyams pa ru// khyod
263b1(skyes rabs): sa mi phan sems par byed// sa d+ha kA ra s+phopA ba yi// rgyur ma rungs su zhig byed// ces sgra zlum T+wAM dwe lA ni// mi yaM bdag pos lan smras pa// 'tsho yang bdag ni bcings pa yis// dgra bo da yi drung du khyer//
263b2(skyes rabs): 'bad pas don gnyer bso// sa bdag dbye yi dogs pa can// tshangs byin dag gis drung du ni// de yis de ni bcings nas khyer// de yis khyer nas 'ongs pa yi// sa dbang de blangs tshangs pas byin// 'dod bya bas kyang mngon lhag byan/
263b3(skyes rabs): babasod nams mi dmanA mi bdag gis ni snying stobs ngo mtshar bram zes bshad thos nas// khon gyi rnam 'gyur shin tu bzod dka' ma rungs nyid du mngon brjod drug btang ste// rang gnas shin tu mtho bar de ni mgo bzhin bzhag
263b4(skyes rabs): nas tshangs byin rang nyid kyis// de yi zhabs kyi chu skyes dag la gtsug gtor phreng bas skad cig mdza' bar byas// do na dul ba rab thob rang gi grong khyer song ba'i tshe// yongs btang rgyal srid yang dag thob nas bsod nams mi dman
263b5(skyes rabs): pas// grags pa ltar dkar dbu ba'i phreng ba g.yo ldan chu gtar gyis// du gu lA yis rnam mdzes sa gaN+DI chos kyis bskyangs par 'gyur// khyab bdag bsod nams mi dman du gyur gang de nga nyid de// gang du dus kyis dge
263b6(skyes rabs): 'dun mang po'i zhabs kyis mngon dga' sa// mi rnams dag gi srid pa gro ni rgyu ni 'byung 'gyur ba// 'dir ding de yi spyod tshul srid pa'i snying po dag gos dran// sngon gyi rtogs pa brjod pa gsung mdzad bcom ldan 'das kyi ni// tshul
264a1(skyes rabs): sems dpa' rab 'bar thos nas ya mtshan rgyas pa yis// dga' bas reg par gyur zhes pa mtho ris bdag po'i lus la ni// spu long 'dab ma mdzes pas spras pa ci yang byung bar gyur// ces pa
264a2(skyes rabs): dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// mi dman pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// legs bshad mgrin par rnam gnas
264a3(skyes rabs): bla ma la 'dud mgo dang rna bar thos pa dang // zhal ni rtag tu skon med bden pa dang ldan mkhas pa rnams ni dga' ba'i rgyan// rin chen yid 'ong rab gsal do shel bkod pa bkra ba'i khyad par dang bcas pa// chas ldan bud mang
264a4(skyes rabs): chas kyi skye bo lhag ma rnams ni mchog tu tshim pa skye// gzhan du bcom ldan 'dzum ldan la// brgya byin bsam pa shes pa yis// 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni dris pa can// thams cad mkhyen pas yang gsungs pa// da ra NA sir mi yi bdag/
264a5(skyes rabs): legs bshad tshol ba zhes pa byung // gang gi grags pa dri med rigs// dpal gyi phreng bu bzhin du mdzes// yon tan skud ldan legs spyod zlum// dben ldan rnams kyi snying la chags// mu tig gi min legs bshad kyi// rgyan nyid gang
264a6(skyes rabs): zhig don gnyer gyur// gang gis mdzod dpal slong rnams la// rtag tu btang yang g.yo ba med// grags pa yon tan la brtags kyang // ring las shin tu ring bar 'gro// rgyal po'i dang pa snyan dngags mkhan// nyams ldan mchog gis rtag
264b1(skyes rabs): bskur te// mkhas pa'i mdun sa pad ldan la// longs spyod skal ldan bzang ldan par gyur// nye bar bstan la rab zhugs pa// de yi legs bshad yon tan can// mar mye'i rtse mo lta bu yis// skye bo rmongs pa'i rab rab phrog pa// nam
264b2(skyes rabs): zhig mdun sar blo bzang des// 'dug pas legs bshad gtan gyi ni// mjug tu blo bzang zhes pa yi// blon po'i gtso la rab smras pa// legs pa'i sgra dang tshig la zhon// yon tan rgyan dang yang dag ldan// khyed rnams dag la
264b3(skyes rabs): legs bshad kyis// mdun sa dag gi bkad bzhin mdzes// legs par smin cing ro dang ldan// legs par bshad pa gsar pa ni// me tog lta bu 'ga' zhig ni// khyed kyis rnyed par gyur tam ci// legs bshad rnams dang mthun rnaM
264b4(skyes rabs): dang / dogs pa rnams kyang rgyas pa ni// gsar pa kho na yid 'phrog ste// bud med rnams kyi lang tsho bzhin// ro dang ldan yang rnam par yangs pa'i me tog don mthun yongs btang nas// yongs 'dris yongasu 'dor zhing ring nas ring du r+Ne suM
264b5(skyes rabs): rgya byed pa// gser pa gsar pA'i sbrang rtsi la chags rkang drug pa ni nAgs rnamasu// rtag tu nyams su myong gyur rin chen mAn+da rA las 'khyam par byed// mdun sa 'dir ni cung zad gang // legs bshad rIn chen rnam dpyad de// yongasu
264b6(skyes rabs): rtags pas thar pa de// kun tu rin theng med par 'gyur// mkhas pa nyid ni med na blo gros rnam nyams mi rnamo 'tsho ba don yod min// mtshungs medo rgyas pa'i snyan dngags med na mkhas pa nyid na ne tso'i klog dang mtshungs// snying ldan
265a1(skyes rabs): rnams kyis nang gi de nyid spyod med par mdzes snyan dngags ni// stong pa nyid de dben sa'i khron pa'i mar me bzhin du nang du bsten par gyur// de yi slad du gnas skabs 'dir// khu byug sgra yis bye zla bzhin// legs
265a2(skyes rabs): bshad go skabs grogs po yis// gsar pa cung zad brjod par mdzod// gal te skad cig de nyid shes pas mchog tu yid rton sgrub byed na// tshig rnams kyi ni dza ti'i dri bzung ngo mtshar ba dag skyed par byed// ji srid skye bo legs bzhin
265a3(skyes rabs): brjod la go skabs med pa ma thob min// dri lta na yang mchog gi tshogs la lhag par bltar byas 'bras bral ba// de skad mi mgon gyis brjod pa// blo ldan snying lnga reg pa'i tshi ga thos nas blon po chen po yis// sa yi bdag la lan
265a4(skyes rabs): gsol pa// rgyal po khyod kyi tshigs bcad nyid// mngon par gsar pa srid gsum na// sgrogs nr-i mkhas pa'i dbang phyug dag/ legs bshad rgyas pa gzhan gyi ci gus ldan gtong phod mchod gyur khyod// rig pa dag la 'gyel pa 'dir
265a5(skyes rabs): sa mthil 'di thams cad ni// rig pa 'dzin pa'i grong khyer gyur// khyod nI yon tran ldan pa'i grogs// sgyu rtsal pad+mo ldan pas mdzes// shar tshe skye bo mtha' dag ni// snang bcas legs po'i lam nas 'gro// grang dang gang la rgyal
265a6(skyes rabs): po rje su chags pas skad cig ni// gus pa'i cha byas pa'i sgyu rtsal dag ni de dang de rtse dga' chas kyi bye brag de de yon tan de de dang // skye bo spyod tshul de de 'jig rten dga' ba nyid du 'gyur// sa skyong mkhas na rig pa'i rtse dga' spro la
265b1(skyes rabs): mchog tu reg par 'gyur// dpa' na g.yul gyi rol pa dang 'grogs brtul zhugs 'dzin par 'gyur// blun na rmongs shing g.yo na rnam par g.yo la gdug na ma rung spyod gang gang sa bdag byed pa da mtha' dag skye bo
265b2(skyes rabs): byed par 'gyur// me tog 'byung gnas legs pa yis// me tog rgyas byed nyams dang ldan// sa bdag rang nyid mkhas pa dang // skye dgu'i bsod nams nyid kyi 'byung // skye bo legs spyod blo ldan blon po dang // mi bdag mkhas
265b3(skyes rabs): shing bden par smre byed pa// 'di dgra rnams ni dge ba daR+sha ba'i dus// mngon sum du mtshon mtshan nyid bzang po yin// gang zhig gnas dang gnas su dgros don nyid la blo ldan blo ni gar byed cing // gleng zhig 'byor tshe legs ldan
265b4(skyes rabs): bdag nyid bdag nyid rnams kyi legs bshad rna ba'i rgyan du gyur// gang 'di mi bdag bdag nyid che rgyas rgyu yis dbul ba'i dbyangs can dag gi ster// 'di ni rang nyid dam pa'i cho ga dag la rig pa'i khyim thab spro dgang yin
265b5(skyes rabs): rgyal po'i bkur ba chen po yis// dam pa'i yon tan mdzes pa na// nags su rngon pa rnams kyang ni// nus pa rnam par bkra la chags// rngon pa gdug pa can zhus pa nags rgya mtha' 'khob dgu na gnas// de las rtag tu
265b6(skyes rabs): legs bshad kyis// rin chen gsar pa gsar pa 'thob// dregs ldan gnyis 'thung dgra sder ni// bsnam gral glang po'i mu tig gis// snyan ngag mkhan gyi don mthun las rtag tu de yis legs bshang blangs zhes pa
266a1(skyes rabs): blon po'i tshig thos sa bdag gis// mdun sa pa bkye mdun sa rab btang nas// smras pa'i gzugs kyis pho brang 'khor song ste// thun mong skye bo'i rje su mthun par byas// skar tshogs rgyas bya lta bu
266a2(skyes rabs): mngon dga' zhing // phan tshun 'od zer rab tu gsal byed pa'i// do shal bzung nas legs bshad gnyer de// grib ma gnyis pa dang bcas nags mthar song // der ni nges par dud pa'i shing rnams kyis// me tog rlung
266a3(skyes rabs): gzhon gyis bkram mgron byas bzhin// de yis 'bad btsal bas sngon pa ni// sngon la rab chags ri yi ngos su rnyed// glang po rnams kyis bde ba'i mi mthun phyogs// ri dwags rnams la yug sas 'debs byed mkhra// /
266a4(skyes rabs): 'khyegs po'i rim pa shin tu ma rungs gzhu// rang sems lta bu lag pa g.yon pas 'dzin// rtag tu nags na nus pa'i mi mthun phyogs// gsod pa gcig bu la mkhasde lag g.yas kyis// lag ldan sde rnams mtha'
266a5(skyes rabs): dag byang grol la// rnam par 'grod pa'i mdu' ni rab tu 'dzin// rtse mo rlung gis dral gyis bskyod pa yi// rma bya'i sgro yis stod g.yogs bsgrubs gyur pa// skyug pas g.yo ba ri dwags rnams kyi mig/ bdag po'i 'tsho ba
266a6(skyes rabs): bsrung bar gsol 'debs bzhin// des de tshig gi mngon mchod mchod bya bzhin// skye dgu'i bla mas phyag 'tshal bla ma bzhin// mchu mdzes dmar ba phye ba'i so yi 'od// yal 'dab lta bu 'dzin cing rab smras pa// khyod ni
266b1(skyes rabs): rtag tu legs pa'i legs bshwad rnams// sdug la rab tu 'bad pa bdag gis thos// skye bo'i lam bstan slad du legs bshad kyi// rin chen sgron ma gAs rA pa cung zad stsol// rang gzugs rol pas zla ba'i
266b2(skyes rabs): dreg sna 'joms shing // dpral gyi 'jo sgeg 'dzum pa'i rtse dga' bskyed// mun pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms pa'i do shal 'di// khyod kyi de yi dong po'i rang bzhin yin// zhes brjod do shal 'od kyis phyogs khengs pa//
266b3(skyes rabs): sa yi 'byer 'jig drag gis de la bstan// rmi lam re ba rnams lo rnyed dka' // rngon pas mthong nas dal gyis rab bsams pa// klog cing bdag la sbyin bya byin nas kyang // phyin nas 'di ni nges par gdung bar
266b4(skyes rabs): 'gyur// 'di ni 'jig rten pha rol sar 'das na// do shal ji ltar bdug rang nyid du 'gyur// skad cig 'di bsams de la des smras pa// dge ba dam tshig gis ni logs bshad bzhin// gal te ri 'di'i rtse las rang gis
266b5(skyes rabs): lus// legs bshad thob pa'i 'phral la mchod na'o// gdug pa'i sems ldan rngon pa'i tshig de dag/ thos nas sa yi bdag pos rab bsams pa// kye ma nges par 'du byed ldan pa 'di// dgag pa'i bya spyod dag la mngon
266b6(skyes rabs): par sbyor// ring du yon tan bskrun par grags gyur cing // mngon du ngan pa'i spyod pa mtshon gyur pa// bsam pa gya gyu rnams kyi grags pa gzhan// de bzhin spyod tshul gzhan de mtshungs pa min// ngan pa di ci nags mthar gnas
267a1(skyes rabs): pa tsi/ sems can 'tshe ci yon tan mngon sbyor ci// legs bshad brjod ci brtse ba med nyid kyi// kye ma 'di yi spyod tshul rmongs pas bcom// rgyun du mdun nas snyan pa'i glu len cing // nags kyi
267a2(skyes rabs): brtul zhugs rnams kyis zhi bzhin mdzes// sred ldan rnon pa'i yon tan bsdu ba ni// srog nI 'phrog byed ci zhig brjod pa 'am// rig pa'i khyad par dag la 'bad byas kyang // mi srun nges par brlang po'i rang bzhin
267a3(skyes rabs): nyid// gdengs ka'i rin chen mdzes 'dzin sbrul rnams ni// gdug pa'i mun pA khro ba'i rang bzhin 'dzin// bstan bcos man ngag rnams kyis dag byas kyang // nges par blo ngan rab dang nyid mi 'gyur// ga pur tshogs
267a4(skyes rabs): kyis yongasu bsgos gyur kyang // mi bzang sgog pA rang gi dri mi gtong // yun ring 'di spyod yon tan don gnyer des// gsar pa'i nyer bstan nyan par mngon 'dod las// legs bshad stsol cig sA 'dzin ngos rtse las// phyi
267a5(skyes rabs): nas lus ni dor bar bya zhes smras// bden pa'i nor ldan de yi tshig thos nas// do shal 'od kyis gtsug lagu khang blangs te// bzung bar mdzod ces brjod nas phra mor ni// rigs pa min la chags pas brjod
267a6(skyes rabs): par brtsams// rang bde'i lam gyi drag tu gdung byed sdig dang nyon mongs reg mi bya// tshul khrims kyis kyang dge ba'i gnas kyi bsod nams tshogs la mchog tu bstan// g.yo ba'i yul gyi nyams myong dag la lhag
267b1(skyes rabs): par chags pa'i sems 'di ni// chags dang bral zhing mngon 'dod mtha' yas chog shes dag gis tshim par bya// 'di ni bde gshegs bstan pa dag dang rab zhi rgyal srid seng ge'i khri// mi rnams dag gi
267b2(skyes rabs): gdung bya skyob byed dge ba'i chos ni thun mong nyid// yid 'byung rnam par sel byed srid pa'i rnam 'gyur dag ni kun tu 'joms// yid kyi me long dge byed legs byas tshogos ni nye bar bsgrub pa yin// legs bshad
267b3(skyes rabs): 'di ni mi bdag de nyid NAM su 'brang bas rI dwagras dgra las rnyed// legs bshad don ni dri med bdag nyid dag byed de yang snying la rnam bkod nas// shin tu mtho bo'i ri yi rtse morA 'dzegs nas lus ni rab tu btang bar
267b4(skyes rabs): gyur// bsod nams yid ldan rnams ni shin tu bden+d+ha pa 'dod kyi g.yo ba'i lus ni min// 'gro rnams yong dag bsgral skud smon lam dag ni nang nyid du// bzung nas de ni ri yi rtse las ji srid ltung gyur pa// de
267b5(skyes rabs): srid ri yi gnas bsten rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i// gnod sbyin gyis bsrung lus ni sa la rabA tu phyin par gyur// de yi brtsin 'grus ya mtshan dbyang gis bzhin du 'jig rten gsum// 'dar bar gyu rA cing bar snang
267b6(skyes rabs): las kyang me tog char bab che/ gnas skabs gsum pa'i tshogs kyi spyod tshul yang dag mchod gyur pa'i// rgyal po dal gyis rang gi rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu song // de nas der ni phan par rab zhugs sa yi dbang po yis// nye bar
268a1(skyes rabs): bstan pa'i yul can legs par bshad pa de yis ni// rtag tu skye bo mA lus srid pa zil gyis gnon byed pa// chos kyi bde ba rtag pa dam pa'i las la 'god pa bsgrubs// gnas skabs 'dir ni
268a2(skyes rabs): tshong dus dag gis lam du rngon pa 'di// do shal btsong ba'i blo yongasu rgyu bar byed pa ni// 'di ni chom rkun pa zhes mtshungs me bab chol 'dar ldan pa// sA bdag mdun sar grong khyer srung ba'i skye bos khyer bar 'gyur// ring
268a3(skyes rabs): po nyid nas do shal 'od zer rab gsal rnam 'phro chags gyur pa// srog ni 'joms pas dam tshig bsgrubs pa de ni rgyal pos shes gyur nas// 'di ni bdag gi slob dpon zhi ba'i yon tan gsal ba'i legs
268a4(skyes rabs): bshad ston// mchod 'di zhes btud byas mchod pa byas nas de ni btang bar gyur// de ltar mi bdag legs bshad ces bya bden pa'i brtul zhugs snying stobs ldan par gyur// de nyid dus kyis slar yang rdzogs pa'i
268a5(skyes rabs): byang chub gter thob bdag nyid pa yin no// rang gi spyod tshul bcom ldan gyis bshad pa de dag thos nas lha rnams bdag po ni// dga' bas sbyin gyi nags tshil rnam par rgyus pa pad+mo'i 'byung gnas dpal bsten
268a6(skyes rabs): gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// legs bshad tshol ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yab 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o//
268b1(skyes rabs): rgyu che grags pa bsten pa'i bsngags 'os ri bod can ltar mdzes// gtsug gi nor bu gzhan gyi don la skyo ba med pa'i dung // glang zhig srog ni song bar gyur kyang legs pa'i sgra yi gnas// bak+ku shis gter gyis 'jig rten dag
268b2(skyes rabs): gau dge ba rgyas par byed// me tog can ma zhes pa yis// mtshan rgyu btul nA bcoM ldan 'das// ri dwags 'phrog byed brtul zhugs ni// dogs med ldan pa'i tshe la na bzhugs// der ni rtis song brgya byin gyis// slar yang 'dzum ldan
268b3(skyes rabs): dag la dris// de yi sngon spyod dran gyur nas// 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni rab tu gsungs// lo ni stong phrag bdun cu gnyis// skye bo tshe rang gyur che sngon// grong khyer dbang chen ldan zhes pa// mtho ris dga' ba thul bar gyur// der ni nor gyi
268b4(skyes rabs): blo gros bdag/ dbang cheni sde zhes bya ba byung // gang gis grags pa ga pur gyi// sdong bus phyogs ni mun bral byas// grang zhig sman pa dam pa bzhin// dgra yis dregs pa'i rim bcom zhing // skabs ngan bsten pa'i nad phrogs
268b5(skyes rabs): taM// skye dgu sred bral rnal gnas bsgru swa// bsod nams tshogs ni rnam bcas nyid// gyur pa bzhin du de yi bu// sems can kun la phan brtson pa// sems can sman zhes bya bar gyur// de ni bskal pa bzad po pa'i// byang
268b6(skyes rabs): chub sems dpa' sems dpas brgyan// snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms dang // byams pa rnams kyi grogs su gyur// grong dang grong khyer nags mtha' dang // phyogs dang gling rnams thams cad nas// nad pa 'ongs rnams rtog
269a1(skyes rabs): tu ni// de yis reg pas bsos par gyur// skye bo'i nags 'dir dam pa de// tsAn bzhin du ci yang sbyod// gang gris lus kyi gzhan phan ni// mi chung rab tu rgyas par byed// chen po'i nad kyis gdung ba rnaMs//
269a2(skyes rabs): de yis 'phral la bde bar bsgrubs// ngan pa'i nyon mongs gdung po rnams// dam pa dag dang 'grogs pa bzhin// don gnyer rnams kyi lus ni nad// reg pa dang ni sems kyi yang // nor gyi phrogs pas phyogs rnams su//
269a3(skyes rabs): nad pa med ci ba slong med gyur// de nas dus kyi rtse dga' ni// ngo mtshar thams cad 'phrog byed pa// skye bo'i bsod nams yongs zad las// dpal ldan de ni mtho ris so// bdud rtsi'i zer ni nyin 'ga' mig rnams dag gi myang bya'i bdag
269a4(skyes rabs): nyid 'gyur// yon tan dri bzang spro ba'i ma tog rnams ni skad cig gnas pa'i tshogs// dus min dus ni 'dod pas mchog tu dga' ba shAn tu gcod la mkhas// ci yang 'di ni su yi yid la zug rngu lta bur sgrub ma yin// gang
269a5(skyes rabs): zhig yid 'ong bsod nams yangs pa'i zong gis rnyed gyur pa// gdung ba kun gyi sman dang 'bad med bde ba skad cig gis// nges par dus kyi cha yis 'joms pa de de mthong gyur nas// blun po rnams ni dben pa'i cha la ni ma yang mI reg go//
269a6(skyes rabs): de nas de dgrags lhag ma'i tshe// dang po de la bral las skyes pa'i// sdug bsngal btang nas nad rang bzhin// skye bo rang gi sdug bsngal bstan// de nas gzhon nu dag gis lus// mtshan nyid shes pa'i blon po yis// nags kyi mtha'
269b1(skyes rabs): ru rab bsrungs te/ skye bo rnams la phan slad bkod// me tog 'khri shing gis rgyas pa// rdzing bu dga' ba'i gnas dAr ni// bsod nams bzhin du de yi lus// rnyings pa med pa nyid du gnas// re bas phyogs mtha' las
269b2(skyes rabs): 'ongs pa// nad pa'i tshogs kun slar yang ni// de yis yang dag rig tsam gyis// 'phral la bsos pa nyid du gyur// de yis reg pa'i rlung gis rnam bskyod pad+ma'i tshogs rnams dang // chu la rgyu bas brgyan pas 'tsho skyes can gyi chu la
269b3(skyes rabs): ni/ khrus byas mtha' dag nad las rnam grol skyon dang bral gyur cing // 'phral la nyid du mi rnams bdud rtsi 'thungs bzhin rab tu mdzes// gang gi ming ni bsgrags nyid kyis// nad rnams zad po nyid 'gyur bA// gang zhig gzhon nu sems
269b4(skyes rabs): can sman// der ni nga nyid de tshe gyur// dran pa'i bdud rtsi bdag gis btam// 'di dag su zhig dran na yang // de yi nad gdung rang bzhin gyi// sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar 'gyur// dus kyis yul 'dir mi yi bdag/ grang gi 'jig rten la
269b5(skyes rabs): phan slad// mchod rten rab gnas byed 'gyur ba'i// mya ngan mad ces bya ba byung // 'chi med rgyal po'i blo gcig gis// bde gshegs kyis bshad 'di thos nas// dga' ba'i rol pa rnams rgyas pa'i// bzhin gyis 'od kyis rnam
269b6(skyes rabs): par mdzes// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las sems can sman zhes bya ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// /
270a1(skyes rabs): yid bzhin nor bu nges par rnam bsams dngos po ster byed cing // dpag bsam shing yang yongasu btags pa kho na skyed par byed// lus ni rab sbyin dam tshig dag la rab nyid brtson pa gang // de dag bstod la
270a2(skyes rabs): yang dag 'os pa'i tshig ni gang zhig yin// b+hA DA a pa g+hA Da ka/ smyo byed gsang ba pa btul nas// skra can nags las mi snang bar// ston pa nags tshal gzhan du gshegs// der ni sngon byung dran gyur nas// bzhin 'dzum
270a3(skyes rabs): mdzad la 'dzum pa'i rgyu// brgya byin gyis ni gus pa sa dris// de yis slar yang rab gsungs pa// grong khyer thams cad ldan zhes gnor bu'i ba gam nu mkha' las// reg pa'i 'od zer rgod pa can// phun tshogs kun
270a4(skyes rabs): gyi gnas su gyur// der ni rgyal po'i zla ba dag/ dri med 'od ldan kun sder byung // gang gis grags pa zla 'od kyis// srid gsum nyin drang mtshan mor mdzes// mdzes ldan legs byas snying po'i gnas skabs drag gas
270a5(skyes rabs): khyad par gyis// 'dul ba'i lam du gnas pa thob cing gzugs bzang ldan gyur pa// gang gi legs smra dul ba'i rgyal ldan sgrogs pa'i rnga nyid du// sbyin pa gyur te glang po'i bdag po dag gi bzhin du'o// nam zhig sa yi
270a6(skyes rabs): brgya byin de de skye dgu'i bya ba lta byed cing // rje su bzung la mngon phyogs pas// phyi rol khyams gnas sa gzhi bstan// der ni mtha' yas rgyal phran gyi// mgo bo'i rin chen la snang des// lus ni grangs med dag gi bzhin// sa
270b1(skyes rabs): yi bya ba thos par gyur// de yi rkang stegs zla shel gyi// rang bzhin la ni 'phos gyur cing // mdun du rab btud slong ba rnams// slar yang bsam pa'i gdung ba btang // skabs der phug ron rab skrag cing // 'da'
270b2(skyes rabs): gshoka zad pa bzhon du ni// 'gro ba med pa'i sa bdag gi/ byin pa'i rtsa la rab tu bstan// rab skrag mig ni 'phrul byed cing // yan lag kun tu 'khums pa des// mthong nas yi bdag po nI// 'phral la brtsa ba'i dbang
270b3(skyes rabs): du gyur// 'di yi 'jigs pa gang las shes// rab rgyas pad+ma'i phreng ldan gyi// pad+mo can ltar 'od gsal ba'o// spyan gyis myur du phyogs rnams bltas// skabs der smin pa gsod byed ni// snying stobs brtag par
270b4(skyes rabs): 'dod pa yis// sgyu mas rngon pa'i rnam par ni// 'ongs nas mi bdag la smras pa// lha cig yun ring nA rnyed pa'i// bdog gi bza' ba byed thong // 'di ni ma bslangs ma zlog pa'i// bdag cag lhan skyes 'tsho ba yin// 'gro ba'i
270b5(skyes rabs): bdag po bdag tso gi zas// rang bzhin gyis ni grub 'di// med na 'tsho ba gtong bar 'gyur// gang phyir zas ni srog gi gzungs// dus 'dir zas ni chad pa las// bdag gi 'tsho ba btang gyur na// bdag gi khyim thab bu dang bcas// re ba
270b6(skyes rabs): chad pas rnams nyams 'gyur// chos ldan gang gis gcig nyid ni// bsrungs pas gang du mang po dag/ chos las nyams par gyur na bkye// de la chos ni ci zhig 'dra// phug ron la ni byams pa yis// bdag la zhe sdang bya mi 'os// gang
271a1(skyes rabs): phyir khyod nyid lta bu ni// sgyu ldan chags pas 'jug pa min// ji ltar 'di nyid de bzhin bdag/ khyod la nged gnyis bye brag cig/ dam pa 'byung po kun la snyoms// gcig la brtse ba byed pa min// des
271a2(skyes rabs): 'di smras che maM bdag gi/ lag pA gdu bu'i sgra ldan pas// 'jigs par mi bya zhes smra ni// bya ni chags pas rab bsgrims te// de nas sems can gzir ba kun// yongs bskyab dus ni byas pa des// char sprin 'jam
271a3(skyes rabs): pa'i sgra dbyangs ltar// zab pa'i tshig gis rab smras pa// skad cig tshim pa don gnyer bas// mi bzang srog chags gsod mi byed// lus can srog la chags pa yi// gdung ba'i rnam 'gyur mtshungs pa nyid// gzhan
271a4(skyes rabs): gyi srog ni phrogs pa yis// gang zhig yongasu 'tsho byed pa// dri yi dge legs ldog 'gyur te// gang phyir sdig pa'i gdung ba ster// nga lta nyid du ma chad par// rang 'dod yang dag bzhed cing gus// bdag gis don du zas gang
271a5(skyes rabs): gang / nye bar bsgrubs pa blang bar mdzod// ces pa rgyal po'i tshig thos nas// yongasu bzhin logs shugs rings can// longs spyod mchog la yid byung ba'i// rngon pas las ni rab smras pa// bdag cag nags na glanas
271a6(skyes rabs): rnams kyis// rgyal po'i longs spyod ro mi shes// 'bru zas nyam su ma myong ba'i// ri dwags la dus dga' ma yin// tshar ma'i 'khri shing 'dab med mya ngan dag la yongs 'dris ma thob nas// nags tshal ldang zhing snum
271b1(skyes rabs): pas rnga mo mya ngan ngag gis ci yang skam// tsu ta rab smin dug bzhin bya rog gis ni za bar mi byed de// rang bzhin dag gis dbye bas 'os pA'i 'dir ni kun la bde ba ste// rgyal la 'os zas dang zos nas// nang par slar
271b2(skyes rabs): yang bdag ci za// gang zhig nyin gzhan rnyed dka' min// de dag zos na bde ba bskyed// rgya che ro ldan kha zas yongs 'dris ro dang bral ba za mi byed// 'khor gyi rtsom pa mang por ltung rnams gcig pu nyid du gnas mi byed// /
271b3(skyes rabs): shi// rta zhon pa rkang pas 'gro ba'i dus na shin tu mya ngan byed// don thob nyams ni mi bzang nyon mongs rtsub mos shin tu gdung bar byed// lha cig rgyal po la 'os zas// khyod kyi spyan gyis gzigs rnams la// rtag tu rnyed
271b4(skyes rabs): dka'/ min mod kyang // skye bar skyon med bdag mi dga'o// rngon pas mngon par bsad pa'i sha// bdag cag rnams kyi srog ltar spyod// des na rang lus rab chod la// bya yi gnyis 'gyur sbyin par mdzod// mi bdag
271b5(skyes rabs): bsam pa 'khrugs pa yis// tshig de thos nas 'phral la ni// dga' bas spyan gyi chu skyes dag/ rab tu rgyas pas de la smras// bya dong khyod kyi srog dwag ni// bsrung slad mtshungs pa'i the tshom la// blo bzang khyod kyi thabs
271b6(skyes rabs): 'di ni// gsal bar bdag la nye bar bstan// gnyis ka'i srog la the tshom gyis// khyogs la zhon pas 'khrag/ sa gyur pa// bdag gi yid ni grogs kyis bzhin// khyod nyid kyis ni brtan par byas// khyod kyis mig zhags
272a1(skyes rabs): kyis bcing bya'i// bya 'di rab tu btang bar mdzod// da lta nyid du bdag gi bshad// re zhig srogi bzungs thug mdzod// rgyalnga po dam bca' bden pa yis// snying rje las ni 'di brjod tshe// dug ldan
272a2(skyes rabs): 'a yis phug pa bzhin// blon po rnams ni rmongs par gyur// sbyin pa'i skabasu phan mi phan// grogs kyis bdag la brjod mi bya// zhes pa de yi dam tshig gi/ lus ni gtong bar nges par gyur// de nas mi bdag gis
272a3(skyes rabs): smras pa// gang zhog bdag gi lus las sha// bcad nas srang la 'do bas byed pa// de la nor ni rab tu byin// de nas rgyal po gser gyi char// 'bebs pas bos pa'i skye bo rnams// dran pa'i las kyi blo rmis phyin// rna ba bsgrib
272a4(skyes rabs): shing song bar gyur// gdug pa'i blo zhes bya ba gcig/ ser skya'i mig ni ser po yis// gser dag blangs nas gdug pa yi// las la chas su zhugs par gyur// gdug pa'i las ni sog le bzhin// drang po gcod la mkhas gyur
272a5(skyes rabs): cing / rang bzhin gyis ni 'khyog s+t+ra p+ta yi// gdug pa'i bdog nyid ci mi byed// gang zhig mtshon gyis mi nus de dag kyal ka'i tshig gis 'joms par byed// gang zhig brjod par mi nus ci yang de dag 'phral la bsgrub par byed//
272a6(skyes rabs): gang zhig bya bar mi nus de dag kyang ni yid kyis sems par byed// ma bsdams brlang po dag gis spyod pas ngo mtshar thams cad rgyas par byed// de nas de yis phug ron ni// srang la gzhal nas bdag gi byin pa g.yas pa'i sha dag ni//
272b1(skyes rabs): rab bcad de dang mtshungs par bkod// de nas sA yi bdag po yis khrag thigs dang po reg pa yis// 'khrugs pa bzhin du sa gzhi ni// yun ring rnam par g.yos par gyur// de nas phug ron lci ba dang // sha ni yang ba nyid gyur che
272b2(skyes rabs): shA ni gzhan dag rab tshong la// byin zhes sa yi bdag pos smras// brla dang dpung pa'i bsha bcad kyang // byi dang mtshungs pa nyid ma gyu// 'jig rten gyi ni the tshom dang // mtshungs pa'i srang der mi bdag zhugs// mi bdag chu rgyu sna lhag
272b3(skyes rabs): ma'i lus// rang nyid srad la 'dzegs pa'i tshe// de yi gtong ba gzung dka' bas// yid byung grags pa phyogs mtshams song // de yi dus na sa yi bdag po dag gi brtan pa 'di// nyams pa med pas ya mtshan gyur pa'i lce yi bu
272b4(skyes rabs): mo rnams// gtsug phung phreng bar 'os pa'i pad+mos yongs gang lag pa yis// de yis spyod tshul dag la mchod pa'i gus pa ci yang byung // rnam 'gyur med par sa yaM bdag/ srung la 'jigs pa mthong gyur nas// skyes bu gdug pa
272b5(skyes rabs): byed pa po// skrag byas de yis de la dris// lus kyi sbyin pa 'di yis ni// khyod ni ci bzhed yongs mi shes// gang phyir lus can rnyed pa kun// yang dag rtsom pa lus kyi don// gal te lus ni btang la sems// nyams pa med
272b6(skyes rabs): dom bden par smros// zhes smra de la rgyal po ni// bzhin 'dzum ldan pas rab smras pa// 'jig rten 'di na thob bya ni// bdag la ci yang med mod kyis// 'gro ba kun la phan pa'i slad// bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod// gal te bdag
273a1(skyes rabs): gi sems 'di ni// nyams pa min na bden pa des// lus ni yongasu ma nyams shing // rang bzhin rdzogs pa nyid gyur te// ces pa brjod pa tsam nyid kyis// sa bdag bden pa'i ngang tshul gyi// lus kyi rma ni rab bsngos te//
273a2(skyes rabs): mA nyams zla ba ltar mdzes gyur// de nas phug rlon rngon pa dag/ song zhing sa skyong 'od ldan ni// shur che spro ba chen po dang // rab gsal 'byor pa ldan par gyur// gang zhig nges par sa yi bdag po thams cad ster gyur pa// de nyid
273a3(skyes rabs): yin skyes bu ser skya de yang lhas byin no// de yi sngon byung yang dag dran nas bdag gi 'dzum pa spro// zhes pa ston pa las thos 'chi med bdag po dga' bor gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rtog
273a4(skyes rabs): pa brjod pa dpag posam gyi 'khri shing las thams cad ster ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// / gang dag mthong bas zhe sdang dug gi ni// tsha ba rab tu zhi ba nyid 'gyur zhing // bdud
273a5(skyes rabs): rtsi'i ro bsil skye bo dam pa yis// zla ba de dag su yi phyag 'os min// gnod sbyin kha rnon dag gi gnas// de las snang ba min gyur te// skad cig gis ni bcom ldan byon// dar ni sa bdag tshangs sbyin gyis// dul ba yis ni mchod pa
273a6(skyes rabs): byas// de yis yang dag rjes mthun par// skal ldan rnams la rjes bstan mdzad// der ni grong pa rnams 'ongs te// rgud pa kun la lus can rnams// rnam par lhung la skyob mdzad pa'i// bcom ldan 'das la rab gsol pa// grong
273b1(skyes rabs): khyer mtha' na bcom ldan 'das// rnga bo yi ni re zhig yod// de na klu ni ba lang skyong // drag po bzod pa dka' ba gnas// de ni phyugs dang skye bo dang // 'bru rnams kun gyi rdo rje che// phun sum tshogs rnams dngos med skad
273b2(skyes rabs): tsi yis rnam sprul rig ma gyur// ma dul 'dul mdzad ma zhi ba// zhi mdzad khyod kyi brtse ba ni// nye bar 'tshe ba 'di dag la// bang gau cag skyobs tshol rnams kyi skyabs// zhes brjod de dag song ba'i tshe// bcom ldan snying rje
273b3(skyes rabs): gter dag ni// 'dus pa'i dbus las mi snang bar// rdo ba'i sa 'dzin dag tu gshegs// de ngos shin tu stug po na// 'jigs rung gdengs can khang pa ni dug gi dbugs rnams dag gi chu// sngon por byas bzhi ni de yis mthong
273b4(skyes rabs): ral gri shubs mad g.yo ba yi// mi bzad dba' rlabs kyis 'khrugs nags// de yi 'gram du bcom ldan gyis// skyil krung bcas te nye bar bzhugs// gnyis gshin spyan ni bdud rtsi'i gnyen// dang ba'i rab tu gzigs pa yis// de yis
273b5(skyes rabs): myur bar drug bzhin du// dug dang bcas pa dug med thob// sku lus gser 'od mthing kha yi// chu la snang bas de rabo mdzes// ma ra ka ta ltar mdzes pa'i// mkha' la nyi mo 'gro ba bzhin// de yi snang bas rnam bcom pas// klu yi khang par
273b6(skyes rabs): rab rib rnams// 'bros par byed pa g.yo ba yi// skyil gyi tshogs dang mtshungs par gyur// klu yi rgyal pos de mthong nas// mig ni khrag ltar dmar ba yis// 'phral du na mkhar ra'i zhugs te// 'gro ba sprin gyi rang bzhin
274a1(skyes rabs): byas/ de yi khro ba'i me yi ni// du ba'i tshogs bzhin du lcag po las// rab 'thon glog gi lce rnams kyis// phyogs rnams skrag pa bzhin du 'dar// myos pa'i sprin rnams dag gi sgra// 'jig pa
274a2(skyes rabs): brtson par sgrogs byed pas// sa 'dzin rnams kyi snying bzhin du// phug dang khang pa zhom par gyur// de nas rdo tshan tshogs dkrigs char// ri phreng mtha' dag nyon mongs shing // brtan pa ltung byed ljon shing ni// phye mar byeng
274a3(skyes rabs): pa 'bab par gyur// lag 'gro gdug pas rab spros pa'i// tshor de skyob pas gzigs nyid no// ma tog char pa nyid du gyur// der ni rab gsal dri med nags tshal nye bar bslang pa med// bung ba glu dbyangs lon pa'i ma
274a4(skyes rabs): tog dang ldan mthong gyur nas// dga' ba'i 'dzum dkrigs do shal khur las nges par rgyal gyur pa'i// nags kyi lha yis gdug pa'i gdengs can dbang po de la smras// kye lags dus kyi rnam 'gyur dag ni yongasu thong //
274a5(skyes rabs): khyod lta bu rnams 'jig pa'i rlung gis bcom par gyur na// gang gi rked skabs phug gi rol por skyabasu 'gro byed pa'o// gser gyi ri bo 'di la ci yang g.yo ba med pa nyid// de nas 'phral la rgyags pa ni// yongasu
274a6(skyes rabs): zad cing rnam 'gyur btang // thal mo sbyar nas mngon phyogs te// klu yis ston pa la phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das ni snying rje'i gter// bslab pa'i gnas dag rab sbyin pas// skyabasu song bar gyur pa de// dge ba
274b1(skyes rabs): mchog la rjes bzung mdzad// zhabasA la mgo yis btugs pa des// gus pa yis ni gsol pA// bcom ldan rgyal bas rtag tu ni// de la yang drag nye bar mdzad// gnA sta skabs der ni de nyid du// gnod sbyin lag
274b2(skyes rabs): na rdo rje dag/ zhar lo 'ongs pa zhi ba'i slad// bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes bzung mdzad// de nas 'jig rten gdung ba mi bzang rnams zlog ston pa ni// rnam rgyas bstod pa'i tshig gis skabs gsum pa yis mchod
274b3(skyes rabs): gyur pa// sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhabs pad dge dang mdza' ba las// drag pa'i rdo ba'i gzhi ldan nags tshal rgyu zhing bsten par mdzad// der de 'dzum dang ldan pa la// lha yi rgyal po ltar 'ongs pas// 'dzum pa'i
274b4(skyes rabs): rgyu dris de la ni// thams cad mkhyen pas bka' stsal pa// dgra byed dri ma med pa'i chu yi rgyun dang ldan gyur cing // kho na med+ma sems can bskal bzang 'khod pa dka' thub dag gi nags// chos ni lhag gnas
274b5(skyes rabs): sdom brtson rnams kyi yid ni dog byed pa// zhi ba'i gnas 'di dog tu nga nyid kho nas rol byas mine// seng ge'i nu 'og ri dwags phru gu rgyab dben pa'i nags tshul 'dir// brgya byin dpal ldan 'khor ba 'jigs
274b6(skyes rabs): dang bde gshegs gser thub de dang ni// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri med blo ldan thub pa 'od srungs te/ mtha' 'jig rten gdung ba'i sgraston pa rnams kyis 'di nyid du gnas mdzod// de nas de skad sgras des
275a1(skyes rabs): gzigs nyid kyi// bsod nams smin pas nye bar 'ongs pa yis// rngon pa dag ni skyabasu song ba lnga// des gnad dbu skra sen mos mtshan pa byas// zhes dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang
275a2(skyes rabs): chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las klu ba lang skyong btul ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o// / phyogs kyi mdzes ma'i rna rgyan
275a3(skyes rabs): da / mtshungs par yon tan+da dam pa bkod// gang zhig grangs pa'i mchod rten gyis// 'gro mdzes de dag rgyal gyur cig/ de nas der ni bcom ldan 'das// brgya byin gus pas gsol btab pas// sangs rgyas snga
275a4(skyes rabs): ma'i mchod rten mdzad// rang gi mchod byed du bcug/ lha rnams kyis der rin tshan gyi// rang bzhi nyi 'od brgya ldan byas// 'gro ba'i rmongs pa chen po dang // mtshungs po'i mun pa gshed song // der nI dri za mi 'am ci// mi dang
275a5(skyes rabs): klu dang lha rnams lha// 'dul ba'i chos kyi man ngag ni// yang dag bstan nas rgyal ba gshegs// rdo ba'i r-i le lU rnams kyis// mchod rten bzhi ni bkod pa la// bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga pa yi// mchod rten mchod rten
275a6(skyes rabs): sde dag bkod// de nas bA lok+Sha zhes pa'i// yul du de bzhin gshegs pa byon// lus ngan gyis bzhin tshong dpon ni// legs par rab sad ces pas mchod// gang gis de ni rjes 'brang bcas// 'dul ba'i chos ni de la
275b1(skyes rabs): bstan// rmongs pa'i gnyid sad legs pa ni// rab sad rab nyid thob gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' las des// rang gi bsod nams bzhin ma thob// bA lak+Shi ya zhes pa yi// mchod rten rin chen 'bar ba
275b2(skyes rabs): byas/ de las ngal gyis de bzhin gshegs// Dam+ba pa r+ya yi grong du byon// gnod sbyin Dam pa ra zhes pa// bslab gnas rab tu sbyin pas btul// gtum mo'i grong du mngon phyogs te// gtum po mal+li ka zhes pa//
275b3(skyes rabs): bu bdun dag dang lhan cig nyid// 'dul ba yis ni mthong bar mdzod// las kyi lkog mas gtum po'i rigs// thub pas sun phyung de dag rnams// rgyal ba mthong las pad+mo yis// 'byung gnas bzhin du dri med gyur//
275b4(skyes rabs): tha shal skyon gyis sun phyung smad pa dag tu 'os gyur cing // sdig pa'i nye bar gdung ba chen pos gdungs shing nyin rnams la// rnam rtog ngan pa dang bral snying rjes rab zhugs dam pa rnams// dman la dmigs pa'i rje suM
275b5(skyes rabs): chags pas lhag par gyur pa yin// de nas bde gshegs rjes 'brang bcas// dpal ldan khyim bdag gru 'dzin zhes// bya la legs pa'i gtam dag mdzad// bde bar gshegs pas rjes bzung bas// bslab pas gnas
275b6(skyes rabs): thob dri med des// de yi dbu skra sen cha yis// mtshan pa'i rin chen mchod rten byas// der ni ltar 'ongs dbang po la// bcom ldan 'das kyis rab gsungs pa// rgyal po mi len dra zhes pas// yul 'dir mchod rten byed par
276a1(skyes rabs): 'gyur// de ltar gnas dang gnas su bcom ldan brtse bas brlan pas gzigs pa yis// mtha' dag 'jig rten rnams kyi mya ngan rmongs dang 'jigs pa btang bar gyur// mchod rten mngon par gsar
276a2(skyes rabs): bus skyibs na nor bu'i dri chung sgra sgrogs pa// dar dir tshogs kyi rtse 'jo dag gis sa gzhi'ang sred pa lta bur gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri
276a3(skyes rabs): las mchod rten gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // rgud pa'i gdung ba zhi byed gzigs pA rab tu dang ba'i ro dag gis// skyes bu rnams ni nad dang bral mdzad srid pas
276a4(skyes rabs): mnan 'khrugs pa'i sman pa gang // nges par dge ba mtha' dge bskyed pa'i nor 'dzin grub pa'i bdud rtsi ni/ rdzogs pa'i snying rje nang du 'dzin pa de dag mi sman phyag byar 'os// grong khyer pad+mo ldan pa ni// bcom ldan 'dzum
276a5(skyes rabs): bcas pa lA// lha yi rgyal pos 'dzum pa'i rgyu// dris nas slar yang ra bo gsungs pa// dpal ldan bsod nams stobs zhes pa'i// sa yi bdag po sngon byung ste// gong zhig grong khyer stong phrag ni// brgyad cu yongasu 'dzin
276a6(skyes rabs): de yi rgyal po'i pho brang ni// bsod nams ldan zhes bya ba ste// shel gyi rnam par yid 'ong zhing // mtshan mo'i bdag po'i 'od bzhin mdzes// skyed chel gsar par 'gro ba'i slad// nam zhig shing rta zhon pa des// lam du
276b1(skyes rabs): du phan pa'i zas bral bas// nad kyis gzir cing 'dug pa mthong // ring po'i nad kyis mnar ba yis// yongasu nyams pa de mthong nas// phyogs mtshams ma lus gnon pa ste// snying rjes zil mnan gdung bar gyur// 'phral
276b2(skyes rabs): la 'phros te dam+ba yis// me long rnams ni gdung 'gyur te// nyi ma me shel rang bzhin bzhin// de yis grong khyer thams cad dang // sgo dang srang rnams mtha' dag tu nad pa rnams la zas dang sman// gnas dang mal stan la
276b3(skyes rabs): sogs byas// de nas de dag rnams kyi slad// rim gro pa ni mkhas pa bskos// gang phyir dam pa'i rim gro pa// nad gso'i yan lag dang po ni// bzod ldan snying rjes brlan zhing bzod// gso byed 'dod pa dag la gnas// mdza' la
276b4(skyes rabs): the tshom mi byed pa'i// rim gro pa ni rnyed pa dka'// de nas rgyal po rim gro pa// dul ba rnams ni legs bos nas// smras pa nyin dang mtshan mor nI// nad pa rnams kyi rim gro mdzod// rgyal po la 'os gnas rnam su// mal stan
276b5(skyes rabs): mchog sogs phun tshogs byas// rin chen skabs ldan pad+mo can// dri med chu ldan nad pa'i phyir// sman pa dang ni sman dag dang // phun tshogs shin tu che ba bsgrubs// dra ni de dag bsos gyur pa// khyed kyi gnyer zhes bdag gi
276b6(skyes rabs): blo/ 'jig rten 'dir ni rim gro pa brtan pa'i sman pa chos kyis gzhan du mi rnams kyi// yongasu gdung ba shin tu bsil ba yis kyang grang ba dag ni bde ba'i dro ba yis// sred pa bsil ba'i chu yis dang ni ngal ba yang
277a1(skyes rabs): yang chung ngu phan zlas nyer bstabs pas// khyod bsngos 'gyur zhes bstan pa'i tshig snyan ku re'i rim pas mi dge bas dag zhi bar byed// de yi slad du khyod rnams kyi// nad kyis gdungs shing
277a2(skyes rabs): 'gyel rnams la// yang dang yang du tshig dag gis// bugs dbyung 'di ni dran par bya// sman pa skyon med bde gshegs bka' drin dang // chos kyis man ngag dam pa'i sman dag dang // 'khor ba ring po rim gyis
277a3(skyes rabs): skabs rnams kyi// dpung gnyen zhi ba'i bcud len de dag yan// mi bdag nor gyi chur 'bebs des de dag rnams la de skad bstan// nad pa mA lus bsos bya'i slad// song nas ji skad brjod bzhin byas// de nas nang grol
277a4(skyes rabs): de dag rnams// dge ba brjod pas de la yid// song ba rnams la blta ba'i slad// mi bdag rang nyid phyi rol byung // brgya byin gyi kyang de la ni// gnyis 'thung dkari po mche ba mi// drug ldan gyis drangs shing rta dag/ bsod nams
277a5(skyes rabs): rab 'bar rnam par sprul// rin chen gser gyi mtsho skyes rnams// reg na bde ba'i rlung gis g.yos// bung po'i na chung glo len pa'i// lam du mchog gi pad ldan yang // rin chen mtsho skyes de dag la// gnas sogs bdud
277a6(skyes rabs): rtsi'i cha rdzogs pa'i// lha mo rnams kyis ring po nas// mi bdag byon pa bsten par gyur// snying stobs bdud rtsi'i rgya mchi nga'i// snying stobs shes 'dod lha yi bdag/ bdag nyid long ba'i gzugs byas nas// de la mngon
277b1(skyes rabs): du phyogs te smras// rgyal po mig gis dman pa bdag/ skye bar snang ba rnam par spangs// sems can thams cad yongs skyob par// zhugs pa khyod can nye bar 'ongs// khyod kyi mthu yis nad pa ni// 'di dag lags
277b2(skyes rabs): par bsos gyur nas// 'dod ldan mdzes pas khyod kyi ni// grags pa mu cor sgrog cing rgyu// sdug bsngal bkron dang long ba'i gnyen// lha yi bdag po bskyob par 'os// bdag la mig ni g.yas dag/ gal te phod
277b3(skyes rabs): na gnang ba mdzod// des 'di brjod tshe mi bdagA ni// rab dang bzhin ras mdze sI pa yi sa// 'gro rnams yang dag bsgral ba'i slad/ rdzogs pa'i byang chubo bsgrub pa'i phyir// smon lam rab tu btab byas te// mig ni
277b4(skyes rabs): mtshon gyis rab phyung nas// brtan pa'i gter gyis de la byin// lha rnams kyis ni me tog gtor// de yi smad byung sbyin pa yis// ya mtshan nas bzhin sa gzhi ni// chu gtor g.yo ba'i ska rags can// r-i dang bcas pa
277b5(skyes rabs): ma lus+dza 'drar// mig gcig gis ni snang ba dag/ skyes pa de mthong sa yi bdag/ sbyin pa'i ro la rab dgyes pas// gnyis pa sbyin par brtson par 'gyur// de nas lha yau bdag po ni// rang gi lus su yang dag gnas//
277b6(skyes rabs): de yi mig ni bsos byas te// snying stobs mchog nyid rab tu bsngags// gang zhig sbyin tshe rang gi yan lag la'ang // nam yang chags pa chung ngu skye min pa// nges par snying stobs rgya mtsho rgyas de la// nor zhes brjod pa'i rdul la rang
278a1(skyes rabs): b+h+r-i tsaM// de tshe mi bdag bsod nams stobs gyur te// nga nyid sbyin pa'i ro yis byang chub thob// de yi ngo mtshar spyod tshul dran+d+ha pas na// de yi rang bzhin thob 'dzum pa mdzad// ces pa
278a2(skyes rabs): dge ba'i dbang pos byis pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las bsod nams stobs kyi rtogs po brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / shin tu
278a3(skyes rabs): rab gsal grags pa'i tshon ris yon tan rin chen rgyan// ma nyams sbyin pa'i me tog dang ldan bden pa'i byug pa byas// gang gi dpal ni tshul khrims gtsang ba'i du gu las mdzes pa// de nyid gcig pu legs byas la
278a4(skyes rabs): 'os 'khor los sgyur ba yin// grong mchog pA Ta li ya~M bu zhes pa// na tshung sa gzhi'i thig le ltar gyur par// nyi ma'i rigs kyi rgyan gyur grags pa'i gter// dpal ldan sa bdag mya ngan med pa byung // dang por 'dod ljon de 'dod
278a5(skyes rabs): nye tshig dang // de nathos rnon po gtum po'i nyer spyod dang // phyi nas chos ni nye bar 'dzin pa yis// dben pa'i smin pa'i na tshong rab grags gyur// mya ngan med de rab dang bsod nams kyi// nye ba'i nags tshal sa gzhi mdzes pa'i rgyan//
278a6(skyes rabs): rgyas par gyur tshe dge ba'i myu gu yis// 'jig rten mya ngan med nyid nges par 'dzin// de yi bde skying lha mo pad+ma ldan// pho brang 'khor gyi mdzes ma'i gtsug gnas pas// kun spro bu ni bsod nams dag gis bskyed// gtong ba rjesu 'brang
278b1(skyes rabs): dpal gyis legs brjod bzhin// gser ltar dag pa mi yi dbang po'i bu// pad rdzing dpal gyis pad+ma'i 'dab 'ad+ma'i spyan// gser ri'i ngang pa kun la zhes pa yis// mig mtshungs de ni ku nA la zhes gyur// rig pa bu mo'i
278b2(skyes rabs): bdag mthong dri ma med// rgyu rtsal 'khri shing rnams kyi dga' ba'i sgyid// grags pa ku mud ldan pa'i zla rgyas pa// de ni 'jig rten kun gyi mngon 'dod gyur// rgyu skar bdag po'i nAng gi ri dwags bzhin// de yi mig yang mtsho skyes
278b3(skyes rabs): zung dag ni// g.yo ldan smin pa'i bung bas mngon dga' ba// blta bos mi dbang rab tu ngoms ma gyur// sna tshogs yon tan rgyan ldan de la ni// mtha' dag phyogs dang gling gi sa yi bdagra/ skal bzang khengs pas rang gi bu mo dag
278b4(skyes rabs): 'dod pa'i mu tig 'khri shing lta bu byin// skye bo rjes chags bskyed pa mchog gi gzugs// de yi dga'ar ba mar mig yangs zla zhal ma// 'dod pa'i dga' ma skye ba gzhan thob bzhin// gser gyi phreng ldan ma zhes bya bar gyur// de nas nam
278b5(skyes rabs): thig pa yi drung gnas pa'i// gzhon nu de mthong dge 'dun gnas brtan gyis// rgyal po'i 'dod pas rang gi thugs pa yis// dben gnas gtsug lag khang du dal gyis khrid// rga n+ya pos mkhan po mngon shes drug ldan mchog snying rje
278b6(skyes rabs): sbyor ldan rnal 'byor ldan pa des// dus kyis de yi mig dag nyams shes nas// ma 'ongs sdug bsngal gdon slad de la smras// khyod kyi sems ni 'byor pas zil gnan dang // lang tsho me tog mtshon dang ldan pa'i tshogs// rol pas zla ba'i
279a1(skyes rabs): dregs 'joms lus dang ni// mtshan ma byung bar gyur 'di bdag gis mthong // mig ni rang bzhin gyis g.yo gzhan pa ci// 'di la bde ba nyer skyes gnas pa med// 'di yi drangs pas rang gnas rab nyams te// 'dod
279a2(skyes rabs): pa zhes brjod khung bur sbyang ba nyid// nges par mi rnams mig bzang yangs pa ni// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bu 'di// chags pa ltos 'gro'i bug pa'i tsho gos nyid de// gang gis myur du dbang po yongs ngal byed// tshul khrims
279a3(skyes rabs): mthu las gang dag rnams kyi mig/ mdzes pa'i btung bas khyad par du ngoms shing // rnam pa g.yo ba min pa de dag nyid// snying stobs bstan pa dang ldan skalta ba bzang // zhes sogs de yi tshig ni rab zhi ba// nye bar rdzogs pa mi
279a4(skyes rabs): bdag bus thos nas// de bzhin zhes te rab dang yid la byas// phyag 'tshal nas ni rang gi gnas su song // de nas bung ba'i tshogs ni glu len cing // kaM shu ka dpal li khris rgyas pa 'dra// khengs ldan ma yi khengs pa
279a5(skyes rabs): 'joms chas pa// ston gyis dris myos glang po dpyid 'ongs gyur// skyed tshal 'khri shIng gsar pa'i yal 'dab dang // 'bral ba'i gdung ba rgud pa'i chu shas dag/ gsar pa chags pas rab bskyed bzod dka' nyid// 'phral la lhan
279a6(skyes rabs): cig nyid du rgyas par 'gyur// tsam pa ka 'dab rlung gis bskyod pa yi// spring yig gis ni byams pa skyed byed cing // 'dod dang lhan cig dpyid kyi dang po yis// mngon sbyor rgyal byed brtan 'joms phyogasu grags// me tog rab rgyas de
279b1(skyes rabs): dang de dgra las// dpyid kyi gnyen la mchog tu phan pa 'di// grags pa'i rnam pa bung ba'i sgra sgrogs pa'i// sa ha kA rA nyid kyis byas par gyur// dpyid kyi spro ba'i rnam 'phrul de la yang // mi yi dbang po'i bu de dben par ni// gnas
279b2(skyes rabs): brtan gyi ni mAn ngag sems pa dag/ sa skyong btsun mo skar rgyal bsrung bas mthong // mA nyams zla ba'i 'od ldan yangs pa'i mig/ phrag mtho pus mos log par slebs de la// mdza' bas brlan pa'i blo yis mngon phyogs te// ma yi
279b3(skyes rabs): tshun ma de yis rab smras pa// gzhon nu me tog mda' can gsar 'jug pa// 'khor ba'i snying po khyod kyi mig gi dpal// khyad par mdzes pa'i chus dang ldan pa 'di// 'jig rten du ni su yi brtan mi 'phrog/ ces brjod de yis 'phral
279b4(skyes rabs): la lag gnyis kyis// ngo tsha btang nas brtan par de la 'khyud// rang gi rgyan gyi khral khrol mu cor gyi// 'dar zhing rgyun tu zlog par byed pa bzhin// gzhan 'di'ang rang gi ma bzhin bdag la ni// rtag tu gnyis gshin nyid dag skyed par
279b5(skyes rabs): byed// ces bsams dogs med blo ldan do yis de'i// rkang par phyag 'tshal zur phud dud par gyur// stug po'i rmongs dus rgyags pas 'phyar gyur cing // chu srin mtshan ma lbu bas rab bskyod pa'i// dpa' rlabs can bzhin bud med
279b6(skyes rabs): rnams la ni// rang bzhin 'gros la 'gog pa cung zad med// ba bau col rtsom pa rnam par ma bsdams pas// sdig par lhung tshe dri mas 'jigs pa bzhin// tshul khrims gtsang mas rnam par btang gyur cing // 'dod pas zil
280a1(skyes rabs): man nu de yis de la smras// bdag gi mdza' bo gzhon nu lang tsho mtshungs// khyod kyi ma yin tshun ma bdag ma yin// khyod kyi 'khyud pas 'grogs 'os bdag gis lus// skal bzang longs spyod
280a2(skyes rabs): 'os 'di brten par mdzod// don du gnyer bya bud med rang nyid kyis// don gnyer gang 'di ngo tsha maud nyid do// ci bgyid dka' drin mdzod cig khyod lus dang // 'grogs pa yun ring bdag gi snying la bcags nu ngos
280a3(skyes rabs): shal 'khri shing mngon dga' zhing // rkang skabs dkyil 'khor dril chung ldan pa yi// bud med sen mo 'debs pa dbul ba ni// rab mdzes skal bzang mngon par khengs mi 'gyur// 'jig rten dag na bud med rang bzhin gyis//
280a4(skyes rabs): sems ni rnam g.yeng dge mtshan ldan pa dang // gsar pa 'dod la shin+da tu mngon phyogs shing // mig kyang mdzes pa dag la srang ldan gyis// zhes smras rlung ltar 'dar ba'i lus can des// mchu 'dab dpal ni dbugs
280a5(skyes rabs): kyis zil mnan cing // rdul chus chen ris nyams byas rnam 'gyur ni// 'dod pas nyer bstan rab tu gsalnga brla bzung // rna ba nyams byed gdung ba'i khab bzhin des// de yi tshig ni 'gal ba de dag thos// sdig de
280a6(skyes rabs): dmigs la chags pa 'dod pa bzhin// sa la blta zhing gdong ni dud par gyur// ri dwags rtags can lta bu de yi bzhin// sdig pa'i dri ma rab rgyas de ni bltar// gzhon nus ma bzod 'phral la yid 'byung dang // ngo tshas bzhin
280b1(skyes rabs): gyi pad+ma zlum par gyur// dag par bgyi slad de y-i d+hA ba zung // mi chung sdig thos 'dar bas bskyod pa las ri nu che nu rab 'bar rna rgyan las 'khrungs pa'i// mthu ldan ma ni skad cig zhugs pa bzhin// de yi lag pas rna ba
280b2(skyes rabs): zung bsgribs nas// skad cig 'khyud pa'i skyon ni zhi ba'i slad// yan lag yan lag 'khyud pa'i gaM gA bzhin// so yi 'od zer dkar ldan tshig spros pa/ ma ma khyod kyis 'di skad ga smrar mi 'os// dam pa'i lam nas song la
280b3(skyes rabs): tshig dgra sdoms// 'phral la yongs gtang stobs kyi tshul khrims ni// nyams shing rnam par g.yo ba dbugs dbyung mdzad// dregs dang bag med gzhan nor 'dod pa dang // sdig pa rjes 'brel yul la mngon sreng
280b4(skyes rabs): pa/ 'di dge srog chags rnam par lhung dus su// bsdams pa med pa'i gnod sbyin sgo dag yin// sbyin las phyir phyogs rnams la nor gyis ci// sdang bas dbang byas rnams la thos pas ci// ljon mchog spangs rnams la
280b5(skyes rabs): gzugs ky-is ci// tshul khrims btut+l-i bu rnams la rigs kyis ci// mA m+b+ha g.yo ba nyid dag thong la ma nyamaso glags pa'i zla ba mdzes pa srungs// tshul khrims dr-I med rigs kyi rgyud dag skyongs shig sdig la blo gros
280b6(skyes rabs): yongs mi byed// rab 'bar dmyal ba'i me yis 'tshed cing 'khrugs te yi dwags rab tu gdungs pas nyen// sdig can 'jig rten pha rol lam ni nges par nyon mongs dag gis 'khrugs pa'i sa// zhes pa sa bdag sras
281a1(skyes rabs): po'i tshig thos nas// mi zad chags pa'i gdon nI des ma btang // rmongs pa'i mun can khron pa'i chu nang du// chos kyi nyer bstan nyi ma'i 'od mi 'jug/ rab tu 'joms byed yid bsrubs bdag gis//
281a2(skyes rabs): chom rkun mu bzhin 'phral la gzir gyur te// shugs rings ngal zhing 'phrul par brjod byed pas// 'brel med don gyi cho de de de smra// rnal gnas nyer bstan khyod kyis byed pa 'di// 'dod pas gzir ba bdag gis
281a3(skyes rabs): 'gal mi thos// lhag par rab 'bar 'dod pa'i me yi tshogs// rgyas pa tshig gis rab tu zhi mi 'gyur// yul na gsil ba'i chu rgyan 'brub mod kyang // mya ngan thang rnams dag ni gdung bar 'gyur// nyi ma shar yang chags pas
281a4(skyes rabs): gzir rnams la// phyogs mtshams rnams ni 'jigs rung mun pa yin// gdung ba'i bud meng bsrungs la chos ci yang // gal te brtse ldan khyod la med nA ni// dam pa rnams kyis gus par bstan pa de// med pa la yang chos
281a5(skyes rabs): min ji ltar yod// gang blo rnal gnas bsil ba de dag la// bdade slad bstan pa chos 'di tshad ma ste// zhen pas gzir cing yang dug gdungs rnams la// bkag pa'i bya ba la yang spyod pa ci// nga nyid kyis ni sdig pa dang por blangs// bdag
281a6(skyes rabs): yongs bsrungs pas khyod la chos su 'gyur// reg pa ri bong can ltar bsil ba yis// rgyun tu gdung bas nyen bdag bde bar mdzod// gdung ba 'phrog byed zla ba dang ni mi bzang mun po nyams byed nyi ma dang // nyin dang mtshan mor grang ba'i
281b1(skyes rabs): nyon mongs zhi byed me la sdig pa'i 'bras bu ci// gdung bas gzir ba bsrang dang mnyam las bzang ba'i chos ni gang du ci zhig mthong // bstan bcos mtha' dag shes pa khyod kyis gang 'di bden par bsal ba nyid du smros//
281b2(skyes rabs): yul 'di skye bos spangs shing legs par bsgribs// dben 'apa 'byed pa su yang med pa 'dir// rang 'o dang du 'jug mdza' bas dud pa yis// bud med drar ma ldan nyid la 'gyur// bud med dga' ma gus yongasu tshim rnams kyi//
281b3(skyes rabs): bzhin gyi pad+mo 'gram pa'i 'dab dman zhing // me chu nyams lan bu 'khrugs shing rdul gyi ni// thigs pas brlan chags skal ldan rnams kyis mthong // bud med ched du chu srin khros pa'i tshogs// 'jigs rung chu srin 'byung gnas 'dzings
281b4(skyes rabs): su 'ga'// rol gri'i 'khri shing g.yo ba'i rtse ldan pa// g.yul ngo dus kyi khar ni bzhin dag 'jug/ yun ring nyon mongs khyad par cher gdung bas// nor rnams la ni skyes bu mchog tu 'bad// nor 'di yongs 'dzin chos kyi don nyid de// chos
281b5(skyes rabs): kyi 'bras bu mchog ni 'dod par brjod// rnam pa mang pos de skad smra byed cing // 'khrugs pa de la gzhon nus rab smras pa// ma ma tshogs gsum gtso bo'i 'bras bu ni// dge ba'i lte ba dang bcas chos// skye bo med sar sdig pa sbrus mi 'gyur//
281b6(skyes rabs): 'dir ni dbang po snang min mtho ris tshogs// grags kyi dngos por gyur pa'i grib mas kyang // chung mas bzhin du skye bo thams cad rig/ dben par byas pa'i las 'bras nges par smin// las rnams 'bras bu rab nyams yod ma yin// mun
282a1(skyes rabs): nag dben par dug ni 'thungs pa na// srog rnams mi zad 'phrog byed min nAm ci// rigs kyi bud mang sdig pa'i mtshan mar gyur// de la'ang 'jigs rung gzhan gyi bud med 'grogs// 'thab mo la rmongs ma
282a2(skyes rabs): zhes mngon sbyor ba'i// rang gi chung mar skye gzhan yang mi reg/ de ltar don gnyer nyams pas phyir phyogs shing // de yis smin pas shin tu gdungs gyur te// khyod kyi mig dregs nges par bdag gis dbrog/ ces smras sdig can
282a3(skyes rabs): ma de rang gnas song // de nas grong khyer rdo 'jog ces par ni// sa bdag glang po'i rna ba zhes bya ba// 'dul du gzhon nu dpung gi rdul tshug tshogs// nyi ma phan byung ldan par rgyal pos btang // grong der nges phyin glang po'i mun pa yis//
282a4(skyes rabs): ma lus phyogs bzung yongasu bskor te gnas// glang po dpa' sgra chu gter bskyod pa ltar// zab pas srid pa rnams gnyis byed pa bzhin// de nas rdo 'jog rgyal pos rgyal sras la// spyi bos phyag 'tshal rab tu dang bar byas// glang po rta
282a5(skyes rabs): dang rin chen dag gis mchod// blo ldan rang gis rang gi rgyal ser pos// der ni de yis dga' ba'i rim gro yis// gus pas nye bar bsten cing rgyal sras de// sprin tshogs gzhan nu gsol bar rab rgyas pas// dri mar byas pa'i nyin rnams
282a6(skyes rabs): rab tu gnas// skabs der bu yi bzhin ras pad+mo dag/ blta bar yid la rab tu 'dod pa yis// sa bdag lto bar rtsa ba bcings pa'i nang // byung bar gyur te bsams pas bcings las bzhin// sna tshogs sman bas mau bsam gtan sgrub
282b1(skyes rabs): byed cing // nad bsos min par rtog pa'i rnal 'byor dang // the tshom gyis nI bzhin log mthong gyur pa'i// sman pas pho brang khang par rab tu bskor// mya ngan 'jigs pas bzhin du dril chung ste// smra bcad du gnas btsun
282b2(skyes rabs): mo'i tshogs rnams ni// ri mor bris pa'i rnam pa dong mtshungs la// rten pa'i g.yo med mig gis lta bar byed// ngal bu dal bur rnga yab 'dab ma ni// nye 'khor mdzes pa'i lag pas rnam dpyod pa// mya ngan gyis 'khrugs
282b3(skyes rabs): bugs rings bsten pa yis// yongasu dkar ba lta bu g.yob pa de// chu grang ldan pas bum par mig gtod cing // ska ba'i btung ba dag la zhen log bskyod// gnyid ni dag pa'i khro ba rab rdzogs shing // phan pa'i nyer bstan dag
282b4(skyes rabs): la chags bral zhugs// zhe sdang bcas pa'i skabs thob lus yang // smad 'os rang bzhin chags bral gyis smod cing // btsun mo'i nu ma'i bar gyi mgo bzhag pa'i// skad gdangs zhan pas sa bdag gis smras pa// rig byed
282b5(skyes rabs): rdzogs pa'i sman pas ding yang ci// gdung ba skyed byed bden med spyad kyis nI// bden med las kyis yongasu gzir ba rnams// gso byed chos kyi nyer bstan la chags yin// lus ni gnod pa'i sar song spyad mi 'os// longs
282b6(skyes rabs): spyosbyo tshogs kying zug rngu lta bur spyod// long ba'i bung ba mdzes sdug ldan pa bzhin// spyod spangs dpal ni dmod pa stug po nyid// ma dag shin tu dman yang rgyun tu ni// rab 'bar mya ngan me yis sred byed cing // gdung ba rgyas kyang
283a1(skyes rabs): rengs dang mI 'bral ba'i// ring po'i nad ldan ma yin sgrog song bde// sdig pa rab bsgribs nang du yongs gnas dang // dman pa brnyas shing rtsod pa rjes 'brel dang // nad kyis bstan par zil mnan smad pa dang //
283a2(skyes rabs): rab 'bar me yis gdung ba zhi bar 'gyur// las ngan rtse dga' nyon mongs rang bzhin 'di// rnam pa ra bkra ba'i gzugs ni bzlog pa ste// nad med bsten gang dbul bas sdug bsngal zhing // phun tshogs ldan gang rtag tu
283a3(skyes rabs): nAnang can no// rnam dpyod rgyas pa'i blo dang bral ba'i lus can rnams kyi skye ba 'bras med de// gang gis blo gros thos pas rgyan gyi sgrub byed rab 'bar byas pa smin pa smad// gang gi dpal gyis dbul ba nyid min ma gyur thos pa rgya che de yis
283a4(skyes rabs): ci// shin tu nang med nyid kyis gang zhig spyong med dpal gyi rnam 'phrul rgyas pas ci// bdag gis gzhon nu skye dgu dga' ba ni// dzo 'jog tu bskos myur du dgug par gyis// me long la bzhin dri med legs spyod zlum// ngo la rang gi
283a5(skyes rabs): rgyal srid 'phos pa blta'i// nga nyid gus pas dbu rgyan bcings byas shing // gdugs dkar mchog ni yang dag gtad pa de// grong pas nga nyid bsod nams bcud len gyis// gzhon nu nyid thob bzhin du lta gyur cig/ ces pa mAM yi dbang pos
283a6(skyes rabs): smras pa de// mtshungs par rab zhugs 'jigs dang mya ngan dang // dman dang phrag dog rmongs pas yongs khengs pa'i// btsun mo dkar rgyal srung bas thos nas smras// sa skyong khyod ni nad med bdag gis bgyi// bdag gis rigs pa'i khyad par
283b1(skyes rabs): blta bar mdzod// rang gi slob don nor nyams skye bo rnams// brlag slang tshe sten sman pa ngan pa song // rtag tu brlag brtson sman pa rig byed bral// phan tshun chags bral thos dregs snyoms pa dang // de nyid shes slong mi mkhas
283b2(skyes rabs): rjes smra bas// nyin zhag dang ni nad pa 'phen par byed// rang gi bu la'ang rgyal srid mi gtang de// rgyal po gzhan la yod kun dga' skyed byed// phun sum tshogs pa btang na skad cig gis// rgud pa stong phrag me yis gdung bar
283b3(skyes rabs): byed// 'phral la bu la zur phung bkod gyur cing // de dus rje bo'i gus pas nyams gyur pa'i// rgyal po'i bka' ni dud pa min rnams kyis// cha yis gcod cing rtswa dang mtshungs par 'gyur// zhes pas sa dbang brtan
283b4(skyes rabs): pa bsgrubs nas ni// khang nang de nas de ni phyi rol song // ba rdzi de mtshungs nad kyi gzir ba zhig/ btsal nas dben pa'i gnas su bos byas te// gdug pa'i bsam pas 'brangs mo gdug pa'i blos// de bsang lte ba'i mdzod ni
283b5(skyes rabs): rab phye ste// brtse bas dman des de yi rgyu mar ni// rnam 'gyur rtsub mo'i srin bu chags pa mthong // gyen du rab rgyu mgyogs par thur du yaud// gci ba spro byed de mthong bsad phyir des// byi dang ga sbyar shing kun pi pi ling // pho ba
283b6(skyes rabs): ris sogs sde tshan de la blugs// mi bzad 'gyur byed dug ldan gang dag ste// de ngas srin bu de ni srog ma ba tang // sgog skya'i rtsa ba dag ni btubs po yis// reg pa tsam las rab tu zhig par gyur// thabs mchog rnyed nas
284a1(skyes rabs): rab tu dga' ba de// de nas mi yi bdag po'i drung song ste// sgrog cha legs par bcad pa byin pa yis// skad cig gis ni de lus bsod par byas// gang la dug gi nus pas cad yod min// gang la
284a2(skyes rabs): mtshon gyis kyang ni myur mi phugs// gang la me ni spro nyams le lo can// de la yang ni bud med brtan nyams min// de nas sa bdag byas shes mdza' ba yi// 'ching bas blo gros bcings pas de la nau// 'tsho bu thob pa'i dga' bas
284a3(skyes rabs): mchog drag byin// de yos nyin zhag bdun du rgyal srid blangs// rgyal srid thob nas sa skyong bya ba ni// thams cad rang dbang nyid kyis byed par zhugs// rdo 'jog dbang po la ni spring yig dag/ rgya ldan rin chen mdzes pa dang bcas
284a4(skyes rabs): springs// de nas mi bdag bkas mtshan spring yig de// dul zhing rab tu dud pas mchod de blongs// rdo 'jogs bdag po rang gI bsal ba yi// yi ges mtshan pa'i don ni rab tu bklags// swa sti/ grong khyer pA Ta lI pu Ta las mtshungs pa med
