284a5(skyes rabs): pa'i g.yul la dpa' ba yang dag pa thob pa// rgya mtsho mtha' dag gis mtsham su rab tu 'phro zhing mi zhan la dri ma dang bral ba'i grags pa'i tshogs las bsgrubs pa'i du ku la'i ras dkar pos nor 'dzin gyi bu mo la longs spyod par bya ba skal pa
284a6(skyes rabs): bzang po nyid kyi snyems pa byin pa// dgra bo'i gzi byin nyams par byed cing mi dga' ba rnams kyi dga' ma'i rtse dga'i dmod pa bzhin du gyur pa/ dri ma med pa'i nor bu'i rkang stegs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal phran gyis rab tu btung
284b1(skyes rabs): pa'i bzhin gyis pad+ma'i gzugs brnyan gyi snod gcig tu byas pa legs byas dge ba'i pad+mo rnam par rgyas par byed pa'i nyin mo'i dbang phyug rtul phod pa dang brtson 'grus dang spro ba chen po rab tu rgyas pa'i nags tshal gyi gdong
284b2(skyes rabs): lta ba dpal lha mya ngan med pas rdo 'jog gyi dbang po dpal glang po'i rna ba lnga yang dag par rtogs par byed pa 'di lta ste// bdag gi bu'i bzhin dang ldan pa'i sgra/ khrel med cing ngan pa'i spyod pa la byams la yongs su skrag pa'i
284b3(skyes rabs): spyod pa can// mi gtsang zhing bstan bcos la sdang ba// mig gi 'dab brgya pa'i chung ma la mngon par sred pa'i dug gi snod du byed pa// sdig pa'i rje su mthun pa'i gzugs dang lang tsho dang spro ba dang rtul phod pa dang ldan pa skye bo mi'i
284b4(skyes rabs): lag 'gro 'dri'i mig nor bu rab tu phyung ste gros dang bral bar bskang mdzod cig ces pa bdag gi 'bad pas don du gnyer ba'o// spring yig don 'di rab tu drag rnam dpyad nas// brtse ldan brtse bas rnam par 'gems byed cing // gzhon
284b5(skyes rabs): nu la mdza' mi bdag la 'jigs pas// mi bdag yod ni khyogs la bteg par gyur// mchi mas 'khrugs shing sa la lta ba de// gzhon nu de na gnas pas mthong gyur nas// 'di dag ci zhes the tshom gyis gzir gyur// spring yig rang gis
284b6(skyes rabs): yang dag blangs nas bltas// rdzun gyis rab bskrun cher khros bla ma'i bka'// gzung dka' bzod par dka' ba de mthong bas// mi bzang gdung ba rgyas pa de la yang // bstan pa'i spyod tshul g.yo med de yis bsam// re zhig pha yi
285a1(skyes rabs): bzhed 'di 'gong mi bya// de khros 'jigs las mi bdag 'di yang bsrung // rgyal po rdzun gyis gnod pa khros mod kyang // drag pa brjod pas rab tu dang mi 'gyur// mig ni yongs btang bde slang yab kyi ni// khro ba'i me
285a2(skyes rabs): gdung rab tu bdag gis byas// sa bdag 'di yang de yi bka' bcag las// skyes pa'i gdung ba rgyas par mi 'gyur ro// mi brtan mi gtsang rang bzhin lus dag la// mig ni chu yi thigs pa'i rnam 'gyur gzugs// rtswa sgron gzugs brnyan skad
285a3(skyes rabs): ga rab gsal ba// de la nges par yon tan ci zhig gnas// gang zhig blta thob la chags 'jig rten na// shin tu rab 'bad mig ni yang dag bsrung // de dag gzugs de rab g.yo mig 'phrul dang // rmi lam phreng thog rten med ri mo'o//
285a4(skyes rabs): yun ring 'di spyad mi dbang sras po yis// rgyal po de ni bzhed mig phyir phyogs shing // skye bo mchi mar bcas pas bzlog gyur kyang // der ni mig dag nyams par byed du bcug/ gdug pa'i skyes bu nor la brkam pa yis// gser byin
285a5(skyes rabs): ga ni rab tu phyung ba des// mi zlog glang pos chu skyes tshogs bcom pa'i// pad+ma'i 'byung gnas rnam par mtshungs pa thob// de yi mdza' bos gser gyi phreng ldan ma// rgyal bar sbyor che lhan cig der 'ongs pas// gnas der mngon phyogs
285a6(skyes rabs): mig ni rnam nyams de// mthong ba nyid na rmongs pas bcom nas 'gyel// 'du shes thob cing rgya che rab gdung ba// mig mdzes rtse dga' la chags de la ni// mi rtag nyid bsams bden pa mthong gyur cing // rgyun zhugs 'bras thob brtan pa des
285b1(skyes rabs): smras pa// mdzes ma 'khrugs pa nyid las brtan pa bsten// rmongs dang dman rgyas skrag par ma byed cig/ srog chags rnams kyis rang las 'bras bu ni// 'jigs ma nges par spyad par bya ba yin// da ni dben par long
285b2(skyes rabs): ba da nyid 'gro// khyod kyis nyon mongs mi bzad gnyen khab bsten// skal bzang longs spyod 'bras pa'i snying po ni// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mya ngan yod mi bya// zhes smra de la 'bral po'i 'jigs pa yis// yongs 'dar lus
285b3(skyes rabs): can btsun mos rab smras pa// rang sems sdug bsngal la btsongs nu ma la// mig sman gyis sngo phyi mas 'bri ba bzhin// bya dag ni rje yi sras khyod yod mi gtong // gang zhig rgung tshe rang bdag gzugs gzhan gyur// rgyan
285b4(skyes rabs): dang tshul khrims bzhin du gtong ba 'di// bud med rnams kyi rigs 'os brtul zhugs mdzad slang nor ldan la// smad 'tshong rnams kyang 'bud nas ston par byed// bdag po rgud gyur dag rnams lhag par mdza'// skye bo tsho
285b5(skyes rabs): rnams slong ba dgra la bzhon// mig ni long ba'i rab mchog 'khar ba ni// rgud pa'i gdung ngas ngal la grib gsil yin// gnas skabs skyes bu rnams kyi mau bzad la// grogs ni chung ma dang mtshungs yod ma yin// de ltar
285b6(skyes rabs): 'bad pas don gnyer rgyal po'i bu// stong g.yogs hrul po tsam lhag brtan pa dang // zhabs zung la btugs chung ma de dang yang // lhan cig nyid du dal gyi song bar gyur// rgyud mangs sbrang mkhas glu snyan len mkhas des//
286a1(skyes rabs): dang por de che lam du 'tsho ba thob// rgud na bsod nams 'byor na rtse 'jo yis// sgyu rgyal mtshung sa pa'i nor ni mi lA med// bung ba'i phreng ba myos pa'i sgra lta bu// rgyud mangs sgra snyan rna ba'i bdud rtsi yis// bran
286a2(skyes rabs): bzhin bsod snyoms slong de chung ma dang // lhan cig khyim rnamasu zhugs glu blangs pa// skye bo bla ma khros pas rab bskrun sgra gcan gyi ni mthu yis nyi ma rnam par nyams byas shing // bden med yongasu smra ba'i rnam par bslad pa
286a3(skyes rabs): nags phyogs nyin gyis spyod pa'i zla ba zad par byas// yon tan ldan pa'i tshigs la sun 'byin lhung bas yon tan mchog gi rin chen 'od kyis dbul bar gyur// rab mang nyes byas yongasu smin pa'i rlung gis bsnun pas mig gi
286a4(skyes rabs): sgron ma dag dang bral gyur pa// srid pa'i chu 'dzin che la glog bzhin shin tu g.yo ba'i dpal gyi rnam pa dag dang bral rnams la// bsod nams dag gis slar yang dam chos dran par gyur pa'i snang ba gsar pa rab tu spro bar byed// rgyu rtsal
286a5(skyes rabs): dang ldan mig gi bden pa de// glu lan slong zhing 'tsho bas dus bzlas nas// yab kyi grong khyer pA tra li pu trar// 'khar ba la bzhin chud mar brtan te song // ring ba'i sdug bsngal lam gyis lus dman zhing // bzhin par
286a6(skyes rabs): mdog gis grang dang tsha ba 'thungs// gzhon nu mdzes ma dang 'grogs de mthong nas// skye bos yid srubs dmod pa nyams par shes// ngal gyis rgyal po'i nags tshal phreng nye bar// phyin zhing skad cig ngal so don
286b1(skyes rabs): gnyer de// rtsub mor smra byed skyed tshal skyongs rnams kyis// bkra mi shis phyir rab tu bkag gyur pa// gnas med gnas ni tshol bar byed pa de// mi bdag gi ni glang po'i gnas su zhugs// rgyud mangs rtsed mo la gus dge mtshan
286b2(skyes rabs): gyis// glang po skyong po dag gis go skabs byin// der ni long ba de mthong shes gyur pa'i// glang po'i dbang pos gdong ni yongs bskor zhing // de la legs 'ongs 'dri bzhin sgra tshon bsgrags// gtsug ldan rtse ba'i tshogs kyis
286b3(skyes rabs): gar dag phul// de ni glang po'i sgra yis mi g.yo zhing // 'khrul pa med mthong lag ldan bdag po yis// kye ma snying stobs rgya mtsho rab mi 'dar// rgyal rigs bzang po 'di ni su zhes smras// glang por mngon phyogs gser gyi phreng ldan ma//
286b4(skyes rabs): rnal 'byor mngon par khengs pa dran gyur te// 'phral la mchi ma 'dzag cing shugs ring bas// khyo yi zhabs dag nyed cing rab smras pa// glang po'i sgra yis lag ldan bdag po khyod kyi mdun na gang // sprin gyi bsam pas g.yo ldan
286b5(skyes rabs): gtsug phud can ni gar rab byed// rma bya 'di dag gzhon nu'i rma bya'i rigs lus 'khrungs pa ste/ tshogs kyi bdag pos sgra bsgrags tshe yang rnam par 'gyur ba med// de nas tshogs ldan g.yo ba'i thun mtshams ni// skyon la mngon
286b6(skyes rabs): phyogs zhe sdang ldan zhing 'ongs// mi ldan 'tsho bar gyur pa'i nyi ma bcom// skye bo mun pa rnam pa rgyas par bsgrubs// pad+mo 'byung gnas chu skyes bzhin zum pa// phun tshogs bral zhing dman pa mthong gyur nas// bung ba'i phreng ba mya
287a1(skyes rabs): ngan zil gyis gnon// nges par myong bya'i rang bzhin glur len bzhin// kun gsal nor bu'i sgron ma gcig pu nyid// nyi ma 'dus tshe mar me stong 'bum gyis// nyin mo'i snang ba'i cha la mtshungs ma
287a2(skyes rabs): gyur// gang phyir chen po'i gzi byin kun las lhag/ rgyal khang nor bu gser gyi ba gam can// rab gsal de ni mun la rab mdzes te// bdag po rgung tshe gus pas phan pa nyid// sgrub byed tshul khrims rgyan ldan dag pa bzhin//
287a3(skyes rabs): rab rib rab rgyas gtso bo nyid thob des// ma lus 'jig rten snang ba med byas nas// zla ba 'char rtsom 'jigs pas zil mnan te// ngal bu yis ni yib pa bzhin du gyur// de nas nag po'i mtshan ma'i ri mo ni// phrin gyi ngang tshul yig
287a4(skyes rabs): phreng rab bkod pa// ku mud can dga'i legs byas bsil zer can// pad+mo 'byung gnas dpal 'phrog spring yig byung // bdud rtsi'i zer dkar yid 'ong pad rtsa yi// 'khri shing myu gu gsar dbyibs 'odra ris kyis// 'o ma'i 'od ldan mdzes
287a5(skyes rabs): pa'i gos dkar gyis// grags pas bzhin du thams cad khyab par byas// de nas mtshan mo'i lang tsho nyams gyur cing // zla ba mkha' las dal gyi babs pa'i tshe// sgo ngas nyams pas rnam par gnyid pa yi// gzho nu la ni glang po 'dzin pas
287a6(skyes rabs): smras// dri za can longs mi 'am ci rnams kyis// mdzes ma bzhin ni pang du rab bkod nas// sen mo btab bskyed yid 'ong snyan sgrogs shing // glu dang rgyud mangs 'ga' zhig mi len nams// zhes smra rgyags shing 'char ba de
287b1(skyes rabs): dag gis// rjes bskul ngal zhing gnyid kyis gzir gyur pa// dman pa'i tshig gis rab gdungs yid byung bas// rgyud mangs blangs nas yud tsam rab bsams pa// kye ma stag gi tshogs ni brtse med dag/ khrag
287b2(skyes rabs): lnga snol zhing nye bar lhags pa dang // rgyal po'i 'bangs ni myos pa'i tshogs bcas te// smod rtsub rjod pas bzung ba 'tsho ma yin// nga rgyal nyams byed ngo tsha sgrub par byed// bde ba 'joms byed gdung ba rgyas par
287b3(skyes rabs): byed// mi bzang sdug bsngal rgud pa skyed byed pa// dman pa bsten pa dang mtshungs mya ngan mod// dman pa'i tshig de yang yang des bsams nas// smod pa'i gdung ba tsha ba'i mes reg pas// shugs phyung dus ni
287b4(skyes rabs): 'phangs par mngon 'dod pas// dal gyis rgyud mangs dag ni sbreng zhing blangs// khengs pa rab 'joms dregs dang nor nyams bde blag tu ni nye bar rgod// tshul lugs min dang du ba'i spyod dang 'byed par byed dang ston bcas dang //
287b5(skyes rabs): gnod du rig pa'i gdung ba mi bzang nyon mongs zug rngu ltar spyod pas// kye ma 'khor ba dag ni mi bsrun tshul gyis sbyar ba'i rtse dga' byed// rlung gis rnam bskyod 'khri shing rab tu g.yo ba'i 'od ba rtse ltor mi brtan/ srid pa 'khor bas
287b6(skyes rabs): kye ma skyes bu rnams la rmongs pa rab brtan byed// chus gang skye bo'i sprin tshogs yang dag 'dus pas rab brtsams glog gi nI// rtse dgo'i nyams ldan dpal 'byor 'di dag de la yang ni lhag par g.yo// skyes bu rnams kyi rgud pa mtha'
288a1(skyes rabs): ngag bsrung ba'i rin chen tshul khrims ni// rab gsal bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin dri med gal te cha yang ma nyams na// 'byor pa dang bral nyon mongs kyis nyen 'dren byed ma tshang 'phye bo dang // lkug par
288a2(skyes rabs): bde ba'i 'jug tu g.yang sa chen por lhung yang rnam par mdzes// chu dang thang yang dbyugs pas rig cing mtha' dag reg pa 'am dris dag gis rtogs la// blo gros kyis ni bgrod dka'i lam kun rig cing thos nas gzhan
288a3(skyes rabs): du bdag 'gro ste// rmongs pas long zhing tshigs pa'i skye bo 'di dag yid brtan dbu su chags gyur pa'i// 'jigs rung dmyal ba'i nyon mongs mi sheso zhes long bas rab mang co 'dri bzhin// de ltar bdag nyid spyod pa'i rjes
288a4(skyes rabs): mthun 'jug/ yid 'ongs nyams ldan de yis glu slongs tshe// mtshan mo'i 'jug tu sa bdag khang bzang na// gzims pa 'phral la sad nas rab tu bsams// rtag tu rmi lam ngan pa mthong nyid kyis// dogs pa'i chu bos
288a5(skyes rabs): bdag ni rab tu 'khrugs// gzhonu rdo 'jog na gnas da lta yang // bdag la spring yig ci phyir yong mi spring // rtag tu mi brjed nye ba'i bzhin ras la// mngon phyogs de ni nga nyid brjed dam ci// nges par yun ring bral bas skye bo ni//
288a6(skyes rabs): mdza' ba'i rje su 'ching ba lhod par 'gyur// ga ma bkas bcings klu yi sgra 'di yang // rgyud mangs dbyangs snyan gyis mtshan rab gsal ba// de yi nying mtshungs mnyan pa'i rjes mthun pa// dri za'i 'jig rten las bzhin
288b1(skyes rabs): bdag gis thos// re zhig glu snyan 'di ni de nyid kyi// ci slad de yib 'di ci yong mi shes// skad cig de ltar rnam bsams rgyal po yis// nyug rum pa btang bu ni de nas bos// ring nas mig bral de ni 'ong ba drag/ mtsho
288b2(skyes rabs): skyes dpal dang bral ba bzhin mthong nas// chung mar bcas pa'i bu ni yongs shes te// sa yi bdag po rmod pA bcom nas 'gyel// kha ba'i zer ma'i thogs 'dra chus reg pas// ngal gyi 'du shes thob pa'i mi
288b3(skyes rabs): bdag des// gzhon nu nye bar 'ongs pa phang par ni// yang drag bkod nas yun ring mya ngan byas// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten mig spro kyi hud bu// sdug bsngal skabs 'di khyod kyis ci slad bsten// lha yi mdzes ma rmongs byang
288b4(skyes rabs): khyod kyi ni// mig ni chu skyes zung de gang du song // zab mo'i sa gzhi yon tan rin tshon mdzod// snying stobs phung po dbyangs can grogs khyod las// kha bas bcom pa'i chu skyes tshal las bzhin// rnam 'phrul sa gauzhi
288b5(skyes rabs): dpal de gang du song // gang du gzugs de mi bzod long 'di gar// 'byor de gang du gang du skabs na 'di// bdag snying mi 'gas 'di la suM zhig gis// rdo rje'i man ngag byin pa yong maM shes// khyod 'byor rje swa 'brang skya
288b6(skyes rabs): bo de gang du// khyod kyi chung ma g.yo med gcig pu 'di// sdug kyang dam pa brtan pa'i spyod tshul bzhin// rigs kyi rjes mthun 'khor gyi lhag mar gyur// zhes pa mchi ma'i rgyan gyis yi ge nyams// tsho de smra ba de yi tshig thos
289a1(skyes rabs): nasA/ dwe yi phreng lasA myur du sAr babs te// gzhon nu brtan pas de la btud nas smraswa// sa yi brgya byin mya ngan rnam phar thong // mya ngan dag ni zil mnan brtan pa min// mtho dang dma'
289a2(skyes rabs): rnams brlag slad nges par ni// myong bya'i rang bzhin 'di ni mel tshe byed// mi rnams dbang phyug ngo mtshar bde ba yi// rna rgyan can dang dpal mdzes thig le can// lus kyang mthar byed rtse ba'i las rnams kyis// sbrul
289a3(skyes rabs): pas phyogs pa skad cig nyid kyis 'gro// gal te dngos med nyams myong srid pa 'dir// dngos tshogs rang bzhin bden par gyur pa na// thub pa 'di la dag longs spyong yongs btang nas// nges par dben pa dag tu ga nas
289a4(skyes rabs): mi byed // ces smra de la rgud pa'i rgyu mchen ni// rgyal po mya ngan ldan pas yang yang dris// de la dal gyis spring yig dang 'brel pa'i// rang gi mig ni rnam par nyams tshul bshad// spyong ngan spyod pa rnams la'ang ma spyad
289a5(skyes rabs): pa'i// gtum pa'i spyong tshul mi bzang de thos nas// sta re rnom pos rtsa ba yongs bcad pa'i// yal 'dab can bzhin 'dzin byed yu ba 'gyel/ 'du shes thob des slar rgyal srung ba yis// bkod pa'i sbyor ba gya gyo de
289a6(skyes rabs): bsams nas// de yi tshod pa bud med bsod pa yi// sdig la'ang chos la gus pas bzhin brtson gyur// gdug pa'i rnam pa gnod pa rgya che ba// de la lan sbyor rab tu brtson pa des// rang las smin pas bzod dka'i sdug
289b1(skyes rabs): bsngal dang // ldan par smra ba'i gzhon nus rab tu bzlog/ sa bdag gdung bas gzir zhing mya ngan dang // glo bas tshig pas de la rab smras pa// gdugs pa la chags 'phags min gtum mo 'di// khyod ni rmongs
289b2(skyes rabs): lasa? yongasu srung ngam ci// sdang bar sbyor dang mdza' bas bcings pa la// mtshungs pa'i yid can gang de mi 'am ci// gang la gnod la khro ba'i cha med pa// de la phan la drin yang ji ltar yod// ces pa rab smra shugs
289b3(skyes rabs): 'byin gzir ba yi// yab la gzhon nu brtan pas rab smras pa// rgyal po bdag la sdug bsngal cha 'ga' med// mi bzad gnod la'ang khro ba'i gdung ba min// mig drag rang gi lag gis phyung ba bzhin// gal te ma la bdag
289b4(skyes rabs): yau rab dang na// bden pa de yis re zhig mig gnyis ni// sngon bzhin 'phral la yang dag 'byung bar shog/ ces brjod tsam la de yi dus nyid na// mi bdag bu yis spyan ni mtsho skyes zung // 'jig rten bden pa'i brtul
289b5(skyes rabs): zhugs yid ches byed// dpal mo rnam par chags byed rab tu byung // 'dren byed zung gis rnam par mdzes gyur cing // skye dgu rnams ni bde dang spro byed pa'i// bu de rgyal tshab las phyir phyogs shes nas// mi bdag de yis phun
289b6(skyes rabs): tshogs rnams lo bskos// de nas sa bdag gis ni btsun mo la// drag po'i gnod la mtshungs pa'i lan bsgrubs bzhin// rdo 'jog dbang po la yang khro ba'i me// bzod dka' de yi bzod pas rab tu bdang // dge
290a1(skyes rabs): mtshan de lngas dge slong tshogs kyis dris// dge 'dun gnas brtan mkhas pa des smras pa// sa skyong bu 'di skye ba gzhan la ni// ka shi grong khyer dag tu rngon par gyur// de yis gangs ldan
290a2(skyes rabs): ngos kyi phugs zhugs pa'i// ri dwags lnga brgya dag ni thob gyur nas// mig bdag phyung nas long bar rab bsgrubs te// ji lta nye bar mkho ba rim gyis bsad// de nas skye gzhan la yang tshong dpon bu// mug d+ha zhes
290a3(skyes rabs): 'di byis pa rab rmongs las// mchod rten gyi ni rgyal ba'i sku gzugs kyi// bzhin ras pad+ma mtshon gyis mig med byas// 'du shes skyes des de yi spyan zung dag/ in+d+ra nI la'i rang bzhin gsur du bsgrubs// de nas skye ba gzhan
290a4(skyes rabs): la'ang mchod rten ni// zhig pa gso dang mchod pa dag kyang byas// nags su ri dwags rnams kyi mig phrogs shing // byis pas mchod rten sku gzugs spyan phyis pas// rgyal po'i bu 'dis skye ba gzhan rnams dang // da lta mig
290a5(skyes rabs): dag rnam par nyams pa thob// rin chen mig ldan sku gzugs byas pa yis// rnam par nyams pa'i mig ni slar yang thob// mchod rten zhig pa rab tu rgyas byas pas// rab tu dang ldan mdzes pa'i rang bzhin gyur// rgyun zhugs
290a6(skyes rabs): 'bras bu rab 'jug dri ma dang bral snang ba'i rim pa 'di yis ni// chags bral rab 'bar bden pa mthong ba'i sgrub byed dag la gnas pa'i dbang gyur thob// dus kyis yang dag bsod nams dbang las ral gyis rdzogs
290b1(skyes rabs): ba'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// zhes pa gnas brtan gyis gsungs dge slong tshogs kyis thos nas ya mtshan ldan par gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag
290b2(skyes rabs): bsam gyi 'khri shing las kunA lI'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// / 'dor ni mi rnams lus dag nyon mongs phung pos rab tu gdung // 'jig rten pha rol tu yang mi bzang dmyal
290b3(skyes rabs): ba'i me yis sreg/ skyabs 'gro'i bsod nams dang ni bslab pa'i gnas dag thob rnams kyi// lus la nam yang sdug bsngal dag gis sreg pa'i mthu yod min// rgya mtsho'i mthar ni nor zhes pa'i// klu ni gnyen mang ldan pa byung //
290b4(skyes rabs): gdengs ka'i rIn chen rab 'bar gyis// snang bas sngon med nyin mo byas// de yi khang par nyin mtshan du// bye tshan dag ni bab gyur te// gang gis lag 'gro rnams kyi lus// gdung ba drag pos nyen par gyur// nor bzang zhes bya gcetses pa'i
290b5(skyes rabs): bu// rang bzhin nyid kyis rab gzhon pa// bye mas yongasu gzir gyur pas// nam zhig de la rab tu dris// yab cig bye ma tsha ba 'dis// bdag cag ci slad gdung bar byed// sngags dang rtsa ba'i sbyor ba dag/ ci yis nyo bar zhi bar
290b6(skyes rabs): gyur// 'ga' zhig bdag las lhag pa dang // gzhan ni bdag las dman pa yi// klu rnams rgya mtsho 'di na gnas// yu nyid sdug bsngal gyis gzir ci// zhes pa bu yis dris ngi la// blo gros chen po de smras bu// ji ltar gdengs can
291a1(skyes rabs): gzhan gyis chos// shes pa de ltar yu tsug min// chos gyi nyer bstan gyis dag pa// zhi zhing bden par smra rnams lnga// nges par nye b.rA gdung gyur pa// lusA lA ma yin yid lnga'ang min// sangs
291a2(skyes rabs): rgyas chos dang tshogs zhes pa// skyabs 'os bsod nams dkon mchog ni// gsum la skyabs song mkhas pa gang // de la yong sa gdung reg mi byed// gang gis nyon mongs rab zhi ba'i// bslab pa'i gnas rnams
291a3(skyes rabs): thob gyur cing // bdud rtsis bran pa de dag la// sdig gdung 'jigs pa gang la yod// shAkya thub pa 'jig rten gyis// nyon mongs thams cad rab zhi'i gnyen// rgyal ba rgyal byed tshal gnas pa// mnyan yod na ni bcom ldan
291a4(skyes rabs): yod// snying rje zla ba'i 'od bskyed de// sems dpa' ltar dkar man ngag gi/ 'od zer tshogs kyis 'gro gsum du// bdud rtsi'i char pa mngon par 'bebs// gang zhig rnam par ma thul bas// bslab pa'i gnas thob mi
291a5(skyes rabs): srung ba// de dag dmyal bar mi bzad pa'i// gdung ba drag pos brlag par 'gyur// zhes pa pha dang ma yi yung // tshig dag thos nas lag 'gro ni// me tog mchog dgu yongs bzung nas// dag pa'i rgyal byed tshal du song //
291a6(skyes rabs): tshig shes sgor ni mngon phyogs des// bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas phyin te// der ni chos dag nyan pa la// tshogs pa'i 'khor dag mthong bar 'gyur// bzhin ras mdzes shing spyan yangs pa// zla ba nya dang pad tshal dag
291b1(skyes rabs): 'grogs pa bzhin du bde ster ba'i// rgyal ba der ni mthong bar gyur// nye bar ston byed mchu yis ni// chags ldan rnams kyi dmar ba nyid// rab rgyas dman pa nyid byas shing // gsal bar zil gyis gnon pa
291b2(skyes rabs): bzhin// rgyan dang bral ba'i mdzes sdug gis// rna ba'i zhags pA rab brgyan cing // sgrib pa dang bral stong pa nyid// rab tu rgyas pa ston pa bzhin// dpung pa chos kyis gnyis 'thungs lags// sbyin pas mdzes
291b3(skyes rabs): pa rnam par 'dzin// nus mthu'i khang pa dgi ni// ka ba gser gyi rang bzhin bzhin// chos gos rgyan dang ldan pa yis// zhabs kyi grib ma spro byed pa// sa gzhi rtogs pa thob pa la// pad+mo grogs rnams kyis bsgrubs
291b4(skyes rabs): bzhin// lus kyis mdzes pa rgyas pa ni// spyan gyis bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pas// dam pa rnams kyi 'khor ba yi// mya ngan yongs gdung bzlog pa bzhin// de mthong nyid nA klu yi bu// yongasu gladung ba gtang bar
291b5(skyes rabs): 'gyur// bdag nyid che rnams mthong ba nyid// gdung ba'i skyon kun zhi bar byed// snyim pa me tog gis grang ba// de la gtor nas des phyag 'tshal// de yi zhabs par reg pa yis// 'phral la bsil ba nyid du gyur//
291b6(skyes rabs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ni// bslab pa'i gnas thob mkhas pa des// thal mo sbyar nas de la ni// ji srid 'tsho bar lhag gnas byas// de la bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa// thams cad rjesu bzung bya la// gcig nyid
292a1(skyes rabs): kho na'i lhag gnas ni// ji srid 'tsho ba ji lta 'os// gus la dgyel pas de brjod nas// de la brtson pas bcom ldan des// gdengs can rnam par brtag pa ni// yongs rdzogs mdzad cing ngal gyis
292a2(skyes rabs): chus// dge slong tshogs kyi sna drangs nas// rim gyis byon pa de ni// klu yis mthu gnas dang gnas// ma ris lta bur mdzes pa bsgrubs// rin chen gser 'od bkra ba yi// mchog gi skyed tshal mdzes pa dang
292a3(skyes rabs): longs spyod 'dzin pas 'brel pa yis// 'bangs dang 'brangs mo'i tshogs rgyas dang // gA pur tsan dan rgya che yi// ngo shal 'phyang bas brgyan pa yi// gnas dang gnas su gtsug lag khang // bcom ldan 'das
292a4(skyes rabs): la de yis byas// de nus ka lAn dra ka'i gnas// zhes pa 'od ma'i tshal du phyin// de yis longs spyod tshogs kun gyis// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas// der ni de yis zla gsum du// dge 'dun dang bcas
292a5(skyes rabs): bde gshegs mchod// ngo shal rin chen 'od kyis bskor// ya mtshan kun dga' ldan la gsungs/ gdengs can 'di ni bskal pa brgyar mi g.yo// bde ba'i longs spyod kun gyi snod du 'gyur// 'on kyang skye ba gzhan lnga
292a6(skyes rabs): byang chub kyang // rab tu 'bad pas gsal bar byed par 'gyur// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs po brjod pa dpag bsam gyi'o khri shing las klu gzhin nu'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i
292b1(skyes rabs): yal 'dab ste drug cu pa'o// // blun po'i lag tu gter dgra lhung yang rab tu 'gro bar 'gyur// rnam dag blo ldan khyim du dpal ni rang nyid 'ong bar 'gyur// skyes bu rnams kyis yid ni shin tu
292b2(skyes rabs): rab tu dang ba dag/ dbul ba'i rab rib mi bzang 'phrog pa'i rgyan gyi nor bu yin// mnyan yod du sngon bram ze ni// nor med bkra shis zhes bya ba/ 'tsho ba bral bas 'tsho ba'i thabs// 'bras bu chung ba'i zhing la brtun//
292b3(skyes rabs): zhing las la chags grang ba dang // rlung dang che bas nyen pa des// thong ba dang ni rtog rtse'i khur// khyer zhing 'ong dang 'gro ba byas// nam zhig chung mAM dang bcas des// lam du rgyal ba nyan thos dang // lhan cig byon pa mthong
292b4(skyes rabs): gyur nas// 'phral la rab tu dang bar gyur// sbyin pa'i bsod nams yongs zad las// dbul po'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa// sems zhing de yis chung ma ni// rab dang bzhin ldan la smras pa// bcom ldan 'dus 'di
292b5(skyes rabs): yu cagu gis// rdog gcig gis kyang ma mchod lasa?// bsod nams zong gris 'thob pa'i nor// phun tshogs yu la gA la 'ong // shi ba gson nyid 'jig rten na// grags pa nyams pa shi ba nyid// nor mang
292b6(skyes rabs): skye bo mdzes pa ni// gson la ma yin gshin la min// nor rigs nor ni rigs pa ste// nor chos nor ni grags pa yin// nor gyis dman zhing bslangs pa yis// 'tsho ba'i yon tan rnams kyi ci// gzhan gyi
293a1(skyes rabs): nye 'khor gyur pa yis// dbul po'i yon tan dam pas ci// khur ba la ni nor bu yis// gser rgyan dral dub don gyis bzhin// dbul po sbyin pa dag dang bral bas slar yang dbul por
293a2(skyes rabs): rab tu 'jug/ dbul po nor la tshogs pas gzhan dbang sdig pa'i bdag nyid dag tu gyur// dbul po dbugs dang bcas kyang shi zhes 'di la khyad par blo gros med// dbul po phyogs bcu 'di dag rang gis skye bo dag
293a3(skyes rabs): gis dman pa bzhin// de slangad dman la mnyes gshin po'i// bde bar gshegs pa mchod par byas/ sangs rgyas mnyes par ma byas pa'i// rmongs la dge ba ga la yod// pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu'i spyan// phongs pa'i gnyen
293a4(skyes rabs): 'dis gang gang du// spyan ni 'phangs pa de dang der// dpal ni gnas par bdag gis shes// de skad bdag po'i tshig thos nas// khyim du gus bcas bram ze mos// zas ni gtsang mar sbyar ba dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du
293a5(skyes rabs): bsgrubs// bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas kyang // de drag bsam pa yongs mkhyen nas// gus pa gsol ba 'debs pa de'i// mchod pa dag ni blang bar mdzad// dbul ba'i sdug bsngal rab gsal ba// bdag la
293a6(skyes rabs): 'byor pa 'byung gyur cig/ ces pa'i smon lam gnyis skyes kyis// rgyal ba mchod pa'i 'jug tu byas// de nas bram ze rang zhing du// song bas 'bru nas myu gu ni// thams cad gser du mthong gyur nas// 'phral ba nyid du dbul
293b1(skyes rabs): btang hA/ sra yi bdag po gsal rgyal gyis// de yi bsod nams las 'khrungs pa'i// gser dag mthong nas ya mtshan te// dga' bsnga rgyal po'i cha shas btang // shin tu mang ba'i gser de yis// dbang phyug gter
293b2(skyes rabs): thob gnyis skyes kyis// rdzogs sangs rgyas sogs dge 'dun ni// longs spyong kun gyis rab tu mchod// ston pas chos ni bstan pa yis// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras thob nas// bdan mthong de yis dus kyis ni//
293b3(skyes rabs): rab tu byung po yang dag blangs// nyon mongs thams cad rab bcom ste// de yis dgra bcom nyid thob tshe// las de dge slong rnams kyis dris// bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par gsungs// skye ba gzhan la bram ze 'dis//
293b4(skyes rabs): bdag nyid chen po bcom ldan 'das// 'od srung kyi ni bstan pa la// tshangs par spyod pa sngon tshe spyang // nye dbang dbang bcas lhas mchod pa// shin tu che ba'i grub pa 'di// bdag gi sngon du skye ba 'di// 'di la de yis yang dag
293b5(skyes rabs): bstan// de skad de yi legs byas rgyal bas gsungs pa thos gyur nas// de yi yon tan rang bzhin nang du 'phos bzhin dge slong ni// de dag thams cad ya mtshan blo ldan dga' bas 'khrugs gyur cing // dge la gus pas bzang
293b6(skyes rabs): po'i spyod pa rab tu bsngags pa mdzad// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las zhing pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o//
294a1(skyes rabs): lug gis gang bar gyur pa'i skye bo'i nags tshal gnas dag tu// lang chos long zhing bde ba la 'os mdzes pa'i chas ldan che// dben pas chags bral zhi zhing dag pa gang la rab byin pa// skye bu de nyid
294a2(skyes rabs): gcig pu ya mtshan rang bzhin dag tu skyes// rgyal ba sngon tshe n+ya gro d+ha'i// kun dga' ra ba mdzes par bzhugs// ba ra NA ser khyim bdag ni// legs par rab sad ces pa byung // nor ni rgyas pa gtong ba dang // longs sbyong tshogs
294a3(skyes rabs): kyis rnam par brgyan// gang gis dbang phyug lus can gyis// mdzod na gnas pa'ang zum par byed// bde ba thams cad phun tshogs te// bu med bu yi bsam pa yis// mchog tu yang dag gdung ba thob// phun tshogos su yi
294a4(skyes rabs): zug rngu min// de yis bsam pas 'phos pa yis// yun ring yid 'khrul gnyen rnams kyis// gnyen la gnyen gshin mya ngan gyis// me yis rab gdung de la smras// khyim bdag ma ning la 'os pa'i// bsam
294a5(skyes rabs): pa bya bar mi rigaso// brtan ldan snying stobs che rnams la// 'jig rten na ni rnyed dka' med// grang 'di phyogs su grags gyur cing // yul 'dir grong khyer pas mchod pa'is// n+ya gro d+ha yi shing de la// mchod pas thams
294a6(skyes rabs): cad thob par 'gyur// de la zhus pas 'ga' zhig ni// bu med bu dang ldan pa dang // gzhan ni nor med nor dang ldan// gzhan yang nad can nang med mthong // n+ya gro d+ha yi rkang 'thung 'di// mchod rten slong ba bden zhes bya// 'os
294b1(skyes rabs): pas mchod na khyod la nI// bu zhes brjod pa'i 'bras ster 'gyur// zhes pa de dag tshig thos nas// 'dzum bcas de dag la smras pa// kye ma rmongs pa 'am mudza' ba las// khyed rnams rmongs pa nyid du gyur//
294b2(skyes rabs): rang las gzhan dbang 'jig rten 'dir// nges par g.yo ba med pA la// su yis su yi brtan pa dang // rgyas dang 'phrog dang 'joms par byed// rang las nye bar nyid thob nas// blo gros blun po gzhan la tshim// rang gi kha
294b3(skyes rabs): chu'i cha myangs nas// khyi ni pags pa skam la bzhin// shing gis bu nor skyes bu la// stir zhes 'di ni rmongs pa'i gtam// 'dab mo tsam yang dus min du// de nyid rang la sbyin nus med// gal te de ni byin
294b4(skyes rabs): rlob lhas// mchod pa lnga chags byed pa na// bdag nyid rang gis mchod pa ni// yo byad rdzogs pa cis mi spro// srin bu'i rjes ni yi ge bzhin// gang yang thob bya thob pa na// bya rog to la ltar brjod pas// skye bo de yis
294b5(skyes rabs): byin par sems// gang zhig thob bya de ni las rnams 'bras bu yongasu gyur tshe 'thob// sna tshogs 'bad cing gus pas bsgrubs kyang thob bya min pa 'thob ma yin// gang zhig gang gis rang nyid kyis bsags longs spyod skal
294b6(skyes rabs): ldan de la ni// 'di dag 'di yisau byas shes rmongs pa'i blo can 'bras med de dag sems// zhes pa sgra de mdza' gcugs dang // ldan pa'i gnyen gyis rab 'bad de// bskul nas gcig pu gsang ba yis// rkang 'thung gi
295a1(skyes rabs): ni drung du song // sta re bzung nas de yis ni// n+ya gro d+hA yi shing la smras// mchod pa 'am rtsu ba gcod pa la// nga ni chas nas khyod can 'ong // bu dag sbyin na khyod la bdag/ gzhan gyis
295a2(skyes rabs): ma byas mchod pa byed// rnam pa gzhan du khyod bdag gis// bcang bsregs btags la chu bor 'phang // zhes pa de yi tshig thos nas// lha yi shing la gnas pa dag/ 'phral la 'jigs pas 'khrugs gyur te//
295a3(skyes rabs): 'dar bar byed cing rab bsams pa// 'dod pa'i bu 'am nor dag ni// bdug gis su la'ang byin pa med// rang gi las kyis thob pa la// skye bo bdag gis byin par sems// gang 'di stobs kyis bu slong zhing // las kyis
295a4(skyes rabs): sbyor bas ma thob na// lha nyid gcod du 'ongs gyur pa// 'di ni sngon chad med pa 'ongs// 'bros don gnyer bas mchod bya ni// mchod pa gang 'di lugs tsam+ba te// las kyis bcings pa'i 'bras bu thog/ su yis byin zhing
295a5(skyes rabs): gling du lha// skyes bu rang gis las kyi nang// bsos pa grub pa min pa la// rtsis mkhan 'dzin pa nyid ma yin// sman po ma yin bsngags pa'ang min// bya min byed pa 'di la ni// shing ni bcad par ma rtog yod// tshul
295a6(skyes rabs): min ngag la mngon zhen pa'i// bag med rnams la bya min ci// shing ni bcad na gzhan du bdag/ gnas par mi nus bde ba med// 'grogs pas goms can dga' ba ni// thug pa rnams la'ang sdug bsngal bskyed/
295b1(skyes rabs): de dgra bsams nas brgya byin gyi// khang par myur bar de song nas// don de la brjod nas ni// yongasu skrag pas slar smras pa// rtag tu bdag ni ljon pa der// skye bo rnams kyis mchod gyur kyang // sna tshogs don
295b2(skyes rabs): skyospyo nyer gnas pas// bdag ni shin tu gzir bar gyur// 'ga' yis legs byas dag las thob// 'ga' zhigani 'og phyogs gyur// g.yo rmongs mi spyan brtul zhugs kyis// gzhan ni denyin rab chags
295b3(skyes rabs): song bA'i rje su 'gro nyid kyis// skye bo grags pa la rton rnams// gdung ba thams cad gzhon pa'i slad// rmongs pas bdag can nyid du rgyug/ skye bo blo gros mi gzhi bas// mi bzad gces par gyur kyang bdag/ bsdam
295b4(skyes rabs): pa de yi yon tan la// chags pos shing ni gtong mi nus// dri la chags pa'i bung ba 'dam skyes 'chi ba'i nyon mongs ldan par 'jugasapad rtsa'i ro myang ngang pa nyid ni 'dam gyi 'jigs pa rtsi mi byed// grang bas gzir
295b5(skyes rabs): ba'i skye bo du byas 'khrugs pa'i me ni yod mi 'dor// gang la gang zhig nyer mkhro de la de yis skyon ni nges par bzod// de slad shing bral gdung ba lngas// khyab bya dag bdag ni bsgrub par 'os// gang phyir lus
295b6(skyes rabs): can rnams kyi gnas// gtong ba lus ni gtong ba'i mtshungs// zhes pa de yis 'bad pa yis// gsol btab po lo mA dga' bas// khyim bdag gis ni bu 'thob pa'i// las kyi dbang ni yang dag bsams// skang+ga/
296a1(skyes rabs): der lha m+bin dgra bo yis// sa gsum pa yi lha yi bu// blo bzang zhes pa ltung ba yis// dus la bab pa mthong gyur te// mi sun la btud grags pa nyams pa bzhin du phreng ba dri ma can gyur
296a2(skyes rabs): cing // dman gyur slong ba bzhin du mdzes pa mun pa dag dang yongs 'dris byung bar gyur// bsod nams yongasu zad las gnod pas bzhin du rdul gyis kyang ni gnas ngag byas// zhe sdang skyon bcas blo bzhin
296a3(skyes rabs): de ni lhung ba gsal byed dga' bA min par gyur// legs par rab sad yon tan can// sa la dpal ldan grags pa yis// blo bzang bu nyid du sing zhes// de la lha yis bdagra pos smras// des smras ston pa shAkya
296a4(skyes rabs): thug/ bla med rgya tsho chos kyi sgra ni// 'khor lo rab tu bskor mdzad pa'i// mdun du dus der gal te badrag/ rab tu byung ba 'dzin pa la// khyod kyis yang dag rtogs byed na// sa la legs par rab sad kyi// bu nyid du ni
296a5(skyes rabs): bdag gis 'gro// lha yi bu yis 'di brjod las// brgya byin de bzhin zhes smras tshe// rjes glanang de ni de nas 'pho sa// de yi chung ma'i dku ru zhugs// lha ni rang gi gnas song ste// legs par rab sang la rab smras// rab tu
296a6(skyes rabs): byung la mngon dga'i bu// dge ba khyod la 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes pa thos nas khyim bdag ni// rab tu mgu nas khyim song ste// bu ni rab tu 'byung ba dag/ bdag gis bzlog par bya zhes bsams// de nas dus kyis de
296b1(skyes rabs): yi ni// chung ma rol pa ma zhes la// yan lag thams cad mtshan nyid ldan// byis pa gser 'od can de btsas// de skyes nyid nA rin chenA ni// kun gyis rang bzhin gdungs 'khrungs te// legs byas dpral ni
296b2(skyes rabs): bla med dang // ngo mtshar gzugs dang ldan pa bzhin// mchog tu pha yi grags 'phel bas// rigs pa sgyu rtsal 'byor pa rnams// tshogs pa'i khang pa lta bu de// grags sbyin zhes ni bya bar gyur// lha yi tshig ni dran
296b3(skyes rabs): gyur nas// de ni rab tu byung dogs te// grong dang khang pa grong khyer gyis// sgo rnams phra yis srung ba byas// de nas brgya byin mngon phyogs te// ston gyi 'gro ba dran par byas// zhi bas dran pa rab byung la// mngon par
296b4(skyes rabs): phyogs shing gus par gyur// nam zhig rang gis skyed tshal du// dal gyis shing rta zhon 'gro des// bcom ldan rgyal ba ji zhig ltar// byon pa dag ni mthong bar gyur// snying la bde bAs yang dag reg/ rab zhi
296b5(skyes rabs): bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa// de mthong nyid la 'phral la ni// shing rta dag las de yis babs// de la bskor ba gsum byas te// de yi zhabs pad zung dag la// dang bas brlan pa de yi ni// spyan gyis gzigs pa
296b6(skyes rabs): nges phyag 'tshal// de nas rab dang bcom ldan la// rab btud de yi rjes gnang gis// de nyid rnam par sems zhing de// rang gi skyed mos tshal du song // de nas bcom ldan 'dzum ldan pas// dge slong rta thul la
297a1(skyes rabs): gsungs pa// bdag gi drung du gzhon nu 'di// mtshan mo rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs bde gshegs rang gnas su// dge slong rnams dang lhan cig gshegs// brgya byin gyis
297a2(skyes rabs): sbrul bud med lus// gzhon nu yis ni mthong gyur te// rnags shing rdul la mi gtsang ba// srin bu'i tshogs kyis 'khrugs shing gnas// skyed mos tshal gyi ro mthong nas// chags bral ldan pa nges bsams pa// dar ba
297a3(skyes rabs): ga zugs ni mdzes pa dang // sdug pa rnam par 'gyur ba nyid// pags pa sha tshogs mi rnams kyi// rang bzhin de ni 'di nyid do// mig dag groyo zhing nu mA zung ni rab rgyas ri bong can gyi 'od kyi mdzod// lus de lang tsho
297a4(skyes rabs): gsar pa dar bab mdzes sdug 'phro bar bgrab 'di dag ni// rul pa'i brlan gyis nges bran 'khrugs shing dman pa'i srin bu rnams kyis dkrigs// ngan cing rab mang bshang bas bsgos shing mtha' dag rgya cher 'khrul
297a5(skyes rabs): 'khor med nyid gyur// yan lag thams cad 'grogs par spro ba 'di la chags shing rmongs pas mig phrogs shing // nu ma'i dkyil 'khor la chags blo gros nyams pas mchog tu bde ba thob gyur pa// gang las wa
297a6(skyes rabs): skyes 'di ni chags bral bza' ba dag las phyir phyogs bzhin 'khyogs cing // mi gtsang dri nga dag gis yang byung blo gros smras phyin ring du 'gro bar 'gyur// zhes bsams chags bral bag chags ni// sbas pa yang dag
297b1(skyes rabs): rgyas gyur te// de ni skyeng tshal las phyir phyogs// rang gi khang par dral gyis song // skabs der nyin byed 'jig rten gyis// spyong tshul ro bral mthong bas bzhin// skyo zhing rab zhir mngon phyogs te// nyin par ngag ni nyams
297b2(skyes rabs): par 'gyur// ngal dub ma lus yongs gtong bar// 'os pa rab zhir 'gro 'dod cing // thun mtshams mkha' yi gos da mor bsten// nyin mo rab tu byung bzhin gyur// nyi ma srid pa'i mig dag ni/ 'jig rten pha rol gnas
297b3(skyes rabs): song tshe// 'jig rten yongs gtang nyin mo yang // de yi rjes 'brang nyid du gyur// de nas 'gro bsten gsar pa yis// rab rib mya ngan sbyor ba dag/ sgron mo'i dkyil 'khor snang ba yis// brtse nas bzhin du rab tu bzlog/
297b4(skyes rabs): skabs der ston pa rang nyid ni// grags sbyin dag la brtse ba yis// grong khyer klung 'gram pha rol tu// de thob slad du yang dag gshegs// grags sbyin gyis kyang nyin parI gyis// nyon mongs mtshungs pa yang yang du// 'khri
297b5(skyes rabs): ba snying po med pa nyid// sems shing nyal ba'i khang par zhugs// gling bu rgyud mdo rje rnga sogs// rtse dgas ngal zhing gnyid log pa// mig zum rgyags pas 'khrugs pa yaM/ bud med rnams der de yis mthong // kha ni rgyang
297b6(skyes rabs): mangs la bkod cing // lag pa'i 'khri shing rdza rnga gtad// bde ba skad cig pa nyid kyi// sdug bsngal bsam gtan la zhugs bzhin// gos ras shi ba bzhin du no// g.yo med de dag mthong gyur nas// lhag par chags
298a1(skyes rabs): bral yang dag skyes// yun ring de yis yang dag bsams// kye ma yul ni 'di dag rnams// mjug tu mchog tu ro dang bral// bud med ces 'di lta la// rmongs pa rnams ni mchog tu gus// mchog
298a2(skyes rabs): min bde ba'i sprin rgyas la// glog gI rtse dga' 'di dag rnams// gnyid log shi ba dag la yang // rnam 'phrul gang na 'dzum gang na// 'ga' zhig 'og tu kha bltas nyal shIng de yi rgyab ni gzhan du bzlog ste lhung // gzhan yang
298a3(skyes rabs): gan rkyal yan lag kun brkyang kha yi bu ga rnam par bye bar gyur// gzhan dag skra ni grol zhing dral bas phrag pa la chags bya rog byabs pa bzhin// bdag gi khyim ni mig zum bud meng tshogs rnams rnam 'dzin dur khrod lta bur
298a4(skyes rabs): spyod// de nyid rab byung don gnyer bdag/ grong khyer nang nas phyir 'thon te// rmongs pa bzlog slad bcom ldan 'das// nges par lha ru 'gro bar bya// zhes bsams r-i thang che ba yis// rin chen mthil lham bzung nas de// grong srung
298a5(skyes rabs): rnams kyis ma shes par// brgyu byin gyis ni mthu yis song // grong khyer sgo las mngon par ni// byung ste chu klung mchog thob nas// 'khor ba'i mya ngan 'phros pa yi// gdung ba gtong bar brtson pa bzhin// bcom ldan
298a6(skyes rabs): 'byung po dgongs pa yis// de ni 'ong ba gzigs gyur nas// dgyes pas de ni bskul ba la// bzhed dang ldan pa bzhin du gyur// de yis rjes mthun gser gyi mdog/ phyag ni g.yas pa brkyang mdzad nas// sku yi gzi brjid snang /

298b2(skyes rabs): 'das kyis gsung thos nas// bdud rtsi yis ni gang ba bzhin// yongs gdung btang nas grags sbyin ni// 'phral la bsil ba nyid du gyur// rin+da che ni rin chen mthil lham ni// klung pi ngog su di yis dor// rgalnga
298b3(skyes rabs): zhing de yi pha rol gyis// 'gram du thar pa nyid thob gyur// bcom ldan drung du ngas phyin te// gdung ba tson gyis tsAn shing // dang bas brlan la zur phud ni// zhabs la btugs pas rab tu btud// de nas de la ston pa yis//

298b5(skyes rabs): par spyad slad rab tu bkod// 'dod pa rdzogs pa nyid du gyur// de nas bu ni song ba dag/ legs par rab sad sad pas thos de bral me yis gdungs pa yis// de ni tshol du phyi rol song // mdza' dang rmongs pa chen
298b6(skyes rabs): po yi sa// gzir zhing mya ngan ldan pa des// chu bo'i ngogs kyi 'gram du phyin// rin chen mthil lham dag kyang mthong // de yis chu bo yang dag brgal// bcom ldan 'das ni mthong gyur te// de yi mthu yi rab bsgribs
299a1(skyes rabs): pas// mdun gnas pa'i bu ma mthong // de nA slar yAng bcom ldan gyis// rab tu btud byas de yi yang // rmongs pas chos gtam rigs pa yi// 'od kyi mdun pa bzhin du phrogs//

299a3(skyes rabs): yi chung mar bcas pa la// dam pa'i brlab gnas rab 'bar mdzad// de nas glags sbyin grogs po ni// dpal dang ldan pa rnams kyis mchog/ dri med gang po lag bzung dang // ba lang bdag ces bya ba bzhis//
299a4(skyes rabs): bcom ldan mdun na grags chen ni// tshangs spyod brtul zhugs lnga chags pa'i// grags pa phyogs su rab gsal ba// thos nas gnas der 'ongs par gyur// dge ba smin pas thob gyur pa// de dag rnams la
299a5(skyes rabs): bcom ldan 'das// dag pa'i bka' yis slar yang ni// 'dul ba'i chos la bstan pa bsgrubs// bzhi po de dang grags sbyin dang // dge slong gzhan la lnga dge dang // bcu yi bcom ldan drung du ni// dgra bcom gnas
299a6(skyes rabs): dag thob par 'gyur// grags sbyin spyod tshul thos gyur nas// de yi grogs po skal ldan gzhan// lnga bcu ston pa'i drung du ni// phyin nas de mtshungs nyid dag thob// tshul des gus pa bskyed gyur pa// gzhan ni brgya
299b1(skyes rabs): phrag lnga yis kyang // de dang mtshungs par 'dul ba'i chos// bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du thob// de nas nam zhig dge mtshan las// dge slong kun gyis bcom ldan la// grags sbyin gyi ni bsod nams dris//
299b2(skyes rabs): de la thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs// sngon tshe yang dag rdzogs pa yis// sangs rgyas bcom ldan gtsug tor can// grong khyer las ni bsod nams thob// pha rol ngogs 'gram skad cig bzhugs// sa yi bdag po
299b3(skyes rabs): tshangs pas byin// lom de nas ni 'gro ba yis// rjes 'brang 'od bzang zhes pa yis// de ni zhugs pa mthong bar gyur// nyi ma'i 'od zer drag po yis// gdung ba rdul dang bcas gyur pa// de mthong nas ni de la des// gdugs dag
299b4(skyes rabs): bzung nas grib bsil byas// de yi drung du tshangs spyod la// de yi bstan pa bzung nas ni// sems ni dri ma med nyid lngas// dge ba mchog ldan thob par gyur// de nas rab dang blo ldan pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis de la gsung /
299b5(skyes rabs): 'byung 'gyur shAkya thub pa yi// drung du khyod ni byang chub 'gyur// de yi nges pa dri gsungs te// blo bzang zhes pa lha yi bu// mtho ris su nI yun ring gyur// bsod nams ldan pa de nyid dang // grags sbyin dge legs gser
299b6(skyes rabs): 'di ste// grags pa yis ni grogs rnams kyang // dge ba'i zam stegs nyid dag thob// sa bdag kr-i ki zhes bya ba// rgya chen blo yi ston pa ni// 'od srung skye dag mya ngan 'das la// rin chen mchod rten sngon tshe byas// sa
300a1(skyes rabs): yi bdag po de yi bu// gsum pa grags ldan dga' ba yis// nor bu'i mchod rten de la ni// gus pas rin chen gdugs dag bkod// de dang bsod nams snga ma yis// skye ba 'di la grags sbyin ni// grags chen
300a2(skyes rabs): rin chen 'barA ba yis// gdugs kyis brgyan pa dag tu skyes// de ltar skye ba gzhan la legs byas rgyas pas rtsa ba bcings// zla ba ltar dkar glags pa'i 'od zer rgyas pa'i me tog can// dge ba de yi chos kyi ljon pa rab rgyas
300a3(skyes rabs): 'bras smin 'di// de skad thos nas dge slong tshogs des ya mtshan thob par gyur// ces pa dag ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ grags sbyin gyi rtogs pa
300a4(skyes rabs): brjod pa'i yal 'dab de drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / brgya byin rlung dang chu sogs lha rnams dang // thub mchog rnams kyang gang slang rnam 'gyur du// 'gyur ba'i dran bde rtsa ltar spyod pa'i gnas// ya mtshan can
300a5(skyes rabs): de gang la rung ba min// ma ga d+ha grong thung chen du// sA la chen po'i rigs 'khrungs pa// n+ya gro rnga yi rtog ces pa// gnyis skyes grags pa'i dpal ldan byung // de yi chung ma gzugs bzang ma// zhes pa khang pa'i skyed 'tshal na// rol
300a6(skyes rabs): pa'i ljon shing pi la'i// 'og tu bu ni nyid 'od bskrun// gser gyi 'od zer 'bar ba yi// bu de skyes pa tsam nyid la// grags po ltar dkar lha yi gos// shing de las ni rab tu byung // pa spri la skyes zhes bya ba// byis pa pad+ma'i mig can de// rig
300b1(skyes rabs): dang sgyu rtsal blo sbyangs shing // dpal dang lhan cig rnam par rgyas// de ni pha yi gsol btab kyang // rtag tu khyim thab las phyir phyogs// yul la sdang ldan dben pa ni// dri med bsam pa ldan par gyur// pha ni rigs
300b2(skyes rabs): rgyud 'chad pa yis// 'jigs nas yang yang gsol btab dris// de la smras pa khyim thab kyi// 'ching ba la ni bdag mi sred// yaub cig 'dod pa bdag mi 'dod// bdag gi blo gros tshangs spyod la'o// rang 'dod zhi ba
300b3(skyes rabs): nas ni// srid pa'i 'ching ba su zhig 'dod// dang por sbyin sreg du bas mamam rtag tu 'bab pa rab tu 'jug/ mtshungs par lag pa gtad pas gdung ba'i lam la bden par 'dud pa byad// phreng ba'i thag pas 'khor
300b4(skyes rabs): ba'i bka' yi dam tshig dgu la g.yo ba 'ching // khyim thab yod ni rmongs pa gnas pas nyar bcom rnams kyi dga' ba'i rgyu// na chung gzhon nu'i 'khri shing gar gyi rlung gis bskyod pa'i rtse dgA'i rjes 'brang ba'i// rgyud mangs gling
300b5(skyes rabs): bu'i sgra ni khyim thab dus su spro ldan gang gis ma mnyan pa// de dag la rten gyi hud bu zhes chung mas cho de smra zhing dman gyur pa// mchi ma lci bar thigs thigs 'bab pas mngon par sbyar ba'i sgra drag thos mi 'gyur// zhes pa
300b6(skyes rabs): 'bad pa drag po yis// pha dang me la des smras nas// mdzes pas bran pa dge mtshan gyi// myu gur yang dag skyes pa bzhin// bzo bo mkhas pas byas pa yis// gser gyi bu mo bzung nas ni// rigs 'chad bsam pas
301a1(skyes rabs): gzir dwe la// bstan pas slar yang rab smras pa// kha dog mdzes sdug 'di mtshungs pa'i// bu mo gal te rnyed gyur na// yab cig khyod kyi tshig gis ni// bdag gi bud meng gzung
301a2(skyes rabs): byar bgyi// zhes pa bu yis tshig thos nas// de mtshungs bu mo mtho ris su// rnyed dkar shes nas bram ze ni// re thag chad cing bzhin sdud gyur// tsa ts+tshe ka ra zhes pa'i grogs// bram zes gtam du
301a3(skyes rabs): thos pa yiswa// kun dga' dang bral g.yo med pa// mya ngan gyis nyen de la smras// rab 'bad tsam gyi bzod don la// khyod ni mya ngan byar mi 'os pa bu mo gser 'ong ldan pa ni// wA ru nga nyid 'gro bar bya// zhes
301a4(skyes rabs): te mdza' ba'i grogs po ni// dang por skyes pa bstan byas nas// gser gyi gzugs brnyan bzung nas ni// blo ldan phyogs rnams rtag tu song // phreng ba gos dang bcas pas brgyun// lha yi mtshan mo'i zol gyis
301a5(skyes rabs): ni// bzung nas phyogasu 'khyam byed cing // bu mo mchod par bya zhes smra// grong khyer grong dang lam rnam su// de mchod du 'ongs bu mo rnams// rtag tu rnam par lta ba dres// de dang mtshungs pa rnyed ma gyur// de nas bram
301a6(skyes rabs): ze ser skya yis// bu mo gser gyi bu mo bas// 'od lhag bzang mo zhes pa ni// yangs pa can du nam zhig mthong // mdzes ma khyim thab las phyir phyogs// char bral dben pa dang ldan zhing // gsar rin ma de ser skya la//
301b1(skyes rabs): rjes 'gro bshad pa de yis bslangs// bu mo'i phA yis des smras pa// 'od srungs rigasta skyes 'jig rten na// n+ya gro d+ha yi rtog pa yi// rigs mchog rigs ni rnam par grags// 'on kyang mdzes ma 'bad pa/
301b2(skyes rabs): yis// nor ni rtags nas sbyin par bya// dbul ba'i shugs ring gis ldan ma nges// pha yi yi do ni gdung bar byed// chung ma 'thab mo la chags dang // bu mo nor med la byin dang // bu ni gdung bas nyer bcom
301b3(skyes rabs): rnams// sems la khab bo sregs lto bu yin// chu gter gyi ni skyes bu mchog la dpal mo byin byas te// ci ste de ni stobs ldan la slong mi'u thung shes nas// da lta 'ang mya ngan la chags rta gdong me yi rang bzhin
301b4(skyes rabs): gyi// gdung bu drag po shugs ring dang bcas nges par gtong mi byed// de slad nor ni btsal byos// de 'byor mngon mthong shes gyur nas// dam pa'i rigs la bu mo sbyin// dam pa'i yon tan nor gyi dbang // zhes pa bu
301b5(skyes rabs): mo'i pha dang de'i// bu rnams kyis kyang brjod thos nas// de bzhin zhes smras gnyis skyes ni// gzhon nu'i pha yi gan du srong // gser gyi mdzes ma las lhag pa'i// bu mo thob ces de yi tshig/ n+ya gro d+ha yi
301b6(skyes rabs): rtogs pa yi// thos nas kun dga' rgyas par gyur// bu mo tshangs spyod don gnyer ma// thos nas bi spa la skyes ni// slong mo pa yi chas kyis de'i// khyim du rang nyid dal gyi song // mgron dang bkur sti thob
302a1(skyes rabs): gyur pa// mkhas pa des der de la dris// tshungs spyod don du gnyeru shes nas// re bA rdzogs pas rab smras pa// dge ba tshangs spyod don gnyer ba'i// pi s+tha la skyes bram ze bdag/
302a2(skyes rabs): gang gi ched du bram ze dwesA// khyod ni 'bad pas bslangs pa'o// khyim thab las ni phyir phyogs bdag/ pha yis shin tu don du ni gnyer// bzang mo khyod kyang 'di lta bu// mtshungs par dgo' bar yang dag
302a3(skyes rabs): 'grogs// zhes pa de yi tshig thos nas// rab dga' de yi de la smras// zhi zhing dul bas khyim thab 'di// yu cag la ni 'gal ba med// de nas yang dag 'ongs pa thob// rab dga' skyo ba rgyas pa des// rang gi khyim
302a4(skyes rabs): du song nas ni// pha yi tshig dag kha yis blangs// mtha' yas nor ni rgyas pa de// rnam par brtag na ser skya kyang // rin chen mchog gi rgyan pa yis// bu mo de la rab tu sbyin// 'byor pa rin thang tsha ba yis// de dag khyim
302a5(skyes rabs): thab spro bar zhugs// tshangs par spyod pa ma nyams shing // rnam 'gyur me par 'grogs par 'gyur// dul po'i ngang tshul de dag gis// gzugs dang ljang tsho rgyas pa'i tshe// yid las byung ba'i bka' bcag pas// 'byor pa
302a6(skyes rabs): dman pa nyid du gyur// de gnyis rog pa bsrung ba'i slad// res kyi gcig ni gnyid log cing // gcig ni langs nas mel che byed// ces pa nyal ba'i rnam bzhag byas// de nas nam zhig mal stan mthar// de yi mig ni
302b1(skyes rabs): gnyid kyis rgyas// thebs tshe bis+tha la skyes kyis// sbrul ni nag po mthong bar 'gyur// de nas de lag 'khri shing ni// logasu 'chang ba brtse ldan des// rnga yab mtha' dang gos dgra gis// bsdus nas 'jigs
302b2(skyes rabs): pa de las gsungs// 'phral la lag pa bskyed pa yo// skrag pa'i ri dwags mig can ma// nu ma 'dar zhing ngo shwal ni// g.yo ldan ma nges khyo la smras// rje yi sras po ji ltar na// nges par dam tshig brjed gyur cing //
302b3(skyes rabs): bden par smra ba khyod kyi thugs// gang 'dir rnam par bslad pa skyes// khyod kyi rnam 'gyur ngo tsho'i rgyan// shin tu che ldan 'di ni ci// sa 'dzin dag kyang bstan pa'i lugs// gtong gi dam pa yong ma yin// zhes pa de
302b4(skyes rabs): yi tshig thos naso// 'dzum ldan de yi de la smras// rma lAm na yod bdog gi yid// bzang mo nges par bslad par med// 'on kyang 'dir ni sbrul nag 'di// 'jig su rung ba yongasu rgyu// khyod kyi lag pa la bstan las//
302b5(skyes rabs): 'chang ba 'jigs nas bdag gis bsrungs// khyo yi tshig ni thos gyur nas// dogs gtang dga' ba thob gyur nas// dogs btang dga' ba des smras pa// bden pa'i ngang tshul khyod kyi sa blo sa// 'dod pas dri mar byas pa
302b6(skyes rabs): mad// gdug pa'i sbrul ni lags pa des// chags pa'i lto 'phyes mchog tu 'jigs// sbrul gyi lus gcig 'joms pa ste// 'dod pas lus ni brgya mthar byed// de slang rlom 'gyur 'di dag srungs// zhes smos
303a1(skyes rabs): de nI chags dang bral// de yi shin tu dul ba yang // pis+tha la skyes dag gis bsngags// dus kyi n+ya gro d+ha yi rtog/ chung ma rA bcas pa mtho ris song // rab mang khyim gyi tshogs dag gis
303a2(skyes rabs): bsam pa'i khur ni de yis blangs// nam zhig til mar btung ba'i slad// khyu mchog rnams kyi til 'chir la// bzang mos yongs su bstan pa yis// 'khor rnams drag ni yongasu bskor// til ni 'chir ba de
303a3(skyes rabs): dwadrag+na gi sA// til mar bum pa srog chags tshogs// ltung ba nyams pa mthong gyur nas// snying rje bcas pas phan tshun smras// srogs chags mang po yongs brlag pas// kye ma bdag kyang sdig pa can// yang na glang
303a4(skyes rabs): gi tshig gis byas// sdig pa 'di kun bzang mo la'o// bzang mo khyim na 'khod pa yis// de thos chags bral nyid du gyur// de dus nyid na bdag po ni// nang zhugs dben par de la smras// zhing las nyon mongs kyis gzir
303a5(skyes rabs): bas// khyu mchog srog chags 'tshe ba ston// bzang mo bdag gi khyim gyi khur// rtag tu yongs 'dzin yod mi bzod// bde ba'i phun tshogs 'di dag rnams// mjug tu ro bral snying po meng // myangs na 'dam bu'i 'dab ma bzhin// gdung
303a6(skyes rabs): ba dag ni skyed par byed// khyim pa rnams ni sdig pa'i 'dam// nyon mongs lhubs dra ba can// khyim nyid du ni nyams 'gyur te// rlubs su glang ni rgan po bzhin// de slang khyim gyi brtson pa 'di// yu cag gis ni btang bar 'os// zhes
303b1(skyes rabs): smras chung mas khas blangs pas// zhi ba la ni nges par byas// khyim dang yo byad bcas pa yi// nor rnams slong la des byin nas// re ba'i zhags pa 'ching ba kun// rnam par grol te nges par byung // de nas 'od srungs
303b2(skyes rabs): rigs nyid phyir// 'od srungs chen po nyid gyur te// de dus yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od srungs drung du de song gyur// mchod rten bu mang zhes pa yi// rtsa bar gnas pa de can phyin// 'dul ba'i chos ni nges byin pas// dag
303b3(skyes rabs): pa'i byang chub thob par gyur// bzung mo yis kyang chags bral gyi// bstan pa'i lam gyi 'dul ba thob// sngon gyi bsod nams yongs smin pas// dge ba dri ma med pa brten// 'od srungs chen po lha rnams kyi// phyogs 'os nyid thob/
303b4(skyes rabs): mthong nas ni// bsod nams dge slong rnams kyis dris// de bzhin gshegs pas der bka' stsal// zas dang 'bru rnams ma lus rab tu nyung ba'i dus// bsod snyoms rnam par log cing shin tu mi bzang tshe// nor chung
303b5(skyes rabs): skyes bu yis+t+ra ni ka shi'i grong khyer du// twe gar sh+tsi ki rang gri zas kyis legs par mchod// grong khyer bu dag po kr-i ki sr-i byas pa'i mchod rten no// rin chen gyis spras mchog tu mdzes pa de yis bu// bsod nams
303b6(skyes rabs): nga tshul gyis kyang bde ba chen po'i slad// nor bu gser gyi rnam par bkra ba'i gdugs dag bkod// skye ba gnyis su nye bar bsags pa'i bsod nams cher rgyas pa nye ba'i gnas kyis 'od srungs chen po
304a1(skyes rabs): nyid ni 'di yis thob// gser gyi ta la bzhin du mtho ba'i mthu ni thob gyur nas// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'bras bu dgra bcom gnas ni rnam par 'dzin// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas
304a2(skyes rabs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// 'od srungs chen po'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o// / yal 'dab mngon par
304a3(skyes rabs): gsor pa lte bur gnyen gyur kyang // sra zhing brtan pa dag ni rdo rje ltar gyur pa// chen po rnams kyi yid kyi nor bu dri ma dag/ med pu la yang tshogs pa dag ni 'pho ba min// kun la rje su brtse ldan yab kyi shAkya
304a4(skyes rabs): yi/ gnas rnams blta ba nyid la mchog tu gsol btab pa// kun dga' bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis zla ba ston pa ni// gang dag tshe na rang gi rgyal sar zhugs gyur pa// de de'i tshe na ba gam du sing rI dwagus mig/
304a5(skyes rabs): rna ba'i rgyan gyi mig nI rab tu mdzes byas nas// grags 'dzin mas ni mdzes pa dag gis phyogs rnamasu// ya mtshan rab tu 'dri ba'i bdag po de mthong nas// de dang 'grogs dang 'khyud pa dag gi ri bral ba'i//
304a6(skyes rabs): dug gi brgyal ba bzhin du ma lus phyogs 'khor zhing // grogs po bzlog par byed pa'i brtan pa ni// dor nas kha bzang dag las lus ni rab tu 'phangs// dag pa yal 'dab ltar mnyen lus dang ldan pa des//
304b1(skyes rabs): gang gang tshe na lus ni rab tu 'phangs gyur pa// de de che na yid srubs kyis ni rmongs ma de// bArdzebs brlan pa'i spyan ldan bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// de nas nam zhig nags kyis mthar ni bcom
304b2(skyes rabs): ldan la// de yi dge mtshan+da dag las dge slong tshogs kyis dris// tshegs kyi 'od zer zla ba'i 'od rnams dag gi sa ni// mchu yi dmar ba 'bebs par mdzad pa bzhin du gsungs// bdag dang bral bas
304b3(skyes rabs): rtag tu gzir bur gyur pa yi// grags 'dzin ma ni gang zhig gzu lums 'di dag byed// brtan pa 'phrog cing rmongs pa rnam par ster ba 'di// chags pa'i rnam 'phrul ldan pa rnams kyis rang bzhin
304b4(skyes rabs): nyid// sngon gyi skye ba gzhan lA dre dang bral ba yi// 'dod pas rnam par rmongs par byas ti bdag gis kyang // rgyan du yongasu gdung ba dag gis rgyur gyur pa// rab mang gdung ba'o nyon mongs dag ni nyam su myong // grong
304b5(skyes rabs): mchog ta staM no yi grong // 'chi mang grong khyer thul bar sngon// yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i gter// rgyal po nor zhes bya ba byung // lag pa yi ni sa la 'khyud// dbyangs can dag ni mabyin par byas// gang gi
304b6(skyes rabs): dpal ni rab tu bstar// grags pa kho na rab tu bskrad// de yi btsun mo mdzes mra// bu ni nor bzang zhes bya ba// gtor bai rgya dang ni grags pa dang // lhan cig skyesau pa byung bar gyur// rig gnas kun gyi ku
305a1(skyes rabs): mung can// rtag tu rnam rgyas byed la chags// dri med mdzes pa sgyu rtsal can// gang zhig zla ba lta bur mdzes// sa bdag de dang sa gzhi ni// bar med sa bdag byung gyur pa// khengs
305a2(skyes rabs): ldan dbang chen ste zhes pa// rgya chen rnam par gnon por grags// dus min dus su brtag bya zhing // kun gyi bdog kun 'phrog byed pa// bzod dka'i dpya dang ldan pa des// gzir ba'i skye dgus mya ngan byas// chos
305a3(skyes rabs): min la ni zhugs pa de'i// grong ni legs byas spro ba dag/ log cing gdung ba drag po yis// gdung bar sbyin gyi char ma phab// sa skyong rjesu mi mthun pa// dIr ni mu ge'i nyer 'tshe byung // sdug bsngal can rnams khyo na
305a4(skyes rabs): la// sdug bsngal rgyas par gyur pa yin// de nas nyon mongs kyis khyud gzir// bdag ngan gyis gdungs yid byung zhing // grong na gnas pa thams cad ni// gcig tu tshogs nas rnam par bsam// rgyal blun mtshan mor
305a5(skyes rabs): byed pa 'di// gsar po'i dpya zer 'bebs pa yis// mchog tu skye bo'i tshogs pa 'di// pad+mo'i spyan bzhin zlum par gyur// rtag tu dran par zhen pa 'dis// bden med blon po'i gros dag gis// bdag cag btsA ra nas g.yon
305a6(skyes rabs): can dang // bran dang glu mkhan rnam dag gso// de la'ang sa bdag sdig pa yi// dmod pas char med sdug bsngal ba// skye bo yang dag brlag pa'i dbang // mu ge skyed par byed pa skyes// sa skyong shin tu rno zhing
305b1(skyes rabs): 'khor gyi skye bo rtsub cing mu chor rmongs// blon po rnams kyang gdug cing grags pa g.yo ldan gya gyu dag la mkhas// zhabs drung gnas dang yig mkhan mi bzang khwa skyon rab tu khros gyur pa// dman pa 'joms byed
305b2(skyes rabs): ma rungs tshogs pa 'di dag rnams ni ji ltar bzod// dpal ldan sa yi bdag po ni// nor gyi yul 'khor rgyas pa thos// bdag cag de grong song ba na// mnyes gshin de yi skyong bar 'gyur// sa bdag gang gi yul 'khor
305b3(skyes rabs): la// bu bzhin rtag tu ltu byed pa// de yi yul du phra yi ni// khyim du bzhin du 'tsho bar bya// de ltar nges bsgrubs de dag rnams// hasti na yi grong khyer song // lus kyang gnod bcos gtang bye na// yul dang gnas ni smos ci dgos
305b4(skyes rabs): mi bdag dbang chen sde yisau kyang // rang grong skye bo med shes nas// 'gyod pa drag po khro ldan pas// blon po chen po la smras pa// rgyal po nor gyi grong khyer du// bdag gi glong nus skye bo rnams// rab tu song zhes nyan rna ni// gsang
305b5(skyes rabs): gnas rgyu ba dag gis smras// gal te bdag gi dgra grong du// de dag mu ges nyen 'gro na// gnam gyi nyer 'tshe thams cad du// re myos kyis ni 'byung ba nyid// yang na rgyal po'i skyon gyis ni// bde ba 'dod pas de dag song // rgyal
305b6(skyes rabs): po su yi grong khyer gyi// skye bo las chad dpya las grol// phal cher yongasu 'dris la sdang // rtag tu gsar pa gsar pa tshol// ring na gnas pa thams cad ni// kun gyi yid du 'ongs pa yan// gang gis gzhan gyi
306a1(skyes rabs): skye dgu ni// rmongs pa chung ma bzhin du 'phrog/ s+ya byAd+mag d+he la yon tan ni// bdag las lhag pa ci zhig yod// re zhig de yi dregs pa ni// rab zhil thabs dgu bsam par mdzod// gang yang phun
306a2(skyes rabs): sum tshogs pa'i rgyu// de dag gzhom pa sgrub par mdzod// ces pa rgyal po'i tshig thos nas// blon po chen pos rabI smras pa// lhan cig gang gis rgyal po 'di// nor dang skye bo dar mya nyon// sa bAdag de yi dAr ba ni// gzugs
306a3(skyes rabs): can bsod nams kyis btags bzhin// yul na klu yi rgyal po ni// chu mung tsi tra zhes pa yod// de yi mthu dus mini du// 'bru ni phun sum tshogs por gyur// sa bdag phun sum tshogs kun gyi// rtsa ba zhing ni phun tshogs
306a4(skyes rabs): yin// de slad rig pa'i stobs dag gis// klu de gal te 'phrog nuswA na// de tshe de yi skye dgu rnams// rang nying khyod la brten par 'gyur// de skad sngags stobs 'bar ba yi// sgrub pa po 'ga' btsas nas nI// klu yi rgyal po
306a5(skyes rabs): 'phrog pa la// brtson pa dag ni myur bar mdzod// ces pa blon po'i tshig thos nas// sa bdag gis ni bden zhes smras// rang nyid yon tan nor nyams pa'i// mi srun pha rol skyo nA la sbyor// de nas gser ni mang po dag/ rngan
306a6(skyes rabs): pa rab tu ster ba'i sgra// bsgrags nas gros pa rnams kyis ni// klu dag 'ching ba'i sngags pa thob// gser sbyin dam bcas de dag gi gsol btab rig 'dzin ces bya ba// de ni tsai tra blong ba'i slad// hasti na yi grong khyer song /
306b1(skyes rabs): der ni nags tshal dag gis mtha'// snum ljang rkang 'thung ldan pa na// gdengs can bdag po'i khang pa ni// na mkha'i 'od can de yis mthong // ba ku la yi phreng g.yo zhing // tI la ka yi dpal rgyas pa// nags
306b2(skyes rabs): kyi dpal mo'i rgyan drag gi/ nor bu'i me long nye ba bzhin// dri med chu de mthong gyur nas// chags pas nyams pa'i yid can gyi// sngags kyi bsam gtan chas zhugs te// bsgrub slang phyogs ni bcing ba byas// brtul
306b3(skyes rabs): zhugs rab drag gzi ldan dIs// phyogs ni bcing ba bsgrubs pa na// klu bdag gdengs ka'i nor bu ni// gdung zhing mgo bo gzir bar gyur// de nas ma mthong yang dag langs// sngags ni sgrub pa de mthong nas// 'dar zhing
306b4(skyes rabs): gdengs can bdug po nI// bcing skrag pa rA ba ba sam+bis pa// khro bo smai ra smin ma sIr// lta byed ser skya glog lta bu// dus min dus dang mtshungs pa yi// gdug pa 'di ni ga la sA 'ongs// da ni gdug pa'i bdag
306b5(skyes rabs): nyid ni// nags kyi phyogs ni bcing bar byas// ji srid 'dis badrag ma bcings pa// de srid rigs pa'i rim pa bzod// drang srong chen po shing shun+da can// 'jug ngogs nye ba'i mtha' 'drir gnas// bdag yongs bskyab pa
306b6(skyes rabs): dam pa ni// des kyang nus pa min par shes// gang 'di de yi bsti gnas na// rtag tu rim gro yongs bsgrub pa// rlon pa pad+ma can zhes pa// de yi bdag ni bsrung bar bzod// ces pa yid kyi nges byas nas// rngon pa go la
307a1(skyes rabs): ba der song // rang gi spyod tshul bshad nas ni// de la 'ching bA srung bar zhus// klu yi rgyal pos sgrub pa po// bsad pa'i glad du gsol btab tshe// gzhu dang ldan pas gnas der phyin// sngags pa
307a2(skyes rabs): dpa' bo mthong bar gyur// gnas skabs dar no sgrub pa po// sngags pa yis ni sbyin sreg mes// bcing bar 'dod pa klu yi ni// rgyal po rab tu dgug par byas// gdengs can bdag po sngags kyi nau// drangs tshe de ya
307a3(skyes rabs): gnas kyi chu// chu yi chu bur rab dkrigs pas// mya ngan byed par brtson pa bzhin// leg 'gro'i chung ma kun tu skrag pas 'khrugs pa'i mya ngan gyi// shugs rings shugs kyis rab bsgrubs rab 'bar dbu ba'i
307a4(skyes rabs): phreng ba ba zhin// rab tu 'dar zhing g.yo ba'i chu ni dba' rlabs lag pa yis// thal mo sbyar byas bsrung ba don gnyer bar byed pa bzhin// mkha' lding gzi brjid ldan pa des// rig pa'i stobs kyi klu bzung ste// 'khum
307a5(skyes rabs): shing gya gyu ldan pa'i lus// chu yi snod du btsal ba na// rngon pa yis ni gzhu bkang ste// dug gis byugs pa'i mda' dag gis// skrag pas mig ni nyams gyur cing // gser la chags pa de la bsnun// 'jig pas las
307a6(skyes rabs): 'gro btang gyur cing // mda' zung de la mngon phyogs te// de yis 'jigs rung ral gri yis// mgo bo dag dang bral bar byas// rmongs pa de yi rig pa ni// g.yam ma chags las gzhan dag dang // nye bar sbyor de grub
307b1(skyes rabs): myod kyang // rang nyid brlag don 'ba' zhig gyur// blun po'i rig pa 'byor pa stobs// pha rol nye bar gdung ba'i slad// sbyor ba rnams ni 'phral la nyid// srog drang lhan cig nyams par gyur// de nas rab dga' yongs
307b2(skyes rabs): rdzogs pa// byas shes gdengs can 'dren pa yis// rang gi khang par rngon pa de// mdzes gcugs blo dang ldan pas bos// nor bu'i khang pa gzhal yas khang // rin chen 'khri shing skyed tshwa la der// tsai tra yi ni mchod byed
307b3(skyes rabs): cing // de yi dus ni 'ga' zhig gnas// dri nas ya mtshan ldan pa des// nam zhig glog phreng lta bu yis// zhags pa don yod ces bya ba// klu yi mchod par byed pa mthong // de mthong de yis nus mthu dag/ klu yi bshad
307b4(skyes rabs): pa thos gyur nas// rngon pa chags pa'i yid ldan pas// de ni 'bad pas rab tu blangs// g.yul gyi sbyor ba mi pham zhing // lha rnams kyang ni 'ching byed pa// srog las lhag pa de de la// gdengs can dbang po dga'
307b5(skyes rabs): bas byin// de nas zhags pa de blangs nas// tsai tra la zhus rngon pa bzhin// klu yi khang pa las thon te// dron thob rang gi gnas su song // klu yi mthu yi sau thob pa yi// phun tshogs yun ring de spyan nas// ut+pal can zhes bya
307b6(skyes rabs): ba yi// bu la zhags pa byin nas 'das// rngon pa gzhon nu de yis kyang // pha yi spyod pa skyong byed cing // rigs kyi bu lugs kyi thub pa de yi// rim gro byed pa nyid du gyur// de nas nAm zhig thob pa ni// bzhugs pa'i mdun
308a1(skyes rabs): na gnas pa dris// shin tu phra zhing snyan pa'i glu// rna ba'i bcud len+da rgyas pa thob// thub pa ri mo bkod pa bzhin+da// mthong nas ya mtshan des dris pra// pad+mo'i khongasu byung ba ni// yang
308a2(skyes rabs): dag bsdams pa'i sgra mtshungs shing // khu byug dbyangs ltar snyan pa yi// dgra 'di dag ni gang las thos// zhes pa rngon pa'i bu yis dris// de la thub pas rab smras pa// ma 'amA ci yi bu mo rnams// snyan par
308a3(skyes rabs): brjodadA pe 'di dag lce// mi 'am tsi bdag ljon pa yi// bu mo yid 'phrog ma 'di ni// bu mo lnga brgyas yongs bskor nas// klu yi khang pa dag nu rtse// de thos dag mtshan gyis nan nas// de yi slar yang thob la smras// mi
308a4(skyes rabs): 'am ci yi bu mo dag/ skyes bu thob par nus sam ci// thub pa des smras gang gi ni// lag rtser dron yod ces bya ba'i// zhugs pa song des 'dod ldan ma// mi 'am ci mo blang bar nus// de nas de thos spro ldan pa'i// rngon pa
308a5(skyes rabs): de la phyag 'tshal nas// zhags pa bzung ste gdengs can gyi// dbang po'i khang pa dag tu song // dwer des mi 'am ci mo'i tshogs// rtse dgra' rol pas mtshan pa ni// gser gyi 'khri shing nags kyi dpal// rlung gis
308a6(skyes rabs): bskyod pa 'dzin pa mthong // de dag dbus su yid 'phrog ma// khrus byas langs pa mthong gyur te// dran pa'i mig gsum me dag ni// zhi byed chu yi lha mo bzhin// lus med rnam 'phrul rtsom pa yi// dba' rlabs tshogs ldan lang
308b1(skyes rabs): tsho ni// gzhon nu ma nyid 'bying ba yi// rten sA dag ni byed pa yin// yid 'ong lha yi gos bgos shing // ske rags dag ni legs par bcings// chu de rolnga pas dbu bA yi// phreng ba rab gsal chags pa bzhin// mdzes sdug
308b2(skyes rabs): rab tu dkrigs gyur pa// dau shal gsal ba'i rgyun dgau ni// shin tu che ba mtshan mo'i dpal// zla ba'i dkar ba phrogs pa bzhin// rna rgyan rin chen 'od zer gyi// tshogs kyi 'gron pa dag la ni// rol pa'i pa tra 'khri shing slar//
308b3(skyes rabs): chu yi dag pa 'bri ba bzhin// dpral ba'i rgyan du grogs mo yis// gla rtsi'i ri mo 'bri byed pa// bsil zer dri ma ldan pa yi// sbyangs pa zhi bar byed pa bzhin// de mthong yA mtshan 'bebs pa yi// zhags pas yid ni
308b4(skyes rabs): drungs gyur pa// rngon pas 'phral la zhags pa ni// don yod ces pa legs pa bstar// dwe nAs lag na zhags pa de// mthong nas 'phral la rab skrag cing // g.yo ba'i ri dwags mig can ma// mI 'am ci rnams mtho ris
308b5(skyes rabs): song // de yi myur bar lag pa yis// zhugs pa 'phangs pas yid 'phrog ma// skrag pa'i mig dang ldan pa zung // ri dgas mo ni rngon pas bzhin// de yi dbang med zhags pas drangs// skad cig brgyal bas mig
308b6(skyes rabs): zum zhing // sdug bsngal gnas skabs brten pa der// 'di ci zhes pa shes ma gyur// khyu nyams ri dwagra mo bzhin du// rang gi skye bo blta bsam pas// phyogs su rnam par lta byed cing // kun rmongs ma des de la smras//
309a1(skyes rabs): thong zhig thong zhig brtan par bcings// bdag la ma reg yongasu bsrangs// nges par mya ngan gyis gzir la// gdug pa rnams kyang rtse ldan yin// chags las lta yi bu ni// mchog min gnas
309a2(skyes rabs): la sbyar ba na// 'phral la sgrub pa po nyid sreg/ rab tu 'bar ba'i rig pa bzhin// blo ldan blo yos rnam dpyad nas// 'os pa dag la bdag stsal na// khyod la nges par chos dang ni// nor gyi tshogs chen 'byung bar 'gyur// zhas
309a3(skyes rabs): pas bsdams pa'i gdung ba 'di// bdag gi mi bzod bcings pa thong // gang du khyod 'gro mngon 'dod pa// der ni bdag rang nyid kyis 'gro// bcings pa btang bar gyur kyang bdag/ mkha' la 'phur nas yong mi 'gro// gang
309a4(skyes rabs): gigi dbang gis mkha' la bdag/ 'gro ba'i gtsug gi rin chen bzung // zhes des mtsho ma drang bcas pa// snying rjes brlan pa nyid gyur te// gtsug gi nor bu yang dag blangs// zhags pa bkrol nas de la smras// dge ma dbugs
309a5(skyes rabs): ni dbyung bar mdzod// mya ngan bya bar yong mi 'os// nges par 'os pa min la khyod// rang gi 'dod pas stsol mI bgyi// gang gis grags pa bdud rtsi yi dba' rlabs kyis ni phyogs kun khengs// yon tan rin chen chu gter che// dpal
309a6(skyes rabs): ldan rgyal po'i sras po yod// de ni rig pa zhal la chags// sgyu rtsal rtsed 'jos rnam par brgyan// rang gi rigs kyi khyad par can// lags spyod nor bzang zhes pa'o// bde dga' dag gi dpal bzhin du// gtong dang long spyod
309b1(skyes rabs): skul ba bzang // rnam 'phrul sa yi rgyan gyur te// smin legs khyod la yang dag 'os// gang zhig sa yi mtshan mo'i bdag/ lha dang dri za mi 'am ci// rig 'dzin rnam par rtsen rnams kyi// khengs pa dag ni thung ngur byed//
309b2(skyes rabs): ces pas de yi dbugs phyung zhing // gnyen tshogs bral ba'i yid 'phrog mas// ku ra ri bzhin shin tu ni// snying rje'i rje skad cho de bton// skabs der 'bigs byed ngos la ni// sngon gyi rtsed mo'i drage mtshan la// 'phong
309b3(skyes rabs): mkhas nor bzang song gyur po// rim gyis gnas der 'ongs par gyur// de yi shing rta'i mu khyud sgras// rma bya'i tshogs kyis gar byas nas// du gu la nyid g.yo zhing sngo// nogs kyi dpal mos skad cig thob// de ni rdul gyi chu thigs
309b4(skyes rabs): dag 'gram par chags pas rab mdzes pa// rna rgyan mtha' rab mdzes pa'i// mu tig 'bras bu 'phros pa bzhin// mdun du so yi 'od zer gyis// shing rta'i rta rmig gis bslang pa'i// rdul gyis tshogs rnams 'phrog pa bzhin//
309b5(skyes rabs): kha lho pa la des smras pa// kye ma yid kyi shing rta bzhon// shing rta rlung ltar mgyogs pa yis// rang sde ring du btang nas ni// ji snyed sa gzhi 'das par gyur// byang chub shing gi yal 'dab ni// rlung gzhon gyis bskyod g.yo ldan pa//
309b6(skyes rabs): sa 'dis rgyan ni ljang khu yi// ldang ba'i mdzes pa nyid dag 'phrog/ 'khri shing gsar ba byu ru'i mchu// me tog phun bu'i nu ma rgyas// snye ma rlung gi dkrugs 'di dag/ srid ldan bzhin du glal bar byed// ma ra ka ta ltar ldang ba'i//
310a1(skyes rabs): rtswa sngon tshogs kyi stod kor can// me tog dngul gyis spras pa yi// nags phreng 'di dwag rab tu mdzes// skrag nas bros pa'i ri dwags mo// 'di dag mgrin pa 'khyog po yis// g.yo
310a2(skyes rabs): zhing lta bas ut+pal ni// sngon po'i nags tshal spro ba bzhin// so ni mtshan mo byed pa'i myu gu ltar mdzes shing // bum pa ri khrod ma bdag mdza' mo'i nu ma dag dang mtshungs// rtsibs kyi sgras bcom rnam par
310a3(skyes rabs): g.yo ba'i rna grags so ldan gyi// phru gu'i 'di dag kun nas bdag gi shing rta dag l-i blta// sha ba ri yi rked skabs las 'phro rma bya'i 'dab phreng rol bas bskyod pa yi// brtsed 'jo'i rnam 'phrul cha yi 'ching ba
310a4(skyes rabs): rnams la chags par gyur pa 'big byed rlung // dri med chu rlung nar ma d+ma dogs 'khri shing g.yo zhing rnam par rgyas pa yi// me tog sbrang rtsi'i dga' ston rgyas pos rab bsgos 'di dag smyos pa bzhin du 'khyam//
310a5(skyes rabs): zhes pa smra ba'i myi bdag bu// nags kyi dpal la spyod pra yi// skye bo med par myi 'am ci'i// snying rje'i sgra yi gadra ba thob// thos nas dge mtshan gyis drangs te// de dang nye bAr brtse ba'i gter// yon tan dom pa'i
310a6(skyes rabs): me long de// song bas r-i dwags mig de mthong // mig chur bcas pas rngon pa la// yongasu skyob pa zhu byed cing // nags rgyu zad pa'i sdug bsngal dang // ldan pa'i nags tshal lha mo bzhin// ri dwags
310b1(skyes rabs): mtshan ma'i dpal mo ni// rab btags ri dwags rngon pa yi// drangs pa tshol du 'ongs gyur pa// nags su 'khyam zhing skyob bzhin// de mthong phul du byung ba'i gzugs// ngo mtshar bcas pa yab mtshan de//
310b2(skyes rabs): mngon par 'dod pa'i ras la ni// myur du ri mi bkod bzhin gyur// de bsams kye ma 'dri yi bzhin// legs par 'bri la mdzes pa ni// rnam par sprul byed goms byas pa'i// byed po ri mo yongasu smin// gdeng/
310b3(skyes rabs): can gnas na rnyed pa dka'// mi yi yul na gtam nyid ci// mdzes sdug rgya 'di mtho ris su'ang // gsar du mngon par 'khrungs sam snyam// gzhon nu mo nyid dar lo babs pas lus myed drang bcas sgeg ldan
310b4(skyes rabs): zhing // lus phra gnyen lcug gsarA du ltar byas yan lag kun 'grogs grogs can gang gis ni// 'bad med phra rol gnon pa shin tu rgya cher rtsom pa'i mngon sbyor dang bral bar// 'gro ba'i rgyal srid tshi la
310b5(skyes rabs): rtse dgA'i mtshon dang ldan pa'i lha ni rnam par rgyalnga// de ltar ya mtshan snying po can// mngon par 'dod ldan mig gis ni// de 'thung mtshungs la mngon phyogs te// phyog 'tshal rngon pas rab smras pa// mi 'am ci
310b6(skyes rabs): rgyal rigs kyi ni// dpag bsam ljon pa ljon pa yi// bu mo yid du 'ong ma 'di// lha cig bdag gis zhags pas drangs// khyod slad blangs pa'i gzhon nu ma// mchog 'di rab tu bzung bar mdzo da// yon tan rgya che
311a1(skyes rabs): khyod nyid ni// sa gzhi 'di yi ba drag tu 'os// 'di yi gtsug gri nor bu 'di// rang 'dod 'gro ster bdag gi ni// bzung ste de dang bral bas 'di// na mkha' dag la 'gro ba med// nor bu 'di
311a2(skyes rabs): ni bsrung bya ste// 'di byin 'di dang phra pa med// bu mo rIn chen rin chen yang // de brjod de la rngon pas byin// swa yi ri dwags mtshan ma de// rgyal po'i bu yi blangs pa na// bdud rtsis bran bzhin rang yul dang // bral
311a3(skyes rabs): ba'i me ni btang bar gyur// 'dod ldan mig gi g.yo ba yi// ri dwags gzhon nu ma 'dra ste// rngon pas btang nas yid kyis ni// chags pa'i rgya yis bcings par gyur// mi 'am ci mo shing rtar bkod// rngon pa rin chen rnaMs
311a4(skyes rabs): kyis bkang // dga' ba rgyas pa'i sa bdag sras// rang gi grong khyer dag tu song // hasti nA yi grong phyin des// rang gi gtam ni pha la bA shad// dga' bas ya mtshan gyur pa des// bag ma yi ni dga' ston bsgrubs//
311a5(skyes rabs): gzugs can ri bong can gyi dpal// dge bas sbyang byas gyur pa bzhin// mi 'am ci yi bu ni// pho brang 'khor du gnas par byas// mchu yi sbrang rtsir chags ldan pa// sbrang rtsi 'thung bAs bzhin du des// rig pas bzhin
311a6(skyes rabs): gyi chu skyes ni// dud cing pad+mo can de 'dar// smra ba bcad kyang sred pa 'chang// g.yo ba med kyang yang yang 'dar// skyengs par gyur kyang dpal mdangs gsal// de yi dga' ba de yi bsgrubs// dal gyi mchu yi ro myangs
311b1(skyes rabs): shing // so yi 'jigs pa byin nas ni// chu skyes rgyas pa'i mig can des// smra bcang rgya ni de yi phral// gos mdud 'grol dang dgag pa la// khyogs shugs lag pa'i pad+ma dag/ rab tu 'ang lhun gdu bu'i sgra// rtsod pur
311b2(skyes rabs): byed par gyur pa bzhin// rtse dga' 'dzum gyi me tig rgyas// mdzes pa'i nu mas 'bras bus mtshan// chags byas yal 'dab ldan pa de'i// longs spyod rkang 'thung sbyang byar gyur// gnas skabs der ni lho phyogs pa/ bram ze ser
311b3(skyes rabs): skya bur skar gnyis// rgyalnga po nor gyi mdun sar ni// 'tsho ba 'dod pas 'ongs par gyur// rig pa phul byung sngags 'os pa// de dag mdun ni 'don nyid thobo// sor skye dag ni sa skyong gi// rgyal po'i bu yi gzhan pa'o// de dag
311b4(skyes rabs): rig pas bcings pa yis// rtag tu rnam par rtsod byed cing // rdzas gcig mngon par 'dod pa yisau// rnam par sdang bas yang dgra skyes// glang po la 'os smyan byed pa// de dag gdong gi rig pa ni// chang gi ri mo
311b5(skyes rabs): lta bu dag/ zhe sdang skyon gyis nyams par bsgrubs// gang gi rig pa mar me'i rtse mo dngos po rnams phyed yon tan ngag gi grogs// 'jig rten rab tu gsal la mngoni phyogs mdun du zhe sdang mun pa mi bzang byed// rmongs/
311b6(skyes rabs): pas nyer bcom rtog dpyod dang bral gzhung bzang chung ma'i dgra bos de dag rnams// tsan dan zla ba chu shel pad+mo zhi ba las 'khrungs mo yis sreg par byed// thos dang dran pa rtsod rnams la// gnas dang gnas su
312a1(skyes rabs): pu skar gyis// nges par tshar gcang ser skya yis// khro ba'i gdung bas yongasu bsams// rno zhing brtan par goms gyur pa// mi bzad rgyags shing 'phyar ba 'di// rtag tu goms pa zhan pa dag/
312a2(skyes rabs): mdun sa dag tu skyengs par byed// shes rab bslu byed tshul dang ni// thos pa dregs pa'i rims dag dang // nor ni chos dag 'gog pa'i slad// ma rabs sems ldan rnams la 'gyur// dregs ldan 'di yis rgyal sras
312a3(skyes rabs): la// brten nas bdag gis yongasu 'joms// de slad 'di yi rten nyid kyi// dpal gyi rtsa ba bdag gis gzhom// rig pa'i thabs ni 'ga' zhig gis// rgyal po'i sras ni dgum pa la// bdag ni 'bad pa bya bar 'os//
312a4(skyes rabs): khengs pa nyams pa ji ltar bzod// de ltar drag po'i sdig brtag pa// de la sdang bas yang dag sbyar// phrag dog gis gang mi byed pa'i// sdig de 'jig rten yod min// gang gis mi bzang khro ba yi// dug gi mig sman sman du
312a5(skyes rabs): btab// rtag tu bsams pa 'khrugs pa des// legs pa'i lamA nI ji ltar mthong // 'dod chags mchog tu sdig cing de las kyang ni lhag par dregs pa sdig/ khro las sdig gzhan 'gro ba nA med bzod dka'i sdig pa
312a6(skyes rabs): 'chags pa'o// gdung ba dang ldan 'gro na sdig pa'i tshogs ni ji snyed bgrangs gyur pa// des kyang rnam par sdang bas bskrun pa'i sdig pa'i cha la mtshungs reg min// de na nam zhig sprin zhes pa'i// gdug cing
312b1(skyes rabs): kAr pa Tar gnas pa// gnod par byed pa'i rgyal phran gyis// dpung rnams springs pa bsad pa dag/ thos nas mi bdag khros pa yis// thabs ni bzhi par nges byas te// blon po rnams kyi 'dod pa
312b2(skyes rabs): yis// gzhonA nu la ni 'di dag smras// gzhon nu stobs kyi dgra dag ni// myur du gcod du 'gro bar gyis// khyod kyi rim 'ongs rgyal srid che// 'di ni zug rngu med par 'gyur// g.yul gyi brtsom pa khyod kyis ni//
312b3(skyes rabs): dpung pa mthu yis brgyan pa ni// 'gro bar rgyal ba'i glang po dag/ 'dogs pa'i ka ba nyid du 'gyur// sa 'dzin rigs ni gnod pa'i sprin// sdug cing lhag par rgyas pa dag/ bcom na khyod kyi gzi byin ni// phyogs
312b4(skyes rabs): su sgribs pa'i bgegs med 'gyur// stobs med mtha' na gnas pa yis// rgyal phran gzhan ni bsad pas ci// dregs ldan de ni gzhom par bya// de bsad nas ni thams cad 'grub// gang zhig cha yi sau rang
312b5(skyes rabs): zas nyid du rnam par bsgrubs pa yi// glang chen tshogs ni 'phrog byed kyis bcom dugi mtshan ci zhig yod// gal te sder mo'i gang rgyangs ldan pa'i gdong lnga mngon bcom na// de ni de yi skyes bu rtul phod
312b6(skyes rabs): gtam gyi lam du 'gyur// zhes pa pha yis bstan pa ni// g.yul gyi dga' ston 'dod pa dang // mi 'am ci 'bar g.yo bas des// skad cig khyod la 'phyang bzhin gyur// yun ring 'gro ba min brjod pas// 'bad
313a1(skyes rabs): pas chung ma dbugs phyung nas// de yi mA la mngon phyogs te// phyag byas dul gyis rab smras pa// mi 'am ci dbang brgya byin du// brtag bya'i bu mo khengs ldan ma// khyod kyis bdag pa/
313a2(skyes rabs): byams pa'i blos// 'bral ba'i mya ngan+da gyis gzir skyongs// 'di yi gtsug gi nor bu ni// rang 'dod 'gro ba ster 'di da gu/ srog la the tshom ma gtogs pa// ma mas kun tu sbyin mi bya// zhes brjod ma yi lag tu
313a3(skyes rabs): ni// mdzes ma mdzes ma'i gtsug gi nor// gtang nas dpung gis phyogs kyi sgo// sgrib cing de ni myur du song // de yis rta tshogs kyis bslang ba// rdul tshul sprin lhur rgyas pa yaM// ngang pA'i rgyal po skrag pa dang //
313a4(skyes rabs): nyon mongs rgyu nyid dag tu 'gyur// khyo ni rang du song ba na// 'bral ba yis ni yid 'phrog ma// pad+ma gzhon nu'i 'dab ma yis// mal stan le ni brten par gyur// srid ljon nyin par bgrang ba'i brtson pa dag la mngon
313a5(skyes rabs): sbyor zhing // grangs kyi ri mi'i lAm nI sla 'dar zhing g.yo bas 'bri byed pa// dre yi lag pa phra ba nyid kyis sgra ldan gdu bu lhung ba la// mchi mA'i rgyun gyi mu tig gdub bskor dag ni myur du gnas par bya// mu
