313a6(skyes rabs): tog 'dab can la sdang bde la phyir phyogs lus la 'ang chags pa nyid ma yin// bdag po'i bsam gtan skyong zhing nyin mtshan du ni de yi mi nga gi gsang sngags zlos// mal stan sa gzhir byas te de
313b1(skyes rabs): lta na yang gzugs bzang gdung ba nyams ma gyur// 'dod chags g.yo med chags pa'i yidang+ga rnams brtul zhugs drag pos grol ba min nam ci// shul gyis 'khri stan la 'dug cing // ha ri tsan dran gyis sgru ba//
313b2(skyes rabs): gzugs can ma de zla 'od kyis// dbus son zla ris bzhin du mdzes// de nas nam zhig sa skyong ni// rmi lam mthong nas ngogs gyur pas// mdun na 'dron+da ni ser sgyu dag/ yang dgu bos nas dben par dris// grong khyer
313b3(skyes rabs): dgra rnams kyis bkag cing // bdag gi lto brtol rgyu ma ni// drangs nas yongasu dkris pA yis// rmi lam de ring bdag gis mthong // blo gros chen po rmi lam 'di'i// rnam smin 'bras bur 'os pa gsungs// dge bar yongs bsgyur
313b4(skyes rabs): 'os pa yis// phyir bcos dag kyang bsam par mdzod// ces pa sa yi dbang pos dris// mdun na 'don gyis skad cig ni// gus pa'i tshul mchod bsam+ba gtan bzung // nang du mngon par 'dod pa bsams// puska ra yis rten
313b5(skyes rabs): bcad slang// rgyal po'i bu ni nyams pa la// shin tu yun ring bsams pa'i thabs// 'di ni bdag gi dga' bas thob// de yi chung ma mi 'am ci// yid 'phrog ma mchog 'tsho bas nyid// de dngos med na nges par ni//
313b6(skyes rabs): sdug cing bskal pas de mi 'tsho// zhes pa bsams nas ngal bu yi// rdzun gyi skyo dang chags bral can// mdun na 'don ni mi phan pa// tshol bas nor 'dzin dbang la smras// lha cig khyod ni rmi lam ngan// mchog tu
314a1(skyes rabs): snying rje 'dar+ya byed 'dri// mthong ste 'di yi 'bras bu ni// bzod dka'i gsal bar ji ltar brjod// rje la gus pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// gnas shing skyon bsgrub bdag nyid min//
314a2(skyes rabs): phan pa tshol rnamasna rna bar+ya ni// mau snyan brjod pa dag+h+na pa myed// rmi lam 'di 'bras gsal bar ni// rgyal sring dram ni lus la nyams// 'di la dgas dang bral bA yis// 'byo pa skad du phyir bcom
314a3(skyes rabs): bya// mchod sbyin zhing du rdzing bu ni// phyogs kyi khrag gis yongs grang bar// khyod bkrus bram zes dag byas shing // gsaR+Sha dang rin chen rAb mAd byin// mi 'am+ba ci mo'i tshil gyis mer// sbyin srid byas
314a4(skyes rabs): pos chos dag thob// khyod kyi mna' ma pho brang na// yongs pas mI 'am ci dkon// zhes pa de tshig ma rungs pa// thos nas sdig pas rmus phyin cing // gtum po'i spyo pas skrag gyur pa// so yi bdag po
314a5(skyes rabs): de la smras// rang gi srog ni bsrung ba'i slad// bud med gsod la ji ltar spro// myi 'am ci mo dang bral na// nges par bdag gis bu mo 'tsho// zhes te sa la spyod pas de'o// 'dod pa phyir la bzlog pa na// mdun
314a6(skyes rabs): na 'doni sdig pa la// mngon par zhen pas yang der smras// kye ma rgyal po blo gros dang // ldan yang skye bo'i lugs mi shes// sde gsum bsgrub byed rgyal srid dang // srog kyang btang bar bya ba min// nor bzhin
314b1(skyes rabs): nang mi grogs po chung ma bu rnams nI// nyams pa skyes bu gnas na slar yang 'byung bar 'gyur// dbugs tsam bral zhing srog ni song gyur la// de dus nye bar gnas kyang thams cad med pa nyid// 'tsho ba'i
314b2(skyes rabs): don du rang yul dang // gtses pa'i bu yang gtong bar byed// rgyal po 'tsho bya'i 'jig rten ni// srog las gzhan ni gces pa med// de ltar de yis sna tshogs kyis// dI pe yIs ral gyis brid pa na// rgyal po
314b3(skyes rabs): srog le chags pa yis// sdig la rigs par kha yis blangs// de nus phun tshogs brtson pa yis// mchod sbyin las la 'jug byed cing // phyugs kyi khrig gis gang ba yi// rdzing bu yang ni byas pa'i tshe// dben
314b4(skyes rabs): par rang gi btsun mo la// rgya la pos rang gi spyod tshul bshad// bu ni byis bgrong mya ngan gyis// gzir cing sdig pus skrag par bsam// kye mi mna' ma bsod pa yi// sgrub byeng sdig pa rgya tsho 'dir// mdun na
314b5(skyes rabs): 'don ni gti mug gis// long bas rgyal po rab rmongs bsku lnga// 'chi ba'i mtshams ni nges bcud pa// 'bad pes yongs 'phrog mi nus kyang // gzhan gyi srogs ni phrog pa yos// blun po rnams ni 'tsho bar 'dod//
314b6(skyes rabs): gal te srog la chags pa yis// bu mo bzhin bzang bdud rtsi 'dra// mna' ma yin yang rgyal po yis// bsad na bdag ni ci zhig smra// ma gcig khyod kyis mnyes gshin las// bdag gi yid 'phrog ma 'di skyongs/
315a1(skyes rabs): zhes brjod bu ni nor bzang dag/ bdag la chung ma gtad nas song // dri slang bdag las gtsug nor// thob na de ni mkha' la 'gro// de ni 'tshon bdag po drang // slar yang 'phrad pa nyid du 'gyur/
315a2(skyes rabs): zhes bsnams mna' ma ga la bar// mig chur bcas pa de song nas// rgyal po'i tshul ni de la bshad// rab 'dar ldan pas slar smras pa// mnyes gshin gtsug gi nor bu chings// na mkha' drag la mgyogs par
315a3(skyes rabs): song // mi bdag 'di ni sdig dang ldan// dam pa'i spyod la mi lta'o// khyod ni mchod sbyin sar song nas// na mkha'i lame nas 'gro bar bya// gzhan du khyod ni 'ba' zhig tu// bdag gi sbas bkod 'dra yis rig/ ces pa'i
315a4(skyes rabs): tshig thos yid 'phrog ma// khyo dang bral bas gdungs gyur pas// 'bad pas de dang phrad pa'i slad// rab tu bces par lus srung zhing // gtsug gi nor bu sgyug mo yi// byin pa blangs nas spyi bor bcings// mna' ma bros
315a5(skyes rabs): pa mchod sbyin gyis// zhing du song nas mkha' la 'gro// rgyal po bu ni gces kyang mna' ma bsad par bya ba gang 'di ni// khyod kyi 'os par ma yin khyod nI shis gyur bdag ni rang gnas s+ho// bdag bral bstan pa
315a6(skyes rabs): rab tu nyams pa'i gzhon nu 'di yang srung bar gyis// der de brjod nas rab phra glog gi rnam 'phrul dag gis de song gyur// de song chen mi bdag ni// mchod sbyin bgegs kyi dogs par gyur// mdun na 'don gyis de la
315b1(skyes rabs): smraswA// sa bdag the tshom yang mA byed// gdug pa zhes bya tshangs pa yis// srin po dag gis sngags kyi drangs// mi 'am ci mo de des bsad// khyod kyis mchod sbyin bgegs med grub// ces pA de
315b2(skyes rabs): yi rdzun gyi tshig/ rgyal po yi ni bden paru bsams// 'khrul 'khor gzugs brnyan brje dga' yas// rmongs rnams gya g+has+ye grwar byed do// pha yaM khang par ma ngon phyogs te// dga' bya ster byed
315b3(skyes rabs): yid 'phrog mas// snying lalA khyo nI bzung byas te// rang gi spyod pa'i mtha' rnams bshad// yab kyi bka' yi mi dang ni// 'grogs pa'i dri mo zhi brla slad// gser gyi bum+b+ha pa lnga brgya yis// nyi mya so sor khrus
315b4(skyes rabs): dag byas// bkrus+tha mau yi dri mau ni// rab tu chung ba nyid du gyur// nor bzang la ni mdza' gcugs ldan// rI dwags mig gi chags pa mina?// lha yi sgyid tshal longs spyod la// de ni dga' bar yongs ma gyu//
315b5(skyes rabs): gzhon la chags par gyur pa yis// lus can gzhan lan+da dga' ba med// nam zhig mkha' lde 'gro me de// sdug pa dang bral nyon mongs shing // klu yi khang pa'i nye 'khor de// nags mtha'i nor 'dzin
315b6(skyes rabs): ngag tu song // drang srong chen po bsti gnas te// gnas pa shing shun can de la// rab tu btud cing phyag 'chil te// 'dud cing mngon du phyogs pas smras// bdag ni 'ching ba rngon pa la// nye bar bstan pa
316a1(skyes rabs): khyod kyis ni// gal te rigs pA 'di byas na// bcom ldan khyod nyid bdag gi gsungs// shes pa de yi tshig thos nas// cung zad do chos bzhin btud de// thub pas der smras bzhin bzang ma// 'drin
316a2(skyes rabs): khyod kyis myong bya nyid// de la zhags pa don yod ni// yod ces bdag gis ma shes bshad// g.yon can rngon pas de yis gtam// shes nas khyod ni bcings par gyur// bden par smra ba'i mu cor can// rang bzhin
316a3(skyes rabs): drang ba bdag cag gis// ma rungs bdag nyid gdug pa yi// sems kyi gya gyu yongs mi shes// shes pa thub pas brjod de la// gzugs tson+da ma yis gus par smras// bu mo'i cho ga 'di g.yo ba 'di// bcom ldan
316a4(skyes rabs): gyis ni bzod par mdzod// khyod kyi mdun du bdag gis ni// gang 'di cung zad brjod gyur pa// dam pa'i spyod las 'ga' ba 'di// bud med rnams kyi skal bya bzang // sdud ga bsngal 'don la chas gyur cing // yongs su
316a5(skyes rabs): gdung la brtse ldan rnams// 'os pa min pa rnams kyi yang // phal cher bya ba sgrub mdzod yin// cho de dag dang ldan pa rngon pa'i zhags byas bcings las grol// 'phrog byed mji' ba'i zhags pA yis// rgyal po'i bu
316a6(skyes rabs): yis nges par bcings// nor bzang zhes pa skal ba bzang // bdag bral me yis gdungs pa de// gal te lem ni 'di nyid nas// khyod can nye bar 'ongs gyur na// snying rje las ni khyod nyid kyis// bdag gis phrin
316b1(skyes rabs): 'di smra bar byos// khyod bral gdung bas+ya bde med cing // bdag ni yab kyi khyim na 'khod// mdun na d+he su rtse ba 'am// byas shes lhan+da cig skyes pa Sh+wam// d+hus mthun mdun du bdar byas te// 'di nas myur
316b2(skyes rabs): du 'a byon por mdzod// mi 'am ci yi grong khyer lam// bgrod dka' nyon mongs brgya yis rten// brtson 'grus stobs gzi chung ba yi// mi rnams kyis ni sa min nyid// dka' thub nA gras mtha' 'dir 'bar ba//
316b3(skyes rabs): bdud rtsi zhes pa'i sman chen ni// mthong ste zhun mar la gtsos pa// khyod rang nyid kyis btudra bar bya// de mthus snying stobs glogs ldan khyod// nyon mongs rab tu sgrol 'gyur te// lam ni kr-i lA sa rgod ltar// dkar bus
316b4(skyes rabs): bdag grong phyin par 'gyur// bdag gi rtags mtshan sor gdubo ni// 'di yang de lnga sbyin par bya// zhes brjod de yIs mi zad pa'i// lam ni rim pas bshed byas te// ngo mtshar+ya rigs pa dag gis ni// bgeH
316b5(skyes rabs): rnams phyir bac+doMs thabs bstan nas// re ba'i 'ching bas srog bzung ba// sor gdub byin nas song bar gyur// lam ring sgrol byed rmad byung dag/ de yis bshad po thos gyur te// sor gdub dag ni blangs byas nas//
316b6(skyes rabs): thub pa rdo dag nyid la sems// skabs der sa yis bdag po sprin// pham par byas shing mdzod blangs nas// chung ma blta bar 'dod pa yis// rgyal po'i bu ni 'ongs par gyur// rgyal phran gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor
317a1(skyes rabs): gyis// mkha' ni chu gter lbu ba'i 'dzum// rgyas pa dag dang mtshungs byed cing // de ni rang gi grong khyer zhugs// de nas myana'i nye gyod gyis// lo rgyus 'chang la nyon mongs shing // 'dar
317a2(skyes rabs): ba'i pho byung 'khor song ste// de yis yab la rab tu btung // 'og tu bzhin phyogs skye bo kun// mya ngan zug rngus dga' ston bcom// yab kyi pho brang 'khor mthong nas// de ni dga' dang bar dogs// 'brus pas
317a3(skyes rabs): gzir ba'i yid 'phrog ma// gzugs bzung ma dwe 'tsho 'am ci// zhes smras de la su yos kyang // gang tshe mi snyan ma brjod pa// de tshe ma yis rab smras pa// bu gcig khyod kyi dga' ma 'tsho// 'on kyang srog la the tshom tshe//
317a4(skyes rabs): gtsug gi nor bu thob nas stong // zhes pa thos pa nyid na de// 'phral la sa yi gzhi la 'gyel// do shal 'khri shing bkram pas sa// mchi ma'i rgyud ldan byed pa bzhin// kha ba'i thig pa lhur dka' ba'i// ha ri tsan dan chu drug
317a5(skyes rabs): gis// dal gyis 'du shes rnyed pa des// mchi mas 'gyur 'gar rnam par smras// mkha' min+da ri bong can gyi dpal// bsrubs min bdud rtsi'i rgyu dri dang ldan// 'bad med me tog gzhu can gyis// rin chen gnas de gang na yod//
317a6(skyes rabs): bla ma'i bka' bcings ring du 'gro byed pa// bdag gis ri dwags mig can mchi ma yis// mig ni 'gags pa'i dga' ba ma bsgrubs pa// des na dran pa'i dmong 'di bdag la lhung // yid 'phrog ma ni gang du song //
317b1(skyes rabs): smin legs tshig gis ldan drag byin// bgra med blun po bdag gi sna ni// rnyi dwagasA mig can khyod ma bsrungs// khyod dang 'grogs pa'i skal bzang ldan// lha yi mdun sbyar bsngags par 'os// khyod dang bral bas mi yi ni//
317b2(skyes rabs): 'jig rten bdug bzhin ci zhig mdzes// zhes pa spyi zhing dal bu yI// mdzese ma'i longs spyod dbang gyur pa// skyod mos tshal du dga' ma mchog/ tshul du rang nyid song bar gyur// 'khor gyi skye bro brid byas te// mtshan
317b3(skyes rabs): mo dag ni mtshor bar// nags mthar song nas mnyam pa dang // mi mnyam rnamasu rnam par 'khyams// 'dod chags drag po'i sha za ni// chen pos rnam par rmongs pa des// smon pa bzhin du sems ldan dang //
317b4(skyes rabs): sems med lnga yang rnam par dris// grogs po ne tso'i phru gu gron kyi groDa mo ni// srog mtshungs zla rdzogs bzhin ldan de ni smras par byos// de yi so yi sgrib byed dmar ba dag gi cha// bim pa'i 'bras bu rtag tu khyod kyis
317b5(skyes rabs): longs spyod yin// kye lags ngang pa lus dkA d+da 'grogs pad+mo can rol rna rgyan ltar mdzes pa// mu tig tshogs ni rnam par g.yo ba gang gi blo 'dzin pa rgyas pa'i rtser// ba spu'i 'khri shing ngang pa la ni nye lcibs
317b6(skyes rabs): 'khri shing lhung bzhin rnam mdzes pa// dri bzang khang pa pad+ma'i bzhin ldan mdzes pa'i dba' rlabs can de mthong ngam ci// de ltar sdug bsngal drag pos bcings pa la// rab smre mnyam pa la yang 'greng de la//
318a1(skyes rabs): brje bas lam rab bsal ster ba bzhin// dAl mya bsil zer can ni na mkhar 'jos// mtshan ma'i blangan po yid srubs gnyen gyi na// gzugs mdzes mkha' la sgyur ba de mthong nas/
318a2(skyes rabs): 'dzum+ba ldan zlu na mA yI sa nA mkhyu'u yi// gAzhal yas khang pa'i steng nas bzhin bstan samu// mi sgra dri mas mtshan nyid skyon dag thob// rnam 'phrul med cing dgod dang rtse 'jos dman// zla ba'i bzhin du ring
318a3(skyes rabs): naM gI le ne nas nges// mi yi mgrin po'i bus ni 'gro zhing dris// grogs po khyod kyi mkha' la mdzes stug grogs// gang gyi bzhin gyi nyer 'jali 'brel thob pas// 'gro la khyod kyi grags par rab rgyas pa// mtshan
318a4(skyes rabs): mA ri dwags mig mtshungs mthong ngam ci// mdzes ma'i gtam+b+ha ni don gnyer dngos gyur pa// bdug la cung zad ji ltar 'di mi smra// gzhan don sgrub pa la ni bsil gyur gyur pa// sgyu rtsal cha ldan su yi ngo dgu byed// gang
318a5(skyes rabs): gi sgra sogs phreng bas rnam bkra ste// khyod kyi mjug ma'i tshogs kyi grogs gyur pa// yid 'ongs glog gi rab gsal sprin ldan gaN+DI// 'gar yang rma byA khyod kyi mtho tsi// gtsug na rin chen mchog ldan
318a6(skyes rabs): lag 'gro ma// gal te lag 'gro khyod kyis 'gar mthong ngam// ltos shI ga gi dug gis zer spros pas// bzod dka'i 'bral ba 'dir ni bdag srog go// ri dwagos khyod kyis yid srubs dag gi/ do ra'i rtse 'jo
318b1(skyes rabs): ma de mthong ngam tsI// gang gIs zur mig ut+pal cha dag gis// ri dwags rnams ni nags na mdzes sam snyam// rnam 'phrul skyes sa yal 'dab mdzes pA'i mchu// rol pAr rnam par g.yo ba'i bud med dag/
318b2(skyes rabs): phung bu can de 'khri shing bzhin du ni// nags mthar nags bdag khyod kyi mthong ngam ci// de ni sprin dang mtshungs pa nags tshul gyi// glang po 'di yi zla ba'i cha bzhin du// gser gyi chu shing yongs 'khyud la chags
318b3(skyes rabs): nas// blangs nas khyer ram bsgribs pa ma yin nam// de ltar rnyogs tshal sgribs rnams su// bla bcol rab brjod de yi ni// mya ngan gyis bzhin mtshan mo ni// zla ba'i bzhin ras mdog bral song // dwe yi klu yi
318b4(skyes rabs): gnas dang nye// ngogs 'gram dka' thub nags tshul du// dal gyi zhugs te dro dra srong che// shing shun can la rab tu drisa?// 'dir ni 'bral bAs sems ngan shugs rings kyis sbyar ba// 'dod pa'i me yi du bris
318b5(skyes rabs): sngo chags lhas ma gcig pA tsan+da// ri bong can+da gyi mdzes skyug dregs rgyas zhi byed rI dwagras migyaM/ mi 'am ci mo su zhig thub pa mchog gis gzigs sam tsi// zhes pa mdzes ma dang bral zhing // smyon pa'i
318b6(skyes rabs): skabs ni thob gyur pa// de yi tshig thos thub pa yis// yongasu shes nas de la smras// khyod ni ngal so dbugs phyung la// yongasu gdung ba 'di gtang mdzod// khyod kyi dge ma yid kyi ni// zla ba'i 'od de bdag gi
319a1(skyes rabs): mthong // khyu nyams ri dwags mo bzhin du// 'tsho ba yang bltos pa med// glang mo zhags pas drangs pa bzhin// de ni khyod kyi bsam pas 'tsho// lag pa dag la bzhin gyi pad+ma nyal zhing yal
319a2(skyes rabs): 'dab mal stan la// gdung bas nyan cing g.yo ba'i tshig ldan ri mo kun tu nyal ba'i lus// re ba bcas la bstan pa blo gros khyod bral 'khrugs gyur pa// de yi yid ni 'gar yang ci yang ngal bsos nyid du 'gyur
319a3(skyes rabs): ma yin// ljon pa mi 'am ci yi bA dgra/ yab kyi khyim na bdag gnas so// khyod ni myur du shog cig ces// de yi khyod la yang dge bstan// brtson 'grus snying stobs stobs dang thabs// bstan dang spro ldan rnams
319a4(skyes rabs): kyis kyang // bskyod min mi 'am ci yI ni// grong khyim lam yang rim bsdu bshad// gang gi 'od 'jam reg pa yis// phyogs rnams ser po nyid 'gyur ba// rin chen+da sor gdub 'di yang ni// de yis khyod kyi ched du
319a5(skyes rabs): byin// zhes brjod kun dga'i bdud rtsi yis// bran zhing bstan pa dag gi rten// sor gdub dag ni de la byin// lam yang thub pas rab tu bshad// de yis bstan pa'i lam dag ni// thabs dang bcas pos mi bdag
319a6(skyes rabs): bu// bstan pas nor 'dzin gnas pa yis// phyogs su 'gro bar rab tu brtsams// sman chen bdud rtsi logs grub pa// mar gyis smin pa 'thungs nas ni// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi bdag nyid thob// mtshon cha dang bcas
319b1(skyes rabs): dal gyis song // rdzu 'phrul gyis ni lam du de'i// nyer mkho thams cad nyer gnas gyur// snying stobs grogs dang ldan rnams kyi// grub pa phun tshogs rang dbang gi// de nas rig 'dzin bu mo ni// rtse dga' rgod pa
319b2(skyes rabs): ltar mdzes pa// gang sna can rga lha nas de yis ni// ku krU l+yA yi ri la sle ba// 'bras bu'i skyes kyis khas blang bya// der nI spre'u'i khyu yi bdag/ rlung shugs shes pa la zhon+da nas// ri bo de ni de yi dgongs// de nas
319b3(skyes rabs): lug gi lam shes pa'i// sa 'dzin dag ni rab tu rgal// 'jigs su rung ba'i sbrul chen+di nau// bgegs kyis tshogs bzhin mda' yis bsnun// 'dod pa'i gzugs can srin mo ni// rgyud mangs sgra yis dbang byas
319b4(skyes rabs): nas// 'dod pa'i gzugs kyi ri bo bzlas// mi 'am ci yi bdag po skyong // dwe nus rgyun cig ri bo la// yang yang mtshon gyi rtse mo yis// bsnin zhing brkos pa dag gis ni// stobs ldan shin tu brtul bas 'dzegs//
319b5(skyes rabs): dwe nas rdo rje tsAn+da zhes pal+li// ri bo rab drug de yisu 'dzegs// srin mo sha ni tshol byed pA// bya rgod gzugs can yang dag mthong // sha ldan ri dwags pags pa ni// yongasu bsgyur bAs kun+da tu g.yogs// ri byo de
319b6(skyes rabs): yi zhabs kyi rtser// de yi lus ni g.yo med 'khod// mtshan rgyu bya rgod gzugs can ni// sha la chags pas de blangs nas// 'jigs rung gzugs kyis bza' ba'i phyir ro// ri rtser steng du rnam par bkod//
320a1(skyes rabs): brtson 'grus can des ri dwags kyi// pags pa btang nas dwe byasad de// seng ldeng skyugs pa'i khengs pa yi// seng ldeng sa 'dzin dag tu phyin// dwe yi phug zhugs rdo bsal bas//
320a2(skyes rabs): grang dang tsha dang mun pa sbrul// srin po la soDa 'phri pa dag/ 'phrog pa'i sman ni chen po thob// 'khrul 'khor raM gnyis rab bsdigs pas// srog ni de yis 'phrog par dwe yis sleb// 'khrul 'khor phur pa mda'
320a3(skyes rabs): rtse yis// bcud nus ga yo ba med par byas// 'khrul 'khor phur pa bcing rnams kyis// 'khrul 'khor sgo ni nges bcom zhing // 'khrul 'khor longs spyod bcad de bzhin// lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor sbyar ba'o//
320a4(skyes rabs): grag tu snun byed skyes bu gnyis// bzod dko' lug gi 'khrul 'khor gnyis// de bzhin tshul srin srin po'i so'i// 'khrul 'khor drag pos 'joms pa gnyis// 'jigs rung mun pa zab pa'i phug/ khron pa gnyis kyang
320a5(skyes rabs): rnam par 'gongs// chu bo chen po yang dag rgal// de ngogs srin po rnams bsad nas// mchi ba'i dug ldan gnas pa'i chu// pya taM ga zhes thur bgrod dang // gang 'gram mi 'am ci dag gi/ 'brangs rnams ngu ba'i sgra dag gis
320a6(skyes rabs): de 'gro'i sems la bgegs byed pa// klung ni du ba can dag dang // de bzhin dgod pa can zhes pa// dgod pas sems la gnod byed dang // mi 'am ci mo rnam dag gi/ gang gi 'gram du gdung ster ba// thur dgrong gzhan yang
320b1(skyes rabs): bzlas byas te// de 'og spa ldan rlung can phyin// de nas de las thar 'dod na// 'gram gyi spa yi 'khri shing gzung // rlung gri bskul ba pha rol gyi// spa yi 'khri shing dre yis thob// re ba bzhin du rab ring ba// de yi pha
320b2(skyes rabs): rol 'gram du phyin// mi 'ame tsi yi grong khyor ni// rab gsal shel gyi khang pa mthong // de yi dAl bus nung du zhugs// gser gyi pad ldan mdzes par phyin// de yi ngogs kyi shing la 'jigs// rin chen 'khri
320b3(skyes rabs): shing gis sgribs gnas// der des chu skyes rdul tshogs kyis// dri bzang ser por gyur pa'i chu// mi 'am ci mo rnam ngag gis// len pa dag ni mthong bar gyur// der ni bum 'degs ngal ba yis// gzir bu gcig can
320b4(skyes rabs): dris mngon phyogs// lag pa su brten nos grogs byas te// ngal bu yis ni de la dris// ma ma su yi ched du ni// chu 'di 'bad nas lan pAR+Sha byed// gang la gus pa khyed rnams ni// yongasu dral 'dri rtsi mi byed// de ltar
320b5(skyes rabs): tshig snyan gyis des dris// mdzes sdug snyana? sgra ljon pA yi// phyogs su skad tsig gis lhung ma// de yiswa de la rabA smras pa// mi yi dr-i nga dag bya'i slad// rtag tu dri bzang chu rnams kyis// mi 'am tsau rgyal yab
320b6(skyes rabs): kyi bkas// yid 'phrog ma ni khrus byed do// zhes pa de yis brjod thos nas// skad cig bdud rtsis bran pa bzhin// de yi rtags mtshan sor gdub ni// gser gyi bum par de yi 'phangs// de nas sor gdub
321a1(skyes rabs): mngon par 'phrog byed de ni bum+b+ha pa las// khrus byed ni yid 'phrog ma yi nu ma'i bum pa zung la ltung // gang gi gzugs brnyan zer ldan rin chen 'od zer ri mo yi// myur du sen mo 'debs
321a2(skyes rabs): pa'i rtse dga' dag mtshungs pa thob// de rjes rin chen sor gdub lus maud gtam dag nang song ba// rang gi rje su chags pa gzugs can bzhin du brtags byas nas// bdag po 'ongs par shes te 'di ni khyod kyi
321a3(skyes rabs): gang las thob// ces pa dri yis 'bangs mo lu ni rangs pa bzhin du smras// de nas 'brangs mos de la smras// lha mo rdzing bu'i ngogs dag na// yid srubs mngon du gyur pa bzhin// dar bab mdzes pa 'ga' zhig mchi/
321a4(skyes rabs): glang mthu snying po can gyi chu// gur gum mdzes pa nyid bsten pa// sor gdub 'di ni de nyid kyis// gser gyi bum pa de ru 'phangs// zhes pa de yi tshig snyan+da thos// gzugs bzang ldan pa yid 'phrog mas//
321a5(skyes rabs): khyod ni 'angs par nges byas nas// de nyid de ni 'gugasu btang // de yi rab sbas skyed tshal gyi// khang par bkod pa'i mdzes pa ni// ku mud can gyi zla ba bzhin// yid 'phrog ma ni slong bse mthong // phan tshun lta
321a6(skyes rabs): bor byed pa'i rnam 'phrul dang // 'bral ba yongs gdung rnam par 'chad pa dang // de dag rab dga' nyam su myong gyur pas// lus med yan lag kun ldan mdzes pa thob// bral ba'i dus su gang gang cung zad bsam
321b1(skyes rabs): pas nang du goms byas dang // gang gang rab dga' rab rgyas yid srubs grogs kyi nye bar bstan pa dang // gang gang mdza' bar mtshungs dang gang gang sred ldan phung por 'os gyur pa// de de thams cad mdza'
321b2(skyes rabs): gcugs bskal bzang khyo shug de gnyis dag gis byas// de rjes spying tshul bsgribyas pa ni// ngo tsha ldan pa'i yid 'phrog mas// bshad nas pa ma dag la ni// bdag pa sa yi yid 'byung bstan// de nas mi 'am
321b3(skyes rabs): ci yi rgyal// de la khyos pas mchu bskyod cing // bu mo'i bdog ni mthong ba'i la ma// yong su gtang nas rab smras pa// kye ma mI 'os skye bo la// cha yis bag med lhung gyur pa// spyod tshul ngana? pa bkrus kyang ni//
321b4(skyes rabs): chags pa nyid ni khyod mi gtong // khyod kyi mdzes sdug lang tsho la// lha rnams kyis ni reg bya 'di// kye ma mo dang mdza' ba yis// mya ngan bya 'os nyid du gyur// mthun po'i ro gas las skyes gyur cing // stug po'i
321b5(skyes rabs): lang tsho rab rgyas po// thur 'gro 'khrugosna pas rnams nyams pA// khyod ni shin tu 'og tu 'gro// mkhas pa chags bral skyed byed cing // rigs ni skyengs par byed pa mo// mi srun rig bzhin dri ma tson// khyod ni su yang mi
321b6(skyes rabs): 'dod ngo // gzugs tsam gyis ni khyed tshim nas// gal te mi yi dbong gyur na// gser las sprul pa'i skyes bu yis// gzugs dang brtse dga' cis mi byed// mthu dang yon tan gyis dman pa// skyes bu rab mdzes
322a1(skyes rabs): dbyib can gyi// mdzes sdug ri mor byis pa yis// skyes bu yi bzhin rtsig pa mdzes// 'brel dman ngo chos sdig can ma// khyod khyo bdag gis bsad paR+Sha bya// khyod slo la 'ongs
322a2(skyes rabs): lha rnams kyi// bzhin ni bdag gi lta mi phod// bden par spro ba dang ldan zhing // mthon por gyur pa'i ri dag ni// bu mos 'khums par byed pa ste// dus ni nges par dga' bas bzhinA// de skad pa yi sbrang gyur dus/
322a3(skyes rabs): mchi ma'i theg pa nu ma la// do shAl skud med sgrig byed cing // bzhin btung dwe la rab smras pa// yab lags khro bAs mi 'ongs pa// 'di dwag bdag la gsung 'os min// mthu yi mi 'am ci dag la// lhag pa'i
322a4(skyes rabs): mis mu thos sam ci// mkha' lding gis kyang bgrod dka' ba// sa 'di gang gis bgrodA gyur nas// 'ongs pa mthu yI swa gzhi ste// mi nyid yin pa ji ltar 'gyur// lus can rnams kyi lus ngag ni// yon tan yang
322a5(skyes rabs): dang cod byed cing // bAsil ze can gyi 'od zer ni// kun dgu' skyed par byed pa yin// yab cig rigs kyi ci zhig bya// yon tan rang bzhin rje su 'brang // zla ba rgyas bdud rtsi zags pA ni// nag po
322a6(skyes rabs): brtsegs pa'i yun zla nyid// kha cig nang na yon tan ldan// de bzhin gzhan ni skyon bsgribs pas// nor bu rnams kyi r-i dag ni// ma brtags 'god par yong mi bya// de thos mi 'am ci yi bdag/ de de bzhi
322b1(skyes rabs): zhes sems byed cing // mgu pa yang dag bos nas ni// yon tan shes par 'dod pas smrasa?// mi 'am ci yi bu 'di dag/ re zhig khyod kyi mdzes pas btul// mthu ni yang dag bstan pa na//
322b2(skyes rabs): mchog gi 'brel pa dag tu 'os// shin tu yangs pa sha ri'i nags// sha ra phyung byas skad cig gis// til bre gang btab mi nyung bar// rab tu sdus la slar yang byin// bstan dang 'ban lu sogs
322b3(skyes rabs): pa yi// gzhu yi rig byed mkhas pa ston// de nas grags pa'i ba dra nu ni// yid 'phrog ma 'di khyod dbang 'gyur// zhes te dri yi gya gyu las// 'os pA min pa'i las lo bskulaM// gzhon nu mdzesA ma
322b4(skyes rabs): la chags pas// thams cad bya bar rab tu brtsams// don med la ni nyon mongs 'bres// sha ri 'byin la rab zhugs pa// de shes mig stong ldan pa ni// phyogs su ltung bas yang dag bsams// ci slad
322b5(skyes rabs): bskal pa bzang po pa'i// bya chub sems dpa' rgyal sras 'di// 'bral med nyon mongs las la nau// mI 'am ts+yai yI dbang gis bskos// 'di yI ngal dub dus 'dri l-i/ bdag gi stong grogs rab tu bya//
322b6(skyes rabs): de ltar bsams nas brgya byin gyis// de yi las ni rdzogs byas te// mchod sbyin brgya pas bstan pa yi// gnod sbyin phag gi gzugs can gyi// sha ri'i nags ni rab phyung ba// mnyam par til ni bre gang
323a1(skyes rabs): bat+tash+tha/ bar+N+Na b+h+yon+d+ha b+h+rUM rgyus grog sbyar gyis// yang drug bsdus nas cig tu byas// myi 'am ts+tsha yi dbang po las mtshan smad du gnon nus phul// stobs rgyus da y-i gser gyi ni//
323a2(skyes rabs): bya bdun dang ta la bdun// phag gau 'khor lo yang dag ldan// sgro ldan shin tu rno bas phug/ gang gau dri yi cod pan la// lha yi me tog char 'thob pa// bstan bcos mtshon dang rtsal dang ni// sgyu rtsal bzo dang
323a3(skyes rabs): stobs rnams bstan// mi 'am ci yi rgyal po ni// de mthus ya mtshan gyur mod kyang // de nyid bslu ba'i slad du slar// rig pa de de sems par byed// mngon par zhen pa shin tu bstan ldan gzhan gyi gnod pas
323a4(skyes rabs): chu bzhin 'khrugs// yon tan brgya phrag gis kyang myi mgu shin tu gral che ba yi blo can rnams// rgya che mtshar la sgra bcad 'dzin cing dam pa bstod la rgod par byed// grags pa mchog la bzhin dag log cing
323a5(skyes rabs): 'gal ba brjod pa nyid du 'gyur// de lce des smras khyod kyi ni// lha yi mthu 'di gsal bar byas// da ni shes rab khyad 'phags dag/ khyod kyi yang dag bstan par 'os// gzugs dang kha dog dbyer med cing //
323a6(skyes rabs): rgyan dang na tshod mtshungs gyur pa// mi 'am ci mo 'khod pa yi// dbus ni rang gi dga' mo zung // zhes pa brjod nas de yis slar// mi 'am ci mo lnga brgya dag/ rdzogs pa kha dog lang tsho dang // chas mtshungs
323b1(skyes rabs): mdun du dre yi mthong // de dag dbus nas yid 'phrog mya// de yi yong su shes nas bzung // 'khri shring nags tsha la kyi sgribs pa yi// tsA ta'i 'khri shing bung bas bzhin// de nas mi 'am ci dbang gi/
323b2(skyes rabs): 'di ni lha zhes nges byas nas// tshim pas de la yid 'phrog ma// lha yi ron chen dang bcas byin// mchog gi longs spyod 'byor pa yis// gus dang bcas par de yis mchod// de la zhus nas chung mar
323b3(skyes rabs): bcas// gzhon nu rang gi grong khyer song // yid 'phrog ma sngon 'gro ba'i bu// 'ong ba mthong nas sa yi bdag/ bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshos glang po'i dbang // mthong nas 'phur bzhin rnam par mdzes// de nas
323b4(skyes rabs): rgyal srid spyod tshul zla ba'i glodug dkar ldan pa la// skye ba'i gdung ba 'phrog pa'i bu ni mngon par dbang bskur nas// chos shes bsil ldan dben pa'i bdud rtsis mngon par dga' ba yi// rab tu zhi ba
323b5(skyes rabs): ljon pa'i grib bsil mi yi bdag pos bsten// nor bzad dbang skur thob pa'i snga dro nyid// gzi chen rgya che de la rin chen bdun// gtso bo nyid 'gyur gsar pa'i mthu 'jigs nas// g.yog la gnas pa'i
323b6(skyes rabs): don bzhin nye bar 'ongs// nor bzang byang chub sems de nga nyid de// yi 'phrog mar gyur de yang grags 'dzin ma// de dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal me sa gdungs pa// 'di nyid 'dod pas bcings las bdag
324a1(skyes rabs): gis thob// de las 'dod pa pad+mo'i bzhin gyi mig gI mtha' la gan+d+has gyur cing // rab rgyus me tog las skyes rdul tshogs tA lA tA la'i rtse mo can// rmongs byed mya ngan+da gdungs ba'i
324a2(skyes rabs): mda' yi gang gi 'jig rten 'bigs byed pa// rngon pa'i rtse dgas zhi ba'i ri dwags 'ching byed dam pa rnams kyis spangs// de nas rgyal ba rang gis rang gi gtam// bshad po de lnga dge slong tshogs
324a3(skyes rabs): kyis thos// 'dod pa ro ldan kho na srid pa ni// 'dab brgya'i rtsa ba sbom po nyid du nges// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sem+b+has dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las
324a4(skyes rabs): nor bzang gi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab skye drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / longs spyod rtse dga'i ngag gi dri yi tshogs kyi dbang po thams cad yongasu drangs gyur pa// chugs ldan sbrasbyang rmi
324a5(skyes rabs): 'thung rnams shin tu dam pa 'di nyid du ni gang gi'i tshong byed pa// skye ba sngar goms zhen cing shin tu chags bcas las byung bag chags rtsa ba'i lhag ma las// ngogs pa med par skye bo'i yid 'dir pad+mo
324a6(skyes rabs): rdzas su mthun pa'i 'dod chags 'byung bar gyur// shAkya'i grong khyer dag tu sngon// n+ya gro d+ha yi kun rang gnas// rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das la slar// dge slong yang dag tshogs pas zhus// zhi bar zhugs
324b1(skyes rabs): shing chas ni yongasu sgyur// 'khor ba'i rnam 'gyur spyod lam log pa khyod// mi yi bdag po'i pho brang 'khor 'jug pa// glags 'dzin mas mthong rnam par rmongs pa bzhin// khyod mthong nyid na kun
324b2(skyes rabs): tu brgyan byas shing // 'dar zhing g.yo ba'i lus can rnam par gnas// lagu na la du'i gnod bzung khyod nyid ni// zas kyi lhag gnas dag la chags par byed// de yI yid kyi rnamo 'gyur rnam mang
324b3(skyes rabs): ldan/ da lta yang ni nye bar zhi ma 'gyur// khyed zhal zla 'od bral na shin tu de// nyams te nyin par ku mung ldan pa bzhin// de skad mtshan las dge slong tshogs kyis dris// cung zad 'dzum pas
324b4(skyes rabs): me chu yi yal 'dab la// mu tig 'bras bus rib spras byu ru'i 'odi// mdzes pa 'god cing bcom ldan gyis gsungs pA// mngon 'dod rtse dga' rnam 'gyur ldan pa 'dri// grags 'dzin ma ni dweng nyid 'dzin
324b5(skyes rabs): pa mi ne// skye gzhan la yang 'dod pa'i rnam 'phel gyis// de yi la dus bdag la chags par byas// ku shi'i grong du mi dab ka sh+ya stenA// zla ba'i 'odi ltar dkar ba'i grags pa can// dgra myos gnyis
324b6(skyes rabs): 'thung lcags kyu yin mod kyang // spyod tshul mi rno rang bzhin drang por gyur// dka' thub 'bang pos bu don gnyer nga la// bu mo pad+ma ldan nyid cig pu byung // skye dgu sbyong la g.yel ba dang btsos pa'i/ sa
325a1(skyes rabs): bdag phal cher rigs rgyud nyung bar gyur// pho brang 'khor du de ni yongs bskyed cing // sems la'ang bsam pa'o mi bdag gis smad nas// mkhas pa la sngogs blon po bos
325a2(skyes rabs): nus ni// gnyid bral dga' ba nyams par rab smras pa// lho 'dab rgyas shing rtsa ba brtan par zug/ skye bo kun gyi nyer tshe shIn+da tu mtho// mtshungs par skye bas dman pa'i rgyal srid ni// srin bus
325a3(skyes rabs): zos pa'i shing bzhin bdag gi rig/ lung 'tsho rab tu sbyin 'os bsten+da pa yi// bu mo pad ldan gtsig pu bdag la yod// de ni 'bad pas mag pa la byin tshe// bu tshwa nyid dang dwe la byams pA'ang rlig/
325a4(skyes rabs): lag paR+Sha sgron me'i sdong bu rab 'byar+ya bzhin// skye bos rang gau bu mo gzung mi nus// gtams pa'i nor bzhin gzhan lA gtang+ku byA ba// rigs kyi bu mo bsam po'i 'bras bu nyid// g.yog l-i byin min grong pa
325a5(skyes rabs): la 'os smin// mi dbang bu mo rnying po nyid la 'o sa// de ltar kun dpyad ring po mi shes pas// shi dang song ba dgra la bye brag ci// de slad gang zhig bu dngos bdag nyid can// rang yul rang spangs bdag gi yul
325a6(skyes rabs): 'dzin pa// bdag gi mag pa'i dngos gyur 'ga' zhig de// yon tan ldan pa 'bad pas sprul par bya// bdag gis po gau gA dag gi rgyan// bsod nams dag pa'i ngogs dang nye ba na// snyim par bcas zhes
325b1(skyes rabs): dka' thugs nug sa mthur ni// rgyal po'i drang srong ka sh+ya pa gan sA la'o// de yi sa bon ci bAs lhung gyur pa// lha yis bskyed pa rdo stengs dma' bar chags// chu 'dod kyisku gzir ri dwags mo yi
325b2(skyes rabs): 'thungs// gser gyi mdog can gzhon nu bcos par gyur// de yi phas gzung nags su ri dge sa de// rnam par bskyed cing brtul zhugs dag kyang bsgrubs// sngor tshad rA yis yang dag mtshan gyur
325b3(skyes rabs): pas// byis pa rA cig pa zhes ming du grags// drar bab bsam gtan bzhi po skyong byed cing // tshangs skrong drang bcas dri mang rang bzhin can// yul ni ma na par mi shes grogs mang gnas// der ni drag
325b4(skyes rabs): po'i nyi 'od lta bu mdzes// de nI gal te pad ldan khyod nyid du// gyur nas rgyud 'di rab tu zhi mI 'gyur// gzi brjid gter de rab tu 'gugs pa yis// glanod meng rig pa ci yang bsam par mdzod// ces
325b5(skyes rabs): pa mi bdag chog thos yun rnying du// dpyang nas blon po kun gyis de la smras// da ni de yi bAsti gnas nye bya yi// nags su rgyal po'i bu mo rtse ru thong // de tshig rje su 'dod byas rgyal po yis// 'dod pa'i don
325b6(skyes rabs): kun rnam par bshad nas ni// pad+mo tson bsrungs rab tu spobs pa bzhin// thab pa'i gzhon nu dbrog phyir rtse ru saung // mdzes mas nags kyi mthar ni dpal gyi phyin// gzugs bzang rtsed 'jos
326a1(skyes rabs): mngon pa ru dga' bas rol// mdzes pa'i mig can da ni rlung gzhon gyis// bskyod pa'i 'khyi shing bzhin du yang drag rgyu// de ni rol cing me tog thu ba yi// ri dwags rA rab g.yo
326a2(skyes rabs): zhing rnam bskyod pa// nags mthong rang gi dka' thub nags tshal nas// dge mtshwa na ldan pa'i gzhon nuso yang dag 'ongs// mi yi grogs med pad+mo ltar yangs mig/ ya mtshan mig ni 'dzum dang bral
326a3(skyes rabs): ba des// ladra tsho'i rnam 'phrul gyis ga lus dud cing // ut+pal rgyas pa'i mi ga tsan+da de mthong gyur// mdzes ma rAM dwags mig can dri mthong nI saM// dga' ma mngon shas mad kyang thub pa dga'//
326a4(skyes rabs): bag chags goms pas nang du zhen pa yaM// yul la mngon thos skye bos gtong ma yin// ri dwags bu yi rab mdzes yid 'od mig/ de yi bzhin g+hi pad+mar rnam bkod nas// rig 'dzin rnams ni thub pa'i
326a5(skyes rabs): bu dag tu// shes nas mdza' ba'i dbang gis der phyag 'tshal// sdom brtson gyis btung bzhin ras dung gyur pa// de yi mchu ni byu ru'i 'od ldan gyi// 'od zer tshogs kyis kun bsgribs do shal dag/ dri meng rang
326a6(skyes rabs): bzhin gyis kyang chags pa zung // dril chung sgra snyan dag gis grogs kyi bzhin// 'dod pa'i nye bar spyod pa gdams byas pa// rdul zags thig le nga gi many+dzu mdzes shing // rab 'dar lus tsA de la gzhon nus
326b1(skyes rabs): sgras r+b+ba/ kA ye thub pa'i sras khyed legs 'ongs sam// dka' thub nags mtha ri dwags dge 'am ci// rtag tu khyod la lha Sh+Ti yo med pa// gang dag rnams ni thang lnga dman par rgyu// brtul zhugs mchog
326b2(skyes rabs): ldan khyod gzugs bdud rtsi'i cha ra// kha na ma tho med pa 'di mthong dang // ral pa shing shun ldan pa thub rnams kyi// lus ni shing skams bzhin du bdag rtog go// 'khri shing me to ga rnams kyi spras byas pa//
326b3(skyes rabs): khyod kyi ral pa'i tshogs ni mdzes pa 'di// sprin gsar tshogs la rnam par gdengs ka yi// rma bya'i mjug ma'i mdzes sdug rnam par 'dzin// khyod kyi brang 'di dpal 'bras zung gis spras// bgrang phreng dkor po
326b4(skyes rabs): ngag gi rnam par bcings// ri dwags gzhon nu'i mig ltar bkra bA yis// yid la dga' ba bskyed cing rnam par mdzes// sbyin sreg me yi ma stog gsal chags pa'i// ske rags 'dzin cing lus 'phra 'khri shing
326b5(skyes rabs): gzhon// yal 'drab gsar pas mtshan 'dra khyod kyi lus// 'di ni su yI dge mtshan rgyus mi byid// thang 'ga' gang du g.yo ldan 'dam skyes ni// khyod zhabs bkod pas rnam par gsal byas pa// 'od kyi rtag tu rnam
326b6(skyes rabs): par mdzes pa yi// dka' thub nags mtha' gang yin dang bas smros// ri dwags rang bzhin thub po'i gzhon nu ni// bud med mi shes de rig bu mo yis// ngo mtshar rab bting rnam par gos med pa// ma bsdams kyi
327a1(skyes rabs): dga' dag gi rgyan bzhin gyur// dwe nas kun dga'i ro swa brlan sems ldanA der// 'jam par smra byed de yis dal bar smras// bdag gi bsti gnas 'bras zhim me tog can// dka'
327a2(skyes rabs): thub nags tshal 'di la nye bar gnas// zhes brjod ka ra'i 'dzum dang ga pur gyi// nang tshangs ldan zhing yid 'ong ya mtsha nau 'os// la du mkhas pa'i legasA bshang mtshungs pa yi// de yis de ni rnam par
327a3(skyes rabs): tshigs par byas// de yi skyo byed ro 'dzin rjes mthun pa// sems dga' mdza' ba'i rang bzhin rtse dga' dang // bsngags pa bdud rtsi gus brjod 'ching ba yis// 'phags pI ri dwags de ni rgyas bzhin
327a4(skyes rabs): bcings// tshe 'os dka' thub nags tshul bdag la ston// zhes brjod mig zum de la rgyal po yi// bu mos lag pa'i 'khri shing dag gis ni// dam du yongs 'khyud tshur shog ces pa smras// chos shing
327a5(skyes rabs): cung zad rkang gis song de la// slar yang de brjod slad du bstar byas pa'i// shing rta la zhon lag pa rkyang nas des// zhon pa nyid ni tshig gi rab tu bskor// shing rta 'dren+do pi'i rta dag des mthong nas// bye brag mu
327a6(skyes rabs): rtogs ri dwags yin par shes// ri dwags bu dag ri dwags steng du ni// rkang pas mi reg ces pa de la smras// de nas yid kyis thub dbang bu 'dzin cing // shing rta yid ltar 'gyogs par song nas ni// mi
327b1(skyes rabs): bdag bu mos rang gi grong khyer phyin// de yi spyod pa mi yi bdag la bshad// stobs kyi rab sbyar dgugs pa'i mngon sbyor la// me mtshungs drang srong chen pos 'jigs gyur pa// rgyal po'i blon dang bcas pas
327b2(skyes rabs): de 'ong la// rab tu 'bad pasA thabasnga ni mngon par bsams// de nas slar yang gzhon nu 'gugs pa la gru yi tshog sa bltams bcings shing ngal byas pas// gaM gA'i ngogs kyi dka' thub nags
327b3(skyes rabs): kyi mthar// rtse ngaga'i 'khri shing de ni rgyal pos btang // skabs der bu ni bya ba mtha' dag btang // mi bdag bu mo'i bsam gtan smra bcad bcings// mngon 'dod gsar ba'i brtul zhugs ldan rtogs
327b4(skyes rabs): nas// thubA pa dag ni ya mtshan g.yo med gyur// de nas phasA dris de la thub sras kyis// shugs rings rgyud ma dag gis bsti gnas drang // nyer gnas snye ma'i yal 'dab yang yang du// sgeg cing rol
327b5(skyes rabs): pa bskyed cing rab smras pa// yab cig dka' thub nags su dIng bdag gis// zla ba'i gzugs brnyan rabA tu phyis pa'i zhal// drang srong che srasa? 'dren byed 'od dag gis// ri dgus bu mo'i dreg pa 'phyog
327b6(skyes rabs): pa mthong // de yi rnying ga rkeng lag mgrin pa la// gtags pa'i rgung pa rnam par bkra gyur pa// dbang po'i mtshon spangs ngag dang mtshungs pa yod// ya ba cig bdag kyang ci slang de lta min// bdag gi tshig gi
328a1(skyes rabs): brgya cha mtshungs pa yang // nAm yang ts+tsha ta'i nagasu bAdag gis ni// thos pa khu byug gi min bung ba'i min// de ni da lta'ang bdag nang sgrogs pa bzhin// dal bAb lag bkrus
328a2(skyes rabs): dbu ba chags pa yi// 'od dang mtshungs pa shing shun+da gsar pa yis// shin tu phra bA de yi lus dag mdzes// bdag gi lus ni lag pas yun rings bsdams// gadrong gi pad+ma'i bzhin
328a3(skyes rabs): ras rnam par bkod// bslabs pas mchu bskyod 'di yi dga' ba yi// bdud rtsi rog pa'i khyad par bslab par byas// mdzes pa rnam par mtshon pa de la meng+ga ni// bdag gis bzod pa nags
328a4(skyes rabs): 'dir skad cig min// gang gi brtul zhugs brten pa sna bdag nyid la// rmongs pa'i grogs po gnyid ni gnas mi byed// bdag gi mig ni de la lta bar 'dod// de tshig med na thos pa yod mi gnas/
328a5(skyes rabs): lus la gnod byed blo ni nang drag tu// mi gsal dwe yi bsam pas mchog tu gzir// ces pa madz+nyA sa mas yid 'phrog bu yi ni// gdung ba'i bsamA pa go byed tshig thos nas// dka' thub par
328a6(skyes rabs): chad gyur pas 'jigs pa yis// drang srong chen pos shin tu yun rings bsams// kye ma dran pa'i rngon pa mi bzad pas// dka' thub can rmongs ri dgas bu 'di ni// bud meng mchog tu gyur
328b1(skyes rabs): pa'i rgya dag gis// zur mig gal du ltung ba 'phral la bcings// skad cig de bsams thub pa mkhas pa yis// bu yi yid kyi rnam 'gyur sgrog pa'i slad// 'dod pa'i lag 'gros dug btang
328b2(skyes rabs): yul lA ni// mngon 'dod 'dzin pa dzI la rab smras pa// bu de drang srong che sras legs pa min// de ni bu myed yid kyi lag 'gro yis// der lhung rmongs pa shin tu mi bzad bya'i// rjes chags
328b3(skyes rabs): thub pa'i gdung ba rnam par 'dzin// mig sman nAg po brtsegs chags na chung gi/ zur mig rnon pos phug pa'i skye bo dag/ skyon bcus bud med lag po'i zhags pas bsdams// 'khor ba'i btson ra
328b4(skyes rabs): drag tu mya ngan+da byed// kun mongasA dri mur ldan pa'i srid pa dgu/ sprin gyi dbus su gya gyur gsal byed pa// skad tsog mtha' tsanA mdzes ma'i glo dag gI// bral tshe skyes bu mchog tu mun par byed// bud
328b5(skyes rabs): med rnams ni mya nganra rgyal pa'i gnyen// smyo zhing brgyal byed dug gi 'khri shIng ste// rmongs po'i sha za chen mo 'di dag gisA// kun tu reg pa'i 'jig rten dge ldan mIna?// bud mye mIg+na zur
328b6(skyes rabs): gdung byed zug rngu ni// rnon po gang gi sem sa la mo zug pa// cho ga shis kyis mdzes dka' thub nags tshal du// gnas pa'i dam pa 'di de rnal du gnas// zhes pa'i dben pa'i tshig ni de dang
329a1(skyes rabs): dang des// pha yis 'bad pas rab tu rtogs par byas// 'dod pa dang ldan mdzes sdug btung ba yis// rnam par 'phrul pa des ni rtogs ma gyur/ de nas nyin gzhan sna tshogus
329a2(skyes rabs): bya ba byas// thub pa 'bras bu yam shing len du song // mi dbang bu mo 'jo sgeg ldan pa ni// gzhon nu chags par byed pa slar yang 'ongs// 'bangs mo'i tshogs rnams rdzas 'brang 'khri shing ni// mo
329a3(skyes rabs): mau tog 'dzum ldan dag gi dpal bsten cing // lus can lus med gsur mtshungase rA gcig can// 'byor pas mtho bo'i lus cin+da brtan pas phyin// bdag gi bsti gnas dpag bsdam shing rtse las// 'phyang
329a4(skyes rabs): ba'i 'khri shIng gis dga' lha la 'os// lta bar khyod kyis 'os zhes brjod nas des// dI ni gaM gA dag gau ngogs su khrid// des der rin chen rab 'bar 'drab ma bkra// gsar gyi 'khri shing me tog 'bras bu
329a5(skyes rabs): dga'// gru yis gzung ba'i bcos ma rnams byartags nas// dga' ba lnga bzhin b+ha de ba'i gnas la 'dzeg ste// 'khor ba dang bcas mtshungs zol gyi bAsti gnas der// chu bo'i rgyun la da ni rab tu khyer// de nyid
329a6(skyes rabs): shes pa min yang chags tshul gyi// mdza' bo can bzhin ba ra NA sir phyin// de yi sa yi dbang chen ka sh+ya yi// rin chen rin thang che ldan rgyal sar phyini// thub pa rnams kyi gtam la bshad pa yi// maH
329b1(skyes rabs): rIstA gnasta ni mig l+h+wam gyur par sems// de nas rab dga' rgyus pa sa yi dbang // sgrub shes cho gas de la ri dgus mig/ g.yas skor bskor bas do shal g.yo ldan ma// bu ma re ba rdzogs pa'i dpa
329b2(skyes rabs): byi byin// mi dbang bu mo'i lag par lag bkod cing // bag ma'i bsreg rdzas me la rnam pa ra bkod// des ni gzhon nu blo gros gzhan pa med// sbyin bsreg rnam pa gzhan dag yin par sems// dga' sngon tshwa dang
329b3(skyes rabs): spro ba'i nyams rgyas pa// rgyal pos gus pas rab tu mchod pa des// brtul zhugs dus ldan nyid du de ra 'dug nas// chung ma dang 'grogs rang gi nags mthar yang // chung mi'i grogs byas dben par bgrod
329b4(skyes rabs): paM de// mA ma ri dogs mos mthong rab dga' ste// thub pa'i drin lus mi yi tshigro thos pas// gang nas khyod kyi bud med 'di zhes smras// de la rab tu dre yis gus smras pa// mA ma blang ga gis mdzes ldan
329b5(skyes rabs): grogs mo 'di// rab 'bar me yi dpung can grogs nyid kyis// 'dod par bya ba'i gzugs can 'bad byas thob// ces smra bag ma la sogs gtam mi shes// rmongs de rig ri dwags myo de yis khyo yaM
329b6(skyes rabs): brtul zhugs dka' thub can rnams kyi// dka' thub nags tshal dag tu ngal gyis khrid// chos rjes 'gro ni khyod kyis lhan cig spyod// 'di yi bdag po khyod ces ma lus pa// bag ma'i spyod tshul dag gi
330a1(skyes rabs): bshad pa de'i// thos nas chung ma dga' ma nyid du rig/ yab ni 'od srungs kyis kyang dga' ba yis// bag ma'i chos ni nye bar bstan pa bsgrubs// der btud de yi tshig gi chung mar
330a2(skyes rabs): bcas// gyos po rgyal po grong khyer dag tu song // snying stobs rab 'bar zhig pa'i lam bstan pa// rgan po de yi rang gnas la dbang bskur// rgyal phran cing phran ngal ba so'i gnas de yis// ma lus sa gzhi
330a3(skyes rabs): dag ni rab tu bskyangs// dbang phyug rmongs pas blo gros zil ma mnan// dben pa chos kyi rang bzhin las 'khrungs shing // rgan po bu dang tsha bo mang ldan des// rab tu byung bas zhi ba 'dod par 'gyur// thub gzhon rwa
330a4(skyes rabs): cig ldan pa gang gyur te// de nyid pad ldan de yang grags 'dzin ma// da yang skye ba gzhan gyi bgra chags las// bdag lnga chags pa'i slad du mngon par sbyor// rang gi skye ba gzhan gyi gtam// rgyal bar nye bar bsngags
330a5(skyes rabs): pa 'di// thos nas dge slong de dag rnams// thams cad ya mtshan ldan par gyur// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs po brjod pa dpog bsam gyi 'khri shing la sA rA gcig pa'i rtog
330a6(skyes rabs): pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o// / 'jig rten du ni skyes bu'i las lam grib ma bzhin// lus la lhan cig spyod 'di nges par mi mtshon te// lus 'di yongs sgyur brgya yis mtha' mar mo
330b1(skyes rabs): phyin cing // mgyogs pas bros pa dgra la rnam par 'chad mi 'gyur// lhas byin gyis ni rdo 'phangs te// zhabs mtheb smad nas khrag byung ba'i// rgyu mtshan dge slong rnams kyis dris// bcom ldan 'das
330b2(skyes rabs): kyis der bka' sprul// mi zlog kho na ni dran pa las// skyes pa'i las kyi rnam smin dag/ gang gis bdag gi rkang pa yi// mthe bong yongasu sbyin pa nyon to// lnga len dag tu grong khyer ni// k+Sho pi l+yar sngon sa gzhi
330b3(skyes rabs): skyong // bden dang chos la yang dag brta na// bden pa dga' zhes bya ba byung // skye dgu yang dag bsrungs 'os pa// de yi btsun mo mtshan nyid bzang // mtshan nyid can zhes bya ba ni// mchod sbyin bdag
330b4(skyes rabs): gau yon bzhin gyur// phywa las de la bu med tshe// de yi gsol btab sa yi bdag/ bu don gnyer bas lus 'phags ma// chos bzang zhes pa khab tu blangs// khyo yi begrA ma blangs pa'i tshe// mtshon nyid can
330b5(skyes rabs): la bu bA tsas te// don maud tshun ma thob pa yis// rje su 'gyod pa dag kyang bzung // dwe ni ma dud pa zhes bya// gzhon nu pha ni rab tu dgyes// rig gnas dul ba phun tshogs shing // rgyu rtsal bstan bcos mtshon
330b6(skyes rabs): mthar phyin// de nas chos bzang mngal dag dang // ldan pa'i tshe na rgyal po 'das// brtson pa kun la lus can gyi// bsam pa bstan gyi lus mi bstan// de nas de mthar blon rnams kyis// rgyal phran blon po'i
331a1(skyes rabs): lcags kyu ni// gsar pa bzhin du gyur pa// mtshan nyid can gyi bu dbang bskur// gang lugs pa lang rA co ltar// g+ha gyu gzhan gyi mi shes pa// blon po chen po bya lung rA// zhes
331a2(skyes rabs): pa de yi mdza'u bor gyur// dus kyi chos bzang btsa' ba yi// mtshan drang nye bar gyur pa na// mtshan mkhan mdun na 'don dag gis// mngal gyi mi bdag mthar byed smras// de nas blon po'i tshig gis ni//
331a3(skyes rabs): byis pa skyes tshe gsod pa la// de yi pho brang srung 'os pa// mtshon gyi sbyor ldan rgyal pos bskos// de dag shes nas chos bzang yang // blon po chen po ba lang rA// rang 'dod bzhin du byed pa lngas/
331a4(skyes rabs): shin tu skrag nas skyabs su song // de yis NI sa myosA chung ma zhes// bsten te bu yi 'jigs pa las// bu nI yang dgra skyes pa dgA/ nya pa rnams kyi khang par bzhag/ de nyid nas ni bu mau dag/ dwe yis
331a5(skyes rabs): blangs nas rab bstan pa// shrIs nas sa yi bdag po yis// mtshan mkhan tshwag+h+ra nI bden min bzung // ny+dza pA'i khyim+b+ha du byis pA des// rig pa bzo gAnas sgyu rtsal drag/ dwe de thob pa gang des na// blo dman
331a6(skyes rabs): gzhon nu snyan ngag mkhan// byis pa rnams dang lhan cig der// lam du rtsed mo'i grong khyer byas// rgyal po'i rtsed mo yongs 'dris la// dpung chen de ni rna rim par rtse// der ni mtshan mkhan mdun na 'don// /
331b1(skyes rabs): 'dod dga' dgu tu 'ongs pa yis// de mthong mi bdag la phyogs te// gus par mngon par 'dod pas smras// lha cig nya pa'i khang par nI// gang gis khyod kyi rgyal srid dang // srog dga' 'phrog par+ya sbyar
331b2(skyes rabs): byarjod pa'i// gzhon nu bdag gis mthong bar gyur// 'di thos mi bdag khros pa yis// gzhan pa'i mu la rab spyad do// blon po chen po ba lang rA// yang dag bros nas rab smras pa// kye ma bdag gau
331b3(skyes rabs): tshom la// rna ba 'dzin pa rab g.yel ba// khyod kyi rgyal srid chu gter la// gru bzhin dpal la btang snyoms byas// khyod kyi blo la sems bkod pa// bdag gi bde bar gnyid 'gyur te// de ring srog la
331b4(skyes rabs): the tshom gyi// rim gyi dbyung gi gAnas+dza dag bsten// bdagra gis mthur byed spel pa'i mAng la// nya ba dag la yings go tad nas+ya// rab tu dga' bas gzhan pa'i ma// nges par nyi me bgrang b.ru byed// da dung
331b5(skyes rabs): de ni zad pa'i thabs// rig pa khyod kyi sgrub par mdzod// senu mos chod pa dus kyis ni// sta re yis kyang nus mi 'gyur// rje bo yul 'khor nor dang rdzong // grogs dang dpung rgyas srung byed pa// dau yi slad
331b6(skyes rabs): du rang bzhin las// blon po'i rang bzhi na shin tu brling // blon po gdung bzhi byed bsam gtan la chags rtag tu phan pa zlos// nyan na dul ba'i tshul ldan gus pa'i brtul zhug so dag ni nges par
332a1(skyes rabs): 'dzin// mngon 'dod 'bras bu thob pas grub pa drug ni 'phrul la rab tu ston// yongs 'di dag cing rgya ches bya dag rnams kyi bsod nams dag gis thob// myur
332a2(skyes rabs): du rab lci rtsom pa yis// byis pa 'di ni rnam par chom// dus dang bral ba'i 'bad po ni// rje su gdung byed 'ba' zhig yin// zhes po rgyal pos yang dgra bstan// sngon gyi btang snyoms skye byis pa
332a3(skyes rabs): blos// blon po glang po rta dong nI// shing rta'i tshogs dang lhan TIg song // chos bzang gris kyang gnas skabs der// bu ni gsung nAs bosa? byas te// glos de de la rnam+ba paR+Ya bshad// 'gro bar mdzod ces
332a4(skyes rabs): de la smras// ma yis gtsug gis nor byin nas// btang ba daM ni rings par 'khrugs// rin chen gyis brgyan 'gro ba dag/ blon po yIs ni ring nas mthong // rgyal po'i bu ni gsang nas ni// bros pa 'di
332a5(skyes rabs): nyid ma yin nam// zhes brjod de yis de bsang slad// dpung gri sngon 'gro drag po bskul// mgyogs pas de drag las 'bros shing // ri dwags ltar mgyogs ring 'gro de// tsam pa kra zhes bya ba yi// klu yi
332a6(skyes rabs): gnas kyi chu la bying // de nas mthong nyams de yi tshe// blon po chen po 'bad ldan pas// rje su de ni btsal ba'i slad// pa te ka zhes nyan na btang // de nas gtsug gi nor bu yi// mthu yi chu ni rings byas shing
332b1(skyes rabs): klu yi gzhon nu dbugs phyung nas// 'dug cig ces pa rab tu smras// rgyal sras+ya la 'os rkang pa yis// rgyu ldan sa gzhi mthong gyur nas// klu yi gnas na gnas pa dgA/ pa da ka yi de la brjod//
332b2(skyes rabs): de nas klu yi dbang po'i gnas// kun nas yongasu bskor nas ni// blon po chen pos sa bdag bka'// gdengs can dbang la rab tu bsgrags// lag 'gro khyod kyi khang pa 'di// bdag gis rdul gyi khengs
332b3(skyes rabs): par byas// chu ni jo bo khros pa yis// thang dang gcong rlong drag tu byed// rang nyid la 'gro'i longs spyod dbang // gal te 'chad par mi 'dod na// rgyal po'i rgyal po mi phan pa// rgyal po'i bu ni yongasu thong // de
332b4(skyes rabs): skad de yi bsdigs pa la// mtshan mo'i dus su klu yis ni// myur ba ra rgyal phyo'i bu btang ste// srog chags rnams ni 'jigs dbang 'gyur// de nas rgyal srasA rab bsgribs te// 'khrud mkhan dag gi
332b5(skyes rabs): khang par gnas// rkang pa bkod pa'i brgya dag gis// pa ta ka yi nye bar mtshon// de nas blon chen 'ongs pa'i tshe// nges 'jigs 'khyud pa dag gis kyang // gos kyi khur gyi nang bcug nas// 'jug ngogs
332b6(skyes rabs): mtha' ru yongasu gtang // de nas kyang ni gsang ste song // do ni rdza mkhan khang pa na// g.yul sprad nus kyang mi bdag bu// dus la sdod cing rab tu gnas// der yang ba lang ra dag ni// rkang pa'i rgya yi
333a1(skyes rabs): rjes 'brang ba// dpung gi 'khor lo chen po yi// lam ni yang dag bgags pa'i tshe// sa bdag bu ni gos dag gis// g.yogs shing me tog 'phreng bas mtshan// cho nge dang bcas rdza
333a2(skyes rabs): mkhan gyis// ro yi zol gyis dben sar dor// dben sar mgyogs par 'gro byed pa// de yi rjes kyi phreng ba dag/ song ba'i rje su song gyur pas// blon po chen po mgyogs par 'ongs// kun tu yongasu mi gtong
333a3(skyes rabs): zhing // las bzhin du ni rjes 'brang ba// tsho lnga bya'i nga lnga dub kyis gzir ba'i// blon po gdug pas de mthong gyur// mgyogs las gri yang sa ma brtsigs te// g.yang sa chen por lhung gyur nas// 'khri
333a4(skyes rabs): shing shing skams tshogs dgra la// gtsug gi nor bu'i chag par gyur// mi bzang g.yang sa gcong dag tu// ltung ba de mthong blon po yis// gtsug gi nor bu yang dag blangs// song nas rgyal po dag la
333a5(skyes rabs): bshad// gnod sbyin+ya A dza la zhes pa// g.yang sar gnas pas gzhon nu yang // bsrungs te 'dab chags bzhin du ni// sa la phyin cing shi ma gyur// bu ni lhung thos chos bzang dag/ rang nyid 'chi ba tshol ba ni//
333a6(skyes rabs): lha mo rnams kyi khyod kyi bu// 'tsho zhes brjod nas rab tu bsrungs// gzhon nu'ang stag rmig rnon po yis// rdo ba'i gzhi ni nyams byas shing // glang po'i khrag gis myos pa yi// mi bzad stag ldan nag su zhugs/
333b1(skyes rabs): dwe ni rngonA pa mi ser can// zhes pa yis ni rab bshad de// lam ni thob pa'i skyes bu dag/ lus kun bcad pa mthong bar gyur// de mthong snying rje skyes pa yi// mi bdag bu yi rab tu dris// khyod kyi sdug bsngal gnas skabs
333b2(skyes rabs): 'di// mi med na gsu ci yi thob// de smras ring po min 'dri na// gtum po gtum po'i spyong tshul can// bzod dka' su dA sa zhes pa// skyes bu rnams kyi mthar byed gnas// de la dung gau kha zhes pa// khye ni 'jig su rung
333b3(skyes rabs): ba yod// de yi spyod tshul ltung gyur pa// yud tsam 'tsho ba'i lhag ma can// bdag gi gnod bsnun zug rA 'di// yan lag bcad las yang dag skyes// gtum po nyin gung gdung ba'i tshe// gdug pa dung gi kha dag gis// mgrin
333b4(skyes rabs): pa rab bcad don mthun gyi// khrag ni rtag tu 'thung bar byed// ces pa de yi tshig thos nas// rtse bas yid ni phug gyur cing // mtshon dang bral rgyal po'i bus// ci zhig bya zhes rab tu bsams// drag po gzhu yi dkyil 'khor can/
333b5(skyes rabs): de nas gtum po 'ongs gyur te// phyogasu mig gi phag gi ni// khrag gi zer ma 'phen pa bzhin// de yi ngos su khyi yang mthong // sog lo ltar rtsub so dang ldan// gsor pa'i khrag gi skos pa yi// sor mo'i rtse mos sa la
333b6(skyes rabs): 'brad// ri dwags rnams kyi yan lag 'joms// g.yag rnams dag gi byis pa'i gdon// lce sbrang rnams kyi rigs kyi nad// phag rnams nyams par byed pa'i rims// gtum po'i phyogs su lhung ba yi// byed pos nags kyi
334a1(skyes rabs): lAm du ni// 'tshe bya dag gi dal dub bzhin// dregs ldan gdug pa ts+tshan de sprul// 'gron po'i chung ma gsar du ni// yugasu sa'i gdung ba sgrub byed de'i// hU~M zhes g+har+ya g+har sgra dag gI/ bse ru drus ma
334a2(skyes rabs): rnam par 'bros// shin tu gtum po 'bod pa yis// brda yis mngon du 'ong ba de// mthong nas sa skyong bu yis nAM// skyu ru ra yi shIng lnga 'dzugs// lo 'dzags pa d+ma mthong nas// rna ba'i bar du mdo
334a3(skyes rabs): drangs shing // gtum pos gdug pa dung gi kha// de ni gsod la mngon par phyogs byas// 'phyar smra gdug po'i mog de yis// mda' dang phyi yi mche ba ltar// rno ba'i tshig gis phug pa yis// rgyal po bu yi rab bsams pa//
334a4(skyes rabs): kyi ma rgyal po'i rgyal po yis// g.yul du spro ba dang ldan pa// mtshon med bo dag lus 'jig pa 'di// byed po dag gi rnam pAr sprul// skye bo dran pa rgya med kyi// dgra nI thub par 'gyur ba ni// mdza' bsna ma yin sbyin pas
334a5(skyes rabs): myin// mchod min yon tan gyis kyang mon// nges par dmyal ba'i gnas dag ni// 'di yi mdun nau bltar byas par// mi yi keng rus phreng ba can// nags kyi sa gzhi rab tu sgra// gang du rgyal rigs gtsug gi
334a6(skyes rabs): nor// rgyal po zla ba'i rigs su skyes// khyi 'am gtum po'i bu dag gis// mtshon med bdag ni gsod por byed// rnam kun nges par mi g.yo zhing // skye ba'i mthar thug gnas gyur pa// skyes bu'i don dang
334b1(skyes rabs): 'gal gyur pa// ston gyi las la phyag 'tshal lo// dman bya'i dru ba dgra snron bug rtsim+bin+da yon tan s+yAd rgyus min// 'jig rten rab mAd+ma snron gyis gnas kyis+ya gang sgron shin tu chung ba dag/ ring nas shin+na tu gAsal
334b2(skyes rabs): bar mthong nas mdzub mo dag gi ston byed pa// kun lasA mtho ba'i rang rigs zla ba dI yi skye bar ma gyur cig/ de ltar sems dpa' de yi nau// mi zad srog gi the tshom l-i// bdud nyid nyams pas lus dgra ni// 'jigs
334b3(skyes rabs): pas 'jigs par yongs ma gyur// stobs der thub pa rig pa 'dzin// ma thA ra yi lha mig gis// dwe yi gnas skabs mI bzad pa// nyon mongs can zhes brtse ba yis// mkha' la ral gri 'grogs pa yi// yon tan
334b4(skyes rabs): gcig nyid ston byed cing // lag na shu byas med ralA gri tsan// mkha' yi lam nas yang dag 'ongs// 'khros shing shin tu gdug pa'i mig/ 'jigs rung lus can de 'ongs te// gtum po'i bu dang dung gi ni/ kha
334b5(skyes rabs): yI mgo dag rab tu bcad// de nas rang gau gnas su khrid// mi bdag sras+ya de dbugs phyung nas// rdzu 'phrul che dang lhan cig nges// sgyu ma'i rig pa de la byin// de nas thub pa de la zhus// khengs ldan rgyal sras rgyalnga
334b6(skyes rabs): srid ni// bzhed cing dgra las rgyal 'dod pas// k+ShaM pau l+yar ni dal gyis song // de yi de ra ni gar mkhan ma// yid 'phrog dga' tso ma'i gzugs byas nas// yid 'ongs gar stabs de dang des// grong pa'i 'jig
335a1(skyes rabs): rten tshim par byas// de yi gar dang zlos gAr drag/ mkhasnga pra mi bdag gis thos nas// blon po dang bucas rang nyid ni// zlos gar khang pa lta ru song // de yi dwer ni sgra can gyi// rtse
335a2(skyes rabs): dga' yid 'od de dag mthong // mdzes ma'i gzugs su g.yo med ni// bdud rtsi len du 'ongs pa bzhin// de yi gar stabs mdzes sdug la// rnam par dpyad nas 'dzin ma 'dzin// 'jo sgeg myangs shing myos
335a3(skyes rabs): b+hu rA pas// blon po'i gtso la rab smras pa// kye ma mdzes sdug kun rdzogs shing // bsngags 'os lus mchog ldan pa'i lus// ngo mchir gar stabs ldan pa 'dri// bdag cag rnams kyi yid 'phrog byed// mtho ris
335a4(skyes rabs): de ra'i rtsed 'dzi mkhan// mai na kA de 'di min nam// gzhan du gsar pa'i tshonu riswa dang // dbyibs mdzes 'di na ga lnga 'ong // 'gyur bag shin tu legs pa'i rang bzhin gyis spras rnam bkra mdzes pa'i rim pa yis//
335a5(skyes rabs): rigs rnams nyid kyi nyamasu myong bya nyams rnams nges par rdzogs pa la brtson zhing // rdzogs pa'i dbugs su klu yi 'gyur gyi yang yang rab tu dang bsgrub byed pa// rdza rnga yang dug bsgrags pas nye bar spras pa'i zlos
335a6(skyes rabs): gar kye ma yid dga' 'gugs// skad ni brjod pa yongasu 'dzin tshe yid 'ong rgyud mangs sgra yis dga' ldan pa// snying stobs gsal bar byed pas 'dar zhing ga yo ldan 'og pag mdzes sdug ri mo'i grogs// gsang por brjod
335b1(skyes rabs): la mngon phyogs mi 'phrogs yid 'ong stobs dang ldan par sgeg par spras// gzugs bzang smin ma zung ni sgeg cing rol pa'i bslab pas spras pa kun la bsten// ces te de gdong chu skyes la// mig bkod sa gzhi bdag po yi//
335b2(skyes rabs): bzhin gyi rdul gyi dran pa yi// 'dod pa'i rkang 'thung yang dag skyes// de la tshim med nyin mo'i mthar// rin chen yongs rdzogs byin nas ni// pho brang 'khor gyi nang song ste// mi yi bdag pos de nyid bsams// 'khor ba'i rgyus bzhin bden
335b3(skyes rabs): med gzugs// bcos ma'i 'dod ldan+da ma yis ni// sa bdag de yi nang dag tu// rnam par gnas shing rmongs par byas// 'dod pas gzir ba de yis des// dal bu yis ni khyim du bos// yongasu gyur pa'i 'gal ba la// 'chi bar 'dod
335b4(skyes rabs): rnams chags par byed// grags pa'i me tog rnam bkra shing // sde mtshan gsum gyi 'bras bu can// mi bdag ljon pa rnams dag gi/ dbang po ma bsdams sta re yin// glang po rjes su chags pa drag po'i dbang du gyur pa la// gal te//
335b5(skyes rabs): glang mo de yi rmongs pa'i bslab pa ma byin na// yongs rdzogs sbyin pas bung ba'i don mthun yongasu dgyes byas pa// khyu yi mgon po lhung ba'i g.yang la nges par lhung ba min// de nas dal gyis rgyal khab tu// bran khrol blun
335b6(skyes rabs): po 'dun pa yi// rje su 'jug pas brlag pa'i slad// bcos mo'i bud med rab tu bcug/ dben par brtan pa btang byas shing // gsang ba mngon par 'dod de la// dus ni mdzes ma'i gzugs dag gis// mgul nas 'dzin la
336a1(skyes rabs): mngon phyogs gyur// de nas gnyin ni ring po'i slad// gus pas mal stan+da 'dzegs nga la// bzhin nus gar mkhan mra yi gzugs// sbyangs nas 'phral la rab smras pa// khyod kyi longs spyod la
336a2(skyes rabs): chags shing // spyan zla'i mdza' la bltas med pa// lhan cig sbyang bya rgyal srid la// gcig pu yis ni ji ltar stong / zang nyon mongs chu gter du// skyon med de ni khyod kyis 'phangs// de yi le lon sems byed bdag/
336a3(skyes rabs): rang gi las kyi sbyo ra bas thar// ces brjod de yi mi bdag bcings// rgyal srid rab tu rgyas pa thob// skye bo'i tshogs ni phyung ste// sred ldan rab tu zhi bar byas// gnas thob de yis rang nyid kyi// gnod pa drug po sems byed
336a4(skyes rabs): cing // snga dro brtse med khro bA yis// mi yi bdag la rdo ba 'phangs// spun zla bsed pa snga chags pa yi// khrag dang sbags ba dpal 'byor te// spyad nas gzhon nu snyan ngag mkhan// las kyi mjug tu dmyal bar song // de nyid nga yin
336a5(skyes rabs): stong phyug lor// las kyi sdig+na d+ye sbyad nAswA// sdig pa zang mong+ga dA lta yang // rkang pa ri mthe bong yongasu gnang // skye ba'i 'khor mor rims kyis yongs 'dris rgyud dag gis ni smin byas shing // phyi nas skam dang chu dang shing rdo'i
336a6(skyes rabs): snying po'i dbus skyes kyang // sna tshogs ra yis yo byad lus kyi snod ni de dang de spyad de// skyes bu'i las kyi lhag ma bskal pa gnod pa yis kyang gtong mi 'gyur// de skad skye ba gzhan gyi spyod// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
336b1(skyes rabs): thos nas// dge slong kun gyis las kyis rgyu// bgom par bya ba min par nges// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las gzhon nu snyan ngag mkhan gyi
336b2(skyes rabs): rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa drug pa'o// // 'khor ba yangs pa'i mya ngan lam chen rab mang nyon mongs drag pos gdung byed pa// yongasu rdzogs pa'i bsod nams gter gyur dam chos rtogs shing yA
336b3(skyes rabs): shes mchog dang ldan// bla mas nyer bstun+da rab tu rgyas pa'i mthu thob bdag nyid chen po gang dag gis// khyim gyi 'khyam su rtse ba lta bus yang dag rgal byed de dag sngags par 'os// mnyan yod dag tu sngon byung ba// khyim gyi
336b4(skyes rabs): bdag pos sangs rgyaswa su// gang gi khyim gyi dpal stug ni// slong ba'i kyi nyer 'khor gyur// gang zhig yid spyod rab dang // dge ba'i slad du bslab pa'i gnas// rab tu drang ba'i dge slong ni// shA ri'i bu yis dag par
336b5(skyes rabs): byas// de sras dam pa'i kun spyod tsAn+tau// rig gnas mdun la rnam par mkhas// yon+ma tAn mtshan nyid yang dag rdzogs// dge 'dun srung zhes bya bar gyur// nam zhig khyim du shwa ri'i bya// 'ongs che pha yaus d+ha la smras
336b6(skyes rabs): buM khyod mngal na gnas pa na// 'di yi nye gnas su dam bcas// de slad de ni bdag gi tshig/ de ni bden par bya bar 'os// pha la bu lon med byed pa'i// bu bzang bsod nams dbang gi 'gyur// de skad pha yaM yi nga
337a1(skyes rabs): dag bstan// dge 'dun srung 'di rab dga' ste// shA ri'i bu yi rjes 'brang zhing // rim gro yongasu skyong bar gyur// de nas de yi rab phyung ste// chos kyi lung ni bzhi po dag/ ma lus de yi khwa thon sbyangs// de
337a2(skyes rabs): nas nam zhig tshong pa ni// mtshungs par skyes pa'i grogs po dag/ brgya phrag lnga yis chu gter las// lhan cig 'gro bar gsol btabya ste// de dag dge ba sems byed pas// 'jigs pa dag la brtan bskyed pa// bla ma'i
337a3(skyes rabs): bka' ni bzung byas te// gzings la rab tu zhon par gyur// de nas gzings te chu gter gyi// dbus su yang dag 'gags gyur cig/ tshong pa'i don mthun cho de dag/ sgrogs tshe chu las tshig drag pa// gal te gzings 'di khyed
337a4(skyes rabs): rnams// grol bar 'dod pa de lta na// dge 'dun srang 'di chu la ni// myur ba nyid du 'phang bar mdzod// de thos srog la tha tshom tshe// de dag rnams la blo 'di byung // shi bar gyur pa mchog yin gyi// dam pa'i grogs po gsod
337a5(skyes rabs): pa min// de dag mi bzang the tshom la// brtse ba yis na bsrung brtson pas// chu gtar 'khrug par dge 'dun srung // rang gi byadag nyid rab tu 'phangs// de nas klu yi gnas su phyin// der ni klu yi gsol btab des// rdzogs
337a6(skyes rabs): sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten la// mngon par phyag 'tshal sngon bsgrubs nas// bsam pas phra des mthong dbugs dang // so reg dug ldan de dag la// legs pa'i spyod tshul mngon 'dod pa// chos ni rab tu bstan pa
337b1(skyes rabs): mdzad// chags bral drag po'i yid 'byung gis// rang yul 'gro bar 'dod pa de// klu rnams kyi ni tshong pa yi// gzings la skad nyid kyis bkod// 'jig rten gzhan las 'ongs pa bzhin// de dag dga' ba yang dag
337b2(skyes rabs): thob// gzings 'di phyir la log gyur nas// rgya mtsho chen po'i ngogs su phyin// rang gi 'dod pas de dag rnams// shin tu rings par bgrod pa yis// dge 'dun srang ni bya ma yi// ngo gsu gnyid du song ba brjed//
337b3(skyes rabs): de nas don mthun song tshe sad// snga dro mi med phyogs rnams su// lta zhing grogs dang bral ba yi// chags bral blo can dpe bsams pa// kye ma mthong dang nyams pa can// dri za'i grong khyer lta bu yi// snying sdug gnyen drang/
337b4(skyes rabs): 'grogs pa dag/ bral na rnam par rmongs par byed// sna 'phar nye gzhon 'phar ba lcu bu rab tu g.yo ba'i mdzes sdug grogs// mi rnams dgra l+yA rdzun gyi yid brtan brtan par gnas pa'i 'ching ba sgrubs// drang gi
337b5(skyes rabs): skye bo dang bral mal du nyal zhing de bzhin nges par 'chi// kun tu chags pa dge dang mi dge'i las dang lhan cig srog chags rgyu// bstan pa'i blo yi 'di bsams te// yul g+hi lum na 'gro ba des// ngal gyi skye bo'i
337b6(skyes rabs): bsam pa bzhin// mtha' med sa la'i nags tshal sleb// de nas der ni khang bzang dang // khang pa rin chen las 'khrungs pa// gtsug lag khang chen mngon gyur te// dge mtshan gzugs dang ldan pa bzhi
338a1(skyes rabs): khri dang mal stan legs bshams pa// der ni dge slong dge 'dun gyi// chos gros mdzes pa zhi ba yi// mtshan nyid nyams pa med pa mthong // de nas de dug gis mgron
338a2(skyes rabs): sgrub// der ni de yis bstan dag brgyan// zas dang bkur sti rnyed gyur nas// skad cig dal bsos thob par gyur// de nas dge slong rnams ngag gi/ zas kyi dus la bab pa'i tshe// mdun du lhung
338a3(skyes rabs): bzed bstar byas pa// thob pa chen po nyid du gyur// gtsug lag khang de mi snang bar// de dag tho chen mtshon cha yis// phan tshun mgo bo rnams bcom nas// sa gzhi khrag gris bran par byas//
338a4(skyes rabs): zas kyi dus ni 'odas pa na// gtsug lag khang yang mngon byung zhing // de bzhin dge slong de dag rnams// rab zhi ldan par rnal du gnas// ngo mtshar de mthong ya mtshan can// de yi de dag rnams la
338a5(skyes rabs): dris// zas kyi dus su rtsod pa 'dra// khyed cag rnams la ci slad 'byung // de la des smras bdag cag gis// skye ba snga mar zas dus su// gtsug lag khang du rtsod pa byas// las de 'bras bu 'di
338a6(skyes rabs): dag go// de dag thos nas de nas de// song bas gzhan du de lta yi// gtsug lag khang gzhan dga' ba ni// rab tu 'khrungs par gyur pa mthong // de nas der yang zas kyi che// dge slong rnams kyi
338b1(skyes rabs): mdun du zas// lcags kyi khu ba nyid gyur pa// mthong nas de dag la des dris// de la des smras rmongs pa las// dge slong 'ongs pa'i zas kyi bgegs// dge slong dran pa'i bdag nyid can// bdag cag
338b2(skyes rabs): rnams kyi ston tshe byas// de thos de nas song gyur pa// de yi gasngar zhing mdzes pa'i gnas// gtsug lag khang ni gsum pa dag/ dge slong rnams kyi zas kyi tshe// de yang tshig cing slar yang byung // de
338b3(skyes rabs): mthong ya mtshan gyur pa yis// 'tshig pa'i rgyu la tshogs la dris// de la des smras dge slong la// phrag dog las sngon gtsug lag khang // sngon gyi skye ba gdug pa la// dga' ba bdag cag rnams kyi bsregs/
338b4(skyes rabs): de thos de nas song ba des// gzhan du g.yo med dI ka ba dang // rtsig pa 'bras bu'i rnam pa can// phyags ma thag pa rA mtshungs pa dang // khri sogs gtun ni grags pa dang // snal ma'i lhag dang rnam gnyis
338b5(skyes rabs): gyur// nyal zhing sems ldan bde med pa'i// sems can snying stobs mchog gis mthong // de mthong 'gro ba de nyid kyis// dka' thub drag ldan thub pa ni// brgya phrag lnga yi bsten pa yi// bsod nams dka'
338b6(skyes rabs): thub nags tshal thob// de dag gis de ring po nas// mthong nas phan tshun nges par byas// bdag cag rnams kyi 'di la gnas// mi sbyin snyan par smra mi bya// shAkya'i slob ma rang bzhin gyis// mang brjod phebs/
339a1(skyes rabs): par smra b+hU min// zhes pa'i gros ni rab sgrubs te// thub pa de dag rab tu gnas// de dag gis der gnas ma byin// de yi nyin mo zad che 'khyams// 'dam skyes mdzod ni bsdams pa yis/
339a2(skyes rabs): rlung drug re ba nyams pa bzhin// thub pa gcig gi de la ni// mtshan mo khyod ni mi smra bar// gnas par bya zhes rab brjod nas// zhag sngar bsti gnas stong pa byin// de dgagra gis der mgron ma byas// mtshan mo 'phen
339a3(skyes rabs): byed nyal gyur pa// de la bsti gnas lha mo ni// mngon du phyogs de la dal gyis smras// dam pa legs pa'i tshul gyis bzhengs// chos ni rab tu bstan par mdzod// 'jig rten dam chos sgra rnams kyi// dang por khyod
339a4(skyes rabs): ni bdag gis bkur// zhes nges gsol btab thub pa des// bcom sbyangs de la rab smras pa// mA ma khyod dang khi bo ni// nges par 'byin pa ci smang thul// gnas 'dir bdag la thub pa yis// mi smra ba yi dam tshig byas//
339a5(skyes rabs): de las 'das par gyur na bdag/ nges par 'di yi 'byin par 'gyur// zhes smras de la gus pa yis// de yi mang du gsol btab ste// bram ze rjesu gnang ba yi// chos ni smra bar yang dag brtsams// rgyun du lus ni gdung
339a6(skyes rabs): bar byed pa'i nges par brtul zhugs min// skye bo med pa'i dka' thub nags tshal dag par byed pa min// gzung dka'i ral pa pags pa yongs 'dzin skye bu rnam dag gi// chags pas yongs 'dris sems ni yongasu
339b1(skyes rabs): gdung b.rarla byed pa yin// nags su 'bras bu za ba'i spre'u 'di dag rnams dang ni// ljon pa 'dab ma shing shun dang bcas ralnga tshogs ldan pa dang // 'jug ngogs chu nang du chags nya ming rnams kyang
339b2(skyes rabs): grol ba myin// rab zhi spangs pa rnams kyi dka' thub yo byad rdzun pa nyid// thal bas dkar ba'i glang po dang ni rlung dag 'thung ba'i sbrul rnams dang // nags na zhen pa'i ro dwags rnams dang thang la nyal ba'i
339b3(skyes rabs): gzungs mo dang // 'bras bu za ba'i ne tso dang ni gos med rngon po rnams kyis kyang // yul la chags pa ma bting rab tu zhi bA 'ga' yang rtogs mi 'gyur// zhes pa de yi tshig thos te// ya mtshan bcas
339b4(skyes rabs): pa'i thub rnams kyang // de la gus pAs mngon phyogs te// kun gyis yongasu bskor nas gnas// de yi bsams pa 'khor ba yi// yongasu 'khor bar tshogs pa 'di// nges par rdzun gyi brtul zhugs kyis//
339b5(skyes rabs): rgyun du nyon mongs gdung ba spyod// mi rnams mya rI ga 'du byed dang // rnam shes ming dang gzugs dang ni// skye mched drug dang reg pa dang // tshor ba sred pa dang bcas dang // len pa srid pa skye ba dang // rga shi yis ni
339b6(skyes rabs): ngen par 'gro// sdug bsngal rang bzhin phung po 'di// shin tu che bar yongasu 'phel// rab zhi mkhas pa rnams kyi ni// me rig la sogs rim pa yis// re re 'gags par gyur pa na// gzhan yang gzhan ni 'gags
340a1(skyes rabs): par 'gyur// de ltar yid kyis nges byas des// de dag mdun du de lta yi// dam pa'i chos ni bstan byas nas// slar yang de dag la 'di smras// gang dag yid ni byams pa gtsang gyur cing // 6
340a2(skyes rabs): ba dag kyang dam pa'i chos kyis dag/ rab zhi 'os pas mtho ba de dag gi/ skye ba mya ngan+ta mi bya dga' bar bya// sa gzhi 'di dang na mkha' dang ni gdengs can dag gi gnas na yang // sems can gang 'khod de la
340a3(skyes rabs): gus pa'i tshig gis legs byas bdag don gnyer// snying ni byams pa'i snod du mdzod tsog blo gros dag gis chos dag bsten// lus can rnams la mi bzang mun par chos la sna gzhan pa'i sgron ma med// ces
340a4(skyes rabs): brjod ljon pa'i 'og tu ni// dau yi skyil krung bcing ba byas// drang po rab tu gsal ba yi// dgra bcom nyid de mngon du byas// de la des smras bdag cag rnams// shAkya thub pa'i gnas su khrid// legs
340a5(skyes rabs): bsrungs chos kyi 'dul ba la// rab 'byung bdag cag dron gnyer ro// de nas de ltar de dag gis// gsol btab rlos glos sne la 'phyangs// de dag khyer nas dge 'dun bsrungs// rdzu 'phrul che de mkha' la slong //
340a6(skyes rabs): de yi zhabs pad gnyis la ni// kun dga' ldan pa'i spyi bo yis// mngon btung de la thams cad bshad// de yi tshig gis thub rnamaso la// bcom ldan brtse ldan dgyes pa yis// yid ni rab dang bskyed pa yis//
340b1(skyes rabs): dam pa'i chos ni bstan par mdzad// dri med rab zhi rgyas pa ni// de yi drin lngas skyes de dag/ nyon mongs thams cad gtong 'os pa'i// mchod 'os dgra bcom nyid du gyur// de dag song tshe ston pa la//
340b2(skyes rabs): dge 'dun srung gis rab dris pa// bcom ldan+da kA paM rtsig sogs gzung // me tog 'bras bu mtshungs pa dang // thag mtshungs sbrul mya'i lhag ma yung // sems can bdag gi lam du mthong // rmongs
340b3(skyes rabs): pabasdu bcings pA de dag ni// de dag las ni ci yi 'bras// zhes pa dre yi gus pas dris// de la kun mkhyen gyis gsungs pa// de dag sngon tshe ston pa ni// 'od srungs zhes pa'i nyan thos gyur// dge 'dun khang
340b4(skyes rabs): pA'i kra ba dang // rtsig pA la dre ngur bsgrubs 'phyangs// gzhan gyis dge 'dun ljon pa lA// me tog dang ni 'bras bu blangs// dge 'dun zas dang btung ba la// gzhan gyi srung bas bgegs dag byas// gzhan
340b5(skyes rabs): gyi dge 'dun rnyed pa yi// dge slong dag la yongs bsgyur byas// de dag las kyi rnam smin des// rnam pa dri de nyid du gyur// bcom ldan gyis bshad de thos nas// de ni ya mtshan ldan par gyur// dgra
340b6(skyes rabs): bcom gnas thob dge 'dun srung // dge slong rnam sa kyis mthong nas ni// las de rgyal ba dag la dris// dris po des kyang de la gsungs// ston pa 'od srungs zhes pa yi// bstan pa la ni rab tu 'di//
341a1(skyes rabs): dge 'dun gtsug lag khang du sngon// zhalA ta byed pa nyid du gyur// gtsug lag khang na gnas pa ni// lnga brgya de yi grogs por gyur// lus kyi mjug tu smon lam ni// dge
341a2(skyes rabs): ba'i slad du de yi byas// skye ba 'di la dge 'dun srungs// de yi dgra bcom nyid thob cing // de dag thub pa lnga brgya po// 'di dge de dag 'grogs// lus can rnams ni dmar dang dkar dang gnag
341a3(skyes rabs): dang khra ba'i las skud kyis// rnam par bkra ba'i gos kyi lus mang dag tu g.yogs par gyur// lagu 'gro rgan po lhogs dman 'dor ba'i rig pa dag gis de btang nas// grangs med chu ba med
341a4(skyes rabs): pa'i 'bra' zhig gang der dge ba ldan pa 'jug/ ces pa de bzhin gshegs pa des gsungs pa// thos nasra dge slong de dag slong nga dag gus bcas pas// dam pa'i sems ldan de yi spyod pa
341a5(skyes rabs): dgra/ yid ni gzhan dang bral bas rab tu bsngags// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ dge 'dun srung gi rtogs pa brjod
341a6(skyes rabs): pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o// // phan dang mi phan las rnams sngon du sgrubs gyur pa// longs spyong dus kyis shin tu 'das shing nyams par gyur pa dag/ rab rgyas me tog mtshungs
341b1(skyes rabs): pas til rnams ngag bsgo ba bzhin// srog chags rnams la rung gi bag chags bzhag nas 'gro bur 'gyur// rdo rje'i gdan la sangs rgyas bdud rtsi'i zer// rdo rje'i ting 'dzin bcings las bzhengs pa'i tshe//
341b2(skyes rabs): rab 'bar ye shes rgyas pa lo drug gis// thob pa de la dge slong tshogs kyis zhus// khyed bral me yis gdungs gyur pa// glags 'dzin ma yi dku nang du// mngal ni chags par gyur pA dgra/ bcom ldan
341b3(skyes rabs): lo drug drag nas bcas// khyod mtshungs byis pa sgra gcan 'dzin// ces pa de ni skyes pa na// rgyal po zlas gtsang khros pa yis// 'di ni ga la skye zhes smra sA// sa bdag bka' yis de nyid nI// gsod pa'i
341b4(skyes rabs): sngar ni khrid gyur pa// spring yig gis bzhin khyod kyis mthus// dag pa de ni rab tu bsrungs// de nas khyod byin rdo nAng du// de yis byis pa nges par bkod// de yi bden pa brjod pa yis// rdo ba de ni chu la ldings//
341b5(skyes rabs): mi g.yem dag pa'i brtul zhugs can// de la gyos po khro ba skyes// sdug bsngal smad cing gdung ba de// lnga so ni tsI yi rnam smin lags// zhes pa dge slong tshig thos nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsungs pa//
341b6(skyes rabs): las ni gang gis grags 'dzin ma// sdug bsngal thob pa rab tu nyon// grong khyer klam+bi la dag tu// sa yi brgya byin dpal dang ldan// 'dod ldan ma yi me tog mtshon// rgyal po tshangs byin sngon byung gyur// g.yul
342a1(skyes rabs): du ral gri'i rgyun+da 'dzin pa'i// dpung pa yiswA ni rab bskyed pA// gang gis gzi byin me dag nI// dgra la mun pa rab ster 'bar// nam zhig nagasu gzhu 'dzin nges// sngon gyi rtse dga'i dge mtshan
342a2(skyes rabs): la// shin tu mgyogs 'gro d+hA yis ni// gcig pur byas te ring du zhugs// de yi 'gram par rdul gyi thigs// nyi ma'i zer gyis rab bskyed pas// rna rgyun mu tig rnams kyis ni// gzugs rnyan dag dang mtshungasmra par
342a3(skyes rabs): byas// lam nas 'ong ba'i ri dgas phru gu dge mtshan g.yo med kyis// yang dang yang du de la dga' bar kun tu lta byed cing // do shal rtse yau rin chen duma~M bur gzugs brnyan snang byed pas// skad cig bdud rtsi'i zer
342a4(skyes rabs): gyi gzugs kyi gnasna dang mtshungs par 'gyur// rje su chags ldan ri dwags mo dang glang mo la chags pa'i// maug+na zumau ri dwags gnyis 'thung rnams kyi rab tu brten bya ba// ri khrod mA yau sgra tshogs ma tog la reg dri
342a5(skyes rabs): bzang can// myos pa'i nags mtha'i rlung gi de yi ngal ba'i chu dge phrogs// skabs der thub pa chen po ni// shAM Ti l+ya yi gzhon nu ma// gci ba 'thungs pas mngal gyi sgo// thob pa ri dwags pho myo ni// mdzes sdug bdud
342a6(skyes rabs): rtsi'i rgyun ldan zhing // chu ni lan du 'ong ba dag/ mig rab g.yo ldan bsti gnas kyis// chu klung ngog su de yi mthong // dpal mo pad+ma'i dga' tshal la// dga' bas bzhin du pad+mo'i tshal// rkang bkod las skyes pad+mo yi//
342b1(skyes rabs): dkyil 'khor dag gis spro byed cing // sngon med dge mtshan ldan pA de// mthong nas mi yi dbang po ni// skad cig mig ni 'dzum bral bas// lha nyid thob pa bzhin gyur// nges bsams kye ma mdzes ma 'di// thub
342b2(skyes rabs): pa'i bu mo su zhig yin// ri dwags mo bzhin rab mdzes shing // yid 'ong lta bswa yi 'phrog byed// pad+ma can ni rkang pa nyid pa'i g.yog gi mtshams la dris par bskos gyur cing // zla ba nya ba'i bzhin gyi mtshan maM
342b3(skyes rabs): 'bri ba'i 'brangs nyid rab tu thob par byas// smin legs smin ma'i rnam 'phrul rang nyid kun las rgyal bar rab tu brtsam pA na// nges par 'dod pa'i gzhu yi 'khri shing dri ming yon tan med pa nyid la brten// 'di yi
342b4(skyes rabs): bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor yid 'ong bsil zer can dag gis// bkod pa ri mo'i rim pas dga' ba'i bdud rtsi rgyas par byed// mig dag rna ba'i rtsa bar shin tu byams par gyur pa 'di// ut+pal gsar pa rol pa'i rgyan gyi
342b5(skyes rabs): mdzes pa rab tu 'dzin// ces bsams de yis dal gyis ni// rta las yang dag byabs byas te// dge mtshan rta la myangon phyogs ma// de la btud de rab smras pa// legs byas rgya che mi dman pa'i// lha yi mgrin par
342b6(skyes rabs): gzung 'os ma// rnam rgyan nor bu'i phreng ba bzhin// ut+pal mig can khyod ni su// khyod kyi mdzes sdug dga' ba yi// tshogs ni rgyas par byed pa 'dis// su yi yid ni dge mtshon la// 'gugs pa nyid du byed ma yin// su yi
343a1(skyes rabs): rI dwags rgyud mu tig/ 'khri shing rab tu mtho ba dag/ ston zla dkar ltar khyod 'khrungs pas// rnam par brgyan pa rab tu smos// zhes pa de yi gus pas drisa?// de ni thub pa'i bur shes nas
343a2(skyes rabs): 'dod pa'i spyod tshul mi shes kyi bya// mngon parA 'dod ldan de yi sgras// rkang pas pad phreng rabya bskyed pas// bdagra ni pad+ma'i can zhes bya// ri dwags mngalnga skyes thub pa ni// shAM Tau l+ya yi bu mo yin//
343a3(skyes rabs): thub pa'i sra sa khyid legs par 'os// bdag ni khyod mthong rab tu dga'// shin tu yid 'phrog bkra ba yi// shing shuni brtul zhugs 'di ni ci// rma bya'i gtsugA phung lnga dag gyi sau// brgyan pa bzhin
343a4(skyes rabs): du khyod kyi ni// rabI tshogs 'di dgra lha las kyang // me tog dag gi rgyas par mdzes// skyu ru re ni rags pA yi// 'bras bu khe ba rab 'bar 'dra// bgrang phreng phred bu ring po yis// khyod kyi mgron la yon
343a5(skyes rabs): tan ming // 'od ma'i dbyugs pa 'khyog po dang // yal 'dab gsar pa'i phreng ba l+ya// khyod kyir-i legrA pa ku sha yi// d+hag byid bkr-i bas kun+da tu smras// legs pa bdag ying+ga ri dwags 'di// gang du ngal+la 'di bsos
