343a6(skyes rabs): 'gyur pa// dga' bar bya ba'i brtul zhugs can// khyod gnas ga na yod pa smros// zhes pa bzhin bzang ma yi tshig/ snyan zhing bdud rtsis brlan pa dag/ sa bdag gis myangs lam rgyags kyi// la du
343b1(skyes rabs): byin nas de la smras// sIn+d+ra legs khyod lus shin tu gzhon// shing dang rtswa ni skams gyur cing // ku shA'i khab kyi tshogs gtam s+ya pa'i// nags tshol 'dir ni 'os pa myin// 'dri nas+yA hA tsAng myi ring n+ya// bA ngag
343b2(skyes rabs): glonas longs spyod 'os pa'i dpal// gang na rnam par 'di lta yi// 'bras bu rgyad mang rgyas pa yod// der ni rnam par gnas par mdzod// yid srubs ngag gi dka' thub mdzod// skye bo mchog ni longs spyod kyi//
343b3(skyes rabs): rim gro dag la rnam par sbyor mig gsum rab tu khros tshe me yI lam du phye mA leb nyid gyur ldan pa// srog ni rab tu rdzogs par byed pos gsar du sprul pa 'di nyid yin bsnams te// khyod kyi lus mdzes
343b4(skyes rabs): nor 'dzin bdud rtsi'i zer gyi cha yi mdzod kyi rjes mthun pa// yid la skyes pa'i mdzes sdug mtshungs med dang po de ni 'di nyid gzhan ma yin// zhes pasi sa bdag 'dzangs pa'i tshig/ bzhin bzang m+b+ha yi thos nas
343b5(skyes rabs): ni// la du zla ba ltar dkar ba// myangs nas de la rab smras bya// khyod kyi brtul zhugs rjes spyod cing // khyod kyi gnas su bdag gnas bgyi// ji srid song nas bla ma'i bka'// don du gnyer la skad cig sdong // ces
343b6(skyes rabs): pa'i gros ni bsgrubs nas de// rang gi bsti gnas dag tu song // mngon 'dod gsar bas dbang bral bas// shu ni 'byin cing thub la smras// yab legs bdag ni thub pa yi// gzhon nu su zhig nags su mthong // shing
344a1(skyes rabs): shun mtha' ni bkra ba dag/ rab tu dang ba'i chu ltar mdzes// gang gi 'bras bu gzhan gyi tshogs// sdom par yongasu rtogs byed pa// de yi gnas su ra ba 'khrungs pa'i// 'bras bu
344a2(skyes rabs): mchog ni bdag gi myong // de yi dka' thub dga' tshal du// khyod kyi rjes gnas bdag mchi'o// de yi gzhung bzang la tshigs pa'i// bdag blo gzhan la dga' ba med// ces pa de laM tshig 'dod pa ni// gsal
344a3(skyes rabs): byed thos nAs ya mtshon zhing // lang tsho smyon par dogs pa yi// thub pas mdzes ma de la smras// khyod kyi mthong de lag 'gro ni// rIn chen gyis brgyan yin nam snyam// bu mo thub pa rnams dang ni// longs
344a4(skyes rabs): spyod can min lce gnyis min// yul bzhin yongasu gyur tshe sdug bsngal rab tu snum bcas lci ba'i lA du ni/ shin tu mngar ba dag gis 'osnga pa la ni don med dga' bar yongs ma byed// mdzes ma 'dod
344a5(skyes rabs): pa'i 'bras bu ro ldan nyon mongs dag gi bran pa gang de rnams// shin tu nges par dug dang mtshungs pa'i nyam su myong ba bskyed pas rgyal bar byed// tshur shog re zhig thub pa'i sras// di su ring nasna bdag lnga
344a6(skyes rabs): ston// ces brjod klung gi ngog su ni// de nas lhan thub pa song // de yi chu klung ngogasu ni// sa yi bdag po tshangs skyon mthong // yon tan tshogs ni rgya che de// mag pa dag tu 'os par bsams// mi bdag gis
344b1(skyes rabs): kyang thub pa ni// mthong nas skyengs pas bzhin dud cing // nyis 'gyur rab tu btud pA yis// ngeste par rab tu drang ba thob// thub pas rang la 'os pa yi// cho ga yi ni rab tu byin// de nas rab dga' bdu
344b2(skyes rabs): yi// bslabs te mi yi bAdag pos blangs// nam yang khyod kyis tshig gzhan gyis// 'di la khro bar mi bya zhing // mdzes mA 'di la bskyang bya zhes// brjod nas thub pas rang gnas song // de nas dga' zhing rta la zhen//
344b3(skyes rabs): chung ma dang 'grogs skad cig gis// rgyal sar yang dag phyin nas ni// rgyal pos dga' ston chen po byas// pho brang 'khor gyi sde kun gyi// gtsug tu sa bdag gis bkod de// sgyu rtsal mkhas pa'i rtsed 'jo la// bdag po'i
344b4(skyes rabs): slob ma nyid du gyur// de yi rkang pa bkod pas sa gzhi pad+ma sau brgyan pa mthong gyur nas// der ni rgyal po'i 'khor gyi lha mo'i sgra dge ji bzhin don can gzung // bsod nams ldan rdzi pa'i mchog tu khyad 'phags legs byas
344b5(skyes rabs): grogs ni rtogs gyur pa// ngo mtshar rgyas pa phul byung rang bzhin mtshan nyid rnams kyi gsal bar byed// pho brang 'khor gyi bud med las// phyi rol phyogs pa'i sa bdag dang // rtse zhing nu rgyas ldan pa dus// skal ba bzang
344b6(skyes rabs): zhing mdzes pa thob// de nas dus kyis nor 'dzin gyi// bdag las de yis mngal bzung zhing // pho brang btsun mo'i skye bo yos// bsam pos chags pa'i zug rngu yang // de nas khyim du mdzes ma ni// btsar nye de la
345a1(skyes rabs): mngon phyogs te// g+ha g+hu sdug pa'i phrag dog las// rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams kyis smras// mi bdag la 'os btsa' ba yi// cho ga rmongs ma khyod mi shes// ma yi mig ni gos dag gis// bsgrib
345a2(skyes rabs): la bu ni btsa' bar bya// zhes pa btsun mo gzhan gyi skyes// mang lha rgyus khur gyi gzir ba des// khyed kyis bdagu la 'os pa ni// mdzod rjes de dag rnams la smras// de nas de dag rnams kyis mig/ ras kyi
345a3(skyes rabs): dam du bcings pas bkag/ btso ma gser gyi 'od ldan pa'i// byis pa zung ni de la btsas// gzhon nu de dag sgrom bur bcug/ gos kyis dkris shing rgyas btab nas// bud med snying rje med rnams kyis/
345a4(skyes rabs): gaM byA'i chu la gsang ste 'phangs// pad+ma can gdong khrag gis ni// bsgos te de dag gis smras pa// khyod la dum bu g.yo med gnyis// btsas pa dag ni chu lo 'phangs pa// dga' ston rgya cher chas bcug cing //
345a5(skyes rabs): bu nI bAlta buR+Sha 'dod pa yi// swa yi bdag pos ci skyes zhes// pho brang 'khor bA rnams la dris// de la de dag gis smras lha// sras ni khyod dang mtshungs pa gnyis// yang dag 'khrungs pa lha mos zlas//
345a6(skyes rabs): zo mo nyid ci zhig brjod// 'di thos mi bdag bklag pa yis// pho brang 'khor gyi khang par song // lha mo bzhin ras khrig gis ni// sbags pa mthong nas bden par bsams// sa bdag rab tu khros pa yis// de ni
345b1(skyes rabs): bsad slad phyi rol btang // chun mu'i skyon du dogs pa yis// blon po mchog gis s+thaswA te bzung // de nas mkha' las shAM Ti l+ya'i// bsti gnas lha mo mngon phyogs te// mi snang bAr ni skye bo yi/
345b2(skyes rabs): mdun du 'gro ba bdag lta smras// khyod dpong bud med skyon med ni// bsad slad gtong ba khyed nyid kyi// rnam par mA dpyad bag myed kyis// grags pa rtsang nas byung nga mau snyam// nags kyi ri dwags bu mo rmongs
345b3(skyes rabs): pad+ma can ni chun ma yis// rang nyid bde slad bslabs pa 'dis// sa bdag khyod kyi yongs mi shes// 'byor pa'i sho za drag po yis// rtag tu byin brlabs sems ldan la// phal cher rnam pa 'di lta yi/
345b4(skyes rabs): blo gros skyon pa 'byung bar 'gyur// rje bos longs spyod kyis long rang bzhin gyis mod dpal gyi rnam 'phrul ldan zhing 'phyur// nu chung bden pa nyams pa'i sa gzhi bsod nams mngon par 'joms pa'i bya ba
345b5(skyes rabs): can// phra ma ldan pa rang mthun rmad byung smra byed mkho'u l+ya ri mo'i las sbyor rnams// gang dus nges par rnam par gnas pa des ni dam pa drang po ji ltar 'tsho// lha mo lus+t+ra mi snang ba yi// tshig de thos nas saM
345b6(skyes rabs): bdag ni// khros pas de yi byang tshul dag/ btsun mo'i tshogs la rab tu dris// khro bas non pa'i mi bdag gi/ bka' ni drag pos ngogs gyur pa// de dag gos ni byung tshul bzhin// bshang pas 'jigs pas 'khrul
346a1(skyes rabs): par gyur// chun myas bslus pa'i btsun mo ni// gsod sar rab tu btang ba dag/ skyon med shes nas mi yi bdag 'gyod pas gzir bas mya ngan byas// mtshungs par stobs rgyas chags
346a2(skyes rabs): dang khro// brtse bas ngo tsha m+b+ha dran dag/ rmongs pa'i grogs kyi yang yang du// de ni bskal bar byas bzhin gyur// kyi hud dga' ma khyod dang ni// phyi nas bsod nams dman pa bdug/ gang du 'grogs pa zhes brjod
346a3(skyes rabs): nanus// mi bdag sa la 'gyel bar gyur// de nas gAM gA'i rgyun thob pa// sgrom bu rgyal po'i rtags mtshan can// nye ba rgya yi mtshon rnams kyis// bzung nas sar yang dag 'ongs// de dag gis de mdun bkang
346a4(skyes rabs): cing // 'phral lnga mi bdag gis phye tshe// pad+mo gsar pa'i 'od ldan pa'i// byis pa zung zhig mthong bar gyur// 'od stong pa yi tha skar bzhin// gzhon nu 'dri dag mi bdag gi/ gzugs mtshungs mya tshun
346a5(skyes rabs): nyid rgya che bar// skyes zhes skye bos rab tu sgrags// de nas sa bdag mchi moM dang // bac+doMsu pas spras dag pang du blangasaM// dga' ma dang bral mya ngan gyis// gzir ba'i gdung ba lhag par gyur// de nas blo gros
346a6(skyes rabs): ring zhes pas// blon po chen pos de la smras// lhan cig khyod kyi btsun mo ni// chun ma'i tshogs kyis bslus pa 'tsho// de thos 'phral la rgyal po ni// 'tsho ba thob pa bzhin du langs// dga' bas ston zhes
346b1(skyes rabs): brjod na ste// blon po'i khang par rab tu song // der ni sdug bsngal ldan pa de// khro byas gus pa brjod gyur cing // smad pas kun tu yid byung ma// mthong nas 'gro ba'i bdag gis smras// gang gis mi bzung
346b2(skyes rabs): lhag ma 'di// dga' ma khyod la rnam sprul pa/ tshur shog da ni de dag rnams// bsod pa'i sdug bsngal dka' la ltos// gdung ba thong bya dang bar mdzod// mi smrar mthong du phyogs ma byed// ces brjod de yi
346b3(skyes rabs): rkang pa lA// sa yi bdag po rnam pa ra 'gyel// nu ma rgyas pa mchi ma yi// rgyan gyi brinA byed des smras pa// skye bo mi bzang gnod byed la// mi dbang khro bo yong ma mdzad// mi bdog bden par dga' dang
346b4(skyes rabs): bral bar byed pa rnams la bdag ni khro yong min// nges par+ra bzod pas dgra ni nye bar wI gyur khon gyi de nyid 'phel bar 'gyur// gnod pa sgrub la dgra ni khyab bladug ma yin nges par grogs ni/
346b5(skyes rabs): phan la myin// lus can rnams kyi bde dang sdug bsngal 'di dag thams cad sngon gyi las kyi sprul// gnod pa byed pa lnga yang gnod pa'i sbyor ba dag/ ma dbyed parA ni blo gros ldan pas mi bya ste// khras
346b6(skyes rabs): pas mchog tu khro ba'i dug ni 'phel bar 'gyur// ma nyid bsnan pas ma ni zhi bar mi 'gyuraro// re zhig sdug bsngal gyis gdung bdag/ yab kyi dka' thub tshal nyid du// 'gro de de tshig 'dod ldan ma//
347a1(skyes rabs): bdag gis sngon tshe yongs mra byas// badrag ni 'drod 'bras la chags pa lwa// dre yi rab tu bzlog gyur kyang // lang tshos myos pa'i skyon gyis na// zlog par ma gyur ci zhig bya// zhes
347a2(skyes rabs): brjod de ni shugs 'byin cing // rkang pa yis ni so la 'bri// skud cing bzhin rAs dud pa yi// mi smra ba la brten par gyur// mi bdag gis ni phyag byos kyang // dwe ni rib dang nyid ma gyur// rdzunau gyi skyon ni
347a3(skyes rabs): yongs gzung ba// mdza' ba'i zug rngu mtshungs par 'dzinA// de ni dmar ba'i bzhin bzung nas// yab kyi bsti gnas dag tu song // khyengs ldan rnams kyi khro ba ni// lag 'gro gya gyu de bzod
347a4(skyes rabs): dka'// bung ba'i sgra yis dge ldegs brjod pa yi// 'khri shing grogs mo rnams kyis 'khyud pa bzhin// ri dwags rnams kyi mdza' bas yongs bskor zhing // pha yi dka' thub na gsu de phyin gyur// dka'
347a5(skyes rabs): thub khyad par gyis bsgrubs 'jig rten ni// drang b.rarla thub pa bsod nams gterA song tshe// bsti gAnas stong mthong 'tsho ba mi bstan pa'i// pad+mo can ni rmongs pas bcom par gyur// rang bzhin rnal
347a6(skyes rabs): gnas pha yi gnyis gshin dang // skye ba'i bar ni nang du gcags pa dran// 'jig rten gsum bzhin stong par sems zhing de// dug gis gzir bzhin sbrul gyi bcom bzhin gyur// thub pas dman pa'i
347b1(skyes rabs): nags tshal de nyid ni// de la dga' ba draga' min nyid du gyur// dus kyi snying po ma lus 'thungs gyur pa'i// dngos po rnams ni 'bral ba'i rang bzhin yin// yid 'phrog yul ni de dag kho na dang // ma tog
347b2(skyes rabs): 'byung gnas nyin par de dag nyid// su zhig cig dang bral ba'i skye bo la// thams cad chags bra laM gnas nyid dag tu 'gyur// de nas sa gzhi dag gi zla ris de// rang byung rje su mthun pa'i chas bzung nas// bde bas
347b3(skyes rabs): bting ste phyogs su yongs 'khyams zhing // zhi ba bzhin du ba ra NA ser phyin// de nas rgyal po kri ki 'dod ldan pas// der ni ri dwags mig de don gnyer yang // dka' thub me lce 'bar bzhin de yi nI// ji zhig ltar yang
347b4(skyes rabs): reg 'os nyid ma gyur// rgyal po btsun mo rnams kyis rab 'bad nas// mngon par mchod cing lha mo bzhin du de// legs spyod sems zhing bdag po'i brtul zhugs kyis// der ni cung zang dus shig nye bar gnas// 'bral
347b5(skyes rabs): ba'i sdug bsngal me yi srog byed cing // de ni de na gnas pa sa yi bdag/ tshangs byin gyis kyang nyan rna bsrings las thos// bram ze'i chas su bcos nas yang dgra 'ongs// de nAs brtul zhugs mdzes pa'i chas kyi bsgribs
347b6(skyes rabs): tshul khrims grags pa'i ba dan de mthong nas// dang ba'i slad du mi bdag gus par ni// mngon du phyogs pas rang gzugs gsal bar bya// sa bdag bdag gi gnod pa mi bzad pa// zhes smra chen de ni yun rings dus// /
348a1(skyes rabs): khengs ldan rnams kyis spyad pa'i khro bA ni// brjod pa na yang gu sa ra pa nyid du gyur// stug po mchi ma'i rgyun ni yongs sel zhing // 'dod pa'i zla ris phyogasu 'bras ldan byed// rgyal po ston dus
348a2(skyes rabs): lta bus mdzes ma nI// dang bar byas nas rang gi rgyal sar khrid// rkang pa'i pad+mos bkod pa'i mtsho skyes phreng // bral ba'i dus su rab tu zhi gyur pa// dga' dang 'grogs tshe de l-i rab 'khrungs te// tshogs pa drag po'i longs
348a3(skyes rabs): spyod dpal 'byor bzhin// skye ba gzhan la nges pa'i bu mo des// rang sangs rgyas la rtse dga'i pad+ma dag/ phul nas chags pas blangs te de yi ni// mdzes pa dpyad nas slar yang rab phul te// pad+mo phul bas 'di yi rkang pa ni//
348a4(skyes rabs): bkod pa rnams la mtsho skyes 'khrungs par gyur// blas pa'i skyon las dus su bral gyur cing // slar yang phul bas slar yang byung bar gyur// byin dang len pa de dgra las 'khrungs pa// rang las smin pa yisna de
348a5(skyes rabs): skyon rnams la// pad+mo can ni gsod pa'i gnas bta ste// dus kyi da lta grags 'dzin ma yung ngo // de skad rgyalnga bas gsung bas gsungs pa thos gyur nas// dge slong de dag thams cad ngo mtshar ni// yongasu 'dzin
348a6(skyes rabs): pos ri mo bkod bzhin gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// pad+ma ldan gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa
348b1(skyes rabs): brgyad bla'o// / glang zhig spyod pa'i khyad par mtho ba'i mtshan nyid ldan rnams kyi// legs byas dag ni mchod rten ldan pa'i nor 'dzin mas sku zhing // mA lus dge ba'i smon lam gnas su gyur pa
348b2(skyes rabs): de dag ni// 'jig rten 'di dang ga zhan yang dag cing bde ba brtan par 'gyer// grong khyer pA tra li pu tra rA// gang zhig yang dag bskyangs bsrungs pas// 'jig rten mya ngan med byed pa// sa bdag mya ngan med pa
348b3(skyes rabs): byung // byang chub slang du khrus bsgrubs nas// gang zhig gser gyi char 'bebs shing // chos gos gsum ni 'gegs pa yis// dge slong dge 'dun mngon par mchod// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas sku yi ni// ring
348b4(skyes rabs): bsrel gauzi brjid 'bar rnams de nga // bla med dpal ldan gnas brtan ni// grags pa de yi mchod byar gyur// rin thang med pa'i rin chen rnams// gus pas bsdu ba byas nas ni// sa gzhi mu tig gdugs mdzes kyi//
348b5(skyes rabs): mchod rten dag gis mtshan ma bsgrubs// rang nyid klu yi 'jig rten du// phyin nas bAd+me gshegs ring bsrel tshogs// klu yis byin pa blangs nas des// rin chen mchod rten phreng ba byas// de yi mchod rten chos rgyal gyi//
348b6(skyes rabs): lugs dang ldan pa stong phrag ni// brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dus gcig la// sgrol pa yi ni rnam par mdzes// dus gcig rab tu gnas pa la// de tshe gnas brtan 'khor song nas// nyi mo bsgribs te sa gzhi ni// grib ma'i
349a1(skyes rabs): 'du shes dag tu rtags// de nas de yi dge 'dun gyi// mchod ston rgya che rtag 'jug la// rang byung dgra' bas 'khogs gyur pa// 'ga' zhig dal+la gyi 'ongs par gyur// dAr ni rgyal po lA 'os zas//
349a2(skyes rabs): sa yi bdagra pos rab springs pa// za zhing mchog tu dga' ba ni// bdud rtsi bzhin du de yi thob// dge slong gzhan gyis de la smras// rang la 'os pa'i bza' ba 'di// 'khyod la sa bdag gis byin pa// ci yi don
349a3(skyes rabs): slad khyod shes sam/ shin tu rgan pa khyod nyid las// dam chos nyan par 'dod pa yis// swa skyong gis ni bkur sti dag/ shin tu che bas khyod la mchod// ces pa bzhin 'dzum dge slong gis// brjod tshwa rmongs
349a4(skyes rabs): prAsa? do tsha zhing // myur du zug rngus phug po bzhin// dge slong rgan pos rabA bsams bya// ngo tshwa r-i'i slad du sdug bsngal mtha'// zas ni bAdagr-i gis ci slad zlos// tshigasu bcad pa bzhi cha yang // badrag gi myi shes
349a5(skyes rabs): yi ge med// dam rdzi pa'i dbus su sa bdag gis// gal te dros nas bdag ci byed// skye bo dga' zhing rgod 'di dag/ lkugs pa bdag la ci brjod 'gyur// sbyin bu khong stong byed pa rnams kyis ngal gyi sdong po'i rgyun
349a6(skyes rabs): ni gzhigs gyur cing // nang du mi dag nyal zhing du bas dri mar gyur pa g.yongs so'i shing yang sla// mkhas pa bzhin ras mdzes pas bcom pa'i rmongs pa skyengs shing zhum pas gnas gyur pa// lkugs
349b1(skyes rabs): nga long ba'i gzugs brnyan bag med du gnas skye bo bdag 'dur ma gyur cig/ de ltar bsam pa yongs 'dris shing // tsha ba'i dbugs 'byin bde med pa// de las lha mos sangs rgyas la//
349b2(skyes rabs): rab dang mngon du phyogs te smras// gung tshwa khyod la rgyal po 'dri// de tshwa khyod kyi 'di brjod bya// shin tu rgyu rje ldan pa'i choste// mdor bsdus pa dag mnyan par mdzod// nor ni cung zad tsam zhig phan pa
349b3(skyes rabs): byed cing bya ba shin tu nyung ba nyid// srog gi gzungs ni shin tu chung zhing ro dang bral ba'i zas kyis kyang // myigI dag gnyid kyi rgyu ni skad cig gis kyang 'di nyid rgyun du ni// nye mkho lhag ma btang nas lus
349b4(skyes rabs): tsan+da longs spyong rtsom pa rgya cher 'gyur// zhes pa lha mos yang dag bstan// rab gsal dbyangs can rgan po yis// sa bdagagu nyan du 'ongs pa la// chos ni rab tu bstan pa mdzad// snying la 'bab pa de
349b5(skyes rabs): yi ni// legs bshad rgyal pos thos gyur nas// kye ma mkhas pas brjod gyur pa// 'di nr-i badren zhes rab tu bsnams// blo gros chen pos bdag nyid kyi// ched du phan pa 'di dag gsungs// de nyid brjod pa
349b6(skyes rabs): dam pa'i tshig/ nyams myong bsod nams bdag gis 'thob// gang zhig mdzad rnams su ni me yi bud shing du mthong nor gyi nags dag bsgrubs// gang yang bya bas rgya mtsho bzhi yi gro can sna tshogs 'dzin
350a1(skyes rabs): pA khyab par byas// zas kyang rnam par bak+ku la yongasu 'dris shIng bdag gis gnyid kyang shin tu che// thams cad rmongs pa'i bde skad 'jug gi dus su gang du tsaM yang mthong ma yin//
350a2(skyes rabs): zhes bsam mi yis bdag po yi// de la rab tu phyag 'tshal te// 'od ldan mdzes pa'i chos gos ni// gser gyis rab tu smras pa phul// de nas lim+ba du be grong byed cing // rgyal po'i mchod pas mdzes
350a3(skyes rabs): pa de// bsam gtAn kha ton sbyor ba'i slad// lho mo yi ni yang dgu bsgyel// de nas de yi myan drag gis// de yI bAsam gtan bsgrubs pa na// nyon mongs ma lus zad po las// dgra bcom nyid ni
350a4(skyes rabs): mngon du bsgrubs// de nAs nam zhig sra bdag gi/ dge 'dun mchod skyon yongs pa la// dge slong chos gos lha yi ni// dri bzangs ldan pa gasngar+ya du 'ongs// sngon med dI la chags pa yi// bung ba'i phreng
350a5(skyes rabs): byas bskoR+ShA ba lA// mi bdag gis dris khyod kyis dris// rgyal 'di re zhig gang las byung // desu smras lha yi 'jig rten gyi// yongs 'du ljon pa'i 'og tu bdag/ dbyar gyi dus su gnas gyur pa// de yi ma
350a6(skyes rabs): tog dag gis bsgos// de thos mi bdag de yi ni// mthu la lhag par gus gyur cing // dkon mcho ga gsum mchod la chags pa// bsod nams kun rar dga' bar gyur// gal te gus par chos la dga'
350b1(skyes rabs): na de nyid 'tsho ba yin// galpa te skal bzang bden pAr+ya spyod na de nyid smra ba yin// gal te mthar thugs sems par byed na de nyid blo gros yin// gal te sbyin pa'i bya ba byed na de nyid dpal 'byor yin// zhes pa
350b2(skyes rabs): dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rno rtogs pa badz+ro da pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ chos kyi rgyal po rab gnas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o// // gang
350b3(skyes rabs): gi grags pa'i mtshon nyid khyad par rnam par bkod pa yis// sa bzhi bsod nams mchog gi bsod rnams ldan par ny+dzar+ya bskrun cing // rgyal ba la nI gus par rab bsgrubs big tshogs skyed byed la// de dag
350b4(skyes rabs): rnams kyi mngon 'dod legaso byas sbyor ba rgyal gyur cig/ dge slong nyi gung zhes bya ba// bla ma dga' bo'i tshig gis ni// kha che'i dkyil 'khor dag tu ni// sangs rgyas bde stan pa 'dzin du song// klu yI byin brlabs/
350b5(skyes rabs): de shes nas// sa gzhi 'dar byed de sr-i nI// snying stobs brtan ldan ting 'dzin gyis// klu rnams kun tu bskyod pa bsgrubs// rnam 'gyur khro ldan de dgra gis// mtshon dang me yi cher spros pa// mthu yI dau yi spyi bor ni//
350b6(skyes rabs): pad+ma ut+pal phreng bar gyur// de nas de yi brtson 'grus kyis// rab tu ya mtshan klus da la// smras pa ji srid skyi'i krungs bcas// de srid yul 'dir khyod kyi gnas// zhes pa brjod nas de la ni// skyil krung yangs
351a1(skyes rabs): pa ru bcings pa yi// tshad dang mtshungs pa stong pa yi// dkyil 'khor dug ni rab tu byin// der+yA ni de yi grong khye dang // grong gri khyad par 'god byed cing // dgra bcom lnga brgya dag dang ni// lhan ci
351a2(skyes rabs): rab tu gnas parar+ya bya// derA ni mi bzang bcom ldan chos dag rnam par bkod byas nas+ya// mdzes pa'i gtsug sgra lnga gi rgyan+da dang ldan pa'i 'dzin byed do// spos dang ljang gi ngos lngas blangs shIng snying po thob gyur pA//
351a3(skyes rabs): gur gum gsar pa'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi rab tu khyab par byas// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang po byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ nyi mu'i gung ba'i rtogs pa brjed pa'i
351a4(skyes rabs): yal 'dab ste bdun cu pa'o// // zhi ba la reg dri med tshul khrims ras dkar rtso dga' yi// mdzes pa bsten zhing yul dang chas las phyi rol phyogs rnams la// dar gos dag dang shA na'i gos hrul dri ma
351a5(skyes rabs): can gyis kyang // mngon par khengs pa bskyed min dmun pa nyid du sgrub pa min// shA na'i gos can dge slong sngon// yon tan ldan pa bla ma'i dko'i// rgyal bu'i bstan pa bzung ba'i slad// glong khyer bcom brlag
351a6(skyes rabs): dag tu zhugs// de ni lam du 'gro ba ni// 'phags pa'i rang bzhin gyad gnyis dag/ phan tshun rab tu brjod pa yis// zhar byung 'phags pa 'di dag thos// dri med tshul khrims gnas dang thos pa yi// mig dang
351b1(skyes rabs): ldan par grags shing bzod pa can// dge sbyong de drag nyid ni sa gzhi la// dge slong shA na'i gos can dag tu brjod// de brjod de nas de yis kyang // de nyid brjod thos de dag gis// der smras shA na'i gos can
351b2(skyes rabs): de// khyod nyid yin pAr the tshom med// ci srung shrI na'i gos can+da zhes// blo bzung khyod ni phyogs su glags// thub pa dam chos smra ba rnams// khyod kyi tshig su bcad pa sgrogs// des sgyus skye ba gzhan la bdag/ dman
351b3(skyes rabs): pa gso bar byed pa yi// rang sangs rgyas ni snying nad kyis// gzir ba rabA tu bsosau paR+Ya byis// dri yau shwa na'i gos dag ni// chung zhing rub tu rnying pa mthong // rgyal po la 'os mdzes pa'i gos// badrag gis rab tu gus
351b4(skyes rabs): pas phul// dri yi smras pa grogs po dag/ mdzes pa'i gos la bdag mi srid// shA na'i gos kyi rab zhi ba// sngags par 'os shing mdzes pa thob// ces pa de yi tshig thos nas// shA na'i gos rnying 'dod pa bdag/ dam
351b5(skyes rabs): pa'i grogs kyi chags bral thob// dam pa'i gos lngas phyir phyogs gyur// dus kyi de yi lus kyi mthar// mdzes pa'i mchod pa bsgrubs byas te// de mtshungs nyid ni thob pa'i slad// bI dag gis smon lam blo gros byas
351b6(skyes rabs): smon lam de dang de la ni// yang dag mchod pa yis kyang bau dag/ shA na'i gos dang ldan par skyes// shA na'i gos can zhesu grogs// zhes brjod bcom brlag grong khyer du// phyin ci dal gyi 'gro ba des// mgau
352a1(skyes rabs): chen zhes pa'i ri bo la// rtsom pa chen po bdag gis 'dzegs// der ni sa gzhi 'dar byed pas// skyil krung bcas te nye bar 'khod// char chen 'bebs pa'i klu dag ni// bgegs la chas pa rnam
352a2(skyes rabs): pU brtul// bcom brlag la gnas tshong dpon bu// nA Ta b+hA Ta zhes bya ba// grogs kyi slad du bzung nas ni// de yi gtsug lag khang par sprul// rin chen rab 'bar shel deng gser gyi bu gam dag dang ldan
352a3(skyes rabs): khri dang khri'u ma la stan dag gris spras shing mngon par dga'o// mtho risau lta bu sbrul bzang longs spyod gterarA gyi gtsug lUg+h+ra khang // bskyod namAM sa gnas pa de ni na Ta b+ha Ta zhes par gyur// zhes pa dgra bya'i
352a4(skyes rabs): dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpyag bsamu gyi 'khri shing las// shA na'i gos can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa gcig pa'o// / skye bo 'dod
352a5(skyes rabs): pa'i rdul gyis mig ni nyams pa kun// yul ni gang dag nyid kyi mngon par 'dod pa'iSh+Ti saR+Sha 'gyur ba// de nyid rje Sh+Ti bsod nams yongs gcod dag pa brten rnams kyi// yod nI rab tu zhi zhing chags rgyal ldan pa
352a6(skyes rabs): dag tu 'gyur// bcom brlag dag ni gnas pa sngon// sbas pa zhes bya spos 'tshong gi bu ni dpal dang ldan pa dag/ nyer sbas zhes par grags pa byung // shA na'i gos can dge slong gi// rjes 'brang ngo zhes pha yi
352b1(skyes rabs): ni// tshig gi ma skyes pA n+yas brtags// de ni de la gus ldan gyur// lang tsho gsar pa dang ldan de// chags bral la ni mngon phyogs tshe// bgegs tshogs brtsom pa nyams pa yis// yid 'byung gis ni
352b2(skyes rabs): bsam pa thob// pA yi tshig gis dus 'ga' zhig/ ha ri tsina? dwen gla rtsi dang // a g+ha ru dang gA pur 'tshong // tha snyed rnams ni dwe yi byAs// de nasu nor lhas byina? zhes pas// sposA n+ya nyo ru btang ba yis// rang ga
352b3(skyes rabs): 'bangs mos de yI gzugs// yon tan grags pa bshad thos nas// chags pa'i tshogs ni rab rgyas shIng // 'grogs po don gnyer smad 'tshong mas// mngon par 'dod pa'i pho nya mo// btang nas de la bsam
352b4(skyes rabs): pa bshad// dal gyi pho nya mos don gnyer// 'dzum ldan de yis der smras pa// de dang phyad pa'i dus 'di ni// bdag la mngon par 'dod pa med// de nas pho nya mo 'ongs tshe// slad 'tshong chags bral ldan
352b5(skyes rabs): par 'gyur// rje su chags pas rmugs bral ba// sgyed 'tshong ma la nges pa med// tshong dpon bu ni lang tsho ldan// nAm zhig de yi khyim gnas tshe// dpal dang ldan pa'i ngor mthun dag byung glo lam nas
352b6(skyes rabs): gsar du 'ongs// de yi mtshan mo longs spyong slad // gos dang bcas pa'i gser dag springs// brkam chags med pa'i smad 'tshong ma// ma dang bcas pa rab bsams pa// nor zad byis pa tshong pa'i bu/
353a1(skyes rabs): nA re zhig khyim na gnas// gzhan yang don gnyer nor chen ldan// bdag gi ci byade ma rig/ 'dod ldan nor ni skyugs pa drag/ phyin nas lhag par ster mi 'gyur// 'bras bu med par yod/
353a2(skyes rabs): rnyings pa// gyur pa de yaM ci zhig bya// gas pa mngon 'dod gsar pA las// ma bslangs par yang thams cad ster// drang por gus par ma mi mdzo' yang // mdza' bya nyam su myo bar byed// de slad nang du zug rngu
353a3(skyes rabs): bzhin// zhugs pa 'di la ci zhig bya// las kyi 'ching zhing rjes 'brang 'di// mu spyad par ni 'gro ma yin// gal te nor ldan 'di btang nas// bdagra cag la ni tshong khe med// chos phyir mau yin 'dod phyir min// bdag cag
353a4(skyes rabs): nor gyi phyir du sprul// zhes bsams nor ni don gany+dza ra ma// de yis ma yi gros kyis ni// chung mchog dug lhun bla pa yis// tshong pa'i bu ni rab tu bsang // de nas srog da bral bu de// phyag dor khrod kyi phung por
353a5(skyes rabs): sbas// dong dpon nang du rab bcug nas// de yi nor ni rgya che thob// smad 'tshong ma yi khAng pA ra ni// 'jug pa mthong ste phyor 'thon min// zhes te gnyen rnams kyis btsal bris// tshong pa'i bu ni srog bral rnyed// de nas dwe
353a6(skyes rabs): bsang gdung ba can// de dag gis gsol sa bdag gri// sdig drag la 'os chad pa ni// mi bzang smad 'tshong ma la bstan// skra grol gos dang bral ba de// gsongs yaM ni sar khrid de// log pa rkang pa rab bcad cing //
353b1(skyes rabs): rna ba dang ni sna yang bcad// rlung gi khrag gi 'dam la nI// gdung bas nyen cing 'gro ldog byed// sha za zlog cing 'phyon ma ni// 'bangs mor bcas pa mya dran byed// de nas de yi sdug bsngal ni// mi bzang nyer sbas kyis
353b2(skyes rabs): thos nas// de lta ba yi dus 'di zhe// brjod nas sa gzhi de ru song // zla 'od can de 'o ba ni// 'bangs mos bshad pa mthong gyuraru nas// sngon gyi mngon 'dod lkog ma yis// ngo tsha ldan zhing gya gyur gyur// bgra chags
353b3(skyes rabs): goms pa dag gi lam// 'ga' las nAng du rab zhugs pa// lus can rnams kyi chags pa ni// gnas skabs 'gaR+Sha yang gtong mi 'gyur// 'bangs mo'i gos kyis 'dab ma yos// 'odo mI sa ni rab b+hu sgribs byas
353b4(skyes rabs): shing // nu mur lug bkod bzhin ras ni// rab tung de yi de la smras// bdag gis 'bad pa chen po yis// don du gnyer yang khyod ma 'ongs// da lta skal pa zhan pa bdag/ mthong ba yis ni khyod lA tsI// gang tshwa bdag
353b5(skyes rabs): gi ljongs spyod kyi// skal bzad rnam 'phrul tsI yang ldan// dri tshe na khyod kyis ni// blta ba'i dus 'di min zhes smras// yan lag btsud cing khrag gi bragos// nyon mongs rgya mtshor lhung ba bdag/ blta bA yi ni dus 'di drag/
353b6(skyes rabs): pad+ma'i mig can khyod kyis ni// zhes pa smra ba zhing mchi ma yi// chu yis gos kyi mtha' dag bslad// rje su gdung ba can de la// dal gyis nyer sbas kyis smras pa// mdzes sdug zla ba'i grogs dang lus ni gser gyi chu shing
354a1(skyes rabs): mdzes pa'i rkun po dang // bzhin ras pad+mo zum byed mig ni ut+pa lA dag la dman pA ster byed pa// shin tu yid 'phrog pa de dag rnams la bdag ni mi dga' 'on kyang 'bad pas bA dag/ rnam par
354a2(skyes rabs): dpyad nas ro dang bral ba 'dod pa rnams kyi rang bzhin lta bur 'ongs// rgyan dang gos kyi rab bsgribs shing // dr-i bzang mchog/ gis rab bsgos pa// khyod kyi lus ni mdzes pa dag/ slar yang rang bzhin 'di 'dra gyur//
354a3(skyes rabs): sgra dang rus pas gang ba'i dbyibs can rtag tu me yi ni// yan lag ma lus rab 'tsheng rnag khrag dang ldan smad pa'i gnas// lus kyi ming can dur khrod sdug bsngal tshogs kyi gter dag la// gang zhig dga' ba
354a4(skyes rabs): de dag kyi hud kyi hud brlag par gyur// kye ma rmongs lngas 'di rnams ni// rnam par zag cing dri nga can// rnam 'gyur bug pas gang gyur pa'i// lus po la yang dga' ba bsgom// bde gshegs nye bar bsten pa las// lus
354a5(skyes rabs): kyi rnam grangs gnod pa can// mi bzung sgyu ma dag gi gnas// sdug bsngal phung po 'di zad 'gyur// rmongs pa'i mun pa dag gi nyin byed nyon mongs gnas skabs mtha' dag gcod byed pa// ston pa'i bstan pa'i
354a6(skyes rabs): gnas la gang dag gis ni dge ba'i grogaces kyi smon lam btag/ de dge lus zhes brjod pa'i dmyal ba dman po'i keng rus dra bas gang gyur cing // rgyu ma'i phreng ba rgyas pas dkrigs pa'i rnam 'gyur snod du slar
354b1(skyes rabs): yang lhung mi 'gyur// de dag thos nAs smad 'tshong ma// sdug bsngal gyis nyen chags bral can// zhi slad bsod namyas dkon mchog gsum// skyabs 'os dag la skyabs su song // de nus de yi nyer sbas kyi// gtam gyi
354b2(skyes rabs): rgyun zhugs 'bras bu thob// chos kyi lam la gus pa yi// badren pa mthong nas zhi bar gyur// de nas de ni lha yi tshogs// 'od dang ldan par skyes pa dag/ bcom+bo brlag dgu na 'khod rnams kyis// thos nas de lus
354b3(skyes rabs): sbyang ba byas// skabs der shA na'i gos can ni// rabA dang blo yi mngon phyogs te// nyer skyes rab tu 'byung ba yi// dus la byab par yang dag bsams// de na de yi rab phyung des// bla med dgra bcom gnas thob nas//
354b4(skyes rabs): grong khyer dog na gnas rnams la// dram chos ston pa'i rtsom pa mdzad// 'khor der chos ni bdud rtsi dang // bcas pA rab tu ston de la// bgegasna tshogs rnam 'gyur rab mdu ba// de dang dre ni bdud kyis byas// nyan pa
354b5(skyes rabs): snams nI gA yeng ba rnams// gang gi rnam par 'khrul 'gyur ba// mdzes pa gser dang bcas pa yi// di rA ni mu tigra char pa phab// de yi mi 'phrogs gaR+Sha mA khan+da ma// mdzes sdug 'jo sgeg gzugasau byas nas//
354b6(skyes rabs): dri za lha mo'i tshogs rnams dang // lha cig der ni gang dag byas// mdzes pa'i gar dang rol rtsed kyis// bde blag tu sems 'phrogs pa// gdul bye rnams kyi yid ni der// nges par 'dod pa'i rang bzhin du// de nas rnam
355a1(skyes rabs): par ma dul bya'i// bdud ni 'dul la brtson pa'i// nyer sbas kyi ni rnam 'gyur lA// 'os pa'i phyir bcos rab tu bsams// bdud la phyogs te des smras pa// khyod ni mkhas pa bdag tshim
355a2(skyes rabs): ste// kye ma gar dang kye ma klu// mchog nyid kho na ci zhig brjod// ces brjod phreng ba'i zol gyis ni// ro ni gsum dag de la brtags// mgo la sbrul gyi ro dang ni// mgrin par mi dang khyi yi ro// bdud des ro ni gsum
355a3(skyes rabs): po dwe ta rang gi dgrol bAr mi nus nas// dbang po nye dbang gdong bzhi dang // bcas pa'i lha la skyabs su song // des kyang dgrol bar ma nus tshe// pad+ma skyes kyi rab bsgral te// de nas dreg pa nyams pa'i bdud// de nyid
355a4(skyes rabs): la ni skyabasu song // shin tu dul bas nyer sbas kyi// rkang pa dag la des btug s+ya te// rgyugasdu pa btang nas rab dang bas// thal sbyar de la rab smras pa gnod pa byas pa bdag la ni// yang drug 'os
355a5(skyes rabs): pa khyod kyis byas// da ni khyod la bdag brten pas// khro ba thong la bka' drin mdzod// bdag gis gnod pa byas mod kyang // bde gshegs bdag nyid chen po yi swA// bu ni rnam par ma thul ba// pha yi bzhin
355a6(skyes rabs): du rab tu bsrungs// byang chub snying por rdo rje'i gdan// bsten pa de la bdag gi sngon// gnod pa yi ni tshogs dag byos// de yis bdag la bzod pa nyid// byang chub ting 'dzin bsgrub pa'i gnas der skyil krung dag
355b1(skyes rabs): nas bcas nas gnas pa'i tshe// rnam 'gyur rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa bdag la ra ba nyid ni 'dzin byed cing // khro ba bzod pas bkrus pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan dag pa nyid kyi bdag nyid can// bsam gtan
355b2(skyes rabs): mchog tu skyong bar byed pa de yis spyan yang cung zad phyi mya yin// khyod kyi snying rje btang nas dring // bdag ni rab tu skyed par byas// gnod byed la yang chen po yi// yid ni khro ba'i dri ldan min// bdag la ro dag
355b3(skyes rabs): btags pa mthong // khyod kyi bka' la bdag gnas so// dul pos de skad sgra byed pa// dri la nyer sbas kyis smras pa// gal te slar yang nyer tshe khyod// dge slong rnams la mi byed na// khyod la brtan par
355b4(skyes rabs): bcings pa yis// ro 'di dag ni bdag gis dgrol// gus ldan bdag la dgra'i bya ni// 'di yang khyod kyis rab tu bya// 'das pa'i bde gshegs rnams pa ni// khyod kyis yang dag bstan par 'os// kun gyi rjes
355b5(skyes rabs): mthun khyod kyis ni// zlos gar nus pa bdag gis mthong // bcom ldan 'das ni mthong ba dag/ bdag ni mchog tu 'dod par gyur// bde gshegs kyi ni chos kyi sku// thos pa'i bdag nyid bdag gis mthong // nges
355b6(skyes rabs): par mgo gi bdud rtsi'i'o rgyun// gzugs kyi sku ni ma yin no// zhes brjod de yi ro dag ni// bkrol ba me tog mtshon can gyis// de la smras pa bde gshegs kyi// gzugs dang mtshungs par byed mi nus// de lta na yang
356a1(skyes rabs): khyod kyi bkal/ 'dul ba lha gnas bdag gis bstun// khyod kyi bdag ni bde gshegs dbyibs// phyag 'os la yang phyag mi byA// zhes brjod bde gshegs rnam pa ni// rnam pa kun tu
356a2(skyes rabs): ba ster zhing // gser gyi snang ba rlig tu s+ho// mdzes pa dag ni de yi so bstan// spyan ni zung drug ring zhing bsgom gtan la cha gos sbyin mo'i 'khri shing rnam 'gyur bA li/ shangs kyi rgyud myi
356a3(skyes rabs): mdzes par chags shing gi ser gyi gdugs dang mtshungs pa'i mtshan ma can// rgyun med snyan gyi zhags pa ring zhing mdzes la phyag gi ljon pa kun tu 'phyang // sangs rgyas+t+ri ni gzugs dag mthong nas
356a4(skyes rabs): bsam pa med pa rnams kyang dga' bar gyur// bcom ldan sku ni mdzes pa de// mthong nas nyer sbas mchi ma dang // bcas shing spro ljong rgyus pa yis// de yi zhabs la phyog dgu byas// nges par bdag na
356a5(skyes rabs): phyag 'os min// zhes pa yod sbubs smra byed tshe// de la nye re sbas kyis smras pa// rgyal ba'i rnam pa khyong phyug 'os// bcom ldan sku ni bac+doMs mya yi// gzugs lnga yang phyug byas 'os// mkhas pa rnams
356a6(skyes rabs): nonis shing dang // khams la phyag de byed pa min// nyir sbas kyis ni 'di brjod pa// rab dang blo ldan bdud kyis thos// bde gshegs gzugs ni yongs btang ste// rang gi gzugs su rab tu bstan// de nas dul
356b1(skyes rabs): thong phan pa tshol// de yi yang dag bros pa yi// grong khyer pa rnams dam pa'i chos// nyan du nyer sgras drung du 'ongs// de yi nam dag gtam gyis ni// bden pa mthong zhing dga' ba yi// grong khyer na gnas 'bum phrag
356b2(skyes rabs): ni/ bco brgyad dgra bcom nyid dag thob// de ltar 'jig rten mtha' dag dge ba dag gis snang byed cing // rab rib 'phrog par byed pas chos kyi lam gyi myan ngag bsgrubs// rgya che dge ba'i rtsa bas
356b3(skyes rabs): bsod nams rgyas pa thob rnams kyi// rdzu 'phrul chen po grang de gzhan la phan pa'i don du 'gyur// zhes pa'i dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brdo rjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri
356b4(skyes rabs): shing lasa?/ nyer sbas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // nyams pa med pa'i dka' dang yangs pa'i dpal// grags pa bsil zer byed pa brgya ltar dkAr// dAM
356b5(skyes rabs): mtshar spyod pas mdzes pa'i mthu dag ni// bde gshegs mchod pa'i 'bras bu'i chu shas yin// grong khyer pa Ta lI pu tAR+ShA// rgyal po dpalnga ldan mya ngan med// byung ste gang g+hi sbyin pa dron// grangs kyi sgra yis
356b6(skyes rabs): dbul por gyur// nam zhig mdun ser 'khod de la// tshong pa gling du 'gro ba po// mdog kun nyams pa'i mya ngan gyis// gzir cing shugs rings ldan pas zhus// dpung pa'i gri bo ma ring po la// srid pa ngal bso
357a1(skyes rabs): lha khyod kyi// rgyal srid dag na 'ga' zhig kyang // re ba bsam pas gzir ba mthong // bskal pa nyams chung 'ba' zhig la// rgya mtshor gnas klu rnams kyis// bdag cag rnams kyi gzings
357a2(skyes rabs): b+hacag nas// rin tshon snod rnams phrogs par gyur// bdag cag rnams ni gzhan du 'tsho// khyab bdag de la btang snyoms ni// rgya mtshor 'gro ba tshang pa lngas// khyod kyi mdzod nyid skam par sgrub// ces pa de dag
357a3(skyes rabs): tshig thos nas// de dgu gdung ba 'phos pa yi// rgyal pos rgya mtshor srung ba'i klu// rnam par bsams nas g.yo med gyur// yid ni khro bas 'khrugs gyur cing // bcos thabs med pa de mthong nis// drung nas mngon
357a4(skyes rabs): shes drug pa yi// dge slong dbang po zhes pas smras// rin chen rkun po klu rnams la// khyod mthu ma ni gos byed pa// zangs kyi glegs bu lA bkod pa'i// spring yig sa bdag spring bar mdzod// ces pa dge slong tshig
357a5(skyes rabs): thos nas// rgyal po yi nI spring yig springs// chu gA tir dag tu 'phangs pa de// klu rnams kyi nI dogs su 'phangs// ma bkur ba des mi bdag ni// bzhin gyi chu skyes mdzes bral cing // bsam pas blo nyalnga dbugs
357a6(skyes rabs): 'byin cing // sna la sor mo bkod de gnas// ma ning la ni bud med bzhin// de lo gnyid ni phyir phyogs gyur// skam chags can gyi sred pa ni// ring zhing mtshan mo zlu ma gyur// gzhan don sbyor ldan de la ni// ni mkha'i
357b1(skyes rabs): lha mos mngon phyogs smras// sa skyongs thabs ni yod pa la// bsam pa bya bar mi 'os so// ga zhig phyag 'tshal yongasu bsngo bas tshur 'os bsod nams can+da// spyi bo thal mo sbyar bas mtshan pas rgyal
357b2(skyes rabs): laM mchod byed po// rnam par rgyal ldan de dag bka' yi phreng ba rnam bkra shing // dngos po mchog gis mdzes pa lha rnams kyis kyang spyi bror 'dzin// de thos nang par mi bdag ni// khrus byis brtul zhugs gtsang
357b3(skyes rabs): ldan pas// dog pa'i yid kyi sangs rgyas ni// bsams nas grub slad rab smras pa// snying stobs kyis 'dzum ro ldan snying rje zla ba'i 'od kyi re ba skong // mdzes shing mtha' drag mun pa zhi slad dkar po'i phyogs
357b4(skyes rabs): la rnam par gnas// rtag tu kun dgo' rnam 'gyur med cing mchog gi bdud rtsi rnam par spro// gdung ba rab zhi'i grogs po sangs rgyas zla ny+dza'i gzugs lnga phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig rtag tu yul gyi skyon lnga phyi
357b5(skyes rabs): rol phyogs gyur cing // rab mang pha rol phyin la brten pa'i sems ni dbang gyur pa// gzhan phan dgra la ma chog tu mngon zhen rten cing kun rtog gi/ dpag bsams ljon pa dri dgra bdag la dge pa ster

358a1(skyes rabs): dang // gzhan pa klu yi rgyal po yi// rnam pa gser gyi rang bzhin byas// de nas ngal bu dal bu yi// sa bdag gzugs ni dma' ba dang // klu yi dbang po'i gzugs dgra ni// ya mtshan
358a2(skyes rabs): byed pa mthong bar gyur// ji lta ji ltar mi bdug gis// rtag tu dkon mchog gsum mchod byas// de lta de ltar klu yi gzugs// dma' zhing gzhan pa mthong bar gyur// de nas rgyal pos spring yig skur//
358a3(skyes rabs): springs tshe klu yi gang zag rnams// ma lus tshong pa'i rin chen khur// phrag la bkod nas 'ongs par gyur// ma lus nor ni mi bdag gis// tshong pa rnams la rab tu byin// klu rnams btang nas rgyal ba yaM/

362a2(skyes rabs): phyag 'tshal rin chen me tog gtor// de dgra las ni 'phags pa'i rigs// yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes po// gzhan gnyis gdug pa'i rigs can+da te// de dag la ni dam+ba chos dag/ bcom ldan 'byung po
362a3(skyes rabs): dgongs pa yis// rang la 'os pa'i skad kyis bstan// gung gis de dag bstan pa yi// chos la rab tu mkhas par gyur// dkon mchog gsum la rab brtan cing // bslab pa'i gnas bzung de dag rnams// bcom
362a4(skyes rabs): ldan zhabs lnga btud nas ni// gzhal maung khang nus mtho ris song // de dag song tshe bcom ldan la// dge slong ya mtshanu skyes rnams kyis// de dag sngon tshe bsod nams tshogs// dris pA thams cad rig pas
362a5(skyes rabs): gsungs// klu ni dbugs chung dbugs chen drag/ sngon byung de dag dgra bo ni// 'dab bzangs gtsug ldan de bzhin du// mi Di'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'o// klu yi ston pa 'ong srungs kyis// bka' ni yang dag thob gyur
362a6(skyes rabs): nas// stobs ldan 'dab bzang dag gis ni// rdzi ber nus pa min par gyur// zhe sdang 'gran zhing mngon khengs pas// 'dab bzangs kyis kyang 'od srungs la// bstan pa rin chen bzung nas ni// dkon mchog gsuM
362b1(skyes rabs): la skyab su song // klu de dag ni 'phags pa'i rigs// yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes po// gdug pa'i 'dab bzang de dgA ni// mig mi bzang dang nor bdag 'di// zhes pa gsung bu rgyal ba yi//
362b2(skyes rabs): bsod nams gsung rA ba bdud rtsi ni// nags tshul de na gnas pa yi// thub pa ke ne yA kAsa~M thos// de yi mthu yi ya mtshan te// de nyid la ni skyabs su song // phyir mi 'od ni thob gyur nas// dben pa mthong zhing
362b3(skyes rabs): dga' bar gyur// dr-i yi tsha bo shi la yang // de bzhin 'dul ba lnga brten naswa// bden pa mthong zhing rgya che ba// phyir mi 'ong gi 'bras thob gyur// de dag kyi 'khor bcas bcom ldan gyi// bstan pa'i cho sla rab dang zhing // rab tu
362b4(skyes rabs): byung ba blangs nas ni// bsngags par 'os pa'i dgra bcom thob// de nas de yi lhag rnams la// bde gshegasuM bka' yi ka bi na// shA ri'i bu dang mr-id+gal gyi// bu yis kyang ni bstan pa mdzad// kaM ne ya ka shai la yi// ying
362b5(skyes rabs): rab dang mthong de dgu gi// sngon gyi bsod nams dge slong gis// dris shing bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// sngon gyi skye ba 'di dgra nI// bu ra NA sir khyim bdag gnyis// ang+ga a gAM na zhes pa// grogs po chos la dga'
362b6(skyes rabs): bar 'gyur// bla ma 'od srungs drung du ni// tshangs par spyod pa spyad de dag/ mthar thug smon lam ngag gis ni// da ltar rab tu zhi nyid thob// de ltar thub mchog bsod nams smon lam las skyes pa// de bzhin gshegs
363a1(skyes rabs): byas bshad pa dag ni thos gyur nas// rab tu zhi ba'i rigs pas srid pa'i lag 'gro ni// zil gyi mnan slang dge slong dge 'dun rtse gcig gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pA'i byang chub
363a2(skyes rabs): sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ ke ne ya ka'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa bdun pa'o// // gang gi skabs gsum la yang rtse ba dang ldan pa'i// mig ni zhi ba mIn pa zhi
363a3(skyes rabs): byed lnga dpa' ltung byed pa// chen po de dag rnams kyi mthu ni cher 'os chen po nyid// dge mtshan gyis ni rtse mo shin tu mthong ba dag tu mdzes// brgya byin 'dun sngar 'khod bya sngon// mtho ri se nas lhung mtshan nyid kyis// reg
363a4(skyes rabs): tsong seng ge'i gad no steng du// dga' ba rab tu thob ma gyur// de yi mgro la man+ta ra'i// phreng ba gser ldan mdzes pa ni/ bsod nams min+d+ra pras bsgribs pa yi// lang mtsho'i dpal bzhin nyams par gyur// de yaM thig le
363a5(skyes rabs): grags pa ltar// dkAr la nyams par bya ba'i slad// dngul gyi chu thigs gsar pA yis// dAn sgras bzhin du gnas dag byas// de yi sems ni bas pa la// chags shing ltung la nye gyur pa// dwe yi brtan pa phrag
363a6(skyes rabs): dog gis// khros bzhin rab tu ring bar song // mya ngan yongs 'dris de mthong nas// 'jigs pa'i ba de sogs kyis smras pa// ldang ba ngag la nye bar 'dir// rten ni rab tu bas ma par mdzod// 'jig rten rnams le rgung
363b1(skyes rabs): pa yis// bsgom bya min pa med ces des// gdu zhig nyon mongs thigs pa 'di// 'gro ba'i bdag po khyod la yang // nges par rnam kun phyir phyogs pas// 'bad pa yi ni btsal btsal nas// ltung ba yon tan
363b2(skyes rabs): la sred cing // chen po rnams dang 'grogs par mdzod// khyod bdag rang nyid 'dzam gling du// re zhig bobs l+ya khyod kyis ni// rgud pa srung bar bzod pa yi// dge slong 'ga' zhig btsal bar mdzod// gleng dag dge bas
363b3(skyes rabs): 'gro byed cing // dge ba nyid kyis sbyor byed pa// dge slong mthu nI rgyu che zhing // khyad par 'phags par grags pa tho sngo// zhes pa dga' ma'i tshigs thos nas// de bzhin zhes smras lha yi bdag/ sa la mngon phyogs nyon
363b4(skyes rabs): mongs ni// 'jil ba dge slong rna maso la dris// brgya byin gyis ni dri tsam+ba g+his// mthu yis mngon khengs de dag gis// thal mo sbyar byas de nyid la// phyag 'tshal bzhin rasa? btud par gyur// gang zhig bdog nyid la
363b5(skyes rabs): 'dud pa// de yi ji ltar srung byed gyur// ces bsamo lha yi bdag po ni// re ba nyams pas rang gnas song // dri nas de yi bde gshegs ni// mchog gi bdud rtsi thob shes nas// ltung la rab tu nye ba ni// yongasu skyob
363b6(skyes rabs): pa dag tu bsam// de nas de nau rjes 'brangs bcas// dbang po'i phreng ba'i phug nang na// de bzhin gshegs pa me khams la// snyoms gnas pa lta ru song // de nas bde sogs bdag po des// 'phral la phug
364a1(skyes rabs): dang nye bar phyin// zur phud lnga pa zhes pa yi// dri za'i bu la gus pas smras// de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// me yi khams lnga snyoms zhugs pa// khyod ni rlung gi sgyu rtsal la//
364a2(skyes rabs): mkhas pas rtogs par bya b.raro 'os// gang zhig dus min nyer 'grong dang / ma brjod par mi nA nang 'jug dang // bsnam pa shes pa min pa de// dam pa rnams kyis skyud pa'i gnas// zhes brjod lho rgyal po yis+ya/
364a3(skyes rabs): blo gros ldan pa dri za'i buSho bai DUr+ya'i dbyug pa can// rgyud mangs sgra snyan len du bcug/ rang bzhin gyis snyan yid du 'ong // bstod dbyangs dga' ba dang bcas pas// de yi rgyal ba sang byas te// 'phro ga byed lta ba'i go
364a4(skyes rabs): skabs phye// de nas lha dang bac+doMs pa yaM// mchod sbyin brgyu pa rab zhugs te// rab zhi bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa// dga' bya skyeng byed bde gshegs lhas// phyag 'tshal rab tu btud pa de// mgo yi myan+dA ra
364a5(skyes rabs): ba'i ro so// bston pa zhabs kyi sen mo yi// me long dag ni rab tu phyis// de nas rab zhugs de la nAM// gang gis bden pa mthong ba lo// chos kyi mig ni 'byung 'gyur ba'i// bka' drin rgyu lu ba de yi mdzad// yo sa
364a6(skyes rabs): ltung de yi 'phral la ni// ratsa gi stan nyid thob par gyur// bsod namos mthu ni de dag gis// ltung ba'i mtshan nyid rab tu zhi// ji srid 'tsho bar bang bar gshegs// skyab 'os de la skyabasu song // bdag ni rab thar ces
364b1(skyes rabs): brjod nas// de la zhus nas mtho ris song+ga// tum bu rub yi bu mo mdzes// zur phud lnga pa la des byin// dam pa rnams ni phan pa'i cha// bu lon bzhin du sems par byed// dge ba thob pas brgya byin+da ni// gsar du
364b2(skyes rabs): 'khrungs pas yA mtshan pa// dge slong gis dris+tha bcom ldan 'das// thams cad mkhyen pas deraro gsungs pa// grong khyer mdzes ldan dag tu sngon// sa yi bdag po bskal bzung gis// ston po log par dang
364b3(skyes rabs): sel gyis// sku yi mchod rten rab tu byas// de yi bsod nams skyon lam rdzogs ldan pas// rgyal pos dI ni lha yi dbong nyid thob// 'byor pa chos kyi bcings zhes gsungs nas ni// bcom ldan gsung ni rab tu zhi
364b4(skyes rabs): bar gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang phye byis pi byang chub seMs dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsom gyi 'khri shing las// brgya byin ltung ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yul 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //
364b5(skyes rabs): bud med blo yi srin mo rnams kyi blo gros rmongs byas shing // bde bya 'dod pa nyid kyis yid ni non+da la zhugs gyur pa// skyes buM glang zhig rab zhi dang bral zhi bar mi bgrod pa// de de nges par 'phrel+la la nyon mong
364b6(skyes rabs): dag tu ltung bar 'gyur// gang zhig na tshod phyed dag ni// thos pa brjod cing tshangs spyod sprad// bram ze 'tsho ba bde zhes pa// mnyan yod du ni sngon byung gyur// mdza' bas gnyen gyis gsol btab pa'i// rgan po sla
365a1(skyes rabs): ra khra bo dwe// chos kyi lam gyi ngo dag tu// bud med rab tu bzung bar byas// longs spyod gsar pa la chags de'i// chung ma g.yo ldan m+b+ha zhes pa// dar la bab cing myig g.yo ma// shin
365a2(skyes rabs): tu yid 'ong nyid du gyur// de nI de la rImA bzhin du// shin tu sred par smin par gyur// bud med mi gus lo chags shing // yang dag chags la chu gras brel zhing // de bsams kun tu mi 'phrog pa'i// rga bas
365a3(skyes rabs): sgra dkar ldan pa'i khyi// bdag gi ljang tsho'i dregs 'di la// bsod nams min pas nye bar gnas// rgyan po gzhon nu ma spyod pa// lus ni nyams pa go byed dag/ rga bas skra nus bzung byas te// gnyen g+ha shin gyis

365b1(skyes rabs): pa yis// bzod pa dka' ba'i dbul po nyid// khyod kyis lag pas drangs nas blangaswa// grang zhig rtsom pa la sngang zhing // drag po'i snyoms las dag la dga'// rub mang 'god pa'i rgyung ldan pa'i/
365b2(skyes rabs): khyimA na gnas pa des ci byed// grang du khyim+b+ha bdog snyoms las las// khyim gyi zu ru ni mi gtong ba// der ni bud med rmongs pa rnams// nor sgrub slad du 'byung ngam ci// gAng la skyes pas+thi ldan pas//

365b4(skyes rabs): dr-ig ni thur phug dri mu can na zhen+ta// khri dang mral sbyin rnam par nyams shing chu snod rmugs pa'i sgra ldan// 'bangs m+be yo byAd medo cing yun+da ring saM zho srub s+thA ni rdzogs parau 'gyur// de yis di badz+rod bram+ba zi da//
365b5(skyes rabs): nor la mngon par phyogs te song // bud med kyi sna ni dbyang byas rnams// yul gyi g.yung sa drag tu ltung // de yi nor 'dzin rgyal mtsho'i mthar// 'khyams nas sbyin pa thob gyur te// gser dang gos ni rdzogs
