369a2(skyes rabs): dga' ga la yod// skabs der sdom brtson brtul zhugs can// rab bzang mi yi 'jig rten gyi// ku shi'i grong khyer mtsho yaM 'gram// u dum+bA ra'i nags na gnas// de yi u dum+bA ra'i shing // me tog gsar pas
369a3(skyes rabs): khyab pa mthong // myig ni ya mtshan gyis rgyas pas// shin tu yang dag yun ring bsams// u dum+ma wa ra'i nags tshal 'di// rgyal ba 'khrungs na me tog dpal// 'byung bzhi 'khor los sgyur ba dgra/ 'byung na
369a4(skyes rabs): yang ngo bzhin du min// yang na bdag gi bsod nams kyis// rmad byung 'di ni yang dag skyes// zhes pa bsams na rab bzang ni// kun dga' rab tu rgyas par gyur// de nas slar yang lha yi bdag/ song nas rab
369a5(skyes rabs): dga' dag la smras// dam pa rang ga bya ba bas// gzhan gyi bya bar brtson pa lhag/ sa gzhi'i zla ba bde gshegs kyis// bstan pa'i 'od ni thums cod ni// rab tu gsal ba'i sa gzhi la// rab dga' tshur shog 'u
369a6(skyes rabs): cag 'dong // de la rab dgas smras pa lha// rgyud mangs la ni glu dbyangs rgyun// bdag gis rab tu sbyar ba 'di// phyi nas bya ba sla mi 'gyur// zhes thos 'chi med bdag po ni// yid la re ba nyams par gyur// 'bad med
369b1(skyes rabs): bdud rtsi nyer gnas pa// bsod nams dman rnams 'thung ba min// dus kyi u dum+b+ha ra'i nags// me tog rab rgyus dri bzang gis// phyogs mtshams kun tu khengs par gyur// rab bzang gis
369b2(skyes rabs): kyang mthong bar gyur// de yi bsams pa me tog gi// tshal ni rnam par rgyus pa 'di// sbyin pa dam chos ston pa dang // 'khor los sgyur ba rgyal lho 'gyur// yang na bdIg gi bsod nams mthus// ma lus tshal
369b3(skyes rabs): ni me tog rgyas// zhes pa sems pa de la ni// dregs dang dga' ba rab tu skyos// de nas ngagi sbyong dgra thob// sangs rgyas zhes bya ma don phyogs te// de ni rdzu 'phrul gyis brtul nas// rab zhi ring na rgyas par
369b4(skyes rabs): byas// de nas dus kyi bcom ldan 'das// rgyal bas 'gro ba'i don mdzod nas// yongasu myo ngan 'das la rtog cing // tha ma'i gzims mal dag la gnas// re zhig gdul bya 'dul bA la// rnam par bkod
369b5(skyes rabs): tsos rab tu bsams// rab bzang dang ni dri za dag/ rUb dga'u de yang bdaglu gis lhag/ rab byazad tshogs ni chung ngu yis// 'dul bu rab tu thob par 'gyur// dri za lang tsho 'byor pa yis// myos pa tshegs
369b6(skyes rabs): kyi 'dul bar 'gyur// zhes pa bsams nas de bzhin gshegs// dri za'i grong khyer dag tu byon// dri za'i rgyal po gzhan pa ni// mdzes pa lhag par mngon par sprul// bai DUr+ya'i dbyug pa can// rgyud mangs
370a1(skyes rabs): rgyud stong skyed byed cing // 'gran pa'i rab dga'i rgyugs pa ni// nyams par byed la brtson par gyur// rim gyi rgyudu ni bcud gyur kyang // de dag sgra dbyangs kun rdzogs pa// ston par byed
370a2(skyes rabs): pa mthu yis ni// khyad par me pa dag tu gyure// rgyud ni thams cad bcad gyur kyang // dri zo'i 'dren pa dag gis ni// dbyangs kyi tshogs ni rab tu bsnun// rab dga'i yis ni nus ma gyur// de nAs khongs
370a3(skyes rabs): dang dregs btang ba// de la bcom ldan rgyal ba yi sa// lus ni mngon phyung dag pa yi// dum pa'i chos ni bstan par mA dza // 'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri bo ni// ye shes rdo rjes rnam bco me te// de yi rgyun zhugs
370a4(skyes rabs): 'bras bu ni// rab tu zhi slad mngon du byas// dus kyi u dum+bA ra yI// nAgs kyi rab dga' me tog tshogs// rgan po dag gi longs spyod bzhin// dal bus rab tu nyams pAr gyur// me tog nyams pa de mthong
370a5(skyes rabs): nus// rab bzang mya ngan+ya brgyu yi thebs// nges pa nyid du bdag nyid kyi// bA saud nams min+d+ra las skyes par bA sams// bsam pr-I'i maM yi gdungas+ya de la// u dum+b+ha ra'i nags gyi dpal// lha mos mngon
370a6(skyes rabs): phyogs rab smras pa// don mod mya ngan yongs ma byed// mthu ldan khyod kyi bsod nams kyis// tshal 'di me tog rgyas pa min// khyod kyi bsod nams ma yin pas// nyams man 'di yi rgyu dag nyon//
370b1(skyes rabs): bde ga shegs nyid ni ladzu sa pa na// me tog 'di dag 'byung 'gyur to// b+hU mr-id shes brnyas pa na// kun nus rab tu rnam pan+d+ha rgyus// myu dran 'das la nyo bu na// nyams pa dang ni ltung bar 'gyur// kA sh+tsa
370b2(skyes rabs): drung n+ya de bzhin gshegs// yongasu mya ngan 'da' bar bzhed// nags kyi dpal mo'i tshig 'di dag/ rab bzang gri ni blo gyur nas// ring zhing dro ba'i shugs btang ste// shin tu yun ring yang dag bsams// ston+da
370b3(skyes rabs): pa'i chos ni 'dul bya la// bdag ni snod du 'gyur bar shog/ ces pa 'di ni bdag skying la// rtag tu re ba bcings par gyur// gang gis ston pa'i zhal gyi pa de// mthong zhing chos kyi gsung rab la// dag pa'i
370b4(skyes rabs): dga' ston yongs rdzogs pa// nyon mongs bral ba de dag bsngags// da ni mya ngan rab zhi'i grogs po mra bzung sred pas gzir ba'i gnyer// su yi bzhin rAs ri bong can las rab 'khrungs rab tu rgyus
370b5(skyes rabs): pa'i gsung // ye shes snang bas dkrigs shing rab mdzesde bsod nam+b+has bdud rtsi dag gi rgyun// skyid pa'i mya ngan gdung bar 'jig rten nyan pa'i snod kyi 'thung bar 'gyur// gang na bcom ldan rgyu
370b6(skyes rabs): ba bzhugs// ku sha'i grong du bangagi 'gro'o// tha mar de mthong bdag gis ni// gal te rnyed slar thob par 'gyur// zhes bsams spro ldan de yi ni// lus mi snang bar skad cig las// yid ltar mo gyo/
371a1(skyes rabs): pasA gyad kyi gnas// ku shwa'i grong khyer dag tu phyin// me tog dga' tshal sa la zung // zhes pa'i tshal na rab gzims pa// rgyal po'i sgor gnas dga' bo la// de nang du 'jug
371a2(skyes rabs): pa zhus// de nas dal gyi kun dga' bos// sor mo gdungs zhing g.yo bo yis// nang 'jug bsam pa zlog byed cing // chung chung sgra yi de la sgra// khyod kyi dri dang lung ston pa// rab bzang da lta gnas skabs
371a3(skyes rabs): med// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i slad// sku ni yongasu mnyel zhing bzhugs// skye bo 'di dag pha rol gyi// gdung ba mi shes rang don gnyer// kun tu ji ltar dwe lta yang // gnas skabs dag ni mi
371a4(skyes rabs): sems so// glang zhig yul dus mi shes par// 'phral la slong ba nyid gyur pa// de dag bzhed dron rab btang nas// ngo tsha blangs te 'gro ba nyid// rgyal ba'i sku ni zhi ba'i tshi nA ljon pa 'di dag kyang // yal
371a5(skyes rabs): 'dab 'khri shI dA rab tu nyal zhing nges par mi g.yo la// chu klung dag ni rnam par dud cing mgyogs pa btang na srA bgring // rlung yang de bzhin 'phral le rAb tu g.yo zhing bgrod ma yAn// de ltar
371a6(skyes rabs): kun dga' bo yi ni// 'bad pas yang dang yang du bzlog/ re bo nyi mas pas rab 'khrugs pa// rab bzang gis ni de la smras// gzir ba yis ni skabs mi shes// slong ba dang zhing brtse bar mdzod//
371b1(skyes rabs): rgyal ba rnyeng+ga sla rab tu ston// rtsub po 'di ltaR+Sha yongs ma mdzad// grib bsil dag lA nye byar 'khod cing bsil bas rab dga'i druga'u ston thob gyur pa// rtag tu gsar pa'i gsar pa'i lum 'gron
371b2(skyes rabs): 'dzegs shing 'bras bu 'dzin pas gzir ba'i shing // brten pa dag la gnyis gshin slong ba kun gyi gzhi ni rnyed slar gyur pa yi// lo maM dgra ni bcom dang dkrugs dang rab tu grags pa'i nyon mongs
371b3(skyes rabs): phreng ba su yi shes// de ltar 'bad pas rab bzang gi// yang dang yang du zhus gyur kyang // dgag pa brgya yis kun dga' bos// de ni kun laM dga' med pas bsgrubs// bcom ldan kun mkhyen gzims mal
371b4(skyes rabs): du// lha yi gyanas lngas mngon phyogs te// rab bzang nang du thong zhig tsos// kun dga' bo la gsung cher gsungs// 'jug pa thob ste nor med kyis/ gter bzhin bde gshegs mthong gyur nas
371b5(skyes rabs): rab bzang gdong ni mchi ma dang // bcas pas phyag 'tshal der gsol bya// bcom ldan de ring 'jig rten ni// skal pas dbul ba nyid 'di ci// de ring khyod kyi btang gyur pa// snang med dag gi 'gro ba ni// ga
371b6(skyes rabs): gnyen khyed dang bral ba na// su yi ye shes snang ba yis// 'gro ba'i pad+ma rmongs pa yi// gnyid kyi rgya ldan rgyas byed 'gyur// mtha' dge 'gro la rgyu mod du// phan pa dag ni rab mdzad nas// kun la rnyed pa
372a1(skyes rabs): sla ba khyod// bdag la rnyed dka' d+hi ltar gyur// ces pA de yi gus pas gsol// de la bcom ldan 'dzum ldan zhing // bzhin gyi chu skyes gzengs bstod de// rab dang mdzes pas
372a2(skyes rabs): bka' stsal pa// gnyen gshin rtagA tu mi rtag nyid// 'dri khyod rigs bya min nam tsI// 'du byed thams cad skad cig la// lus kyi gdong 'di su zhig 'dzin// gAng drug rtag tu nyin byeng 'khor bas rab
372a3(skyes rabs): bzlas pa'o// mtshan mos bkra ba'i nyin par ring du rab 'gro ba// mi yi 'tsho ba rnams kyi dge bo 'odi dag ni// rgyu ches dus kyi 'khor lo ltung bas gcod pa nyid// rI 'di snyil 'gyur chu gau ti re 'jigs ni mchog
372a4(skyes rabs): tu skam// rab kyis 'byung po dang bcas srid pa'i lam rab 'jigs// ri dwags skyug mig ltar g.yo snying po med 'khor ba// mang du yongs 'dri sa lus kyi tshogs 'di bArta n+ya ge nas min// zhes pa
372a5(skyes rabs): gsungs nas bcom ldan gyis// rab tu zhi slang rlab bzang la// bden pa'i lam ni gsal ba'i gtam// rab dang kun dga' ldan par mdzad// dbyig pa gsum dang ril pa'i tshogs// lam 'gron gyis ni
372a6(skyes rabs): khur bzhin btang // ston pa'i bka' la rab byung ni// de nas rab bzang dag gis blangs// de nas nyon mongs kun bcom pas// dgra bcom gnas ni thob gyur nas// bsams pa kye ma bdag gi ni// slob ma
372b1(skyes rabs): nyid 'di 'os pa min+da// bdag gi mdun du bcom ldan 'das// mya ngan 'da' ba ji ltar blta// de skad sngon du lus btang nas// bdag gi rang gi gnas dag brten// ces bsam byin brlabs lha dag
372b2(skyes rabs): ni// bsten pa de yi ral bu yi// gdengs can shun+de pa dor ba ltar// yong su mya ngan 'das pa thob// de nas dr-i yi lus spyod la// dge slong rnams dang mu stegs drag/ su yi tshangs spyod drang ldan zhesa?//
372b3(skyes rabs): rnam par rtsod pa yang dag skyes// dwe nas+thA mu stegs byed rnams kyis// de yis sgrub byed cho ga la// khyogs khyer ma nus song ba'i tshe// dge slong tshogs kunI dag gi bsgrubs// de nas de yis gdung tshig
372b4(skyes rabs): gis// mchod rten byas nas dge slong gi// snron la mr-i ngan 'das pa yi// rgyu mtsho nA bAde bar gshegs la drisa?// de drug la de gsungs pa sngon// ba ra NA sIr bram ze 'di// mya ngan med pa ston pa ni// 'od
372b5(skyes rabs): srungs srog mtshungasau grogasu gyur// mtha' yi ma lA stan lnga gnas bya// de las de yi 'dul ba'i chos// lha yis 'thob par bya thob nas// bsdigs par 'os pa'i dgra bcom thob// gus pa'i ngang tshul de
372b6(skyes rabs): yi lus// rang gi bla ma'i mdun du gtang // de nas der ni lha yi der// mthong nas smon lam rab tu btab// ji ltar legs byas ldan pa yi// 'od srungs sngon du yongs 'das pa// de bzhin bdag kyang bla ma'i
373a1(skyes rabs): mthar// ston+ma du 'gro ba por gyur cig/ lha de rab bzang 'di nyid de// rnam par dag pa'i smon lam dang // dad pa de yis legs byas pa// bdag gi mdun du lus dgu btang // ston pa
373a2(skyes rabs): log pAr dang sel+yA g+haM// mtha' yi gzims mal dag la ston// lha de rang gi khrid gyur pa'i// thub pa bar+m+ma phyug lta bgA ni// dgra bcom gnas thob gus pa yis// sngon du lus b+h+r-i tang mthong gyur+ya nas// rnam+b+ha pa
373a3(skyes rabs): de lta'i smon lham gyis// de nyid rab bzang nyid du du gyur// lus la rang bzhin gyis skyes pa// mthar thub nye ba'i gdung ba 'di// bzod par byed cig bdag gis dang // gdung ba med pa'i gnas su bkod// dwe ni mi
373a4(skyes rabs): byA dag tshongs byin dang // bdag kyang ltar gyur the tshom la// pU dgu ni rgyu mya dral bas kyang // de ni dgra bcom pa bsgral// krA n+yA ku ba d+hA'i nag suM ston// da ni ri dwags khyu bdag gyur// rab bzang khyA yi n+yad nas ni// bdug
373a5(skyes rabs): gis rjes 'brong ri dregs gyur// nags su su bdag kA n+ya ni// rngon po 'ongs pas bkag gyur te// chu klung ngogs su ri dgos rnams// skrag cing dga' ba myed par gyur// de nus chu klung nang du ni// g.yo med bdug gis
373a6(skyes rabs): rab tu babs// bdag gis rgyab tu rkang bkod pas// ri dwags 'jigs pa de dgas bsgral// de dag rmig pa bkod pas bdag/ nyams shing 'tsho bar 'dod gyur tshe// ri dregs de nyid cig po ni// de tshe rgyal
373b1(skyes rabs): zhing 'o b+hA gyurarA// skrag pas nyes pa de dag gis// gdung bas bzod dka' nags byas te// myur bar snying rjes yang dag bsgral// 'jug ngogs der ni shrI bar gyur// de nyid rab bzang de ring yang // gdung ba dang
373b2(skyes rabs): bcas bA dag gis bsgral// zhes gsungs bcom ldan zhi ba la// mngon phyogs mi gsung nyid la brte ni// dge slong rnams kyis rab dga' yang // dge ba thob pa'i rgyu mtshan dris// gus pas mAnyesA ga sh+yan kun
373b3(skyes rabs): mkhyen gyis// dal bu yi ni rab gsungs pa// ston pa 'od srungs dgu gri nau// dge bsnyen blo bzang zhes bya ba// de yi drin gyis bslab gnas ni// yongs rdzogs tho ba cing blo gnas gyur// de yis dri za'i tshogs
373b4(skyes rabs): kyis mchog/ glu dbyangs mkhasde pa mthong gyur nas// dri za'i bdag po nyid kyis nI// ched du smon lam rab tu bsgrubs// de ni smon+da lamya de nyid kyis// rab dga' nyid du nye bar bsgrubs/ kr-i bslab pa'i gnas ni yongs
373b5(skyes rabs): bzung bas// 'du lAM ba'i chos ni yang dag thob// rabA bzungs rab dga' 'di dag ni// bdag gis dge ba ldan par byas// gzhan gyi mngon 'dod byasna pa la// kun tu bAdagra ni gi dung ba med// grong khyer mchod 'os
373b6(skyes rabs): ces bya ba// mtho rigs dag dang mtshungs par ni// mi bdag dpal ldan brgya byin bzhin// rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya byung // bsod nams lo ni rab zhugs de'i// chos lam rjesu 'brangs pa yis// grong
374a1(skyes rabs): pa mtho ris bgrod rnams kyis// lha yis sa gzhi khengs par gyur// rgyal po de yis bsod nams mthus// mi yi mtho rnyis kun gang ga/ mthong nas lha yi
374a2(skyes rabs): dbang po yis// snying stobs shes 'dod sbyor bar byas// de nAs brgya byin gyis sprul pa'i// sems can gdung bas sa yI bdag/ de ni lus ni bcud pra yi// shr-i dang khrag dag tu bslangs// mi
374a3(skyes rabs): bdag blo gro sA rnam 'gyur med// de yi mye don 'dod rus pa'i lha// dr-i dgra rnams n+ya la byin nas ni// bAsam pa chen pos smon lamra btab// lus kyi sbyin pa'i bsod nams 'dis// lus can rnaMs
374a4(skyes rabs): ni bsgral ba'i slad// bla med yang dgra rdzogs pa yi// byang chub chen po thob par shog/ de nas brgyu byin drer phyogs smras// rgyal po rab gdung khyed kyai ni// lus ni rab tu byin pa la// rnam 'gyur
374a5(skyes rabs): byung ngam bden par smros// ces pa lha'i dbang pos dris// slong ba rdzogs pa su rab bskyed pa// dga' bos mig ni rgyas pa yi// mi yi dbang pos de la smras// gul te bdag ni gdung ba nA// rnam
374a6(skyes rabs): 'gyur med pa bde na pa des// bdag gi lus ni rma bsos shing // mdzes lnga ni rnal du gnas gyur cig/ ces pa rab tu brjod tsam gyis// de lus rab mdzes rnal gnas gyur// sprin da
374b1(skyes rabs): rnam par bral ba yi// rgyu skar bya dgra po'i gzugs bzhin no// myi bdagra rnam rgyal de nyid dang // gzhan gyi don la gdung ba med// ces pa brjod nas bcom ldan 'das// bsdam gtan la chags
374b2(skyes rabs): spyan ldan gyur// 'phral la ri bo bskyod pas bsrubs pa'i nyon mongs zer ma do dang der// lha tshogs ched du bdud rtsi'i chu gtAr bsam pa chen pos bzod par byed// dri myang yid ldan lus ni gnod pa
374b3(skyes rabs): dodang bcas tshe yang rnam 'gyur med// gzhan phan sgrub par chas pa rnams la gdung ba dag kyang bde bar spyod// ces pa dgro ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsum
374b4(skyes rabs): bye ba khi shring las/ rab bzung gi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyud cu pa'o// / legAs rmos zhing la rab nyung gang btab dang // byas shes dag la phan pa gang byas dang // yon
374b5(skyes rabs): tan dag gis mtho la gang byin pa// de ni lo mang stong phrag 'phel bar 'gyur// legs ldan nyan yod rgyal byed kyi// tshal du bcom ldan rgyal bas ston// gtam gyi zhar la nyer 'dus pa'i// dge slong
374b6(skyes rabs): tshogs la bka' stsal po// gang zhig rang gis spyad 'os pa// de dag thams cad 'bras bu bral// 'jig rten du ni dgra bcom pa// gang phul de nyid 'bras bur ldan// dam pa'i snod la yon tan nyid
375a1(skyes rabs): kyis// yon nI rab tu phul ba dag/ dam pa'i grogs bzhin mi bzad pA// yon+ta tan grangs med ldan par 'gyur// grong khyer pA Tu li pu tra'i// tshong pa tsan dan don gnyer ston+da/
375a2(skyes rabs): gzings chen dag la zhon nas ni// tsan dan gling du phyin par gyur// de nas tsan dan sa mchog tshogs// blangs nas dga' bste de dag rnams// de las phyir ni log gyur te// chu gter chen 'i dbus
375a3(skyes rabs): su phyin// rgya che dus min rlung chub kyis// bskyod pa'i dpa' rlabs stobs kyis der// dus kyi rtse dga' g.yo pa yis// gzings ni bsdams pa med par gyur// skyob pa don gnyer tshong pa'i tshogs//
375a4(skyes rabs): lha l-i bstod pa byed pa'i tshe// don mthun yod la reg pa dgA/ lhan cig gzings ni zhig par gyu// mi bzang srog lA the tshom med// don mthun 'dren pa bsod namAs sde// zhes pa 'ad ba dang
375a5(skyes rabs): bcas pa'i// yaungasu bskyob par rab tu bsdams// bdag gi khyim dang nye ba na// dge bsnyen chos kyi byang chub yod// de ni nyon mongs dus dag tu// ston pa rgyu yi mchog nyid bstod// ces pa yid kyis rab
375a6(skyes rabs): bsams nas// de nyid la ni skyabs song ste// ded dpon mtsho ma dang bcas pa// 'jigs zhing ngal-i bas lngab ljib smras// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyu yi mchog/ dge ba yi ni dpag bsam shing //
375b1(skyes rabs): nyon mongs can kun bde ba na// dgra bcom che la phyag 'tshalo// zhes pA de yi brjod pa'i tshe// 'phral la rgya mtsho'i lha 'ongs te// don mthun srog ni slararu byung nas// chu gter gyis ni ngogasu bsgral//
375b2(skyes rabs): 'jigs chen de las grol gyur pa// de dag rang gi yul du phyin// rgyu yi mchog lnga phyag byed pa// dus kun tu ni chugs par gyur// glanas skabs der ni ston pa dge/ rgyu yi mchog gi sgra la ni// las
375b3(skyes rabs): kyi lhag ma 'gru' yi rims// drag pos gdung ba gnas pa rau gyur// gang dag gzigs po srid pa'i 'jigs pa chen po'i sman gyis ni// 'gro ba thams cad legs par bsos pa nyid ni sgrub mdzad
375b4(skyes rabs): pa// de dag gis kyang rang la 'khri shing khyad par rab chags po'i// lhag ma lhag par gnas shing chags pa dag ni stong mi 'gyur// de yi drag por gdung ba ni// zhi slad tsan dan sa mtsho gA dag/
375b5(skyes rabs): rgyal po zla ba snang zhes pas// thams cad du ni btsal brtsams// sa bdag gis ni 'bum phrag bzhis// ded dpon de la don+da du gnyer// tsan dan sa mchog sna la ni// rnyed dka' srang gcig byin ma
375b6(skyes rabs): gyur// ded dpon nyid ni mngon phyogs te// dran pa tsam gyis phan mdzad pa// ston pa'i ska la tsan dan gyis// gus pa yis ni byugs pa byas// do shal dang ni kha ba'i tshogs// zla ba'i bsilo ba dman
376a1(skyes rabs): byed pa// grags pa ltar dkar tsan+dan des// rgyal ba rnal du gnas par gyur// de yis bsod nams mthu yis ni// dpalnga ldan pa bsod nams sde// zla ba'i 'od dang yan
376a2(skyes rabs): lag kun// rma byung dr-i bzangs ldan par gyur// de yi tsin dan rin chen sogs// rgya mtsho'i chu la gang lhung ba// de dag thams cad rang khyim dang // nye bar khrom pa'i nang nus byung // tshong pa rnams
376a3(skyes rabs): lA tsan dan sogs// rang rang dag la des byin nas// zas dang rin chen gos rnams kyis// khyim du dge slong dge 'dun mchod// do nas ded dpon dag gis ni// mchog gi mthu yis brgyan
376a4(skyes rabs): pa'i dpal// mthong nas mngon du nyer gnas kyis// dwe yi legs byas rgyal la dris// de nas bcom ldan rgyu yi mchog/ 'dzum dang bcas pas de la gsungs// ded dpon gyis ni tsAn dan gyis//
376a5(skyes rabs): ngal byugs pas dpal 'byor thob// bsod nams sde ni legs byas kyi// drang tshul dgu gi las de byas/ bdud rtsi nyid nI re bA 'thob pA// gang gis 'di dag rA yi thigs// dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyin
376a6(skyes rabs): pa na// skye ba tha ma dag la 'od// rab byung bla med yang dag par// rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur// bsod nams dag gis tsan ngan shing // yangs pa yi ni rtsa bar 'di// tsan ngan dpal zhes
376b1(skyes rabs): grags pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// de skad bcom ldan rgyu yi mchog/ ye shes spyan+d+ha dang ldan pas gsungs// zhes pa shAkya thub pa yis// gsungs tshe dge slong ya mtshan
376b2(skyes rabs): gyur// legs byas can gyi dad pa'i sbyin po'i che yi myu gu lo 'drab brgya yi oMs 'phel// dgra bcom zhing l+ya yang dgra btab pa yongasu smin tshwa chags bral phun tshogs 'bras// gang la skabs
376b3(skyes rabs): gsum bdag po dri med gdugs can drar zhing bso da nams dri yis rgyags// rab dgra'i grogs po phun tshogs 'di drag me tog gsor pa nyid du rab tu rgyus// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas
376b4(skyes rabs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpyag bsam gyi 'khri shring las/ rgyu'i mchog gi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yul 'ang bA ste brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa'o// // 'jig rten pho rol
376b5(skyes rabs): blo ljon don med bu la chags pa'i ci slad sgrub// bsod rnams gang rigs de nI rang gi byas te gzhan gyis byas pa spyod ma yin// glang gIs sdig lus mA lus rigs ni rnam par ltung zhing bzhin
376b6(skyes rabs): dman nyams byed pa// de dag mtshungs me da gdug pa'i bya ba la mkhas bu ni 'ga' yau rnam par bsgrubs// mnyan yod du sngon khyim gyi bdeg/ thos pa'i go cha dag gi ni// chung ma rgyal ba'i sde la bu//
377a1(skyes rabs): srid pa'i glo cha zhes pa byung // dal bu dral bus byis pa de// khyo shug de dag gis bskyed de// rigs rgyud khyad 'phags khyad par gyi// re ba rnam par 'god pa byas// dus kyi pha ni dus
377a2(skyes rabs): dbang du// song che srid pa'i go cha ni// mdza' zhing rmongs pas gzir bya yi// ma yi bskyed bsrings bsnyungs par gyur// khyim ches grogs po dag dang ni// lhan cigu rtse zhing ma bsdams po// lang cho dag la
377a3(skyes rabs): gnas pa de// gnyis 'thung lcags kyu med bzhin 'khyam// lag 'gro brgya lam nas 'gro do// dpa' bo ya ni bude med dog/ mdzes mA zhes pa khang bzung gi/ rtse mo dag na gnas pas mthong // mngon par
377a4(skyes rabs): skyed dang ldan pa des// 'dzi sgeg ldan pa rnam paR+Sha bltos// bzhin 'dzum ma des de yi ni// spyi bor me tog phreng ba 'phangs// khyim tshes dwe yi de dgra gi/ bsam+ba pya rnam 'phrul da bcas pa// mthong nas
377a5(skyes rabs): lcong sU spyod go byed pa'i// bArda rnams thams cad rig par gyur// grogs la mdzo' bas chags gyur cig/ gnod pa 'byung bar dogs pa yis// 'jigs pa de ni song gyur nas// srid pa'i go cha'i mA lnga smras//
377a6(skyes rabs): khyod kyi bu dang dpa' bo yi// bud med gsal ba'i brda dag byas// mtshan mo rnam par ma dul ba// dman min rgyu zhing 'gro bar 'gyur// mi yi ri dwags 'khor ba sdug bsngal nags tshal 'dir ni rgyu
377b1(skyes rabs): byed ts+tshing+ga// mchog tu longs spyod kyis 'khrugs ma lus bde ba'i rtsa la chags gyur rnams// 'jigs pa'i bya ba dang ldan rngon pa zhugs pa dgra tu lhung gyur to// mjug tu dug ldan
377b2(skyes rabs): rnon po'i mtshon rnams dag gi brlag pa thob par gyur// g.yo ba'i bsam pa dang ljon zhing // re zhig nyin par bdog gis srungs// mtshan mo khyod kyibasrung bar bya// zhes pa brjod nas
377b3(skyes rabs): grags po song // de nas khyim nang du ny+dza lA bu// sgo ru nyal ba'i sa yi ni// mtshan mi rab tu sad bzhin du// kun+da tu bsrung be la chags gyur// chu yi dag byed zol gyis ni// phyir 'byu zhu
377b4(skyes rabs): bir byed pa la// mdzu'u bas rmongs pa'i mi yaM ni// phyi rol 'thon pa byed ma gyur// des bsams kyi ma dga' ba yis// bud med rin tshun dang 'grogs la// b+h+r-i glegs ni skyed pa rau byed pa yi//
377b5(skyes rabs): bdag+ho gi mA 'di ci yis sbrul// re zhigu skal bAs pa ni bA grA/ lang tsho snga ldan bzhin shi bur gyur// bsod nams min pas sgrub dag ni// 'jigs rung ma 'di khyimu na gnas// gaunyid dang bral
377b6(skyes rabs): ma 'di la ni// gal te bad rtag gis 'gongs phyin na// 'di yi 'thab mo'i skye brjod kyis// skye bo rnams kyang snga pA 'gyur// mtshan mo phal cher yongs zad cing // mdzes ma ring la bdag ci byed// /
378a1(skyes rabs): skul ba dman pa bdug la ni// skal bzang ma de ji ltar mod// khang bzang nang du son cing rnam par blta ba'i ro lngas bzhin gyi chu skyes dud// rna ba'i ut+palA lhung bar
378a2(skyes rabs): gyur pas mig gi mdzes pa rna ba dag la steR+Sha// rna rgyan+ya 'od zer dag gis 'gum pa zung lA tra'i phreng ba rnam par 'dzin// mdzes ma de ni legs ldan da ga grI skal bA rnams kyis spyad
378a3(skyes rabs): bya'i sa ru 'gyur// de ltar bsam pas gzir zhing sgo// yAng dang yang du skrong byed pa// di lA me yin 'di nyid du// gtsang ba mdzod ces rab tu smras// de nas ral gris ma yi mig+ho// bcud ni s+ye de
378a4(skyes rabs): ni mgyogs par spyong // chags pas nyer bstan sdig bdag nyid// dran+da pa rnams lho bya min ci// mtshan mo ngal du ba ma rtsis pas// mdzes mA'i khang par de song nas// mkhas shing ljongs spyod
378a5(skyes rabs): la chags ma// de ni dben par yang dag thob// de le rang gi byas pa'i sdig/ gus pa'i slad du de yi bshad// gang gis rmad pa nyid 'gyur// de nyid kyis ni rmongs pa bsngags// ma bsad+ma sdig pa
378a6(skyes rabs): drag po ni// thos nas 'dar bar gyur pa de// gtum po la bzhin de la ni// reg pa shin tu phyir phyogs gyur// de yi gnas nas khang bzang la// 'dzegs pa'i zol gyis de song ste// sdig pa rnams
378b1(skyes rabs): kyis gus pa yis// sred ldan dag kyang chugs bral 'gyur// sdig pa las ni phyir phyogs ma// de yis ba gam mthon por 'dzegs// 'di ni chom rkun chom rkun zhes// 'jigs pa bzhin du skad cher
378b2(skyes rabs): bsgrags// 'khor gyi skye bosna rgyugs pa'i tshe// 'jigs pas nyen po der rab bros// ji srod rang gi khyim du stong // khyi rnams kyis nI tsa co byas// bdag gi ma ni chom rkun gyis// bsad ces skad cher rab smra
378b3(skyes rabs): zhing // snga dro dwe yis ma yi nI// lusA la stsogs pa sbyangs pa byas// rab bsgribs sdig pa'i gdung ba yI// sreg cing shin tu mi bzad pa'i// dmyal bar ltung ba de bsams te// 'byung po bzhin du sa la
378b4(skyes rabs): 'khyams// sdig pa smra byed de yi nI// phyir bco sna dris la gnyisau skyes kyi// smras pa ma bsung drag po yi// sdig pa dag la bcos thabs med// de nas rgyal byed tshul song bas// dere ni dge slong tshogs brjod
378b5(skyes rabs): pa tau/ sdig pa thems tsod nyams byed // chos kyi khya tonA rab tu thos// der ni blo ldi na rab byung ste// kha tron dag lnga mchog tu chags// de nas de ni sde gnod gsum// brjod cing chos kyi gtam can gyur// de nas
378b6(skyes rabs): kun mkhyen bcom ldan 'das// mngon phyogs dge slong tshogs la gsungs// sdig cen 'di la rab byung ni// khyed kyi ci slad yang dag byin// ma bsang drag por gyur pa yi// sdig pa de yis bag med 'di// 'jug tu
379a1(skyes rabs): tu mAnar med tsha byar ni// yun ring gnas la rab tu ny+tsa// de bzhin gla shegs pas de gsungs tshe// de yang mkhan po nyid du gyur// dus kyis dus kyi 'jug tu ni// 'ad+h+r-ig su rung ba'i
379a2(skyes rabs): dmyal ba thob// der ni mnar med tshogs 'khrungs pa// mi bzad me lce brgya phrag gi/ yun rings 'tshed par byed cing des// dmyal pa'i gnas ni skyo bar byas// dmyal bsrungs rab tu khros pa yi// tho bas
379a3(skyes rabs): bsnun zhing phye mar rtags// de yi ring nas sdig pa yis// me yis yongs smin lus zad thob// de nas de nI rab byung gi/ mthu yi rgyal po chen po dag/ bzhi pa yi ni lha rnamasu// lha yi rgyun gyi brgyan pa
379a4(skyes rabs): skye/ de nas dri med phreng ba cod pan dpung rgyanA do shal lngas// rab 'phros nor ni 'od kyi rmad byung dpal ni 'bri byed cing // l+yA yi bAstaun+d+ra byA r+d+hes 'brang 'od kyi rab mdzes zla bu wAr// mdzes pa de ni b+h+r-id+ma bAR+Sha
379a5(skyes rabs): gshegs la phyag 'tshal slad du song // de yi zhabs kyi pad+mo zung la gus pas phyug 'tshal tI// kun dga' 'phel zhing mdzes pa'i bzhin gyi pad+mo rnam par rgyas// ston pa'i chos kyi man ngag gtam gyi de ni
379a6(skyes rabs): myur nyid du// bdon pa mthong zhing yang ni rab tu phyi spu bzhin du gyur// sdig pa mtshan mo'i rab rib nye bar zhi ba'i dus su ni// yun ring nye bar spyad pas sdug bsngalo nyams pa'i skye bo la// legs byas snga dro'i
379b1(skyes rabs): dus ni dri ma med cing yangs pa yi// dge ba phul byung snang ba de ltar kun tu rgyas par gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing
379b2(skyes rabs): las// dmyal ba sngon ldan gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dra ba ste brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // myangal du gnas dang skye dang de nas byis pa dag dang ni// dar ba de nas ngal gyi rkun po nyid la brten gyur
379b3(skyes rabs): pa// skye bo mtshangs ming dus kyi glang pos phyung ba dag gi ni// las skung 'di n+ya padu skud tshul gyi nges par g.yo mi 'gyur// zas go tsang gis ni gus pas sngon// bcom ldan 'das ni mgron du gnyer// dge slong
379b4(skyes rabs): rnams dang bcas pa yis// de yI zas ni ra ba bzhes mdzad// de ni sa gsol rje sa rlob dang des// bzhugs te saM yi bdag po la// rje su bzung bas bdeg pa yaM// chos ni rab tu bstan pa mdzod// der ni de dus
379b5(skyes rabs): mthong ba la// byis pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyis de// dge slong dbus su yongs shes nas// yab ni la du dag gis mchod// de yi dus na bcom ldan la// byis pa gus pa mthong gyur nas// rab tu dge slong thams cad nA//
379b6(skyes rabs): dge mtshan dag dang ldan pas dris// las kyi rnam smin ci zhig gis// khyod kyi gzugs brnyan lus ldan pa// byis pa 'di ni lo drug dag/ dku ru nges par bsdams te skyes// ci slad lha mo grags 'dzin mas// nyin
380a1(skyes rabs): dang mtshan mor mngal gyis khur// shin tu ches pas yongs mnan cing // shin tu yun ring gdung ba bsten// dge slong rnams kyis gus pas 'di// bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen la
380a2(skyes rabs): dris/ skad cig bsam+b+ha s+ya nas de dag la// gsungs pa 'dir ni rgyu dag nyon+da// lus 'phags kyis ni mi thi lar// sa bdag me tog lta la ni// nyi ma zla ba zhes pa yis// bsod nams dang tshul bu gnyis byung //
380a3(skyes rabs): yAb ni mtho ris song ba'i tshe// de dag dka' thub nags 'dod ldan// rgyal srid chen po khur 'dzin la// phan tshun zhu ba rab tu byas// rnam pA kun tu chags bral pra// nyi mas btang ba'i rgyal srid ni// phu bo'i bka'
380a4(skyes rabs): yis bsdams pa yis// zla bas ji zhig ltar ste bzung // rgyal po'i drang slong nyi ma dre// zhi dag dka' thub tshal si nas// mchogau shes rgyal srid bde ba yis// shin+da tu yun ringasra dka' thub byas// nam zhig
380a5(skyes rabs): yongasu ngel gyur cig/ sgom pa drag pos gdungs pa des// thu ba yi ni bum pa'i chu// rmongs las ma brjod nyid du 'thungs// dran pa skyes nas mkhas pa de// ma byin len gyi sdig pa la// rtog cing bzhin
380a6(skyes rabs): ni logs gyur pas// 'gyod pa'i las rab bsams pa// las kyi zhags pas yang dag drangs// dbang med lus can rnams kyis ni// mi 'dod bzhin du legs byas sam// nyes byas dag ni thob par 'gyur// /
380b1(skyes rabs): skye bo logs spyad spyod cing dkar ba 'di yang nyes byas dag gi cha// 'dzin de gang gis bzhin raswA dri ma tsan+d+ra 'di mchog tu gdung b+hurar+ya byed// skad+ma cig skyid pa'i bde ba sdug bsngal tshogs la chags/
380b2(skyes rabs): pos 'phangasu rnam sa lA// lo 'dra ba brgyud ldan rgyus nang du zhugs te g+hadung ba ster bar byed// mi bdag sngon du bdag phyin la// sdig po bdag gisgra brjod pUR+Sha bya// rgyal po'i bka' yis dag pa
380b3(skyes rabs): rnams// bu loni med pa'i chos kyi tshogs// nad kyi gzir rnams sman pas gso// chosA laM zhugs rnams bstan bcos kyis// sdig pa las can rnams mi bdag ni// rigs gnas lugs can bla ma yis//
380b4(skyes rabs): zhes bsams yongasu gdung ba yis// sA bdag yun zla'i drung du ni// phyin nas de yis myur bar ni// mA byin blangs pa'i sdig pa smras// spun zla mthu bo mngon mchod de// de las bdag gis smras+t+r-i pa// skyes
380b5(skyes rabs): gnas dag pa'i dngos gyur pa// khyod la sdig pa yod ma yin// rigs mAn shin tu pU bA yang // rje zhog m+b+hir+ya stegs ged b+hAs+yA pa// ni da dur+N+Ne suM g+hadung byA 'dzin// de nyid de yi rnam dgany-i// tse
380b6(skyes rabs): pas bdag tshig thos nas// nyi mos de la rab smras pa// dam pa'i chos ni dkar po yos// gos la dri ma'i cha mi bzod// rgyal po chad pas bdeg tshal lo// shin tu dpyad nas sgrib par mdzod// ngog
381a1(skyes rabs): byed kyis bzhin rgyal po yis// chad pas sdig can gtsang byar 'gyur// zhes te 'ab pas lan mang du// rang gi chung pa don gnyer ba// de lta nu bo rgyal pos smras// nang par bdagi
381a2(skyes rabs): gang bzod byA// re zhig khyod ni skyed tshal gyis// nags 'di nyid du gnas parwa mdzod// ces brjod grong pa'i bya ba lA// sa yi bdag po phyi rol song // de nas drir ni thub pa dgra// nges par g.yo med
381a3(skyes rabs): gnas pa'i tshe// rgyal po daM yi byi be bArjed// nyi ma drug nas mngon par 'ongs// de nas rgyal pos phu bu ni// zas med rid pa'i rnam pa mthong // kun rmongs dag gi blo smod cing // dwe la rab tu dang bar byas//
381a4(skyes rabs): de ni bram ze dang bcas pas// de yi sgrog pa dag byas nas// nyin drug nyon mongs byon pa yis// dri song tshun rab tu gdungs// nga nyid rgyal po'i drang srong nyid// byis pa 'di yang rgyal po zla// nyin
381a5(skyes rabs): drug thub pa nyon mongs par// byas la lo drug dag ni skyes// bzang mo zhes bya ba rdzi mo// rgan mo grong khyer la phyogs te// bu mau ri dwags mo dag dang // 'grogs nas dor ba 'tshong du song // de yi bu mo dur
381a6(skyes rabs): bab mas// rang gi bum pa rab lci ba// ma rga na dag la byin nas ni// de yi bum pa yang ba bzung // mau ni rgan zhing nyams chung de// bu mos dpag tshang phyed dang gnyis// btang bas grong khyer nye bar ni//
381b1(skyes rabs): shin tu yongasu ngal bar 'gyur// grags 'dzin ma ni ba NI yis// bu mo ma yi nyon mongs las// rgyang grags drug mtshungs lo dag ni// mngal gyi khur gyis gzir bar gyur// mtho ris sa dang
381b2(skyes rabs): gdengs can 'jig rten byis dang lang tsho dang // rgan dang 'chi dus mngal gyi mal stan la brten dog la yang // lus dang ldan pa rnams kyi sngon gyi las ni lhan cig tu// 'gro ba 'dod pa rnam pa
381b3(skyes rabs): kun tu rlag par yongs mi 'gyur// de ltar sgra gcan 'dzin ni sngon gyi las ldan pa// ngo mtshar gtamA ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa dge/ nges par gzung nas dge slong tshogs dang swa
381b4(skyes rabs): skyod dang // skye bo dang bcas ya mtshan rab tu rgyas par gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ sgra gcan 'dzin
381b5(skyes rabs): gyi sngon gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'ang bye stau brgyud tsu rtswa gsumA pa'o// // gung gis legs pa'i yid canA rnams kyis yid ni kun dga' gnyen ldan rig par
381b6(skyes rabs): byed// gang gis mthu yis gdug rnams kyi yid yongasu 'dris po'i mun pa zhi bar byed// gang gis bsod nams grangs med grangs kyi tshig gi tshad kyi yul du mi 'gyur ba// 'gro ba thub pa'i
382a1(skyes rabs): mgon po rab rgyus mthu ldan de nyid gcig pu 'byung ba yin// mnyan yod du sngon khyim nA gnas// dpal ldan shin tu brtan pa yis// chung ma mig bzang ma dgra la//
382a2(skyes rabs): 'dod pa'i bu ni btsas par gyur// skyes pa tsam na rab 'khrungs pa// lha yi rin chen gyis brgyan po'i// khri stan rad+hi bsod nams kyis// mtshan la gang zhig nyer 'khod mdzes// de skyes
382a3(skyes rabs): tshe na chu 'dzin ni// mA nan+ti 'jam pa'i sgo dbyangs can// sbrang rtsi 'bebs pa'i me tog+ha dang // bcas po'i rin chen che raM pa phag/ rdzogs pa'i gzhon nu gus can gyis// gter ni brgya yis bskor bya
382a4(skyes rabs): dwe/ sbrang rtsi'i char pA bab pA lagyis// sbrang rtsi'i dbya ngas zhes bya bar gyur// rin chen char 'bebs de yis na// sa la dbul ba med nyid sgrubs// glang du'ang bya rog dkAr po bzhin// slong ba po
382a5(skyes rabs): nI mthong ma gyur// nama? zhig dge slong kun dga' byo// rab zhi 'phags pa'i lAm gnas pa// khyim du byon+da pA des mthong nas// mdun du pho la rab dris pa// yaub cig dri med dge ba can// 'dri
382a6(skyes rabs): yi brtul zhugs 'di ni ci// gang zhig yang dag mthong nyid na// 'phral la yid ni dang bar byed // ces pa buM yi tshig thos nas// shin tu brtan pas de la smras// bu cig snying stobs rab gsal 'di//
382b1(skyes rabs): zhi ba'i brtul zhugs yongasu 'dzin// gang zhig 'jigs rung 'khor ba'i mtsho las mtha' dgra 'gro ba'i zlum stegs drang po dang // khro ba'i nad kyis gso byed dag kyang zhi ba bdud rtsi'i snying pos
382b2(skyes rabs): sred 'phrog dang // skyon gyi tshogs kyi mun pa zhi byed nyi ma sangs rgyas 'od zer rab rgyas pa// de yi nyan thos zhi ba'i yid can rnams kyi mchog gyur 'di ni kun dga' bo// bcom ldan 'das kyi mngon brjod
382b3(skyes rabs): dag/ thos pa nyid sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs// sngar skye dge ba rgyus pa los// ba spu'i rab tu langs par gyur// de nas kun dga' dang bcas des// gus pas mngon phyogs phyag 'tshal te// dge slong tshogs
382b4(skyes rabs): bcus kun dga' bo// longs spyod kun gyis rab tu mtshig/ de nas 'dun pas de nyid dang // lhan cig rgyal byed tshal song nas// 'od zer phung po bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa
382b5(skyes rabs): mthong gyur te// pad+ma 'drab mA rgyas pa'i spyan// mchog gI mtshan nyid dag gris mtshan// mdzes shing yid 'ong rnam pa tsan+da// gser gyi ta la bzhin du mtho// bdud rtsis byugs pa lta bu ste// mthong nus
382b6(skyes rabs): dga' ba rab rgyas pa// de yi spyi bor phreng po bzhin// de yi zhabs sen 'od zer blangs// 'bad pas gsol ba btab pa yis// gus pa mnyes gshin bcom ldan 'das// dge slong de yi khang par byon// /
383a1(skyes rabs): mchod ston+da rab tu bzhed pA madz+nyA da// bcomA ldan 'das ni mngon mchod nas// rgyal byed tshul du gshegasdu pa'i tshe// skye bo'i tshogs ni rin chen gyis// sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs kyis
383a2(skyes rabs): yongs rdzogs byas// dbul po rnams kyis khyim khyim du// rang gi bsod nams ma yin pas// rin chen phung po de byin pa// skad cig nyid kyis sos phung gyur// de nas byung tshul de thos nusau// sbrang
383a3(skyes rabs): rtsi'i dbyangs ni sgrog bsngal zhing // de dag lA smros khyed kyis sngon+da// legs byas dag ni yongs ma byas// brtse bas sbyin pa ma byin zhing // dge 'dun mchod pa mA byas la// bcom ldan mngon par
383a4(skyes rabs): mya mchod pas// 'byor pa dag ni thob ma yI ni// dr-i smang+ga khyed kyis bde gA shigs la// stsogs po'i dge 'dun mngon par mchod// khyeng+ga la 'ongasA spyod dag gi tshogs// thams cad bdag gis phun
383a5(skyes rabs): tshogs bgyi// zhes po des bskul de dgA gas// dra yisau nyer bsgrubs tshogs rnams kyis// bcom ldan dge 'dun drang bcas pa// sdig pa zhi blo slad du mchod// de nas de tshe dge ba byas// sdig pa
383a6(skyes rabs): zad pa de dag gis// rang khyim reb 'bar rin chen gyi// phung pos rku can tu gang ba mthong // de nas chags brel bsad pa yi// blo dang ldan pa sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs// bcom ldan 'das kyis drung song nas//
383b1(skyes rabs): rab tu zhi slad rab byung blangs// ston pa'i bka' yis dul ba yis// brtul zhugs can gyis mnyan yod btang // skye bo'i mtha' yi gtsug lag khang // ri brag dag la brten par spong // der
383b2(skyes rabs): des bslab pa'i gnas byin+da pa// ri brag pa yi skye bo rnams// nyon myongs dug ni rab zhi'i slad// dkon mchog gsumo lha skyabasu song // gnas skabs der ni chom rkun+da pa// nags kyi mtha'
383b3(skyes rabs): na gnas pa rnams// dur go'i ya stags khas bla ngas pa'i// maM nr-i tshol ba dag la zhugs// phra ma can la rabya bstan pa'i// gtsug lag khAng der de dag 'ongs// sbrang rtsi'i sgra la 'dus pa yi//
383b4(skyes rabs): dge slong dge 'dun tshogs rnams bcings// yi stags slad du druge slong ni// gcig nyid kho na bdagu cag 'dod// chom rkun tshogs kyis 'di brjod tshe// dge slong rnams kyis rim pas smras// ya
383b5(skyes rabs): stags don du bdag zung la// dge slong thams cad gtang bar mdzod// ces pa rgan rim gyis brjod tshe// sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs kyis rab smras pa// nga nyid kho na yA sngags don// dge 'dun tha rims
383b6(skyes rabs): cad rnam par thong // zhes pa thos nas de dag gis// rnam par mchog ldan de bzung song // gsod par chas pa de dag gis// bcing sa khyer rnam 'gyur blo med des// du rga'i gnas ni nags nang
384a1(skyes rabs): du/ shIn tu 'jigasu rung ba mthong // de yang dus mtha'i sprin gyis bzhin// gtor ma la ni bstar byas pa'i// ma hA s+ye bo rags pa yaM// rtag tu ya sngags dag gis gang // dpa'
384a2(skyes rabs): bos bran du dzaM ba yi// rang bzhin me tog phreng spos bzhin// ru ru'i khrag gI zer ma brgya// zhabs kyi rdo la chags pas byas// gshin rje'i me tog rgyas pa yis// sgo la mchod pa byas pA bzhin// dril
384a3(skyes rabs): bu'i sngon du 'phyang ba yis// dpa' bo mgo yis yongasu bskor// r-I khrod ma yI rkang bkod pas// sen rtsi rab tu chags po bzhin// mi khrag gsar pos bsgos pa yI// skas dag gis ni dmar ba'i 'od//
384a4(skyes rabs): ya stegs ma thob rngon pa yi// bud med rnams kyis gus pa yIs// rang gi bu bcad snying gi ni// pad+mas khyams kyi kha khyer bkang // de mthong srog chags rnams kyi tshogs// sdug bsngal ngal dub
384a5(skyes rabs): bzod dka' zhing // 'khor bA chags bral snying po can// sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs kyis rAbA tu bAsams// de nas nyon mongs thams cad ni// yongs zud dgra bcom mngon du byas// khams gsum pa las
384a6(skyes rabs): chags bral de// dga' dang mi dga' mtshungs par gyur// nges bsams gang gi drin gyis ni// 'khor ba med pa bde ba'i sa// kye ma bdag gis thob pa 'di// ston pa srid pa gcod pa'i mthu// rmongs pa'i
384b1(skyes rabs): lcags sgrogs bstan pa gcod cing lta ba'i ri bo nyams par byed// mi bzad sred pA'i chu bo sgrol zhing skye ba'i ljon+da pa rab tu 'byin// gang du mya ngan mig l+ya slar yang mchi m+bA dag ni myi 'dzin pa//
384b2(skyes rabs): ston pa'i drin gyis gdung pa zhi bar gyur pa'i gnas de rab tu thob// ces bsams snying stobs rgya mtsho des// ri bzhin g.yo ba mod par gnas// khro bas mtshon blang chom rkun gyis// gsod rtags
384b3(skyes rabs): me tog phreng ba bcings// dwe lus gser gyi gzi ldan las// de dag rnams kyis gos dge bshus// gos ni gzhan dang gzhan byung ba// de drag mdun du phung por gyur// skabs de raM lha mo de yis ni// rAb
384b4(skyes rabs): bskyed 'byung po lnga brgya yis// chom rkun dag nr-i lde brgya po// rab tu g.yo ba med par byas// de dag mtshon+da gyi tshogs lhung tsho// sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs kyi spyi bor ni// mkha' las ma tigra dag gi charA// ran
384b5(skyes rabs): che ni rab tu mdzes pa bob// de nas mkha' lu 'gro bya yi// chom rkun rnams kyisu mthong gyur nas// de yi mthu yis reg pa yos// dri ny-id lA ni skabasu song // de nas babs te bzod pa'i slad//

385a3(skyes rabs): mchog gsal byed cing // dag pa'i dang ba skyed byed pa'i// tshe sa ni phan slad bstan pa mdzad// buM ni bdud rtsi'i gnod nyid thob// shes nas shin tu bstan pas kyang // legs byas las 'khrungs

385a5(skyes rabs): nye bar dge ba dar// de la bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa// rkang pa bkod pas gser gyi ni// pad+mo 'khrungs par khyod 'gyur ro// pad+ma'i mchog ce sna grags pa yi// yang drag rdzogs sangs rgyu sde 'gyur te/
