390b6(skyes rabs): bde gshegs brtul zhugs cod pan nyid du rab gyur cing // snying stobs dpal ni gtsang bas thig le nyid gyur pa/ tshul khrims mtshungs pa'i rgyan ni cung zad yod ma yin// zhes pa brjod nas rdul ldan do// gnod
391a1(skyes rabs): pa'i zug rngu mi bzang can// mchod pa rab btang myur ba dang // bcas pas snod stong nyid du stong // de nas sngags stobs zhes pA yi// smad 'tshong gtum mo 'dod ldan ma// dbang dgugs
391a2(skyes rabs): sogs la 'khrul 'khor dang // sngags dang rgyud sogs de sbyor ma// bos nas de la rang nyid ni// chags pa'i zil gyis mnan pa bshad// nor gyis tshim byas chags pa yi// gzir mes dga' dang 'grogs
391a3(skyes rabs): pa zhugs// de nas de yis 'phral la ni// sdug stob kyi drangs pad+ma can// dbang med de la mngon phyogs te// bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes smras// de la des smras bsod nams kyis// nyer gnas mdzes ma
391a4(skyes rabs): zla bzhin ma// mdza' mo 'di la rab tu bsten// yang na 'byur ba'i me la zhugs// pad+mo can gyis mdun du ni// me 'bar mthong nas gos bzhag ste// snying stobs dkar ba'i gos can gyi sna// mchod bar chas
391a5(skyes rabs): nas rab smras pa// gtsang byed 'bar bar bdag 'jug gi/ mi gtsang chags pa'i mir ma yin// chags pas bsregs pa'i skyes bu rnams// ste ba brgya yi rjes 'brang sreg/ ces pa de yi tshig thos nas//
391a6(skyes rabs): gtum mo re ba nyams gyur cing // bya min byas pas yid byung ste// rje su gdung ba dag tu gyur// de yis bzod pa'i gnas de lo// gus pa yis ni dang bar byas// tshigs bral zhi zhing bsil ba yi// blo ldan
391b1(skyes rabs): smad 'tshong ma dag kyang // chos kyis kun tu dag pa'i slad// de dag la ni cho sna bstan mdzad// gang gis nyon mongs kun zhi nas// de dag gi snga ni dgra bcom thob// dge legs ldan pa pad+mo can//
391b2(skyes rabs): ring nyid slob dpon nyid thob nas// mnyan yod grong du bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa lta ru song // der ni rgyal byed tshal bzhugs pa'i// rgyal ba des mthong phyug 'tshal nas// bya bi byas pas
391b3(skyes rabs): rung nyid kyi// spyod mtha' dge slong mdun du bshad // bcom ldan 'das lA dge slong gis// de yi bsod nams ya mtshanau driswa// smad 'tshong ma dang pad+ma can// gtum mo'i sngon byung rgyal bas gsungs
391b4(skyes rabs): sngon tshe ston po bcom ldan 'das// 'od srungs zhes pa'i bstan pa la// khyim bdag bshes gnyen zhes pa ni// rab tu byung ba nyid du gyur// de yi chung ma dga' mo dang // rab dga' me yang rab byung ste// mthu
391b5(skyes rabs): ni bdag po dang mtshungs pas// gtsug lag khang du gnas par byas// der ni de dag rtsod pa yi// tshig rtsub chen pos dge slong ma'o// tshogs ni yid dag byung bar byas// rang bzhin nges par gtang
391b6(skyes rabs): bar dka'// gcig gis gtum mo'i tshig dang ni// gzhan gyis smad 'tshong mar brjod pas// dge slong rnams smad pas dag/ byas pa'i sdig pa thob par gyur// de nyid gtum mor ngag skyon las// de
392a1(skyes rabs): bzhin gzhan smad 'tshong mar skyes// rab tu byung ba'i mthu yis ni// slar yang dge ba dag la brten// khyim bdag bshes gnyen de yang ni// brtul zhugs kyis bsdams pang ldan 'di/
392a2(skyes rabs): tshul khrims gtsang bas rnam rgyan cing // dgra bcom gnas ni thob pas mdzis// pad can skye ba gzhan la yang // me togo sde zhes me tog pa// me tog tshogs kyis slong bA yis// skye bo rtag tu khengs byed
392a3(skyes rabs): gyur// de yis rang rgyal longs spyod kyis// mchod nas gos kyis g.yogs byas te// pad+ma ut+pal kra da ra// me tog rnams kyis yang dag mchod// bsod nams de yis pad+mo tsa nAM// pad+mo'i snying po'i 'od
392a4(skyes rabs): mtshungs 'di// legs byas rgya che'i dri bzang can// bdag gi bstan pa la 'os gyur// gzugs ni tshul khrims kyis brgyan grags pa gtsang zhing zla bA lta bur dkar ba'i rigs sems ni dben pa yongs smin
392a5(skyes rabs): shin tu dri med 'khor po'i g.yon can phyogs zhi gyur pa// 'di dag mkhas pa rnams kyi bsod nams cher da ru mtshan nyid lta bar bzod pa yin// shin tu smad pa 'os rigs dang yid ni dri mA can yang
392a6(skyes rabs): mi rnams las ngan rtags zhes pa kun mkhyen gyis bshad pa'i// rmad byung las smin gtam dag gis// dge slong rnams ni dga' ba yis// reg cing ya mtshan rgyas par gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang
392b1(skyes rabs): pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dbyugu bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ pad+ma can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yul 'dab ste brgyud cu rtsa bdun pa'o// // shin+yA tu
392b2(skyes rabs): drag po'i dul po mthong nus 'phrog cing zhi ba nges par bzod mi byed// myur bar yIng dga' kha ba drang mtshungs mjug tu sreg par bzod pa'i lasA dig byung // bya min dgra lu 'jigs btang blo gros
392b3(skyes rabs): rab tu 'drug 'khor ba'i grogs mo bud med kyis// rmi lam dag dang mA tshungs pa'i rnam 'phrul mi bzad 'di dag thams cad nges par 'dzin// mi bdagau gzugs can snying po yi// grong khyer rgyal
392b4(skyes rabs): po'i khab tu sngon// nags pa zhes pa glang sde'i bdag/ glang chen stan gyi bu ru gyur// rgyal po'i 'byor pa dang mtshungs khyim// yo byad bcas pa yongs btang nas// chags bral la ni mngon phyogs
392b5(skyes rabs): des// gzhon nu nyid la rab byung bzung // de yi chung ma gzugs mdzes pa// 'byor pa rgyas pa'i khyim du ni// bdag po'i longs spyong dang bral bas// yun ring bsam pa 'khrugs par gyu ro// de
392b6(skyes rabs): dus kyi yongs 'dris la// gus pas mtha' ni rgyu/ byed pa// nag pa glang chen stan gyi bu// de ni rang gi khyim du song // de nas mngon du 'ongs de la// chung ma mdza' gcugs ldan ma des// rjesu
393a1(skyes rabs): 'byungs nas muchod pa ni// ston du 'gro bas mgron+da gnyer byas// lam ring gi dub bde med de// mthong nas de yis rab bsams pa// kye ma 'di yI mdzes sdug ni// lang tsho nyid kyis
393a2(skyes rabs): nges par bzung // natshodadu longs spyod 'os 'di laM// khyim gyi dpal 'di yongs tang nas// rnam par ma spyad 'di yis nI// rdzun gyis bdag nyid ci la gdung // gang zhig phyogs rjes lhung bcas pa yi/
393a3(skyes rabs): mig gis khyim la lta byed pa// da ka' thub can+da ni mdza' ba'i lha// du dung zhi ba min par nges// yang na dang por bstan pa nyid// yongs brtag bstan pa'i rgya mtshan gyis// 'di yi cha gas bral g.yo
393a4(skyes rabs): bu 'am// brten pa bdag gis shes par bya// khyim du longs spyod tshogs kyi tshim// thams cad nags tshal mngon par 'dod// dben par bde ba nya mas pa'i tshe// bdag nyid rje su gdung ba med
393a5(skyes rabs): ces bsams de yis de ni yi// mdun du zas kyi gnas skab su// sgra dang bcas par zangs kyi snod// b+ha gam rtse las rang gis dor+ya// sgra des kun tu skrag pa bzhin// skad cig phyogasu rnam par
393a6(skyes rabs): bltas// 'di ci zhes pa nag pa ni// 'khrul pas mngon phyogs de la dris// de nas dar bab bzhin 'dzum ldan// de yis zangs snod cung zad ni// lhung ba de la bshed byas nas// dga'
393b1(skyes rabs): bas slar yang rab bsams pa// re zhig rnam 'gyur med pa yi// gnas la gnas pa 'dis ma thob// 'di yi yid ni lhod pa drag/ rtse dwags myur du zhugs par 'gyur// gang zhig snod kyi sku
393b2(skyes rabs): tsama? gyis// kun tu skrag cing 'khrugs gyur+Ya/ rnam de pyong bral byas de la ni// yul gyis ci dang ci mi byed// ngang pa thums cad chu 'dzina? dag gIs sgra tsom las// sgrag cing bstan+da pA nyams pas
393b3(skyes rabs): bcings nas 'bros par byed// gang zhig sprin tshogs lci bar sgrogs la g.yo med pa pad+ma sten dang po'i rgyal po de nI khwa cig yin// zhus pa yid kyis ngesna byas nas// smin ma'i 'khri shring rol rtsed
393b4(skyes rabs): can 'dzum par smra byed de yi swA ni/ de la mngon phyogs ngal gyis smras// bdag ni rtsa bzhin rab spangs nas// khyod nI ring du song ba'i tshe// blang gA gi khyim ni chung mas bzhin// rgud pasu zil gyis mA
393b5(skyes rabs): la ltos// rtson chen 'byor pa 'di la yang // longs spyod drug ni rab sbyangs pa// bde med bdag ni grogs kyis bzhin// khyod mthong re ba nyid kyis bzung // yang dag brta par mi 'o sna pa// 'di ni
393b6(skyes rabs): sdug bdag gis brjod// mi smra 'dod kyang brjod pa 'di// lce yang rab tu ngo tshar shes// khyim bdag gis ni chung ma yi// tshul khrims bslad mthong de la ni// chags bral skyes pa ma yin nam//
394a1(skyes rabs): gzhan du dus min ji ltar 'gyur// zhes pa gzhan gyi yon tan ni// nyams pa bgrang ba la mkhas pa'i// bzhin mdzum skye bo thams cad ni// phan tshun rnam par lta zhing smras//
394a2(skyes rabs): 'brel bas gdung ba bdagra la ni// 'jig rten sem so zhes par 'dzin// dar ma nyon mongs dag la yang // ma nyams gzugs bdag ci zhig bya// khyim du g.yog 'khor 'di dag kyang // bdag la shin
394a3(skyes rabs): tu ma bsdams gyur// bud med bdag po med rnams kyi// mdun du khyi yang rab tu rgod// bdag gi lhag ma nyid kyis ni// rab tu bsos pa 'bangs phrug 'di// bka' bsgos khros pas bdag gis ni// skra
394a4(skyes rabs): nas 'dren pas 'dod la ltos// zhes pa brjod nas brda byas te// bdag po'i sems ni rnam 'gyur smad/ rlung gi 'brangs kyis zil gnon pa// de yis mngon sum nyid du bstan// ma nyams gzugs zhes
394a5(skyes rabs): chags pa dang // bde ba med ces 'khrugs pa dang // rmed par gyur ces phrag dog dang // 'bangs kyis gzir ces khro ba yang // thob nas dri la lta byed cing // brtul zhugs kyis bsdams btang pa de// mtshungs
394a6(skyes rabs): par 'khor ba'i skyon rnams ni// thams cad dag gi dbang du gyur// lhang bzang chos gos rab btang zhing // 'jigs ru pa ral gri phyung nas ni// dga' ma'i gnod pa la khros pas// de yis 'bangs ni gsod
394b1(skyes rabs): par zhugs// 'brangs ni gsod pa'i sdig pa las// chung masu 'bad nas bzlog pa des// dgra las rgyal 'dod khyim gyi ni// byade dman pas slar yang bsten// de ni longs spyod yongasu bzung bas
394b2(skyes rabs): bud med longs spyod skal bzangs gzhir gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs gnod pa'i gtam gyi rgyu las g.yog 'khor rnams la khro byas 'khrugs// 'dod pas dul ba nyams byed khro bas skad cig nyid
394b3(skyes rabs): kyis bzod pa rlag pa byed// blun gyi brtul zhugs dag gis gdung ba'i yid kyis chags bral nyid ni thob ma yin// de nas rgyal pos glang chen gyis// sna chen gnas ni slar yang byin// 'byor pa rgya che
394b4(skyes rabs): thob gyur nas// de nas lhog par rgyas por gyur// skabs der grong khye nang dag nas// dge slong rnams kyis bsod snyoms blangs// bcom ldan rgyal ba nags tshil na// gnas pa dag la mngon phyogs te// chags
394b5(skyes rabs): bral bzhin gyis de lA ni// phyag 'tshal glang chen stan gyi bu// nag pa dag gi brtul zhugs ni// 'os pa min pa rnam par bshad// de nas bcom ldan thams cad du mkhyen// 'dzum dang ldan pas der gsungs
394b6(skyes rabs): pa/ de yi dge ba ma smin pas// brtul zhugs dag ni blang bar byas// gang zhig dben pa smin cing rdzogs pa'i brtag pas yid kyi 'khri shing skams gyur pa// de dge phyi nas yul gyi nyi mas myong rnying par
395a1(skyes rabs): dran pa'i dbang du gyur pa yin// gang zhig don gyis bkag cing khengs pas lhod la rgyun du gus pa rab btang ba// de dag 'dod dang zhi ba'i blar mtshams dag la yid ni 'byung
395a2(skyes rabs): mo yug par byed// gang gis g.yang slar lhung ba'i mkhas pa rnams kyang dul ba dag la ni yongs gto tshong zhing // chags pa'i dug rgyas rnal 'byor can rnams mi bzang glags rums la 'jug par
395a3(skyes rabs): byed// skye bar goms pas chags shing yuM la gyi reg pa mchog tu mngon par 'dod gyur pa// rnam 'gyur mda' yi chur drag dkrigs pa'i tshe// 'dod pa 'di ni su lnga bzod par byed// ces pa brjod
395a4(skyes rabs): nas bcom ldan 'das rgyul bu nag pa'i khyum byon nas// sku yi 'od kyis phyi rol gyi rab rib rnam par 'joms shing slar// rjesu bzung ba'i snang ba yis// de yi yid ni dri med modzad// phyug dang bsnyen
395a5(skyes rabs): bkur byas pa des// rang nyid kyi ni gnas su khrid// da ru ni sla yang gus pa yos// sgrol med rab byung de yis bsten// grub slad rgyal bas dag pa yi// dam pa'i chos ni rab bstan mdzad// nyon mongs
395a6(skyes rabs): thams cad rab zad pa// de ni dgra bcom gnas thob tshe// de yi sngon byung dge slong gis// dri nas bcom ldan 'dis gyis gsungs pa// sngon gyi skye ba gzhan la des// rang sangs rgyas ni gus pa yis//
395b1(skyes rabs): rtag tu mchod cing de yi ni// mjug tu mchod rten chen po bsgrubs// de yi bsod nams smon lam gyis// skal ldan nug pa 'di yis ni// bdag gi bstan+da rab byung dag/ blangs nas drag
395b2(skyes rabs): bAcom gnas la brten// 'di ni slar yang 'dod pa la// rab tu 'jug pa'i rgyu dag nyon// sngon gyi skye ba dag la yang // 'di ni chung mas rab tu bslus// ba ra NAM si drag tu ni// sa yi bdag po tshangs
395b3(skyes rabs): byin dang // yon tan yong saM rdzogs mdun na 'don// dpal ldan 'phrog byed kyi sku byin byung // de la rnyog drung 'dul ba dag/ rdzogs pa'i bu gnyis byung gyur te// gcig ni 'phrog byed bu zhes dang /
395b4(skyes rabs): du bzhin gzhan pa 'phrog byed rtse// de dge chags bral dben pa thob// sring pa'i longs spyod las phyir phyogs// dka' thub nags tshul yongs rgyu zhing // mngon shes lha ni thob por gyur// rgyal dang
395b5(skyes rabs): skye bos mchod gyur cing // rab zhi bsdigs par 'os pa yi// mkha' la rgyu ba de dag ni// thub pa rnams kyi 'ong mchod byar gyur// nam zhig sa bang ga khang pa na// 'phrog byed rtse gnas mi bdag ni//
395b6(skyes rabs): phyogs las rgyal bar mngon phyogs pas// bu mo mdzes ldan zhes la skyes// mnyes gshin khyod kyis gus pro ng+ge 'aM shin tu che bas thub pa dag/ mchod bya 'di la mchod pa byas// 'di ni bdag
396a1(skyes rabs): gi bkur sti'i 'os// zhes pa bu mo la bstan nas// sa yi bdag po rab song tshe// rgyal po'i bu mo gus ldan mas// thub pa rtag tu mchod par gyur// gser bcad 'od ltar
396a2(skyes rabs): yong su shes pa'i mdzes pa lus la 'dzin byed cing // pad+ma'i can dang ldan pa de mthong de ni mngon par sred ldan gyur// lhan cig 'khyod pas nges par mdzes po'i yul la dmigs pa'i 'dod
396a3(skyes rabs): pa yis// 'grogs pa'i bsam pa snying la rtsa bau zug pa ci yong byed par 'gyur// rung gzhon dag gis bskyod pa'i 'khri shing bzhin// 'dod pa'i rnam 'phrul shugs 'byin lus dag ni// dud pas de
396a4(skyes rabs): yi lus kyi kun dga' dang bcas par grogs med thub la 'khyud pa byAs// de yi nu ma gsar pa'i rtser chags lus kyi tshon gyis ni// 'dod pa rgyal po'i bka' yig rgyo ldan snying lA 'dzin byed cing //
396a5(skyes rabs): de dus nyid na glo bur du ni dul ba'i gdags thug chad// thub pa 'dod po'i rtse dga' gsar pa dag la 'phyar bar gyur// khyu mchog nyams las 'khrig pa'i bya ba la// rab tu sbyor zhing sdig pas
396a6(skyes rabs): bzung ba bzhin// rgyal po seng ge'i khyim du nyi mtshungs de// gdung slad bu mo la ni 'gro 'dod gyur// 'khyud pa'i sgrub byed dag la lag 'gro ma rnams dug ni mi bzad pa// yang yang brgya la rmongs
396b1(skyes rabs): 'ad+h+rigs byed rang bzhin ma lus la nges par zhugs pa drag/ sngags kyis zhi ba ma yin 'od kyi rang bzhin bstan bcos nor bus min// sbyor mun bsam gtan gyis min zhi ba'i khyad par sman
396b2(skyes rabs): gyi ro yis min// mdza' ba'i rang bzhin rkun po'i longs spyod chu re// ri dwagos mig can gyis 'phongs de lhung ste// dben pa med las skyes pa'i yid srubs tshogs// mkhas rnams kyis yang
396b3(skyes rabs): bstan pa mthar byed yin// 'grogs la phyir phyogs snying la chags dang bzlas pa'i gzhim mchu la 'o dang ni// bsam gtan dag la dmigs pa'i spyan la mdza' gcugs mdzes sdug btung
396b4(skyes rabs): ba'i dga' ston dang // lhung bzod kyis gcing log par nu ma zung ste me tog mtshon ldan mnyes pa las// dul min+da bslab pa dag gis de yi brtul zhugs thams cing gsar pa nyid du gyur//
396b5(skyes rabs): sra bdag bu mo'i lag pa yis// drang bar gnas pa de la no// dka' thub grub 'bar 'phral nyid la// phrag dog can bzhin phyir phyogs 'gyur// de ni mothul che ba'i tshe// pho brang 'khor gyi skye bo yis//
396b6(skyes rabs): spyod tshul shes kyang 'jigs gyur nas// sus kyang ci yang der ma smras// de nas sa bdag yun ring na// phyir log rgyal po'i dga' ston can// 'byor pa smad du byung ba'i tshogs// rab tu mang
397a1(skyes rabs): ba rgyas par gyur// sngon du thub pa 'phrog byed rtse// sa bdag gus shing dul ldan de// rang gis sa skyong la 'os pa'i// longs spyod kun gyis rab tu mchod// thub pa gsol ba'i
397a2(skyes rabs): mdun du ni// sa bdag gus pas 'khod pa'i tshe// mdzes ldan mA yis sngon du ni// rim gro dag ni legs par byas// do nas gser gyi chu snod kyis// lag gnyis 'brel ba de la ni// thub pa bstan
397a3(skyes rabs): pa brjod pa yis// lag brkyang tshur shog ces pa smras// de yi 'dod pa'i rnam 'gyur de// mthong nas mi bdagau rab khros te// sdig pa'i phyir bcos sbyor ba lnga// chad pas bcad pa'i blo gros
397a4(skyes rabs): bsgrubs// drag pos khros pa phe yI bzhin// mtho nga nAs mdzes ldan mA yIs kyang // thub pa'i mgrin paR+Ya zas chags zhwas// brjod nas de la tshwa dag byin// bud med phur ba'i blo gros can+da//
397a5(skyes rabs): ska ba su ny+dzar mkho'i tshig dang ni// phyir zlog sgyu'i rang bzhin gyis// sdig pa'i sgrib byed rnam par bkra// bu mo yis ni tshig de yis// 'phral la nyid du mi yi bau dag/ ka ta ka yau phye ma yis// chu yi
397a6(skyes rabs): gnas bzhin dang bar gyur// skabs der thub pa rdzu 'phrul bri// de yi mkha' la 'gro nyams pa// sprin zla thu bo nag na gnas// lha yi spyan ldan gyis shes nas// sdug bsngalo rang nyid mngon
397b1(skyes rabs): phyogs te// de ni rang gi rang gi gnas khrid nas// slar yang bAs ma g+hAtAna? bzhi bskyangs te// mngon shes lga dang ldan par+ya byAsa?// thub pa chags pa'i chu gter du lhung mi bzad yul gyi ni//
397b2(skyes rabs): nyon mongs 'khor lo dag+na las phyir phyung rab mang dka' thub kyi// gzi yis 'dod pa dran pa'i sdig bsregs shrIs nas khro bo'i tsho gas// gAtad+da nas mi bdag blo ldan des kyang rab tu dang
397b3(skyes rabs): bAr gyur// de yi tshu na nga nyid ni// 'phro ga byed bu yi mIng tsan+da te// nag pa dag kyang 'phrog byed rtsel chung ma rgyal po'i bu mor gyur// de skad der ni mi bden ma yin rab grags pa'i// rang gi gtam
397b4(skyes rabs): 'di de bzhin gshegs pas bshad gyur te// gang gis srid pa mtha' dag skyon gyi rang bzhin las// dge slong tshogs kyi blo gros ci yang zhugs ma gyur// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas
397b5(skyes rabs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las// nag pa glang po'i stan gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yi lnga 'dab ste brgyud cu rtse brgyad pa'o// // 'jigs rung
397b6(skyes rabs): stug po'i rlung gis rab bslang dba' rlabs rnam sprul pas// ma lus phyogs kun 'gengs pa drag po'i sgra dang rab tu ldan// chu srin 'byung gnas bzlog dka' chu yi rnam 'gyur can de yang
398a1(skyes rabs): bde gshegs dran pa'i mi rnams dgu la mthar ru gyur pa nyid// rgyal ba 'gro kun bde legs la// rtag tu sbyor zhing mnyan yod kyi// rgyal byed tshal gyi kun dga' ra// gtsug
398a2(skyes rabs): lag khang nA mngon+da zhugs tshe// yangs pa'i gling du 'gro ba na// spro ba yis nI dus byas pa// rin chen don gnyer tshod pa yi// dron mthun chu gter chu 'gram+ba phyonra// de nas gzigs la don mthun
398a3(skyes rabs): ni// rab tu zhon tshe lci ba'i khur// dpyad nas bying du dogs pa yIs// rna bA 'dzin pasau de la smras// khyed rnams rab tu sred pa yis// brgyad mAr gzhon pa 'di ni ci// chu gter dba' rlabs rtse mthu
398a4(skyes rabs): 'di// khyim gyi khyams ni yongs mo yin// re zhig khyod kyi gzings la nI// 'tshams pa'i khur dog rab tu mdzod// rin chen phung po su mi 'dod// 'on kyang chu gter 'tshe ba mang // chu gter na ni
398a5(skyes rabs): gzhan dag dba' rlobs rab 'khrugs gzhan na drag po'i chu srin tshogs dkrigs shugs// gzhan na nang gi ri bI bstan pa'i rtse mo sdug por rab bsnun tshogs kyis rgyan bkag 'thor// gzhan rlung ni mthar
398a6(skyes rabs): byed dag gi dbugs ltar drag pa langs pas kun tu bsnun cing 'khor// gzhan na glo bur nyams byed rta gdong me ni rab brtan me lce'i dkyil 'khor gtum po yod// ces pa rna ba 'dzin pa yis// chu gtar
398b1(skyes rabs): ra bzhin bshad thos nas// 'ga' zhig babyas nas song bar gyur// bsam pa che ba 'ga' zhig 'khod// de nas rin chen gling phyin te// don mthun don byas nyid gyur cing // dal bus ngal busna rjes
398b2(skyes rabs): mthun gyi// rlung gIs rje su log pa'i tshe// ri bo man d+hA ra bslang bzhin// nu mkha' kun tu gyang gyur cing // khwa gdangs phug ltar gyu pa nI// tshong pa kun+da gyis mA dun du mthong // ru spal+ya nya dang chu srin
398b3(skyes rabs): bcas// rgyu ma tsho'i chu ni ma lus pa// g.yang sar lhung bzhin de lha ni// mngon phyogs mgyog sa par song gyur cing // de nas gzings ni mthar byed kyi// khA yi phug dang nye ba'i tshe// tshong pa bslong byas
398b4(skyes rabs): 'khrugs rnams kyis// rna ba 'dzin pa dag la dris// sngon tshe ma byung ba byung gyur pA// rmad byung 'byung ba 'di ni ci// gang gi spyi bor tshe zer tsam// zung zhig shar bA lta bur mthong // 'di la mngon
398b5(skyes rabs): phyogs chu 'di dag/ ci sladri yongasu rgyug par byed// gang gi shugs kyis gzings 'di ni// 'dren pAr byed cing rnam par g.yo// de ltar blo bur brlag rtsom pa'i// 'jigs pa'i rnam 'phrul gyis skrag
398b6(skyes rabs): pa'i// tshong ba rnams kyis the tshom dris// rno ba 'dzin pas rab smras pa// nyi ming med par byed pa'i nyi// sems can 'joms byed chen po 'di// rgya mtsho dag na rnam par gnas// 'khor bA ni kun rmongs
399a1(skyes rabs): bzhin// nyi ma bran+du gnyis 'chu R+Ya rtsom tshe// nyi tshwa zung ni shar ba bzhin// dus mtha'i 'jigs rung 'dri yi ni// mig ni zung dwag rab tu mthong // 'di yi kha yi ga yang sa'i mtha// sbyin
399a2(skyes rabs): dkAr dag gis yongs bskor ba'i// ri rtse chen po'i phreng ba bzhin// swo yi phreng ba rab tu mtshon// 'di yaM kha ru lhung ba yi// rgyun gyis gzings ni grangs pa dag/ yulu la mngon par phyogs pa yi// sem
399a3(skyes rabs): bzhin gzung bar nus ma yin// 'chi ba las kyis sbrel gyur pa// 'di la phyir bcos yod ma yin// skye ba gi zhan la nga ge ster ba'i// lha ni cung zad dran par mdzod// ces pa rna 'dzin gyis brjod
399a4(skyes rabs): pA// tshong pa'i mchog kun gyis thos nas// sang sna rgyas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshalnga zhes// cho ngo'i sgra drang ldan pas smras// 'jigs pas gzir ba de dgu sgra// bcom ldan rgyal ba rgyal byed/
399a5(skyes rabs): kyi// tshal bzhugs 'byung po la dgongs pas// lha yi rno ba dug gis thos// mun pa zhi byed sangaswa rgyas kyi// me tshun tho sa nyid nu sems can+da gyi// nyer 'tshe zhi slada? nya maM de khaM/ dal bu yis
399a6(skyes rabs): ni zlum par gyur// dal gyis de ni kha bsgribs tshe// mi mthun phyogs 'gro rgyan nyams pas// dus kyi kha ba las grol ba yi// gzings ni rang gi ngos su phyin// de nas mi bzang 'jigs las thar
399b1(skyes rabs): grags pa'i dpal ldan rin chen gyi// khengs shing dge ba ldan pA kun// mnyan yod du ni rnam par zhugs// gus ldan de dag song gyur nas// gdung ba skyob par mdzad pa po// rgyal ba bcom ldan rgyal
399b2(skyes rabs): byed kyi// tshul na bzhugs nA phyag dag 'tshal// de dag de mthong nyid na ni// 'khor ba'i 'ching ba chang gyur cing // 'phral l+ya rab tu dra ba thob// rab tu byung nas dgra bcom gyur// 'di dag sngon gyi skye bo lA/
399b3(skyes rabs): ston pa 'od srung zhes pa yi// bstan la zhugs par gyurarA to zhes// bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu gsungs// rgya mtsho ny+dza ming mid pa yang // sems can 'joms lngas chags bral te// bkres pa'i
399b4(skyes rabs): me rnon gyis nyin cing // skad cig gis ni srid zad tho bya// dwi nga mi bzod ying+ga 'byung dang / bcas pa'i klu nI stobs ldan gyis// de yi ro nI mi gtsang ba// chu gter dag gi ngog su 'phangs// dus kyi rus
399b5(skyes rabs): pa skem po yaM// rang bzhin lus te chus bkrus pA// ri bo brtsegs pya khA ba yi// phung pesa? bsgribs pa bzhin du mdzes// de nas mnyan yod bram ze ni// su man tu yi bu nyid gyur// ma la bkres pa'i
399b6(skyes rabs): sdug bsngal tshor// mi bzad mngal gnas de yis byas// skyes tshe bkres pa bud med ni// brgya yi 'o mas tshim ma gyur// dal gyis bskyed bsrings tshe na do// zas tshogs shin tu mang bas kyang // ma
400a1(skyes rabs): ma mchog tu yid byung ba// de ni dge slong tshogs song nas// rab tu byung ba nye bar blangs// bsod snyoms drug gis tshim ma gyur// de nas cher bkres grags pa des// dad pas
400a2(skyes rabs): mgron gnyer dge 'dun gyi// rgya che mchod ston de dung des// gang du yang ni tshim ma gyur// skabs der khyim bdag dpal dang ldan// sbyin pa'i brtul zhugs zhes pa brjod// dad pa yis ni dge slong
400a3(skyes rabs): rnams// mgronA du gnyer slang nye byar 'ongs// dge 'dun gzhan du gsol ba lA// gshegs tshe myo za de nyid ni// gcig pu daM yisa? yAng deg thob// de la zas ni rAbu tu phul// skyes bu rAbA tu mang
400a4(skyes rabs): ba'i zas// skad cig gis ni rab zos tshe// mtha' dag dge 'dun mchod ston ni// khyim gyi bdag pos de lnga byin// ya mtshan byed po de yis ni// zan gyi phung po zos pa'i tshe// khyim gyi byadag po 'jigs/
400a5(skyes rabs): pA yi swA// 'byung por rtags te yang dag bsams// kye mA rab gzhon chung ngu yi// zas can 'di ni bdag gis thob// gang zhig gcig pus dge 'dun gyi/ mchod ston dwagA ni moM lus zos// ji srid gnod
400a6(skyes rabs): sbyin 'di yis ni// zhal la bdag kyang ma zos pa// de srid 'di la yon byin nas// bdag ni mgyogs par 'gro bar bya// zhes bsams dogs dang bcas pa des// de la yon ni rab phul nas// phyi nas 'ong
400b1(skyes rabs): ba la skrag pas// phyir mig rnam par blta zhing song // phyin nAswa de yi spyod tshul kun// de yis bcom ldan lnga bshad de// 'di ni gnod sbyin srin bu 'am// ci zhes bde gshegs mngon du dris// bcom
400b2(skyes rabs): ldan gyis kyang de l-i gsungs pa// gnod sbyin 'di min srin po min// da ge slong tshogs srad ces bya ba// 'di ni dgra bcom nyid du 'gyur// de nas ston pa rang nyid kyis// chos sred mkha' la khrid nas ni// de
400b3(skyes rabs): le 'jigs su rung ba yi// rang gi lus dag rab tu bstan// 'khor ba shin tu 'jigs rung ba// dwe yi mtha' ni mthong gyur nas// chos sred skyo nas rgyal ba la// 'di ci zhes pa rab tu dris// cung zad 'dzum
400b4(skyes rabs): dkar bzhinA ra s+yA can// thams cad mkhyen pas dor gsungs pA// 'jigs su rung ba'i lus 'di ni// skams zhing rags pa rus pa'i ga zag// chos sred rab tu zhi ba ste// dngos por yongasu 'dzin pa
400b5(skyes rabs): thod/ rgyab kyi tshogs rus lcags sgrogs can// rags pa 'di ni khyod kyi'o// byed gshegs kyis gsungs de thos nas// rang gi lus la rtog byed cing // chos srang srid par 'khyam pa la// mchog tu skyo
400b6(skyes rabs): ba nyid du gyur// de bsams kye ma rmongs pa yi// lam la rab tu bgrod pa'i 'gron// mi rnams skad cig bsten pa yi// lus la rang gi nyid du cha gos// lus ni rab nyams srin bu'i tshogs kyis rkang ni bug
401a1(skyes rabs): par byas gyur cing // dbyibs bral rus pa'i dkar bu rab gsal so yi phreng ba 'jigs rung 'di// 'jig pa'i rang bzhin sgyu ma la chags mi rnams dag gi sred 'phel
401a2(skyes rabs): zhing // chags bcas yul gyi nyams myongs gzhi gnod pa dang bcas de dag go// de ltar rang gi lus mthong nas// chags bral yang drug skye ba de// rgyal bas blangs nas nu mkhye' las//
401a3(skyes rabs): slar yang rgyal byed tshal du spong // der ni de la bcom ldan 'das// brtse bas bstan mdzad gang gis ni// rgyun dang lhan cig phyir mi 'ong // rim pas dgra bcom nyid thob gyur/ nyon mongs kun
401a4(skyes rabs): lus rnam grol+yo des// de bzhin gshegs pa phyag 'tshal te// ston gyi skye ba'i tshogs dran nus// bzhin ni 'dzum pa dang btsos so// de nas nam zhig bcom ldan 'das// kun mkhyen dgyes pas
401a5(skyes rabs): dge slong gi// tshogs dang nye bar 'ongs pa yi// 'ching ba bcad pa de la gsungs// chos srid nyon mongs lam dag ni// yangs pa'i dus na yun ring gi/ shin tu ches kyang yun rong ba// yun ring
401a6(skyes rabs): las kyang yun ring ba// yun ring rgyu bas bsags pa yi// pha rol med pa'i kun nyon mongs// bar med de yi chos srang khyod// mi ngam lam ci cung zhog smros// thams cad mkhyen pas dam pa yi// mdun
401b1(skyes rabs): du cho sna sred la 'di dris// sngon tshe dran pa ster ba yI// bcom ldana? 'das la de gsol+la pa// bcom ldan re zhig nyon mongs lam// yangs pa'i dus la yun ring+ga gi/ shin tu ches kyad+tha yun ring ba//
401b2(skyes rabs): yun ring las kyang yun ring bar// rnam pa sku tshogs rab lce'i khur bu mngal gyi mal stan dring mas mtshan// lus kyi sgraR+Ya ma'i tshogs ni shin tu yun reng bzung ni sra ngal zhing 'khyams//
401b3(skyes rabs): sdug bsngalnga can rnams gdung la snying rje'i gnyin khyod rab tu thob gyur nas// sgrib pa kun dang bral ba'i ngal bsos 'di ni kye ma bdag gis thob// de ltar der ni chos sred dang // rgyal-i ba'i
401b4(skyes rabs): gtamyaM gyis mjug tu ni// mtshar nas tshul de dauge slong gis// dri s+dza shing de bzhi ni ga shogs pas gsungs// sngon gyi bskol par+ya grong khyer ne// dragau ba can+da du sa yi byad ga/ dge ba zhes
401b5(skyes rabs): la bcom ldan 'das// bde gshegs drag mdzad ces pa byung // dwe yI dus na khyim bdag ni// chos kyi ngang chu la zhes pa byung // rgyu mtshor bgrong pA'i rin chen gyis// rnam thos sras dang rna
401b6(skyes rabs): mtshungs pa thob// de nas dus kyis de bzhin gshegs// gzi brjid dpag tu med pa de// 'gro ba kun gyi don mdza de nas// myang 'das dbyings su bzhugs pa ni// de dang brel ba'i mes
402a1(skyes rabs): gdungs pa'i// khyim bdag khyod kyi drang tshul ni// gus pas bcom ldan 'das de yi// mchod rten byed pa la brtson gyur// bdag nyid chen po de yi nI// nor bu glaser
402a2(skyes rabs): tshogs mchod rten rtsom// rgyal ba'i bstan pa lnga sbyong ba'i// bram ze yis ni rnam par bzlog// bram ze chos kyi bgegs rnams kyi// spyod tshul de yis rgyal la bshad// de yis byin pa'i
402a3(skyes rabs): dpa' bo ni// 'gog byed zlog par byed pa thob// ming gis stong thub ces bya ba// rgyal po'i dpa' bo mkhas pa des// bram ze rnams la rab pa sdigs nas// tshod pas skrag pas phyir phyogs byas//
402a4(skyes rabs): de nas bgegs bral khyimi bdag gau// gser gyi mchod rten nor bu dang // mu tig ngag gis spras pa dgra/ smon lam dag ni rab bsgrubs pa// bdag ni dge ba 'di dag gis// saums can+da yang
402a5(skyes rabs): dge sgrol la chags// bla myed yang dag rdzogs byung chub// bdud rtsi bran pa thob gyur cing // des brjod de dag zlos gyur nas// stong thub gas dang bcas pas bdug/ khyod kyi nyan thos nyid
402a6(skyes rabs): gyur cig/ ces pa smras te smon lam btab// chos kyi ngang tshul ye shes kyis// spyan ni thob pas de la smras// sdig po rab tu mang ba khyod// tshigs chen ngag gis nyan thos gyur// bskal pa mang
402b1(skyes rabs): b+h+yo song ba'i tshe// yangs pa'i dus la sdig zad nas// sangs rgyas mtshan ni thob pa na// khyod kyis dge ba thob par 'gyur// khyim bdag chos kyi ngang tshul der// de yi tshe na nga nyid gyur// gang
402b2(skyes rabs): zhig stong thub du gyur te// yun ring lon nAs chos sredang+ga 'dri// gnyis pa'i bskul par grong khyer ni// mar me can du sa yi bdag/ mar m+me zhes la bcom ldan 'das// ston pa man+ta me mdzad
402b3(skyes rabs): ces gyur// nam+b+ha zhig dka' thub nags dgyes de// rang gi grong khyer 'jug phyi'i slad// sa bdog de yis gus pa yis// phyin nas rlung gis rab tu zhus// mi bdag gus pa de la ni// mnyes gshin
402b4(skyes rabs): rab tu drang ba yis// bde byaR+Ya gAM shegs pAs khas blangs tshe// bkod pa'i tshogs ni rab tu ba sham+ba srA// ka sha'i grong khyor dag tu ni// s+ya bdag nor lha'i bu zhes pa'i// grogs la bcom ldan
402b5(skyes rabs): ltos shig ces// rgyal po de yis pho nya springs// skabs der rgyal po nor lha'i bus// mchod sbyin lo ni bcu gnyis pa// cho ga bzhin du rdzogs pa nA// yon tan lha drag gis brtag pa byas// sa
402b6(skyes rabs): bdag de la lhas smos pa// khyod cag bram ze gnyis 'ong 'gyur// blo gros bzang dang blo gros so// de las dang po la sbyin 'os// de nas kha ton mthar phyin te// bla ma'i yon ni don gnyer ba'o// bram ze de
403a1(skyes rabs): dag sA badrag gi/ mchod sbyin+da zhing du ya dag 'ongs// sa skyong nor lha'i bu yis kyang // de yi mI mthong gus pa yis// blo gros bzang lha mchod sbyin gyi// mjug tu yon tan lha
403a2(skyes rabs): dga' bas phul// khri stan rin chen bzhi rang ba zhin// gser gyi dbyug pa ril ba dang // rin chen gser gyi snod dang ni// gser ni brgya phrag lnga dag go// rang gi bu mo rkye na gyis brgyan// mi bdag ster
403a3(skyes rabs): bar brtson pa na// blo glos bzang gis tshangs spyod ni// brjod cing bu mo yong ma blangs// mdzes ma zhes pa bu mo des// gser gyi 'od can dri mthong nas// mngon 'dod lhun pos ngo tsha ni// rab tu btang nas zhu
403a4(skyes rabs): bar byas// de nas de yis phyir bzlog tshe// bu mo tshangs spyod ldan ma de// chags byul gnyen lasna phyir phyogs te// mar me can la grong khyer song // der ni rgyan gyi rin chen rnams// rim pa yis ni 'tshong
403a5(skyes rabs): byed cing // rin gyis ny+tsos po'i me trog gis// dri yIs rta ga tuM lha mchod byas// blo glos bzung gisau yon thob pa// bzhed pA bla mya le phulA nAs// de yi chung mas bstan pa yi// g+ha skyer gyi lhag m+bA rang
403a6(skyes rabs): gos bzung // de nyid kyi ni mtshan mo la// de yis rmi lam bcu mthong ste// bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho 'thung ba dang // nam mkha' la ni 'gro ba dang // nyi ma zla mthong dang rgyal po dang // thub pa'i tshogs dang shang rta
403b1(skyes rabs): dang // glang chen dkar dang ngang pa dang // de bzhin seng ge ri la 'dzeg/ de nas dwe ni rab sad de// thub chen mngon shes lha ldan pa// lo ma gsol ba'i tshal du ni// rmi lam 'bras bu nyan du song //
403b2(skyes rabs): de yis dris la des smras pa// khyod kyi rmi lam 'bras bu rgyas// mar mye can gyi grong gnas pa// bcom ldan rgyal ba nyid kyis mkhyen// de thos myur bar blo gros bzangarmi lAm lung bstan 'dod pa
403b3(skyes rabs): yis// mched ni blo gros dang 'grogs te// grong khyer mA ro me can du song // skabs der rgyal po mar mA yis// bcom ldan nang du byon pa yi// dga' ston che la grong khyer de// rin chen dang ni glos kyis
403b4(skyes rabs): spras// de yi mchod pa'o me tog tshogs// dor ni sa bdag gis bsgrubs che// nyo 'tshong drug gis gnas su ni// nges par me togre mthong ma gyur// de nas bu mo mdzes ma des// me tog rnyed dka' gyur pa'i tshe/
403b5(skyes rabs): mchod pa 'chad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi sku// gzir bas phreng ba mkhazi na la zhus// de nas blo bzung bsod rnams mthus// 'dam skyes med pa'i rdzing bu ni// 'ga' zhig du yang de dus na// pad+mo dge ni 'khrungs par/
403b6(skyes rabs): gyur// de dag rgyal po'i 'jigs pa yis// sbas nas srid ldan phreng mkhan gyis// de la byin zhing de yis kyang // bum chu'i nang bcug mgyogs par song // blo gros bzang po rab mchod slad// me tog
404a1(skyes rabs): don gnyer yongs 'khyams pas// pad+mo rgyus pa'i bzhin ras can// mdzes ma drug la lam du mthong // de nas de yi bstod nams mthus// srog dang bcas pa dag gis bzhin// bum+b+ha pa'i
404a2(skyes rabs): nang na rAbu bsgribs pa'i// pad+mo rnaMs kyis bzhin drag bstan// me tog don du gnyer bA des// gser gyis de la bslangs pa na// srid ldan ma yIs yongs shes nas// 'dzum bcas de la rab smras pa// khyod kyis
404a3(skyes rabs): bdag ni sngon btang nas// du lho me tog slong bar byed// dam pa tshangs spyong bu mo la// phebs par smra ba rigs ma yin// khyod la ma tAMg rab byin pas// ske ba gzhan du chung mar bdag/ gyur cig cas pa'i
404a4(skyes rabs): smon lam gyis// 'di dag ster gyi gzhan du min// de ltar gyur ces des brjod tshe// pad+ma ldan ni de la byin// rang yang mcho phyir de yis ni// pad+mo gnyis dag rab tu bzung // de nas sa bdag mar me dang // sa
404a5(skyes rabs): bdag nor lha'i bu dag kyang // bcom ldan legs par byon pa can// gus pas mngon du byings par gyuraro// de nas mar me de yis gdugs// rin chen thur mas mtshan pa bzung // nor 'dzin bdag po nor lha'i
404a6(skyes rabs): bus// zla ba ltar dkar rnga yab bo// lha dang grub po drang srong dang // dri zas mchod de grong khyer du// rab tu zhugs tshe sems can kun// kun tu bde ba'i dga' ston rgyas// skye bo'i tshogs ni stug po la// rgyal ba
404b1(skyes rabs): lta bar 'dod pa yi// b+h+yo glos bzang g+h+ri de mthu las// dzi b+h+rig ltar skyes lam thob gyur// ston pa'i zhabs la pad+mA dag/ rab tu 'phangs nas thal sgyur te// krAn+ta dga' can des ral pa'i khur//
404b2(skyes rabs): sA la bkram nAs der phyag 'tshal// de yi dusA ne yangs pa yi// legs byas bzhin du pad+mo rnams// de mdun zhal gyi zla ba'i mthar// mchod phye yang dwa gro rgyu ba thob// bcom ldan mdun du dad pa
404b3(skyes rabs): yis/ mdzes ma sA gus par rab gtor ba'i// pad+ma rgyas pa zung dag ni// snyan gyi rgyan nyid dag tu gyur// blo bzang rab tu btud pa yi// ral pa'i tshogs ni bde gshegs kyis// zhabs kyise mnan pas
404b4(skyes rabs): lhung gyur cing hA/ de bzhin gzhan ni rab tu 'khrungs// dai nr-i bya ba byas gyur cing // mkha'o la 'gro ba thob pa na// 'jig rten thams cad nyan pa la// bcom ldan rgyalnga bas bka' sku lnga pya// bla med yang dag
404b5(skyes rabs): rdzogs pa yi// byang chub thob nas blo bzang khyod// 'jig rten du ni de bzhin gshegs/ shAkya thub pa ces bya bar 'gyur// zhes pa rgyal bas rab gsungs shing // mkha' le mye tog char lhung tshe// mchod
404b6(skyes rabs): rten rab tu gnas po'i slad// blon po kun gyis ral pa blangs// sa la mched kyi ral pa ni// bcom ldan zhabs kyis mnan mthong nas// nyan pa nyid du mngon khengs pas// blo gros khro ba sa 'khrugs
405a1(skyes rabs): par gyur// de yi rnam 'gyur rmongs pa las// skyes pa blo gros bzang pos bzlog/ de nyid dang ni lhan cig tu// ston pa'i mdun du rab byung blangs// de nas dus kyi lus kyi mthar
405a2(skyes rabs): blo gros bzang gis lha yi gnas// dga' ldan zhes pa thob gyur te// blo gros dag ni dmyal bar song // dra lta blo bzang de nyid nga // blo gros blo gros rnams bslad pas// nyams par gyur pa ches srid
405a3(skyes rabs): 'di/ mdzes ma de la grags 'dzin ma'o// gsum pa'i bskol phyir bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig/ bla nA med pa'i ye shes gter// 'dzam+ba'i gling du mngon byung gyur//
405a4(skyes rabs): de yaM dus nu 'phags rgyul du// tshong pa tsan dAn byin zhes pa// nor chen nyo tshongs dag gis ni// rab tu grags pa byung bar gyur// dri yi chung ma 'dod pa'i stobs// zhes la myos byed ltar mA dza~M sna bu/
405a5(skyes rabs): rtas byin zhes ni byA ba dog/ lus bzhin du ni d+yogo' ba byung // khyim lugs chung ma la bkod nas// nor don gnyer dri rgya mtshor seng // lan tshwa yid bzhin nor can rnams// nor drag gis ni
405a6(skyes rabs): sred po 'phel// de yi chung ma khyo song tshe// lang tshos shing rmongs pa yi// khyim gyi bsam pa yongs btang nas// 'dod pa'i bsam gtan la chags gyur// nga yis nor gyi las la ni// gzhon nu
405b1(skyes rabs): rta swa byin de bkod nas// rtag tu khyang bzang ba gram du// gnas de rgyal po'i lam la bltas// g.yog 'khor mang po'i khyim du ni// rang dbang gnas skabs bral+la des// shugs rings phyung nas ma
405b2(skyes rabs): ma ni// rgan mo dag la mngon phyogs smras// khyim ni 'byor zhing ljongs spyod mang // skye bI dka' la nyan pa 'dir// rarAng dbang spyod pas dmun pa yis// ma me byadag la dga' ba med/ au skyes pa'i
405b3(skyes rabs): longs spyod med bya na// bud med dga' rdib bsten pa ni// dbang gis ma yin bku ro stis min// rgyun gyis ma yin zas gyis mIn// de slad khyim ni yongs btang nas// bdag ni 'dun
405b4(skyes rabs): pas rgyu zhing 'gro// gzhon skyes bu ni 'di la yang // bdag ni chags pa'i dbang ma gyur// rigs kyi 'jug ngogs kyis bcings shing // gnyen gyi 'chingadA bas bsdams pa dag/ bud med dga'
405b5(skyes rabs): ba'idrang tshul tsan+da// g.yo ldan dwegrA gr-is bzod ma yin// zhes smras dwe la mA me ni// shin+na tu mdza'i bswa 'khrugs pa s+ya smrasta// gnyis gau shin shin tu yAd+de pa'i dpal// btang nasa?
405b6(skyes rabs): 'gro ba rigs ma yin// bya ba med po'i khyim 'dir ni// sbas pa'i spyod pa mi sbyar te// gsang ba'i spyod pa skad cig gi/ rgyal po yi ni lam du rgyug/ lang tsho tsha bas rab gdungs pa// khyod
406a1(skyes rabs): kyis spyod pa ji ltar+ya bsrung // khyim gyi gter yung rkang pA yi// rab sbyangs khyod kyis ji ltar 'gro// 'dri nas 'dod pa'i dug 'be byas shing // 'di nas skad cig g.yang la lhung
406a2(skyes rabs): gnyis ka the tshom 'di la ni// khyod kyis ci byA yong ma shes// g.yo zhing dge mtshan ldan pa rnams// ji srid gos ni ma nor bar// de srid srog gi zong gis kyang // gzhan gyi bud med don du ga
406a3(skyes rabs): 'og pag+na gos nas drangs pa no// mA ma ma zhes 'dar byed cing // bdag 'gro thong zhig thong zhig ces// sgra sgrogs dwe na su zhig 'dod// rnam+ba kun tu bya ba byas// skye bos gos ming+ga mthong nas ni//
406a4(skyes rabs): lag pa'i gzeb kyis bsdams pa yis// ne tso tshul bzhin 'bros par byed// mun par dga' ba'i chom rkun dang // skad cig phyed ni bde bar 'grogs// phye nas snang ba rab spangs pa'i// 'jig rten
406a5(skyes rabs): pha rol drug tu 'grogs// bzhin smad do tsha'i sdug bsngal can// 'bras maung nyams shing dman pa d+he// tshul khrims rin tshon lam ngan du// stor bar gyur pa tshol ba bzhin// dri med tshul khrims de shwal
406a6(skyes rabs): 'dod pa'i ngal dub kyis chad cing // mu tig 'bras bu sa gzhi yongasu khengs par byed pa bzhin// mi dman chags bral du brtags mchi ma'i thigs pa rags pa yis// nyes spyod smad pa rab tu spros
406b1(skyes rabs): pa de ni du bar byed// byis pa'i 'dzum bu bsil zer can ltar mdzes pa la yang rab tu sems byed cing // pad+ma'i stan ltar lus ni mchog tu zum zhing 'phral la rab tu nyams gyur te// khyim gyi
406b2(skyes rabs): nAnang du phan tshun gtams rnams phyir ni rang gi gtam du thos gyur pa// 'phyon ma rnams kyi yid ni rtsa yi 'dab mya bskyod pa lA yang dogs par 'gyur-I// gzugs kyi dregs pas gzhon nu mA// khyod yi
406b3(skyes rabs): khyim las phyi rol 'thon// yongs rtog rnams kyis bsod na mas kyi// gnas li yongs brtags phyi nus 'dor// de slad khyim na gnas pa khyod// ji ltar skyes bu dang 'grogs shing // 'jig rten dag gi
406b4(skyes rabs): mi shes pa// de ltar rig pa dag gis brjod// khyod kyi gzhon nu rtes byin 'di// cung zad lang mtsho dag lnga ni/ skye bos dogs byA m+b+hino pa'i slad// mchog tu bde bA longs spyod 'os// rnam pa 'di lta'i bzhin bzang
406b5(skyes rabs): dang // mdzes sdug can+da ni ga las rnyed// galpa ti re zhig rab bsgrubs na// 'di ni gnod du med rnam pa yin// zhes pa ma mo'i tshig thos nas// de yis kyang ni rigs por bsams// chags pa dragu po'i rnam
406b6(skyes rabs): pa yis// lo'i bas sdig lhung mthong ma yin// de nas ma mas dal bu yis// bud med longs spyod bde bsngags pas// bsgrubs shing bsgrubs nas gzhon nu'i yid// yul la mngon par phyogs par
407a1(skyes rabs): byasa?/ rtag tu 'dod pa rab spyos nus// de la de yis rab smras pa// bu khyod la 'os 'ga' zhig ni// bdag po yul gzhan song ba yod// khang stong sgron ma med pa Sha ni// mtshan
407a2(skyes rabs): mo mi smra la brten te// shin tu ngo tsha ldan mA daM// khyo dang yang dag 'grogs par 'dod// ces pa dr-i yi tshig thos mu mngon paR+Sha 'dod ldan tshong pA'i bus// rtag tu sbas paM'i khyim du ni// ma dang dga'
407a3(skyes rabs): mgur 'grogs pa bsten// rtag tu rabye bsgribs khyim+b+ha du ni// dga' dgur spyad pA ste nr-i byed pa// de la chags pa me dag ni// rab tu 'phel zhing zhi bar gyur// de yis bsams pa rtag tu ni// rab tu
407a4(skyes rabs): bsgribs pa'i sdug bsngal 'di// mi bzod gzugs kyi longs spyod la// snang ba nyid ni 'tsho ba la// phan tshun bzhin gyi chu skyes la// rnam par lta ba'i ro bral ba'o// 'o yis dga' dgur spyod pa lu// bde ba'i
407a5(skyes rabs): dga' ston dga'i yod min// de bsgribs pa yi nyon mongs ni// rab tu 'bad pas rtsom byas te// 'phral lde ljongs spyod gau zhon nu ma// gsal bar bdag gis bstan par bya// zhes pa mtshan mo rab bsam
407a6(skyes rabs): te// rab bsal lus de gos dag ni// yongasu rje ba'i rigs pa yis// nang par de la rab gsal gyur// de yis rang gi ma mthong nas// rdul bcad pa'i ljon pa bzhin// sdig pa'i dug ni 'bebs pa yis//
407b1(skyes rabs): dbang dang bral bar byas te lhung // de yi sna bsil ba'i chus bran te// dal gyi 'du shes thob pa des// rgya che g.yang sar 'khyams pa la// sdug bsngal gyur bzhin smre sngags phyung // dmyal bar lhung ba'i
407b2(skyes rabs): phyo nya mo// 'dod pas rmongs ma dre yis ni// smin ma'i 'khri shing gzengs bstod nas// lag pas yongs 'khyud de la smras// khyod kyis mya ngani bzod bka' 'di// gan rIs min rdzun pa dgo la ci// bud med
407b3(skyes rabs): chos kyis bsdams pa rnams// mi badren khyod kyis mi shes sam// khyod kyis sdug bsngal yong ma bskyed// su yi yang nI nor mAM phrogs// thun mong bde ba'i longs spyod 'dir// khyod la sdig pa'i bag chags
407b4(skyes rabs): ci / g.yo ldan bsdams pa med pa yi// chu klung bud med thun mongs nyid // gang la phi yis khrus byas der 'bu ni khrus byed min nA mA ci// lamA gang nas nAM pha song ba// de nyid nas ni bu yang 'gro// bud med brgya lam
407b5(skyes rabs): ngag dang mtshungs// thun mong pa yi bgrod bya nyid// bud med gcig gis sbyang bya nyid// gzhan dong gzhan gyi mi 'os pa// 'di ni 'ga' zhig phrag dog dang // ldan+da pas dam tshig byas pa tsama?// dam pa'i don
407b6(skyes rabs): du dga' mgu'i slad// bgrod par mi byi 'ga' yang med// pha dang pu po snod gcig bzhin// bud meng nye bar longs spyad bya// zhes te de yis 'bad pa yis// longs spyod la de mngon phyogs byas// 'dod
408a1(skyes rabs): chags skyes pas rtag par yang // phyugs bzhin du ni ma nyid bsten// de nas dus kyi pha dag ni// chu gter che las slar 'ong ba// ma yis bskul ba der gsang nas// dug+h+ra gis srog+h+ra dang /
408a2(skyes rabs): byal bar byas// de nas chagos pa 'phel ba yis// ma bsdams bde ba tshol ba des// mdza' bas rmongs pa'i gzhon nu la// mdza' bas ngal gyis rab smras pa// ma bsdams bde ba thob pa'i slad// snying
408a3(skyes rabs): po'i nor drug blangs byas la// tsher ma sbyangs pa'i yul gzhan du// yu cag re zhig 'gro ba ru bya// zhes pa de tshig yun+na ring gi/ dus su 'dod pa thob gyur nas// nor gyi snying po blangs byas te// de nI
408a4(skyes rabs): de dang 'grogs nas song // yul gzhan dag tu gnas byas te// sdig pas rab bsgribs de dog ni// chung ma khyod po nyid du grags// mchog tu bde ba thob par gyur// de nas nam zhi gau khyim der ni//
408a5(skyes rabs): rat+na gri yul par mngon shes pas// yongs dris dge slong mngon phyogs te// mnyes gshin lngas ni de la smras// khyod kyi ma ni dge ba 'am ci// skyes btang la yang yang du// bsams pa'i dab du gyur
408a6(skyes rabs): pa'i sems// 'gyod gdung med par gyur tam ci// zhes pa dge slong chog thos nas// rdo ba yi ni bsnun pa bzhin// 'dri shes dag gi 'jigs pa des// rigs pa de de rab bsams pa// gros byed
408b1(skyes rabs): 'jig pas 'khrugs pa des// ma dung lhan cig bgros byas nas// dge slong de ni mgron gnyer te// ma bsnams mtshon gyis khyim du bsad// dge slong dgra bcom bsad la yang // de yi bgra
408b2(skyes rabs): kyang 'dar ma yin// gtum po rnams ni sdig pa yi// rdo rje las lcug smra bar gyur// ngos med g.yang sar chos kyi ri rtse yi// sbreng nas khyu ni thur bltas lhung gyur cing // 'khrul mang bya skyibs brgya yi
408b3(skyes rabs): bsnun pa rnams// nges par brgyud ma dag tu ltung bar 'gyur// buM dang rol par byed mod kyang // lcong sa spyod dag la chags pa des// mdzes pa zhes bya tshong pa'i bu// mthong nas de lnga chags ldan gyur//
408b4(skyes rabs): da ga' mgur spyad pa yongs 'dres goms pas lo nges spyod dag ni mchog tu 'phel// nor ni rab 'phel dar bas chags pa stug po tsau yang sten por byed// len tshwa'i chu dgra 'thungs pas
408b5(skyes rabs): shin tu mI bzang sred pa skye bar 'gyur// chu ni rgya che me lces myongs pas rta gdong ma ni rlab tu 'barla// 'dod ldan gsar pa de dang ni// chags ldan ma de gas ngo 'grogs pa// rtas byin gyis mthong
408b6(skyes rabs): khros pa yis// ral gri dag gis ma nyid bsad// mtshams mod gsum gyi sdig khur gyis// de ni lci ba nyid du gyur// skye bo lha yis bskul rnams kyis// myur du grong khyer dag phyung // 'gyod pa drag
409a1(skyes rabs): po skyes pa des// stong nas dge slong tshogs mang la// sdugu bsngal lAs ni rab byung zhus// gang tshe sdig can lA ma byin// de de yi zhe sdang gis// dge slong tshogs nyal mtshan
409a2(skyes rabs): mo bsregs// de la brtse bas brlan pa'i blo// dge slong byang chub sems dpa'i che// gcig gis de tshe bai slab pa'i gnas// sbrengs pa'i rab tu byung ba byin// rab tu 'bad cing nan tan gyis// bslab pa'i
409a3(skyes rabs): gnas ni zhu byed pa// de la dge slong gis smras pa// bsgrub gnas 'dzin par yod mi 'os// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshalo// zhes pa 'di nyid rtog tu brjod// rgyal ba'i mtshan ni thos nyid kyis// dus
409a4(skyes rabs): kyi mthar ni khyod grol 'gyur// de nus rtas byin lus kyi mthar// 'jigasu rung ba'i dmyal bar zhugs// gang mdun rab tu nyam nga ba'i// grang pa 'jig pa'i me ldan po// de nyid chos sreng yun ring gi/ yun/
409a5(skyes rabs): ring las zhes bdag gis dris// zhes pa badz+rod nas bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bzhugs// dbaSh+Ta rlabs ltar g.yo ma yi rlung tshub dgral dogs pa med par rab tu 'khyud// dar
409a6(skyes rabs): ba thob nas pha ni gzi byin gter de snang ba min pa dag tu bkod// dgra bcom gnas ni rab tu gsal ba'i 'byor pa mi bzad rim pas bcom// / du ba shin tu dri ma can gyis mchog tu nyes byas
409b1(skyes rabs): ci dang ci ma byas// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las chos sred kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yAlnga 'dab ste brgyad
409b2(skyes rabs): cu rtsa dgu pa'o// / yid ni dge bo'i sgrub byed canA// sbyin pa shin tu chung ngu yis// snying stobs can la phunA tshogs ni// brtag pas bgom pa bya mi 'gyur// bri dzi'i yangs pa can du
409b3(skyes rabs): sngon/ spre'u'i rdzing zhes bya ba'i 'gram+ba// khang pa brtse gos pa'i khyim gnas na// bcom ldan rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i tshe// yon tan mtha' drug ldan pa l-is// skyes bu mchog nyid du gyur pa//
409b4(skyes rabs): khyim bdag dpalnga gyisau bskor ba ni// nor can zhes pa byung bar gyur// de yi chung ma chos kyi grogs// ngang tshul can zhes bya bar gyur// bu ni stong phod can zhes dang // de bzhin+da ma nu' mra bden ldan ma'o/
409b5(skyes rabs): yongs pa can pa'i bram ze rnams// tshogs nas der ni de sA par byas// thams cad tshogs nas bcom ldan 'das// mgron du gnyer bya gzhan du min// nor gyi rgyags pas gcig gis ni// gal te rgyal ba
409b6(skyes rabs): mgron gnyer byed// gzhan gyi chos kyi bgegs byed pa// de ni kun gyis dbyung bar bya// de dag nges pa ma shes na// nor can mchog gi phun tshogs ldan// bsod nams ldan pa rang nyid kyis// song nas
410a1(skyes rabs): rgyal ba mgron+da gnyer byas// bcom ldan rang gi dge 'dun dang // lhan cig khyim du gshegs par ni// zhal gyis bzhes tshwa gus ldan de// dga' bas rang gi khyim du song
410a2(skyes rabs): dwed+yer+ya ni de yis lha la 'os// mchog gi 'byor po'i tshogs rnams kyis// rin chen stan dang yo byad dang kau/ zas kyi sa gzhi bstar ba byas// skabs der gnyis skyes thams cad ni// 'dus nas yo byad
410a3(skyes rabs): tshogs bsgrubs pas// bcom ldan 'dos kyi drung song nas// de nas de la bcom ldan 'das// rib dang dri med bsam pas gsungs// sngon du dge 'dun dang bcas pa// nor can gyis ni mgron du gnyer//
410a4(skyes rabs): de dag thos nas bcom ldan 'das// mchod pa sngon gyi nyin par la// rab tu rtog cing de dag rnams// rang gi khyim du song ba'i tshe// nor can khang par bcom ldan 'das// dge sbyong rnams dang bcas byon nas//
410a5(skyes rabs): lha yi rmad byung phun sum tshigs// mchod ston rab tu bzhes pa mdzad// de yi chung mas nyin gzhan yang // dri mtshungs yangs pa'i dpal gyis ni// mchog gi longs spyod tshogs rnams kyis// bcom ldan
410a6(skyes rabs): 'das la mchod pa byas// gsum pa'i nyin la de yi bus// bzhi par mna' mas rgyal ba ni// ngo mtshar 'byor pa'i longs spyod kyi// nyer spyang rnams kyis mgron du gnyer// yongs pa can pa'i tshogs rnams kyis//
410b1(skyes rabs): ston pa mchod pa'i skabs ma thob// nor can la ni rab khros te// gnas nas dbyung ba'i rtsom pa byas// de nas bde bar gshegs pa'i bkas// gnyis skyes de dag rnams la ni// bdag gis ma shes
410b2(skyes rabs): zhes brjod nas// nor can gyis ni dang bar byas// de nas nor can chung mar bcaste// bu dang bcas shing mna' mar bcas// ston pas chos ni bstan pa yis// bden pa mthong ba thob par gyur// de dag
410b3(skyes rabs): sngon byung bstod nams ni// 'byor pa chen po rgya che bas// dge slong gis dris bcom ldan 'das// tham swa cang mkhyen pas der gsungs pa// ba ra NAM sir sngon byung ba// pad+ma zhes bya phreng rgyud mkhan// mu
410b4(skyes rabs): grigyis nyan+d+ra pa'i dus su nA// mchog tu dbul ba nyid du gyur// chung ma yal 'dabu ts+tshin zhes dang // bu ni ut+palpo zhes pa dang // mna' ma pa tra laM zhes pa// 'di dag+na de yi cho gas par gyur// nAm+b+ha zhig
410b5(skyes rabs): dwe dag khyim dang nye// me tog dag myadzesa? shing // tshaMm pa dag tu nyin mo'i mthar// radwa sangs rgyusaM ni bzhugs pAr gyur// de dgu kun gyis mi bdag gi// gnas su glos gcig ri myos
410b6(skyes rabs): kyis// me tog phul nas 'ongs pa yis// 'od kyi rang bzhin de mthong nas// gzi brjid gter de mthong gyur nas// snga dro de la mchod 'dod pas// gshog pa bcad pa'i bya bzhin du// de dag nor
411a1(skyes rabs): med gdung ba thob// bdag cag gzhi la bdog pa kun// gos ni gcig nyid kho na yod// mchod 'os 'di yi lus kyi mchog/ de nyid kyis ni g.yog par byas// di ring glacer
411a2(skyes rabs): bur rgyal po yi// 'khor du mi 'gro ci 'byung 'gyur// zhes pa'i dam tshig dri dag gis// byas nas gos kyis de la mchod// de yi byasod nams smon lam gyi// phreng rgyud mkhan daM nor can 'di// chung
411a3(skyes rabs): ma bu dong mna' mar ldan// lha mthu phun sum tshogs par gyur// ces pa tshogs kun tu mkhyen gyis// bshud pa thos nas dge slong rnams// sems ni dri med rtsa ba drag/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'i
411a4(skyes rabs): dpal du sems// de nas bram ze de dag rnams// kun tshogs gtsang ba'i zas drag gis// bcom ldan 'das ni yang dwag mchod// dge bu rab tu 'bar bar gyur// dman byin rin chen nor ni rtswa yi rtse//
411a5(skyes rabs): dang pas byin pa'i rtswa yang rin thang med// mdzes pa du ma'i nyams myong nor min te// dge ba 'byung ba'i rgyu sems nyid do// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa
411a6(skyes rabs): brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ nor can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu pa'o// // snang ba med pa'i gnas rnams ngag tu sgron ma bzhin// legs par bshad pa
411b1(skyes rabs): bden pa'i lam ni gsal bar byed// de nyid phyir na rtag tu nye bar 'kho ba las// bdag nyid che rnams dben pa spyod la yid du 'ong // glang che gyad kyi skye bo'i gnas// ku sha'i grong du bcom
411b2(skyes rabs): ldan 'das// dge ba tshol bas dge slong tshogs// dgra bcom gnas la bkod gyur pa// de tshe phan tshun snyan par chos// smra byed dge slong rnams dag gi/ lcags bshad bde bar gshegs
411b3(skyes rabs): bya ni// dgyes pa dang ldan rang gis gnas// de yi legs bshad la bcags pa// de mthong dge slong rnams kyis ni// de la gsol ba kun mkhyen nyid// nged kyi tshig la ji ltar dgyes// dge slong
411b4(skyes rabs): tshogs kyis de brjod che// bcom ldan rgyal bas bka' stsal pa/ bad+mag ni skye ba gzhan du yang kA/ legs bshang dag la mchog tu dgu'// grong khyer zhi ldan dag tu sngon// mi dbang shi pi zhes bya ba//
411b5(skyes rabs): 'byung po kun la brtse ba yis// yid 'ong gnyen+da du gyur pa byung // de yi bAso da nams dkar pa'i// mi yis mtho ris kun gang ba// mthong nas de yi snying stobs ni// rtag tu mcho sbyin brgya pa 'ongs//
411b6(skyes rabs): de ni rin chen khang bzang rtser// 'dzegs pa'i mi bdag can song nas// 'jigs rung srin po'i gzugs bsgrub ste// de yi mdun du mngon phyogs smras// 'du byed mi rtag shin tu g.yo bo'i glog rab mdzes
412a1(skyes rabs): pa dag dang mtshungs// rab tu skyes shing 'jigs pa'i yongasu 'gyur ba dag la chags// zhes pa'i legs bshad phyed brjod nas// srin po de ni mi smra gyur// sa yi bdag pos thal sbyar
412a2(skyes rabs): nas// phyag 'tshal de la rab smras pa// dge ba legs par bshad pa'i phyed// ying be de lcug ma gsung bar mdzod// byang chub yan lag gyur skad de// slobI mur gyur nas bdag nyan no// dulta bas de smra mi bdag
412a3(skyes rabs): la/ srin po yis ni rab smras pa// rgyal dbang slob ma 'bras bu med// khyod kyis bdag la ci zhig bya// skom pas bdag ni yongs nyen cing // bkres pas dgu ni yongasu nyams// rgyal po bdag ni bla ma yi// zhes
412a4(skyes rabs): 'ba' zhig 'di mi 'dod// bkres skom dag gis gzir gyur pa// gang zhig cung zad bdag smra'o// lcug ma brjod par yod mi nus// bdag la sdug bsngal ma mdzad cig/ sman pa'i gdangs ldan ro ni 'os pa tsam/
412a5(skyes rabs): legs par bshad pa rab tu rgyas gyur phye// tshim la bde ba ster byed 'di dag ni// nges par bkres dang skom pa za byed min// thos dang glu dpe snyan de dag ngal bu yongs 'dris dge mtshan sgrib byed dang // nor bu
412a6(skyes rabs): shes dang 'byung po gdon nang dug dang smyo ba zhi byed dang // sa 'dzin bsten dang chu gter sgrol bar byed dang gser 'gyur dag dA rtsis// 'di dag ma lus mthar thug 'bras bu mi rnams dag gos bza' ba yin//
412b1(skyes rabs): 'phrul la bcad pa'i shA drung ni// khrag da bad+mag nI tshi m+bu byed pa// 'tsho med sdom pas bcings gyur pa// khyod las shin tu rnyed pa dkal// khyod dang nye b+hur bdag ci byung // 'gyu' zhig la ni skyong du
412b2(skyes rabs): 'gro// zas dang gnas ni mtshungs pa yi// rtsed mau dang no gtam dag mU dz+re ste// zhes des brjod tshe mi bdago ni// gus+yA dang baMtsAs+t+ra pas d+he la smros// rang gi lus ni rab bA cad pa'i// khrag bcas sha
412b3(skyes rabs): ni khyod la sbyinra// rgya che blo gros ldan pa khyod// rten cing 'brel 'byung dang po'i sgo// khyod kyi legs bshad myang 'ang skye// grong khyer gyi ni lam gyi ma cho ga/ rgyal po zla bas 'di brjod tshe// mtshan mo rgyu bsla
412b4(skyes rabs): de laM smras// blo gros bzang po myur du nyin// ngam bcas pa dag sbyin par mdzod// 'du byed mI rtag shin tu g.yo bo'i glog rab mdzes pa dag dang mtshungs// rab tu skyes shing 'jig pa'i
412b5(skyes rabs): yongasu 'gyur ba dgu la chags// des bskyed 'khor zhing yongasu sgyur bsna srog chags dag ni dbang bral zhing // ngal dub ldan pa rnams la nyer zhi 'gog pas ngal gis ster bar byed// de dag
412b6(skyes rabs): thos nas mi bdag ni// dga' mgu mig dag rab rgyas pas// rang gi lus ni bcad pa'i sha/ khrag dang bcas pa de la byin// rang sha bcad cing bcad cing ni// ster bar byed pa saM bdag go// snying stobs
413a1(skyes rabs): rnam 'gyur med pa yis// mtshan mo rgyu ba ya mtshan gyur// de yi lus ni thams cad las// shra za dag la sha byin nas// sems can thams cad sgrol ba la// smon lam
413a2(skyes rabs): myi yi bdag pos byas// de nas de la bcug pa las// 'dze ra 'jig srin po'i gzugs kyis smras// khyod kyis gan ni bcad pa la// gdung bas mi dga' bskyed dam ci// skabs gsum rgyal
413a3(skyes rabs): pos dris pa ni// rgyal po'i rgyal pos dur smras pa// lus kyis gzhan la phan pa dgra/ byas la bdagro ni mi dgu' med// gal te gdung ba dag la bdag/ rnam 'gyur med na bden pa des// bdag
413a4(skyes rabs): gi lus 'di sngon gzugs bzhin// rma med bsos pa nyid gyur cig/ ces smras sa yi badrog po yin// bden pa'i tshogs ni brjod pa las// 'phral nyid lus ni sngon gyi gzugs// rma dang bral ba nyid
413a5(skyes rabs): du gyur// mkhwa'i la rgyu bas me trog tshwar// yangs pas de nr-i gAyogs byas shing // lha yi dbang pos srin po sna gzugs// yongasu bAtang nas rAbA tu bsngags// ber+g+ha byinra snying stobasde mthong ba yis//
413a6(skyes rabs): mi bdag la ni dang byas so// de yi legs bshang bdud rtsi yi// nyams myong sa yi bdag pos bsams// nga nyid sngon gyi skye ba la// mi dbang shi pi der gyur te// de ltar srog gi zing gis bdag lags
413b1(skyes rabs): bshad la ni dga' bar gyur// rang gi skye ba gzhan gyi gtam// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa dag/ thos nas ya mtshan ldan pa yi// dge slong kun gyis rab tu bsngags// mthong dang ma
413b2(skyes rabs): mthong bde lo lam ni legs bshad kyi gus la sgrol mya lta bur spyod// legs bshang bdud rtsi'i ro ni nyams myong ldan pas mchog tu dga' ba'i chur dag 'bebs// legs bshad don gnyer
413b3(skyes rabs): yul la gnyer yul la gnyer bya kun mkhyen dag kyang don gnyer nyid du 'gyur// de slang ngem pa rnams la legs bA sh+yang dang mtshungs dgra' ba ci yang yod ma yin// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang
413b4(skyes rabs): pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing la s+yA/ shri pi'o legs bya shrang+ga kyi rtogs pa berjod pa'i yul 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// /
413b5(skyes rabs): bla mya rnams kyi mdun dag tu yang shin tu bla ma'i gnas su che// 'byung po rnam stA ni 'dzin byed mtha' dag ro yi snying po rab tu bskrun// lus ni mdza' gtsug sde bzhin du rgyus byed skabs gsum
413b6(skyes rabs): chu bo gtsang ma'i lus// ma de nyid ni rtag tu mkhas pas mchod bya yin gyi nor 'dzin min// minyan yod dag gi rgyal byed tshal// da ga' bar rgyal bas rgya che'i chos// rab tu bstan nas mdor
414a1(skyes rabs): bsdus pa// slaR+Sha yang dge slong tshogs lha gsungs// pha mu mchog tu tshangs pa ste// grayo ba'i bsod nams dag gi grogs// gang zhig de mchod chos ldan pa'i// rigs de
414a2(skyes rabs): bsngags par 'os pa yin// 'jig rten gsum na bde mtshungs dka' thub med// 'che med mtshungs pa'i chos ni gang na'ang med// bla ma lci ba pha las gzhan yod min// lce yi mchog ni ma lus
414a3(skyes rabs): gzhan pa min// gung zhig lhag par gus pa rab rgyas pas// bla ma'i zhabs kyi pad+ma zung mI sten// de dag mchog lnga chur sred 'ba' zhig gis// 'jug ngogs kun tu song yang 'bras bu med// bde
414a4(skyes rabs): bas bsten bya phyi rol ma phyogs rtag tu bzod pa 'dzin// drag po'i brtul zhugs la sogs nges par gdung ba ster mi byed// gus pa'i rim gro chung ngu la ya mi chung 'bras bu ste // pheM dang mra dang
414a5(skyes rabs): mnyam pa'i blo gsum pa yod pa min// legs byas don ston byed pas slob dpon rtag tu su yis mngon par dragA'i myi bya// srog rnams skyed byed bla ma rnams kyi bla ma pha ni ji ltar mchod mi bya// de bas
414a6(skyes rabs): kyang ni mchog tu skad cig mngal gyi khur bzung ma yi ngal dub lo// bu lon dag pa sgrub byed bsod nams tshogs ni ci yis dag pa thob par 'gyur// dben pa ma smin sdig pa'i tshig gi yang dgo thob gyur

414b6(skyes rabs): de nas nyi ma gzhan la ni// de las nyis 'gyur bzhi 'gyur dang // de nas brgyad 'gyur dag kyang rnyed// thams cad de yis ma la phul// de nas gling bgrong rigs la ni// 'os par thos nas 'dod ldan gyur//
415a1(skyes rabs): rgya mtshor 'gro bu rtsom pa yi// tshogs la chags shing gus ldan de// ma yis bzlogs par gyur mod kyang // ldog pa nyid du khas ma blangs// de nas ma ni mya ngan gyis// 'khrugs shing

415a3(skyes rabs): la re ba'i dga' ston rgyas pa burgya yis dga' ba 'dzin// phyi nAs mi bzad lang mtsho tshwa ba drag pos brlang po dag tu smra byed mkhasau// gsal bar nags po brtsegs pa ltar rtsub ngan pa'i bu yas sdugs
415a4(skyes rabs): bsngal gdung bar byed// rin chen sgrub par 'dod pa de// mo yi mya ngan yangs par bzhin// rgya mtsho'i drung du phyin nas nau/ gzings la rab tu zhon te so // de nas dwe yi gzings chen ni// rab rnon chu sbyin
415a5(skyes rabs): se na mo yis// so ga le drag pos dral bar byas// 'jug ngogs dag tu zhig par gyur// blo gros rab 'phyar de yis ni// ma yi bsam bcom khur lci bas// gzings nI zhig par gyur pa des// de m-id
415a6(skyes rabs): pa bzhin du rmongs pa thob// de nas shing gi tshal pa thob// dal gyis 'du shes thob pa des// chu gter gyis ni ngogs phyin nas// nags tshal chen po'i nang du zhugs// gcig pu bstan nyams 'gro/

416a1(skyes rabs): dge mtshan las song bas// grong khyer gsum pa dga' byed thob// dwer nI rim pa de nyid kyis// rtse dwagras rnam par rol de lnga// lha mo bcu drug dga' myu gu yis// longs spyod spyad bya

416b1(skyes rabs): ni las dgra ci yi 'bras// zhes des snying rjes dris pa na// skyes bu de la rab smras pa// bdag gi ma la gnod byed do// 'di ni las de nyid kyi 'bras// de dag thos nas de yang ni// sdig pa dran nas ngogs/

420a1(skyes rabs): po can ni legs par mtshon// tshul khrims du gu la dang ldan// dam pa rnams yid sgrib bral nyid// gang gi rab tu byung bas 'dzin// de drug bdag cag khyim du mchod// thams cad bsrung ba'i nor

420a4(skyes rabs): blos// tshul dang mthun par de la zhus// bdag gis khyed la de stan zhes// gus dang bkur pa ldan mas smras// dam bca' chen po'i tshogs kyi nI// khur dag khyer bar 'dod pa yis// srod la mal stan+da srang la
420a5(skyes rabs): 'dzegs// skad cig bsam gtan bskyangs par+ya gyur// de nas khang bzang la 'dzegs te// bcom ldan sto na pa'i phyogs su ni// phyag 'tshal mchod bya mchod 'os pa'i// me tog snyim pa rab tu gtor// de yi gnas
420a6(skyes rabs): su mngon phyogs des// me tog bdug po chus mtsho de nas// yangs pa'i mig ni kun dga' yis// mchi mas 'gags pas rab smos pa// bcom ldan thugs rje 'os pa bdag/ dkon mchog gsum po rnams spangs
420b1(skyes rabs): te/ khyod kyi gnas kyi ri dgras bzhin// shin tu thag rIng yul 'dir phyin// khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma zung gI skyabs ni thob pa bdag/ ring du gnas par gyur kyang spyan gyis rAg mdzod brtse ba can// mnyes
420b2(skyes rabs): gshin gnyen pa'i blo ldan chen po rnams kyi thugs rje ni// yul gzhan ring por phyin pa rnams la chung ba nyid mi 'gyur// 'bangs kyi bu mo bdag gi deng // bcom ldan khyod ni mgron du gnye// nang par byon
420b3(skyes rabs): pas bdag la ni// khyab bdag khengs pa gnang bar mdzod// ces brjod nas des 'phangs pa// rnam par bkra ba'i me tog phrang // gus pa'i pho nya srog bcas bzhin// ne mkha' las ni rab tu song // dkar dang
420b4(skyes rabs): dmar dang serarA dang sngon po dag gi me tog phreng // bdug pa'i du bsra bkra ba dral gyis mkha' la 'gro ba de// bde sogs bdag po'i gzhu yi 'khri shing yang dag rgyu ba de/ chu 'dzin gzhon nu dag la rab tu chags
420b5(skyes rabs): bzhin yulA ring mdzes// de nas rgyal byed tshul song nas// skad cig gis ni me tog phreng // gus pa dag dang ldan pa de// ston pa'i zhabs pad dge la lhung // bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas kyang // ma ga d+hA naM
420b6(skyes rabs): bzang mo yau// 'dod pa kun mkhyen thugs rje yis// kun dga' bo la mngon du gsungs// grong khyer bu ram shing 'phel du// nang par bdag cag 'gro bar bya// ma ga d+ha bzang dge 'dun dang // bcas pa'i bdag mchod
421a1(skyes rabs): don du gnyer// 'di nus glong de dpag tshad ni// drug cu lhag pA'i brgya phrag ste// nyi ma phyed kyis 'gro bar bya// 'di la thogs 'khor rigs pa min// gang gang rdzu 'phrul chen po yis// mkha'
421a2(skyes rabs): la 'gro nus mthu ldan pa// de dang de la khyod kyi ni// mgron du gnyer ba'i tshul shing byin// ces pa bde gaushegs kyis bskul des// nyin phyed bgrod pas phyin pa dang // tshul shing gis ni mgron gnyer ba//
421a3(skyes rabs): dge slong rnams la rab tu bshad// rdzu 'phrul che ldan thams cad kyis// des ni tshulnga shing blangs pa'i tshe// glang po bum par sdes bya ba// rgan po yIs kyang rim par blangs// mthu ni thob pa min pa des// tshul shing
421a4(skyes rabs): dAg lnga lag brkyang tshe// cung zad 'dzum dkar bzhin ras can// kun+da dga' bo yis de la smras// mgon med zas sbyin khyim du ni// rkang pa nyid kyis 'gro bya min// dpag tshad drug cu dang bcas brgya// nyin phyed
421a5(skyes rabs): kyis ni bzla bar bya// zhes pa des brjod rgan po ni// sbyangs pas bzhin ras rnam par dud// bsams te rang gi sngo bdun du// dman pa'i dngos po bzod pa dka'// thogs med dus su bas gso pa yi// nyon
421a6(skyes rabs): mongs skye dang dgo' ba sogs// 'bad pa can gyis gzhon nus na// rdzu 'phrul gnas ni 'thob la ci// chags bral drag po'i blo gros kyis// de ltar sems shing dag pa yi// sems ldan de la skad cig gi
421b1(skyes rabs): rdzu 'phrul chen po rab tu skyes// de nas mtshan mo 'das gyur te// snga dro dge slong thams cad ni// sna tshogs lha yi chas ldan pa'i// gzhal yas khung nas mkha' la gshegs// skabs der rtsom pa
421b2(skyes rabs): chen po yi// tshogs kyis yongasu gang gyur pa// bdag po'i khyim ni bcom ldan 'das// lta 'dod mi ga d+ha bzang mo// me tog bdug pa'i mchod pa yi// bkod pa 'dzin la mngon phyogs shing / skyug
421b3(skyes rabs): mo gyos po khyo rnams dang // lhan cig khang bzangs la 'dzegs 'khod// de nas rta yi shing ltar gnas// dge slong kun shes kauN+Ti n+ya// rnam mang ngo tshwar rdzu 'phrul nI// mchog ldan dang por rabya tu mthong //
421b4(skyes rabs): ny+Ni ma dang mtshungs de mthong nasa?// ya mtshan gyos sogs dga' ba yis// ma g+ha d+hA bzang lnga smras pa// bcom ldan zhes pa 'di 'am tse// des sgras 'dri ni bcom ldan min+da// dge slong kun shes kaur+t+ti n+yA/
421b5(skyes rabs): 'od dmun+da paM min pa 'di// nyi ma dag dang mtshungs par mthong // de nas rim gyis shing rta yis// byon pa'i tshe na gyos sogs kyis// bzang mo bcom ldan 'di lum ci// 'di 'am ts+yai zhes rab tu smras// des
421b6(skyes rabs): smras 'di ni ston pa min// 'di dag de yi bka' la 'os// dge slong rab zhi bsngags par 'os// dka' thub rab 'bar 'od zer dri med can// gser ljon mdzes pas dga' ba ri yi ni// rtse mo la zhon sngon la byon pa gang //
422a1(skyes rabs): ngo mtshar byed pa mthu nI gzugs can bzhin// dpral ldan dge slong 'di ni 'od srungs che// chu ldan tshwa sprin zab mo'i 'brug sgra can// gdong lnga'i shing rta dag la gnas pa gang // mkha' las mngon
422a2(skyes rabs): du byon pa'i dge slong 'di// sa l-i yon tan gyis bsgrags shA ri'i bu// gnyis 'thung so bzhi kaM la sha bzhin du// rab dkar l-i zhon mtha' yas mdzes pa gang // byon pa'i ngage slong 'di ni 'gro rnams na// bsod namras ldan
422a3(skyes rabs): mchogau maung+gal bu zhes bya// gser pad b+h+r-i DUr+ya yi yu be can// rin chen myu gu ge gser gyis mtshan zhon// phyogs ni dri bzang gis 'grengs byon pa gang // dge slong de nyid ma 'gags pa zhes grags// gong gis mekhA
422a4(skyes rabs): la zhon gshog rlung gis// chu 'dzin rab tu gtor ba'i 'chi mad lam// mgyogs pa rgyas pas rnam par gcod byed pa// dge slong 'di ni byams ma'i bu gang po// snying stobs chu gter che gang mchog gi lam//
422a5(skyes rabs): shin tu zhi ba mtha' med dag la gnas// 'od kyi bdud rtsi sra phyogs tshim rab tu b+h+yo// mthu ldan dge slong 'di ni rta thul lho// gser gyi tA la yangs pa'i 'khri shang ni// rnam pAr g.yo bas dkris mngon dga' zhon// bsod/
422a6(skyes rabs): mas gsal rdzogs mngon par 'ong ba gang // dge slong 'di ni blo ldan nye bar 'khor// gser dang rin chen rab 'bar pe Ta ris// bai DUr+ya yi gzhal yas khang rtser zhon// 'od kyi byugs bzhin byon pa gang 'di ni// dge
422b1(skyes rabs): slong kA t+yA ya na zhes bya'o// gang zhig gzugs dang ldan pa'i chos la bzhin// khyu mchog la zhon mkha' la rnam par lding // rab gnas yongasu gnas pa rnams kyi mchog/ blo ba rling dge slong 'di ni kr-iSh+NI la// yang yang
422b2(skyes rabs): nga pa gzhal yas khang 'od kyis// yud tsam par snang 'dzum rlabs dga' ldan par// byed cing dga' thub gter grang byon pa 'di// dge slong pi lin du ba da sA zhes brjod// me tog rab rgyas 'khri shing rgyas pa yi//
422b3(skyes rabs): nagus tshal nang n+ya bzhugs shing byon pa gang // mi dmin khyim gyi dpal la bltos med pa'i// dge slong 'di ni rna ba bye bar grags// gser gyi 'od kyis phyogs cha rnam par rgyan// lhun po'i gzugs gzhan bzhin du
422b4(skyes rabs): legs par mtshon+da// 'khor los sgyur gang mkha' la mdzes pa 'di// ston pa'i sras po sgra gcan 'dzin zhes brjod// de nas rI dang phyogs mtshams rnams dang ni// swa yi dkyil 'khor mkha' ngos khongs las kyang //
422b5(skyes rabs): rnam bkra rin chen khri dang bzhon par gnas// grangs med rmad byung dge slong tshogs 'di byon// de ltar de yi rim pas bshad gyur pa'i// dge sbyong dge 'dun khyed 'phags bzhin mthong nas// gzhan dag mtshon min de dag
422b6(skyes rabs): mtshungs par ni// dga' dang rmad byung gus pa'i dbang nyid gyur// de nas rab 'bar gsar gyi phye ma'i gos// nyi ma brgya ltar gsal ba 'gro la byung // gdung ba'i khyad par ma lus zhi byed pas// bsil zer phreng ba brgya
423a1(skyes rabs): ltar bsil ba yang // de nas nor bdag brgya byin tshangs sogs blon po rnams kyis ni// rgya chen na mkha' bgrod pa bsnyen cing rjes bgrod pa phul// 'chi med grong gi bu mos me tog tshogs na
423a2(skyes rabs): gtor bA las// rgyal ba'i zla ba bsod nams ldan pa rnams kyi mig lam gyur// grong khyer s+thi lam bco brgyad ldan pa der// mtshungs pa'i sgra ni bcu bdun dang bcas paste// rab zhugs ma ga d+hA ni bzung mo'i khyim// zla
423a3(skyes rabs): shel rin chen rdo yi rang bzhin byas// der ni yo byed rdzogs pa rnams mang gis// mngon par mchod cing kun gyis phyag 'tshal te// grang pa'i skye bo dag gis kun nas mchod// rtsig par gzugs brnyan snang byed phyi nos kyang
423a4(skyes rabs): bcom ldan brtse ldan dge 'dun dang bcas pas// brtse bas mchod pa blangs nas rjes gzung ni// gzigs pa'i cha yis ma ga d+ha bzang mo// gnyen dang btsasma rnams la bka' drin bsgrubs// ma go d+h+r-i bzang gyos
423a5(skyes rabs): sogs sde dang bcaste// grong pa'i skye bo kun dang bcas pa yang // de tshwa ston pa'i bstan pa dag gis noni// de dus bden mthong bsam pa dag par gyur// dge bsA rjes 'brel ma ga d+ha bzang gi// bsod nams mthu ni yangs pa
423a6(skyes rabs): mthong gyur nas// dge slong de dag gis der dge mtshan las// de yi sngon byung rgyal ba dag la dris// ma ga d+ha bzang dge ba'i rgyu dag ni// tshogasu de dag gis dris bcom ldan 'das// kun gzigs de yis tshems kyi 'od rnams
423b1(skyes rabs): kyis pa phyogs sgor snang ba sbyin zhing rab gsungs pa// ba ra NA si dag tu ston// sa bdag mdzes pa kr-i ki yi// bu mo gser phreng can zhes pa// gser phrang sgra dang ldan pa byung // ston pa 'od srungs zhes pa la// rtag tu
423b2(skyes rabs): gus ldan mA des// grogs mo byargya phrag lnga dang ni// lhan cig dag tu rim gr-i bsgrubs// nam zhig swa yi bdag po des// rnam 'gyur rmi lam+b+ha mthong ba las// 'jigs pa'i thA tshom kun 'khrul bas// 'bras bu mkhas
423b3(skyes rabs): pa dgra la dris// rgyal po'i bu mo lo snang bas// mtshan shes de dag gis der slus// shin tu mdza' ba dag gi snying // me la bsregs na zhi ba thob// ces pa de dag rnams kyi tshig/ rab gdugs ma bzung mi bdag ni// bu
423b4(skyes rabs): mo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das// 'od srungs dag la lta ru song // de la phyogs te des gsol pa// rmi lam mchog tu rnam 'gyur can// bdag gi deng mthong de la 'bras kun// thams cad mkhyen pas gsung bar 'os// glang
423b5(skyes rabs): chen rgya skar nas 'thon pa// rdu ma dag la thogs pa dang // de bzhin skom pa'i phyir rjes nas// khron pa rgyug pa bdag gis mthong // phye ni bre gang dag lnga yang // mu tig bre gang 'tshong ba mthong // ngan pa'i shing dang tsun dran ni//
423b6(skyes rabs): mnyam pa dag tu byed pa mthong // de bzhin g.yul du glang phrug gis// glang po chen po yang dge 'bod// mi gtsang ba yisau lus byugs pa'i// spre'u 'phar zhing gzhan la 'byug/ spre'u ngan pa g.yo ba'i gter//
424a1(skyes rabs): rgyal srid rgyas mngon dbang bskur// ras yug skyes bu bcwo brgyad kyis// drangs kyang kun tu nyams pa med// me tog 'bras bu'i dga' tshal ni// dga' ba chom rkun dag gis dkrugs// zhe sdang bzhad
424a2(skyes rabs): gad rtsod pa la// skye bo mang po chags pa ste// rma byung rmi lam 'odi dag gi// 'bras bu shin tu 'jigs rung snyam// zhes pa swa bdag gis dris pa// bcom ldan 'od srung gis gsungs pa// skye bo'i tshe lo brgya
424a3(skyes rabs): pa'i tshe// ston pa zhi ba shAkya thub// rgyal ba bdud N+DI'i chu gA ter 'byung // de ni khyod kyi glung blor mthong // de yi nyan thos tha ma yi// dus su rtsod pa la brten pas// tshul khrims yon tan kun spyod btang // bslang
424a4(skyes rabs): pa dang btsas 'byung bar 'gyur// de dag stobs kyis khyom nA ge nas// dben pa ma la smin chung rnams la// rang gis bsten pa lnga brten cing // bstan pa dag la byed par 'gyur// gang phyir zhu bya zhu byed kyis// /
424a5(skyes rabs): dngos pos bsten pa dag la rgyug/ d+he laswA sgom pa'i phyi nas ni// khron pa 'gro ba rnam par mthong // chags pas long zhing kun rmongs kyis// bcom pa de dag byang chub kyis// yan lAMg mu ti gau bre dgau ni// phye bri dag
424a6(skyes rabs): la 'tshong bar 'gyur// mu ste gas tshig ni shing ngan dong // sangs rgyas kyis gsungs tsan dan dag/ rmongs las khyad par mi shes pa// de dag gis ni mtshungs byed 'gyur// dul ba'i dge slong glang po che// bzang po
424b1(skyes rabs): thob nas 'ga' zhig tu// dge slong khrims 'chal glang phrug gi// 'gran zhing smod par byed par 'gyur// g.yo ba mi gtsang gis byugs lus// dge slong spre'us khyim bzang rnams// rang gi skyon gyis sgo byed cing //
424b2(skyes rabs): bdag nyid mtshungs par byed par 'gyur// spre'u bzhin du rigs 'khyal ba// mngon par dbyung ni bskur bar 'gyur// rdzogs sang+yas rgyas kyi bstan pa yi// ras yug drangs pas nyams mi 'gyur// dge 'dun
424b3(skyes rabs): rdzas ni 'bras bu yi// dgra'i tshal dag kyang rku bar 'gyur// phan tshun skyon nas rjod byed cing // thob mo'i ngang tshul dag tu 'gyur// khyod kyi rmi lam rnam smin mthar// 'bras bu 'di dag sa la 'byung // zhes pa ston pa'i tshig
424b4(skyes rabs): thos nas// sa yi bdag po ya mtshan gyur// de nas ston dris mi bdag nI// rjes 'bring bcas chos bstan pa// mdzad nAs gsor phyung can ma li// dge ba 'os pa nyid dag bstan// skye ba gzhan du mchod rten la// nA rang
424b5(skyes rabs): bya yi phreng bas mchod// legs byas de yis de nyid ni// gser phyeng dag gis mtshan par skyes// mu ga d+ha ni bzang mo 'di// de nyid bsod nams mthu chen gyis// yang dgra dge ba'i zom stegs nyid// de ring skye bo'i

425a1(skyes rabs): mchog 'phel slad stobs ldan bu la chags pas rdzun pa nyid// gal te bu la yon tan med na tshe rigs kun nyams pa min nam ci// gang gi bsod nams mthu yis 'khor ba'i chung glang
425a2(skyes rabs): bdag po che la gru bzhin du// rigs zung yang dag sgrol byed yon tan ljon pa'i bu mo de dag nges par 'byung // zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam

425a5(skyes rabs): ba shes g+hanyen dag gi bu// grags pa'i ba shes gnyen ces bya ba// grags pA can gyi tshud gyur byung // bdud rtsi zar gyis 'od zer can// de skye so che na bsod nams kyi// chu yis char med las
425a6(skyes rabs): skyes pa// mi bzad rgud pa zhi bar gyur// gzhon nu nyid la dbang gyur cing // srid pa'i longs spyong lis phyir phyogs// dge ba la brtson pa de song nas// rgyal ba rgyal byed tshal bzhugs bstan// ston pas/
425b1(skyes rabs): chos ni bstan pa yi swA// rab byung dgra bcom gnas la brdan// dwe ni gser+ya dang rdo mtshungs shing // dga' dang mi dga' btang bar gyur// dwe yaM che ba dag las chu// ro ldan dri med shIl gyi ni//
425b2(skyes rabs): khu ba zags pa gang zhig gi/ de ni rtag tu sred bral gyur// nam zhig dge slong thams cad kyis// dAge mtshan las ni bcom ldan la// de yi srid pa bral pa yis// bsod nams rgya ni rab tu
425b3(skyes rabs): drimi// des gsungs kA shI'i grong du sbyin// mdzes pa zhes bya tshong dpon bu// ston pa 'od spangs zhes pa yi// rab tu byung ba nyid du gyur// nam zhig sgom pas gzir gyur cing // gdung dus nyan pa'i
425b4(skyes rabs): lus na can des// so ga'i ts+ya te ka bzhin du// 'gar yang chu ni thob ma gyur// de yaM bsod nams ma yin pas// chu snod stong pa nyid du ni// khron pa yang dag chu med da dA dzugs ngogs 'phral la
425b5(skyes rabs): skams par gyur// de nas skom pas cho nga sgra// lus ni gtong bar brtson dA la// mkhan pos chu ni byin pa dag/ mthong ba man+ta pa dag/ mthong ba min pa nyid du gyur// de nas de yis ston pa ni// 'od srungs bAk+Sha
425b6(skyes rabs): yis chu yi snod// mi zad pa nyid bzhin gyur pa// dge 'dun dag la yun rings brims// de yi chu ni bcom ldan 'das// 'od srungs dag legs dag gi gau tir// rab tu dang bas thugs rje nas// phyag gi
426a1(skyes rabs): pad+mos rab bzhes mdzad// der ni skye bo'i tshogs 'ongs pas// chu ni zad pa myed gyur pa// mthong nas ya mtshan dag dang bcas// bden pa mthong ba thob par gyur// de yI bsod nams sgron

426a5(skyes rabs): bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // rgya che sdig pa'i mun par 'jug pa dag ni rab spangs nas// 'phrul la snying rje'i 'od zer snang ba rab tu rgyas pa yis// skyon sel ci yang yongasu gdung pa dag kyang 'phrog byed pa//
426a6(skyes rabs): sangs rgyas 'od stong ldan pas dam pa'i lam ni ston par byed// grong khyer rgyal po'i khab na sngon// ka lan da ka'i gnas zhes pa// 'od ma'i tshal na bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bzhugs//
426b1(skyes rabs): grong khyer ded dpon don byin gyi// chung mA rno mo zhes bya ba// bu nyid dag ni dus gcig tu// mtshe ma nyid du byung bar gyur// pha ni lnga pa nyid gyur cing // nor dang 'khor ni zad pa'i tshe// shang ku mtshams byin zhes bya ba// de
426b2(skyes rabs): dAg mo yis tshegs kyis bskyed// me yi tshig gis chom rkun lnga// rab zhugs byis pa de dag gis// khyim zla drag gi nor chung dang // snod rnams dal gyis brlag par byas// mA dang pha yi dul ba yis ni rung ba
426b3(skyes rabs): nyid 'gyur zhing // de yi btong snyoms nyid kyis 'dul ba min pa'i g.yang la lhung // rlung gi skye bo sngon bskyed bag chags dgra dang 'brel ba las// byis pa rnams ni trail bzhin gzhan gyi rang bzhin sten par byed/
