426b6(skyes rabs): bya ba'i bde ba la gus pa de nyid ni// smin par gyur pa srog ni nyams byed mi bzad zong dag yin// yul gyi btung bas rgyags shing 'khrugs pa rnams kyi chags pa gang // rku dang sreg dang gsod pas thob pa'i nor gyis rab
427a1(skyes rabs): bskyed pa// de ni yongs smin rkang lag bcad dang gas la shing la zhon pas// yongs brags khrag dang rgyun gyis phyi rol dag tu 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas gsod pa'i phreng bas mtshan// sngon
427a2(skyes rabs): dmar gos kyis g.yogs de dag/ lta ru 'ongs pa'i skye bos bskur// gsod pa'i gnas su nye bAr song // brtse ldan kun ma khyen gyis mkhyen// rang nyid sa der mngon phyogs te// rje su gzung ba'i bka' drin gyis//
427a3(skyes rabs): bcings pa dag dang bral bar mdzad// kun+da mkhyen bkro' yis de dag ni// rgyal pos btang zhing sdig pa grol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la// rab tu byung nas bstan pa thob// ye shes 'byor 'bar de dag ni//
427a4(skyes rabs): mya dang bcas mthong gyur nas// dge slong gis dris dge mtshan laswA// de gtam bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// snron gyi skye ba dag la yang // 'di dag bdag gis rab tu bsrungs// de tshe 'di dag nyid kyi ma// stag
427a5(skyes rabs): mo 'jigs rung gzugs ldan gyur// dI dus byang chub sems dpa' ni// brtse bas lus can rnams kyi gnyen// snying rje'i rdul zhes bya ba yI// sa skyong bur ni d+ya nyid gyur// num+ba zhig bkres pas nyen pa yis// phru gu
427a6(skyes rabs): 'di dag za rtsom pa'i// stag mo de ni rang gi lusau// byin nas bdag gis rnam par bzlog/ las kyi lhag ma da lta yang // 'di dag chomo rkun nyid du gyur// stag mo de ni ma 'di ste// 'di dag bdag gis rab tu bsrungs// zhes
427b1(skyes rabs): gsungs bcom ldan thugs rjes yis// rgya mtsho 'byung po la dgongs pa// dge slong tshogs dang bcas pa dag/ rgyal byed tshul du rab tu gshegs// bdud rtsi'i ro yi char bzhin mi 'dod sel// 'dod pa dam pa'i gzigs
427b2(skyes rabs): pa gang lhung bas// lhung ba rnams kyang bsod nams kyis mtho ba'i// bsngags par 'os par mdzad pa rgyal gyur cig/ ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri
427b3(skyes rabs): shing las/ stag mo ma lus byin pa'i rtog pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// / zla ba kun dga' nyi ma'i rab gsal dang // ma yi tsha ba rlung gi mgyogs pa dang // snying rje la dgra' skye bo che rnams kyi/
427b4(skyes rabs): gzhan la phan pa lhan skyes rang bzhin yin// 'phags rgyal skyed mos tshal du mngon// rgyal po dpal ldan 'char byed ni// rtse dgu'i ro dang ldan pa dag/ btsun mor bcas pa rnam par gnas// de yi mdzes ma ut+pal
427b5(skyes rabs): mig/ me tog thu la chags pa rnams// thub pa brgya phrag lnga rnams ni// 'dod dragar 'ongs pa dag gis mthong // phrag dog khro ba skyong ba dris// dga' bar mig bkod de dag rnams// rkang pa lag bcad pa'i khrag gis ni// 'di
427b6(skyes rabs): la nyal ba dag tu byas// mi bzang gnang bcad cho ngo yis// gzir cing cho de ldan de dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan thugs rje yis// ston pa'i spyan gyis rab tu gzigs// de yi gzigs bdud rtsi yi// char ltar reg pas de dag
428a1(skyes rabs): rnams/ srog bzung rkang lag legs par 'byar// gdung ba dang bral yang dag langs// de nas rab rdzogs de dag la// bcom ldan 'das kyi mchos bstan mdzad/ gang gis myur du de dag rnams//
428a2(skyes rabs): phyir mi 'ong 'bras dar pa thob// de mthong dge slong mtshar bcas pas// dris shing bcom ldan rgyal ba yis// gsungs pa sngon yang 'di dag rnanra// bdag gi brtse ba nyid kyi bzung / a ra NA si dag tu sngon/ rgyal po tshad byin dag gre ni 'byed byed sdig pa byas pa yi/ blon po
428a3(skyes rabs): brgya b+hu A hA// rgyal pos 'di la snga dag gdung // mya ngam lam du bgrod de dag/ so ga grib ma chu med par// mi bzad skom pas lhung bar gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gnyis 'thung che// bzang po zhes pas de dag mthong // da
428a4(skyes rabs): dag cho de'i 'das phug nas// snying rjes gdung pa dang bcas gyur// chu dang rtsa bA 'bras ster des// ring po ring po drag nas chu// lag pa shin tu che bas blangs// de dag skom pa dang bral byas// de yi dga' bas rtag tu ni//
428a5(skyes rabs): srog gi gzungs ngag nges par bstan// rgya che ngal ba rab zhi ba// de dag der ni ngal bsos thob// de nas dus kyis so ldan pa// lus kyi btang ba de nyid kyi// lus dag sbyangs nas dri dag gis// lha la 'os pa'i mchod pa
428a6(skyes rabs): byas// dgon par bdag ni glang po yis// sdug bsngal de las blon po ni// sngon bsgral de dag la lta yang // thub pa 'di dag gi mi 'dod las// zhes pa gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das// sems can kun sgrol
428b1(skyes rabs): brtul zhugs can// thub pa'i tshogs kyis mchod byed cing // rang gri dka' thub nags su gshegs// ston pa'i thugs rje bdud rtsi'i chu bo ni// ma lus bde dang dge ba'i pho nya ste// srid pa'i mya ngan gdung bsil
428b2(skyes rabs): grib ma dang // ma bzhin skyed par byed pa rgyal gyur cig/ ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ glang po'i rtog sa brjod pa'i yal
428b3(skyes rabs): 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // rnam sdang skyon gyi dug gis yid ni sun phyogs gyur rnams kyi// dam pa dag la gnod pa sgrub la 'bad pa rab rno gang // de nyid gal te de yi yon tan rab 'bar
428b4(skyes rabs): rjeswA byed par// g+hur+ya ni srid 'di su zhig rgya cher gnod dang ldan par 'gyur// rgyal ba rgyal po'i khab dang nye// 'od ma'i tshal na rgyu ba ni// lhas byin gyis ni snang bas sdom/ rab tu bskul po'i dka' thub pa
428b5(skyes rabs): de yi sau byin pa'i mitshon cha can// smin+d+ra 'khyog 'jigasu rung ba'i bzhin// khro bas dul ba nyams gyur pa'i// rtsom pa chen pos mngon par gtses// baurgya phyug lnga yi dka' thub can+da// de dag gi sa 'phangs mtshon gyi
428b6(skyes rabs): char// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku laM ni// pad+ma ut+pal tshogs nyid gyur// dam pa rnams la rnon po yi// mtshon yang 'jam pa sten byed de// sdang ba'i dug gis byugs gyur pa// sdig pa can gyi sems ni min// ston
429a1(skyes rabs): pa'i sku ni sgrib byed pa// nor bu'i rang bzhin khang pa brtsegs// nam mkha'i 'od ni rab 'khrungs te// lta ba dag ni bzlog ma gyur// de nas dka' thub can de drag/ ngal zhing ngo tsha bzhin dud pas
429a2(skyes rabs): bzod pa'i rgyu mtsho rab dang pa// ston+da paM yi ni zhabs la gtugs// bcom ldan kyis kyang bu la bzhin// rab tu dang ldan de dgra la// gnod byed la yang khro ba med pas// chos nI rab tu bsnun pA mdzad// tshun
429a3(skyes rabs): po rnams kyi yid ni 'khrugs pa'i rnam 'phrul med pa yi// bde dang zhi ba le brten bsod nams bzod pa dag gi chu// dri med bsil po dag dang ldan pa phan mi 'jug pa ni// de thob khro ba'i rdul gyis rnyog pa
429a4(skyes rabs): dag tu yong mi 'gyur// sten pas chos bstan+da rab byung gi// bsam pa rab phyis de dag gis// zag pa kun las rnam grol ba// dgra bcom nyid ni rab tu thob// skabs der 'ongs pa'i dge slong ni// gtam de thos shing
429a5(skyes rabs): ngo mtshar dang // bcas pas 'di ci zhes pa dris// rgyal bas de dag la gsungs pa// sngon+da gyi skye ba dag la yang // shin tu gnod byas 'di dag la// rnam 'gyur med pa bdag gis ni// rab tu dang bustu nges par bltas/
429a6(skyes rabs): mtsho dag tu 'gro ba la// gzings ni chag par gyur tsho sngon// 'di dag kA shi'i yul skyes pa'i// tshong pas srog la the tshom thob// de la bdag ni rus sbal gyis// rgyab tu bkod nas rab tu bsgral// 'tsho ba thob cing pha rol
429b1(skyes rabs): tu/ phyin nas ngal bsos rnam par bsten// rab tu bsgral bas yongs ngal te// bdag ni skad cig gnyid log tshe// bdag sha za 'dod de dag rnams// thams cad bdag ni gsod par brtson// rdo yo char chen rab
429b2(skyes rabs): spros kyang // khog pa rab tu bstan ldan zhing // gong bu'i dbyibs can bdag gi ni// lus ni dag cing nyams ma gyur// de nas bkres pas yongs nyen te// mthong nus snying rjes bdag 'khrugs pas// rang gi de dag rnams
429b3(skyes rabs): la lus// byin nas bya ba byas nyid gyur// sngon gyi tshong pa de dag ding // dka' thub can ni 'dri dag gyur// gnod pa byas kyang snying rje yis// bdag gis dge ba dgra la bkod// de dag sngon tshe bdag nyid che// ston pa 'od srungs
429b4(skyes rabs): bstan pa lo// rab byung thob nAs de yI 'bras// da lta skal ldan dag tu skyes// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ni// thos nas dge slong rnams kyis ni// de yi bzod pa sa gzhi bzhin// khur dag bzod pa rab
429b5(skyes rabs): tu bsngags// gang zhig tshul khrims bri med bsil ba'i chu ldan sems can bsam pa dbugs 'byin byed// khon gyi rdul ni rab tu drag byed bzod pa'i chu bo sems la rtag gnas pa// de dag bzlog dka' dgra yI gnod
429b6(skyes rabs): la khro bas me 'bar phreng bas rnam bslad par// sred par rab bskyed rgya cher gdung bas yongs 'dris rnam 'gyur dag tu 'gyur ma yin// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa
430a1(skyes rabs): dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ rus sbrul gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // rigs kyi ri bo dag gi rtse mo shin tu mtho ba dang // dmu' zhing mi
430a2(skyes rabs): gtsang tshogs dang phyag dar khrod kyis gang bar yang // nyinu mo 'dren+da pa'i snang ba mtshungs par phan byed bdag nyid can// 'di ni bye brag med par 'jug par nges par 'bab pa nyid// grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu
430a3(skyes rabs): sngon// 'on ma'i tshal-i bzhugs rgyal ba la// mu gre'i tshe na bkres pa yis// yongs nyen gyad rnams skyabasu song // snying rje'i dpag bsam rkeng 'thung gis// mngon par 'dod pa'i zas byin nas// gau nas skabs ngan pa zhi
430a4(skyes rabs): ba'i spyad// de dag rnams la chos bstan mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes bzung gis// dge ba rgyas pa thob pa rnams// dgra bcom gnas ni thob gyur nas// 'gro bas mchod bya nyid du// dman pa shin tu mthor gyur pa/
430a5(skyes rabs): de mthong grong khyer gnas pa rnams// rtag tu de dag rigs le nAM// spyod cing phrag dog ldan par gyur// kye ma dag pa'i bstan pa la// bcom ldan 'das kyis kla klo'i gyad// 'os min+da rnams la dgra bcom gnas// nges por bstan
430a6(skyes rabs): skyes de dag smros// chung ngu 'byor pa ma chung la// gsar pa'i sgro dga' mi bzod pa'i// skye bo ngo tshe skye ba byed pa'i// skye ba mchog tu rab gsal byed// rgyal ba'i bka' yis sgra mi snyan// gling du mkha' las 'gro 'ong byas// mthu/
430b1(skyes rabs): yis kyang ni de dag rnams// mi bdag skye bor bcas pas mchod// de dag grong pas phyug byas te// rab dang bkur byas de dag rnams// rang yon yon tan mchod 'os pas// drage skyong rnams kyi mchog nyid
430b2(skyes rabs): gyur// de nas de mthus ya mtshan pa'i// dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan la// de yi bsod nams rgyu mtshan dris// de la thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs// sngon gyi skye bar k+Sha sha yi// yul mtha' dka' thub
430b3(skyes rabs): tshil du bdag/ mngon shes lha dang ldan dka' thub can// dge bya'i ngang tshul zhes par gyur// der ni rdzong gi gyang 'di dag/ sngon tshe thub pa dag tu gyur// badrug gis dge bstan de dag rnams// mngon shes lnga pa nyid
430b4(skyes rabs): du gyur// skye ba 'di yang bskyod names de'i// bag chags groms pa'i dga' ba yis// gyad kyi rnams ni 'khor ba yi nA/ nyon mongs dag las bdag gis bsgral// 'di dag rnams sngon ston pa ni// 'od srungs
430b5(skyes rabs): drung du rab byung ste// rgyal po'i gnas su gnas par gyur// de yis da lta gyad nyid gyur// ces pa gyad rnams dag gi ni// skyo ba sngar byung bcom ldan 'das// thams cad gzigs pas gsungs pa dag/ thos
430b6(skyes rabs): nas dge slong ya mtshon gyur// gza' yi bdag po'i snang bas rjes gzung bas// mun pa'i tshogs kyi rnam par zum gyur po'i// 'di ma skyes chu dang bcas pa rnams dag kyang // mkhas pa'i cod pan du 'os
431a1(skyes rabs): nyid du 'gyur// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ dka' thub pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa
431a2(skyes rabs): brgyad pa'o// // lus can lus dang de bzhin yid kyi ni// srid pa'i rang bzhin nad med 'phrog byed pa// 'jig rten kun gyi 'jig rten pha rol gnyen// sangs rgyas bcom ldan bdud rtsi'i gter nyid do// mnyan yod du ston bcom
431a3(skyes rabs): ldan 'das// rgyal ba'i gzigs pa bdud rtsi yis// skye bo nad kyis gzir rnams dang // dge slong tshogs kyang sos par mdzad// mnyes gshin gyis ni ya mtshan pa'i// dge slong tshogs la de gsungs pa// sngon gyi skye ba
431a4(skyes rabs): dag la yang // bdag gis khyed rnams bsos par byas// bdag sngon pa ra NA saM sa ni// mi bdag pad+ma can zhes pa// gzir ba thams cad sel la chags// skye dgu'i pha dang mtshungs par gyur// nam zhig gnam gyi skyon gyis ni/
431a5(skyes rabs): yul dang dus ni mi bzad ltos// gyong pa rnams la bzod dka' yis// nad ni ra rgyas par gyur// sman pa sman gyi tshogs dang ni// zhi dang shis pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gis phun tshogs bsgrubs t+kA s+ya pa// de dgu bsos pa
431a6(skyes rabs): nyid ma gyur// de dag nad ni bzlog pa la// nya chen ro hi ta zhes pa// mtsha shes pa'i sman pasastan// 1pas 'ga' yang thob ma gyur// nya de med pas skye bo rnams// srog la the tshom gyur che bdag/ de
431b1(skyes rabs): dag cho de mi bzad pas// sdug bsngal gyis gzir snying rje laswa// nad pa kun la phan 'os pa// ro hi ta yI ny+dzar ni bdag/ gyur ces smon lam brtul zhugs kyis// bA grA ma dros nas lus dag 'phangs// gzir ba'i smon lham
431b2(skyes rabs): dede yis ni// chu bo bA ra dag gi chur// skad cig gis bdag ro hi ta'i// nya ni shin tu chen por gyur// de yi nya ni nyer sbyar bas// grong khyer ni gnas de dag kun// bdud rtsi'i yis ni rkang pa bzhin// 'phral la bsos pa nyid du gyur//
431b3(skyes rabs): de nyid dge slong rnams te// de ring bdag gis nad las bsgral// sems can rnams kyi nang bskyabs pas// rtag tu bdag ni nad dang bral// bde gshegs 'khor ba'i nad kyis ni// sman+da pas de skad gsungs pa dge dag
431b4(skyes rabs): slong bsos pa de dag gis// thos nas dga' dgu rangs pa dang // shin tu chud pa'i rtswa dang mtshungs pa yis// lus dang byin pa gang la rtse dga' can// gzhan phan yid dang bral ba min rnams kyis// snying stobs bcas
431b5(skyes rabs): pa nI yang rnam par gsal// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ pad+ma can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa'o//
431b6(skyes rabs): gang gis bsam par bla med byang chub 'dod// bdud rtsi'i pho nya dang po zla tshes bzhin// bsod nams kyis ni gsar du 'jug byed pa// snying stobs rgya mtsho su zhig der phyag 'os// rgyal byed tshal bzhugs rgyal ba la// dpal
432a1(skyes rabs): ldan ko sa la yi dbang // gsal rgyal dge mtshan la chags shing // rab tu btud pas sngon zhus pa// khyod kyi yang dag rdzogs pa yi// byang chub bag chags dang po ni// sngon gyi skye ba gang la skyes
432a2(skyes rabs): 'od zer rgya che bcom ldan gsungs// sa bdag gis 'du dris de la// tshems kyi 'od zer yid kyi rdzing // gtsang ma'i ngang pa'i phreng ston cing // bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa// grong khyer 'od ldan dag tu ston//
432a3(skyes rabs): rab gsul sa bdag ga tIr du ni// gang tshe bdag gyur de tshe bdag/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub blo gros gyur// glang po chags ldan glang mo la// dga' ba'i zhags pas rab tu drangs// gnas su 'khyoms nas gang gi tshe// de ni
432a4(skyes rabs): nye bar 'ongs gyur pa// de tshe glang chen sna chen po// kun tu bgrod kyis de la smraso// sa bdag b+ha dag gi bslab pa yis// gleng po dag tu ni rab tu 'ongs// 'dod chags kyis ni yang dag drangos// dul ba brjed pa'i glang po
432a5(skyes rabs): 'di// yon tan dkyil 'khorar+ya yid bstan pa// nges par rnam 'gyur dag tu gyur// lus 'dzin 'dod chags dran pas rab bskyed dran 'phrog bstan pa 'joms pa ni// me dang nyi ma min pas gdung zhing dmod pas
432a6(skyes rabs): min pas dmyal bar byed// long dang mtshan mo min pa'i rab ribo lag 'gro'i rdzas min mi bzang dug/ chang min myos byed dman min lhung byed 'byung po min pa'i smyo byed do// zhes pa kun bgrod kyis smras tshe// de la
432b1(skyes rabs): mi bdag gis smras pa// chags bral chags yul la chags med pa// 'ga' zhig 'khor ba na yod dam// zhes pa sa yi bdag pos dris// kun tu bgrod kyis de la smras// 'gro ba 'di na de bzhin gshegs//
432b2(skyes rabs): 'khor ba med pa ther 'dod chags bral// dam pa'i snod drang yon tan+da can// sems can kun la phan mdzad pa// rgyal po sangs rgyas sgron ma yi// 'od kyis thams cad gsal bar mdzad// de dug thos naswA sa yi bdag
432b3(skyes rabs): mchog tu rab dang sems ldan pa'i// snying la rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi// bag chags 'phra lnga la rab tu 'khrungs// sngon gyi bsod nams mthu yis ni// dge ba rgyas pa yang dag thob// de yis yang dag rdzogs pa yi// byang chub
432b4(skyes rabs): thob skud smon lam byas// de ni sngon gyi skye ba la// rdza mkhan khyim bdag ces par gyur// de yis dbul che gus pa yis/ bu ram zan gyi rgyal ba mchod// de yoM bsod nams smon lam gyis/ rUb gsal nyid thob de yi na
432b5(skyes rabs): sems li byang chubo myu gu bskrun// da lte bdag lnga 'bras 'di grub// dang po dag pa'i byang chub sems bskyed pa// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa de ni der// bdud rtsi bzhin du thos pa'i khyor pa yis// ko sa la dbang
432b6(skyes rabs): des 'thungs rgyal sar song // zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs po brjod pa dpag bsam gyis 'khri shing las/ bsod nams rab gsal gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab
433a1(skyes rabs): ste brgya pa'o// / gyang zhig skyed byed tsha zer ldan pa rgyu ba'i zhabs ni nye bar bsten pa 'dzin// gang zhig ma ni tho rangs snang ba mchod 'os rtag par rgyun du rab gsal 'char// skye bo
433a2(skyes rabs): thams cad dga' bu'i snga dro de nyid nyin mo dgra la bsngags par 'os// de yi rjes 'brang 'jig rten 'di 'am gzhan du 'gar yang mun pas rig mi 'gyur// sa dbang zas ga cing grags pa lhag ma yaM//
433a3(skyes rabs): gnas skabs gyur tshe de yi lus la ni// de bzhin gshegs pa dag mchog gsal mdzad pas// gus pas mchod mdzod mchod rten dag kyang mdzad// dben po'i spyod tshul 'jig rten thun mong min// ji ltar bzhed
433a4(skyes rabs): par 'jig rten ldum 'jug pa// de la the tshom ya mtshan gyis gang ba'i// dge slong tshogs kyis mngon du phyogs twa dris// mi nyams bla na med pa'i byang chub gonas// chags sgra sbyangs pas 'jig rten spyod
433a5(skyes rabs): btang ba// 'gro ba'i bla khyod bla ma la gus pas// thu snyad spyod la 'jug pa 'di ni ci// bcom ldan chos gzigs dag gis der gsungs pa// dbye ba'i gnas su gyur pA lus dag gi/ rgyur gyur phra ma dag ni mkhas
433a6(skyes rabs): rnams kyi// bla ma yis kyang mchod 'os zhe sar 'os// dang por mtha' dag bsod nams la 'jug pa'i// pha ma gang gis rtag tu mi mchod pa// de dag tshe sa min nyid 'gyur zhing // ye shes snang ba nag po
433b1(skyes rabs): nyid du 'gyur// skye ba gzhan la gus dang zhes yis// dka' thub la zhugs pha ma long ba dag/ khyim la chags btang bdag gis mchod pa yis// lha bzhin rtag pa nyid du mnyes par byas// kA shi'i grong du gnyis
433b2(skyes rabs): skyes gnyen bcos kyi// chung ma gau ta mi ka zhes la sngon// rigs ni dag cing gtsang bar byed pa'i bu// blo ldan sngo bsangs can zhes bya ba byung // khyod shugs de dag rgas pas long ba thob// bu la khyim
433b3(skyes rabs): bkod nags mtha' dag tu spong // mkhas pa rnams ni rga ba 'drug pa na// dben pa mchog tu dar ba nyid du gyur// de dag bu ni kun spyod yon tan gyiso// rgyal pos 'dun na 'don du rab zhus kyang // phra mo'i mchod
433b4(skyes rabs): papa la chags lang tsho can// bsod nams dka' thub rlugs der de tshe song // mkhas pa de yis 'bad pas rtsa ba dang // 'bras bu chu dang btsas pas rim gro byas// cho ga shas yid ni rab tu dang ba skyes// de yi pha ma dag
433b5(skyes rabs): gis rab dga' thob// de nas nam zhig rngon la rtse ba yis// de drag bsti gnas dang nye chu klung 'gram// ma he gnyis 'thung dbang gis mi dman pa'i// sa dwer mi yi badrag po tshangs byin 'ongs// skabs der der ni ri
433b6(skyes rabs): dwags pags pas mtshan// chus gang bum pa med len pa'i sngo bsangs can// ri dwags don gnyer rgyal pos ring po nas// rna ba'i bar du drangs pa'i mda' yis bsnun// mi srun tshig gis bzhin du mda' rnon
434a1(skyes rabs): ni// bde med las kyis nye bAr gnas pa de// gnang du zug byas drag tu phug pa des// rnam par g.yo zhing dal gyis rab smras pa// kye ma shin tu 'phags pa maun prA s+ya// sgying NAM'i
434a2(skyes rabs): bsam pa med pas rgyu med du// sdig pa ma sbyang bya min la tshugs nas// srog ni 'phrog par byed pa'i mda' 'di 'phangs// nags na phra ma'i lus 'dzin du gnas pa// mig rab nyams pa'i dbyig par gyur
434a3(skyes rabs): pa bdag/ kyi hud bsau che re me de dag bas // gsum+b+ha gsod drag po'i 'bad 'di su zhig gau/ zhes pa gdung bas 'khrul sgra bram ze dwe// smA ra'i ri mo gsarA chags myi bdag gis// bung po dang bcas
434a4(skyes rabs): tsA ta gsar pa dag/ shing mkhan dag g+his bcad bzhin mdun du mthong // bla ma'i nyon mongs khyad par bsam pas gdung // 'bar ba'i mAM rtse lta bur spyod pa'i mda'// sgros mtshan srog gi mi mthun+da phyogs
434a5(skyes rabs): gyur// gser gyi ltod can snying la 'dzin byed cing // chu klung dog s+ya na 'gre ldog byed pa de// mthong nas myi dbang brtan pa rab tu nyams// gzi byin bral ba radwa gri mang+ga'i de yis// bsnun pa bzhin du rgya che grodung
434a6(skyes rabs): bar gyur// de la des smras thub pa ri dgas kyi// pags pas lus stong g.yogs pa khyod ni bdag/ rab tu rmongs pas bcom mo dam pa kye// bdag nyid gnod pa'i ma yis gzhom mi 'os// zhes pa rgyal po gzir
434b1(skyes rabs): bu'i tshig thos nas// ral pa'i tshogs bkra gzhonu nu rang bzhin gyis// khro med yid ldan snying stobs gter gyis ni// drag por gdung ba bzod byas de la smras// rgyal po dka' thub mod pas 'jigs don
434b2(skyes rabs): med// khro bral bdag dang bdag gi pha ma dag/ long ba srog 'phrog gnod pa 'di la yang // khyod la dmod pa dag gi 'dor mi 'gyur// srid par srog chags rlung gis byas pa'i las// 'khrul med
434b3(skyes rabs): 'bras bu can rnams dus su nAM// bde dang sdug bsngal yon tan rgyus pa dang // skyon dang dmod pa gsod pa'i slad du 'gyur// gang zhig lam nas ngal gyis 'gro ba lhung zhing lus nI rab tu nyams pa 'thob// gang
434b4(skyes rabs): zhig lam 'bras gA yang sar yongasu 'khyams shing 'jug pa nyams pa myed por 'jug/ gang zhig lan gcig ma yin mkhas pa nyams shing dpal bsten lce lo can las kyi ri mo rtsig pa med par bdag
434b5(skyes rabs): nyid kun gyis bkod de rnam par bak+ku// bdag gi chu bum phyi ma med pa 'di// pha ma skam pas gzir la 'tsho bar ni// gzhung bzang la brten brtse bas blan+da pa'i blos// myur bAr song sna khyod kyis sbyin par bya//
434b6(skyes rabs): zhes pa mgrin pa'i bar du srog rgyu zhing // dbugs brtsegs ngal bas sgra bsgribs chu ngur brjod// bzhin ni phyi rol phyogs pa'i mda' dag la// thub pa des ni skyengs pa ston bzhin mdzad// de nas dbang mchog
435a1(skyes rabs): tu rab gdung bas// bum pa blangs nas dre dag bsti gnas phyin// rgan rgon bu cig ldan pa de dag mthong // de dag gam du 'gro bar yongs ma nus// ring nas rdog sgra dag la rna gtod cing //
435a2(skyes rabs): mdza' bas rab tu 'dod ldan bu zhes pa// sgra ba dwe dag la ni nye btu de// dmod pas nyams pa mi 'dod rgyal po sna smras// glang chen myos pa'i tshul gyis a mra'i shing // 'joms bzhin gang gis gzhon
435a3(skyes rabs): nu rU ba bcom pa// skyes mchog 'khri shing dag gi sta re rtsub// sdig pa'i skal ldan bad+mag ni khyed sras min// bdag gi mda' yi lus btsam khyod kyi sras// de ni sdug bsngal gyur nas chu 'gram nyal// sdig
435a4(skyes rabs): pa'i gdung ba chu las tshe grang dang // bcas pa'i dmod pa drag bdag gi spyi bor dor// nor 'dzin bdag po sna de skad brjod tsam las// rdo rjes bcom bzhin brtan pa nyams de dag/ shin tu bzod dka' mya ngan las
435a5(skyes rabs): 'jigs bzhin// rab tu che ba rmongs pa'i phugu nad zhugs// de nas rgyal pos chu grang gtor de dag/ ji zhig ltar stes 'du shes che shas thob// sa bdag khyod kyi bdag cag bu drung du// khrid ces snying rjes rab smra ba//
435a6(skyes rabs): de nas de yis chu klung nye bar khrid// gling dang sgron med nye bar bying gyur pas// lag pas mda' bsnun bu la reg byas nas// de yi mda' yis phug bzhin de dag 'gyel// bu cig bla ma dag la mnyes gshin yang //
435b1(skyes rabs): phra ma rgan long mgo med btang nas ni// ci slad glo bur mtho ris khyod 'gro zhes// de dag gis ni de la dam 'khyud smras// bu khyod me yi sbyin sreg la dga' zhing ka bla ma'i lha dang ldan pas bdag cag ni// zol
435b2(skyes rabs): med gus pa'i mchod pas mnyes byas pa'i// bden pa des khyod zug rngu med gyur cig/ ces pa bla ma dag gi snying sto bas rdzogs// snying rjes gzir ba'i bden pa tshig brjod tsam las// brgya byin mngon phyogs
435b3(skyes rabs): bdud rtsis bran pa yis// gzhon nu r+m+ma dang bral zhing bsos par byas// bdag ni de che der gus brtul zhugs can// thub pa'i gzhon nu sngo bsangs can der gyur// shAkya'i rigs 'khrungs mchod bya bdag gi yang
435b4(skyes rabs): 'bad nas mchod bya pha ma de dag go// de ltar rnam mAng chos kyi rtsa ba ni// bde gshegs kyis gsungs dge slong gis thos naswa// bla ma bsten pa'i brtul zhugs dang mtshungs// dam+bi pa'i spyod pa gzhan dag med
435b5(skyes rabs): paR+Sha sems// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsnam gyi 'khri shring las// sngo bsangs can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yul 'dab ste brgya rtsa
435b6(skyes rabs): gcig pa'o// // brtan pa'i sbyin pas skye bo dman pa rnams kyi gdung ba sel// tshul khrims kyis ni skye bo dam pa'i yid dag tshim par byed// shes rab stobs kyis kyang ni dben pa dang bral gti
436a1(skyes rabs): mug 'brog/ brtson 'grus kyis ni 'jigs su rlung ba'i 'jigs pa bzlog par byed// chos kyi bka' yis mnyan spyod na// dbye ba skyems can la ston+d+ha cing // rtul ba rgyal byed chal
436a2(skyes rabs): bzhugs la// dge slong rnams kyis sngon dris pa// bcom ldan khyod kyis brgyu byin+da dang // sa badrag gzugs can snying po dang // dge slong kun shes kr-iN+Di n+ya// bden pa mthong ba dag la bkod// dr-i yi zhar
436a3(skyes rabs): la lha rnams ni// 'bum phrag gnyis dang de bzhin du// khri phrag bzhi yis bden po ni// mthong ba'i snod nyid rab tu thob// kun la phan mdzad khyod kyi 'di// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin nam// yon tan bsod
436a4(skyes rabs): nums rjes 'gro ma// skye bor goms pa'i rab dang yin+da// dge slong rnams kyis 'di brjod gras na// bcom ldan 'dras kyis slar gsungs pa// bdag gi blo gros gzhon phan la// gom pA lhan cig skyes pa nyid/
436a5(skyes rabs): skye ba 'dir bdag sems can la// phan par dga' ba ci zhig mtshar// rtag tu goms las seng+ge dang // glang sogs skye bar 'di la 'gyur// sngon tshe ded dpon lce phyogs pa// drag pos 'brings pa'i bud med drang //
436a6(skyes rabs): don mthun 'bum phrag gnyis rjes 'brang // chu gter dag gi ngogs su phyin// de dus dus ni gzhan pa bzhin// 'gro ba za ba la chags pa// 'jigs rung lus rgyas sbrul chen ni// pham pa zhes pa byung bar gyur// skye ba
436b1(skyes rabs): kun gyi nyon mongs kyi// skrag pa bzhin du bzod dka' de// mthong nas brtan pa rnam pa nyams// de dag dkrugs pa bzhin du gyur// gdengs can de yi lus kyi ni// lam dag kun nas bskor ba'i tshe// bsam
436b2(skyes rabs): bral lus kyi kha sgor gnas// de dag rnams kyis cho nge bAton// ma lus lha rnams bstod pa yis// skyabs pa'i sgra ldan de dag gi/ cho phyogs kun khyab byed pa// snying rje'i sgra ni rgyas par gyur// de nas seng+ge'i
436b3(skyes rabs): ri phug gnas// grags pa'i ral can zhes pa dang // dwe yi grogs po glang po che// mnu d+hi ra yis sgra dwe thos// rgyud pa skyeb la chags shing // yid ni snying rje'i drangs gyur pa// drin mthun skyob la dus byas pA'i//
436b4(skyes rabs): bsnun pa de dag 'ongs par gyur// de nas glang chen rI bo yi// lus can dag la seng ge zh-ina?// shugs kyis bsnun nas sbrul chen ni// sgrog dang bral+la dag tu byas// de yi srog ni 'gro dus// dbugs kyi rlung ni
436b5(skyes rabs): sreg byed dgra/ rab tu 'bar byas seng+ge dang // glang po dgra ni thal bar byas// de nas deng dpon de rnams kyis// de drug lus lu mchod pa'i slang // mchod rten byas nas de dag gi/ grags pa dang 'grogs
436b6(skyes rabs): phyogs su song // nga nyid de tshe don mthun la// srog ster sang+ge dag tu gyur// lhas byin dag ni sbrul chen te// shA ri'i bu ni glang po che// snying stobs zla ba de yi spyod pa legs byas rab tu gsal// kun la phan
437a1(skyes rabs): par byed mkhas grags shing chen po dag tu 'os// rgyal bas gsungs pa thos nas dgu' ba thob gyur cig/ dge slong de dag rnams kyi tshig gi so sor rab tu bsngags// zhes pa dge bar
437a2(skyes rabs): dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpago bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ sang+ge'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste burgya rtsa gnyis pa'o// // do shAl rab gsal gos
437a3(skyes rabs): mchog cod pan dang // gdugs dang rnga yab dkar pos 'dzum pa'i dpal// mchog gi long spyod skal bzang dga' ston gyis// bdag nyid chen po'i logs byas gsal bAR+Ya byed// chos kyi 'byor pa rab
437a4(skyes rabs): rgyas pa'i// mthu ni rgyas par mthong ba las// ya mtshan dge slong tshogs l+ya ni// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gsungs pa// skye ba gzhan la bla med kyi// ye shes gzi byin ma thob kyang // bdag la
437a5(skyes rabs): ngo mtshur bcas pa'i dpal// legs gsal bar byed pa yang // byang gi phyogs kyi gleng khyer dgu/ rdo rje can zhes byA bar nAM// rgyal po phyag na rdo rje bzhin// rdo rje gtum po zhes par gyur// grong khyer
437a6(skyes rabs): gang gi bdag tu ni// sa bdag lhun po btul nas do'o// pu ma snar mo zhes bya ba// de thob bdud rtsi'i zer gyis bzhin// de yis de la bu dog ni// nyi ma'i 'od dang mtshungs pa bskyed// gang la ner bu'i gdugs
437b1(skyes rabs): dag ni/ bkra ba lhan cig skyes pas mdzes// de yi bsod nams mthu yis ni// rtag tu bsams pas nye bar gnas pa// lha yi rgyan dang longs spyod dag/ grong khyer pa yis nyams myong gyur// long spyod
437b2(skyes rabs): dga' ba'i gong bu dris// gung phyir grong khyer yongs btang ba// de phyir sa bdag sras de ni// dga' ba'i gong bu zhes par gyur// pa yi mjug tu rgyal srid thob// grags pa rgya sna de phyogs rnamasu/ 'byung po kun
437b3(skyes rabs): la rang 'dod kyi// longs spyo phun suM tshogs pa bstan// blon po blo ngan blo ngan zhes// bya ba de la chags bral gyur// yon tan can la ldang ba ni// bdag nyid ngan pa'i rang bzhin yin// dr-i yi ma mes sa bdag ni// lhun
437b4(skyes rabs): po springs yig rnams kyis des// sngon gyi gnod pa dran pa yis// g.yul la mngon par phyogs par byas// khro bya mchog tu rab 'ber ba// 'phral la rgyas shing gsod brtson de// stobs rab rgyas pas pho nye
437b5(skyes rabs): springs// bu mo'i bu la rab bstan pa// bu mo'i bu khyod dgra yi bu// bdag nyid ngan pa khyod kyi phyas// dkyil 'khor nyams pa khyod byas nas// grags pa bzhin du bu mo phrogs// mi nyams sa 'di rlung 'dod
437b6(skyes rabs): kyis// stsol cig gal te ma yin na// rang nyid 'ongs khyod mtha' 'khob tu// skyabs pa'i mgron du bdag gis byas// ma mes kyis ni rab bstan pa// de dag thos nas sa yi bdag/ skye bo rlag la snying rje bas//
438a1(skyes rabs): de la dung bar byed du spong // dam gA dpung rIng zhing g.yul gyi ni// sdums la chus des gru dag gi/ gaM gU'i 'gram na gnas pa yi// mA mes glong khyer dag tu phyin// blon po g.yo gA sde
438a2(skyes rabs): dang bcas pa// de yi kun rtog rtse dga' yis// lha yi zas ni rab 'khrungs pa// sa badrig lhun po sA mthong gyur nas// 'di ni lha zhes deswa byAs+ya te// rung nyid de yi drung song nas// mauchi ma zag cing mag+nin
438a3(skyes rabs): par bya zung // rin chen kun+da gyis rab tu mchod// dro yisA gus pas mchod pa des// rang gi grong khyer phyin nas ni// 'dzam gling skye ba lha yis ni// longs spyod ltar bcas lhag par bsgrubs// de spyod phun tshogs
438a4(skyes rabs): la mtshon te// dge slong gros rgyal ba nI// kun mkhyen gyis kyang de dag la// de yi phun tshogs rgyu mtshan gsungs// ba ra NA sir skye gzhan de// bram ze rtsa bya can zhes gyur// de yis nad kyis gzi ro ba yis// rang
438a5(skyes rabs): sangs rgyas la sman dgra ni// bsos pa'i mtsham sau la thub par byas// gdung pa gang la gdung kyang bzung // bsod nams des rgyu lnga gdugs can de// lha yi longs spyod snod du gyur// nga nyod dga' ba'i gong bu de// blo
438a6(skyes rabs): ngan de yang lhas byin no// zhes pa bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa// thos nas dge slong ya mtshan gyur// kye ma gang zhig yon tan 'dzin dang 'byor pa'i mthu dang ni// lha yi nye bar longs spyod skal bzang srid pa'i bdag
438b1(skyes rabs): po dag ring du gnas shA sdug par gyur pa gad+ha byur ltung ba drug/ ba cung yang 'dun pa de dag bsod rnams rnam 'phrul yin// s+yA pa dag pa'i dbang pos byas pa'i byung rgyu sems dpa'i rtogs pa
438b2(skyes rabs): pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las dga' ba'i grong bu'i rtogs pa brjod po'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa gsum pa'o// / legs pa'i lam la yid la re ba rlab rgyas grub gyur cing // dam pa'i legs byas
438b3(skyes rabs): dri med 'jug ngogs gtsang ma bsngags par 'os// 'jigs rung 'khor ba'i chu srin 'byung gnas dag gi zam stegs gyur// dam pa'i sgrogs nyid dge ba spro ba'i rang bzhin pho nya yin// mnyan du yod pa dag tu
438b4(skyes rabs): sngon// khyim bad+mag pad+ma zhes pa'i bu// dang pa zhes bya bcom ldan gyi// 'bad pas dgra bcom gnas la ni// rab da dri med snying rje yi// gzigs pa bdud rtsis bzung mthong nas// rjes 'dzin brtson pas 'brel de la
438b5(skyes rabs): de slong rnams kyis rab gsol pa// bcom ldan+da rigs kyi bu 'di ni// bag chags lhag ma dag gi yul// dran pa ma zhi rab byung yang klu khyim la mngon par phyogs par gyur// de ni rab 'ab bcom ldan gyis// 'dul ba
438b6(skyes rabs): dag la rnam par sbyar// kye ma rje bzung chen po yis// kun rmongs dag dang bral bar mdzod// de skad dge slong ya mtshan zhing kaM/ dga' ba'i bdud rtsi bran pas zhus// gus le mnyes gshin bcom ldan 'das// thams cad
439a1(skyes rabs): mkhyen pas der gsungs pa// sngon gyi yang bdag gis dge ba la// 'di ni 'bad nas rnam par bkod// sngon ni bka' thub na gsu ni// thub pa brtul zhugs bzang zhes gyur// de dus de yi gnas
439a2(skyes rabs): su bdag/ ri bong gsal bar sgra byed pa// de yi gtam la yid gcugs skyes// mdza' ba dang ldan rtag gnas gyur// de nas chur med kyis bcom ste// rtsa ba 'bras bu chu skam tsho// nags su yid byung gus pa de// grong mthar
439a3(skyes rabs): 'gro baR+Sha 'dod par gyur// bdag gis gus pa de la smras// dam pa khyod ni rnam par mkhas// dka' thub nor can dka' thub kyi// nags ni yongs btang ji ltar rigs// rnam mang 'bral ba'i mya ngan du// bying ba'i skye bos
439a4(skyes rabs): glang ba'i phyir// rmongs pa'i gdon gyi nyon mongs kyis// gzung bar gyur pa grong gi sa// bud med lcags sgrog du cor bzod dka' bu yi zhags pa dang // g.yog 'khor gyis dkris brtan pa'i gnyen gyi dri ba dang /
439a5(skyes rabs): mi srun tshogs pa'i nad dang blo ngan gyis bcings mun chen can// btang ba'i khyim+bu la blo ldan su zhig slar yang reg par byed// sna tshogs 'bral ba'i mya ngan stug po yang yang rmongs pa skyed par byed// nor ni lan tshwa'i zas
439a6(skyes rabs): rnams dag gis sred pa mchog tu yongasu spel// mi bzang yul la chags pa goms pas sems ni blun par byas gyur pas// nyon mongs zhing gi khyim na gnas pa rnams kyi skye ba zod par 'gyur// skye bo med pa'i
439b1(skyes rabs): nags su zhi ba'i khyad par dag gis tshig pa rnams// yul gyis longs spyod la chags chang gis blo gros myos shing g.yo mi 'gyur// mdza' bo dang bral du ba rgyas pas mig ni mtsha mas 'khrug mi 'gyur//
439b2(skyes rabs): gzir dang 'thab mo khro dang gdung ba'i tshogs rnams dgra gis sreg mi 'gyuraka/ nugs las yid byung la grong la chags// grong las yid byung nags tshul dran// skyes bu rnams ni rab zhi las// phyir phyogs zhar la
439b3(skyes rabs): 'byung ba yin// glong gi dul ba'i g.yon la khyod// dus min blo gros yod ma byed // grong dang 'grogs pas yul la ni// chags rnams thog ma nyid du 'ching // dus kyis 'di nyid du ni khyod// 'bras bu thob pa 'byung bar
439b4(skyes rabs): 'gyur// bdag gi sha nI drag pA yiswA// dA ni srog gi gzungs dgra mdzod// tsos pA badz+rod nus bdug gis ni// nye ba'i me la rang nyid mchongs// des kyang myur du rab blangs nas// yongasu 'khyud de bdag la smras// gzu
439b5(skyes rabs): lums po'i 'gul pa 'di// khyod ni ci yi slad du byed// nags 'di las ni bdag mi 'gro// khyod mtshungs mdza' byo ga la rnyed// de yis gus pa de brjod cing // bdag gis mkha' la bltas po'i tshe// 'phrul la char ni rab

440a1(skyes rabs): dris/ de nas bdug gis de la smras// bdag ni spyod pa 'di dag gis// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod// skye ba gzhan la 'gro ba rnams// bsgral slang rgyal bar bdag gyur cig/
440a2(skyes rabs): ces brjod de yis bdag lha smras// khyod ni de bzhin gshegs par gyur// glang che yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// thams cang mkhyen por khyod gyur pa// dri tshe bdag gis lus gzhan no// khyod kyi rjesu gzung

440b1(skyes rabs): pas kun spyong gAtsang ma rnams la ni// rdzun gyi skyon brjod mi bzang dug ni rab tu skyo byed pa// sdig slong yongasu gdung ba brgyad mas gzir ba de dag ni// mi bzang 'dod bya min pa'i rab rib khung du 'jug par
440b2(skyes rabs): 'gyur// kha tshi rA ri yi gnas su ni// r+ye ba tau kra zhes pa sngon// 'byung po kun la brtse bo'i gnas// dge slong brtul zhugs bai cad pa byung // nam zhig de yi bum nang du// shing shun ngur smrigA dang gis ni// nugra

440b4(skyes rabs): naswa// chos gos tshos khu mchod pA yi// me la sa skyesaM pA'i du pA dang // mthong nas be'u bac+doMs par bsnams// de nas mA nau cha lagu rnams dang // lhan+da cig gnyis skyes ri la 'dzegs// dge slong re bA ta
440b5(skyes rabs): la ni// mngon phyogs du lAM bas rab dris pa// 'phag sngo pa 'di dag ci zhig mdzad// ces pa daM yi gus pas dris// bzang po 'di ni gros 'tshed ces// rI ba ta yis de la smras// gnas skabs der ni sngon med kyi//
440b6(skyes rabs): de yaM las kyi rnam smin gyi// 'tshed pa de ni ba lang gi/ sha khrag chu dang bcas par gyur// sgrub byed 'khrug par gyur pa na// bde ba sdug bsngal nyid 'gyur zhing // dkar po dag kyang nag por 'gyur// chos
441a1(skyes rabs): kyang chos min nyid du 'gyur// rdzun gyis sdig pa gsal byed dang // skye bo khro dang bcas nas lhung // 'di dag bsod nams ma yin pa// yongs sbyin mtshan nyid mngon sum yin//
441a2(skyes rabs): skye bu rnams kyis nyes byas mngon sgrub smin pa'i dusu ni// skyon rnams rab tu rgyas shing yin tan dag nI nyams per gyur// bya ba phyin ci log 'gyur blo gros rnam par bslang par 'gyur// mngon par
441a3(skyes rabs): 'dzums pa chen po d+h+we paur su dang su mi ltung // 'gal ba'i sha yi dri dang ni// khyigAM gis kyang ni dogs pa yi// bram ze dwe yi bum par nau// chos gos nyid gyur pa bltas// skyon ni mngon sum mthong gyur nAs//
441a4(skyes rabs): khro ba'i rnam 'gyur dbyibs ldan zhing // mi bzang sdig pas 'drarA ba des// skrod cing de la rab smras pa// kye ma dam pa'i kun sbyong ldan// mi med nags su gnas pa 'di// glang gi wa ni 'di 'dra bye// 'dir ni
441a5(skyes rabs): su yang mthong ba med// rab tu byung bar lus sgyur cing // byA ba kla klo'i skye bor 'os// sdig pas bsgribs pa'i rdzun gyis ni// bArtu lI zhugs zhi nyid su yis shes// zhes des rmod bcas brjod pa'i tshe// raM bAt+ta
441a6(skyes rabs): yis rab bsams pa// skyon ni mngon sum mtshon 'di la// lan med bdag ni ci zhig smra// bdag gi ca zhig spro// bdag gi 'di ni lhas bcom zhes// brjod kyang su zhig bden par 'dzin// mngon sum gsang
441b1(skyes rabs): ba'i skye ba ni// bzhad gang bdag gi gnas su 'gyur// mi smra 'ba' zhig la brten te// nye bar gnas pa kun bzod bya// bA dgu la bcos su med pa 'di// chu las me naM rab tu 'khrungs// skyon la yon tan
441b2(skyes rabs): phul byung myur du yon tan dug+na lnga skyon// bdud rtsi'i gnas la dug dang dug la yAng bdud rtsi ste// dris par myong bya duMs ni mig 'phrul byed pa'i bud med 'di// rtag tu rmad byung rang bzhin nyid ni rab tu
441b3(skyes rabs): ston par byed// ces snyems de ni mi smyo bas// gnyis skyes lhag par khros gyur te// sdig pa bzhin du sbom po yau// dau byug pa mgo la yang dag bsnun// khrag gis bgos dri gnyis skyes des// bcings nas
441b4(skyes rabs): saM bdag mdun sar khring// de bzhin sha dang bcas por bstan// btson khang dag gi mgron du byas// skyon med dgra ni nyin mongs spyod// sdig pa sbas pa dar gyur pa// dbang med mtsha ba'i rnam pA la// su yi
441b5(skyes rabs): dag pa su yis shes// btsong khang dag tu bcing pa de// dus kyis brjod par gyur pa na// be'u thob nas gnyis skyes ni// tshul+la ngani dro chos cad mi smra// de nas lo ni bcu gnyis na// na mkha'i skad kyis rtogs
441b6(skyes rabs): byas shing // de slob kyis spun mi bdag gi/ dge slong bcings pa dag las bkrol// btson ra dag las keng rus bzhim ring pa'i rnam pa mdog mi sdug gos med skra ni gyan du langs// de ni yi dgas
442a1(skyes rabs): bzhin du 'thon// kye ma rdo rje steng ri mo bzhin// las kyi rgyun ni g.yo ba med// gang phyir mngon shes thob pas kyang // drag po'i nyon mongs sdug bsngal thob// dri mthongs bdag dga' bo ni//
442a2(skyes rabs): drag por 'gyod pas rabA gdungs pas// bdagu med las byung bdag nyid kyis// bsod nams dman+da pa nyid la smad// de yis dge slong zhabs la gtugs// dang byis gos kyis g.yogs nas smras// mi
442a3(skyes rabs): shes las skyes bdag gi skyon// 'phags pa khyod kyis bzod par 'os// gnyis skyes de yis de tshe nyid// be'u dgi ni thams cad thob// sdig can dag ni gti mug gis// khyod nyid bcings pa brjed par gyur//
442a4(skyes rabs): mAdun sar khyod kyi su yis kyang // skal bzhan pas yong mra shes// sa bdag lhung bar thob pa na// dag pa rnams la chad pa lhung // sa yi mugon pos 'di brjod tshe// bzod pas bsam pa rab bkrus pa// raM ba ta
442a5(skyes rabs): yis de la smros// rgyal po bdag la khro ba med// ci yang khyod kyis gnod ma byas// nyon mongs rgya che lhung gyur pa// bdag la ra las mtshungs pa'i 'bras// smin pa de ni nye bar gnas// gang zhig 'dod ldan nyid kyis tshud
442a6(skyes rabs): pa kun gyis mgrin nas 'dzin par byed pa dang // gang zhig phun tshogs yan log thams cad lhag pa'i longs spyod skal bzang nyams byed dang // gang zhig rang 'dod bde ba'i gnas su rnam par rtse dang gang zhig ring du
442b1(skyes rabs): 'ching byed pa// de dag skyes bu rnams kyi rang las 'khor ba'i 'khri shing smin pa'i 'bras bu bkra// zhes smra de la mi bdag gis// dge mtshan dag las rab smras pa// blo bzang khyod kyi 'di yang ni// las ngan ci yi
442b2(skyes rabs): 'bras bu yin// des smrasa~M ba ra NA sIr sngon// ku tha zhes pa gdug spyod can// ba lang rku zhing de yaM shAs// zas ni sgrub pa dag tu gyur// nam zhig bA lung bsad pa yi// shra bzung 'jigs nas bros pa dag/ ba lcang bsrung
442b3(skyes rabs): ba 'khor bcus rnams// khros pa yi ni mngon par gtses// de nas bdag gis nye bar ni// gsar pa'i sha dag rab bkod nas// rang sangs rgyas ni chom rkun no// zhes pa de dge rnams la bstan// ba lang gsod sdig
442b4(skyes rabs): drag pos khros// de dag gis de sha mthong nas// 'bad nas 'di ni gsang bya zhes// tshogs pa rnams kyis bcings te bzung // de nas 'gyod byas bdag gis ni// nyi ma bcu gnyis na song ste// bdag gis sdig byas
442b5(skyes rabs): zhes brjod nas// de ni btson ra drug nas btang // sdig pa de smin bdag gis ni// dmyal bar yun ring nyams myong nas// skye ba 'dir yang nyon mongs ni/ lo ni bcu gnyis rab tu thob// zhes brjod mi bdag la gsol
442b6(skyes rabs): nas lha dang lha min rab 'dud thob/ rdzu 'phrul bsten na re bi ta// dge slong rnams dang lhan gcig song // bden med skyon gyi bye brag rigs pa ni// mngon sum du mtshon mi nyams mtshan nyid kyis// brlang pos zil
443a1(skyes rabs): mnan skye bo dam pa ni// yul gzhan dag tu btsongs bzhin ci zhig brjod// ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shI
443a2(skyes rabs): shing las/ re ba ta yi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa lnga pa'o// // rgyal bar 'dod rnams bzhin du stobs kyis ni// bzod dka' 'khor ba'i dgra yi stobs bcom nas// dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid
443a3(skyes rabs): chen po ni// rgyas pa bstan pa rnams kyis thob par 'gyur// gang che grong khyer lta bu'i mdo// bcom ldan gyis gsungs de yi tshe// dge slong rnams kyi dge mtshan las// dris pa de yi rab gsungs pa// grong khyer
443a4(skyes rabs): gser can zhes pa ni/ skye bo mtho ris 'od ldan byung // dar ni mi bdag 'od dang ldan// gser zhes bya ba byung bar gyur// de yi dga' ba mchog tu ni// rabyA rgyas pa dag la gnas// bu ni gser gyi go cha dang // bu mo pa
443a5(skyes rabs): gser 'od dag tu gyur// dus kyi lang tshwa lha mdzes shing // nu ma'i me tog phun bus mdzes/ mdzes pa de mdzes dpyid kyi nI// yid 'ong dbyib can 'khri shing bzhin// gzhon la mdza' bas yongs 'dris pa// blon
443a6(skyes rabs): po'i bu gzhon 'did ldan ni// 'dod pa'i snying po zhes pa yi// de la dal gyis 'dod pa bsten// me tog dus su rab zhugs shing // lang tsho can la brtan 'phrog tshe// snye ma dang 'grogs bung ba ni// yang dag rgyub cu
443b1(skyes rabs): sa zlogs/ bu mo spyod tshul nyams pa dag/ shes nas sa bdag khengs ldan ni// mi bzang mya ngan khro ba yi// me gnyis dag la tshungs par zhugs// khengs pa bsten pa rnams la bsod nams kyis//
443b2(skyes rabs): tshad 'os rigs ni bu mos dman par 'gyur/ bslang bya sbyin pa'i slong ba'i gdong bzhin du// skad cig gis ni bu mos rigs nyams byed// de nAs sa yi bdag po'i bkas// bu mo blon po'i bu de yang // bka'
443b3(skyes rabs): ni byed pa rnams dgra gis// blangs nas gsod pa'i gAnasau suM khyer// de nas skyabs ni zhu bar byed pa// de dag snying rje rgyas pa yi// rgyal sras kyis ni rang grol las// grong khyer gzhan pa dag tu khrid // de nas
443b4(skyes rabs): sa bodag brtse med cing / khros pas dgra ni drag po bzhin/ bu nau nges par rab+h+r-i bas+yA de// mtho'i 'khob nags kyi 'gron du byAs// snying stobs chu gter phes bskrad de// 'jug rdzogs nags tshal saR+Sha 'khyam
443b5(skyes rabs): nus su dga' ba'i skyed tshal pad+mo can/ mi mr-id glong khyer mdzes pA thob// der ni srid mo gser gyi 'od// skye bo dang bral skye ba ni// grong khyer drag gi lha mo bzhin// gcig pu nyid nI mthong bar gyur// de yi sna ming
443b6(skyes rabs): por yongs shes nas// mdza' bas mchi ma'i char 'bebs shing // de la lan ni rab smras pa// ming po n+ya gro d+ha brten pa'i// gnod sbyin stobs chen snun byed pa// drug cu'i grangs kyis grong khyer 'di// skye
444a1(skyes rabs): bo med pa dag tu byas/ 'dri brlag lhag ma dag lta ni// bdag dang blon po'i bu re ste// da ni khyod kyi dpung pa yi// stobs mthus bdag cag skyabs pa nyid// ces pa skying mo'i tshig thos nas
444a2(skyes rabs): rgyal po'i bu yis mda' rnams kyis/ gnod sbyin phreng ba 'ongs pa dgA/ gnod sbyin gcig gi sna lhag mar byas// gnod sbyin ko Ta ra zhes pA// de nyid la ni skyabaso skyong zhing // 'bangs kyi dngos po thob pa des// dwe
444a3(skyes rabs): yi rgyal ba bsgrags pa byas// slar yang glong de grong khyer pas// khengs shing 'tshe ba med pa na// sring mo'i bdag po'i blon po'i bu// rgyal sras kyis ni rgyal por byas// ngo mtshar dang bcas bu yi mthu/ nyan rna dag gis
444a4(skyes rabs): bshad thos nas// sna yi bdag po gser gyi ni// springs yig ngag gi 'bad pas bos// yab kyis rkyod pan bcings gyur cing // rgyal tshob gzi brjid ldan gyur// dbang po dbang gyur de yi sak+Sha gling bzhi ldan pa dbang du
444a5(skyes rabs): byas// 'khor ba bzhin du dgra yi sde/ gung gisna kun tu brlag byas pa// dpal ldan rgyal po'i gzhon nu der// nga nyid de yi dus na gyur// snying stobs mdzes dam chos seng+ge'i khri la spros pa yis ni nyer zhugs shing //

444b1(skyes rabs): ba dag gis myang 'das sa de spyod par byed// gnod sbyin dang mtshungs nyon mongs brlag byas nus// shin tu dri med grong khyer lta bu yi// mya ngan 'da' bu 'ba' zhig dag gis thob// ces pa gsungs nas
444b2(skyes rabs): bcom ldan rnam par gnas// zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las gser gyi go cha'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste

444b5(skyes rabs): dag gis swa srungs tshe/ khyim bdag zas ni gtsang ma dag/ nor sbyin dang ni mtshungs pa byung // rgya mtshor 'gro bas rab bsgrubs pa// nor bu mu tig tshogs rnams kyis// slong ba dog gi dpag bsam
444b6(skyes rabs): shing // de yi khyim ni yongs gyur pa/ nam zhig rin chen gling gzhan nas/ skyes bu mu tig do shal dag/ khyer nas lha ru song bar gyur// sa bdag sngon du langs byas nas// gus pas mchod pa de
445a1(skyes rabs): yi ni/ dpal gyi rtse dga' dgod bya bzhin// gsal ba'i do shal da la phul// 'od ldan skud par yang dag chags// rgyu skar m+b+hi ni tshogs lta bu// yon tan ldan pa'i do shalA gyis// sa bAdab
445a2(skyes rabs): snying ni gzung bar byas// gnas skabs der ni rgyal po yis// bu mo gzhon nu dbyangs tsAn ma// bA gam can gyi nang song nas// legs ldan tshig gis legs bshAng blang se// rna ba'i bdud rtsi 'dod pa yis//

447b1(skyes rabs): dag gis mig zlum nyal zhing dran pa yis// 'gro ba rab tu rtogs par sgrub la chas shing skyon rnams ma lus 'joms byed pa// 'od dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan sangs rgyas rab tu sad pa nyid la rtag
447b2(skyes rabs): tu bstod// kun dga'i gnyen gyur lan cig min par rgya che yid can la// legs bshad 'od kyis bde ba kun gyi nye bar bsten pa sgrub// dri ming rang rigs chu gter dag gi dga' ba'i dbang // grags pa
447b3(skyes rabs): gsal ba skyed byed yab la bdag gi phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa dag byed tshig ni smin pa'i gter// sbrul byed bsod nams brtag pa dag ba'i mngon par sbyor ba 'di// bla ma legs byas

447b5(skyes rabs): mig ni bdud rtsi bkra bya'o ri mo chags// de ni gtsug lag khang gi dus kyi mda'// dbyangs tsan+da pir gyis rnam par bkra ba yi// rtogs pa brjod pa'i yi ge'i rim pas bris// gang 'dra bsod nams rang bzhin
