448a1(skyes rabs): nyer 'tshe'i/ dus bzhi 'jigs kyang nyams pa yod ma yin// de la rtogs brjod gcig gi gzugs brnyan 'di/ mi bzud bsod nams lnga tshugs bdag kyang 'gyod// bdag nyid
448a2(skyes rabs): chen po der nas rjes 'byung g+ha/ shin tu chung yang 'bad med chen por 'gyur// thos pa'i sgyogs kyi sku btu bya'i bdud rtsi snyan po dag gi rgyun// dri bzang khang pa bzhin gyi pad+mo'i gnas su sgrogs byed pa// bung
448a3(skyes rabs): ba'i na chung dang mtshungs yab kyi skad l+ya btung nas ni// snyan+da dngags rgya che'i khyad par lhag mo bdag gis rdzogs par byas// mAdz+nyA sa mA gser du sgrogs pa'i dga' ston can+ti dang lha yI mthu ldan dpal dang
448a4(skyes rabs): nI// dar bab rgyun gyi nye bar longs spyod dpa' rlabs rtswa yi rtse dga' btang byos nas// gus+t+ra bcas gang dgra brtse bas gzhan gyi srog ni bskyab par bsgrub la rang gi lus// zol mdI sbyin la g.yo ba med ba
448a5(skyes rabs): de la bdag cag phyag 'tshalo// dpalnga ldan rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang // sprin gyi tog+na nI sbyin bzhin du// slong ba'i gdung ba 'phrog pa dag/ grong khyer gr-I seR+Sha du byung bar gyur// gang+gA gi dpag+na bsam shing lngas
448a6(skyes rabs): 'khrungs// rtag tu gsar pa gsar pa'i dpal// grags pa'i me tog bsod nams kyi// dri bzang rgyas pa rnam par mdzes// chu gter las ni zla bo bzhin// sprin gyi bzhon pa de yi sras/ shin tu lhag pa'i
448b1(skyes rabs): bsod nams rnams// gsar du tshogs pa bzhin du gyur// dam pa'i skye bo legs byas dang // yon tan+da ldan pa dul ba dngas 'byor pa ldan pa gtong bas bzhin// de ni sras po de yi mdzes// de yis bu la
448b2(skyes rabs): dpagu bsam shing ka/ rgyal srid tshe dang bcas gtad nas// dka' thub slong du zhi ba'i go nas// ma la ya rA ni dben pas song // yab ni btsun mo dang 'grogs te// dpal btang dka' thub nags song che// sprin gyi bzhon
448b3(skyes rabs): pa 'byor pa dag/ thob po yis ni rab bsnams pa// bla ma bsten pa dang bral bas// bdagu lha dpal 'di bde med gyur// mig gis dman pa dgra la ni// ri mo'i gnas dag 'bral med bzhin// yab kyi zhabasdu
448b4(skyes rabs): la gtugs tshe sen mo 'od kyi phreng ba yis// rnam par mdzes pa'i cod pan dang ldan de yis bka' nyan pa'i// rna rgyan gyis brgyan dpal ni ji ltar bdag la sngon byung ba// de lta 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'byor
448b5(skyes rabs): pA dagla la de lta med// ces bsams de yi 'jig rten nI// kun lnga phan sla radwa nyid kyi// dpag bsam rkang 'thung gsar gyi tshor// 'bebs pa dag tu bltar byas nas// rgyal sring chen po rab btang ste// yA ba
448b6(skyes rabs): kyi bsti gnas dag tu song // 'jig rten gsum gyi snying po yi// dbang phyug sems yangs rnams la rtswa// rgyal srid chen po btang nas des// ma la yi yi rir song tsho// dpag bsam ljon pas sa gzhi
449a1(skyes rabs): ni// gser gyis yongs bkang mkha' la sodAka/ sprin gyi bzhon pas ri bo ni// dpal gyi dum bus brgyan par phyin// phra ma'i zhabs pad bsten pa yis// 'bral ba'i gdung ba rab tu btang /
449a2(skyes rabs): skabs dwer tsan+dan 'khri shing rlung bzhon gyis// bskyod cing shugs rings glal ba bsten rnamasa?// 'dod pa'i grogs par gyur pa dpyid kyis ni// mngon par 'dod pa'i spyod yul rab tu bstan+da/ khyod bral 'dod ldan
449a3(skyes rabs): ma yi mi mthun phyogs// lho phyogs rlung ni yang yong rab tu ldang // 'gro las rgyal slad nya yi rgyal mtshan gyis// rlung gi metshon nI 'phral la rab sbyar bzhin// rkang drug dkyil 'khor dag gis ma spras pa// steg
449a4(skyes rabs): por rgyas pas lci ba nyid gyur pa'i// tsu ta'i shing gis mi phyed phyag rgya bcings// lang tsho dran la mngon 'dod bslab pa byas kAdapyid kyi dpal mo dag gi rna ba'i rgyun/ ri bro'i ngos la mya ngan med pa mdzes/ gro
449a5(skyes rabs): khyer ma yi rkang pas ra bya bsnun pas// yal 'dab gsor pau nga gwa la tsA'aphas/ mdzes ma'i mkha' yi tshong gi sngo dga' ldan pa// 'dod pa'i thobs 'di skal ldan bdag nyid la// zhes te ba
449a6(skyes rabs): ku la shing me tog gi zol gyis dga' zhing 'dzum pa'i dpal rtsepa bzhin// khengs ldan ma rnams khengs pa rab btang zhing // mi smra spangs nas rkang par rab btung de// mdza' bo dag la dang bar byed
449b1(skyes rabs): mthod nas// sIn+na bA ra me tog gis rgod bzhin// ge sar rgyas pa'i khur bsten pA la sha'i// phreng ba mdzes pa dpyid kyi seng+ge yis// khengs ldan ma yi khengs pa glang po la// bsnun pa'i khrag bsgos sder
449b2(skyes rabs): mo'i phreng ba bzhi ni// rna bar snyan sgrogs khu byugs bu mo yis// reg la shai ri Shis mig kur+Ni kar// sna la gre slor rdul tshogs rgyas pa yis// me trog 'byung gnas dpal gyi sa dga' char phab/ bung ba'i
449b3(skyes rabs): na chung rnam 'phrul longs spyod ldan// sbrang rtsis myos shing rnam par 'khyams dus der// me tog rab rgyas 'khri shing tshil gyi gzhir// rig 'dzin rgyal po'i sras ni rnam par rgyu// des der gser las bsgrubs
449b4(skyes rabs): pa'i khang par ni// grub pas rab tu gnas byas rin chen gzugs// gau rI la mchod nas rgyud myangs glu len pa'i// zla ba gsar pa lta bu'i bu mau mthong // yid srubs 'tsho slad gau ri mnyes pa yi// sgrub
449b5(skyes rabs): byed la ni rab tu gnas byas pa// 'dod pa'i chung ma gzhan bzhin de mthong nas sbyin gyi bzhon pa yaM mtshan rgya cher gyur/ de nas ri dwags mig yungs dro tshwa yis// dud pas glu mthar rgyud mangs
449b6(skyes rabs): pang pa nas// dal gyis phab pas rig 'dzin rgyal po'i bu// mnga' bzhag 'dod pa dag dang mtshungs pa mthong // mig zer mdzes pa'i rgyun ldan mngon 'dod des// phan tshun lta bar byed pa'i rnam
450a1(skyes rabs): 'phrul gyis// yid ni nyes par mAtshams sbyor phro nya bzhin// de dag bA ra du 'gro dang 'ong bar byas// gsar+ya mthong la yang phyogs su lhung byas pa// 'dod pa pad+ma mtsho'i ngang pa'i rgyal
450a2(skyes rabs): mo des// skye ba gzhan du goms pa'i ro las bzhin// de yi yid mtsho che zhing dang bar zhugs// rin tshon zla bar dri med ri bong dang // bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'ben la dran po'i mda'// rab rgyas pad+mo drag tu bung ba bzhin//
450a3(skyes rabs): gas ldan de yis sems la'ang de zhugs gyur// grogs mo bu mo'i gnyis pa dang bcas der// 'dod pa gsar skyes ngo mtshas snun byed cing // brtan yang rmad byung gzugs kyi drangs gyur pa// rig 'dzin zla bas
450a4(skyes rabs): dben par mngon phyogs smras// smin legs cing slad sngon du 'ongs pa la// phebs smras bkur ba'i chu ni khyod mi byed// dam pa'i sngon sbyong yon tan gyis mdzes gzugs// legs ldan rigs kyi rjes mthun rnam par
450a5(skyes rabs): 'dzin// kha na ma tho med lus khyod lus mchog/ dran pa'i rgyan ni gsar pa zla ba lta rA// mdzes pa mu tig nor bu nyid 'di ni// rab tu mtho ba'i rigs mi mgung las thob// yang na mdzes mA khyod ni mthong gyur pa// bdud
450a6(skyes rabs): rtsis brlan pa ngeng la rim gro byas// mdzes sdug dga' ster ri bong gis mtshan pa'i/ ri mo su la phebs par smra bar byed// 'on kyang dga' bas nged kyi dge mtshan tsam// gsal ba'i slad du khyod kyis 'di smros shrI
450b1(skyes rabs): dam pa'i phyogs ltung mngon phyogs byed pa yis// su yi rigs ni khyod kyis rgyas par byas// zhes pa rigs 'dzin cod ldan dag gis tshig/ 'dod snying po can de thos gyur nas/ ngo tshas de ni mi sgra ldan gyur
450b2(skyes rabs): gang // de tsho grogs mo ma tI liM kas smras// gzhon nu rigs 'dzin rgyal rigs bdud rtsi yi// chu gter gyi ni zla ba khyod 'dir krags// nged kyi grong na rtsub 'i rtse dgra mas// lus med yus ldan khyod ni glu khyen byed//
450b3(skyes rabs): dpag bsam shing sbyin rtse dgas rab grags pa// khyod kyis grags yon tan mthu yi rgyan// zla ba lngar dkar ba 'di yi rgyan du// ming po nor gyi bshes gnyen dag gis byas// sems dpa' chen po de khyod
450b4(skyes rabs): grogs mos gtumos// drar ma'i nyes spyod bya bas ji ltar 'os// khyad par che rnams bdun du bu mo 'di// ngo tshas rnam par thul ba'i rang bzhin 'gyur// bu mo pa di ni grub ri gas chu gter gyi// zla ba drug bdagra sna
450b5(skyes rabs): tshogs nor gyi ste// gang gis mdzes pa skyang tshal du rtse che// rtag pa nyid du ku mud rgyas par byed// ma la yar skyes 'khri shing gsar bzhin phra// dang por 'khrungs gyur yal 'dab ltar dmar chuka/ bedud rtsi'i rang
450b6(skyes rabs): bzhin ma l+la can 'di// rtag tu lha dang lha min mngon 'dod pas// zhes des smras par gyur pa ni// nyung chum rgan po mngon phyogs te// myur bar 'ongs pa'i shugs bcas pas// grub bdag bu la smras pa// dge bla nor
451a1(skyes rabs): bshes gnyen dang // lhan cig pho brang 'khor na 'khor// khyod kyi bag ma'i gtam la chags// yab ni khyod la lta bar 'tshal// zhes pa de yis brjod pa'i 'phrul// grogs mo dang bcas mig bzab
451a2(skyes rabs): ma// yid ni sbyin gyi bzhon pa lA// rnam par bkod nas dal gyis song // grogs mo phyi nas 'khod do la// gtam gyis sgrol gyis yang dang yang // mdzes ma rnam par lta byed cing // le lho'i goms pas 'gro ba'i tshe/
451a3(skyes rabs): mngon 'dod gsar pa la brten zhing // phrag dog gis bzhin brtan pas btang // lam dor mig ni gtang pa yi// gzhon nu yis ni rab bsams pa// kye ma ri dgas phrug gu'i mig/ pha yi drung du 'gro byed ma// de yis
451a4(skyes rabs): 'jigs bzhin chags bcas kyi// yid ni bAdag la gtams par byas// dbugs kyi ngalu dub 'bad pas 'gog la chags shing sgra med dag tu rnam par gnas// mthong ba'i 'jigs las shin tu dogs pa 'khrugs
451a5(skyes rabs): shing dben pa rung yang rab 'dar bcas// yid srubs dag gi mda'i yis rab tu bsnun tshe skyengs pa yis ni chags shring gnas// lus 'pho chom rkun ma de bdag yid la zhugs lam grang nas ni yongs mi shes// zhes
451a6(skyes rabs): pa yun ring bsams nas rdo la 'khod// yid ni srubs bka' yi yul du gyur pa de sa// kun rtog par gyis mdun du ri dgas mig/ yang yang mngon bris mig ni g.yo mad gyur// de nas me tog rdul dang rdul gyis gang //
451b1(skyes rabs): nags tshal dben pur rkang pa'i mtsho skyes rgya// 'khor lo rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan rjes 'brang nas// de yi drung du rtsed grogs gnyen bzang 'ongs// mngon 'dod gsar pa'i khyad par bsam pa yis// sems ni rab
451b2(skyes rabs): tu bkag de des mthong nas// dran pa'i bka' yis brtan pa btsongs pa la// ngo mtshar bcas pa'i rnam 'gyur rgyu dag dris// grogs po brtan b+hi gtwe gyur khyod la yang // shin tu gdung ba'i gnas 'di nyer
451b3(skyes rabs): bstan cing // bsam pa la brten mig ni g.yo ba med pa// brtan med rnam pa ci zhig nyam su myong // zhes pa yod gcugs gnas ni grogs po dag/ rab tu 'bad shing gus pas dris pa ni// shugs ring
451b4(skyes rabs): mthun phyogs rlung gis rjes dpag bya// dran pa'i mda' lhung gzhon nus de la smras// grogs po sngon spos sde la skyon ldan pa'i// byed po yis ni gzugs gsar rI mo dag/ grub rigs rgya mtsho'i zla ba
451b5(skyes rabs): ri mi bzhin// mdzes pa'i rang bzhin bu mo dag gis mthong // de yi bzhin gyi pad+mo mdzes sdug rgyas pas gzi byin nyams pa'i zla ba dang // de yi mig dag mdzes pas mig gi dpal nI rab tu nyams pa'i ri dgra
451b6(skyes rabs): dag/ grags pa zhi zhing sdug bsngal mtshungs pas mtshan mo so sor skyengs te zhum pa yi// bdag nyid dag ni bsam pa g.yo med 'grogs pa 'di nyid mthong bar bdag rtog go// mthong ba'i rnam 'phrul gas
452a1(skyes rabs): pa yin mod kyang // mig gi mdzes pa rna ba'i rgyan byas des// mngon 'dod gsar pa nyams su myong byed pa'i// rang gi ngo bo bdag la gsar bar byas// der ni glo bur 'dar zhing g.yo ldan
452a2(skyes rabs): sgra dag sgrogs par byed pa'i rnyog pa ga la// 'jigs pas rab tu zhi bar byed bzhin yang yang gos dag sbyin+da nAMs lkug par byas// ngo tshas mi smra dang ldan bzhin du de yis rna ba'i ut+pal ltung ba la// 'khor
452a3(skyes rabs): zhing rgyu ba'i bung ba rnams kyi sgra yis bdag la legs par 'ongs sam byas// bzhin ras zla ba brgya phrag dang nI mig gnyis dag lnga ut+pal sngon po'i nAMgs// lag pa dag la brang rtsa gzhon nu rkang par pad+mo'i
452a4(skyes rabs): 'byu dA ga nastA rA bya rgyas pa// lus mchog sprul pa phra rab rdul dwag gau lA te 'dod pas rab tu bkod pa na// me yi rang bzhin bzhin du de yis bdag yid mdza' bas phug pa ci slang sred// 'dod pa'i ku mu
452a5(skyes rabs): tshal gyi zla ba'i ri mo su zhig de// mig gi pad+mo rnam par rgyas pa'i rgyur ni bdag gis mthong // gung gis mdzes pa'i rnam 'phrul bdud rtsi'i chu bo 'thung ba yis// che bI'i dug tu gsal byed rmongs pa rtags
452a6(skyes rabs): tu rgyas par gyur// ma la ya can zhes pa'i bu mo ri dgas mig can de// rtse dga'i bla ma me tog mtshon gyi rol rtsed skyed byed ma// dri med grub rig bdud rtsi'i chu gter dag gi rgyu skar dag/ sna tshogs nor dag gi
452b1(skyes rabs): nIni bu mo yin zhes byadag gyis thos// zhes pa rigs 'dzin rgyal po dag gi bu// yid 'byung gasngar pa rgyas pa'i tshig thos nas// dri za'i gzhon nu yid gcugs dag gi swa// gus ldan gnyen bzang gis ni
452b2(skyes rabs): ni daM la smras// grogs po dag las khyod kyi mngon 'dod 'di// yon tan mthu dag mtshungs pa'i gnas la spros// legs byas ldan pa rnams kyi raM ba nI// nges par dam pa'i lam du 'gro bar 'gyur// l+yA yi
452b3(skyes rabs): bu mo bltas pas mi g.yo ba/ khyod kyi brtan pa gang gis g.yo bzhin byed// dga' ma'i bdag po dag gi ru mtshon de// skal ldan 'jig rten gsum gyi mtshon bya ny+Nid// 'gro la nya yi mtshan mi rgyal ba dang
452b4(skyes rabs): ldan gcig pu mchog tu mas// sto bsangs sde la mchog gi 'byor pa 'dzin pa de nyid skal ba bzang // gang dang bral bas mtshan mo'i so sor bdud rtsi'i zor ni gzi byin nyams// dral gyis sen mo'i
452b5(skyes rabs): kha ris gsar pa phra ba nyid 'dzin lus dang ldan// brten pa sten cig khyod kyi 'dod pa gang // de ni 'bad med lag pa'i rtsen gnas// grub pa dag sna tshogs nor lngas bu mo do// khyod kyi yab kyi khyod kyi don du
452b6(skyes rabs): bslangs// 'od ldan zla bas mtshan mo la bzhin gang gi bu mo li// 'gro po gsum dga' bas yang dag sbyor ba bdag gi bskal pa bzang // zhes pa brjod nas grub pa'i bdag po gus dang dga' bas gang // bu mo ma
453a1(skyes rabs): na bdag ma'i dga' ston de nyid skyong bar gyur/ grogs po na ny+tsa khyod kyi rtse dga'i dga' ston yangs pa dag/ mdzes mA dang 'grogs bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ldan pa 'byung ste/
453a2(skyes rabs): tan mtshungs pa 'grogs pa dag ni mthong bas nu// skye bo shin tu yun rnying byed pa bsngags pa byed par 'gyur// zhes pa grogs po'i tshig de thos gyur pas// dga' ba'i rang bzhin yongs pa 'phru rgya
453a3(skyes rabs): de/ nyin mo'i lhag ma du ma'i dus mtshungs parA// blo yos rtogs cing rang gi gnas su song // de nas thun mtshams bu mo dang // 'grogs pas gur gum 'phos pa bzhin// nam mkha' yi ni skyed tshul du// nyi ma
453a4(skyes rabs): chags rtag ldan par 'gyur// pad+mo can la dga'i nyin mo'i mthar// nub ri'i ngos la 'khod pa na// de yi mjug tu thun mtshams ni// rkang pa bsten pa lnga chags mdzes// de nas nub phyogs chu gter du// nyin mo'i
453a5(skyes rabs): dbang phyug rab lhung tshe// de las 'thor thigs pa bzhin// skar ma rnams kyis nA mkha' gang // dal gyis mun pa chung ngu gnag/ mtshan mos srid pa'i gnod dgra las// thun mtshoms dmar ba'i chang 'thungs
453a6(skyes rabs): nas/ myos pa bzhin du skad ci ga 'khyams// de nas bde sogs mdzes pa yi// rtse dga' gnas pa shar gyi phyogs// zla 'char snang ba nye ba ni// tsan dan dag gis mtshan bzhin mdzes// de nas bdud rtsi skyed
453b1(skyes rabs): ni/ longs spyod can gyi ljong sa spyod kyi/ skal bzang rtse dga' khyad par can// sngo bsangs gdong gi khyed par can shar// zla ba'i rtse dga' mngon phyogs pa'i// ku mung ldan pa mthong gyur nas// khro bas
453b2(skyes rabs): zhum bzhin pad+ma can// gzi byin nyams shing zum par gyur// zla ba'i thig le gsar pa dag/ skar ma'i tshogs kyi do shal can// sngo bsangs ma de thub pa ni// dul ba'i mi mthun phyogs nyid gyur// de nas
453b3(skyes rabs): mtshan de khang bzang du// sred pa ldan ma ya can ma// gnyid kyi sprin gyi gzhon pa yi// bsam gtan ldan pas rab bsams pa// bdag ni bag mar nye ba yI// bar nA gnas pa'i mi mthun phyogs// mtshan
453b4(skyes rabs): mA 'dra na thun brgyu dang // ldan pa bzhin du yong mi mdzad// kye ma na mkha'i skyed mos tshul// rgyu skar me tig 'dzum ldan pA/ ri bong can 'grogs dga' bla yi// mtshaT mo yis ni gtong mi byed// shrIn tu
453b5(skyes rabs): ring+ga ba'i mtshan mo 'di// bdag gis dga' ba'i bgegs su gyur// rang nyid bde bya'i ror chags pa// su yis gzhan gyi gdung ba shes// zhes pa de yi bsamA pa ni// gdung byed rje su 'brel ba yi// nor
453b6(skyes rabs): bzhin du ni mtshan mo de// dal gyis mthong ba min par gyur// de nas skya rengs gos dang ldan// brel bas zla ba'i me long zags// dga' ston nye ba la chas bzhin// snang ba ljon pa tho rang mdzes// pad+ma can
454a1(skyes rabs): gyi dga' bA shar// mtshan mo'i mun pa zhi ba na// 'byung po thams cad bde bu'i slad// mig gi dga' ston dag tu gyur// de nas pad+ma ldan pa yis// nyin byed zer 'dzin+da la zhugs tshe//
454a2(skyes rabs): bung ba'i nu chung 'grogs pa yis// bkra shris gru dag rab tu bskrun// de nas grub pa'i bdag po ni// phun tshogs madra ba'i khyim dag tu// bu mo'i big ma'i dga' ston dgo/ rtson pa'i chas no DoMb tu
454a3(skyes rabs): bstar// ci ste grub pa'i na chud kyis / kAlha yi gos drang rgyan rnams kyis// bu mo brgyan pa mthong gyur nas// lha mo rnams kyiswa phan tshun smras// 'di yi nu ma rab mdzes pa// de shwalA khur gyis rab tu bsgribs//
454a4(skyes rabs): mdzes sdug sgrib par byed pa yau// shrIn tu myang ba'i rgyan gyis ci// grogs mo lus phra nu ma'i ngos l-i rIn chen phreng bi'i khur gyis ci zhig byed// khyod ni bkra bar rgyan la mkhas te mig bzang dag la mig sman
454a5(skyes rabs): 'dis k+tang+gi ci'i bzhin ros zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag lo khyod kyis 'bad nas dga' bar bsgrubs pa'i chen// gla rtsi dag gi rnyog pa rnams ni dri mo chags par byed pa 'di la ltos// de ltar kun rtog brjod pa yi/
454a6(skyes rabs): grogs mos rgyan ni rnam 'phrul ni// bkra shis slad du rtags gyur pa// shin tu chung ba dag kyang mdzes// de nas na mkha'i gzhal yas khang // nor bu phreng po'i 'od zer phreng can// do shal ba gam can lta bu/
454b1(skyes rabs): sprin gyi gzhon pa rab tu 'ongs// yon tan la gus 'jig rten gsum gyis mchud// grub pa'i mgron pos mchod par gyur pa de// rigs 'dzin phreng ba brgya phrag rjes 'brang zhing // bstar byas bkra shis sra gzhi
454b2(skyes rabs): dag tu phyin// de nas rin chen gzhal yas khang gnas pa// yid skyes rtse dga'i 'khri shing bu mo ni// bag mu dga' mdzes pa'i cha dag gis// phyogs l+ya rgyan+da dgra ster ba bzhin du 'ongs// grogs mo'i lag
454b3(skyes rabs): pas bskyod pa'i rnga yab rtses// rna ba'i ut+pal 'dab lhung gyur pa// 'gram pa rA reg pas skadang+ge cig de rabya mdzes// rtags yon zla bas brgyan pa'i mtshan mo bzhin// de nis bgra ma'i dga' ston chen po la// cho ga
454b4(skyes rabs): bzhin zhugs grub byadag bu mo yi// lag bzung reg pe gser pa'i bdud rtsi yis// rigs 'dzin rgyal po'i bu ni dga' bar gyur// khyud shug de rAg lus ni bag ma'i tshe/ shAdo shal cher 'os rin chen la 'phyos mdzes// /
454b5(skyes rabs): mdza' bas snying lnga go skabs thob gyur nus// phan tshun rap+ta drang bas zhugs pa bzhin// bag mi'i cho gla rab tu sbyar byas be// mchod yon bstan pa de dgu rkyal po'i khyams// glu dadA gAr ldan mtho ris ltar
454b6(skyes rabs): mdzes pa// rin chen stan bkod dga' ston 'os par song // de nas ngagra ston spro ba'i khyad par gyi/ gar gyis ngal bzhin 'dab brgya'i sbrang rtsi 'thungs// tsha zer ldan pa'i zer phreng nub ri yi// ngos la 'khod pas
455a1(skyes rabs): dal gyis ngal bsos bsten// de nas 'od chags nyin mo'i dpal dang ni// chags ldan thun mtshams drug kyang khrid byas nas// 'od zer phreng ba skyed tshul la chags bzhin// lhun
455a2(skyes rabs): po'i pha rol nges kyis gzhir song // rgyu skar g.yo ldan mtshan mo ri dgras mig/ nyin mo'i 'jug tu gos sngon ldan pa mthong // 'jigasau shing 'khrul pas yang yang phyogs rnamasu// rnam par blta
455a3(skyes rabs): zhing mngon par 'gro ba bzhin// de nas kau shar gyi ri rtse re ri bong can// 'od brer phreng bA shel gyi dra bas bstan// ba gem cher mdzes dga' chen po la// grub pa'i bu mo'i ga la blta ba bzhin// rgyu skar rmu/
455a4(skyes rabs): drang 'bras yod me tog gtor// mtshan mo zla bas byug mar blangs pa deR+SharA// sbrang rtsi'i brtul zhugs sbrang rtsis myos pA can// ku mud 'byung gnas ci yang rab dgar gyur// de nas nyams dga' dga'u ston
455a5(skyes rabs): chen po der// phreng ba dro shalwa rab 'byar dbu bA gA yo// grub pa'i na chung 'jig rtenA rnam pa ru mdzes// zla shar bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho 'phyur ba bzhin// de nas snga dro mchod ston chen po ni// yongasu rgyas che
455a6(skyes rabs): grogs dang phrad pa yis// nyi 'od gzhon nus li khri'i tshogs kyis bzhin// grub pa'i grong du grong pa'i rtse dga' byung // dga' ston chen po rmad byung dga' ba'i sa// nyi ma drug ni dal gyis rab 'das te// nyi ma
455b1(skyes rabs): bdun pa'i drang po ri ngos la// rig 'dzin rgyal po'i bu ni rnam par rgyu// der ni gdengs ka'i nor bu'i 'od zer dag/ rab gsal dra ba snang ba rgyas byed pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs bzhin ras
455b2(skyes rabs): can// klu gzhon ma dang bcas pa mdun du mthong // mchi mu stug par rUb 'bab thigs pa yis// phreng bsu nu ma'i dkyil 'khor dkrigs g+hor cing // rA ba dragu mya ngan+da gyis bcom 'dar ba der// snying
455b3(skyes rabs): rje'i cho ji rlab tu bsangs pa thos// kyi hud mnyis gshin sa 'o ga nor bu'i sgron// ji ltar khyod ni brlag la nye ba thobo// khyod gdong chu skyes kun dga'i tshogs bzhin mdzes// 'di ni bdag gi phyi nas gang du
455b4(skyes rabs): mthong // kyi hud dga' ma'i dga' ba'i dpyid// yid srubs mtshams sbyor pho nya lang+ga tshe 'dir// tri ga gnyen gyi srog gyur khyod za gyu ro// dus kyi gnyis 'thung gis bcom tsu ta bzhin// zhes pa de yi snying
455b5(skyes rabs): rje'i sgra thos nas// mya dran zug rngu nAng du rab zug pa// rigs pa'i dzin rgyal po'i bu yis mngon phyogs te// de la bzod dka'i sdug bsngal rgyu dag dris// ma maM khyod kyi cho bye drag po 'di// sdug bsngal drag po
455b6(skyes rabs): gsal byed ci las skyes// dge ba'i gzugs can dam pa 'di la khyod// drag por kun tu 'dar byed ci zhig dogs// nges par dge ba dag la 'os pa'i lus// skye bo bzang po dang 'grogs bde ba ster// rnam
456a1(skyes rabs): pa 'di lta bu ni rlag 'joms pa'i// rgud pa'i gnas nyid dag tu mi 'gyur ro// zhes pa de yi sdug bsngalalnga dug 'phos 'khrugs// brtse ba'i rang bzhin de yis dris la des// 'bral bas
456a2(skyes rabs): 'jigs nas bu yi bzhin lA mig/ phur pa btsugs bzhin de lnga rab smras pa// bcos thabs med par gyur bi des kyi ni// sdugu bsngalnga me dag thos pas khyod la ci// lus ngan smin pas nyer gnas
456a3(skyes rabs): bzod dka' yi// rnam pa 'di ni bdage la dus mon lhung // rgya che grags 'bar dung skyong rigs nyid kyi// mya gu bdag gi bu gzhon 'di la ni// byed po gdugs rtsa ba 'joms pa yi// sta gri rnon po
456a4(skyes rabs): 'di ni chas su byas// rtag tu zla bar ston byed mkha' lding la// thams cad brlag pa bsrung slang re mos kyi// gdengs can+da 'dren pa drag gis kr-I re na// gau swaM dmar rtags kyis mtshan pyA s+thing+ga bar
456a5(skyes rabs): byed/ gang 'dri khaM ba'i ri ni bkod pa yaM// phung po pha rol mthong min mthong gyur pa// 'dri ni gdengs tsama? lusa? zos dor ba yI// keng rus+yA phreng bsa? baisgrubs pa'i rus+yA phung yin// mthar byed so yi drung
456a6(skyes rabs): du song gyur cing // gos dmar bka' ni rab tu bzung byas pa// bdag gi bu 'dis de ring rim gyis ni// de rigs rtsa ba 'joms pa'i ris 'di thog/ ces pa 'dzegs pas myur du smre byed cing // bu ni
456b1(skyes rabs): skyes ni dbugasna dag 'byin byed m+b+ha// de yis de na gros 'drab mas sgrubs nas// s+yAng dz+harlung gsang pon+da chu ston// m+b+hih+lA d+yu gr-I g+hA tsug phyung 'gro d+hi r+m+mAn// gas par 'a la 'di ltar ts+tsha rdu na/
456b2(skyes rabs): zhes brjod bu yi mgrin bzung de yi nI// phrag par bzhin bkod ma dwe rmongs par gyur// da lAM gyis 'du shes thob cing sgegra ma daM// bi'u gcig ldan pa bzhin gzhon nus mthong // de yi sdug bsngal nigs me
456b3(skyes rabs): bzlog pa'i thabs// brtse bas brlan pa'i blo yis rab bsams pa// snying rjes dman pa gang gis rtag tu nI// gzhan dag bcom nas lus dran gso byed pa// kye mA 'di ba tshugs dbadI gis 'bad pa ni// gdug
456b4(skyes rabs): pas rjesu 'brel 'di rab tu dman// bu dang bral bar gyur pas bu med kyi// ma 'di nges pa nyid du 'tsho ma yin// gzhon nu shin tu gzhon pa'i lus can 'di// rang gi lus byin bdag gis bsrung bar bya// skad
456b5(skyes rabs): cig 'dis bsams de yis der smras pa// ma gcig khyod ni bu bcas rang sarA spong // klu dag gso dra ba'i gnaswa su bdag mchis yis// gos dmar mtshan ma 'di ni bdag la stsolA// zhes pa brtse ldan de
456b6(skyes rabs): yis brjod tsam la// yan lag 'khri shing 'dar des do la smras// 'gal ba 'di ni khyod kyis brjod mi bya// khyod ni dung gtsug las lhag bdag gi bu// bde med las kyi nyer gnas gting med mtsho// rmongs pa'i
457a1(skyes rabs): dba' rlabs ldan par bdag 'jug go// nyes pa byed pa rnams lnga sdug bsngal ni// dus min+da sgyogs kyi rdo ba bzod dka' lhung // dam pa'i snying stobs chu gter khyod kyi lus// 'gro ba'i mig
457a2(skyes rabs): dang srog gyur bskal pa ni// 'jigs kyang mngon sum bsten byed kyi// bdud rtsi nye 'di dge legs ldan gyur cig/ ces pa de yis brjod cing 'bad pas des// rjes su bcings byas rang lus sbyin pa la// gang che
457a3(skyes rabs): snyems spyod g.yo ba med par gyur// de tshe dung gtsug gis kyang de la smras// mkha' lding zas su bdag spros dang por grub// 'di la byed po la ni ci zhig bya// rgyu med mnyes gshin dag las gnos smin 'dir// khyod
457a4(skyes rabs): ni log po'i bsam pa byar mi tres// khyod kyi lus ni yon tan rgyan dang ldan// tshul bzang yongasu rdzogasuM pa bdud rtsi'i gter// srid gsum 'tsho ba yis ni bsrung bya 'di// rtswa mtshungs badrag don ji ltar btang por
457a5(skyes rabs): 'os/ srid pa'i nags tshol 'dir ni bdag lta bu// ka shi'i 'dob ma dang mtshungs rtag tu 'byung // bdud rtsi'i spun zlar gyur pa yongs 'du'i shing // khyod lta bu ni phyi nas 'khrungs ma yin// skye ba gzhan bskyod nams
457a6(skyes rabs): zong gis tshul bzang khyod// bdud rtsi bdud rtsi'i zer mthong dang bar mdzod// bdag gi thugs khral dag gis yid gdung 'di// bdag nyid kun gyis khyod ni yong mau mdzad// rgya mtsho'i drung du lus bkod gau kar+Na//
457b1(skyes rabs): sha sbar myur du phyin nas phyag 'tshal te// ma ni mra sa 'og khang par rnam sbrid nas// mkha' lding rno der skyo med bdag mchi'o// zhes brjod mgo yis sbyin gyi gzhon pA la// rab tu btud nas glu 'di ma dat+na
457b2(skyes rabs): bcas// dba' rlabs chen po'i lag pas dbu ba'i phreng // rab bkod gau kaR+Sha'i ngos su song // rig 'dzin bdag po dag gi bu yang der// de yi srog ni rab bsrung nges pa yis// 'gre bas mdun du nyung rum pa dag ni
457b3(skyes rabs): lag na dgos dmar thogs nas 'ong pa mthong // de nas nyung rum pa des phyag 'tshal nas// bkra shis gos zung de ni de la phul// dga' ston zhag bdun dag gi khrus kyi slang // cho gA bstar bas byon par mdzod ces
457b4(skyes rabs): smras// bzang po sngon la khyod song rjes nas ni// thogs 'gor med par bdag 'ong shes par mdzod// ces brjod myur du de btang dga' ba yis// gzhon nus snying stobs blo yis rib bsamos pas// klu dag
457b5(skyes rabs): gsod pa'i rtags gyur gos dmar zung // 'dod pa 'di ni 'bad pa dang bral bar a la bdag gis thob pas myur nyid du// lag 'gro dgra yis rdo tsa ni 'gro bar bya// zhes bsams gtsug gri nor bu'i 'od
457b6(skyes rabs): zer ni// rab 'bar tshogs mtshungs gos ni spyi bor bkod// gzhan ni bla gos dag tu chags byas te// mkha'i ljang babs rtags ldan pa'i rdo can song // brlan chags sbrul gyi zhag gis bran gyur cing
458a1(skyes rabs): ngos ni khrag gis dmar ba der phyin nas// 'dzegs te mkha' lding 'ong ba mngon 'dod pas// de ni lus kyi stong bsgribs rnam par gnas// de nas gser gyi khu ba'i dba' rlabs ltar// mdzes
458a2(skyes rabs): pa'i glog drag tshogs kyi sprinA dag ni// rab tu gsol bar gyur bzhin gang gis mkha'// rtag gdong me 'brar rgya mtsho'i chu bzhin gyur// de nas gshog pa bskyod pas rab bskyed rgyas par rab dkrigs rlung gi
458a3(skyes rabs): chu gtur 'khrug byed cing // nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis mnan gser gyi ri bo dang mtshungs 'dab chags dbang po ring nas mthong // glang gis dmun pa'i 'gros dag spris ni ljon pa mtha' dag grubs par gyur cing
458a4(skyes rabs): sa 'dzin gyi// rtse mo'i cha dag ltung ba'i sgra dag gnod pas 'jigs pa bzhin du sA gzhi 'khrugs par gyur// de nAs ri la 'jigs rung rdo rje bzhin// brtan pa'i lus tsan de yi rgyab tu ni// rdo rje ltar dri ga sder mo
458a5(skyes rabs): lcags kyu'i rtse// drag por sna mi byed klu dbang sgra dge lhung // 'phralnga la mkha' lding dag gis bsnun zhing lus ni gtubyas par gyur mod kyang // gzhan srog bsrung la rab mong spu long gis rgyun lus can
458a6(skyes rabs): gzhon nu dag/ brtan pa yangs pas rtag tu bdag gi lus 'di sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba'i// gdung ba ldan pa'i tshogs rnams bsrung ba'i nye 'khor gyur cig ces pa bsams// de nas thug chom 'jig
458b1(skyes rabs): rung sgra lhun kha yis mngon bcom zhing // nges par gtu byas kyang de nI gA yo med snying stobs brtan ldan tshe// lag 'gro 'di ni su zhes der ni 'dab chags rgyal po dag/ ya mtshan la chags rnam par dris
458b2(skyes rabs): slad g.yo ba med par gyur// de nas 'dab chags bdag po rab drag nyi ma'i phreng ba bzhin// gzi bAN+Di da ser sku rgya chen tshogs kyis phyogs ni ser byed pas// slar yang mngon btab myur du de yi mgo yi dum
458b3(skyes rabs): bu dgra/ nor bu 'od dam ro rab 'bar khrag rgyun lta bur rab gsal blangs// gnas skabs der ni gzhon nu yau// ha ri tsAn dan nags tshal du// sprin gyi tog ni btsun mo drang // lhan cig mna' ma dang ldan gan
458b4(skyes rabs): chu ga ter+yA zla ba 'dod pa bzhin// bu ni lta bar 'dod gyur cing // snying lnga dogs pa gnas pa yis// bsams pas non pa bzhin smras pa// kye ma ci zhig de dung yang // bu ni sprin gyi bzhon pa dag/ ri mchog mtha' la
458b5(skyes rabs): blta ba yi// dge mtshan can de ma mthong ngo // raM 'di'i ngos la mkha' lhung gi// dus 'di 'baR+Sha ba rab tu zhugs// gang gis na mkha' mi bzad pa'i// phyogs sreg 'baR+Sha pa lta bur gtogs// 'jigs pas lus
458b6(skyes rabs): nyams lag 'gro dag/ za 'dod gdengs can dgra yi ni// kun tu 'bigs byed snun pa'i sgra// 'jig su rung bas dus 'dir 'jug/ de ltar the tshom rab rgyas shing // 'dzugs bcas ngogs pa la gnas
459a1(skyes rabs): che// gats+tshag gi nor bu khrag gis bsgos// mkha' las de ni mthun du lhung // mi bzad pa yi ltas dran bzhin// mdun du shA dang sku dang ni// khrag bcas kyis gang de mthong nas// 'phrul la de ni
459a2(skyes rabs): brgyal bar gyur// bdag po'i gtsug gi nor bu dag/ lhung mthong ma la ya can dang // rmongs pas mngon bcom sgyug mo dang // lhan cig sa gaN+DI dag la lhung // dal gyi 'du shrIs thob gyur nas// btsun mo mnu' ma
459a3(skyes rabs): dbugs phyung ste// blo ldan+da rIg 'dzin+da bdag po yis/ the tshom bsnams pas rAb smras pa// bu ni sbyin gyi bzhon pa dag/ rang nyid song ste bdag gisa? blta// mkha' lding dus ni 'jigase rung 'di// lus la the tshom
459a4(skyes rabs): ster byed yin// gtsug gi nor bu 'dri lhung yang // nges pa nyid ni mi rtag ste// 'di ni gau rnyings can mkha' lding gis// za ba dag la yin yang srid// 'jig pa'i rlung gis bsnun pa yi// rgyu skar rab tu g.yo ba bzhin// gdeng
459a5(skyes rabs): can rnams kyi nor bu ni// rtag tu 'di ltar nges par lhung // zhes pa brjod nas rig 'dzin+d+ra dbang // de gnyis dang 'grogs rjes 'bra ba bcas// gdengs can gsod pa'i rdo ba can// sa 'dzin dag gi ngos su song // gnas
459a6(skyes rabs): skabs dar ni dung gi gtsug/ gsod pa'i gos dmar ngag dang ldan// chu gter ngogs su gau kar+Na ra// phyag 'tshal nas ni myur du 'ongs// sprin gyi bzhom pa mkha' lding gis// bsnun zhing gtubs pa mthong gyur nas//
459b1(skyes rabs): kyi hud bcom mo bslus so zhes// rnam par smra zhing sa la 'gyel// yang yang ri phug sgra brnyan gyis// cho tre dag dang ldan byed cing // mchi ma rab zags dwe yIs+dza ni// lhub lcib sgra yi cho de byas// kyi hud N+ya
459b2(skyes rabs): med gnyen gyur gdung ba can gyi snying rje bstod nams dag gis mtshams// gzhan gyi gdung bzhi byed srog rab sbyin le mngon phyogs myunyes gshin 'di ni ci// kyi hud tshulnga bzung gter dag khyod dang
459b3(skyes rabs): bas 'gro bla dag ni mun par gyur// bdud rtsi'i zar ni sgra gcan gyis zlos nA mkha'i mdzes pa lta buM drug la brten// gzhan la rtse bos srog ni bskyab par bsgrub la kye ma srog ni gtong byed pa// khyod kyi lus ni
459b4(skyes rabs): bskal pa'i bar nas grags pa'i rang bzhin dag tu yang dag skye sna// khyod kyis sdig can dung gi gtsugA ni sdig pa'i dam rdzab dog cing nyam nga ba// rtag tu 'chi dang brlag pa'i gnas gyur 'jigs rung smad pa'i
459b5(skyes rabs): khongasu ci slad 'phangs// zhes pa mu cor rab smra zhing // mkha' lding drung du 'gro ba yi// gdengs can gyis ni sprin gyi tog/ rjes 'brang bcas pa 'ong ba mthong // de la byung ba'i mtha' bA shud nas// kr-I nI mya ngan
459b6(skyes rabs): gyis 'khrugs pas// dpung pa blangs nas 'dab chags kyi// gang zag la ni smad bcas smras// gdings can la 'os rtags ni cung zad nyid kyang ma brtags par// rig 'dzin 'di ni ci slad bcom zhing nges
460a1(skyes rabs): bsad na mkha' lding // khyod kyis dang por ma dpyad steng du yongs rdzogs sdig pa yi// gdung ba'i lam b+hasbyin thub mchod 'di yis mtshur bA b+h+yas// 'di thos sbyin gyi bzhon pa ni// mdun du
460a2(skyes rabs): lus nyams mthong gyur nas// sprin gyi tog ni btsun mo dang // btsos pa rab tu brgyal bar gyur// de nas ma lA ya can gyis// mdun du mkhye' lding dag gis khyo// drag bsnun gtugs pa'i dbyibs can
460a3(skyes rabs): drug/ mthong nas 'tsho ba phyed thob gyur// brtan yang ri shod lhung ba bzhin// ma bcos na yang de bcom bzhin// 'tsho ba ldan yang 'tsho me de bzhin// rab tu 'khyam yang g.yo med gyuraro// brtan pa'i
460a4(skyes rabs): grogs bzhin rgyal ba yaus// yan lag kun 'khyud cing ba sngams// rmongs pas dbang dang bral ba des// yud tsam ci yang rig ma gyur// dal gyi 'du shes thob gyur cing // thams cad gdung ba
460a5(skyes rabs): smra ba na// mkha' lding chags bral skyengs pa yi/ mya ngan ldan pa dag tu gyur// de dus 'tsho ba gtong bar ni// nges byas brtan pa bzung ba yis// phywa ma dag las sprin gyi ni// bzhon+d+ra pA lus zos la
460a6(skyes rabs): smras pa// bya min 'di la rab zhugs bu// nged kyi srog ni 'phrog byed pa// gzhan la snying rje'i ngang tshul can// khyod kyi rtsub po 'di ni tse// 'gro ba'i tshogs ni rgud pa dag/ bsrung ba'i rin chen lus 'di
460b1(skyes rabs): ni// nges par mya bsrung bu khyod kyis// legs byas dag ni ci zhig bya// zhes pa sba ba'i pa mA lA// spyi blo 'dar bas phyag 'tshul nas// bzod dka' srog ni rab g.yo zhing // yi ge 'thor bar rab skyes
460b2(skyes rabs): pa/ yab cig khyod la bka' myed par// rang gi 'd-i byasa? bdag gi ni// phyi ma med pa ru phyag 'di yis// khyod la rab tu dring ba mtshon// skad cigA 'jig pa'i lus 'di ni// yongasu 'gyur ba me mtshon tshe//
460b3(skyes rabs): lus can rnams kyi skye ba yi// bgrod pa gzhan phan snying po nyid// lus can+do rnams kyi tshe 'di mgyogs pa'i rlung gi tshe dga' yis// bskyod pa'i 'khri shing 'dab ma la gnas chu thig rnam par g.yo// rgyan tu gaN+DI
460b4(skyes rabs): b+hA la phan bsod na myos gnas la yo byad ni// bsgrubs byas brtan pa'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// pha ma mchisnga ma can la 'di// brjod nas mdun du 'dab chags dbang // 'gyod pa chen pos
460b5(skyes rabs): gis ni// nyes byas smod cing gnas pa dag/ de yIs snying stobos 'bad pA na// chags bral bla mas dag byas nas// klu nri za ba las ldog la// kun tu rtogs bya brtun po byas// de nas mi bzang mtha' yi
460b6(skyes rabs): dbugs// yi ge rab tu 'khrul pa can// mig mi rab tu zum pa ste// snying stobs gsal ba'i lhag mar gyur// de nas sreg khang rab spros pa// 'os shing me tog gos kyis spras// me yi mdun du mngon phyogs
461a1(skyes rabs): te/ 'jug 'dod de yi dga' mas smras// bdag gi gus pas mnyes byas pa// 'byung ba'i draga' ma bcom ldan mas// rig 'dzin kun gyi kha lo sgyur// mchog ni bdag la rab tu
461a2(skyes rabs): 'byin// gang zhig zhag bdun nyid kyis ba dag/ bu maM yugs su'i skal ldan gyur// drag pa'i tshig 'di bdag la ni// ci skad bden pa mIn par gyur// bdag gi skye ba gzhan du yang // 'os pa 'di nyid bdag gyur
461a3(skyes rabs): tsi gau/ ces brjod de yis man+de d+ha ra'i// me tog snyim pa me la gatroR+Ya// de nas bdud rtsi'i bum pa yIs/ lag pa'i mtsho skyes brel pa yi// ri skyes rang nyid mngon phyogs te// dga' bas bu mo khyod kyi bdag de ni 'tsho
461a4(skyes rabs): zhes brjod byed cing bzhin gyi 'od kyis phyogs bgadra ste// bdud rtsi'i char rgyun dag gis ni// sprin gyi bzhon pa rab tu bsos ri sras mi snang gyor pA na// sprin gyi bzhon pa rab bsos nus// bsad pa'i klu rnams brasos
461a5(skyes rabs): pa niHmkha' lding dag la slar yang zhus// de nas de yi bdud rtsi'i char// spros pas gadrang sna can thams cad ni// gdengs ka nor bu'i 'od rgyas pa'i// snang ba dang ldan rab tu langs// de nas dga' dang rmad byung yid
461a6(skyes rabs): skyabs rnams// mtshungs par mngon pa sbyor bas 'dar byed cing // dpag bsam 'khri shing yang dag rgyu ba bzhin// grub pa'i bu mo bdag po'i drung dri song // de nas lhun po gshog pa ldan pa bzhin// 'deb chags
461b1(skyes rabs): dbang pos gzhon n+ya mngon mchod song // sprin gyi bzhon pa dag la mngon phyogs pa'i// dung gi gtsug ni lta bas ngoms ma gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyi bor lha yi bdag po yis// mdzes
461b2(skyes rabs): pa'i pad+mos rab gtor me tog rgyas pa'i cha ro// bung ba'i tshogs kyis sgyu yi yon tan gtong byas sgra dbyangs bzhin// 'chi med dgra' ba'i tshogs kyis phyogs ni yongasu grong ba babs// pha dang ma dag la phyag
461b3(skyes rabs): 'tshal de dag zhabs kyi pad+mar gtsug gi nor bu chags// de dag dga' ba'i mchim zags byas dga' gos dbang skur dga' ston legs par bsgrubs// snying stobs chu gter bsod nams tshogs ni yongasau rdzogs
461b4(skyes rabs): sprin gyi bzhon pas skad cig lnga// gsal bar 'khor los sgyur ba'i dpal gyi mtshan ma rin chen rnams ni yang dreg thob// de nas lha yi bdag po sa gus pa dang ldan pa// dga' bas mngon phyogs rang gi bstan
461b5(skyes rabs): l-i mngon dbang bskur// skabs gsum tshogs kyis phyagabyar 'os pa'i grags can// 'khor los sgyur ba de yis yun ring dpal dang bstan// de ltar rang gi skye ba gzhan gyi tshul 'di dag/ bsod nams kyi
461b6(skyes rabs): bstan drag la rgya 'i bas gsungs pa ni// bdag gis bsdebs las dge ba'i mchog ni gang thob des// sems can thams cad mngon par 'byung ba nyid gyur cig byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod
462a1(skyes rabs): pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing dge ba'i dbang pos mdzad pa las de nyid kyi sras zla ba'i dbang po mdzad pa sprin gyi bzhon pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa brgyad pa'o//
462a2(skyes rabs): dpal ldan rgyal po'i cod pan blon// blo bzang mi dbang zhes pa rigs// gdengs can dbang bzhin longs spyod can// longs spyod ldan pa'i dbang po byung // snying stobs gter gyur de yi bu/ yon tan rin chen
462a3(skyes rabs): tshogs kyi gnas// dpal ldan tshig ni bdud rtsi bskyed// rgya mtsho dang mtshungs rgya mtsho byung // de yi bu ni rab gsol dbang // sbyin pa'i bsod nams drag gis ni// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'os// sa la rab
462a4(skyes rabs): gsal dbang mtshungs byung // de yi bu ni dge ba'i dbang // snyan dngags mkhan dbang zla shar bzhin// gang gi grags pa zla ba'i 'od// dam pa'i yid ni rangs par byed// gnyis skyes pa yi skye bo dga'// rtsom
462a5(skyes rabs): pa thams cad sku la byed pa// dga' ba'i grags pa gang gis ni// bsod nams dang po'i pho nyar gyur// nam zhig bde bar 'khod de la// grogs po yon tan ldan pa'i mchog/ logs byas grogs ldan bde
